text: a tired , predictable , bordering on offensive , waste of time , money and celluloid .
translation: 一部疲惫的、可预测的、近乎冒犯的浪费时间、金钱和胶卷的作品。
back_translation: A tired, predictable, almost offensive waste of time, money, and film.

text: there 's no disguising this as one of the worst films of the summer .
translation: 这无疑是今年夏天最糟糕的电影之一。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly one of the worst movies of this summer.

text: frida is n't that much different from many a hollywood romance .
translation: 弗里达与许多好莱坞浪漫故事并没有太大区别。
back_translation: Frida is not much different from many Hollywood romance stories.

text: follows the original film virtually scene for scene and yet manages to bleed it almost completely dry of humor , verve and fun .
translation: 几乎逐帧地跟随原始电影，却几乎完全榨干了幽默感、生气和乐趣。
back_translation: It follows the original movie almost frame by frame, yet it almost completely drains away the humor, anger, and fun.

text: scott baio is turning in some delightful work on indie projects .
translation: 斯科特·巴约在独立项目中表现出色。
back_translation: Scott Baio performed exceptionally well in independent projects.

text: keenly observed and refreshingly natural , swimming gets the details right , from its promenade of barely clad bodies in myrtle beach , s.c. , to the adrenaline jolt of a sudden lunch rush at the diner .
translation: 观察敏锐，十分自然，《游泳》准确捕捉了细节，从南卡罗来纳州穆尔特海滩上穿着单薄的身体的长廊，到餐厅突如其来的午餐高峰的肾上腺素冲击。
back_translation: With keen observation and great naturalness, "Swimming" accurately captures the details, from the thinly clad bodies on the boardwalk at Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, to the adrenaline rush of the sudden lunch peak in the restaurant.

text: like vardalos and corbett , who play their roles with vibrant charm , the film , directed by joel zwick , is heartfelt and hilarious in ways you ca n't fake .
translation: 就像瓦达洛斯和科尔贝特以充满活力的魅力演绎他们的角色一样，这部由乔尔·兹威克执导的电影在真实感和幽默感上都是无法伪造的。
back_translation: Just as Vardalos and Corbett brought their characters to life with vibrant charm, this film directed by Joel Zwick is authentic in both its sense of realism and humor.

text: a lame comedy .
translation: 一个滑稽的喜剧。
back_translation: A funny comedy.

text: deliberately and devotedly constructed , far from heaven is too picture postcard perfect , too neat and new pin-like , too obviously a recreation to resonate .
translation: 故意而专注地构建，远离天堂的景象太过于如明信片般完美，太过整洁和新颖，显得仿若重塑，难以引起共鸣。
back_translation: Deliberately and focusedly constructed, the scene far from paradise is too perfect like a postcard, too tidy and novel, seeming almost remade, making it difficult to resonate.

text: morvern rocks .
translation: 莫文岩石。
back_translation: Mo Wenyan rock.

text: a positively thrilling combination of ethnography and all the intrigue , betrayal , deceit and murder of a shakespearean tragedy or a juicy soap opera .
translation: 一个积极刺激的民族志结合了莎士比亚悲剧或肉麻肥皂剧中的所有阴谋、背叛、欺 deceit 和谋杀。
back_translation: An engaging and stimulating ethnography combines all the plots, betrayals, deceit, and murders found in Shakespearean tragedies or melodramatic soap operas.

text: when ` science fiction ' takes advantage of the fact that its intended audience has n't yet had much science , it does a disservice to the audience and to the genre .
translation: 当“科幻小说”利用其目标受众尚未接触太多科学这一事实时，它对观众和这个类型都是一种损害。
back_translation: When "science fiction" takes advantage of the fact that its target audience has not yet been exposed to too much science, it is detrimental to both the audience and the genre.

text: illiterate , often inert sci-fi action thriller .
translation: 无知，常常迟钝的科幻动作惊悚片。
back_translation: Ignorance, often a dull sci-fi action thriller.

text: as janice , eileen walsh , an engaging , wide-eyed actress whose teeth are a little too big for her mouth , infuses the movie with much of its slender , glinting charm .
translation: 作为珍妮丝，艾琳·沃尔什是一位引人入胜、眼睛炯炯有神的女演员，她的牙齿有些大于她的嘴巴，为影片注入了不少纤细而闪亮的魅力。
back_translation: As Janice, Eileen Walsh is a captivating actress with bright, expressive eyes, and her teeth are slightly larger than her mouth, adding a delicate and sparkling charm to the film.

text: a film of quiet power .
translation: 一部静谧而有力的电影。
back_translation: A quiet yet powerful film.

text: overwrought , melodramatic bodice-ripper .
translation: 过于紧张、戏剧化的胸衣撕裂小说。
back_translation: An overly tense and dramatic novel about the tearing of a corset.

text: zhuangzhuang creates delicate balance of style , text , and subtext that 's so simple and precise that anything discordant would topple the balance , but against all odds , nothing does .
translation: zhuangzhuang 在风格、文本和潜台词之间创造了微妙的平衡，这种平衡简单而精确，以至于任何不协调的元素都会破坏这种平衡，但出乎意料的是，没有任何东西打破这一平衡。
back_translation: Zhuangzhuang creates a delicate balance between style, text, and subtext, a balance so simple and precise that any discordant element would disrupt it; yet surprisingly, nothing breaks this balance.

text: because the film deliberately lacks irony , it has a genuine dramatic impact ; it plays like a powerful 1957 drama we 've somehow never seen before .
translation: 因为这部电影故意缺乏讽刺，因此产生了真正的戏剧效果；它就像一部我们从未见过的强大1957年戏剧。
back_translation: Because this movie deliberately lacks irony, it creates a genuine dramatic effect; it is like a powerful play from 1957 that we have never seen before.

text: it 's a very valuable film ...
translation: 这是一部非常有价值的电影……
back_translation: This is a very valuable movie...

text: bad movie .
translation: 糟糕的电影。
back_translation: Terrible movie.

text: just when you think you are making sense of it , something happens that tells you there is no sense .
translation: 就在你认为自己理解了一切的时候，总会发生一些事情，让你意识到这一切是毫无意义的。
back_translation: Just when you think you understand everything, something always happens that makes you realize it is all meaningless.

text: the rich performances by friel -- and especially williams , an american actress who becomes fully english -- round out the square edges .
translation: 弗里尔的丰富表现，特别是威廉姆斯，这位完全变成英国人的美国女演员，弥补了棱角。
back_translation: Freer's rich performance, especially that of Williams, the American actress who has completely transformed into a British person, smoothed out the edges.

text: the film rehashes several old themes and is capped with pointless extremes -- it 's insanely violent and very graphic .
translation: 这部电影重新演绎了几个旧主题，并且以无意义的极端内容作为结尾——它的暴力场面令人发狂，非常血腥。
back_translation: This movie reinterprets several old themes and concludes with meaningless extreme content – its violent scenes are maddening and very bloody.

text: an undistinguished attempt to make a classic theater piece cinematic .
translation: 一个毫无特色的尝试将经典戏剧作品转化为电影。
back_translation: A completely unremarkable attempt to adapt a classic theatrical work into a film.

text: it 's pauly shore awful .
translation: 这是保利·肖尔的糟糕表现。
back_translation: This is a poor performance by Paul Shaffer.

text: , `` they 're out there ! ''
translation: “他们在那里！”
back_translation: "They are there!"

text: a sour attempt at making a farrelly brothers-style , down-and-dirty laugher for the female set .
translation: 一个尝试制作类似法瑞利兄弟风格的、粗俗搞笑的女性喜剧的失败之作。
back_translation: A failed attempt to create a crude and funny women's comedy in the style of the Farrelly brothers.

text: what could have been right at home as a nifty plot line in steven soderbergh 's traffic fails to arrive at any satisfying destination .
translation: 在史蒂文·索德伯格的《毒品网络》中，原本可以作为一个精彩情节的设定，却未能达到任何令人满意的结局。
back_translation: In Steven Soderbergh's "Traffic," a setup that could have served as a brilliant plot point ultimately fails to reach any satisfying conclusion.

text: oh , james !
translation: 哦，詹姆斯！
back_translation: Oh, James!

text: got some good , organic character work , lots of obvious political insights and little room for engaging , imaginative filmmaking in its nearly 2_1\/2 - hour , dissipated length .
translation: 有一些好的、有机的角色塑造，很多明显的政治见解，但在将近两个半小时的冗长时长中，几乎没有空间进行引人入胜、富有想象力的电影制作。
back_translation: There are some good, organic character developments and many obvious political insights, but in nearly two and a half hours of lengthy duration, there is almost no space for engaging and imaginative filmmaking.

text: an emotionally and spiritually compelling journey seen through the right eyes , with the right actors and with the kind of visual flair that shows what great cinema can really do .
translation: 一段情感上和精神上引人入胜的旅程，通过正确的视角、合适的演员，以及展现伟大电影真正可以做到的视觉风格呈现。
back_translation: An emotionally and spiritually captivating journey presented through the right perspective, suitable actors, and a visual style that showcases what great cinema can truly achieve.

text: an inept , tedious spoof of '70s kung fu pictures , it contains almost enough chuckles for a three-minute sketch , and no more .
translation: 这是一个笨拙而乏味的70年代功夫电影恶搞，几乎只有三分钟小品的笑点，别无其他。
back_translation: This is an awkward and dull parody of 70s kung fu movies, almost exclusively relying on the humor of a three-minute skit, with nothing else to offer.

text: a vivid , sometimes surreal , glimpse into the mysteries of human behavior .
translation: 对人类行为神秘事务的生动、有时超现实的洞察。
back_translation: Vivid and sometimes surreal insights into the mysterious nature of human behavior.

text: it 's no accident that the accidental spy is a solid action pic that returns the martial arts master to top form .
translation: 《意外间谍》是一部出色的动作片，武术大师重回巅峰绝非偶然。
back_translation: "Unexpected Spy" is an outstanding action film, and the martial arts master returning to his peak is no coincidence.

text: a wild comedy that could only spring from the demented mind of the writer of being john malkovich .
translation: 一部只能来自于《成为约翰·马尔科维奇》编剧疯癫思维的荒诞喜剧。
back_translation: An absurd comedy that can only come from the eccentric mind of the screenwriter of "Being John Malkovich."

text: it 's affecting , amusing , sad and reflective .
translation: 这是令人感到影响深远、有趣、悲伤和引人深思的。
back_translation: This is something that feels profound, interesting, sad, and thought-provoking.

text: how can such a cold movie claim to express warmth and longing ?
translation: 这样一部冷漠的电影怎么能声称表达温暖和渴望呢？
back_translation: How can a cold and indifferent film claim to express warmth and longing?

text: the film did n't convince me that calvin jr. 's barbershop represents some sort of beacon of hope in the middle of chicago 's south side .
translation: 这部电影没有让我相信卡尔文小子的理发店在芝加哥南区代表着某种希望的光辉。
back_translation: This movie did not make me believe that Calvin's barbershop represents some kind of hopeful brilliance in the South Side of Chicago.

text: exciting documentary .
translation: 令人兴奋的纪录片。
back_translation: An exciting documentary.

text: at its most basic , this cartoon adventure is that wind-in-the-hair exhilarating .
translation: 从最基本的角度来看，这部卡通冒险就是那种让人心旷神怡的风吹发散的刺激感。
back_translation: From the most basic perspective, this cartoon adventure is the kind of exhilarating feeling that makes one feel refreshed, like a breeze dispersing through the air.

text: a winning piece of work filled with love for the movies of the 1960s .
translation: 一部充满对1960年代电影热爱的获奖作品。
back_translation: An award-winning work filled with love for 1960s cinema.

text: her film is like a beautiful food entr茅e that is n't heated properly , so that it ends up a bit cold and relatively flavorless .
translation: 她的电影就像一道美丽的食物前菜，虽然看起来不错，但没有加热好，最后变得有点冷且相对无味。
back_translation: Her films are like a beautiful appetizer; they look nice, but they weren't heated properly and ultimately end up a bit cold and relatively tasteless.

text: the most excruciating 86 minutes one might sit through this summer that do not involve a dentist drill .
translation: 这个夏天最令人痛苦的86分钟，除了牙医的钻头之外无人能及。
back_translation: The most excruciating 86 minutes of this summer are unmatched by anything except a dentist's drill.

text: gives everyone something to shout about .
translation: 让每个人都有欢呼的理由。
back_translation: Let everyone have a reason to cheer.

text: it 's a setup so easy it borders on facile , but keeping the film from cheap-shot mediocrity is its crack cast .
translation: 这是一个如此简单的设定，几乎可以说是肤浅，但让这部电影免于廉价平庸的则是其出色的演员阵容。
back_translation: This is such a simple setup that it can almost be called superficial, but what saves this movie from being cheap and mediocre is its excellent cast.

text: the chateau is a risky venture that never quite goes where you expect and often surprises you with unexpected comedy .
translation: 这座城堡是一个风险很大的项目，总是出乎你的意料，并常常以意想不到的喜剧让你惊喜。
back_translation: This castle is a high-risk project, always surprising you and often delighting you with unexpected comedy.

text: deliciously mean-spirited and wryly observant .
translation: 美味而刻薄，冷静而敏锐地观察。
back_translation: Delicious yet caustic, calmly and keenly observing.

text: as dumb and cheesy as they may be , the cartoons look almost shakespearean -- both in depth and breadth -- after watching this digital-effects-heavy , supposed family-friendly comedy .
translation: 尽管这些卡通可能显得愚蠢和俗气，但在观看这部数字特效丰富、宣称适合家庭观看的喜剧后，它们看起来几乎有些莎士比亚风范——无论是在深度还是广度上。
back_translation: Despite these cartoons seeming silly and cheesy, after watching this digitally effects-rich, family-friendly comedy, they almost appear to have a Shakespearean quality—both in depth and breadth.

text: though clearly well-intentioned , this cross-cultural soap opera is painfully formulaic and stilted .
translation: 尽管显然出于良好意图，这部跨文化的肥皂剧却显得生硬而千篇一律。
back_translation: Although clearly made with good intentions, this cross-cultural soap opera feels stiff and formulaic.

text: jones has tackled a meaty subject and drawn engaging characters while peppering the pages with memorable zingers .
translation: 琼斯探讨了一个重要主题，塑造了引人入胜的人物，同时在页面上点缀了难忘的妙语。
back_translation: Jones explores an important theme, shapes compelling characters, and sprinkles unforgettable witty phrases throughout the pages.

text: reassuring , retro uplifter .
translation: 令人安心的复古提升者。
back_translation: A reassuring retro booster.

text: the most brilliant work in this genre since the 1984 uncut version of sergio leone 's flawed but staggering once upon a time in america .
translation: 自1984年塞尔吉奥·莱翁的缺陷但惊人的《美国往事》未删减版以来，这一类型中最杰出的作品。
back_translation: Since Sergio Leone's flawed but remarkable uncut version of "Once Upon a Time in America" in 1984, this has been the most outstanding work in the genre.

text: there are deeply religious and spiritual people in this world who would argue that entering a church , synagogue or temple does n't mean you have to check your brain at the door .
translation: 这个世界上有一些非常虔诚和灵性的人，他们会争辩说，进入教堂、犹太教堂或寺庙并不意味着你必须在门口把大脑放下。
back_translation: There are some very devout and spiritual people in this world who would argue that entering a church, synagogue, or temple does not mean you have to leave your brain at the door.

text: this is unusual , food-for-thought cinema that 's as entertaining as it is instructive .
translation: 这是不同寻常的，既有趣又富有启发性的思考电影。
back_translation: This is an unusual, interesting, and inspiring thought-provoking film.

text: much credit must be given to the water-camera operating team of don king , sonny miller , and michael stewart .
translation: 必须给予唐·金、索尼·米勒和迈克尔·斯图尔特的水下摄影团队很大的赞誉。
back_translation: Great credit must be given to the underwater photography team of Don King, Sony Miller, and Michael Stewart.

text: a sugar-coated rocky whose valuable messages are forgotten 10 minutes after the last trombone honks .
translation: 一块糖衣包裹的岩石，其宝贵的信息在最后一声长号鸣响后10分钟便被遗忘。
back_translation: A rock wrapped in a candy coating, its precious information forgotten just 10 minutes after the last long horn sounded.

text: what begins brightly gets bogged down over 140 minutes .
translation: 开始时光芒四射的东西，在140分钟后却陷入困境。
back_translation: What was initially dazzling found itself in difficulty after 140 minutes.

text: a painfully slow cliche-ridden film filled with more holes than clyde barrow 's car .
translation: 一部痛苦地缓慢、充满陈词滥调的电影，漏洞比克莱德·巴罗的车还多。
back_translation: A painfully slow and cliché-filled movie, with more plot holes than Clyde Barrow's car.

text: the best of the pierce brosnan james bond films to date .
translation: 至今最好的皮尔斯·布鲁斯南詹姆斯·邦德电影。
back_translation: The best Pierce Brosnan James Bond film to date.

text: drumline is -- the mere suggestion , albeit a visually compelling one , of a fully realized story .
translation: 鼓乐队只是一个简单的暗示，尽管在视觉上很吸引人，但并不是一个完整的故事。
back_translation: The drum ensemble is just a simple suggestion; although visually appealing, it is not a complete story.

text: to be influenced chiefly by humanity 's greatest shame , reality shows -- reality shows for god 's sake !
translation: 主要受到人类最大羞耻的影响，真人秀——天哪，真人秀！
back_translation: Mainly influenced by humanity's greatest shame, reality shows—oh my, reality shows!

text: take away the controversy , and it 's not much more watchable than a mexican soap opera .
translation: 去掉争议后，它比墨西哥肥皂剧看起来也没什么更吸引人的地方。
back_translation: Removing the controversy, it doesn't seem any more appealing than a Mexican soap opera.

text: the audacity to view one of shakespeare 's better known tragedies as a dark comedy is , by itself , deserving of discussion .
translation: 将莎士比亚其中一部较为知名的悲剧视为黑暗喜剧的勇气本身就值得讨论。
back_translation: The courage to view one of Shakespeare's more well-known tragedies as a dark comedy is itself worth discussing.

text: the success of undercover brother is found in its ability to spoof both black and white stereotypes equally .
translation: 《卧底兄弟》的成功在于它能够平等地嘲讽黑人和白人刻板印象。
back_translation: The success of "Undercover Brothers" lies in its ability to equally ridicule the stereotypes of both black and white people.

text: too damn weird to pass up , and for the blacklight crowd , way cheaper -lrb- and better -rrb- than pink floyd tickets .
translation: 太奇怪了，无法错过，对于黑光人群来说，比平克·弗洛伊德的票便宜得多（而且更好）。
back_translation: It's so strange, you can't miss it, it's much cheaper than Pink Floyd tickets for the blacklight crowd (and even better).

text: you expect more from director michael apted -lrb- enigma -rrb- and screenwriter nicholas kazan -lrb- reversal of fortune -rrb- than this cliche pileup .
translation: 你对导演迈克尔·阿普特（《谜一样的命运》）和编剧尼古拉斯·卡赞（《命运的反转》）的期望应该比这堆陈词滥调更高。
back_translation: Your expectations for director Michael Apted ("The Mysterious Fate") and screenwriter Nicholas Kazan ("The Turn of Fate") should be higher than this pile of clichés.

text: director jay russell weighs down his capricious fairy-tale with heavy sentiment and lightweight meaning .
translation: 导演杰伊·拉塞尔用沉重的情感和轻浮的意义给他那变幻莫测的童话增添了厚重感。
back_translation: Director Jay Russell adds a sense of depth to his unpredictable fairy tale with heavy emotions and a light-hearted meaning.

text: a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries hard to make the most of a bumper cast , but never quite gets off the ground .
translation: 一部性格温和的合奏喜剧，努力充分利用强大的演员阵容，但始终未能真正起飞。
back_translation: A gentle ensemble comedy that tries to make full use of its strong cast but never really takes off.

text: a moving and solidly entertaining comedy\/drama that should bolster director and co-writer juan jos茅 campanella 's reputation in the united states .
translation: 一部感人且极具娱乐性的喜剧/ drama，应该能提升导演兼联合编剧胡安·霍塞·坎潘内拉在美国的声誉。
back_translation: A touching and highly entertaining comedy/drama should enhance the reputation of director and co-screenwriter Juan José Campanella in the United States.

text: everything is off .
translation: 一切都不正常。
back_translation: Everything is not normal.

text: working from a surprisingly sensitive script co-written by gianni romoli ... ozpetek avoids most of the pitfalls you 'd expect in such a potentially sudsy set-up .
translation: 在一部由贾尼·罗莫利共同创作的令人惊讶的敏感剧本的基础上，奥兹佩特克避免了在如此潜在的煽情情境中你会预期的大部分陷阱。
back_translation: Based on a remarkably sensitive script co-created by Gianni Romoli, Ozpetek avoids most of the pitfalls you would expect in such a potentially sensational situation.

text: pretend like your sat scores are below 120 and you might not notice the flaws .
translation: 假装你的SAT分数低于120，而你可能不会注意到缺陷。
back_translation: Pretend that your SAT score is below 120, and you might not notice the flaws.

text: mordantly funny and intimately knowing ...
translation: 讽刺地幽默且亲密地了解……
back_translation: Sarcastically humorous and intimately understanding...

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw worse stunt editing or cheaper action movie production values than in extreme ops .
translation: 我已经记不清最后一次看到如此糟糕的特技剪辑或如此廉价的动作电影制作水平是什么时候了，但在《极限行动》中我看到了。
back_translation: I can’t remember the last time I saw such terrible stunt editing or such a cheap level of action movie production, but I saw it in "Extreme Action."

text: it 's tommy 's job to clean the peep booths surrounding her , and after viewing this one , you 'll feel like mopping up , too .
translation: 这是汤米的工作，清洁她周围的偷窥小屋，看到这个之后，你也会想去擦拭了。
back_translation: This is Tommy's job, cleaning the peeping huts around her. After seeing this, you would also want to wipe it down.

text: each of these stories has the potential for touched by an angel simplicity and sappiness , but thirteen conversations about one thing , for all its generosity and optimism , never resorts to easy feel-good sentiments .
translation: 这些故事都有可能带有天使般的简单和多愁善感，但《关于一件事的十三次对话》尽管充满了慷慨和乐观，却从未诉诸于简单的感人情感。
back_translation: These stories may embody an angelic simplicity and sentimentality, but "Thirteen Conversations About One Thing," despite being filled with generosity and optimism, never resorts to simple touching emotions.

text: there 's ... an underlying old world sexism to monday morning that undercuts its charm .
translation: 周一早晨有一种潜在的老旧性别歧视，这削弱了它的魅力。
back_translation: There is a potential outdated gender discrimination on Monday mornings that undermines its appeal.

text: what a great shame that such a talented director as chen kaige has chosen to make his english-language debut with a film so poorly plotted and scripted .
translation: 真是太遗憾了，如此有才华的导演陈凯歌选择以一部情节和剧本都如此糟糕的电影作为他的英语处女作。
back_translation: It's such a pity that a talented director like Chen Kaige chose to make his English debut with a movie that has such a terrible plot and screenplay.

text: i liked a lot of the smaller scenes .
translation: 我很喜欢很多小场景。
back_translation: I really like many small scenes.

text: some of the computer animation is handsome , and various amusing sidekicks add much-needed levity to the otherwise bleak tale , but overall the film never rises above mediocrity .
translation: 一些计算机动画相当精美，各种有趣的配角为这个本来阴郁的故事增添了急需的轻松气氛，但总体而言，这部电影始终未能超越平庸。
back_translation: Some computer animations are quite exquisite, and various interesting supporting characters add the much-needed lightheartedness to this otherwise gloomy story, but overall, the film never quite rises above mediocrity.

text: beresford nicely mixes in as much humor as pathos to take us on his sentimental journey of the heart .
translation: 贝雷斯福德巧妙地将幽默与悲情结合起来，引领我们踏上他的心灵感受之旅。
back_translation: Beresford cleverly combines humor with pathos, guiding us on a journey through his emotional experiences.

text: nothing can detract from the affection of that moral favorite : friends will be friends through thick and thin .
translation: 没有什么可以削弱那位道德宠儿的情感：朋友无论顺境逆境都会是朋友。
back_translation: Nothing can weaken the feelings of that moral darling: friends will be friends in both good times and bad.

text: bring tissues .
translation: 带上纸巾。
back_translation: Bring tissues.

text: an enthralling , entertaining feature .
translation: 一部引人入胜、娱乐性强的作品。
back_translation: An engaging and highly entertaining work.

text: as a director , paxton is surprisingly brilliant , deftly sewing together what could have been a confusing and horrifying vision into an intense and engrossing head-trip .
translation: 作为导演，帕克斯顿令人惊讶地才华横溢，巧妙地将原本可能让人困惑和恐怖的视角缝合成一部紧张而引人入胜的心理之旅。
back_translation: As a director, Paxton is surprisingly talented, skillfully stitching together originally confusing and terrifying perspectives into a tense and captivating psychological journey.

text: well-made but mush-hearted .
translation: 做工精良但心软。
back_translation: Well-crafted but soft-hearted.

text: labute masterfully balances both traditional or modern stories together in a manner that one never overwhelms the other .
translation: 拉布特巧妙地将传统故事与现代故事平衡在一起，使得二者之间不会相互压倒。
back_translation: Labute skillfully balances traditional stories with modern ones, ensuring that neither overpowers the other.

text: assured , glossy and shot through with brittle desperation .
translation: 自信、光滑，透着脆弱的绝望。
back_translation: Confident, smooth, yet infused with a fragile despair.

text: a damn fine and a truly distinctive and a deeply pertinent film .
translation: 一部非常出色、独特且深具相关性的电影。
back_translation: A very outstanding, unique, and highly relevant film.

text: filmmaker stacy peralta has a flashy editing style that does n't always jell with sean penn 's monotone narration , but he respects the material without sentimentalizing it .
translation: 电影制片人斯特西·佩拉尔塔具有一种华丽的剪辑风格，虽然这并不总是与肖恩·潘的单调旁白融合，但他尊重素材，并未对其进行情感化处理。
back_translation: Filmmaker Stacy Peralta has a stunning editing style, although it doesn't always blend well with Sean Penn's monotonous narration. However, he respects the material and does not sentimentalize it.

text: despite its promising cast of characters , big trouble remains a loosely tied series of vignettes which only prove that ` zany ' does n't necessarily mean ` funny . '
translation: 尽管拥有一系列 prometting 角色，《大麻烦》仍然是 loosely tied 的插曲，令人只能证明“古怪”并不一定意味着“搞笑”。
back_translation: Despite having a range of promising roles, "Big Trouble" remains a loosely tied episode, demonstrating that "quirky" does not necessarily mean "funny."

text: a surprisingly sweet and gentle comedy .
translation: 一部令人惊讶的甜美而温柔的喜剧。
back_translation: A surprisingly sweet and gentle comedy.

text: ... begins with promise , but runs aground after being snared in its own tangled plot .
translation: ... 开始时充满希望，但在被自己错综复杂的情节困住后陷入困境。
back_translation: ... started with hope, but fell into trouble after being trapped by its own complex plot.

text: although what time offers tsai 's usual style and themes , it has a more colorful , more playful tone than his other films .
translation: 尽管《时间》展现了蔡明亮一贯的风格和主题，但其色彩更加丰富，语调也比他其他的电影更为轻松活泼。
back_translation: Although "Time" showcases Tsai Ming-liang's consistent style and themes, its colors are more vibrant, and the tone is more relaxed and lively than in his other films.

text: a dull , inconsistent , dishonest female bonding picture .
translation: 一幅乏味、不一致、不诚实的女性情谊画面。
back_translation: A dull, inconsistent, and dishonest portrayal of female friendship.

text: a must-see for fans of thoughtful war films and those interested in the sights and sounds of battle .
translation: 对喜欢深思熟虑的战争电影的观众以及对战斗的景象和声音感兴趣的人来说，这是必看的影片。
back_translation: This is a must-see film for viewers who enjoy thought-provoking war movies and are interested in the sights and sounds of battle.

text: with an unflappable air of decadent urbanity , everett remains a perfect wildean actor , and a relaxed firth displays impeccable comic skill .
translation: 以一种沉着优雅的颓废都市气息，埃弗雷特依然是完美的威尔德式演员，而轻松自在的费irth则展现了无可挑剔的喜剧技巧。
back_translation: With a calm and elegant air of urban despondency, Everett remains the perfect Wildean actor, while the relaxed Firth showcases impeccable comedic skill.

text: by no means a slam-dunk and sure to ultimately disappoint the action fans who will be moved to the edge of their seats by the dynamic first act , it still comes off as a touching , transcendent love story .
translation: 绝对不是铁定成功，最终肯定会让那些被动感十足的第一幕推向座椅边缘的动作片爱好者失望，但它仍然是一部感人而超越的爱情故事。
back_translation: It is definitely not a surefire success, and will ultimately disappoint those action movie enthusiasts who are fully engaged in the first act, but it remains a touching and transcendent love story.

text: it has that rare quality of being able to creep the living hell out of you ...
translation: 它具有一种罕见的特质，可以让你感到毛骨悚然……
back_translation: It has a rare quality that can send chills down your spine...

text: i encourage young and old alike to go see this unique and entertaining twist on the classic whale 's tale -- you wo n't be sorry !
translation: 我鼓励年轻人和老人都去看看这个经典的《鲸鱼的故事》的独特而有趣的改编——你不会后悔的！
back_translation: I encourage both young people and seniors to check out this unique and interesting adaptation of the classic "The Story of the Whale" - you won't regret it!

text: what goes on for the 110 minutes of `` panic room '' is a battle of witlessness between a not-so-bright mother and daughter and an even less capable trio of criminals .
translation: 在《惊慌失措》（Panic Room）这110分钟的时间里，上演的是一场智力低下的斗争，主角是一位智力并不高的母亲和女儿，以及一组三个能力更差的罪犯。
back_translation: In the 110 minutes of "Panic Room," what unfolds is a battle of intelligence with a not-so-bright mother and daughter as the protagonists, along with a group of three even less capable criminals.

text: in comparison to his earlier films it seems a disappointingly thin slice of lower-class london life ; despite the title ... amounts to surprisingly little .
translation: 与他早期的电影相比，这似乎是一幅令人失望的贫瘠的伦敦下层生活画面；尽管有这个标题……却实际上所涵盖的内容出乎意料地少。
back_translation: Compared to his earlier films, this seems to present a disappointingly barren picture of lower-class life in London; despite the title... the actual content covered is surprisingly sparse.

text: the script was reportedly rewritten a dozen times -- either 11 times too many or else too few .
translation: 据报道，剧本重写了十几次——要么多了11次，要么少了。
back_translation: According to reports, the screenplay has been rewritten more than a dozen times—either 11 times more or 11 times less.

text: the master of disguise may have made a great saturday night live sketch , but a great movie it is not .
translation: 伪装大师可能做了一个很棒的星期六夜现场小品，但这并不是一部伟大的电影。
back_translation: The master of disguise may have created a great Saturday Night Live skit, but it's not a great movie.

text: if we 're to slap protagonist genevieve leplouff because she 's french , do we have that same option to slap her creators because they 're clueless and inept ?
translation: 如果我们要因为主角吉娜维芙·勒普卢夫是法国人而 slap 她，我们是否也可以 slap 她的创作者，因为他们无知且无能？
back_translation: If we are to slap the protagonist Genevieve Leplouffe because she is French, can we also slap her creator for their ignorance and incompetence?

text: i 've had more interesting -- and , dare i say , thematically complex -- bowel movements than this long-on-the-shelf , point-and-shoot exercise in gimmicky crime drama .
translation: 我经历过更有趣的——甚至，敢我说，更具主题复杂性的——排便，比这部长时间搁置的、简易拍摄的花招犯罪剧要强。
back_translation: I have experienced more interesting—even, dare I say, more thematically complex—bowel movements than this long-shelved, poorly filmed heist crime drama.

text: i 've seen some bad singer-turned actors , but lil bow wow takes the cake .
translation: 我见过一些糟糕的歌手转行演员，但小破孩绝对是最糟的。
back_translation: I've seen some terrible singers transition to acting, but Xiaopohai is definitely the worst.

text: `` nicholas nickleby '' is a perfect family film to take everyone to since there 's no new `` a christmas carol '' out in the theaters this year .
translation: 《尼古拉斯·尼克尔比》是一部完美的家庭电影，适合带着大家一起去看，因为今年影院里没有新的《圣诞颂歌》。
back_translation: "Nickleby" is a perfect family movie, suitable for watching together with everyone, especially since there are no new "A Christmas Carol" movies in theaters this year.

text: it wo n't hold up over the long haul , but in the moment , finch 's tale provides the forgettable pleasures of a saturday matinee .
translation: 它在长远来看不会坚持下去，但在当下，芬奇的故事提供了一个星期六午后场的不可忘怀的乐趣。
back_translation: In the long run, it won't last, but for now, Finch's story offers an unforgettable enjoyment for a Saturday afternoon.

text: was that movie nothing more than a tepid exercise in trotting out a formula that worked five years ago but has since lost its fizz ?
translation: 那部电影难道仅仅是一个平淡无奇的练习，只是重新搬出五年前有效的公式，而现在却失去了其魅力吗？
back_translation: Is that film merely an unremarkable exercise, simply rehashing a formula that was effective five years ago, but has now lost its charm?

text: how good this film might be , depends if you believe that the shocking conclusion is too much of a plunge or not .
translation: 这部电影的好坏取决于你是否认为那个震惊的结局太过冲击。
back_translation: The quality of this movie depends on whether you think the shocking ending is too overwhelming.

text: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen , the fabulous stains ... crossroads is never much worse than bland or better than inconsequential .
translation: 一部用赛璐珞重新演绎的朋克经典《女士们，先生们，华丽的污点》……《十字路口》往往不比平淡更糟，也不比无关紧要更好。
back_translation: A punk classic reinterpreted with celluloid, "Ladies and Gentlemen, the Fabulous Stains" ... "Crossroads" is often no worse than bland and no better than trivial.

text: pretty good little movie .
translation: 相当不错的小电影。
back_translation: Quite a good short film.

text: if nothing else , `` rollerball '' 2002 may go down in cinema history as the only movie ever in which the rest of the cast was outshined by ll cool j.
translation: 如果没有其他的话，2002年的《滚动球》可能将被载入电影史，成为唯一一部其他演员被LL Cool J掩盖光芒的电影。
back_translation: If nothing else, the 2002 film "Rollin' Ball" may go down in movie history as the only film where other actors were overshadowed by LL Cool J.

text: angel presents events partly from the perspective of aurelie and christelle , and infuses the film with the sensibility of a particularly nightmarish fairytale .
translation: 《天使》部分以奥蕾莉和克里斯特尔的视角呈现事件，并将影片注入一种特别噩梦般的童话感。
back_translation: The "Angel" segment presents events from the perspective of Auleli and Kristel, infusing the film with a uniquely nightmarish fairy tale feel.

text: nemesis suffers from a paunchy midsection , several plodding action sequences and a wickedly undramatic central theme .
translation: 《天敌》有着臃肿的腹部、几个生硬的动作场面以及一个缺乏戏剧性的核心主题。
back_translation: "The Enemy" has a bloated abdomen, several awkward action scenes, and a core theme that lacks drama.

text: even when he 's not at his most critically insightful , godard can still be smarter than any 50 other filmmakers still at work .
translation: 即使在他不是最具批判性洞察力的时候，戈达尔仍然可以比其他任何50位仍在工作的电影制作人更聪明。
back_translation: Even when he is not at his most critically insightful, Godard can still be smarter than any other 50 working filmmakers.

text: the fascination comes in the power of the huston performance , which seems so larger than life and yet so fragile , and in the way the ivan character accepts the news of his illness so quickly but still finds himself unable to react .
translation: 这种吸引力来自于休斯顿表演的力量，它看起来如此超乎寻常却又如此脆弱，以及艾文角色对自己疾病消息的快速接受，但仍然发现自己无法作出反应。
back_translation: This attraction comes from the power of the performance in Houston, which seems so extraordinary yet so fragile, as well as the character of Ivon quickly accepting the news of his illness, yet still finding himself unable to react.

text: -lrb- t -rrb- he film is never sure to make a clear point -- even if it seeks to rely on an ambiguous presentation .
translation: 这部电影从未能明确表达一个清晰的观点——即使它试图依赖于一种模糊的呈现。
back_translation: This film has never been able to clearly express a coherent viewpoint—even though it tries to rely on a vague presentation.

text: this movie is about the worst thing chan has done in the united states .
translation: 这部电影讲述的是陈在美国所做的最糟糕的事情。
back_translation: This movie tells the story of the worst things Chen did in America.

text: amazing !
translation: 太棒了！
back_translation: Awesome!

text: the ya-ya 's have many secrets and one is - the books are better .
translation: 雅雅们有很多秘密，而其中一个就是 - 书本更好。
back_translation: Yaya and the others have many secrets, and one of them is - books are better.

text: the plot 's contrivances are uncomfortably strained .
translation: 情节的设计显得过于牵强。
back_translation: The plot design seems too contrived.

text: a thoroughly entertaining comedy that uses grant 's own twist of acidity to prevent itself from succumbing to its own bathos .
translation: 一部彻底娱乐的喜剧，利用格兰特自己独特的酸味避免陷入自我悲情。
back_translation: A thoroughly entertaining comedy that uses Grant's unique bitterness to avoid falling into self-pity.

text: kids will love its fantasy and adventure , and grownups should appreciate its whimsical humor .
translation: 孩子们会喜欢它的幻想和冒险，成年人也应该欣赏它的异想天开的幽默。
back_translation: Children will enjoy its fantasy and adventure, while adults should appreciate its whimsical humor.

text: -lrb- allen 's -rrb- best works understand why snobbery is a better satiric target than middle-america diversions could ever be .
translation: 艾伦最好的作品理解到，势利眼比中美洲的消遣更是一个更好的讽刺目标。
back_translation: Allen's best work understands that snobbery is an even better target for satire than the pastimes of Central America.

text: the stars may be college kids , but the subject matter is as adult as you can get : the temptations of the flesh are unleashed by a slightly crazed , overtly determined young woman and a one-night swim turns into an ocean of trouble .
translation: 这些明星可能是大学生，但主题内容却十分成人：一个略显疯狂、极度坚定的年轻女性释放了肉体的诱惑，一次一夜的游泳变成了无尽的麻烦。
back_translation: These stars may be college students, but the subject matter is very adult: a somewhat crazy and extremely determined young woman unleashes the temptation of her body, and a night swim turns into endless trouble.

text: we 've liked klein 's other work but rollerball left us cold .
translation: 我们喜欢克莱因的其他作品，但《滚轮球》让我们感到失望。
back_translation: We enjoy Klein's other works, but "Rolling Ball" disappointed us.

text: both a grand tour through 300 hundred years of russian cultural identity and a stunning technical achievement .
translation: 既是对300年俄罗斯文化认同的宏伟巡礼，也是一个令人赞叹的技术成就。
back_translation: It is both a grand pilgrimage of 300 years of Russian cultural identity and an astounding technological achievement.

text: a markedly inactive film , city is conversational bordering on confessional .
translation: 一部明显不活跃的电影，城市的对话接近于坦白。
back_translation: A distinctly inactive film, the conversations in the city verge on confessions.

text: clever and unflinching in its comic barbs , slap her is a small but rewarding comedy that takes aim at contemporary southern adolescence and never lets up .
translation: 《扇她一巴掌》是一部聪明而毫不妥协的喜剧，以现代南方青春为目标，虽然篇幅不大，但十分值得一看，始终没有放松对目标的追击。
back_translation: "Slap Her Once" is a smart and unyielding comedy targeting modern Southern youth. Although it is not long, it is well worth watching, as it consistently maintains its pursuit of the goal.

text: soderbergh , like kubrick before him , may not touch the planet 's skin , but understands the workings of its spirit .
translation: 索德伯格，像他之前的库布里克一样，可能无法触及地球的表面，但理解其灵魂的运作。
back_translation: Soderbergh, like his predecessor Kubrick, may not be able to touch the surface of the earth, but he understands the workings of its soul.

text: there is no denying the power of polanski 's film ...
translation: 不可否认的是波兰斯基的电影的力量……
back_translation: Undeniably, the power of Polanski's films...

text: to be oblivious to the existence of this film would be very sweet indeed .
translation: 对于这个电影的存在毫不在意，确实是非常美好。
back_translation: It's truly wonderful to be completely indifferent to the existence of this film.

text: though it goes further than both , anyone who has seen the hunger or cat people will find little new here , but a tasty performance from vincent gallo lifts this tale of cannibal lust above the ordinary .
translation: 尽管它比两者都更进一步，但任何看过《饥饿》或《猫人》的观众都会发现这里没有多少新意，但文森特·加洛的精彩表演让这个关于食人欲望的故事超越了普通。
back_translation: Although it goes further than both, anyone who has seen "The Hunger" or "Cat People" will find little new here, but Vincent Gallo's brilliant performance elevates this tale of cannibalistic desire above the ordinary.

text: the beautifully choreographed kitchen ballet is simple but absorbing .
translation: 精心编排的厨房芭蕾简单却引人入胜。
back_translation: The meticulously choreographed kitchen ballet is simple yet captivating.

text: from the opening strains of the average white band 's `` pick up the pieces '' , you can feel the love .
translation: 从普通白乐队的《拾起碎片》的开场旋律中，你可以感受到爱。
back_translation: From the opening melody of "Picking Up the Pieces" by the Ordinary White Band, you can feel love.

text: empire ca n't make up its mind whether it wants to be a gangster flick or an art film .
translation: 帝国无法决定是想成为一部黑帮片还是艺术片。
back_translation: The empire cannot decide whether it wants to be a gangster film or an art film.

text: the result is so tame that even slightly wised-up kids would quickly change the channel .
translation: 结果太乏味，即使是稍微聪明一点的孩子也会迅速换台。
back_translation: The result is too dull; even slightly smarter children will quickly change the channel.

text: a penetrating , potent exploration of sanctimony , self-awareness , self-hatred and self-determination .
translation: 对自命不凡、自我意识、自我厌恶和自我决断的深入而强烈的探索。
back_translation: An in-depth and intense exploration of arrogance, self-awareness, self-loathing, and self-determination.

text: thirteen conversations about one thing lays out a narrative puzzle that interweaves individual stories , and , like a mobius strip , elliptically loops back to where it began .
translation: 《关于一件事的十三次对话》呈现了一个叙事谜题，交织着个人故事，像莫比乌斯环一样，椭圆地回到起始点。
back_translation: "The Thirteen Dialogues About One Thing" presents a narrative puzzle, intertwined with personal stories, returning elliptically to the starting point like a Möbius strip.

text: director peter kosminsky gives these women a forum to demonstrate their acting ` chops ' and they take full advantage .
translation: 导演彼得·科斯敏斯基为这些女性提供了展示她们演技的平台，她们充分利用了这一机会。
back_translation: Director Peter Kosminsky provided these women with a platform to showcase their acting skills, and they made full use of this opportunity.

text: storytelling feels slight .
translation: 讲故事感觉不足。
back_translation: The storytelling feels insufficient.

text: witty , vibrant , and intelligent .
translation: 机智、充满活力和聪明。
back_translation: Witty, vibrant, and intelligent.

text: despite its shortcomings , girls ca n't swim represents an engaging and intimate first feature by a talented director to watch , and it 's a worthy entry in the french coming-of-age genre .
translation: 尽管存在不足，《女孩无法游泳》代表了一位才华横溢的导演所创作的引人入胜且亲密的处女作，值得观看，并且是法国成长类电影中一部值得的作品。
back_translation: Despite its shortcomings, "The Girl Who Can't Swim" represents an engaging and intimate debut by a talented director, making it worth watching and a notable entry in French coming-of-age cinema.

text: interesting and thoroughly unfaithful version of carmen
translation: 有趣且完全不忠实的《卡门》版本
back_translation: An interesting and completely unfaithful version of "Carmen"

text: thanks to a small star with big heart , this family film sequel is plenty of fun for all .
translation: 感谢一颗大心的小星星，这部家庭电影续集给大家带来了很多乐趣。
back_translation: Thanks to a big-hearted little star, this sequel to the family movie brings a lot of joy to everyone.

text: for most of the distance the picture provides a satisfyingly unsettling ride into the dark places of our national psyche .
translation: 在大部分时间里，这幅画为我们提供了一次令人满意的不安之旅，深入我们国家心理的黑暗角落。
back_translation: Most of the time, this painting offers us a satisfying journey of unease, diving into the dark corners of our national psyche.

text: it 's a smart , funny look at an arcane area of popular culture , and if it is n't entirely persuasive , it does give exposure to some talented performers .
translation: 这是对流行文化一个晦涩领域的聪明而幽默的观察，尽管它并不完全令人信服，但确实让一些有才华的表演者得到了曝光。
back_translation: This is a clever and humorous observation of a niche area of popular culture; although it is not entirely convincing, it does give some talented performers exposure.

text: we get the comedy we settle for .
translation: 我们接受的喜剧正是我们所得到的。
back_translation: The comedy we accept is exactly what we receive.

text: eerily accurate depiction of depression .
translation: 对抑郁症的诡异准确描绘。
back_translation: A bizarrely accurate depiction of depression.

text: schrader aims to present an unflinching look at one man 's downfall , brought about by his lack of self-awareness .
translation: 施雷德旨在展现一个人因缺乏自我意识而导致的无情堕落。
back_translation: Shred aims to showcase a person's relentless decline due to a lack of self-awareness.

text: feels like the work of someone who may indeed have finally aged past his prime ... and , perhaps more than he realizes , just wants to be liked by the people who can still give him work .
translation: 感觉这是一位可能真的已过巅峰时期的人的作品……而且，也许比他自己意识到的更多，他只是希望能得到那些仍能给他工作的人们的喜欢。
back_translation: It feels like this is the work of someone who may truly have passed their peak... and perhaps more than he realizes, he just hopes to win the favor of those who can still give him work.

text: extraordinary debut from josh koury .
translation: 乔希·库里的非凡首秀。
back_translation: Josh Curry's extraordinary debut.

text: ... a bland murder-on-campus yawner .
translation: ... 一部让人昏昏欲睡的校园谋杀案。
back_translation: ... a campus murder case that makes one drowsy.

text: cannon 's confidence and laid-back good spirits are , with the drumming routines , among the film 's saving graces .
translation: 坎农的自信和轻松的好心情，以及打鼓的表演，成为了这部影片的几大亮点。
back_translation: Cannon's confidence, cheerful mood, and drumming performance became several highlights of the film.

text: just like a splendid meal , red dragon satisfies -- from its ripe recipe , inspiring ingredients , certified cuisine and palatable presentation .
translation: 就像一顿丰盛的美餐，红龙令人满意——从成熟的食谱、启发性的食材、认证的烹饪技艺到美味的摆盘。
back_translation: Like a lavish feast, the Red Dragon is satisfying — from mature recipes, inspiring ingredients, certified cooking techniques to delicious presentations.

text: feels more like a rejected x-files episode than a credible account of a puzzling real-life happening .
translation: 感觉更像是一集被拒绝的《X档案》，而不是对一个令人困惑的真实事件的可信叙述。
back_translation: It feels more like an episode of a rejected "X-Files" than a credible account of a perplexing true event.

text: features what is surely the funniest and most accurate depiction of writer 's block ever .
translation: 这无疑是对作家障碍最搞笑和最准确的描绘。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly the most humorous and accurate depiction of writer's block.

text: whenever it threatens to get bogged down in earnest dramaturgy , a stirring visual sequence like a surge through swirling rapids or a leap from pinnacle to pinnacle rouses us .
translation: 每当它威胁到陷入严肃的戏剧中，一个激动人心的视觉场景，比如在旋涡中涌动的急流或从高峰跃向高峰，都会唤醒我们。
back_translation: Whenever it threatens to fall into serious drama, an exciting visual scene, such as rushing torrents swirling in a whirlpool or leaping from peak to peak, will awaken us.

text: surprisingly powerful and universal .
translation: 令人惊讶的强大和普遍。
back_translation: Surprisingly powerful and universal.

text: the story has its redundancies , and the young actors , not very experienced , are sometimes inexpressive .
translation: 这个故事有些冗余，而年轻演员经验不足，有时显得缺乏表现力。
back_translation: This story is somewhat redundant, and the young actors lack experience, which sometimes makes them seem unexpressive.

text: even murphy 's expert comic timing and famed charisma ca n't rescue this effort .
translation: 即便是墨菲的专业喜剧时机和著名魅力也无法拯救这部作品。
back_translation: Even Murphy's professional comedic timing and famous charm cannot save this work.

text: a captivating coming-of-age story that may also be the first narrative film to be truly informed by the wireless age .
translation: 一个引人入胜的成长故事，可能也是第一部真正受无线时代影响的叙事电影。
back_translation: An engaging coming-of-age story that might also be the first narrative film truly influenced by the wireless era.

text: an intelligent , multi-layered and profoundly humanist -lrb- not to mention gently political -rrb- meditation on the values of knowledge , education , and the affects of cultural and geographical displacement .
translation: 一个智能的、多层次的、深刻人文主义的（更不必提温和的政治性）思考，探讨知识、教育的价值，以及文化和地理位移的影响。
back_translation: An intelligent, multi-layered, and profound humanistic (not to mention mildly political) reflection that explores the value of knowledge and education, as well as the impact of cultural and geographical displacement.

text: if hill is n't quite his generation 's don siegel -lrb- or robert aldrich -rrb- , it 's because there 's no discernible feeling beneath the chest hair ; it 's all bluster and clich茅 .
translation: 如果希尔不是他这一代的唐·西戈尔（Don Siegel）或罗伯特·奥尔德里奇（Robert Aldrich），那是因为他胸毛下没有明显的情感；一切都是虚张声势和陈词滥调。
back_translation: If Hill is not the Don Siegel or Robert Aldrich of his generation, it is because he lacks evident emotion beneath his chest hair; everything is just bluster and clichés.

text: and neither do cliches , no matter how ` inside ' they are .
translation: 刻板印象也一样，无论它们多么“内部”。
back_translation: Stereotypes are the same, no matter how "internal" they are.

text: strictly a ` guy 's film ' in the worst sense of the expression .
translation: 严格来说，这是一部“男人电影”，是这个表达最糟糕的意思。
back_translation: Strictly speaking, this is a "man’s movie," in the worst sense of the expression.

text: a lightweight , uneven action comedy that freely mingles french , japanese and hollywood cultures .
translation: 一部轻松、不均衡的动作喜剧，自由地融合了法国、日本和好莱坞文化。
back_translation: A lighthearted, uneven action-comedy that freely blends French, Japanese, and Hollywood cultures.

text: irwin and his director never come up with an adequate reason why we should pay money for what we can get on television for free .
translation: 欧文和他的导演从来没有提出一个充分的理由，说明我们为什么应该为那些可以在电视上免费获得的东西付钱。
back_translation: Owen and his director have never offered a sufficient reason why we should pay for things that are available for free on television.

text: can you bear the laughter ?
translation: 你能忍受笑声吗？
back_translation: Can you tolerate laughter?

text: `` abandon '' will leave you wanting to abandon the theater .
translation: “放弃”会让你想要放弃电影院。
back_translation: "Giving up" will make you want to give up on the cinema.

text: the movie fails to portray its literarily talented and notorious subject as anything much more than a dirty old man .
translation: 这部电影未能将其文学才华横溢且声名狼藉的主题呈现得更有深度，而只是描绘成一个肮脏的老头。
back_translation: This movie fails to present its literary talent and notorious themes with more depth, instead depicting it as a dirty old man.

text: not as good as the full monty , but a really strong second effort .
translation: 虽然没有《全裸一班》那么出色，但这是一次非常强有力的第二次尝试。
back_translation: Although it is not as outstanding as "Full Naked Class," this is a very strong second attempt.

text: asks what truth can be discerned from non-firsthand experience , and specifically questions cinema 's capability for recording truth .
translation: 询问从非亲身经历中能辨别出什么真相，特别质疑电影记录真相的能力。
back_translation: Inquire about what truths can be discerned from non-personal experiences, especially questioning the ability of films to document the truth.

text: audiences are advised to sit near the back and squint to avoid noticing some truly egregious lip-non-synching , but otherwise the production is suitably elegant .
translation: 观众被建议坐在后面，眯起眼睛以避免注意到一些极其严重的对嘴不同步，但除此之外，整个制作还是相当优雅的。
back_translation: Audience members were advised to sit in the back and squint their eyes to avoid noticing some extremely serious lip-syncing discrepancies; however, apart from that, the entire production was still quite elegant.

text: ... a solid , unassuming drama .
translation: ... 一部扎实且低调的戏剧。
back_translation: ... a solid and understated drama.

text: a formula family tearjerker told with a heavy irish brogue ... accentuating , rather than muting , the plot 's saccharine thrust .
translation: 一个充满公式的催泪故事，用浓重的爱尔兰口音讲述……强调而非削弱情节的甜腻感。
back_translation: A tear-jerking story filled with formulas, told in a thick Irish accent... emphasizing rather than diminishing the sweetness of the plot.

text: it 's fairly solid -- not to mention well edited so that it certainly does n't feel like a film that strays past the two and a half mark .
translation: 这部电影相当扎实，不用说编辑得很好，所以看上去确实没有超过两小时半的感觉。
back_translation: This movie is quite solid, and it goes without saying that it is well edited, so it definitely doesn’t feel like it’s over two and a half hours long.

text: the holiday message of the 37-minute santa vs. the snowman leaves a lot to be desired .
translation: 37分钟的《圣诞老人对雪人》的节日信息让人还是感觉不够理想。
back_translation: The 37-minute holiday special "Santa Claus vs. the Snowman" still feels somewhat less than ideal.

text: a vile , incoherent mess ... a scummy ripoff of david cronenberg 's brilliant ` videodrome . '
translation: 一个卑鄙、混乱的烂片……是对大卫·柯南伯格精彩作品《录像带》的一种低劣剽窃。
back_translation: A despicable, chaotic poor film... is a shoddy plagiarism of David Cronenberg's brilliant work "Videodrome."

text: discursive but oddly riveting documentary .
translation: 叙事性强但又奇特吸引人的纪录片。
back_translation: A narrative-driven yet uniquely captivating documentary.

text: what 's most offensive is n't the waste of a good cast , but the film 's denial of sincere grief and mourning in favor of bogus spiritualism .
translation: 最令人反感的不是优秀演员的浪费，而是电影为了虚假的灵性而否认真诚的悲痛与哀悼。
back_translation: The most repulsive thing is not the waste of excellent actors, but the film's denial of sincere grief and mourning for the sake of false spirituality.

text: like a medium-grade network sitcom -- mostly inoffensive , fitfully amusing , but ultimately so weightless that a decent draft in the auditorium might blow it off the screen .
translation: 像是一部中等水平的网络情景喜剧——大多无害，偶尔有趣，但最终如此轻浮，以至于礼堂里的一阵微风可能会把它吹出银幕。
back_translation: It's like a mediocre online sitcom—mostly harmless, occasionally funny, but ultimately so shallow that a slight breeze in the auditorium could blow it off the screen.

text: a little melodramatic , but with enough hope to keep you engaged .
translation: 有点戏剧化，但足够充满希望，让你保持关注。
back_translation: A bit dramatic, but hopeful enough to keep you engaged.

text: not only is it a charming , funny and beautifully crafted import , it uses very little dialogue , making it relatively effortless to read and follow the action at the same time .
translation: 它不仅是一部迷人、有趣且精美制作的进口作品，而且使用了很少的对话，使得读起来相对轻松，同时跟随情节的发展。
back_translation: It is not only a captivating, interesting, and beautifully produced import, but it also uses very little dialogue, making it relatively easy to read while following the development of the plot.

text: just about all of the film is confusing on one level or another , making ararat far more demanding than it needs to be .
translation: 几乎整个电影在某种程度上都是令人困惑的，这使得《亚拉腊山》比需要的更具挑战性。
back_translation: Almost the entire movie is confusing to some extent, making "Yaralashan" more challenging than necessary.

text: though it lacks the utter authority of a genre gem , there 's a certain robustness to this engaging mix of love and bloodletting .
translation: 尽管缺乏一种经典佳作的绝对权威性，这种迷人的爱情与血腥交织的结合却展现出一种特有的健壮感。
back_translation: Despite the lack of absolute authority of a classic masterpiece, this charming blend of love and bloodshed displays a unique sense of robustness.

text: it 's touching and tender and proves that even in sorrow you can find humor .
translation: 这很感人和温柔，证明了即使在悲伤中你也能找到幽默。
back_translation: This is touching and gentle, proving that you can find humor even in sadness.

text: collapses after 30 minutes into a slap-happy series of adolescent violence .
translation: 在30分钟后崩溃，变成了一系列嬉闹的青少年暴力。
back_translation: After 30 minutes, it collapsed into a series of rowdy teenage violence.

text: a spiffy animated feature about an unruly adolescent boy who is yearning for adventure and a chance to prove his worth .
translation: 一部时尚的动画片，讲述一个叛逆的少年渴望冒险和证明自己价值的故事。
back_translation: A fashionable animated film that tells the story of a rebellious teenager who yearns for adventure and seeks to prove his worth.

text: payne constructs a hilarious ode to middle america and middle age with this unlikely odyssey , featuring a pathetic , endearing hero who is all too human .
translation: 佩恩以这种不太可能的历程构建了一首对中美和中年生活的搞笑颂歌，主角是一个可怜而又惹人喜爱的英雄，极其人性化。
back_translation: Payne has crafted a humorous ode to Sino-American relations and middle-aged life through this unlikely journey, featuring a pitiable yet endearing hero who is extremely relatable.

text: a surprisingly flat retread , hobbled by half-baked setups and sluggish pacing .
translation: 一个令人惊讶的平淡翻拍，受困于不成熟的情节设定和缓慢的节奏。
back_translation: A surprisingly bland remake, hindered by immature plot development and a slow pace.

text: fierce , glaring and unforgettable .
translation: 激烈、刺眼且令人难以忘怀。
back_translation: Intense, dazzling, and unforgettable.

text: the film does n't show enough of the creative process or even of what was created for the non-fan to figure out what makes wilco a big deal .
translation: 这部电影没有展示足够的创作过程，甚至没有展示非粉丝能够理解威尔科为何如此重要的创作内容。
back_translation: The film does not provide enough insight into the creative process, nor does it explain in a way that non-fans can understand why Wilco is so important.

text: there are laughs aplenty , and , as a bonus , viewers do n't have to worry about being subjected to farts , urine , feces , semen , or any of the other foul substances that have overrun modern-day comedies .
translation: 笑声不断，此外，观众不必担心被迫接触放屁、尿液、粪便、精液或其他现代喜剧中泛滥的恶心物质。
back_translation: Laughter is continuous, and moreover, the audience doesn't have to worry about being forced to encounter disgusting substances like flatulence, urine, feces, semen, or other things that are rampant in modern comedy.

text: a lot more dimensional and complex than its sunny disposition would lead you to believe .
translation: 比它阳光灿烂的外表所让人相信的要复杂和多维得多。
back_translation: It is much more complex and multifaceted than its sunny exterior might lead one to believe.

text: miller has crafted an intriguing story of maternal instincts and misguided acts of affection .
translation: 米勒编织了一个引人入胜的故事，讲述母性本能和误入歧途的爱意行为。
back_translation: Miller weaves an engaging story about maternal instincts and misguided acts of love.

text: sometimes there are very , very good reasons for certain movies to be sealed in a jar and left on a remote shelf indefinitely .
translation: 有时候，某些电影被密封在罐子里，放在偏远的架子上无限期保存是有非常非常好的理由的。
back_translation: Sometimes, there are very good reasons for certain movies to be sealed in jars and left on remote shelves for indefinite preservation.

text: an instantly forgettable snow-and-stuntwork extravaganza that likely will be upstaged by an avalanche of more appealing holiday-season product .
translation: 一部令人瞬间遗忘的雪景和特技表演盛宴，很可能会被更具吸引力的假日季节产品所 overshadow。
back_translation: A snow scene and stunt performance feast that can be instantly forgotten is likely to be overshadowed by more attractive holiday season products.

text: some movies suck you in despite their flaws , and heaven is one such beast .
translation: 一些电影尽管存在缺陷，却仍能吸引你，而《天堂》就是这样一部作品。
back_translation: Some movies, despite their flaws, can still captivate you, and "Heaven" is one such work.

text: with a `` spy kids '' sequel opening next week , why bother with a contemptible imitator starring a `` snl '' has-been acting like an 8-year-old channeling roberto benigni ?
translation: 随着一部《间谍游戏》续集下周上映，为什么还要去看一部可鄙的模仿作品，主演是一位在《周六夜现场》中的过气明星，扮演一个模仿罗伯托·贝尼尼的八岁儿童？
back_translation: With a sequel to "Spy Game" coming out next week, why bother watching a contemptible imitation starring a washed-up Saturday Night Live star playing an eight-year-old who imitates Roberto Benigni?

text: muddled , melodramatic paranormal romance is an all-time low for kevin costner .
translation: 混乱的、情感戏剧化的超自然浪漫片是凯文·科斯特纳职业生涯的最低点。
back_translation: The chaotic, emotionally dramatic supernatural romance film is the lowest point of Kevin Costner's career.

text: in a summer of clones , harvard man is something rare and riveting : a wild ride that relies on more than special effects .
translation: 在一个克隆的夏天，哈佛人是稀有而引人注目的：一次狂野的旅程，依赖的不仅仅是特效。
back_translation: In a cloned summer, the Harvard people are rare and eye-catching: a wild journey that relies not just on special effects.

text: so original in its base concept that you can not help but get caught up .
translation: 其基本概念如此独特，令人不禁沉浸其中。
back_translation: Its fundamental concept is so unique that it draws one in irresistibly.

text: but even then , i 'd recommend waiting for dvd and just skipping straight to her scenes .
translation: 但即便如此，我还是建议等到DVD发行，再直接跳到她的戏份。
back_translation: But even so, I still recommend waiting for the DVD release and then skipping directly to her scenes.

text: this new zealand coming-of-age movie is n't really about anything .
translation: 这部新西兰的成长电影其实并没有真正的主题。
back_translation: This New Zealand coming-of-age film actually does not have a real theme.

text: quitting offers piercing domestic drama with spikes of sly humor .
translation: 辞职带来了尖锐的家庭 drama 和隐含幽默的波动。
back_translation: Resigning brought sharp family drama and subtle waves of humor.

text: mama africa pretty much delivers on that promise .
translation: 妈妈非洲在这方面基本上兑现了这个承诺。
back_translation: Mama Africa has basically fulfilled this promise in this regard.

text: we hate -lrb- madonna -rrb- within the film 's first five minutes , and she lacks the skill or presence to regain any ground .
translation: 我们在电影的前五分钟内就讨厌（麦当娜），她缺乏技巧或存在感以弥补任何失地。
back_translation: We hated Madonna within the first five minutes of the movie; she lacks the skill or presence to make up for any shortcomings.

text: much smarter and more attentive than it first sets out to be .
translation: 比起最初表现出来的，它聪明得多，注意力也更集中。
back_translation: It is much smarter than it initially showed and has more focused attention.

text: one regards reign of fire with awe .
translation: 人们对《火焰统治》充满敬畏。
back_translation: People are in awe of "Flame Dominion."

text: it 's tough to tell which is in more abundant supply in this woefully hackneyed movie , directed by scott kalvert , about street gangs and turf wars in 1958 brooklyn -- stale cliches , gratuitous violence , or empty machismo .
translation: 在这部由斯科特·卡尔维特执导的关于1958年布鲁克林街头帮派和地盘战争的可怜透顶的老生常谈电影中，究竟是陈词滥调、无谓暴力，还是空洞的男子气概，哪个更为丰富，真是难以分辨。
back_translation: In this pitifully clichéd film directed by Scott Kalvert about the gang and turf wars of Brooklyn in 1958, it’s hard to discern whether the clichés, pointless violence, or hollow masculinity are more prevalent.

text: the story is also as unoriginal as they come , already having been recycled more times than i 'd care to count .
translation: 这个故事也毫无创意，已经被重复利用了不止我愿意计数的次数。
back_translation: This story is also completely unoriginal and has been reused more times than I am willing to count.

text: you 've already seen city by the sea under a variety of titles , but it 's worth yet another visit .
translation: 你已经以多种标题看过《海边的城市》，但再去一次值得。
back_translation: You have seen "The City by the Sea" under various titles, but it's worth visiting once more.

text: in one scene , we get a stab at soccer hooliganism , a double-barreled rip-off of quentin tarantino 's climactic shootout -- and meat loaf explodes .
translation: 在一个场景中，我们对足球流氓文化进行了攻击，这是对昆汀·塔伦蒂诺高潮对决的双重抄袭——还有肉饼爆炸。
back_translation: In one scene, we attacked the culture of football hooliganism, which is a double homage to Quentin Tarantino's climactic confrontations—along with a meat pie explosion.

text: is the kind of movie that 's critic-proof , simply because it aims so low .
translation: 这是一部几乎不受评论影响的电影，因为它的目标太低了。
back_translation: This is a movie that is almost unaffected by reviews because its ambitions are too low.

text: to the civilized mind , a movie like ballistic : ecks vs. sever is more of an ordeal than an amusement .
translation: 对于文明的心智来说，像《弹道：埃克斯对塞弗》这样的电影更像是一种折磨而非娱乐。
back_translation: For the mind of civilization, movies like "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever" are more of a torment than entertainment.

text: a different movie -- sometimes tedious -- by a director many viewers would like to skip but film buffs should get to know .
translation: 一部不同的电影——有时候令人乏味——由一位许多观众想要跳过的导演执导，但电影爱好者应该了解。
back_translation: A different kind of movie—one that can be tedious at times—directed by a filmmaker many viewers might want to skip, but that cinephiles should be aware of.

text: my precious new star wars movie is a lumbering , wheezy drag ...
translation: 我心爱的新的星球大战电影是一部沉闷、喘息的拖沓之作……
back_translation: My beloved new Star Wars movie is a tedious, breathless slog...

text: a dull , simple-minded and stereotypical tale of drugs , death and mind-numbing indifference on the inner-city streets .
translation: 一个沉闷、简单思维和刻板印象的故事，讲述了城市街道上药物、死亡和麻木不仁的冷漠。
back_translation: A dull story of simple thinking and stereotypes that depicts the indifference to drugs, death, and numbness on the city streets.

text: throw smoochy from the train !
translation: 把斯穆奇从火车上扔下去！
back_translation: Throw Smouch off the train!

text: an alternately raucous and sappy ethnic sitcom ... you 'd be wise to send your regrets .
translation: 一部时而喧闹时而感人的民族情景喜剧……你最好还是婉拒。
back_translation: A occasionally noisy and sometimes touching ethnic sitcom... it's best if you politely decline.

text: none of this is half as moving as the filmmakers seem to think .
translation: 这些都没有电影制片人想象中那么感人。
back_translation: These are not as touching as filmmakers imagine.

text: the heedless impetuousness of youth is on full , irritating display in -lrb- this -rrb- meandering and pointless french coming-of-age import from writer-director anne-sophie birot .
translation: 青春的无畏冲动在安-索菲·比罗特（Anne-Sophie Birot）编剧兼导演的这部曲折且无意义的法式成长故事中充分、令人烦恼地展现出来。
back_translation: The fearless impulse of youth is fully and frustratingly displayed in this twisted and meaningless French coming-of-age story directed and written by Anne-Sophie Birot.

text: a low-budget affair , tadpole was shot on digital video , and the images often look smeary and blurry , to the point of distraction .
translation: 这部低预算的作品《蝌蚪》是用数字视频拍摄的，画面常常显得模糊不清，甚至令人分心。
back_translation: This low-budget work "Tadpole" is filmed with digital video, and the images often appear blurry and even distracting.

text: irwin is so earnest that it 's hard to resist his pleas to spare wildlife and respect their environs .
translation: 欧文非常认真，以至于很难拒绝他请求保护野生动物和尊重它们栖息环境的恳求。
back_translation: Owen is so serious that it's hard to refuse his plea to protect wildlife and respect their habitats.

text: a miraculous movie , i 'm going home is so slight , yet overflows with wisdom and emotion .
translation: 一部奇迹般的电影《我回家》既轻盈，又充满智慧和情感。
back_translation: A miraculous movie "I Am Home" is both light and full of wisdom and emotion.

text: the story 's pathetic and the gags are puerile . .
translation: 这个故事很可悲，笑点也很幼稚。
back_translation: This story is very sad, and the jokes are quite childish.

text: showtime is n't particularly assaultive , but it can still make you feel that you never want to see another car chase , explosion or gunfight again .
translation: 《秀场》并不是特别激烈，但它仍然可能让你觉得不想再看到任何汽车追逐、爆炸或枪战。
back_translation: "Showtime" is not particularly intense, but it may still make you feel like you don't want to see any more car chases, explosions, or gunfights.

text: by the final whistle you 're convinced that this mean machine was a decent tv outing that just does n't have big screen magic .
translation: 到最后哨声响起时，你确信这个强大的机器是一次不错的电视节目，但并没有大银幕的魔力。
back_translation: By the time the final whistle blew, you were sure that this powerful machine was a good television show, but it did not have the magic of the big screen.

text: first , for a movie that tries to be smart , it 's kinda dumb .
translation: 首先，对于一部试图表现聪明的电影来说，它有点傻。
back_translation: First of all, for a movie that tries to be clever, it is a bit silly.

text: and people make fun of me for liking showgirls .
translation: 人们嘲笑我喜欢《舞女》。
back_translation: People ridicule me for liking "The Dancer."

text: ... the story simply putters along looking for astute observations and coming up blank .
translation: ……故事平淡无奇，寻找敏锐的观察却一无所获。
back_translation: ...the story is plain and ordinary, and searching for keen observations yields nothing.

text: it has a caffeinated , sloppy brilliance , sparkling with ideas you wish had been developed with more care , but animated by an energy that puts the dutiful efforts of more disciplined grade-grubbers to shame .
translation: 它具有一种充满咖啡因的、邋遢的智慧，闪烁着你希望能更仔细发展出的想法，但它的活力让那些努力追求好成绩的循规蹈矩者感到惭愧。
back_translation: It possesses a caffeine-fueled, scruffy wisdom that sparkles with ideas you wish you could develop more carefully, but its vitality makes those rule-followers striving for good grades feel ashamed.

text: if you 're not deeply touched by this movie , check your pulse .
translation: 如果你对这部电影没有深受感动，检查一下你的脉搏。
back_translation: If you are not deeply moved by this movie, check your pulse.

text: whether it 's the worst movie of 2002 , i ca n't say for sure : memories of rollerball have faded , and i skipped country bears .
translation: 我不能确切地说它是否是2002年最糟糕的电影：对《滚轴球》的记忆已经淡去，而我跳过了《乡村熊》。
back_translation: I can't say for certain if it was the worst movie of 2002: the memory of "Rollerball" has faded, and I skipped "The Country Bears."

text: children , christian or otherwise , deserve to hear the full story of jonah 's despair -- in all its agonizing , catch-22 glory -- even if they spend years trying to comprehend it .
translation: 孩子们，无论是基督徒还是其他宗教信仰， 都值得听到约拿绝望的完整故事——在其痛苦的、无解的辉煌中——即使他们花费多年去理解它。
back_translation: Children, whether Christians or of other religious beliefs, deserve to hear the complete story of Jonah's despair—in all its painful, unresolved brilliance—even if they spend years trying to understand it.

text: muccino , who directed from his own screenplay , is a canny crowd pleaser , and the last kiss ... provides more than enough sentimental catharsis for a satisfying evening at the multiplex .
translation: 穆奇诺根据自己的剧本执导，是一位精明的观众取悦者，《最后的吻……》为在综合影院享受一个令人满意的夜晚提供了足够的情感宣泄。
back_translation: Muccino directs based on his own script and is a savvy crowd-pleaser; "The Last Kiss..." provides ample emotional release for an enjoyable night at the movies.

text: has a solid emotional impact .
translation: 具有强烈的情感冲击。
back_translation: It has a strong emotional impact.

text: dogtown is hollow , self-indulgent , and - worst of all - boring .
translation: 狗镇是空洞的，自我沉溺的，最糟糕的是 - 无聊。
back_translation: Dogville is hollow, self-indulgent, and worst of all - boring.

text: the sweetest thing leaves a bitter taste .
translation: 最甜的东西留下苦涩的味道。
back_translation: The sweetest things leave a bitter taste.

text: one of those films that seems tailor made to air on pay cable to offer some modest amusements when one has nothing else to watch .
translation: 这部影片似乎专门为付费有线电视量身定做，在没有其他可看内容时提供一些适度的娱乐。
back_translation: This film seems to be tailor-made for paid cable television, providing a moderate level of entertainment when there is no other content to watch.

text: has enough wit , energy and geniality to please not only the fanatical adherents on either side , but also people who know nothing about the subject and think they 're not interested .
translation: 拥有足够的机智、活力和和善，能够让不仅是两边的狂热支持者感到满意，还有那些对这个话题一无所知并认为自己没有兴趣的人。
back_translation: Possessing sufficient wit, energy, and kindness can satisfy not only the passionate supporters on both sides but also those who know nothing about the topic and believe they have no interest in it.

text: lawrence should stick to his day job .
translation: 劳伦斯应该专注于他的本职工作。
back_translation: Lawrence should focus on his own work.

text: by turns numbingly dull-witted and disquietingly creepy .
translation: 时而令人麻木地乏味，时而让人感到不安的诡异。
back_translation: Sometimes numbingly boring, sometimes eerily unsettling.

text: buy is an accomplished actress , and this is a big , juicy role .
translation: 买是一个出色的女演员，这个角色非常重要且充满挑战。
back_translation: Mai is an outstanding actress, and this role is very important and full of challenges.

text: maid in manhattan proves that it 's easier to change the sheets than to change hackneyed concepts when it comes to dreaming up romantic comedies .
translation: 《曼哈顿的女佣》证明了，在构思浪漫喜剧时，改变思维陈规比换床单要容易得多。
back_translation: "The Maid in Manhattan" proves that when it comes to conceiving a romantic comedy, changing conventional thinking is far easier than changing bed sheets.

text: thought-provoking and stylish , if also somewhat hermetic .
translation: 发人深省且时尚，尽管也有些隐秘。
back_translation: Thought-provoking and fashionable, though somewhat mysterious as well.

text: a cleverly crafted but ultimately hollow mockumentary .
translation: 一部巧妙制作但最终空洞的伪纪录片。
back_translation: A cleverly made but ultimately hollow mockumentary.

text: jacquot has filmed the opera exactly as the libretto directs , ideally capturing the opera 's drama and lyricism .
translation: 雅克特按照剧本的指示拍摄了歌剧，理想地捕捉到了歌剧的戏剧性和抒情性。
back_translation: Jacte filmed the opera according to the script's instructions, ideally capturing the drama and lyricism of the opera.

text: the misery of these people becomes just another voyeuristic spectacle , to be consumed and forgotten .
translation: 这些人的苦难变成了另一种观看的表演，供人消费和遗忘。
back_translation: The suffering of these people has become a performance for another kind of viewing, meant for consumption and forgetfulness.

text: from a deceptively simple premise , this deeply moving french drama develops a startling story that works both as a detailed personal portrait and as a rather frightening examination of modern times .
translation: 从一个看似简单的前提出发，这部深具感染力的法国戏剧展开了一个令人震惊的故事，既是一幅详细的个人肖像，又是一种对现代社会颇为可怕的审视。
back_translation: Starting from a seemingly simple premise, this deeply moving French drama unfolds a shocking story that serves both as a detailed personal portrait and a rather frightening examination of modern society.

text: unexpected , and often contradictory , truths emerge .
translation: 意想不到，并且常常是矛盾的真相浮出水面。
back_translation: Unexpectedly, and often contradictory truths come to the surface.

text: has the capability of effecting change and inspiring hope .
translation: 具有改变现状和激发希望的能力。
back_translation: Have the ability to change the status quo and inspire hope.

text: even if you 're an elvis person , you wo n't find anything to get excited about on this dvd .
translation: 即使你是一个埃尔维斯的粉丝，你也不会在这个DVD上找到令人兴奋的东西。
back_translation: Even if you are an Elvis fan, you won't find anything exciting on this DVD.

text: together writer-director danny verete 's three tales comprise a powerful and reasonably fulfilling gestalt .
translation: 编剧兼导演丹尼·维雷特的三部故事构成了一种强大而相对充实的整体。
back_translation: The three stories by writer and director Dani Virette form a powerful and relatively complete whole.

text: writer\/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: 编剧/导演沃尔特·希尔在这里充分展现了他的极端男性气质，再次能够为一个在许多其他人手中完全可忘记的低俗概念注入真正的活力甚至艺术感。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Walter Hill fully demonstrates his extreme masculinity here, once again infusing a vulgar concept that could easily be forgotten in the hands of many others with genuine vitality and even a sense of artistry.

text: goldbacher draws on an elegant visual sense and a talent for easy , seductive pacing ... but she and writing partner laurence coriat do n't manage an equally assured narrative coinage .
translation: 戈德巴赫展现了一种优雅的视觉感受和轻松、诱人的节奏天赋……但她和写作搭档劳伦斯·科里亚特并没有成功地实现同样自信的叙事构建。
back_translation: Godbard displays an elegant visual sense and a relaxed, alluring rhythm... but she and her writing partner, Lawrence Coriat, did not successfully achieve the same confident narrative construction.

text: the script is smart and dark - hallelujah for small favors .
translation: 剧本聪明而黑暗——为小恩惠而感到欢喜。
back_translation: The script is clever and dark—delighted for the small favors.

text: even though we know the outcome , the seesawing of the general 's fate in the arguments of competing lawyers has the stomach-knotting suspense of a legal thriller , while the testimony of witnesses lends the film a resonant undertone of tragedy .
translation: 尽管我们知道结果，但将军命运的摇摆在竞争律师的辩论中具有法律惊悚片般令人紧张的悬念，而证人的证词则为影片增添了一种深沉的悲剧色彩。
back_translation: Although we know the outcome, the fate of the general is suspended in a tense, legal thriller-like tension during the debates of the competing lawyers, while the witness's testimony adds a deep tragic tone to the film.

text: you 're not merely watching history , you 're engulfed by it .
translation: 你不仅仅是在观看历史，你正沉浸其中。
back_translation: You are not just watching history; you are immersing yourself in it.

text: i am more offended by his lack of faith in his audience than by anything on display here .
translation: 我对他对观众缺乏信任的态度感到更为反感，而不是对这里展示的任何内容。
back_translation: I am more disgusted by his lack of trust in the audience than by anything presented here.

text: we 're drawn in by the dark luster .
translation: 我们被黑暗的光泽吸引。
back_translation: We are attracted by the luster of darkness.

text: the darker elements of misogyny and unprovoked violence suffocate the illumination created by the two daughters and the sparse instances of humor meant to shine through the gloomy film noir veil .
translation: 厌女主义和无端暴力的阴暗元素窒息了两个女儿所创造的光辉，以及那些旨在穿透阴郁的电影黑色面纱的稀疏幽默时刻。
back_translation: Misogyny and senseless violence's dark elements stifled the brilliance created by the two daughters, as well as the sparse moments of humor aimed at penetrating the gloomy black veil of cinema.

text: it 's not a great monster movie .
translation: 这不是一部优秀的怪兽电影。
back_translation: This is not an excellent monster movie.

text: it 's a lovely , sad dance highlighted by kwan 's unique directing style .
translation: 这是一段可爱而悲伤的舞蹈，由关的独特导演风格突显。
back_translation: This is a cute yet sad dance, highlighted by Guan's unique directing style.

text: it 's so downbeat and nearly humorless that it becomes a chore to sit through -- despite some first-rate performances by its lead .
translation: 它的基调如此消沉，几乎没有幽默感，以至于观看时成为一种负担——尽管其主演的表现相当出色。
back_translation: Its tone is so bleak and nearly devoid of humor that watching it becomes a burden—despite the fact that the performances of its leads are quite outstanding.

text: the all-french cast is marveilleux .
translation: 全法语演员阵容是精彩绝伦的。
back_translation: The all-French cast is outstanding.

text: if the title is a jeopardy question , then the answer might be `` how does steven seagal come across these days ? ''
translation: 如果标题是一个危险边缘问题，那么答案可能是“史蒂文·西格尔如今给人怎样的印象？”
back_translation: If the title is a dangerous edge question, then the answer might be "What impression does Steven Seagal give these days?"

text: the emperor 's club , ruthless in its own placid way , finds one of our most conservative and hidebound movie-making traditions and gives it new texture , new relevance , new reality .
translation: 《帝国俱乐部》以其冷静的方式，毫不留情地挑战了我们最保守和拘泥的电影制作传统，赋予其新的质感、新的相关性和新的现实。
back_translation: "The Empire Club" challenges our most conservative and rigid filmmaking traditions in a coldly ruthless manner, giving it new texture, new relevance, and new reality.

text: that storytelling has value can not be denied .
translation: 讲故事的价值是不可否认的。
back_translation: The value of storytelling is undeniable.

text: the whole thing comes off like a particularly amateurish episode of bewitched that takes place during spring break .
translation: 整个事情就像是在春假期间发生的一集特别业余的《女巫》，给人一种拙劣的感觉。
back_translation: The whole thing feels like a particularly amateur episode of "The Witch" that happened during spring break, giving off a sense of clumsiness.

text: it 's hard to believe that something so short could be so flabby .
translation: 很难相信这么短的东西竟然会如此松弛。
back_translation: It's hard to believe that such a short thing can be so loose.

text: it establishes its ominous mood and tension swiftly , and if the suspense never rises to a higher level , it is nevertheless maintained throughout .
translation: 它迅速建立了阴郁的氛围和紧张感，尽管悬念从未升至更高的水平，但它在整个过程中仍然得以维持。
back_translation: It quickly established a gloomy atmosphere and tension; although the suspense never rose to a higher level, it was still maintained throughout.

text: solondz may well be the only one laughing at his own joke
translation: 索朗兹可能是唯一一个在自己笑话上大笑的人。
back_translation: Soranges may be the only person who laughs at his own jokes.

text: deep intelligence and a warm , enveloping affection breathe out of every frame .
translation: 深邃的智慧和温暖、包容的情感从每一帧中散发出来。
back_translation: Profound wisdom and warm, embracing emotions emanate from every frame.

text: swinging , the film makes it seem , is not a hobby that attracts the young and fit .
translation: 摇摆，影片似乎表明，这并不是一项吸引年轻人和健康人的爱好。
back_translation: Swinging, the film seems to suggest, is not a hobby that attracts young people and healthy individuals.

text: there 's a reason why halftime is only fifteen minutes long .
