translation: 中场休息只有十五分钟是有原因的。
back_translation: There is a reason why the halftime break is only fifteen minutes.

text: winds up being both revelatory and narcissistic , achieving some honest insight into relationships that most high-concept films candy-coat with pat storylines , precious circumstances and beautiful stars .
translation: 最终既具有启发性又有自恋性，对人际关系有一些诚实的洞察，而大多数高概念电影则用公式化的情节、珍贵的环境和美丽的明星来粉饰。
back_translation: Ultimately, it is both thought-provoking and narcissistic, offering some honest insights into interpersonal relationships, whereas most high-concept films tend to embellish with formulaic plots, precious settings, and beautiful stars.

text: in its own floundering way , it gets to you .
translation: 以它自己的挣扎方式，它触动了你。
back_translation: In its own way of struggling, it touched you.

text: behind the glitz , hollywood is sordid and disgusting .
translation: 在辉煌的背后，好莱坞肮脏而令人厌恶。
back_translation: Behind the brilliance, Hollywood is dirty and disgusting.

text: this mild-mannered farce , directed by one of its writers , john c. walsh , is corny in a way that bespeaks an expiration date passed a long time ago .
translation: 这部由编剧之一约翰·C·沃尔什执导的温和喜剧，展现了一种过时的老土风格，仿佛早已过了保质期。
back_translation: This gentle comedy directed by one of the screenwriters, John C. Walsh, exhibits an outdated and cheesy style, as if it has long passed its expiration date.

text: with very little to add beyond the dark visions already relayed by superb recent predecessors like swimming with sharks and the player , this latest skewering ... may put off insiders and outsiders alike .
translation: 除了已经由出色的前作如《与鲨鱼共泳》和《玩家》所传达的黑暗幻影之外，除此之外几乎没有什么可以补充的，这部最新的讽刺作品可能会让内部人士和外部人士都感到不适。
back_translation: Aside from the dark shadows already conveyed by outstanding previous works like "Swimming with Sharks" and "The Player," there is hardly anything more to add; this latest satirical piece may leave both insiders and outsiders feeling uncomfortable.

text: significantly better than its 2002 children 's - movie competition .
translation: 明显优于2002年的儿童电影竞争对手。
back_translation: Clearly superior to the children's movie competitors of 2002.

text: this is an elegantly balanced movie -- every member of the ensemble has something fascinating to do -- that does n't reveal even a hint of artifice .
translation: 这是一部优雅平衡的电影——每位演员都有引人入胜的表现——没有透露出任何人造痕迹。
back_translation: This is an elegantly balanced film—each actor delivers a captivating performance—without revealing any artificial traces.

text: cox creates a fluid and mesmerizing sequence of images to match the words of nijinsky 's diaries .
translation: 考克斯创造了一系列流畅而迷人的图像序列，以与尼金斯基的日记文字相匹配。
back_translation: Cox created a series of fluid and captivating visual sequences to match the text of Nijinsky's diaries.

text: with the exception of mccoist , the players do n't have a clue on the park .
translation: 除了麦考伊斯特，其他球员在场上完全没有头绪。
back_translation: Aside from McAllister, the other players had no idea what to do on the field.

text: no amount of good acting is enough to save oleander 's uninspired story .
translation: 再好的表演也无法拯救夹竹桃那无聊的故事。
back_translation: No matter how good the performance is, it cannot save the dull story of the oleander.

text: everyone 's to blame here .
translation: 这里每个人都有责任。
back_translation: Everyone here has a responsibility.

text: evokes the 19th century with a subtlety that is an object lesson in period filmmaking .
translation: 唤起了19世纪的氛围，以一种微妙的方式成为了时代电影制作的典范。
back_translation: It evokes the atmosphere of the 19th century, subtly becoming a model for filmmaking of the era.

text: an odd , haphazard , and inconsequential romantic comedy .
translation: 一部奇怪、随意且无关紧要的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A strange, casual, and insignificant romantic comedy.

text: ... another example of how sandler is losing his touch .
translation: ... 又一个沙勒失去他触觉的例子。
back_translation: ... another example of a Shaler losing his sense of touch.

text: an awful lot like one of -lrb- spears ' -rrb- music videos in content -- except that it goes on for at least 90 more minutes and , worse , that you have to pay if you want to see it .
translation: 这就像一个（斯皮尔斯的）音乐视频，只是内容上糟糕得多——除了它至少还要多花90分钟，更糟的是如果你想看就得付钱。
back_translation: It's like a (Spears) music video, but way worse in content—except it takes at least 90 more minutes, and what's worse is you have to pay to watch it.

text: stale and clich茅d to a fault .
translation: 陈腐且老套。
back_translation: Clichéd and outdated.

text: ... built on the premise that middle-class arkansas consists of monster truck-loving good ol' boys and peroxide blond honeys whose worldly knowledge comes from tv reruns and supermarket tabloids .
translation: ...建立在这样的前提上，即中产阶级的阿肯色州由喜爱怪物卡车的老实巴交的家伙和那些金发碧眼的姑娘组成，她们的世俗知识来自于电视重播和超市小报。
back_translation: ...based on the premise that the middle class in Arkansas is composed of honest, down-to-earth guys who love monster trucks and those blonde-haired, blue-eyed girls whose worldly knowledge comes from TV reruns and supermarket tabloids.

text: zellweger 's whiny pouty-lipped poof faced and spindly attempt at playing an ingenue makes her nomination as best actress even more of a an a
translation: 泽尔维格那种哭哭啼啼、嘴唇嘟嘟、面容清秀、身材纤细的尝试去饰演天真的角色，让她获得最佳女演员提名更加显得不合适。
back_translation: Zellweger's attempt to portray innocent characters with her whiny demeanor, pouting lips, delicate features, and slender figure makes her nomination for Best Actress seem even more inappropriate.

text: holofcener rejects patent solutions to dramatize life 's messiness from inside out , in all its strange quirks .
translation: 霍洛芬纳拒绝采用专利解决方案，从内部揭示生活的杂乱无章，展现其奇特的怪癖。
back_translation: Holoferna refuses to adopt patented solutions, revealing the chaos of life from within, showcasing its peculiar quirks.

text: i still want my money back .
translation: 我仍然想要我的钱。
back_translation: I still want my money.

text: no one involved , save dash , shows the slightest aptitude for acting , and the script , credited to director abdul malik abbott and ernest ` tron ' anderson , seems entirely improvised .
translation: 参与的每个人除了达什之外，似乎都没有表现出丝毫表演天赋，而且剧本归功于导演阿卜杜勒·马利克·阿博特和厄内斯特·“特隆”·安德森，似乎完全是即兴创作的。
back_translation: It seems that everyone involved, except for Dash, showed no signs of performing talent at all, and the script, credited to director Abdul Malik Abbott and Ernest "Tron" Anderson, appears to be entirely improvised.

text: it 's the kind of effectively creepy-scary thriller that has you fixating on a far corner of the screen at times because your nerves just ca n't take it any more .
translation: 这是一种有效的令人毛骨悚然的惊悚片，有时让你不得不盯着屏幕的远角，因为你的神经实在受不了了。
back_translation: This is an effective, spine-chilling thriller that sometimes makes you have to stare at the far corner of the screen because your nerves can't take it anymore.

text: narratively , trouble every day is a plodding mess .
translation: 叙述上，《每天的麻烦》是一场缓慢的混乱。
back_translation: In terms of narrative, "Everyday Troubles" is a slow chaos.

text: well-done supernatural thriller with keen insights into parapsychological phenomena and the soulful nuances of the grieving process .
translation: 优秀的超自然惊悚片，对超心理现象和悲痛过程中的灵魂细微差别有着深刻的洞察。
back_translation: An excellent supernatural thriller with profound insights into psychical phenomena and the subtle emotions of the grieving process.

text: if there 's no art here , it 's still a good yarn -- which is nothing to sneeze at these days .
translation: 如果这里没有艺术，依然是个好故事——在如今这一天也算不错。
back_translation: If there is no art here, it is still a good story - that counts as not bad on this day.

text: the cumulative effect of watching this 65-minute trifle is rather like being trapped while some weird relative trots out the video he took of the family vacation to stonehenge .
translation: 观看这段65分钟的琐事的累积效应就像被困在某个奇怪亲戚面前，他播放着他拍摄的我们全家去巨石阵度假时的视频。
back_translation: Watching this 65-minute accumulation of trivia feels like being trapped in front of some strange relative who is playing videos of our whole family vacationing at Stonehenge.

text: its sheer dynamism is infectious .
translation: 它的活力是感染性的。
back_translation: Its vitality is infectious.

text: the film is reasonably entertaining , though it begins to drag two-thirds through , when the melodramatic aspects start to overtake the comedy .
translation: 这部电影相当娱乐，尽管在三分之二的时候开始有些拖沓，当时戏剧化的元素开始超过了喜剧。
back_translation: This movie is quite entertaining, although it starts to drag a bit two-thirds of the way through, when the dramatic elements begin to surpass the comedy.

text: simultaneously heart-breaking and very funny , the last kiss is really all about performances .
translation: 《最后一吻》既令人心碎又非常搞笑，真正的核心在于表演。
back_translation: "The Last Kiss" is both heart-wrenching and very funny, with the true core lying in the performances.

text: start reading your scripts before signing that dotted line .
translation: 在签署那条虚线之前，先阅读你的剧本。
back_translation: Read your script before signing that dotted line.

text: jackson and co have brought back the value and respect for the term epic cinema .
translation: 杰克逊和公司重新带回了“史诗电影”这一术语的价值和尊重。
back_translation: Jackson and the company have revived the value and respect of the term "epic film."

text: a pathetically inane and unimaginative cross between xxx and vertical limit .
translation: 一个可悲的、无聊的、缺乏想象力的混合体，介于xxx和《垂直极限》之间。
back_translation: A sad, boring, unimaginative hybrid between xxx and "Vertical Limit."

text: max pokes , provokes , takes expressionistic license and hits a nerve ... as far as art is concerned , it 's mission accomplished .
translation: 最大限度地挑衅，采取表现主义的自由，触动了神经……就艺术而言，任务圆满完成。
back_translation: Maximally provocative, taking the freedom of expressionism, touched the nerves... In terms of art, the task has been completed perfectly.

text: the power of shanghai ghetto , a documentary by dana janklowicz-mann and amir mann , rests in the voices of men and women , now in their 70s , who lived there in the 1940s .
translation: 《上海贫民区的力量》，由达娜·扬克洛维茨-曼和阿米尔·曼制作的纪录片，其力量在于那些在1940年代居住在那里的男女的声音，他们现在都已70多岁。
back_translation: "The Power of the Shanghai Slums," a documentary produced by Dana Yanklowitz-Man and Amir Man, derives its strength from the voices of the men and women who lived there in the 1940s and are now all over 70 years old.

text: ` punch-drunk love is so convinced of its own brilliance that , if it were a person , you 'd want to smash its face in . '
translation: 《拳击醉爱》对其自身的辉煌如此自信，如果它是一个人，你会想要冲上去揍他的脸。
back_translation: "Boxing Drunk Love" is so confident in its own brilliance that if it were a person, you would want to rush up and punch its face.

text: a sentimental mess that never rings true .
translation: 一团感情杂乱无章，永远不会显得真实。
back_translation: A messy tangle of emotions will never seem real.

text: a fascinating case study of flower-power liberation -- and the price that was paid for it .
translation: 一个关于花朵力量解放的迷人案例研究——以及为此付出的代价。
back_translation: A captivating case study on the liberation of the power of flowers — and the price that comes with it.

text: -lrb- janey -rrb- forgets about her other obligations , leading to a tragedy which is somehow guessable from the first few minutes , maybe because it echoes the by now intolerable morbidity of so many recent movies .
translation: （贾尼）忘记了她的其他责任，导致了一场悲剧，这在最初的几分钟内就能 somehow 猜测出来，也许是因为它反映了如今许多近期电影所无法忍受的病态。
back_translation: (Jani) forgot her other responsibilities, leading to a tragedy that can somehow be guessed in the first few minutes, perhaps because it reflects a morbidity that many recent films today cannot endure.

text: the only problem is that , by the end , no one in the audience or the film seems to really care .
translation: 唯一的问题是，到最后，观众和电影中的角色似乎都不真正关心。

text: a film without surprise geared toward maximum comfort and familiarity .
translation: 一部没有惊喜的电影，旨在提供最大程度的舒适和熟悉感。

text: ... although this idea is `` new '' the results are tired .
translation: ……尽管这个想法是“新的”，但结果却是疲惫的。

text: remarkable for its excellent storytelling , its economical , compressed characterisations and for its profound humanity , it 's an adventure story and history lesson all in one .
translation: 因其出色的叙事、简洁的角色刻画和深刻的人性而显得卓越，它是一部冒险故事和历史课程的结合。

text: mike white 's deft combination of serious subject matter and dark , funny humor make `` the good girl '' a film worth watching .

back_translation: Mike White's clever combination of serious themes and dark humor makes "Good Girl" a film worth watching.

text: a film that will be best appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely languorous rhythms , waiting for happiness is ultimately thoughtful without having much dramatic impact .
translation: 一部将最能被愿意忍受其极其缓慢节奏的人所欣赏的电影，等待幸福最终是深思熟虑的，但并没有太大的戏剧性影响。
back_translation: A film that can only be appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely slow pace; Waiting for Happiness is thoughtful, but lacks much dramatic impact.

text: this may be the first cartoon ever to look as if it were being shown on the projection television screen of a sports bar .
translation: 这可能是第一部看起来像是在体育酒吧的投影电视屏幕上播放的动画片。

text: it 's a treat -- a delightful , witty , improbable romantic comedy with a zippy jazzy score ... grant and bullock make it look as though they are having so much fun .
translation: 这是一部享受之作——一部愉快、机智、离奇的浪漫喜剧，配有充满活力的爵士乐音轨……格兰特和桑德拉·布洛克看起来似乎玩得非常开心。
back_translation: This is a work of enjoyment—a delightful, witty, and quirky romantic comedy, accompanied by a lively jazz soundtrack... Grant and Sandra Bullock seem to be having a great time.

text: the trouble is , its filmmakers run out of clever ideas and visual gags about halfway through .
translation: 问题是，这部影片的制作团队在大约一半的时间内耗尽了聪明的创意和视觉笑料。
back_translation: The problem is that the film's production team exhausted their clever ideas and visual gags in about half the time.

text: even when crush departs from the 4w formula ... it feels like a glossy rehash .
translation: 即使当《Crush》脱离4w公式时……它仍然感觉像是一个光鲜的重述。
back_translation: Even when "Crush" deviates from the 4w formula, it still feels like a polished retelling.

text: nair does n't treat the issues lightly .
translation: 纳尔并未轻视这些问题。
back_translation: Narl did not take these issues lightly.

text: a compelling motion picture that illustrates an american tragedy .
translation: 一部引人入胜的电影，展现了美国的悲剧。
back_translation: An enthralling movie that showcases the tragedy of America.

text: it 's that painful .
translation: 这真的很痛。
back_translation: This really hurts.

text: smart , sassy interpretation of the oscar wilde play .
translation: 聪明而机智的奥斯卡·王尔德剧作解读。
back_translation: Interpretation of the clever and witty works of Oscar Wilde.

text: there 's nothing more satisfying during a summer of event movies than a spy thriller like the bourne identity that 's packed with just as much intelligence as action .
translation: 在一整个夏天的大片中，没有什么比《谍影重重》这样一部充满智慧与动作的间谍惊悚片更让人满意的了。
back_translation: In a whole summer of blockbusters, nothing is more satisfying than a smart and action-packed spy thriller like "The Bourne Identity."

text: though writer\/director bart freundlich 's film ultimately becomes a simplistic story about a dysfunctional parent-child relationship , it has some special qualities and the soulful gravity of crudup 's anchoring performance .
translation: 尽管编剧/导演巴特·弗伦德利奇的电影最终变成了一个关于不良亲子关系的简单故事，但它具有一些特殊的品质，以及库哈普出色表演所带来的灵魂深度。
back_translation: Although writer/director Bart Freundlich's film ultimately turns into a simple story about troubled parent-child relationships, it possesses some special qualities and the soulful depth brought by Kuhap's outstanding performance.

text: the early and middle passages are surprising in how much they engage and even touch us .
translation: 早期和中期的段落令人惊讶，因为它们如此吸引人，甚至打动了我们。
back_translation: The early and mid-sections of the text are surprising because they are so engaging that they even move us.

text: -lrb- cho 's face is -rrb- an amazing slapstick instrument , creating a scrapbook of living mug shots .
translation: -（乔的脸是）一种令人惊叹的滑稽表演工具，创造出活生生的面部特写剪贴簿。

text: if ever such a dependable concept was botched in execution , this is it .
translation: 如果有哪个值得信赖的概念在执行上被搞砸了，那就是这个。
back_translation: If there is a trustworthy concept that has been messed up in execution, it is this one.

text: his -lrb- nelson 's -rrb- screenplay needs some serious re-working to show more of the dilemma , rather than have his characters stage shouting matches about it .
translation: 他的剧本需要进行一些严肃的重写，以更好地展示困境，而不是让角色之间进行大声争吵。
back_translation: His script needs some serious rewriting to better showcase the predicament, rather than having the characters argue loudly with each other.

text: terminally brain dead production .
translation: 终末期脑死亡制作。
back_translation: End-stage brain death production.

text: -lrb- grant -rrb- goes beyond his usual fluttering and stammering and captures the soul of a man in pain who gradually comes to recognize it and deal with it .
translation: （格兰特）超越了他通常的颤抖和结巴，捕捉到了一个在痛苦中挣扎、逐渐认识并学会面对自己内心的人的灵魂。
back_translation: (Grant) transcended his usual tremors and stutters, capturing the soul of someone who struggles in pain, gradually comes to understand, and learns to confront their inner self.

text: the movie suffers from two fatal ailments -- a dearth of vitality and a story that 's shapeless and uninflected .
translation: 这部电影有两个致命缺陷——缺乏生气和一个没有形状且毫无变化的故事。
back_translation: This movie has two fatal flaws - a lack of vitality and a shapeless, monotonous story.

text: bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequences evenly but milks drama when she should be building suspense , and drags out too many scenes toward the end that should move quickly .
translation: 比格洛在处理核危机场景时表现得很均衡，但在应该营造悬念的时候却煽情过度，并且在结尾处拖延了许多本应迅速推进的场景。
back_translation: Bigelow handles the nuclear crisis scenario quite balanced, but becomes overly sentimental in moments that should create suspense, and prolongs many scenes that should have progressed quickly at the end.

text: while most films these days are about nothing , this film seems to be about everything that 's plaguing the human spirit in a relentlessly globalizing world .
translation: 虽然如今大多数电影都没有内容，但这部电影似乎涉及了在一个不断全球化的世界中困扰人类精神的所有问题。
back_translation: Although most movies today lack content, this film seems to address all the issues troubling the human spirit in an increasingly globalized world.

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .
translation: 人们可以在《世界旅行者》和他早期的电影中感受到福伦德对父亲怀有一种沉重却模糊的怨诉，他对此纠缠不休，却始终未能真正触及。
back_translation: People can sense a heavy yet vague grievance that Furland has towards his father in "World Traveler" and his earlier films; he is entangled in it yet never truly manages to address it.

text: well-meant but unoriginal .
translation: 善意但缺乏创意。
back_translation: Well-intentioned but lacking in creativity.

text: it 's an effort to watch this movie , but it eventually pays off and is effective if you stick with it .
translation: 观看这部电影需要一些努力，但如果你坚持下去，最终会有回报，并且效果显著。
back_translation: Watching this movie requires some effort, but if you persevere, there will be rewards in the end, and the results will be significant.

text: it 's burns ' visuals , characters and his punchy dialogue , not his plot , that carry waydowntown .
translation: 是阿尔伯特·伯恩斯的视觉效果、角色和有力的对话，而不是情节，支撑了《远离市中心》。
back_translation: It is the visual effects, characters, and powerful dialogue of Albert Burns, rather than the plot, that support "Away From The City Center."

text: the real triumphs in igby come from philippe , who makes oliver far more interesting than the character 's lines would suggest , and sarandon , who could n't be better as a cruel but weirdly likable wasp matron .
translation: 在《伊格比》中，真正的成功来自于菲利普，他让奥利弗变得比角色的台词所暗示的更有趣，以及萨兰登，她作为一个冷酷但奇怪地令人喜爱的白人上层人士，表现得无可挑剔。
back_translation: In "Igby," the real success comes from Philip, who makes Oliver more interesting than the lines of the character suggest, and Sarandon, who, as a cool yet strangely endearing upper-class white woman, delivers a flawless performance.

text: the quiet american is n't a bad film , it 's just one that could easily wait for your pay per view dollar .
translation: 《安静的美国人》并不是一部坏电影，只是这部电影完全可以等到你为其付费观看的时候。
back_translation: "The Quiet American" is not a bad movie; it’s just a film that you can completely wait to watch until you pay for it.

text: no. .
translation: 不。
back_translation: No.

text: kapur weighs down the tale with bogus profundities .
translation: 卡普尔用虚假的深刻性拖累了这个故事。
back_translation: Kapoor's use of false profundity dragged down the story.

text: my big fat greek wedding is that rare animal known as ' a perfect family film , ' because it 's about family .
translation: 《我的希腊大婚礼》是一部被称为“完美家庭电影”的稀有作品，因为它是关于家庭的。
back_translation: "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" is a rare work known as a "perfect family movie" because it is about family.

text: even though many of these guys are less than adorable -lrb- their lamentations are pretty much self-centered -rrb- , there 's something vital about the movie .
translation: 尽管这些家伙中很多人并不是那么可爱（他们的哀叹基本上都是以自我为中心），但是这部电影有一些重要的东西。
back_translation: Although many of these guys are not that likable (their laments are mostly self-centered), this movie has something important.

text: while it may not add up to the sum of its parts , holofcener 's film offers just enough insight to keep it from being simpleminded , and the ensemble cast is engaging enough to keep you from shifting in your chair too often .
translation: 虽然这部霍洛芬的电影可能无法完全展现其各个部分的价值，但它提供了足够的洞察力，使其不至于显得肤浅，且全体演员的表现足够吸引人，不会让你在椅子上坐立不安。
back_translation: Although this Hollywood film may not fully showcase the value of its various parts, it provides enough insight to avoid feeling superficial, and the performances of the entire cast are engaging enough to keep you from fidgeting in your seat.

text: an ugly , revolting movie .
translation: 一部丑陋、令人厌恶的电影。
back_translation: An ugly and disgusting movie.

translation: 如果你喜欢喷血电影，那么你可能会在《盐湖海》中度过一个相当愉快的时光。
back_translation: If you enjoy gory movies, then you might have a rather pleasant time with "Lake of Salt."

text: the characterizations and dialogue lack depth or complexity , with the ironic exception of scooter .
translation: 角色描写和对话缺乏深度或复杂性，只有小轮车这一角色具有讽刺的例外。
back_translation: Character descriptions and dialogues lack depth or complexity, with the exception of the character of the little scooter, which is ironically nuanced.

text: shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as roman polanski 's the pianist , but its compassionate spirit soars every bit as high .
translation: 上海隔都或许没有罗曼·波兰斯基的《钢琴家》那样戏剧化，但它充满同情的精神同样高昂。
back_translation: Shanghai's "The Pianist" may not be as dramatic as Roman Polanski's, but its spirit of empathy is equally uplifting.

text: but it 's hardly a necessary enterprise .
translation: 但这并不是一项必要的事业。
back_translation: But this is not a necessary undertaking.

text: ratliff 's two previous titles , plutonium circus and purgatory county show his penchant for wry , contentious configurations , and this film is part of that delicate canon .
translation: 拉特利夫的前两部作品《铀马戏团》和《炼狱县》展示了他对讽刺和争议构图的偏好，而这部电影是这一精致典范的一部分。
back_translation: Latlif's first two works, "Uranium Circus" and "Purgatory County," showcase his preference for satire and controversial compositions, and this film is part of that exquisite paradigm.

text: distinctly sub-par ... more likely to drown a viewer in boredom than to send any shivers down his spine .
translation: 明显低于标准……更可能让观众沉浸在无聊中，而不是让他感到一丝寒意。

text: it 's a shame that the storyline and its underlying themes ... finally seem so impersonal or even shallow .
translation: 很遗憾，故事情节及其深层主题...最后似乎显得如此冷漠甚至肤浅。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the plot and its deeper themes... ultimately seem so indifferent and even superficial.

text: as it stands , crocodile hunter has the hurried , badly cobbled look of the 1959 godzilla , which combined scenes of a japanese monster flick with canned shots of raymond burr commenting on the monster 's path of destruction .
translation: 目前，《鳄鱼猎人》看起来匆忙且粗糙，令人联想到1959年的《哥斯拉》，该片将日本怪兽电影的场景与雷蒙德·伯尔对怪兽破坏路径的现场评论剪辑在一起。
back_translation: Currently, "Crocodile Hunter" appears rushed and rough, reminiscent of the 1959 "Godzilla," which edited together scenes from a Japanese monster movie with Raymond Burr's on-site commentary on the monster's path of destruction.

text: leigh succeeds in delivering a dramatic slap in the face that 's simultaneously painful and refreshing .
translation: 利成功地给了一个戏剧性的耳光，既让人感到疼痛，又令人耳目一新。
back_translation: Li successfully delivered a dramatic slap that was both painful and refreshing.

text: i liked the original short story but this movie , even at an hour and twenty-some minutes , it 's too long and it goes nowhere .
translation: 我喜欢原来的短故事，但这部电影，即使有一小时二十分钟，也是太长了，而且没有什么进展。
back_translation: I liked the original short story, but this movie, even at one hour and twenty minutes, is too long and there's not much progress.

text: it 's the kind of under-inspired , overblown enterprise that gives hollywood sequels a bad name .
translation: 这是一种缺乏灵感、过度夸大的企业，给好莱坞续集带来了坏名声。
back_translation: This is a lack of inspiration, overly exaggerated company that has given a bad reputation to Hollywood sequels.

text: the movie starts with a legend and ends with a story that is so far-fetched it would be impossible to believe if it were n't true .
translation: 电影以一个传说开始，以一个离奇的故事结束，如果不是事实，根本不可能相信。
back_translation: The film begins with a legend and ends with a bizarre story; if it weren't true, it would be impossible to believe.

text: really does feel like a short stretched out to feature length .
translation: 确实感觉像是一部短片被拉伸到长片长度。
back_translation: It really feels like a short film stretched to feature length.

text: a breezy blend of art , history , esoteric musings and philosophy .
translation: 轻松的艺术、历史、深奥思考和哲学的融合。
back_translation: A fusion of relaxed art, history, profound thinking, and philosophy.

text: unexpected moments of authentically impulsive humor are the hallmark of this bittersweet , uncommonly sincere movie that portrays the frank humanity of ... emotional recovery .
translation: 意外的真实冲动幽默瞬间是这部带有苦乐参半色彩且罕见真诚的电影的标志，它描绘了情感恢复中的坦率人性。
back_translation: The unexpectedly authentic moments of impulsive humor are a hallmark of this film, which carries a bittersweet tone and demonstrates rare sincerity, depicting the straightforward humanity in emotional recovery.

text: stands as a document of what it felt like to be a new yorker -- or , really , to be a human being -- in the weeks after 9\/11 .
translation: 它作为一份文件，记录了在九一一事件后几周，作为一名纽约人——或者，更确切地说，作为人类——的感受。
back_translation: It serves as a document that records the feelings of a New Yorker—or more precisely, of a human being—in the weeks following the September 11 events.

text: my wife is an actress works as well as it does because -lrb- the leads -rrb- are such a companionable couple .
translation: 我妻子是一名演员，她的工作之所以如此顺利，是因为（主角）是一对如此和睦的夫妻。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and her work is going so smoothly because the (main characters) are such a harmonious couple.

text: about schmidt is nicholson 's goofy , heartfelt , mesmerizing king lear .
translation: 关于施密特是尼克尔森搞笑、真挚、令人着迷的《李尔王》。
back_translation: Regarding Schmidt, it is Nicholson's humorous, sincere, and captivating "King Lear."

text: a comedy that is warm , inviting , and surprising .
translation: 一部温暖、亲切和令人惊喜的喜剧。
back_translation: A warm, friendly, and surprising comedy.

text: hatfield and hicks make the oddest of couples , and in this sense the movie becomes a study of the gambles of the publishing world , offering a case study that exists apart from all the movie 's political ramifications .
translation: 哈特菲尔德和希克斯形成了最奇特的一对，从这个意义上讲，这部电影成为对出版界赌博的研究，提供了一个案例研究，独立于电影的所有政治影响。
back_translation: Hatfield and Hicks formed the most peculiar pair, in this sense, the film became a study on the gambling in the publishing industry, providing a case study independent of all the political influences of the movie.

text: the movie is so contrived , nonsensical and formulaic that , come to think of it , the day-old shelf would be a more appropriate location to store it .
translation: 这部电影如此牵强、毫无意义且公式化，想来放在过期的货架上更合适。
back_translation: This movie is so forced, meaningless, and formulaic that it would be better suited for an expired shelf.

text: this sensitive , smart , savvy , compelling coming-of-age drama delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of co-dependence and the struggle for self-esteem .
translation: 这部敏感、聪明、机智、引人入胜的成长剧探讨了共依存的被动攻击心理和自尊心的挣扎。
back_translation: This sensitive, intelligent, witty, and captivating coming-of-age drama explores the passive-aggressive psychology of codependency and the struggle for self-esteem.

text: enigma looks great , has solid acting and a neat premise .
translation: 《谜团》看起来很不错，表演出色，构思新颖。
back_translation: "Mystery" looks very good, with excellent performances and innovative ideas.

text: eventually , they will have a showdown , but , by then , your senses are as mushy as peas and you do n't care who fires the winning shot .
translation: 最终，他们会有一场对决，但到那时，你的感官像豌豆一样软弱，你也不在乎是谁打出了获胜的一击。
back_translation: In the end, they will have a showdown, but by then, your senses will be as weak as a pea, and you won't care who delivered the winning blow.

text: as warm as it is wise , deftly setting off uproarious humor with an underlying seriousness that sneaks up on the viewer , providing an experience that is richer than anticipated .
translation: 既温暖又智慧，巧妙地将喧闹的幽默与潜藏的严肃结合在一起，让观众感受到一种超出预期的丰富体验。
back_translation: Both warm and wise, skillfully combining noisy humor with underlying seriousness, it provides the audience with a richly unexpected experience.

text: godard 's ode to tackling life 's wonderment is a rambling and incoherent manifesto about the vagueness of topical excess ... in praise of love remains a ponderous and pretentious endeavor that 's unfocused and tediously exasperating .
translation: 戈达尔对生活奇观的颂歌是一份漫无边际和含糊不清的宣言，讨论了当代过度的模糊性……《赞美爱情》仍然是一项沉重且自负的努力，缺乏重点，让人感到无聊而令人沮丧。
back_translation: Godard's ode to the wonders of life is an endless and vague declaration, discussing the excessive ambiguity of contemporary life... "Praise of Love" remains a heavy and self-important endeavor, lacking focus, which feels boring and frustrating.

text: this ready-made midnight movie probably wo n't stand the cold light of day , but under the right conditions , it 's goofy -lrb- if not entirely wholesome -rrb- fun .
translation: 这部现成的午夜电影可能经不起现实的考验，但在合适的条件下，它是傻里傻气的（如果说不完全健康的话）乐趣。
back_translation: This ready-made midnight movie may not stand up to the test of reality, but under the right conditions, it is silly (if not entirely wholesome) fun.

text: hampered -- no , paralyzed -- by a self-indulgent script ... that aims for poetry and ends up sounding like satire .
translation: 受制于一部自我放纵的剧本……它试图追求诗意，却最终听起来像讽刺。
back_translation: Constrained by a self-indulgent script... it attempts to pursue poetry, but ultimately sounds ironic.

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: 虽然敏感到有些过分，但它常常被大量沉重的启示、华丽的对话以及对过去和未选择道路的怀旧所覆盖。
back_translation: Although the sensitivity may seem excessive, it is often overshadowed by a wealth of heavy revelations, extravagant dialogues, and nostalgia for the past and unchosen paths.

text: several uninteresting , unlikeable people do bad things to and with each other in `` unfaithful . ''
translation: 在《不忠》中，一些无趣且不可喜欢的人彼此之间做坏事。
back_translation: In "Infidelity," some boring and unlikable people do bad things to one another.

text: ... a low rate annie featuring some kid who ca n't act , only echoes of jordan , and weirdo actor crispin glover screwing things up old school .
translation: ... 一部低评的影片，讲述一个不会演戏的孩子，只剩下乔丹的回声，还有怪异演员克里斯平·戈弗搞砸了一切，老派风格。
back_translation: ... A poorly rated film that tells the story of a child who can't act, with only Jordan's echo remaining, and the bizarre actor Crispin Glover messing everything up, in an old-fashioned style.

text: this version does justice both to stevenson and to the sci-fi genre .

text: surprisingly , considering that baird is a former film editor , the movie is rather choppy .

text: directing with a sure and measured hand , -lrb- haneke -rrb- steers clear of the sensational and offers instead an unflinching and objective look at a decidedly perverse pathology .
translation: 以稳健和自信的方式执导，-lrb- 汉尼斯 -rrb- 避免了 sensational 的表现，提供了一种无畏而客观地审视一种明显扭曲的病理。
back_translation: Directing with steadiness and confidence, Hannes avoided sensational performances, providing a fearless and objective examination of a clearly distorted pathology.

text: ... it was n't the subject matter that ultimately defeated the film ... it was the unfulfilling , incongruous , `` wait a second , did i miss something ? ''
translation: ……最终击败这部电影的并不是主题内容，而是那种令人不满足、不协调的感觉，“等一下，我是不是错过了什么？”
back_translation: ...what ultimately defeats this movie is not the theme or content, but rather that feeling of dissatisfaction and disconnection, "Wait a minute, did I miss something?"

text: wiseman is patient and uncompromising , letting his camera observe and record the lives of women torn apart by a legacy of abuse .
translation: 智者耐心而坚定，让他的相机观察和记录那些因虐待遗留下的创伤而撕裂的女性生活。

text: it 's a compelling and horrifying story , and the laramie project is worthwhile for reminding us that this sort of thing does , in fact , still happen in america .

text: ub equally spoofs and celebrates the more outre aspects of ` black culture ' and the dorkier aspects of ` white culture , ' even as it points out how inseparable the two are .
translation: 它同样调侃并庆祝“黑文化”的更多另类方面和“白文化”的较为呆板的方面，同时指出这两者是多么不可分割。
back_translation: It also mocks and celebrates more alternative aspects of "black culture" and the relatively stiff aspects of "white culture," while pointing out how inseparable these two are.

text: full frontal , which opens today nationwide , could almost be classified as a movie-industry satire , but it lacks the generous inclusiveness that is the genre 's definitive , if disingenuous , feature .
translation: 《全裸前奏》，今天在全国上映，几乎可以被归类为电影行业的讽刺片，但它缺乏这一类型定义性的、尽管不诚实的慷慨包容性。
back_translation: "Naked Prelude" is being released nationwide today and can almost be classified as a satire of the film industry, but it lacks the defining, albeit dishonest, generosity and inclusiveness of this genre.

text: ultimately ... the movie is too heady for children , and too preachy for adults .
translation: 最终，这部电影对儿童来说过于深奥，对成年人来说又过于说教。

text: could n't someone take rob schneider and have him switch bodies with a funny person ?

text: in the wrong hands , i.e. peploe 's , it 's simply unbearable

text: what saves it ... and makes it one of the better video-game-based flicks , is that the film acknowledges upfront that the plot makes no sense , such that the lack of linearity is the point of emotional and moral departure for protagonist alice .
translation: 它之所以保存了下来……并使其成为更好的视频游戏改编电影之一，是因为电影在一开始就承认情节毫无意义，因此缺乏线性正是女主角爱丽丝情感和道德的出发点。
back_translation: It has survived… and has become one of the better video game adaptation movies because the film acknowledges from the beginning that the plot is meaningless, and the lack of linearity is precisely the starting point for the emotional and moral journey of the protagonist, Alice.

text: like an afterschool special with costumes by gianni versace , mad love looks better than it feels .
translation: 就像一部穿着吉安尼·范思哲的课后特别节目，疯狂的爱看起来比感觉更美好。

text: a strong script , powerful direction and splendid production design allows us to be transported into the life of wladyslaw szpilman , who is not only a pianist , but a good human being .
translation: 强而有力的剧本、强劲的导演和华丽的制作设计使我们能够置身于弗拉迪斯瓦夫·什皮尔曼的生活中，他不仅是一位钢琴家，更是一位善良的人。
back_translation: A powerful script, a strong director, and stunning production design allow us to immerse ourselves in the life of Władysław Szpilman, who was not only a pianist but also a kind-hearted person.

text: miller tells this very compelling tale with little fuss or noise , expertly plucking tension from quiet .
translation: 米勒以极少的喧嚣和麻烦讲述了这个非常引人入胜的故事，巧妙地从宁静中提炼出紧张感。

text: it has no affect on the kurds , but it wore me down .
translation: 这对库尔德人没有影响，但让我感到疲惫。

text: the wanton slipperiness of \* corpus and its amiable jerking and reshaping of physical time and space would make it a great piece to watch with kids and use to introduce video as art .
translation: \* corpus的肆意滑动以及其友好的扭动和重塑物理时间和空间，使它成为与孩子们一起观看的绝佳作品，并用来介绍视频作为艺术。
back_translation: The arbitrary sliding of the corpus and its friendly twisting and reshaping of physical time and space make it an excellent piece to watch with children, and to introduce video as art.

text: the real star of this movie is the score , as in the songs translate well to film , and it 's really well directed .

text: instead of letting the laughs come as they may , lawrence unleashes his trademark misogyny -- er , comedy -- like a human volcano or an overflowing septic tank , take your pick .

back_translation: Rather than allowing laughter to arise naturally, Lawrence unleashes his trademark misogyny—uh, humor, take your pick—like a volcanic eruption or an overflowing sewage.

text: this tuxedo ... should have been sent back to the tailor for some major alterations .
translation: 这套礼服……应该送回裁缝那里进行大幅度的修改。

text: for most of its footage , the new thriller proves that director m. night shyamalan can weave an eerie spell and that mel gibson can gasp , shudder and even tremble without losing his machismo .
translation: 在大部分镜头中，这部新的惊悚片证明了导演麦克·奈特·沙马兰能够编织出一种诡异的魔力，而梅尔·吉布森则能够在不失男子气概的情况下喘息、颤抖，甚至颤动。
back_translation: In most scenes, this new thriller demonstrates that director M. Night Shyamalan can weave a strange magic, while Mel Gibson can breathe, tremble, and even quiver without losing his masculinity.

text: downright transparent is the script 's endless assault of embarrassingly ham-fisted sex jokes that reek of a script rewrite designed to garner the film a `` cooler '' pg-13 rating .
translation: 毫无疑问，剧本对令人尴尬的笨拙性笑话的无休止攻击，显然是为了让电影获得一个“更酷”的pg-13评级而进行的剧本重写。
back_translation: There is no doubt that the script's relentless assault on awkward and embarrassing jokes was clearly a rewrite to give the film a "cooler" PG-13 rating.

text: the performances are so overstated , the effect comes off as self-parody .
translation: 表演过于夸张，效果显得像是自我嘲讽。

text: in terms of execution this movie is careless and unfocused .
translation: 就执行而言，这部电影显得粗心和缺乏重点。

text: the story ultimately takes hold and grips hard .
translation: 故事最终掌握并紧紧抓住人心。
back_translation: Stories ultimately grasp and hold people's hearts tightly.

text: the whole movie is simply a lazy exercise in bad filmmaking that asks you to not only suspend your disbelief but your intelligence as well .
translation: 整部电影简直是懒惰的糟糕电影制作练习，不仅要求你暂时放下你的怀疑，还要放下你的智力。
back_translation: The entire movie is simply a lazy exercise in bad filmmaking that not only demands you to suspend your disbelief temporarily but also to let go of your intelligence.

text: it puts washington , as honest working man john q. archibald , on a pedestal , then keeps lifting the pedestal higher .
translation: 它将华盛顿作为诚实的工人约翰·Q·阿奇博尔德放在一个基座上，然后不断抬高这个基座。

text: i have not been this disappointed by a movie in a long time .
translation: 我已经很久没有对一部电影感到如此失望了。

translation: 一部时而引人入胜、时而令人沮丧的纪录片。

translation: 伯纳德·罗斯执导的杰作，《伊万的性福》。

translation: 不幸的是，《一小时照片》辜负了它的标题。

text: for a guy who has waited three years with breathless anticipation for a new hal hartley movie to pore over , no such thing is a big letdown .

text: beautifully produced .
translation: 精美制作。

text: a compelling coming-of-age drama about the arduous journey of a sensitive young girl through a series of foster homes and a fierce struggle to pull free from her dangerous and domineering mother 's hold over her .
translation: 一部引人入胜的成长剧情片，讲述了一位敏感年轻女孩在一系列寄养家庭中艰难的成长旅程，以及她奋起挣脱危险而专横的母亲控制的激烈斗争。
back_translation: An engaging coming-of-age drama that tells the difficult journey of a sensitive young girl growing up in a series of foster homes, and her intense struggle to break free from the control of her dangerous and domineering mother.

text: lee 's achievement extends to his supple understanding of the role that brown played in american culture as an athlete , a movie star , and an image of black indomitability .
translation: 李的成就还体现在他对布朗在美国文化中所扮演角色的深刻理解上，作为一名运动员、一位电影明星，以及黑人不屈不挠的象征。
back_translation: Li's achievements are also reflected in his profound understanding of the role Brown plays in American culture, as an athlete, a movie star, and a symbol of Black resilience.

text: it 's definitely an improvement on the first blade , since it does n't take itself so deadly seriously .
translation: 这绝对比第一部《刀锋》要好，因为它没有那么严肃。

text: yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness .
translation: 然而这一点在心灵上弥补了它在全新程度上的不足。
back_translation: However, this compensates for its shortcomings in a completely new aspect on a spiritual level.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: 最令人难忘的时刻是当绿先生把医疗设备扔向窗户的时候；不是因为这特别搞笑，而是因为我强烈想抓住我走道尽头那位老奶奶的拐杖，把它扔向屏幕以发泄我的不满。
back_translation: The most memorable moment was when Mr. Green threw the medical equipment at the window; not because it was particularly funny, but because I strongly wanted to grab the old lady's cane at the end of the hallway and throw it at the screen to vent my frustration.

text: the premise of `` abandon '' holds promise , ... but its delivery is a complete mess .
translation: “放弃”的前提充满希望，...但其呈现却是一团糟。

text: shyamalan offers copious hints along the way -- myriad signs , if you will -- that beneath the familiar , funny surface is a far bigger , far more meaningful story than one in which little green men come to earth for harvesting purposes .
translation: 沙马兰在这个过程中提供了大量的暗示 -- 不妨说是无数的迹象 -- 这些暗示表明，在熟悉而搞笑的表面下，隐藏着一个更加宏大、更加有意义的故事，而不仅仅是小绿人为了收割目的来到地球的故事。
back_translation: Shyamalan provides a wealth of hints throughout this process—one might say countless signs—that suggest beneath the familiar and humorous surface lies a grander and more meaningful story, rather than just the tale of little green men coming to Earth for harvesting purposes.

text: call me a cynic , but there 's something awfully deadly about any movie with a life-affirming message .
translation: 叫我愤世嫉俗者吧，但任何具有生命肯定意义的电影总是有一种可怕的致命性。
back_translation: Call me a cynic, but any film that has a significant meaning to life always carries a terrifying fatality.

text: we started to wonder if ... some unpaid intern had just typed ` chris rock , ' ` anthony hopkins ' and ` terrorists ' into some univac-like script machine .
translation: 我们开始怀疑...是否是一些未付实习生随便输入了“克里斯·洛克”、“安东尼·霍普金斯”和“恐怖分子”这些关键词到某个类似于宇宙计算机的脚本机器里。
back_translation: We began to suspect... whether some unpaid interns casually input the keywords "Chris Rock," "Anthony Hopkins," and "terrorist" into some script machine similar to a universe computer.

text: it 's hard to imagine that even very small children will be impressed by this tired retread .
translation: 很难想象甚至非常小的孩子会对这个疲惫的翻版感到印象深刻。

text: the art direction is often exquisite , and the anthropomorphic animal characters are beautifully realized through clever makeup design , leaving one to hope that the eventual dvd release will offer subtitles and the original italian-language soundtrack .
translation: 艺术指导常常精美绝伦，人形动物角色通过巧妙的化妆设计得以完美呈现，让人希望最终的DVD发行能够提供字幕和原版意大利语音轨。
back_translation: The art direction is often exquisitely crafted, and the humanoid animal characters are perfectly presented through clever makeup design, leaving one hoping that the final DVD release will provide subtitles and the original Italian audio track.

text: the problem with movies about angels is they have a tendency to slip into hokum .
translation: 关于天使的电影问题在于它们往往会滑入胡说八道。
back_translation: The problem with movies about angels is that they often slip into nonsense.

text: lazy filmmaking , with the director taking a hands-off approach when he should have shaped the story to show us why it 's compelling .
translation: 懒散的电影制作，导演采取了放任自流的态度，而他本应塑造故事，向我们展示它为何引人入胜。
back_translation: The lazy filmmaking has resulted in the director taking a hands-off approach, whereas he should have shaped the story and shown us why it is compelling.

text: like smoke signals , the film is also imbued with strong themes of familial ties and spirituality that are powerful and moving without stooping to base melodrama
translation: 像烟信一样，这部电影也充满了强烈的家庭纽带和灵性主题，这些主题既强大又感人，而没有降低到低级的情感戏剧。
back_translation: Like "Smoke Signals," this film is also filled with strong family ties and spiritual themes that are both powerful and touching, without resorting to lowbrow emotional drama.

text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: 与许多此类极度商业化的电影一样，似乎更花时间在为播放列表招聘合适的乐队和为明星们设计服装上，而不是在剧本上，剧本中只有几句聪明的笑话，除此之外没什么特别的内容。
back_translation: Like many such highly commercialized movies, it seems to spend more time recruiting suitable bands for the playlist and designing costumes for the stars, rather than on the script, which contains only a few clever jokes and nothing particularly special beyond that.

text: the film 's images give a backbone to the company and provide an emotional edge to its ultimate demise .
translation: 影片的画面为公司提供了支撑，并为其最终的灭亡增添了情感色彩。
back_translation: The visuals of the film provided support for the company and added emotional depth to its eventual demise.

text: stuffed to the brim with ideas , american instigator michael moore 's film is a rambling examination of american gun culture that uses his usual modus operandi of crucifixion through juxtaposition .
translation: 美国煽动者迈克尔·摩尔的电影充满了观点，是对美国枪支文化的漫无边际的审视，采用了他一贯的通过对比进行钉十字架的方式。
back_translation: Michael Moore's film, as an American provocateur, is filled with viewpoints and offers a sweeping examination of American gun culture, employing his usual method of crucifixion through contrast.

text: press the delete key .
translation: 按删除键。

text: ... the kind of entertainment that parents love to have their kids see .
translation: ... 父母们喜欢让他们的孩子观看的那种娱乐。

text: for all its visual panache and compelling supporting characters , the heart of the film rests in the relationship between sullivan and his son .

text: imamura has said that warm water under a red bridge is a poem to the enduring strengths of women .
translation: 今村说，红桥下的温水是一首赞颂女性持久力量的诗。

text: a grating , emaciated flick .
translation: 瘦削的刺耳的闪光。

text: it 's plotless , shapeless -- and yet , it must be admitted , not entirely humorless .
translation: 它没有情节，没有形状——然而，必须承认，并非完全没有幽默感。
back_translation: It has no plot, no shape—yet, it must be admitted, it is not entirely devoid of a sense of humor.

text: with a tone as variable as the cinematography , schaeffer 's film never settles into the light-footed enchantment the material needs , and the characters ' quirks and foibles never jell into charm .
translation: 莎弗的电影以变化多端的语调呈现，从未进入素材所需的轻快迷人之中，角色的怪癖和瑕疵也从未融汇成魅力。

text: a very slow , uneventful ride around a pretty tattered old carousel .
translation: 一次非常缓慢、无趣的乘坐，绕着一个破旧的老旋转木马。
back_translation: A very slow and boring ride around an old, dilapidated carousel.

text: jackson is always watchable .
translation: 杰克逊总是值得一看。

text: showtime is a fine-looking film with a bouncy score and a clutch of lively songs for deft punctuation .
translation: 《秀时光》是一部外观优美的电影，配有活泼的音乐和一系列生动的歌曲，恰到好处地增添了节奏感。
back_translation: "Showtime" is a visually stunning film, featuring lively music and a series of vibrant songs that perfectly enhance its rhythm.

text: mib ii is a movie that makes it possible for the viewer to doze off for a few minutes or make several runs to the concession stand and\/or restroom and not feel as if he or she has missed anything .
translation: 《异形特遣队 II》是一部让观众可以打个盹或者多次跑去售货亭和/或洗手间而不会感觉错过任何东西的电影。

text: ... bright , intelligent , and humanly funny film .
translation: ... 一部聪明、机智且富有人情味的影片。
back_translation: ... a smart, witty, and emotionally rich film.

text: too bad kramer could n't make a guest appearance to liven things up .
translation: 真可惜克雷默没能来客串一下，让气氛活跃起来。

text: 300 years of russian history and culture compressed into an evanescent , seamless and sumptuous stream of consciousness .
translation: 三百年的俄罗斯历史与文化浓缩成一条瞬息万变、无缝连接、奢华华丽的意识流。
back_translation: Three hundred years of Russian history and culture condensed into a constantly changing, seamlessly connected, luxurious and glamorous stream of consciousness.

text: the modern remake of dumas 's story is long on narrative and -lrb- too -rrb- short on action .
translation: 现代版的达umas故事叙述冗长而行动却显得不足。
back_translation: The modern version of the Dumas story is lengthy in narration but insufficient in action.

text: seagal is painfully foolish in trying to hold onto what 's left of his passe ' chopsocky glory .
translation: 西格尔在试图维持他那过时的功夫荣光时，显得痛苦而愚蠢。
back_translation: Siegel appeared pained and foolish in his attempt to uphold his outdated kung fu glory.

text: the enjoyable undercover brother , a zany mix of saturday night live-style parody , '70s blaxploitation films and goofball action comedy gone wild , dishes out a ton of laughs that everyone can enjoy .
translation: 愉快的卧底兄弟是一部疯狂的混合体，结合了《周六夜现场》风格的 parodied 、70年代的黑人剽窃电影和失控的搞笑动作喜剧，带来了许多人人都能享受的笑声。
back_translation: "Joyful Undercover Brothers" is a crazy hybrid that combines the parodied style of "Saturday Night Live," 70s black exploitation films, and out-of-control comedic action, delivering a lot of laughter that everyone can enjoy.

text: fantastic !
translation: 太棒了！
back_translation: Great!

text: there 's not a spark of new inspiration in it , just more of the same , done with noticeably less energy and imagination .
translation: 其中没有一点新的灵感，只是更多的老生常谈，明显缺乏能量和想象力。
back_translation: There is not a bit of new inspiration, just more of the same old clichés, clearly lacking energy and imagination.

text: `` red dragon '' is entertaining .
translation: 《红龙》很有趣。
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is very interesting.

text: hoffman waits too long to turn his movie in an unexpected direction , and even then his tone retains a genteel , prep-school quality that feels dusty and leatherbound .
translation: 霍夫曼太久才将他的电影转向一个意想不到的方向，即便如此，他的语气仍保持着一种温文尔雅、预科学校的气质，给人一种陈旧和皮革装帧的感觉。
back_translation: Hoffman took too long to shift his film in an unexpected direction; even so, his tone still retains a genteel, pre-scientific school quality, giving a sense of antiquity and leather-bound formatting.

text: secretary is just too original to be ignored .
translation: 秘书实在太有创意，无法被忽视。
back_translation: The secretary is simply too creative to be ignored.

text: while cherish does n't completely survive its tonal transformation from dark comedy to suspense thriller , it 's got just enough charm and appealing character quirks to forgive that still serious problem .
translation: 尽管《珍惜》在从黑色喜剧到悬疑惊悚片的音调转变中并未完全成功，但它仍然拥有足够的魅力和迷人的角色特点，可以原谅这个仍然严重的问题。
back_translation: Although "Cherish" does not completely succeed in transitioning from dark comedy to suspense thriller, it still possesses enough charm and captivating character traits to forgive this still significant issue.

text: the lack of naturalness makes everything seem self-consciously poetic and forced ... it 's a pity that -lrb- nelson 's -rrb- achievement does n't match his ambition .
translation: 缺乏自然感使一切显得过于自觉地诗意和矫揉造作……真可惜 -lrb- 纳尔逊的 -rrb- 成就没有匹配他的雄心。
back_translation: The lack of a natural feeling makes everything appear overly self-consciously poetic and contrived... it's really a pity that Nelson's achievements didn't match his ambitions.

text: graham greene 's novel of colonialism and empire is elevated by michael caine 's performance as a weary journalist in a changing world .

back_translation: Graham Greene's novels on colonialism and empire are made even more remarkable by Michael Caine's performance as a weary journalist in a changing world.

text: the movie is so resolutely cobbled together out of older movies that it even uses a totally unnecessary prologue , just because it seems obligatory .
translation: 这部电影是如此坚定地拼凑了旧电影，以至于它甚至使用了一个完全不必要的序幕，仅仅因为这似乎是义务。

translation: 《我的大希腊婚礼》不仅是今年最好的约会电影，它还是一个——我敢重复一遍——令人愉悦迷人的——而且完全可以说是美式的——喜剧幸福片段。
back_translation: "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" is not only the best date movie of the year, it is also a—I dare say again—delightfully charming—and can quite rightly be described as an American—comedy bliss segment.

text: an off-beat and fanciful film about the human need for monsters to blame for all that is amiss in the world .

text: this thing works on no level whatsoever for me .

translation: 一系列寻找电影的场景。

text: an unholy mess , driven by the pathetic idea that if you shoot something on crummy-looking videotape , it must be labelled ` hip ' , ` innovative ' and ` realistic ' .
translation: 一个亵渎的混乱，源于这样一个可悲的想法：如果你用糟糕的录像带拍摄一些东西，它就一定要被标记为“时髦”、“创新”和“真实”。
back_translation: A blasphemous chaos arises from the sad idea that if you capture something with a bad video tape, it must be labeled as "stylish," "innovative," and "authentic."

text: in the end , the weight of water comes to resemble the kind of soft-core twaddle you 'd expect to see on showtime 's ` red shoe diaries . '
translation: 最终，水的重量变得像你在Showtime的《红鞋日记》中所期望看到的那种软色情胡言乱语。

translation: 细致入微地揭示了一条令人愤慨的暴力和卑劣隐瞒的痕迹。

text: time is a beautiful film to watch , an interesting and at times captivating take on loss and loneliness .

translation: 一个感人且沉重的描绘，讲述了一个家庭在孩子去世后努力治愈的过程。

text: it 's replaced by some dramatic scenes that are jarring and deeply out of place in what could have -lrb- and probably should have -rrb- been a lighthearted comedy .
translation: 它被一些戏剧性的场景所取代，这些场景让人感到不适，深深地与本可以 -（并且可能应该 -）是轻松幽默喜剧的内容格格不入。

text: even if you do n't understand what on earth is going on , this is a movie that will stimulate hours of post viewing discussion , if only to be reminded of who did what to whom and why .
translation: 即使你不明白到底发生了什么，这也是一部可以激发数小时观后讨论的电影，哪怕只是为了回忆谁对谁做了什么以及为什么。

text: ... watching it was painful .
translation: … 看它真是痛苦。

translation: 这个故事情节可能有127年的历史，但《阿马罗神父的罪行》在对天主教机构内部腐败的绝望视角上却显得更加及时。

translation: 那就等着看看吧。

translation: 很好地确定了时间和地点，并讲述了一个迷人角色的故事。

translation: 这应该是一部浪漫喜剧，但它的问题在于太多《诺玛·雷》（Norma Rae），而不足够像《风华绝代》（Pretty Woman）。

text: one of the most incoherent features in recent memory .

translation: 电影的其余部分……毫无生气。

translation: 直言不讳，带有幽默和深刻的情感，使其信息引起共鸣。
back_translation: To speak frankly and without reservation, with humor and deep emotion, makes the message resonate.

translation: ... 一部好电影，肯定让市场部的人感到困惑。
back_translation: A good movie is sure to leave the marketing team feeling confused.

text: director uwe boll and writer robert dean klein fail to generate any interest in an unsympathetic hero caught up in an intricate plot that while cleverly worked out , can not overcome blah characters .
translation: 导演乌韦·博尔和编剧罗伯特·迪安·克莱因未能引起对一个不讨喜的英雄的兴趣，这个英雄卷入了一个复杂的情节中，尽管情节巧妙构思，但无法克服平淡的人物。
back_translation: Director Uwe Boll and screenwriter Robert Dean Klein failed to generate interest in an unlikable hero caught up in a complex plot. Despite the clever construction of the plot, it could not overcome the bland characters.

text: the metaphors are provocative , but too often , the viewer is left puzzled by the mechanics of the delivery .

text: works better in the conception than it does in the execution ... winds up seeming just a little too clever .

text: after you laugh once -lrb- maybe twice -rrb- , you will have completely forgotten the movie by the time you get back to your car in the parking lot .
translation: 当你笑了一次 -lrb- 也许两次 -rrb- 后，等你回到停车场的车里时，电影已完全被忘记。

text: there are plenty of scenes in frida that do work , but rarely do they involve the title character herself .

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
translation: 4ever 的吸引力与 Pokémon 视频相同，但在大屏幕上更有生机，并且引发头痛的速度较慢。

text: a chilling tale of one of the great crimes of 20th century france : the murder of two rich women by their servants in 1933 .
translation: 一个关于20世纪法国伟大犯罪之一的令人毛骨悚然的故事：1933年两名富裕女性被她们的仆人谋杀。
back_translation: A chilling story about one of the great crimes in 20th century France: in 1933, two wealthy women were murdered by their servant.

text: despite all the closed-door hanky-panky , the film is essentially juiceless .
translation: 尽管有很多幕后秘密交易，这部电影本质上是没有什么精彩之处的。

text: it 's one long bore .
translation: 这真是一场长时间的无聊。

text: if you are curious to see the darker side of what 's going on with young tv actors -lrb- dawson leery did what ?!? -rrb- , or see some interesting storytelling devices , you might want to check it out , but there 's nothing very attractive about this movie .
translation: 如果你想看看年轻电视演员背后黑暗的一面（达森·利里做了什么！？），或者想看看一些有趣的叙事手法，你可能会想看看这部电影，但这部电影其实并没有什么吸引人的地方。
back_translation: If you want to see the dark side behind young television actors (what did Dawson Leery do!?), or want to explore some interesting narrative techniques, you might want to check out this film, but in reality, this movie lacks anything appealing.

text: it has a dashing and resourceful hero ; a lisping , reptilian villain ; big fights ; big hair ; lavish period scenery ; and a story just complicated enough to let you bask in your own cleverness as you figure it out .
translation: 它有一个潇洒而聪明的英雄；一个口吃的爬行动物反派；大规模的打斗；华丽的发型；奢华的古代场景；还有一个故事复杂得刚好，让你在解谜的过程中享受自己的聪明才智。
back_translation: It features a suave and clever hero; a stuttering reptilian villain; large-scale fights; magnificent hairstyles; luxurious ancient settings; and a story that is just complex enough to let you enjoy your own cleverness while puzzling it out.

translation: 《冰河世纪》不会让你大吃一惊，但会温暖你的心，我给它一个强烈的赞。

text: a tasty masala .
translation: 美味的香料。

text: but it does have one saving grace .
translation: 但它确实有一个拯救的优点。

translation: 人们无法否认其严重性和质量。

translation: 皮克里展现了充满深情的精彩表演。

text: it 'll keep you wide awake and ... very tense .
translation: 它会让你保持清醒，并且……非常紧张。

translation: 一个空洞、毫无目的的练习。

text: too bad .
