text: rich in shadowy metaphor and as sharp as a samurai sword , jiang wen 's devils on the doorstep is a wartime farce in the alternately comic and gut-wrenching style of joseph heller or kurt vonnegut .
translation: 富含阴郁的隐喻，犹如武士刀般锋利，姜文的《鬼子来了》是一部战争闹剧，以乔瑟夫·海勒或库尔特·冯尼古特那种时而喜剧、时而撕心裂肺的风格呈现。
back_translation: Rich in gloomy metaphors and as sharp as a samurai sword, Jiang Wen's "Devils on the Doorstep" is a war farce presented in a style reminiscent of Joseph Heller or Kurt Vonnegut, at times comedic and at times heart-wrenching.

text: can be classified as one of those ` alternate reality ' movies ... except that it would have worked so much better dealing in only one reality .
translation: 可以被归类为其中一种“替代现实”电影……不过如果只处理一个现实，它会更有效。
back_translation: It can be categorized as one of those "alternative reality" movies... However, it would be more effective if it only dealt with one reality.

text: despite some strong performances , never rises above the level of a telanovela .
translation: 尽管有一些出色的表演，但始终没有超过肥皂剧的水平。
back_translation: Despite some outstanding performances, it has never surpassed the level of a soap opera.

text: painfully padded .
translation: 痛苦的填充。
back_translation: Painful filling.

text: the sum of all fears is remarkably fuddled about motives and context , which drains it of the dramatic substance that would shake us in our boots -lrb- or cinema seats -rrb- .
translation: 《恐惧之和》在动机和背景方面显得相当混乱，这使其失去了可以让我们感到不安的戏剧性实质——无论是在靴子里还是电影院的座位上。
back_translation: "The Equation of Fear" appears quite chaotic in terms of motivation and background, which detracts from its dramatic substance that could have made us feel uneasy—whether in a boot or in a cinema seat.

text: a diverse and astonishingly articulate cast of palestinian and israeli children .
translation: 一群多样化且极具表达能力的巴勒斯坦和以色列儿童。
back_translation: A group of diverse and expressive Palestinian and Israeli children.

text: highly recommended viewing for its courage , ideas , technical proficiency and great acting .
translation: 强烈推荐观看，因其勇气、思想、技术娴熟和出色的表演。
back_translation: Highly recommended to watch for its courage, thoughtfulness, technical skill, and outstanding performances.

text: none of this is meaningful or memorable , but frosting is n't , either , and you would n't turn down a big bowl of that , would you ?
translation: 这些都没有意义或令人难忘，但糖霜也一样，你不会拒绝一大碗糖霜，对吧？
back_translation: These have no meaning or are memorable, but frosting is the same; you wouldn't refuse a big bowl of frosting, would you?

text: a gripping documentary that reveals how deep the antagonism lies in war-torn jerusalem .
translation: 一部引人入胜的纪录片，揭示了在战乱中的耶路撒冷中对立情绪的深度。
back_translation: A captivating documentary reveals the depth of polarized emotions in war-torn Jerusalem.

text: i had a dream that a smart comedy would come along to rescue me from a summer of teen-driven , toilet-humor codswallop , and its name was earnest .
translation: 我做了一个梦，一个聪明的喜剧会来拯救我脱离一个充满青少年驱动、厕所幽默废话的夏天，它的名字叫做《真诚》。
back_translation: I had a dream that a clever comedy would come to rescue me from a summer filled with teenager-driven, toilet humor nonsense. Its name was "Sincere."

text: a delightful surprise because despite all the backstage drama , this is a movie that tells stories that work -- is charming , is moving , is funny and looks professional .
translation: 一个令人愉快的惊喜，因为尽管有所有的幕后戏剧，这是一部能讲述有效故事的电影——迷人、感人、有趣，并且看起来很专业。
back_translation: A delightful surprise, because despite all the behind-the-scenes drama, this is a film that can tell an effective story—charming, touching, interesting, and looking very professional.

text: for all the wit and hoopla , festival in cannes offers rare insight into the structure of relationships .
translation: 尽管有所有的机智和热闹，戛纳电影节提供了对人际关系结构的罕见洞察。
back_translation: Despite all the wit and excitement, the Cannes Film Festival offers a rare insight into the structure of interpersonal relationships.

text: every joke is repeated at least -- annoying , is n't it ?
translation: 每个笑话至少被重复过一次——这真让人烦，不是吗？
back_translation: Every joke has been repeated at least once — that's really annoying, isn't it?

text: ` anyone with a passion for cinema , and indeed sex , should see it as soon as possible . '
translation: “任何对电影和确实对性爱充满热情的人，都应该尽快观看这部电影。”
back_translation: "Anyone who is passionate about movies and indeed about sex should watch this film as soon as possible."

text: a refreshing change from the usual whoopee-cushion effort aimed at the youth market .
translation: 与通常针对年轻市场的笑气垫玩具相比，这是一个令人耳目一新的变化。
back_translation: This is a refreshing change compared to the typical laughing gas cushion toys targeted at the young market.

text: ... an interesting slice of history .
translation: ……一段有趣的历史片段。
back_translation: ...an interesting historical excerpt.

text: for dance completists only .
translation: 仅适合舞蹈爱好者。
back_translation: Only suitable for dance enthusiasts.

text: it has the air of a surprisingly juvenile lark , a pop-influenced prank whose charms are immediately apparent and wear thin with repetition .
translation: 它有一种令人惊讶的幼稚嬉闹的气息，这是一场受到流行音乐影响的恶作剧，其魅力立刻显现，但随着重复而变得乏味。
back_translation: It has a surprisingly childish and playful vibe, a prank influenced by pop music, whose charm becomes apparent immediately but grows tiresome with repetition.

text: it 's uninteresting .
translation: 这很没意思。
back_translation: This is very boring.

text: bray is completely at sea ; with nothing but a savage garden music video on his resume , he has no clue about making a movie .
translation: 布雷完全无从下手；他的简历上只有一部《野蛮花园》的音乐视频，他对制作电影毫无头绪。
back_translation: Brei was completely at a loss; his resume only featured a music video for "Wild Garden," and he had no clue about film production.

text: a tone poem of transgression .
translation: 一首关于越界的音调诗。
back_translation: A poem with a tune about crossing boundaries.

text: seemingly a vehicle to showcase the canadian 's inane ramblings , stealing harvard is a smorgasbord of soliloquies about nothing delivered by the former mr. drew barrymore .
translation: 似乎是一个展示加拿大人无意义喋喋不休的载体，《偷哈佛》是一场由前德鲁·巴里摩尔先生演绎的关于无所事事的独白盛宴。
back_translation: Seemingly a vehicle for showcasing the meaningless ramblings of Canadians, "Stealing Harvard" is a monologue feast about idleness, performed by the former Mr. Drew Barrymore.

text: confusion is one of my least favourite emotions , especially when i have to put up with 146 minutes of it .
translation: 困惑是我最不喜欢的情绪之一，尤其是当我不得不忍受146分钟的困惑时。
back_translation: Confusion is one of my least favorite emotions, especially when I have to endure 146 minutes of it.

text: road to perdition does display greatness , and it 's worth seeing .
translation: 《堕落之路》确实展现了伟大，值得一看。
back_translation: "The Road to Perdition" truly showcases greatness and is worth watching.

text: ultimately , sarah 's dedication to finding her husband seems more psychotic than romantic , and nothing in the movie makes a convincing case that one woman 's broken heart outweighs all the loss we witness .
translation: 最终，莎拉对寻找丈夫的执着似乎更具精神病倾向而非浪漫，电影中没有任何情节能令人信服地论证一个女人的破碎心灵大于我们所见的所有损失。
back_translation: Ultimately, Sarah's obsession with finding her husband seems more indicative of a psychiatric tendency than romance, and the film does not present any plot points that convincingly demonstrate that a woman's broken heart is greater than all the losses we see.

text: an intense and effective film about loneliness and the chilly anonymity of the environments where so many of us spend so much of our time .
translation: 一部关于孤独和许多人花费大量时间的环境冷漠匿名的强烈而有效的电影。
back_translation: A powerful and effective film about loneliness and the environmental indifference many people spend a lot of time in.

text: one of the worst movies of the year .
translation: 今年最糟糕的电影之一。
back_translation: One of the worst movies of the year.

text: like a soft drink that 's been sitting open too long : it 's too much syrup and not enough fizz .
translation: 就像一瓶放置太久的软饮料：糖浆太多，气泡太少。
back_translation: It's like a bottle of soft drink that's been sitting too long: too much syrup and not enough bubbles.

text: too bad writer-director adam rifkin situates it all in a plot as musty as one of the golden eagle 's carpets .
translation: 真可惜，编剧兼导演亚当·里夫金将这一切置于一个像金雕地毯一样陈旧的情节中。
back_translation: It's a pity that writer-director Adam Rifkin has placed all of this within a plot as outdated as a golden eagle carpet.

text: it has more in common with a fireworks display than a movie , which normally is expected to have characters and a storyline .
translation: 它与烟花表演更为相似，而不是电影，电影通常被期待有角色和故事情节。
back_translation: It is more similar to a fireworks display rather than a movie, as movies are typically expected to have characters and a plot.

text: a captivatingly quirky hybrid of character portrait , romantic comedy and beat-the-clock thriller .
translation: 一个引人入胜的奇特混合体，结合了人物肖像、浪漫喜剧和赛跑时限的惊悚片。
back_translation: A captivating and peculiar blend that combines character portraits, romantic comedy, and a thriller with a race against time.

text: manages to delight without much of a story .
translation: 在没有多少故事的情况下仍能给人带来愉悦。
back_translation: Can provide pleasure even with little story.

text: ... an hour-and-a-half of inoffensive , unmemorable filler .
translation: … 一个半小时的无害、无记忆的填充内容。
back_translation: ... an hour and a half of harmless, forgettable filler content.

text: may take its sweet time to get wherever it 's going , but if you have the patience for it , you wo n't feel like it 's wasted yours .
translation: 可能需要花些时间才能到达目的地，但如果你有耐心，就不会觉得这段时间是浪费的。
back_translation: It may take some time to reach your destination, but if you are patient, you won't feel that this time is wasted.

text: ultimately , the film never recovers from the clumsy clich茅 of the ugly american abroad , and the too-frosty exterior ms. paltrow employs to authenticate her british persona is another liability .
translation: 最终，这部电影从对丑陋的美国人在国外这一老套陈词滥调的笨拙表现中始终无法恢复，而帕特洛女士为了展现她的英国角色所使用的过于冷淡的外表也是另一个劣势。
back_translation: Ultimately, the film never recovers from its clumsy portrayal of the old cliché of ugly Americans abroad, and Ms. Paltrow's overly aloof demeanor in portraying her British character is another disadvantage.

text: in the book-on-tape market , the film of `` the kid stays in the picture '' would be an abridged edition
translation: 在有声书市场中，《孩子永存于画面》这部影片将是一个缩略版。
back_translation: In the audiobook market, the film "Children Live On in the Picture" will be a condensed version.

text: it is bad , but certainly not without merit as entertainment .
translation: 这很糟糕，但作为娱乐肯定不乏优点。
back_translation: This is terrible, but as entertainment, it certainly has its merits.

text: high crimes is a cinematic misdemeanor , a routine crime thriller remarkable only for its lack of logic and misuse of two fine actors , morgan freeman and ashley judd .
translation: 《高罪》是一部电影上的轻罪，这是一部常规的犯罪惊悚片，唯一引人注目的是其缺乏逻辑和对两位优秀演员摩根·弗里曼和阿什莉·贾德的滥用。
back_translation: "High Crimes" is a film about a minor crime, a conventional crime thriller, notable only for its lack of logic and the misuse of two excellent actors, Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd.

text: the project 's filmmakers forgot to include anything even halfway scary as they poorly rejigger fatal attraction into a high school setting .
translation: 该项目的 filmmakers 忘记了包含任何即使是半分恐怖的内容，因为他们将《致命吸引》糟糕地重新改编成了一个高中背景。
back_translation: The filmmakers of this project forgot to include any content that is even mildly scary, as they poorly adapted "Fatal Attraction" into a high school setting.

text: a high-spirited buddy movie about the reunion of berlin anarchists who face arrest 15 years after their crime .
translation: 一部充满活力的好伙伴电影，讲述了柏林无政府主义者在犯罪15年后重聚并面临逮捕的故事。
back_translation: A vibrant and engaging buddy movie that tells the story of anarchists in Berlin reuniting after 15 years of crime and facing arrest.

text: ... one of the most entertaining monster movies in ages ...
translation: ... 最近年代最具娱乐性的怪兽电影之一 ...
back_translation: ... one of the most entertaining monster movies in recent years ...

text: an infinitely wittier version of the home alone formula .
translation: 一个无限机智的《独自在家》公式版本。
back_translation: An infinitely clever formula version of "Home Alone."

text: devoid of any of the qualities that made the first film so special .
translation: 缺乏第一部电影中让人印象深刻的任何特质。
back_translation: Lacking any of the impressive qualities of the first film.

text: succeeds where its recent predecessor miserably fails because it demands that you suffer the dreadfulness of war from both sides .
translation: 它在最近的前任失败的地方取得成功，因为它要求你从双方感受战争的可怕。
back_translation: It succeeds in the recent failures of its predecessors because it asks you to feel the horrors of war from both sides.

text: fontaine masterfully creates a portrait of two strong men in conflict , inextricably entwined through family history , each seeing himself in the other , neither liking what he sees .
translation: 丰丹巧妙地描绘了两位强者之间的冲突，他们通过家族历史密不可分地纠缠在一起，彼此在对方身上看到了自己，却都不喜欢自己所看到的。
back_translation: Feng Dan skillfully depicts the conflict between two strong characters who are inextricably intertwined through family history. They see themselves in each other, yet neither likes what they see.

text: everyone 's insecure in lovely and amazing , a poignant and wryly amusing film about mothers , daughters and their relationships .
translation: 每个人都在不安中，影片《可爱的与惊人的》是一部关于母亲、女儿及其关系的深刻而幽默的电影。
back_translation: Everyone is in a state of unease, and the film "Lovely and Amazing" is a profound and humorous movie about mothers, daughters, and their relationships.

text: seemingly disgusted with the lazy material and the finished product 's unshapely look , director fisher stevens inexplicably dips key moments from the film in waking life water colors .
translation: 似乎对懒散的素材和成品的不成样子感到厌恶，导演费舍尔·史蒂文斯 inexplicably 将影片中的关键时刻浸入《梦游人生》的水彩画中。
back_translation: It seems that Director Fisher Stevens feels averse to the lazy material and the unrefined final product, inexplicably immersing key moments of the film in the watercolor style of "Life is a Dream."

text: it 's also curious to note that this film , like the similarly ill-timed antitrust , is easily as bad at a fraction the budget .
translation: 有趣的是，这部电影与同样时机不佳的反垄断电影相比，虽然预算只有一小部分，但同样糟糕。
back_translation: Interestingly, this movie is just as bad as the similarly timed anti-trust film, despite having only a small fraction of the budget.

text: do n't let the subtitles fool you ; the movie only proves that hollywood no longer has a monopoly on mindless action .
translation: 别让字幕骗了你；这部电影只证明好莱坞不再垄断无脑动作片。
back_translation: Don't let the subtitles fool you; this movie only proves that Hollywood no longer has a monopoly on brainless action films.

text: the only type of lives this glossy comedy-drama resembles are ones in formulaic mainstream movies .
translation: 这种光鲜亮丽的喜剧剧所类似的生活类型，只有在公式化的主流电影中才能找到。
back_translation: This type of glamorous comedy, similar to certain life styles, can only be found in formulaic mainstream movies.

text: fulford-wierzbicki ... deftly captures the wise-beyond-her-years teen .
translation: fulford-wierzbicki ... 巧妙地捕捉到了这个超越年龄智慧的青少年。
back_translation: Fulford-Wierzbicki... skillfully captures this teenager who possesses wisdom beyond their years.

text: you see the movie and you think , zzzzzzzzz .
translation: 你看了电影，然后觉得，zzz。
back_translation: You watched the movie and then felt, zzz.

text: much of this slick and sprightly cgi feature is sufficiently funny to amuse even the most resolutely unreligious parents who escort their little ones to megaplex screenings .
translation: 这部光鲜亮丽、活泼生动的CGI作品大部分足够有趣，可以让即便是最坚定的不信教父母在带着孩子观看大屏幕时也感到开心。
back_translation: This glamorous and lively CGI work is mostly interesting enough to keep even the most staunch non-believer parents happy while watching with their children on the big screen.

text: a tightly directed , highly professional film that 's old-fashioned in all the best possible ways .
translation: 一部紧凑有序、专业水准高的电影，在各个方面都呈现出最经典的老派风格。
back_translation: A compact, well-organized, and high-quality professional film that showcases the most classic old-school style in every aspect.

text: confessions is without a doubt a memorable directorial debut from king hunk .
translation: 《忏悔》无疑是帅气王子令人难忘的导演处女作。
back_translation: "Confession" is undoubtedly the unforgettable directorial debut of the handsome prince.

text: best enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real-life events .
translation: 最好把它当作一种受真实事件启发的虚构作品来享受。
back_translation: It is best to treat it as a fictional work inspired by real events.

text: this is a heartfelt story ... it just is n't a very involving one .
translation: 这是一个发自内心的故事……只是它并不是一个很吸引人的故事。
back_translation: This is a story that comes from the heart... but it is not a very captivating story.

text: schnitzler does a fine job contrasting the sleekness of the film 's present with the playful paranoia of the film 's past . '
translation: 施尼茨勒很好地对比了电影当前的流畅与影片过去的玩味焦虑。
back_translation: Schnitzler effectively contrasts the current fluidity of films with the playful anxiety of films from the past.

text: george clooney , in his first directorial effort , presents this utterly ridiculous shaggy dog story as one of the most creative , energetic and original comedies to hit the screen in years .
translation: 乔治·克鲁尼在他的第一部导演作品中，以一种极其荒谬的长篇笑话呈现了这部多年未见的极具创意、活力和原创性的喜剧。
back_translation: George Clooney presents this long-lost, highly creative, energetic, and original comedy in his directorial debut as an exceedingly absurd long joke.

text: ` martin lawrence live ' is so self-pitying , i almost expected there to be a collection taken for the comedian at the end of the show .
translation: 《马丁·劳伦斯现场演出》充满了自怜，我几乎期待在演出结束时要为这位喜剧演员募捐。
back_translation: "Martin Lawrence Live" is filled with self-pity, and I almost expected to be asked to donate to this comedian at the end of the performance.

text: the screenplay does too much meandering , norton has to recite bland police procedural details , fiennes wanders around in an attempt to seem weird and distanced , hopkins looks like a drag queen .
translation: 剧本过于漫无目的，诺顿不得不背诵枯燥的警察程序细节，范恩试图显得怪异和疏离而四处游荡，霍普金斯看起来像个变性人。
back_translation: The script is aimless, with Norton having to recite tedious police procedural details, Vann trying to appear quirky and detached while wandering around, and Hopkins looking like a transgender person.

text: if oscar had a category called best bad film you thought was going to be really awful but was n't , guys would probably be duking it out with the queen of the damned for the honor .
translation: 如果奥斯卡有一个类别叫做“最佳糟糕电影”，你曾以为会非常糟糕但实际上并没有，那些家伙可能会与《被诅咒的女王》争夺这个荣誉。
back_translation: If the Oscars had a category for "Best Bad Movie," those films you thought would be terrible but actually weren't might compete with "The Cursed Queen" for this honor.

text: anyone else who may , for whatever reason , be thinking about going to see this movie is hereby given fair warning .
translation: 任何其他可能出于任何原因考虑去看这部电影的人在此被给予了明确的警告。
back_translation: Anyone else considering watching this movie for any reason is hereby given a clear warning.

text: i could n't help but feel the wasted potential of this slapstick comedy .
translation: 我不禁感到这部滑稽喜剧的潜力被浪费了。
back_translation: I can't help but feel that the potential of this comedy has been wasted.

text: the latest vapid actor 's exercise to appropriate the structure of arthur schnitzler 's reigen .
translation: 最新的无聊演员的练习是模仿阿图尔·施尼茨勒的《轮回》的结构。
back_translation: The latest exercise for boring actors is to mimic the structure of Arthur Schnitzler's "Reigen."

text: majidi 's direction has never been smoother or more confident .
translation: 马基迪的导演风格从未如此顺畅自信。
back_translation: Majidi's directing style has never been so smooth and confident.

text: there 's only one way to kill michael myers for good : stop buying tickets to these movies .
translation: 要彻底杀死迈克尔·迈尔斯，只有一个办法：停止购买这些电影的票。
back_translation: The only way to completely kill Michael Myers is to stop buying tickets for these movies.

text: fear permeates the whole of stortelling , todd solondz ' oftentimes funny , yet ultimately cowardly autocritique .
translation: 恐惧渗透了整个故事讲述，托德·索伦兹的作品常常幽默，但最终却是一种懦弱的自我批判。
back_translation: Fear permeates the entire narrative; Todd Solondz's work is often humorous, but ultimately it's a form of cowardly self-criticism.

text: falsehoods pile up , undermining the movie 's reality and stifling its creator 's comic voice .
translation: 虚假信息堆积，扰乱了电影的真实性，压制了创作者的幽默声音。
back_translation: The accumulation of false information disrupts the authenticity of movies and stifles the humorous voices of creators.

text: bland but harmless .
translation: 平淡但无害。
back_translation: Mundane but harmless.

text: like leafing through an album of photos accompanied by the sketchiest of captions .
translation: 就像翻看一本仅附有简陋说明的相册。
back_translation: It's like flipping through an album that only has a rudimentary explanation.

text: judd 's characters ought to pick up the durable best seller smart women , foolish choices for advice .
translation: 贾德的角色应该借鉴畅销书《聪明女性，愚蠢选择》的建议。
back_translation: Jade's character should draw on the advice from the bestselling book "Smart Women, Foolish Choices."

text: the criticism never rises above easy , cynical potshots at morally bankrupt characters ...
translation: 这种批评从未超出对道德败坏角色的轻松、愤世嫉俗的讽刺。
back_translation: This criticism has never gone beyond light-hearted, cynical satire of morally corrupt characters.

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a ` topless tutorial service . '
translation: 青少年将会充分满足于这部电影幼稚的恶作剧和滑稽表演的混合，尽管那些更好色的人可能会对这部电影相对保守感到失望，因为它展现了一个“无上装的教程服务”。
back_translation: Teenagers will be fully satisfied with the mix of childish pranks and funny performances in this movie, although those with a more lascivious nature might feel disappointed by the film's relatively conservative approach, as it features a "without upper garment tutorial service."

text: about the best thing you could say about narc is that it 's a rock-solid little genre picture .
translation: 关于《毒品交易员》，你可以说它是一部坚实的小类型电影。
back_translation: Regarding "Drug Dealer", you could say it is a solid little genre film.

text: an unbelievably stupid film , though occasionally fun enough to make you forget its absurdity .
translation: 一部令人难以置信愚蠢的电影，尽管偶尔有趣到足以让你忘记它的荒谬。
back_translation: An incredibly stupid movie that, despite being occasionally amusing enough to make you forget its absurdity.

text: star\/producer salma hayek and director julie taymor have infused frida with a visual style unique and inherent to the titular character 's paintings and in the process created a masterful work of art of their own .
translation: 明星/制片人萨尔玛·海耶克和导演朱莉·泰摩尔为《弗里达》注入了独特且固有于主角画作的视觉风格，并在这个过程中创造了一部他们自己的杰作。
back_translation: Star/producer Salma Hayek and director Julie Taymor infused "Frida" with a unique visual style inherent to the protagonist's artwork, creating their own masterpiece in the process.

text: what -lrb- denis -rrb- accomplishes in his chilling , unnerving film is a double portrait of two young women whose lives were as claustrophic , suffocating and chilly as the attics to which they were inevitably consigned .
translation: 丹尼斯在他令人毛骨悚然且令人不安的影片中所取得的成就是，描绘了两位年轻女性的双重肖像，她们的生活就像注定要被隔离到阁楼一样，狭窄、窒息且寒冷。
back_translation: Dennis's achievement in his chilling and unsettling film is the portrayal of a dual portrait of two young women, whose lives seem destined to be confined to an attic—narrow, suffocating, and cold.

text: to build a feel-good fantasy around a vain dictator-madman is off-putting , to say the least , not to mention inappropriate and wildly undeserved .
translation: 围绕一个自恋的独裁者狂人的感觉良好的幻想是令人反感的，至少可以这么说，更不用提这是不合适和极其不配的。
back_translation: The feel-good fantasy surrounding a narcissistic dictator is repugnant, to say the least, not to mention that it is inappropriate and highly unworthy.

text: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it is n't merely offensive .
translation: 一种通用的血腥屠杀，当它不仅仅是令人反感时，往往变得可笑且无法忍受。
back_translation: A universal bloody massacre often becomes ridiculous and intolerable when it is not just disgusting.

text: judith and zaza 's extended bedroom sequence ... is so intimate and sensual and funny and psychologically self-revealing that it makes most of what passes for sex in the movies look like cheap hysterics .
translation: 朱迪思和扎扎的延展卧室场景……是如此亲密、感性、幽默且在心理上自我揭示，以至于电影中大多数所谓的性场面看起来像廉价的歇斯底里。
back_translation: The extended bedroom scene between Judith and Zaza is so intimate, sensual, humorous, and psychologically revealing that most of the so-called sex scenes in the film appear as cheap hysteria.

text: with an unusual protagonist -lrb- a kilt-wearing jackson -rrb- and subject matter , the improbable `` formula 51 '' is somewhat entertaining , but it could have been much stronger .
translation: 《公式51》以一位穿着苏格兰裙的杰克逊为不寻常的主角，以及主题内容，虽然有些娱乐性，但本可以更加强大。
back_translation: "Formula 51" features an unusual protagonist, a man named Jackson dressed in a kilt, and while its themes have some entertainment value, they could have been more impactful.

text: this is the kind of movie during which you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you , at its cluelessness , at its idiocy , at its utterly misplaced earnestness .
translation: 这是一部让你想要在前面的座位上撞头的电影，因其毫无头绪、愚蠢以及完全错位的认真态度。
back_translation: This is a movie that makes you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you because it is completely clueless, stupid, and has a completely misplaced seriousness.

text: its appeal will probably limited to lds church members and undemanding armchair tourists .
translation: 它的吸引力可能仅限于摩门教会成员和不太挑剔的沙发游客。
back_translation: Its appeal may be limited to members of the Mormon Church and less discerning couch travelers.

text: the latest adam sandler assault and possibly the worst film of the year .
translation: 最新的亚当·桑德勒电影《攻击》，可能是今年最糟糕的影片。
back_translation: The latest Adam Sandler movie "The Outlaws" might be the worst film of the year.

text: the determination of pinochet 's victims to seek justice , and their often heartbreaking testimony , spoken directly into director patricio guzman 's camera , pack a powerful emotional wallop .
translation: 皮诺切的受害者们寻求正义的决心，以及他们直接对着导演帕特里西奥·古兹曼的摄像机所讲述的常常令人心碎的证词，带来了强烈的情感冲击。
back_translation: The determination of Pinochet's victims to seek justice, along with their often heartbreaking testimonies directly addressed to director Patricio Guzmán's camera, brings a strong emotional impact.

text: a beautiful , timeless and universal tale of heated passions -- jealousy , betrayal , forgiveness and murder .
translation: 一则美丽、永恒且普遍的故事，讲述了强烈的激情——嫉妒、背叛、宽恕和谋杀。
back_translation: A beautiful, eternal, and universal story that tells of intense passions—jealousy, betrayal, forgiveness, and murder.

text: hill looks to be going through the motions , beginning with the pale script .
translation: 山似乎在走过场，从苍白的剧本开始。
back_translation: The mountains seem to be going through the motions, starting with a pale script.

text: who needs mind-bending drugs when they can see this , the final part of the ` qatsi ' trilogy , directed by godfrey reggio , with music by philip glass ?
translation: 谁需要令人震惊的药物，当他们可以看到这个，由戈弗雷·雷吉奥执导，菲利普·格拉斯作曲的“qatsi”三部曲的最后一部分呢？
back_translation: Who needs shocking drugs when they can see this, the final part of the "qatsi" trilogy directed by Godfrey Reggio and composed by Philip Glass?

text: disjointed parody .
translation: 割裂的滑稽模仿。
back_translation: Fragmented comical imitation.

text: typical anim茅 , with cheapo animation -lrb- like saturday morning tv in the '60s -rrb- , a complex sword-and-sorcery plot and characters who all have big round eyes and japanese names .
translation: 典型的动画，配有廉价的动画效果（就像60年代的周六早晨电视节目），复杂的剑与魔法情节，以及所有角色都拥有大圆眼睛和日本名字。
back_translation: A typical animation, featuring cheap animation effects (similar to Saturday morning TV shows from the 1960s), a complex sword and magic plot, and all characters having big round eyes and Japanese names.

text: you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .
translation: 你真的无法相信会有人真正购买这些东西。
back_translation: You really can't believe that there are people who would actually buy these things.

text: the plot is nothing but boilerplate clich茅s from start to finish , and the script assumes that not only would subtlety be lost on the target audience , but that it 's also too stupid to realize that they 've already seen this exact same movie a hundred times
translation: 情节从头到尾不过是陈词滥调，剧本假设不仅目标观众无法理解细腻之处，而且他们也太愚蠢，不会意识到自己已经看过这部电影一百遍。
back_translation: The plot is nothing more than a cliché from beginning to end, and the script assumes that not only can the target audience not understand the subtleties, but they are also too stupid to realize that they have already seen this movie a hundred times.

text: twenty years later , e.t. is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: 二十年后，《外星人》仍然是电影的里程碑。
back_translation: Twenty years later, "Alien" is still a milestone in cinema.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .
translation: 安吉拉·盖奥尔基乌饰演著名女主角弗洛里亚·托斯卡，罗伯托·阿拉尼亚饰演她的情人马里奥·卡瓦拉多西，而鲁杰罗则饰演阴险、好色的警察局长斯卡皮亚，所有人都唱得很出色，表演也相当到位。
back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu plays the famous heroine Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna portrays her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggero plays the sinister, lecherous police chief Scarpia. Everyone sings beautifully and delivers their performances very well.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate ... but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .
translation: 贡德里的导演技法还算不错……但赋予人性独特感觉的是考夫曼的剧本。
back_translation: Gondry's directorial technique is quite good... but it is Kaufman's script that gives it a unique sense of humanity.

text: though this rude and crude film does deliver a few gut-busting laughs , its digs at modern society are all things we 've seen before .
translation: 虽然这部粗俗的电影确实带来了几次让人捧腹大笑，但它对现代社会的讽刺却是我们见过的老生常谈。
back_translation: Although this crude film does provide a few laugh-out-loud moments, its satire of modern society is a tired cliché that we have seen before.

text: one of the most exciting action films to come out of china in recent years .
translation: 近年来中国最令人兴奋的动作片之一。
back_translation: One of the most exciting action movies in China in recent years.

text: glizty but formulaic and silly ... cagney 's ` top of the world ' has been replaced by the bottom of the barrel .
translation: 华丽却公式化且愚蠢……凯根的“世界之巅”被“捡拾垃圾”所取代。
back_translation: Glamorous yet formulaic and foolish... Kagan's "World atop the World" has been replaced by "picking up trash."

text: makes a joke out of car chases for an hour and then gives us half an hour of car chases .
translation: 把车追逐戏弄了一个小时，然后给我们半个小时的车追逐。
back_translation: The car chase was teased for an hour, and then we got half an hour of the actual car chase.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- soulless , stupid sequel ...
translation: -（一）缺乏灵魂、愚蠢的续集……
back_translation: - (1) A soulless, foolish sequel...

text: with a large cast representing a broad cross-section , tavernier 's film bounds along with the rat-a-tat energy of `` his girl friday , '' maintaining a light touch while tackling serious themes .
translation: 塔瓦涅的电影演员阵容庞大，代表了广泛的社会群体，影片以“她的星期五”的节奏轻快地推进，保持轻松的风格同时探讨严肃的主题。
back_translation: The cast of "Tavane" is extensive and represents a wide range of social groups. The film progresses with a lively rhythm of "Her Friday," maintaining a relaxed style while addressing serious themes.

text: unpretentious , charming , quirky , original
translation: 朴实无华，迷人，古怪，独特
back_translation: Simple and unadorned, charming, quirky, unique.

text: humorless , self-conscious art drivel , made without a glimmer of intelligence or invention .
translation: 毫无幽默感、自我意识的艺术废话，缺乏丝毫智慧或创意。
back_translation: Artistic nonsense that is completely devoid of humor and self-awareness, lacking any trace of wisdom or creativity.

text: told just proficiently enough to trounce its overly comfortable trappings .
translation: 足够熟练地告诉，让其不再过于安逸的束缚。
back_translation: Sufficiently skilled to tell, so that it is no longer bound by excessive comfort.

text: if you have n't seen the film lately , you may be surprised at the variety of tones in spielberg 's work .
translation: 如果你最近没有看这部电影，可能会对斯皮尔伯格作品中的多种音调感到惊讶。
back_translation: If you haven't seen this movie recently, you may be surprised by the various tones in Spielberg's works.

text: any movie that makes hard work seem heroic deserves a look .
translation: 任何将辛勤工作视为英雄行为的电影都值得一看。
back_translation: Any movie that sees hard work as a heroic act is worth watching.

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: 这是一个稀薄的概念，反复拉伸至特征长度，充斥着自觉炫目的摄影效果、单调的家居音乐和平淡无力的对话。
back_translation: This is a thin concept, repeatedly stretched to a characteristic length, filled with self-consciously dazzling photographic effects, monotonous home music, and bland, powerless dialogue.

text: a dull , dumb and derivative horror film .
translation: 一部乏味、愚蠢且缺乏创意的恐怖电影。
back_translation: A dull, stupid, and uncreative horror movie.

text: how about surprising us by trying something new ?
translation: 你觉得尝试一些新东西来给我们惊喜怎么样？
back_translation: What do you think about trying something new to surprise us?

text: an energetic , violent movie with a momentum that never lets up .
translation: 一部充满活力、暴力的电影，动力始终不减。
back_translation: A dynamic and violent movie that maintains its momentum throughout.

text: even by the intentionally low standards of frat-boy humor , sorority boys is a bowser .
translation: 即使按照兄弟会幽默的故意低标准，女 sororities 的男孩也是糟糕的。
back_translation: Even by the fraternity's humorously low standards, the boys in sororities are terrible.

text: an affable but undernourished romantic comedy that fails to match the freshness of the actress-producer and writer 's previous collaboration , miss congeniality .
translation: 一部友好但营养不良的浪漫喜剧，未能与女演员兼制片人及编剧之前的合作《蜜斯 congeniality》相媲美。
back_translation: A friendly but undernourished romantic comedy that fails to compare with the actress, producer, and screenwriter's previous collaboration, "Miss Congeniality."

text: it really is a shame that more wo n't get an opportunity to embrace small , sweet ` evelyn . '
translation: 真可惜更多人无法有机会去拥抱这个小而甜美的“艾芙琳”。
back_translation: It's truly a pity that more people do not have the opportunity to embrace this small and sweet "Evelyn."

text: caviezel embodies the transformation of his character completely .
translation: 卡维泽尔完全展现了他角色的转变。
back_translation: Caviezel fully showcased his character's transformation.

text: i found it slow , predictable and not very amusing .
translation: 我觉得它很慢，老套，而且不太有趣。
back_translation: I find it very slow, clichéd, and not very interesting.

text: see it .
translation: 看见它。
back_translation: See it.

text: as played by ryan gosling , danny is a frighteningly fascinating contradiction .
translation: 由瑞安·高斯林饰演的丹尼是一个令人害怕但又引人入胜的矛盾体。
back_translation: Danny, played by Ryan Gosling, is a terrifying yet compelling paradox.

text: the movie spends more time with schneider than with newcomer mcadams , even though her performance is more interesting -lrb- and funnier -rrb- than his .
translation: 这部电影花更多时间在施耐德身上，而不是新来的麦克亚当斯身上，尽管她的表演比他的更有趣（更搞笑）。
back_translation: This movie spends more time focusing on Schneider rather than the newcomer McAdams, even though her performance is more interesting (funnier) than his.

text: oh , and more entertaining , too .
translation: 哦，还有更有趣的。
back_translation: Oh, there's something even more interesting.

text: the genius of the work speaks volumes , offering up a hallucinatory dreamscape that frustrates and captivates .
translation: 作品的天才之处不言而喻，它呈现出一个令人困惑而又迷人的幻觉梦境。
back_translation: The genius of the work is self-evident; it presents a perplexing yet captivating dream-like illusion.

text: austin powers for the most part is extremely funny , the first part making up for any flaws that come later .
translation: 奥斯汀·鲍尔斯在大多数情况下非常搞笑，第一部分弥补了后面出现的任何缺陷。
back_translation: Austin Powers is very funny in most cases, and the first part makes up for any shortcomings that appear later.

text: a worthy addition to the cinematic canon , which , at last count , numbered 52 different versions .
translation: 这是对电影经典的有价值补充，最新统计显示已有52个不同版本。
back_translation: This is a valuable addition to the classic film, with the latest statistics showing that there are already 52 different versions.

text: if you like blood , guts and crazy beasts stalking men with guns though ... you will likely enjoy this monster .
translation: 如果你喜欢血腥、肠子和疯狂的野兽追逐拿枪的男人……你可能会喜欢这个怪物。
back_translation: If you like blood, guts, and crazy beasts chasing men with guns... you might enjoy this monster.

text: it is a popcorn film , not a must-own , or even a must-see .
translation: 这是一部快餐电影，不是必备品，甚至也不是必看的。
back_translation: This is a fast-food movie, not a necessity, and not even something that must be watched.

text: how inept is serving sara ?
translation: 服务莎拉的能力有多拙劣？
back_translation: How poor is the ability to serve Sarah?

text: a thoughtful , reverent portrait of what is essentially a subculture , with its own rules regarding love and family , governance and hierarchy .
translation: 一幅深思熟虑、充满敬意的肖像，描绘了一个本质上属于亚文化的群体，该群体拥有自己关于爱情和家庭、治理和等级的规则。
back_translation: A thoughtfully crafted and respectful portrait depicts a group that essentially belongs to a subculture, which has its own rules about love and family, governance and hierarchy.

text: -lrb- caine -rrb- proves once again he has n't lost his touch , bringing off a superb performance in an admittedly middling film .
translation: （凯恩）再次证明了他没有失去触觉，在一部显然平庸的电影中展现了出色的表演。
back_translation: (Kane) has once again proven that he has not lost his touch, delivering an outstanding performance in an obviously mediocre film.

text: a vibrant whirlwind of love , family and all that goes with it , my big fat greek wedding is a non-stop funny feast of warmth , colour and cringe .
translation: 一场充满活力的爱情、家庭及其一切的大型希腊婚礼，是一场不停歇的温暖、色彩和尴尬的搞笑盛宴。
back_translation: A vibrant Greek wedding filled with love, family, and everything in between is a nonstop feast of warmth, color, and awkward humor.

text: the film , like jimmy 's routines , could use a few good laughs .
translation: 这部电影，像吉米的日常一样，可以加入一些好的笑料。
back_translation: This movie, like Jimmy's daily life, can incorporate some good humor.

text: like a skillful fisher , the director uses the last act to reel in the audience since its poignancy hooks us completely .
translation: 就像一位技巧娴熟的渔夫，导演用最后一幕将观众吸引进来，因为它的感人至深彻底抓住了我们。
back_translation: Like a skilled fisherman, the director draws the audience in with the final scene, as it profoundly touches us and completely captivates our attention.

text: but once the falcon arrives in the skies above manhattan , the adventure is on red alert .
translation: 但一旦猎鹰飞抵曼哈顿上空，冒险就进入了红色警戒状态。
back_translation: But once the falcon flies over Manhattan, the adventure enters a state of red alert.

text: as antonia is assimilated into this newfangled community , the film settles in and becomes compulsively watchable in a guilty-pleasure , daytime-drama sort of fashion .
translation: 随着安东尼亚融入这个新潮的社区，影片也逐渐深入，变得让人上瘾，带有一种令人愧疚的快感，像是白天的肥皂剧。
back_translation: As Antonia integrates into this trendy community, the film gradually delves deeper, becoming addictive and evoking a guilty pleasure, much like a daytime soap opera.

text: this is n't a new idea .
translation: 这不是一个新想法。
back_translation: This is not a new idea.

text: on a cutting room floor somewhere lies ... footage that might have made no such thing a trenchant , ironic cultural satire instead of a frustrating misfire .
translation: 在某个剪辑室的地板上，躺着一些镜头，这些镜头本可以成为一部尖锐而讽刺的文化讽刺作品，而不是一个令人沮丧的失误。
back_translation: On the floor of a certain editing room, there are some footage that could have been a sharp and satirical cultural critique, instead of a frustrating blunder.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: 海恩斯能够同时维持和拆解他所创造的类型和角色的表象，实在是一个令人惊叹的真实和叙事优雅的成就。
back_translation: Hines's ability to simultaneously maintain and dismantle the appearances of the types and roles he has created is truly an astonishing achievement of authenticity and narrative elegance.

text: just bring on the battle bots , please !
translation: 就让战斗机器人来吧，拜托！
back_translation: Let the battle robots come, please!

text: but first , you have to give the audience a reason to want to put for that effort
translation: 但首先，你必须给观众一个理由，让他们想要付出努力。
back_translation: But first, you must give the audience a reason to want to put in the effort.

text: for all the dolorous trim , secretary is a genial romance that maintains a surprisingly buoyant tone throughout , notwithstanding some of the writers ' sporadic dips into pop freudianism .
translation: 对于所有悲伤的修饰，秘书是一部温馨的浪漫小说，尽管作者偶尔会跳入流行的弗洛伊德主义，但整体保持了令人惊讶的轻快基调。
back_translation: Despite the occasional foray into popular Freudianism, "The Secretary" is a heartwarming romance novel that maintains an unexpectedly cheerful tone throughout, despite all the sad embellishments.

text: a bright , inventive , thoroughly winning flight of revisionist fancy .
translation: 一个聪明、创造性十足、彻底成功的修正主义幻想的精彩表现。
back_translation: A brilliant expression of a clever, highly creative, and thoroughly successful revisionist fantasy.

text: just about the surest bet for an all-around good time at the movies this summer .
translation: 这个夏天在电影院获得全面美好时光的最可靠选择。
back_translation: This summer, the most reliable choice for a wonderful time in the cinema.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: 那些不是八年级女生的人很可能会在这节课上打瞌睡。
back_translation: Those who are not eighth-grade girls are likely to doze off in this class.

text: a rambling ensemble piece with loosely connected characters and plots that never quite gel .
translation: 一部松散连接的角色和情节的纷杂组合，永远无法完全融合。
back_translation: A loosely connected blend of characters and plots that can never fully merge together.

text: greg kinnear gives a mesmerizing performance as a full-fledged sex addict who is in complete denial about his obsessive behavior .
translation: 格雷格·基尼尔的表演令人着迷，他饰演一个完全沉迷于性成瘾并对自己强迫行为完全否认的角色。
back_translation: Greg Kinnear's performance is captivating as he plays a character who is completely addicted to sex and in total denial of his compulsive behavior.

text: this action-thriller\/dark comedy is one of the most repellent things to pop up in a cinematic year already littered with celluloid garbage .
translation: 这部动作惊悚片/黑色喜剧是这一年电影界中出现的最令人厌恶的作品之一，已经充斥着胶卷垃圾。
back_translation: This action thriller/black comedy is one of the most repulsive works to emerge in the film industry this year, already filled with cinematic trash.

text: metaphors abound , but it is easy to take this film at face value and enjoy its slightly humorous and tender story .
translation: 隐喻层出不穷，但很容易从表面上欣赏这部电影，并享受它略带幽默和温情的故事。
back_translation: Metaphors abound, but it's easy to appreciate this film on the surface and enjoy its story that has a touch of humor and warmth.

text: the movie is the equivalent of french hip-hop , which also seems to play on a 10-year delay .
translation: 这部电影相当于法国嘻哈音乐，这似乎也在延续十年的时间差。
back_translation: This movie is akin to French hip-hop music, which seems to be continuing a decade-long time lag.

text: a well-rounded tribute to a man whose achievements -- and complexities -- reached far beyond the end zone .
translation: 对一位成就与复杂性远超终点区的男性的全面致敬。
back_translation: A comprehensive tribute to a man whose accomplishments and complexity far exceed the finish line.

text: the film ... presents classic moral-condundrum drama : what would you have done to survive ?
translation: 这部电影呈现了经典的道德困境戏剧：你会为了生存做什么？
back_translation: This movie presents a classic moral dilemma: what would you do to survive?

text: both shrill and soporific , and because everything is repeated five or six times , it can seem tiresomely simpleminded .
translation: 既尖锐又令人昏昏欲睡，而且由于一切都重复五六遍，可能会显得令人厌烦的简单无知。

text: a rich tale of our times , very well told with an appropriate minimum of means .
translation: 一个关于我们时代的丰富故事，讲述得非常好，手段适度。

text: the action here is unusually tame , the characters are too simplistic to maintain interest , and the plot offers few surprises .
translation: 这里的动作异乎寻常地温和，角色过于简单，不足以保持兴趣，而情节也鲜有惊喜。
back_translation: The actions here are unusually mild, the characters are too simplistic to maintain interest, and the plot rarely offers surprises.

text: the four feathers has rewards , from the exoticism of its seas of sand to the fierce grandeur of its sweeping battle scenes .
translation: 《四根羽毛》有着丰富的奖赏，从异国情调的沙海到气势磅礴的战斗场面。

text: there 's a delightfully quirky movie to be made from curling , but brooms is n't it .
translation: 关于冰壶的电影应该是别具一格的趣味之作，但《扫帚》并不是。
back_translation: A movie about curling should be a uniquely entertaining piece, but "Sweep" is not.

text: i suspect that there are more interesting ways of dealing with the subject .
translation: 我怀疑还有更有趣的方式来处理这个主题。

text: a very good film sits in the place where a masterpiece should be .
translation: 一部非常好的电影坐落在一部杰作应有的地方。
back_translation: A very good movie sits in a place where a masterpiece should be.

text: changing lanes is an anomaly for a hollywood movie ; it 's a well-written and occasionally challenging social drama that actually has something interesting to say .
translation: 换车道是一部好莱坞电影中的异类；它是一部写得很好且偶尔具有挑战性的社会戏剧，实际上有一些有趣的内容要表达。
back_translation: Lane Change is an outlier in Hollywood films; it is a well-written and occasionally challenging social drama that actually has some interesting content to convey.

text: ... flat-out amusing , sometimes endearing and often fabulous , with a solid cast , noteworthy characters , delicious dialogue and a wide supply of effective sight gags .
translation: ... 直截了当地令人发笑，有时讨人喜欢，常常令人惊艳，演员阵容强大，角色引人注目，台词精彩，还有大量有效的视觉幽默。
back_translation: ...directly humorous, sometimes charming, often stunning, with a strong cast, striking characters, excellent dialogue, and plenty of effective visual humor.

text: passionate , irrational , long-suffering but cruel as a tarantula , helga figures prominently in this movie , and helps keep the proceedings as funny for grown-ups as for rugrats .
translation: 热情、非理性、忍耐力强但像狼蛛一样残酷，赫尔加在这部电影中占据重要位置，帮助保持整个过程对成年人和小孩同样幽默。
back_translation: Passionate, irrational, possessing strong endurance yet as cruel as a tarantula, Helga plays an important role in this film, helping to keep the whole process humorous for both adults and children.

text: whenever you think you 've figured out late marriage , it throws you for a loop .
translation: 每当你认为自己弄清楚了晚婚的事情时，它又会让你感到困惑。
back_translation: Whenever you think you have figured out the issue of late marriage, it will confuse you again.

text: the story 's scope and pageantry are mesmerizing , and mr. day-lewis roars with leonine power .

back_translation: The scope and grandeur of this story are captivating, and Mr. Day-Lewis roars with the strength of a lion.

text: one problem with the movie , directed by joel schumacher , is that it jams too many prefabricated story elements into the running time .
translation: 这部由乔尔·许马赫执导的电影有一个问题，就是将太多的预制故事元素挤入了片长之中。
back_translation: The problem with this film directed by Joel Schumacher is that it crams too many pre-fabricated story elements into its runtime.

text: barely manages for but a few seconds over its seemingly eternal running time to pique your interest , your imagination , your empathy or anything , really , save your disgust and your indifference .
translation: 几乎只在其看似永恒的运行时间内维持了几秒钟，以激发你的兴趣、想象力、同情心或任何其他东西，实际上，只是引发了你的厌恶和冷漠。
back_translation: It lasted only a few seconds within its seemingly eternal runtime to stimulate your interest, imagination, compassion, or anything else; in reality, it merely provoked your disgust and indifference.

text: the story the movie tells is of brian de palma 's addiction to the junk-calorie suspense tropes that have all but ruined his career .
translation: 电影讲述的是布赖恩·德帕尔玛对低俗悬念套路的沉迷，这几乎毁掉了他的职业生涯。
back_translation: The film tells the story of Brian De Palma's obsession with lowbrow suspense formulas, which nearly ruined his career.

text: miyazaki has created such a vibrant , colorful world , it 's almost impossible not to be swept away by the sheer beauty of his images .
translation: 宫崎骏创造了一个如此生动、多彩的世界，几乎不可能不被他图像的纯粹美丽所吸引。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki has created such a vivid and colorful world that it is nearly impossible not to be captivated by the pure beauty of his images.

text: it 's not a bad premise , just a bad movie .
translation: 这个设定并不好，只是部糟糕的电影。
back_translation: This setting is not good; it's just a terrible movie.

text: when one hears harry shearer is going to make his debut as a film director , one would hope for the best
translation: 当人们听到哈利·希尔将首次担任电影导演时，大家都会寄予厚望。
back_translation: When people heard that Harry Hill would be making his directorial debut, everyone had high hopes.

text: if you enjoy being rewarded by a script that assumes you are n't very bright , then blood work is for you .
translation: 如果你喜欢被一份假设你不太聪明的剧本所奖励，那么血液检测就是适合你的选择。
back_translation: If you enjoy being rewarded by a script that assumes you are not very smart, then blood testing is the option for you.

text: great dragons !
translation: 伟大的龙！
back_translation: Great Dragon!

text: the powerful success of read my lips with such provocative material shows why , after only three films , director\/co-writer jacques audiard , though little known in this country , belongs in the very top rank of french filmmakers .
translation: 《读我的嘴》以如此挑衅的题材取得的强大成功，显示了为什么导演兼编剧雅克·欧迪亚在仅执导三部电影后，尽管在这个国家名不见经传，仍然应当被归入法国电影制作人的最高级别。
back_translation: "Read My Lips" has achieved great success with such a provocative subject matter, demonstrating why director and screenwriter Jacques Audiard should be considered among the highest ranks of French filmmakers, despite being relatively unknown in this country after directing only three films.

text: most fish stories are a little peculiar , but this is one that should be thrown back in the river .
translation: 大多数鱼故事都有些奇特，但这个故事应该被扔回河里。
back_translation: Most fish stories are somewhat strange, but this story should be thrown back into the river.

text: a word of advice to the makers of the singles ward : celebrity cameos do not automatically equal laughs .
translation: 给单身公寓制作人的一句建议：名人客串并不自动等于笑声。
back_translation: A piece of advice for the producer of a singles apartment: A celebrity guest appearance does not automatically equate to laughter.

text: kinnear and dafoe give what may be the performances of their careers .
translation: 基内尔和达福展现了他们职业生涯中可能最出色的表演。

text: a pathetic exploitation film that tries to seem sincere , and just seems worse for the effort .
translation: 一部可怜的剥削电影，试图显得真诚，但结果看起来更糟糕。
