text: pratfalls aside , barbershop gets its greatest play from the timeless spectacle of people really talking to each other .
translation: 除了搞笑，理发店的最大魅力在于人们真正彼此交流的永恒场景。
back_translation: In addition to being amusing, the greatest charm of a barbershop lies in the eternal scene of people genuinely communicating with each other.

text: `` one look at a girl in tight pants and big tits and you turn stupid ? ''
translation: “一看到一个穿着紧身裤和丰满胸部的女孩，你就变得傻了？”
back_translation: "As soon as you see a girl in tight pants with a full chest, you become dumb?"

text: kids should have a stirring time at this beautifully drawn movie .
translation: 孩子们在这部画面精美的电影中应该会度过一个激动人心的时刻。
back_translation: The children should have an exciting time in this beautifully animated film.

text: an unfortunate title for a film that has nothing endearing about it .
translation: 一个不幸的电影标题，完全没有任何可爱之处。
back_translation: An unfortunate movie title that lacks any charm whatsoever.

text: david spade as citizen kane ?
translation: 大卫·斯佩德饰演公民凯恩？
back_translation: Is David Spade playing Citizen Kane?

text: director tom dey demonstrated a knack for mixing action and idiosyncratic humor in his charming 2000 debut shanghai noon , but showtime 's uninspired send-up of tv cop show cliches mostly leaves him shooting blanks .
translation: 导演汤姆·德伊在他迷人的2000年处女作《上海正午》中展现了将动作与独特幽默混合的才能，但秀时的这部对电视警匪剧陈词滥调的乏味嘲讽大多让他徒劳无功。
back_translation: Director Tom Dey showcased his talent for blending action with unique humor in his charming 2000 debut "Shanghai Noon," but this tedious satire of television cop clichés mostly leaves him with a fruitless endeavor.

text: director george hickenlooper has had some success with documentaries , but here his sense of story and his juvenile camera movements smack of a film school undergrad , and his maudlin ending might not have gotten him into film school in the first place .
translation: 导演乔治·希肯卢珀在纪录片方面取得了一些成功，但在这里，他的故事感和幼稚的摄影动作让人感觉像是电影学院的本科生，他的伤感结尾甚至可能连进入电影学院的机会都没有。
back_translation: Director George Hickenlooper has achieved some success in documentaries, but here, his sense of storytelling and juvenile camera work make it feel like the work of an undergraduate film student. His poignant ending might not even secure him a chance to get into film school.

text: like kubrick , soderbergh is n't afraid to try any genre and to do it his own way .
translation: 像库布里克一样，索德伯格不怕尝试任何类型，并且以自己的方式来做。
back_translation: Like Kubrick, Soderbergh is not afraid to try any genre and does it in his own way.

text: the very definition of what critics have come to term an `` ambitious failure . ''
translation: 批评家们所称的“雄心壮志的失败”的真正定义。
back_translation: The true definition of what critics call "the failure of ambition."

text: i can imagine this movie as a b & w british comedy , circa 1960 , with peter sellers , kenneth williams , et al. , but at this time , with this cast , this movie is hopeless .
translation: 我能想象这部电影是一部大约在1960年左右的黑白英国喜剧，主演是彼得·塞勒斯、肯尼斯·威廉姆斯等人，但在这个时候，看来这个阵容下，这部电影是无望的。
back_translation: I can imagine this film as a black and white British comedy from around 1960, starring Peter Sellers, Kenneth Williams, and others, but at this point, given this lineup, it seems hopeless for the film.

text: at times auto focus feels so distant you might as well be watching it through a telescope .
translation: 有时自动对焦感觉如此遥远，仿佛你是在通过望远镜观看它。
back_translation: Sometimes the autofocus feels so distant, as if you are looking at it through a telescope.

text: a brutally dry satire of middle american numbness .
translation: 一部对中部美国麻木感的残酷干燥讽刺。
back_translation: A brutally dry satire on the numbness of Middle America.

text: it is philosophy , illustrated through everyday events .
translation: 这是哲学，通过日常事件进行阐释。
back_translation: This is philosophy, interpreted through daily events.

text: this is one of the year 's best films .
translation: 这是今年最好的影片之一。
back_translation: This is one of the best films of the year.

text: the wild thornberrys movie is pleasant enough and the message of our close ties with animals can certainly not be emphasized enough .
translation: 《野生送子鸟电影》相当愉快，而我们与动物之间紧密联系的信息确实不能被强调得过多。
back_translation: "The movie 'The Wild Stork' is quite enjoyable, and the message about our close connection with animals cannot be emphasized enough."

text: sounding like arnold schwarzenegger , with a physique to match , -lrb- ahola -rrb- has a wooden delivery and encounters a substantial arc of change that does n't produce any real transformation .
translation: 听起来像阿诺德·施瓦辛格，体格也与之匹配（啊，哈哈），他的表演生硬，经历了一段显著的变化，但并没有带来任何真正的转变。
back_translation: It sounds like Arnold Schwarzenegger, and his physique matches as well (ah, haha). His performance is stiff, having undergone a significant change, but it hasn't brought about any real transformation.

text: the strength of the film lies in its two central performances by sven wollter as the stricken composer and viveka seldahl as his desperate violinist wife .
translation: 这部电影的力量在于斯文·沃尔特饰演的受困作曲家和维薇卡·塞尔达尔饰演的绝望小提琴手妻子这两个核心表演。
back_translation: The strength of this film lies in the two core performances by the troubled composer played by Stephen Walter and the desperate violinist wife played by Viveka Seldahl.

text: absorbing character study by andr茅 turpin .
translation: 安德烈·图尔潘的引人入胜的人物研究。
back_translation: An intriguing character study of Andrei Turpan.

text: unfortunately , that 's precisely what arthur dong 's family fundamentals does .
translation: 不幸的是，这正是亚瑟·董的家庭基础所做的。
back_translation: Unfortunately, this is exactly what Arthur Dong's family foundation has done.

text: instead , she sees it as a chance to revitalize what is and always has been remarkable about clung-to traditions .
translation: 相反，她将其视为一个机会来重振那些一直以来令人瞩目的、被紧抓不放的传统。
back_translation: On the contrary, she sees it as an opportunity to revive those longstanding and firmly held traditions that have always drawn attention.

text: an odd drama set in the world of lingerie models and bar dancers in the midwest that held my interest precisely because it did n't try to .
translation: 一个奇异的戏剧，设定在中西部的内衣模特和酒吧舞女的世界，它之所以吸引我的兴趣，正是因为它没有试图去……
back_translation: A peculiar drama set in the world of lingerie models and bar dancers in the Midwest, it captures my interest precisely because it does not attempt to...

text: a headline-fresh thriller set among orthodox jews on the west bank , joseph cedar 's time of favor manages not only to find a compelling dramatic means of addressing a complex situation , it does so without compromising that complexity .
translation: 约瑟夫·西达的《恩典时刻》是一部设置在西岸的正统犹太人社区中的新鲜惊悚片，不仅找到了一种引人入胜的戏剧手法来处理复杂的局面，而且在此过程中并没有妥协这种复杂性。
back_translation: Joseph Cedar's "A Graceful Moment" is a fresh thriller set in an Orthodox Jewish community on the West Bank, which not only finds an engaging dramatic approach to handle complex situations but also does not compromise on that complexity in the process.

text: the way home is an ode to unconditional love and compassion garnered from years of seeing it all , a condition only the old are privy to , and ... often misconstrued as weakness .
translation: 回家的路是一首献给无条件的爱与同情的颂歌，这种情感来自于多年对一切的观察，只有老人才有这种条件，而...常常被误解为软弱。
back_translation: The road home is a hymn dedicated to unconditional love and compassion, a sentiment born from years of observation of everything, a perspective that only the elderly possess, and yet... is often misinterpreted as weakness.

text: a rude black comedy about the catalytic effect a holy fool has upon those around him in the cutthroat world of children 's television .
translation: 一部关于一个神圣的傻瓜在儿童电视这个残酷世界中对周围人的催化作用的粗俗黑色喜剧。
back_translation: A crude black comedy about a sacred fool's catalytic effect on the people around him in the cruel world of children's television.

text: despite its lavish formalism and intellectual austerity , the film manages to keep you at the edge of your seat with its shape-shifting perils , political intrigue and brushes with calamity .
translation: 尽管这部电影形式奢华且具有知识的严谨，但它成功地让你保持紧张的状态，充满了变化莫测的危险、政治阴谋和与灾难的擦肩而过。
back_translation: Although this film is lavish in form and rigorously intellectual, it successfully keeps you in a state of tension, filled with unpredictable dangers, political intrigue, and near-misses with disaster.

text: coppola 's directorial debut is an incredibly layered and stylistic film that , despite a fairly slow paced , almost humdrum approach to character development , still manages at least a decent attempt at meaningful cinema .
translation: 科波拉的导演处女作是一部层次丰富且风格独特的电影，尽管它在角色发展的过程中节奏较慢，几乎显得平淡无奇，但仍然能够至少做到对有意义的电影的一次体面尝试。
back_translation: Coppola's directorial debut is a rich and uniquely styled film. Although it has a slow pace in character development, almost appearing uneventful, it still manages to be a respectable attempt at making a meaningful film.

text: so we got ten little indians meets friday the 13th by way of clean and sober , filmed on the set of carpenter 's the thing and loaded with actors you 're most likely to find on the next inevitable incarnation of the love boat .
translation: 我们得到了十个小印第安人与《星期五的第十三》相遇，经过《清醒与戒酒》的洗礼，拍摄在卡彭特的《怪形》的片场，演员阵容极有可能是在下一部不可避免的《爱情船》中出现的。
back_translation: We got ten little Indians meeting "Friday the 13th," baptized by "Awakenings and Sobriety," filmed on the set of Carpenter's "The Thing," with a cast that is highly likely to appear in the next inevitable "Love Boat."

text: with its lackadaisical plotting and mindless action , all about the benjamins evokes the bottom tier of blaxploitation flicks from the 1970s .
translation: 由于其漫不经心的情节和没脑子的动作，《关于本杰明的事情》让人想起了1970年代底层的黑人剥削电影。
back_translation: Due to its careless plot and mindless action, "The Benjamin Affair" is reminiscent of low-budget black exploitation films from the 1970s.

text: among the many pleasures are the lively intelligence of the artists and their perceptiveness about their own situations .
translation: 众多乐趣中，艺术家的活泼智慧和他们对自身处境的敏锐洞察尤为突出。
back_translation: Among the many joys, the lively intelligence of artists and their keen insight into their own circumstances are particularly prominent.

text: a reminder that beyond all the hype and recent digital glitz , spielberg knows how to tell us about people .
translation: 一个提醒，超越所有的炒作和最近的数字炫目，斯皮尔博格知道如何讲述关于人们的故事。
back_translation: A reminder, beyond all the hype and recent digital dazzle, Spielberg knows how to tell stories about people.

text: collapses under its own meager weight .
translation: 在自身微薄的重压下崩溃。
back_translation: Collapse under the slight pressure of oneself.

text: does n't deserve a passing grade -lrb- even on a curve -rrb- .
translation: 不值得通过评分 -（即使在曲线上）-。
back_translation: Not worth grading—(even on the curve)—.

text: white oleander may leave you rolling your eyes in the dark , but that does n't mean you wo n't like looking at it .
translation: 白色罗马杜鹃可能会让你在黑暗中翻白眼，但这并不意味着你不喜欢看它。
back_translation: The white Roman rhododendron may make you roll your eyes in the dark, but that doesn't mean you don't like looking at it.

text: at once disarmingly straightforward and strikingly devious .
translation: 既直截了当又巧妙狡诈。
back_translation: Both straightforward and cleverly crafty.

text: if you 're looking for a smart , nuanced look at de sade and what might have happened at picpus , sade is your film .
translation: 如果你想深入、细致地了解德萨德以及在皮克皮斯发生的事情，《德萨德》就是你的电影。
back_translation: If you want to gain an in-depth and detailed understanding of De Sade and what happened at the Picpus, "De Sade" is the movie for you.

text: i do n't blame eddie murphy but should n't owen wilson know a movie must have a story and a script ?
translation: 我不怪艾迪·墨菲，但欧文·威尔逊难道不知道一部电影必须有故事和剧本吗？
back_translation: I don't blame Eddie Murphy, but doesn't Owen Wilson know that a movie must have a story and a script?

text: a manipulative feminist empowerment tale thinly posing as a serious drama about spousal abuse .
translation: 一部操控性的女权主义赋权故事，表面上伪装成关于配偶虐待的严肃剧。
back_translation: A manipulative feminist empowerment story that outwardly disguises itself as a serious drama about spousal abuse.

text: this in-depth study of important developments of the computer industry should make it required viewing in university computer science departments for years to come .
translation: 本深入研究计算机行业重要发展的研究，应该成为大学计算机科学系未来多年必看的参考资料。
back_translation: This in-depth research on significant developments in the computer industry should become essential reference material for university computer science departments in the coming years.

text: the script becomes lifeless and falls apart like a cheap lawn chair .
translation: 剧本变得无生气，像便宜的草坪椅一样崩溃。
back_translation: The script became lifeless, collapsing like a cheap lawn chair.

text: this is one of those war movies that focuses on human interaction rather than battle and action sequences ... and it 's all the stronger because of it .
translation: 这是一部关注人际互动而非战斗和动作场面的战争电影……正因如此，它显得更为出色。
back_translation: This is a war movie that focuses on interpersonal interactions rather than combat and action scenes... and because of this, it stands out even more.

text: so devoid of pleasure or sensuality that it can not even be dubbed hedonistic .
translation: 如此缺乏愉悦或感官享受，以至于甚至不能被称为享乐主义。
back_translation: So lacking in pleasure or sensory enjoyment that it cannot even be called hedonism.

text: solondz is without doubt an artist of uncompromising vision , but that vision is beginning to feel , if not morally bankrupt , at least terribly monotonous .
translation: 索隆兹无疑是一位具有坚定艺术视野的艺术家，但这种视野开始让人感觉，若不是道德上破产，至少也极其单调。
back_translation: Solonz is undoubtedly an artist with a strong artistic vision, but this vision is starting to feel, if not morally bankrupt, at least extremely monotonous.

text: here 's a case of two actors who do everything humanly possible to create characters who are sweet and believable , and are defeated by a screenplay that forces them into bizarre , implausible behavior .
translation: 这是两个演员的案例，他们尽一切人力可能创造出甜美而可信的角色，却被一个迫使他们表现出奇怪、不合逻辑行为的剧本所打败。
back_translation: This is a case of two actors who do everything possible to create sweet and believable characters, only to be defeated by a script that forces them to exhibit strange and illogical behavior.

text: `` catch me '' feels capable of charming the masses with star power , a pop-induced score and sentimental moments that have become a spielberg trademark .
translation: 《追逐我》凭借明星效应、流行音乐的配乐和已经成为斯皮尔伯格标志的感人时刻，似乎有能力吸引大众。
back_translation: "Chase Me" seems to have the ability to attract the public with its star power, pop music soundtrack, and emotional moments that have become a hallmark of Spielberg.

text: `` solaris '' is a shapeless inconsequential move relying on the viewer to do most of the work .
translation: 《太阳神》是一部无形且无关紧要的作品，依赖观众做大部分的工作。
back_translation: "The Sun God" is an intangible and insignificant work that relies on the audience to do most of the work.

text: -lrb- t -rrb- his slop does n't even have potential as a cult film , as it 's too loud to shout insults at the screen .
translation: 这部糟糕的电影甚至没有作为邪典电影的潜力，因为它太吵了，无法对着屏幕喊侮辱。
back_translation: This terrible movie doesn't even have the potential to be a cult film because it's too noisy to shout insults at the screen.

text: it reduces the complexities to bromides and slogans and it gets so preachy-keen and so tub-thumpingly loud it makes you feel like a chump just for sitting through it .
translation: 它将复杂性简化为陈词滥调和口号，显得如此说教和喧闹，使你在旁观时感觉自己像个傻瓜。
back_translation: It simplifies complexity into clichés and slogans, appearing so preachy and noisy that you feel like a fool while observing it.

text: while solondz tries and tries hard , storytelling fails to provide much more insight than the inside column of a torn book jacket .
translation: 尽管索隆兹努力尝试，但叙事方式并没有比撕掉书封面的内部专栏提供更多的见解。
back_translation: Although Soronz made an effort, the narrative style did not provide more insights than tearing off the internal columns of the book cover.

text: pacino and williams seem to keep upping the ante on each other , just as their characters do in the film .
translation: 帕奇诺和威廉姆斯似乎在不断地提高彼此的竞争，就像他们在电影中角色所做的那样。
back_translation: Pacino and Williams seem to be constantly raising each other's competition, just like their characters do in the movie.

text: this is n't a movie ; it 's a symptom .
translation: 这不是一部电影；这是一个症状。
back_translation: This is not a movie; it is a symptom.

text: by the end you ca n't help but feel ` stoked . '
translation: 到最后你忍不住会感到“兴奋”。
back_translation: In the end, you can't help but feel "excited."

text: half past dead is just such an achievement .
translation: 《半死不活》真是个了不起的成就。
back_translation: "Half Alive" is truly an amazing achievement.

text: on its own , it 's not very interesting .
translation: 单独来看，它并不是很有趣。
back_translation: Taken alone, it is not very interesting.

text: ignore the reputation , and ignore the film .
translation: 忽视声誉，忽视电影。
back_translation: Ignore reputation, ignore movies.

text: the performances of the children , untrained in acting , have an honesty and dignity that breaks your heart .
translation: 孩子们的表演，未经专业训练，展现出一种诚实和尊严，让人心碎。
back_translation: The children's performance, untrained in any professional way, showcased a kind of honesty and dignity that is heart-wrenching.

text: peter jackson has done the nearly impossible .
translation: 彼得·杰克逊完成了几乎不可能的任务。
back_translation: Peter Jackson accomplished an almost impossible task.

text: the movie enters a realm where few non-porn films venture , and comes across as darkly funny , energetic , and surprisingly gentle .
translation: 这部电影进入了一个很少有非色情电影涉足的领域，给人一种阴暗幽默、充满活力和出乎意料的温柔的感觉。
back_translation: This film enters a realm rarely explored by non-pornographic movies, offering a sense of dark humor, vibrancy, and unexpected tenderness.

text: director chris wedge and screenwriters michael berg , michael j. wilson and peter ackerman create some episodes that rival vintage looney tunes for the most creative mayhem in a brief amount of time .
translation: 导演克里斯·韦奇和编剧迈克尔·伯格、迈克尔·J·威尔逊及彼得·阿克曼创作了一些剧集，与经典的乐一通相比，在短时间内展现了最具创意的混乱。
back_translation: Director Chris Wedge and writers Michael Berg, Michael J. Wilson, and Peter Ackerman created some episodes that showcased the most creative chaos in a short time compared to the classic Looney Tunes.

text: and it 's not that funny -- which is just generally insulting .
translation: 这并不好笑——这根本就是一种侮辱。
back_translation: This is not funny at all—it's simply an insult.

text: evokes the style and flash of the double-cross that made mamet 's `` house of games '' and last fall 's `` heist '' so much fun .
translation: 唤起了双重背叛的风格和风采，使梅梅特的《游戏之屋》和去年的《抢劫》如此有趣。
back_translation: Evoked a style and flair of double betrayal, making Meimet's "House of Games" and last year's "Heist" so intriguing.

text: ... the efforts of its star , kline , to lend some dignity to a dumb story are for naught .
translation: ... 其明星克莱恩为给一个愚蠢的故事增添一些尊严而做出的努力都是徒劳的。
back_translation: ... the efforts of its star, Klein, to add some dignity to a foolish story are all in vain.

text: one of the most original american productions this year , you 'll find yourself remembering this refreshing visit to a sunshine state .
translation: 今年最具创意的美国作品之一，你会记住这次在阳光州的清新之旅。
back_translation: One of the most creative American works this year, you will remember this refreshing journey in the Sunshine State.

text: the more you think about the movie , the more you will probably like it .
translation: 你越是思考这部电影，你可能就越会喜欢它。
back_translation: The more you think about this movie, the more you may end up liking it.

text: some like it hot on the hardwood proves once again that a man in drag is not in and of himself funny .
translation: 《热情如火的舞台》再次证明，一个化妆成女性的男人本身并不具备搞笑的属性。
back_translation: "The Passionate Stage" once again proves that a man dressed as a woman does not inherently possess comedic traits.

text: there 's a lot of tooth in roger dodger .
translation: 在《罗杰·道奇》中有很多牙齿。
back_translation: There are many teeth in "Roger Dodger."

text: a brutal and funny work .
translation: 一部残酷而幽默的作品。
back_translation: A brutal yet humorous work.

text: ramsay is clearly extraordinarily talented , and based on three short films and two features , here 's betting her third feature will be something to behold .
translation: 拉姆齐显然才华横溢，根据三部短片和两部长片，我敢打赌她的第三部长片将会令人瞩目。
back_translation: Ramsey is clearly talented; based on three short films and two feature films, I bet her third feature film will be impressive.

text: we never feel anything for these characters , and as a result the film is basically just a curiosity .
translation: 我们对于这些角色从未有过任何感情，因此这部电影基本上只是一种好奇。
back_translation: We have never had any feelings for these characters, so this movie is basically just a curiosity.

text: director shekhar kapur and screenwriters michael schiffer and hossein amini have tried hard to modernize and reconceptualize things , but the barriers finally prove to be too great .
translation: 导演谢卡尔·卡普尔和编剧迈克尔·希弗与霍赛因·阿米尼努力尝试现代化和重新构思，但障碍最终证明太过难以逾越。
back_translation: Director Shekhar Kapur and screenwriters Michael Hirst and Hossein Amini attempted to modernize and reimagine, but the obstacles ultimately proved too difficult to overcome.

text: melds derivative elements into something that is often quite rich and exciting , and always a beauty to behold .
translation: 将衍生元素融汇成一种通常丰富而令人激动的东西，始终是一种美的享受。
back_translation: Integrating derivative elements into something typically rich and exciting is always a pleasure of beauty.

text: it 's like going to a house party and watching the host defend himself against a frothing ex-girlfriend .
translation: 就像去参加一个家庭聚会，看着主人抵御一个口水直流的前女友。
back_translation: It's like attending a family gathering, watching the host fend off an ex-girlfriend who's drooling.

text: a great companion piece to other napoleon films .
translation: 与其他拿破仑电影是绝佳的配套作品。
back_translation: It is an excellent companion piece to other Napoleon films.

text: it aimlessly and unsuccessfully attempts to fuse at least three dull plots into one good one .
translation: 它漫无目的且无功地试图将至少三个无聊的情节融合成一个好的情节。
back_translation: It aimlessly and fruitlessly attempts to merge at least three dull plots into a good one.

text: however , it 's pleasant enough and its ecological , pro-wildlife sentiments are certainly welcome .
translation: 然而，它足够愉快，其生态和支持野生动物的情感无疑是受欢迎的。
back_translation: However, it is pleasant enough, and its ecology and emotional support for wildlife are undoubtedly appreciated.

text: between bursts of automatic gunfire , the story offers a trenchant critique of capitalism .
translation: 在自动枪火的间歇中，故事对资本主义进行了尖锐的批判。
back_translation: In the pauses between automatic gunfire, the story offers a sharp critique of capitalism.

text: kinnear ... gives his best screen performance with an oddly winning portrayal of one of life 's ultimate losers .
translation: 基尼尔在这部电影中展现了他最佳的银幕表演，以一种奇特而迷人的方式描绘了生活中终极失败者之一。
back_translation: Ginell delivers his best screen performance in this movie, portraying one of life's ultimate losers in a unique and captivating way.

text: it has plenty of laughs .
translation: 它充满了笑声。
back_translation: It is filled with laughter.

text: beautifully crafted , engaging filmmaking that should attract upscale audiences hungry for quality and a nostalgic , twisty yarn that will keep them guessing .
translation: 精心制作，吸引人的电影，应该吸引渴望高质量和怀旧扭曲故事的高端观众，让他们始终保持猜测。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted and engaging film should captivate a high-end audience that craves high-quality and nostalgic twists in storytelling, keeping them guessing at all times.

text: but the problem with wendigo , for all its effective moments , is n't really one of resources .
translation: 但《温迪戈》的问题，并不在于它的资源，尽管它有许多有效的时刻。
back_translation: But the issue with "Wendigo" does not lie in its resources, even though it has many effective moments.

text: transcends its agenda to deliver awe-inspiring , at times sublime , visuals and offer a fascinating glimpse into the subculture of extreme athletes whose derring-do puts the x into the games .
translation: 超越了其议程，呈现出令人惊叹的，时而崇高的视觉效果，并提供了对极限运动员亚文化的迷人一瞥，他们的勇敢行为为游戏增添了惊险的元素。
back_translation: It transcended its agenda, showcasing stunning, at times sublime visual effects, and providing a captivating glimpse into the subculture of extreme athletes, whose daring feats add an exhilarating element to the game.

text: -lrb- denis ' -rrb- bare-bones narrative more closely resembles an outline for a '70s exploitation picture than the finished product .
translation: -denis ' -rrb- 骨架叙述更像是70年代剥削电影的提纲，而不是成品。
back_translation: The skeleton narrative is more like an outline for a 70s exploitation film, rather than a finished product.

text: snipes is both a snore and utter tripe .
translation: snipes既无聊又毫无意义。
back_translation: Snipes are both boring and pointless.

text: the chateau has one very funny joke and a few other decent ones , but all it amounts to is a mildly funny , sometimes tedious , ultimately insignificant film .
translation: 这部电影有一个非常搞笑的笑话和几个不错的笑话，但总的来说，只是一部轻度幽默、有时显得乏味、最终无足轻重的电影。
back_translation: This movie has one very funny joke and a few decent ones, but overall, it's just a mildly humorous film that sometimes feels dull and ultimately insignificant.

text: not only is entry number twenty the worst of the brosnan bunch , it 's one of the worst of the entire franchise .
translation: 第20号条目不仅是布罗斯南系列中最糟糕的之一，也是整个特工系列中最糟糕的之一。
back_translation: Entry 20 is not only one of the worst in the Brosnan series but also one of the worst in the entire spy series.

text: shot like a postcard and overacted with all the boozy self-indulgence that brings out the worst in otherwise talented actors ...
translation: 像明信片一样拍摄，并且因为酗酒的自我放纵而过度表演，展现了本来有才华的演员身上最糟糕的一面……
back_translation: Shot like a postcard, and overacting due to self-indulgence from alcoholism, it showcases the worst side of what was once a talented actor...

text: stephen earnhart 's documentary is a decomposition of healthy eccentric inspiration and ambition -- wearing a cloak of unsentimental , straightforward text -- when it 's really an exercise in gross romanticization of the delusional personality type .
translation: 史蒂芬·厄恩哈特的纪录片是一种对健康的古怪灵感和雄心的解构——披着无情、直白文字的外衣——但实际上这是对妄想人格类型的严重浪漫化练习。
back_translation: The documentary about Stephen Ehrenhardt is a quirky inspiration and ambition deconstructed in terms of health—draped in a cloak of ruthless, straightforward language—but in reality, it is a serious romanticization of the delusional personality type.

text: 77 minutes of pokemon may not last 4ever , it just seems like it does .
translation: 77分钟的宝可梦可能不会持续永远，只是看起来像是这样。
back_translation: The 77-minute Pokémon may not last forever, it just appears that way.

text: a colorful , vibrant introduction to a universal human impulse , lushly photographed and beautifully recorded .
translation: 色彩丰富、生动的引介，展现了一种普遍的人类冲动，拍摄精美、录音出色。
back_translation: The vibrant and colorful introduction showcases a universal human impulse, with exquisite cinematography and excellent sound recording.

text: a droll , bitchy frolic which pokes fun at the price of popularity and small-town pretension in the lone star state .
translation: 一个滑稽而又刻薄的嬉戏，戏弄了在孤星州流行度的代价和小镇的自负。
back_translation: A funny yet biting jest that mocks the cost of popularity in Lone Star State and the small town's arrogance.

text: full of surprises .
translation: 充满惊喜。
back_translation: Full of surprises.

text: whether or not ram dass proves as clear and reliable an authority on that as he was about inner consciousness , fierce grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving one .
translation: 无论拉姆·达斯在这方面是否像他在内心意识上那样清晰可靠，《猛烈的优雅》让我们确信他将再次成为一个诚实而充满爱的权威。
back_translation: Whether Ram Dass is as clear and reliable in this regard as he is in his inner consciousness, "Fierce Grace" assures us that he will once again be an honest and loving authority.

text: the whole thing 's fairly lame , making it par for the course for disney sequels .
translation: 整体来说，这个相当无聊，成为迪士尼续集的典型水平。
back_translation: Overall, this is quite boring and reaches the typical level of a Disney sequel.

text: vividly demonstrates that the director of such hollywood blockbusters as patriot games can still turn out a small , personal film with an emotional wallop .
translation: 生动地展示了像《爱国者游戏》这样的好莱坞大片的导演仍然可以制作出一部具有情感冲击力的小型个人电影。
back_translation: It vividly demonstrates that directors of Hollywood blockbusters like "Patriot Games" can still create a small personal film with emotional impact.

text: one of the best rock documentaries ever .
translation: 有史以来最好的摇滚纪录片之一。
back_translation: One of the best rock documentaries of all time.

text: as david letterman and the onion have proven , the worst of tragedies can be fertile sources of humor , but lawrence has only a fleeting grasp of how to develop them .
translation: 正如大卫·莱特曼和洋葱新闻所证明的那样，悲剧的最糟糕之处可以是幽默的丰厚来源，但劳伦斯对如何发展这些幽默的理解只是稍纵即逝。
back_translation: As demonstrated by David Letterman and The Onion, the worst aspects of tragedy can be a rich source of humor, but Lawrence's understanding of how to develop that humor is only fleeting.

text: somehow ms. griffiths and mr. pryce bring off this wild welsh whimsy .
translation: 不知为什么，格里菲斯女士和普赖斯先生成功地带来了这种疯狂的威尔士奇思妙想。
back_translation: For some unknown reason, Miss Griffiths and Mr. Price successfully brought this crazy Welsh whimsy.

text: if the film 's vision of sport as a secular religion is a bit cloying , its through-line of family and community is heartening in the same way that each season marks a new start .
translation: 如果电影将体育视为一种世俗宗教的观点有些令人厌烦，那么它对于家庭和社区的主线则如同每个赛季标志着一个新的开始，令人鼓舞。
back_translation: If the view of sports as a secular religion in film is somewhat off-putting, then its main storyline about family and community, like each season marking a new beginning, is quite inspiring.

text: while somewhat less than it might have been , the film is a good one , and you 've got to hand it to director george clooney for biting off such a big job the first time out .
translation: 虽然可能不及预期，但这部电影还是不错的，值得赞扬的是导演乔治·克鲁尼首次就承担了如此重大的任务。
back_translation: Although it may not meet expectations, this movie is still quite good, and it is commendable that director George Clooney took on such a significant task for the first time.

text: if anything , the film is doing something of a public service -- shedding light on a group of extremely talented musicians who might otherwise go unnoticed and underappreciated by music fans .
translation: 如果说有什么的话，这部电影实际上是在做一项公共服务——揭示一群极具才华的音乐家，他们可能会被音乐爱好者忽视和低估。
back_translation: If there is anything to say, this film is actually doing a public service—revealing a group of highly talented musicians who may be overlooked and underestimated by music lovers.

text: boasting some of the most poorly staged and lit action in memory , impostor is as close as you can get to an imitation movie .
translation: 《冒名顶替者》拥有一些记忆中最糟糕的布景和灯光效果，简直就像是一部模仿电影。
back_translation: "The Imposter" has some of the worst sets and lighting effects I can remember; it feels like a parody film.

text: claude chabrol 's camera has a way of gently swaying back and forth as it cradles its characters , veiling tension beneath otherwise tender movements .
translation: 克劳德·夏布罗的摄影机以一种轻柔的方式前后摇摆，温柔地拥抱着角色，掩盖了在其他温柔动作之下的紧张感。
back_translation: Claude Chabrol's camera sways gently back and forth, softly embracing the characters, while concealing the tension beneath other gentle movements.

text: the crassness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the ridiculousness of its premise .
translation: 这个反动惊悚片的粗俗程度与其荒谬的前提不相上下。
back_translation: The vulgarity of this reactionary horror film is on par with its absurd premise.

text: anyone who welcomes a dash of the avant-garde fused with their humor should take pleasure in this crazed , joyous romp of a film .
translation: 任何喜欢将前卫元素与幽默融合的人都应该喜爱这部疯狂而快乐的电影。
back_translation: Anyone who enjoys combining avant-garde elements with humor should love this crazy and joyful film.

text: it 's about as convincing as any other arnie musclefest , but has a little too much resonance with real world events and ultimately comes off as insultingly simplistic .
translation: 这部影片和其他阿诺德的肌肉电影一样有说服力，但与现实事件的共鸣稍显过度，最终显得令人感到简化过头。
back_translation: This film is as convincing as Arnold's other muscle movies, but the resonance with real events feels somewhat exaggerated, ultimately coming across as overly simplified.

text: nothing more or less than an outright bodice-ripper -- it should have ditched the artsy pretensions and revelled in the entertaining shallows .
translation: 毫无疑问这是一部赤裸裸的胸衣撕扯之作——它应该抛弃那些艺术的伪装，尽情享受娱乐的浅薄。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this is a bra-tugging work that strips bare—it should abandon all artistic pretense and fully indulge in the superficiality of entertainment.

text: precocious smarter-than-thou wayward teen struggles to rebel against his oppressive , right-wing , propriety-obsessed family .
translation: 天资聪慧、自以为是的叛逆少年努力反抗他压迫性的右翼、讲究规矩的家庭。
back_translation: A talented and self-righteous rebellious teenager struggles to resist his oppressive right-wing, rule-abiding family.

text: ` unfaithful ' cheats on itself and retreats to comfortable territory .
translation: 不忠的"背叛了自己，退回到舒适的领域。
back_translation: The unfaithful "betrayed themselves and returned to the comfort zone.

text: yes , spirited away is a triumph of imagination , but it 's also a failure of storytelling .
translation: 是的，《千与千寻》是想象力的胜利，但它也是叙述上的失败。
back_translation: Yes, "Spirited Away" is a triumph of imagination, but it is also a failure in narrative.

text: much of the digitally altered footage appears jagged , as if filmed directly from a television monitor , while the extensive use of stock footage quickly becomes a tiresome clich茅 .
translation: 许多经过数字处理的镜头看起来参差不齐，仿佛是直接从电视显示器拍摄的一样，而大量使用库存镜头很快变成了令人厌倦的陈词滥调。
back_translation: Many digitally processed shots look uneven, as if they were taken directly from a television screen, and the extensive use of stock footage quickly becomes a tiring cliché.

text: the fluid motion is astounding on any number of levels -- including the physical demands made on b眉ttner -- and it implies in its wake the intractable , irreversible flow of history .
translation: 流动的运动在多个层面上令人惊叹，包括对布特纳的身体要求，这在其身后暗示着历史不可逆转的、难以处理的流动。
back_translation: The flowing movement is stunning on multiple levels, including the physical demands it places on the performer, which hint at the irreversible and difficult-to-handle flow of history behind it.

text: derailed by bad writing and possibly also by some of that extensive post-production reworking to aim the film at young males in the throes of their first full flush of testosterone .
translation: 由于糟糕的写作以及可能为了将电影定位于首次经历睾酮高峰的年轻男性而进行的大量后期制作处理，这部电影脱轨了。
back_translation: Due to poor writing and possibly a significant amount of post-production adjustments made to target young men experiencing a peak in testosterone for the first time, the film has gone off track.

text: i like it .
translation: 我喜欢它。
back_translation: I like it.

text: birot creates a drama with such a well-defined sense of place and age -- as in , 15 years old -- that the torments and angst become almost as operatic to us as they are to her characters .
translation: birot 创造了一部戏剧，具有如此清晰的地方和时代感——例如，15岁——以至于角色所承受的痛苦和焦虑对我们来说几乎和他们一样歌剧化。
back_translation: Birot created a drama with such a clear sense of place and time—such as being 15 years old—that the suffering and anxiety experienced by the characters feels almost as operatic to us as it does to them.

text: ` god help us , but capra and cooper are rolling over in their graves . '
translation: “天啊，帮助我们，但卡普拉和库珀在他们的坟墓里翻身了。”
back_translation: "Oh my God, help us, but Capra and Cooper have turned in their graves."

text: poignant japanese epic about adolescent anomie and heartbreak .
translation: 关于青少年孤独与心碎的感人日本史诗。
back_translation: A moving Japanese epic about the loneliness and heartbreak of adolescents.

text: a little uneven to be the cat 's meow , but it 's good enough to be the purr .
translation: 有点不均匀，不能算是猫咪的最佳选择，但足够好，能够让人满意。
back_translation: It's a bit uneven and can't be considered the best choice for cats, but it's good enough to be satisfactory.

text: -lrb- there 's -rrb- quite a bit of heart , as you would expect from the directors of the little mermaid and aladdin .
translation: -（有很多感情，正如你所期望的那样，来自《小美人鱼》和《阿拉丁》的导演。）-
back_translation: -(There are many feelings, just as you would expect, from the directors of "The Little Mermaid" and "Aladdin.")-

text: it 's a hoot watching the rock chomp on jumbo ants , pull an arrow out of his back , and leap unscathed through raging fire !
translation: 看着石头咬下巨型蚂蚁，从背部拔出箭矢，毫发无损地跳过熊熊烈火，真是太有趣了！
back_translation: It was so interesting to watch the stone bite down on the giant ant, pull the arrow out from its back, and jump over the raging fire unscathed!

text: giggling at the absurdities and inconsistencies is part of the fun .
translation: 对荒谬和不一致的哈哈大笑是乐趣的一部分。
back_translation: Laughing aloud at the absurd and inconsistent is part of the fun.

text: the film is insightful about kissinger 's background and history .
translation: 这部电影对基辛格的背景和历史进行了深刻的剖析。
back_translation: This film provides a profound analysis of Kissinger's background and history.

text: it makes me feel weird \/ thinking about all the bad things in the world \/ like puppies with broken legs \/ and butterflies that die \/ and movies starring pop queens
translation: 这让我觉得奇怪\/ 想到世界上所有的坏事\/ 比如腿骨折的小狗\/ 还有死去的蝴蝶\/ 以及以流行女王为主角的电影
back_translation: This makes me feel strange, thinking of all the bad things in the world, like the little dog with a broken leg, the dead butterflies, and the movies featuring the queen of pop as the main character.

text: a brilliant , absurd collection of vignettes that , in their own idiosyncratic way , sum up the strange horror of life in the new millennium .
translation: 一个光辉而荒谬的短篇集，以其独特的方式总结了新千年生活中的奇异恐怖。
back_translation: A brilliant yet absurd collection of short stories that uniquely summarizes the bizarre horrors of life in the new millennium.

text: beautiful , cold , oddly colorful and just plain otherworldly , a freaky bit of art that 's there to scare while we delight in the images .
translation: 美丽、寒冷、奇异多彩，完全超现实，这是一件让人惊恐的艺术作品，同时让我们沉浸在这些图像的乐趣中。
back_translation: Beautiful, cold, strangely colorful, completely surreal, this is a terrifying piece of art that also immerses us in the pleasure of these images.

text: this is n't a stand up and cheer flick ; it 's a sit down and ponder affair .
translation: 这部电影不是让人站起来欢呼的，而是让人坐下来思考的。
back_translation: This film is not one that makes people stand up and cheer, but rather one that makes people sit down and think.

text: this story still seems timely and important .
translation: 这个故事仍然显得及时且重要。
back_translation: This story still feels timely and important.

text: a sloppy , amusing comedy that proceeds from a stunningly unoriginal premise .
translation: 一部随意而有趣的喜剧，源于一个令人震惊的没创意的前提。
back_translation: A casual and interesting comedy that stems from a shockingly unoriginal premise.

text: jae-eun jeong 's take care of my cat brings a beguiling freshness to a coming-of-age story with such a buoyant , expressive flow of images that it emerges as another key contribution to the flowering of the south korean cinema .
translation: 郑在恩的《照顾我的猫》为一部成长故事带来了迷人的新鲜感，使用了如此充满活力和表现力的影像流，使其成为韩国电影发展的又一个重要贡献。
back_translation: Zheng Zai'en's "Taking Care of My Cat" brings a captivating freshness to the coming-of-age story, utilizing such vibrant and expressive imagery that it becomes another significant contribution to the development of Korean cinema.

text: the film 's appeal has a lot to do with the casting of juliette binoche as sand , who brings to the role her pale , dark beauty and characteristic warmth .
translation: 这部电影的吸引力与茱莉亚·比诺什饰演桑德有很大关系，她为这个角色带来了她那种苍白而深邃的美丽以及特有的温暖。
back_translation: The appeal of this movie is largely related to Juliette Binoche's portrayal of Sand, as she brings her pale and profound beauty along with her unique warmth to the role.

text: like the english patient and the unbearable lightness of being , the hours is one of those reputedly `` unfilmable '' novels that has bucked the odds to emerge as an exquisite motion picture in its own right .
translation: 《时光之河》与《英语患者》和《无法承受的轻盈》一样，是那些被誉为“无法改编成电影”的小说之一，但它打破了这一说法，成功转变为一部精美的电影。
back_translation: "The River of Time," like "The English Patient" and "The Unbearable Lightness of Being," is one of those novels said to be "impossible to adapt into a film," but it broke this notion and successfully transformed into a beautiful movie.

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .
translation: 这些rapper玩乐的录像和与Suge Knight的监狱采访只是两个能吸引你的元素。
back_translation: These rappers' fun videos and the prison interview with Suge Knight are just two elements that can captivate you.

text: -lrb- f -rrb- rom the performances and the cinematography to the outstanding soundtrack and unconventional narrative , the film is blazingly alive and admirable on many levels .
translation: 从表演和摄影到杰出的配乐和非常规叙事，这部电影在许多层面上都充满生机和令人钦佩。
back_translation: From the performances and cinematography to the outstanding score and unconventional narrative, this film is vibrant and admirable on many levels.

text: it 's bedeviled by labored writing and slack direction .
translation: 它饱受艰难的写作和松散的导演之苦。
back_translation: It suffers from difficult writing and loose direction.

text: it is too bad that this likable movie is n't more accomplished .
translation: 这部可爱的电影没有更出色，真是太遗憾了。
back_translation: It's a pity that this lovely movie isn't better.

text: quiet , adult and just about more stately than any contemporary movie this year ... a true study , a film with a questioning heart and mind that is n't afraid to admit it does n't have all the answers .
translation: 安静、成熟，比今年任何一部当代电影都显得更加庄重……一部真正的研究，一部心灵和思想都在质疑的电影，并不害怕承认它并没有所有的答案。
back_translation: Quiet and mature, it appears more solemn than any contemporary film this year... a true study, a film that questions both the heart and the mind, not afraid to admit that it does not have all the answers.

text: although god is great addresses interesting matters of identity and heritage , it 's hard to shake the feeling that it was intended to be a different kind of film .
translation: 尽管《上帝是伟大的》探讨了身份和遗产的有趣问题，但很难摆脱这样一种感觉：这部电影本应是一种不同类型的作品。
back_translation: While "God Is Great" explores interesting issues of identity and heritage, it's hard to shake the feeling that this film should have been a different kind of work.

text: you can not guess why the cast and crew did n't sign a pact to burn the negative and the script and pretend the whole thing never existed .
translation: 你无法猜测为什么演员和剧组没有签署协议去烧掉底片和剧本，假装这一切从未存在过。
back_translation: You can't guess why the actors and crew didn't sign an agreement to burn the film and script, pretending that it had never existed.

text: feel free to go get popcorn whenever he 's not onscreen .
translation: 随时可以去拿爆米花，尽管他不在荧幕上。
back_translation: You can go get popcorn anytime, even though he's not on the screen.

text: definitely funny stuff , but it 's more of the ` laughing at ' variety than the ` laughing with . '
translation: 绝对好笑，但它更像是“在嘲笑”而不是“与之同笑”。
back_translation: Absolutely funny, but it's more like "laughing at" rather than "laughing with."

text: ... pray does n't have a passion for the material .
translation: ... 祈祷并不对物质有激情。
back_translation: ... Prayer does not have a passion for material things.

text: plays like an unbalanced mixture of graphic combat footage and almost saccharine domestic interludes that are pure hollywood .
translation: 就像是一个不平衡的混合体，包含了激烈战斗画面和几乎甜腻的家庭插曲，完全是好莱坞风格。
back_translation: It's like an unbalanced mix, featuring intense battle scenes and almost syrupy family interludes, completely in Hollywood style.

text: the increasingly diverse french director has created a film that one can honestly describe as looking , sounding and simply feeling like no other film in recent history .
translation: 这位日益多元化的法国导演创作了一部电影，可以坦诚地说，它在视觉、声音和感觉上与近期历史上的任何其他电影都截然不同。
back_translation: This increasingly diverse French director has created a film that can honestly be said to be completely different from any other film in recent history in terms of visuals, sound, and feeling.

text: the film is a confusing melange of tones and styles , one moment a romantic trifle and the next a turgid drama .
translation: 这部电影是一种令人困惑的各种语调和风格的混合，瞬间是浪漫的小品，瞬间又变成了沉闷的戏剧。
back_translation: This movie is a confusing blend of various tones and styles, sometimes becoming a romantic vignette and at other times turning into a somber drama.

text: lush and beautifully photographed -lrb- somebody suggested the stills might make a nice coffee table book -rrb- , but ultimately you 'll leave the theater wondering why these people mattered .
translation: 画面华丽且摄影精美 -（有人建议这些静态画面可以做成一本不错的咖啡桌书）- 但最终你会在剧院里思考这些人为何重要。
back_translation: The visuals are magnificent and the photography is exquisite - (some suggest that these static images could make a nice coffee table book) - but ultimately you will ponder in the theater why these people matter.

text: instead of using george and lucy 's most obvious differences to ignite sparks , lawrence desperately looks elsewhere , seizing on george 's haplessness and lucy 's personality tics .
translation: 劳伦斯没有利用乔治和露西最明显的差异来点燃火花，而是绝望地寻找其他机会，抓住乔治的无助和露西的性格缺陷。
back_translation: Lawrence did not take advantage of the most obvious differences between George and Lucy to spark a reaction; instead, he desperately sought other opportunities, seizing on George's helplessness and Lucy's personality flaws.

text: it recycles every clich茅 about gays in what is essentially an extended soap opera .
translation: 它将关于同性恋者的每一个陈词滥调进行回收，基本上就是一场扩展的肥皂剧。
back_translation: It rehashes every cliché about homosexuals, essentially turning into an extended soap opera.

text: one of the most splendid entertainments to emerge from the french film industry in years .
translation: 近年来法国电影产业中出现的最精彩的娱乐之一。
back_translation: One of the most exciting entertainments that has emerged in the French film industry in recent years.

text: the piano teacher , like its title character , is repellantly out of control .
translation: 钢琴老师，像其标题角色一样，令人厌恶地失控。
back_translation: The piano teacher, like the titular character, uncontrollably descends into repulsiveness.

text: the basic premise is intriguing but quickly becomes distasteful and downright creepy .
translation: 基本 premise 令人感兴趣，但很快变得令人讨厌和令人毛骨悚然。
back_translation: The basic premise is intriguing, but it quickly becomes annoying and creepy.

text: it is ok for a movie to be something of a sitcom apparatus , if the lines work , the humor has point and the actors are humanly engaged .
translation: 如果电影有点像情景喜剧的装置也是可以的，只要台词有效，幽默有意义，以及演员们投入真实的情感。
back_translation: It's fine if the movie has a bit of a sitcom setup, as long as the dialogue is effective, the humor is meaningful, and the actors invest genuine emotions.

text: too campy to work as straight drama and too violent and sordid to function as comedy , vulgar is , truly and thankfully , a one-of-a-kind work .
translation: 《粗俗》确实是独一无二的作品，过于夸张而无法作为正剧，也过于暴力和肮脏而不能作为喜剧。
back_translation: "Vulgar" is indeed a unique work, too exaggerated to be a proper drama, and too violent and filthy to be a comedy.

text: this romantic\/comedy asks the question how much souvlaki can you take before indigestion sets in .
translation: 这部浪漫喜剧提出了一个问题：你能吃多少沙威玛才会开始消化不良？
back_translation: This romantic comedy poses the question: How much shawarma can you eat before you start to feel unwell?

text: visually breathtaking , viscerally exciting , and dramatically moving , it 's the very definition of epic adventure .
translation: 视觉上令人惊叹，内心激动不已，情感深刻动人，这正是史诗冒险的定义。
back_translation: Visually stunning, emotionally thrilling, and profoundly touching—this is the definition of an epic adventure.

text: full frontal had no effect and elicited no sympathies for any of the characters .
translation: 全裸表演没有任何效果，也没有引起对任何角色的同情。
back_translation: The裸 performance had no effect and did not evoke sympathy for any characters.

text: the movie is n't painfully bad , something to be ` fully experienced ' ; it 's just tediously bad , something to be fully forgotten .
translation: 这部电影并不是痛苦地糟糕，而是乏味地糟糕，值得被完全遗忘。
back_translation: This movie is not painfully bad, but rather boringly bad, and it deserves to be completely forgotten.

text: if you 've the patience , there are great rewards here .
translation: 如果你有耐心，这里会有丰厚的回报。
back_translation: If you have patience, there will be rich rewards here.

text: devolves into the derivative , leaning on badly-rendered cgi effects .
translation: 退化为衍生作品，依赖于糟糕的 CGI 特效。
back_translation: Devolved into derivative works, relying on poor CGI effects.

text: it 's the type of film about growing up that we do n't see often enough these days : realistic , urgent , and not sugarcoated in the least .
translation: 这是一部关于成长的电影，这种类型的电影如今已经不常见了：现实、紧迫，并且一点也没有粉饰。
back_translation: This is a movie about growth, a type that has become rare nowadays: realistic, urgent, and not sugarcoated at all.

text: remember back when thrillers actually thrilled ?
translation: 还记得以前的惊悚片真能让人感到惊悚吗？
back_translation: Do you remember how horror movies used to really give people a sense of terror?

text: perhaps even the slc high command found writer-director mitch davis 's wall of kitsch hard going .
translation: 也许甚至SLC高层也觉得编剧兼导演米奇·戴维斯的这种俗气墙面难以接受。
back_translation: Perhaps even the high-ups at SLC find the tacky wall design by writer-director Mitch Davis hard to accept.

text: the acting is fine but the script is about as interesting as a recording of conversations at the wal-mart checkout line .
translation: 表演还不错，但剧本的趣味性就像沃尔玛结账排队时的对话录音一样无趣。
back_translation: The performance was quite good, but the script's interest level is as dull as the recorded announcements while waiting in line at Walmart.

text: writer\/director alexander payne -lrb- election -rrb- and his co-writer jim taylor brilliantly employ their quirky and fearless ability to look american angst in the eye and end up laughing .
translation: 编剧/导演亚历山大·佩恩（《选举》）和他的合作编剧吉姆·泰勒巧妙地运用他们独特而无畏的视角直面美国焦虑，最终以笑声收尾。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Alexander Payne ("Election") and his co-writer Jim Taylor cleverly confront American anxiety with their unique and fearless perspective, ultimately ending with laughter.

text: if you can push on through the slow spots , you 'll be rewarded with some fine acting .
translation: 如果你能坚持度过那些慢节奏的部分，你会得到一些精彩的表演作为回报。
back_translation: If you can persist through those slower-paced parts, you will be rewarded with some fantastic performances.

text: chris columbus ' sequel is faster , livelier and a good deal funnier than his original .
translation: 克里斯·哥伦布的续集比他的原作更快、更生动，并且有很多搞笑的元素。
back_translation: The sequel to Christopher Columbus is faster, more lively, and has many humorous elements than the original work.

text: this is the stuff that disney movies are made of .
translation: 这就是迪士尼电影的素材。
back_translation: This is the material for Disney movies.

text: what 's invigorating about it is that it does n't give a damn .
translation: 令人振奋的是它毫不在乎。
back_translation: What's exciting is that it doesn't care at all.

text: it 's difficult to conceive of anyone who has reached puberty actually finding the characters in slackers or their antics amusing , let alone funny .
translation: 很难想象有谁在青春期达到的年龄会觉得《懒人》的角色或他们的 antics 有趣，更不用说搞笑了。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine anyone at the age reached during adolescence finding the characters in "The Lazy Person" or their antics interesting, let alone funny.

text: the film is a verbal duel between two gifted performers .
translation: 这部电影是一场两位才华横溢的表演者之间的言语对决。
back_translation: This movie is a duel of words between two talented performers.

text: it 's makes a better travelogue than movie .
translation: 它比电影更像一本优秀的旅行日志。
back_translation: It resembles a great travel journal more than a movie.

text: it 's a masterpiece .
translation: 这是一部杰作。
back_translation: This is a masterpiece.

text: been there , done that , liked it much better the first time around - when it was called the professional .
translation: 去过了，做过了，第一次的时候我更喜欢——那时叫做《职业特工》。
back_translation: I have been there, I have done it, and I preferred it the first time—back then it was called "Professional Agent."

text: i have to admit i walked out of runteldat .
translation: 我不得不承认我走出了《runteldat》。
back_translation: I have to admit that I walked out of "runteldat."

text: a movie so bad that it quickly enters the pantheon of wreckage that includes battlefield earth and showgirls .
translation: 一部糟糕到迅速进入毁灭殿堂的电影，包括《战斗地球》和《表演者》。
back_translation: A movie so terrible that it quickly entered the hall of destruction, including "The Wandering Earth" and "The Performer."

text: -- but it makes for one of the most purely enjoyable and satisfying evenings at the movies i 've had in a while .
translation: ——但这带来了我近来在电影院中经历过的最纯粹愉快和令人满意的夜晚之一。
back_translation: —But this brought me one of the most pure and satisfying nights I've experienced in the cinema recently.

text: the unexplored story opportunities of `` punch-drunk love '' may have worked against the maker 's minimalist intent but it is an interesting exercise by talented writer\/director anderson .
translation: 《醉拳爱情》的未开发故事机会可能与制片人的极简主义意图相悖，但这是才华横溢的编剧/导演安德森的一次有趣尝试。
back_translation: The undeveloped story opportunities in "Drunken Fist Love" may contradict the minimalist intentions of the producer, but it is an interesting attempt by the talented writer/director Anderson.

text: there are now two signs that m. night shyamalan 's debut feature sucked up all he has to give to the mystic genres of cinema : unbreakable and signs .
translation: 现在有两个迹象表明，M. Night Shyamalan 的处女作《不可动摇》和《第六感》耗尽了他在神秘类型电影中所有的创作灵感。
back_translation: There are now two signs that M. Night Shyamalan's debut film "Praying with Anger" and "The Sixth Sense" have exhausted all his creative inspiration in the mystery genre.

text: if cinema had been around to capture the chaos of france in the 1790 's , one imagines the result would look like something like this .
translation: 如果电影早在1790年代就能记录下法国的混乱场面，结果可能会看起来像这样。
back_translation: If movies had been able to capture the chaotic scenes in France as early as the 1790s, the result might have looked something like this.

text: this quiet , introspective and entertaining independent is worth seeking .
translation: 这部安静、内省且有趣的独立电影值得去寻找。
back_translation: This quiet, introspective, and interesting independent film is worth seeking out.

text: what little atmosphere is generated by the shadowy lighting , macabre sets , and endless rain is offset by the sheer ugliness of everything else .
translation: 阴暗的灯光、可怕的布景和绵延不绝的雨水所营造出的微弱氛围被其他一切的丑陋所抵消。
back_translation: The dim lighting, terrifying set design, and relentless rain create a faint atmosphere that is overshadowed by the ugliness of everything else.

text: what `` empire '' lacks in depth it makes up for with its heart .
translation: “帝国”在深度上所欠缺的，正用它的热情来弥补。
back_translation: What the "empire" lacks in depth, it compensates with its enthusiasm.

text: the usual movie rah-rah , pleasantly and predictably delivered in low-key style by director michael apted and writer tom stoppard .
translation: 这部电影的常见宣传方式由导演迈克尔·阿普特和编剧汤姆·斯托帕德以低调风格愉快且可预测地呈现。
back_translation: The common promotional style of this film is presented in a pleasantly predictable manner by director Michael Apted and screenwriter Tom Stoppard with a low-key approach.

text: this starts off with a 1950 's doris day feel and it gets very ugly , very fast .
translation: 这开始时有一种1950年代多丽丝·戴的感觉，但很快就变得非常丑陋。
back_translation: It initially has a 1950s Doris Day vibe, but it quickly becomes very ugly.

text: standing by yourself is haunting ... -lrb- it 's -rrb- what punk rock music used to be , and what the video medium could use more of : spirit , perception , conviction .
translation: 独自站立是令人难以忘怀的……（这正是）朋克摇滚音乐曾经的样子，也是视频媒介所需要更多的东西：精神、感知、信念。

text: the best movie in many a moon about the passions that sometimes fuel our best achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our lesser appetites .

text: nothing more than a widget cranked out on an assembly line to see if stupid americans will get a kick out of goofy brits with cute accents performing ages-old slapstick and unfunny tricks .

text: the film was produced by jerry bruckheimer and directed by joel schumacher , and reflects the worst of their shallow styles : wildly overproduced , inadequately motivated every step of the way and demographically targeted to please every one -lrb- and no one -rrb- .

back_translation: This movie, produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and directed by Joel Schumacher, reflects the worst aspects of their superficial style: overproduction, insufficient motivation, and constantly catering to everyone (yet actually to no one).

back_translation: In "Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams," Robert Rodriguez adds a sense of elegance and maturity to his family film plot, something that many contemporary adult films lack.

text: ... unbearably lame .
translation: ... 无法忍受的无聊。
back_translation: ... unbearable boredom.

text: certainly not a good movie , but it was n't horrible either .
translation: 确实不是一部好电影，但也并不是糟糕。
back_translation: It is indeed not a good movie, but it is not terrible either.

text: where the film falters is in its tone .
translation: 电影的缺点在于其基调。
back_translation: The downside of the film lies in its tone.

text: this film biggest problem ?
translation: 这部电影最大的问提是什么？
back_translation: What is the biggest issue with this movie?

text: this is a movie that is what it is : a pleasant distraction , a friday night diversion , an excuse to eat popcorn .
translation: 这是一部电影，它就是它本身：一种愉快的消遣，一个周五晚上的娱乐，一个吃爆米花的借口。
back_translation: This is a movie that is just what it is: a pleasant distraction, entertainment for a Friday night, an excuse to eat popcorn.

text: the gags are often a stitch .
translation: 这些笑话常常令人捧腹大笑。
back_translation: These jokes often make people burst into laughter.

text: the complex , politically charged tapestry of contemporary chinese life this exciting new filmmaker has brought to the screen is like nothing we westerners have seen before .
translation: 这位令人兴奋的新电影制作人呈现的当代中国生活的复杂且政治敏感的画卷，是我们西方人前所未见的。
back_translation: This exciting new filmmaker presents a complex and politically sensitive portrayal of contemporary life in China that is unprecedented for us Westerners.

text: the sinister inspiration that fuelled devito 's early work is confused in death to smoochy into something both ugly and mindless .
translation: 对德维托早期作品的阴险灵感在《死亡来临时》变成了既丑陋又无脑的东西。
back_translation: The sinister inspiration of DeVito's early works transforms into something both ugly and mindless in "When Death Comes."

text: -lrb- shyamalan -rrb- continues to cut a swathe through mainstream hollywood , while retaining an integrity and refusing to compromise his vision .
translation: （沙马兰）继续在主流好莱坞开辟一片天地，同时保持着自己的完整性，拒绝妥协他的视野。
back_translation: (Shyamalan) continues to carve out a place in mainstream Hollywood while maintaining his integrity and refusing to compromise his vision.

text: as averse as i usually am to feel-good , follow-your-dream hollywood fantasies , this one got to me .
translation: 尽管我通常对温馨、追求梦想的好莱坞幻想感到厌恶，但这一部却触动了我。
back_translation: Although I usually feel disgusted by the warm, dream-chasing fantasies of Hollywood, this one touched me.

text: you 'll know a star when you see one .
translation: 你会在看到一颗明星时知道它是明星。
back_translation: You will know it is a star when you see a star.

text: sorority boys , which is as bad at it is cruel , takes every potential laugh and stiletto-stomps the life out of it .
translation: 兄弟会男孩，这部片子既糟糕又残酷，把每一个潜在的笑点都踩得粉碎。
back_translation: Brotherhood Boys, this movie is both terrible and brutal, crushing every potential joke into dust.

text: in between the icy stunts , the actors spout hilarious dialogue about following your dream and ` just letting the mountain tell you what to do . '
translation: 在冰冷的特技表演之间，演员们幽默地谈论着追随梦想的主题，以及“让山丘告诉你该做什么”。
back_translation: In the cold acrobatic performance, the performers humorously talked about the theme of following dreams and "letting the hills tell you what to do."

text: this gorgeous epic is guaranteed to lift the spirits of the whole family .
translation: 这个华丽的史诗保证能提升整个家庭的精神。
back_translation: This magnificent epic is sure to uplift the spirit of the whole family.

text: horrible .
translation: 糟糕。
back_translation: Oh no.

text: grating and tedious .
translation: 令人恼火和乏味。
back_translation: Irritating and boring.

text: at three hours and with very little story or character development , there is plenty of room for editing , and a much shorter cut surely would have resulted in a smoother , more focused narrative without sacrificing any of the cultural intrigue .
translation: 在三个小时的时间里，几乎没有故事或角色发展，编辑的空间很大，一个更短的剪辑无疑会带来更流畅、更集中的叙事，而不牺牲任何文化的吸引力。
back_translation: In three hours, there is hardly any story or character development; the editing space is vast. A shorter cut would undoubtedly bring a smoother, more focused narrative without sacrificing any cultural appeal.

text: better effects , better acting and a hilarious kenneth branagh .
translation: 更好的效果，更好的表演，还有令人捧腹的肯尼斯·布拉纳。
back_translation: Better results, better performances, and the hilariously entertaining Kenneth Branagh.

text: it 's too interested in jerking off in all its byzantine incarnations to bother pleasuring its audience .
translation: 它过于沉迷于各种复杂的形式来满足观众。
back_translation: It is too obsessed with various complex forms to please the audience.

text: none of this so-called satire has any sting to it , as if woody is afraid of biting the hand that has finally , to some extent , warmed up to him .
translation: 这些所谓的讽刺一点都没有力度，好像伍迪害怕惹恼那只终于在某种程度上对他有所温暖的手。
back_translation: These so-called ironies have no strength at all, as if Woody is afraid of upsetting that hand that has finally shown him some warmth to a certain extent.

text: a keep - 'em - guessing plot and an affectionate take on its screwed-up characters .
translation: 一个让人猜测的情节，以及对那些复杂角色的深情演绎。
back_translation: A plot that invites speculation, along with a heartfelt portrayal of those complex characters.

text: a prison comedy that never really busts out of its comfy little cell .
translation: 一部监狱喜剧，总是呆在它舒适的小牢房里，始终没有真正突破局限。
back_translation: A prison comedy that always stays in its cozy little cell and never truly breaks through its limitations.

text: an elegant and sly deadpan comedy .
translation: 一种优雅而狡猾的冷面喜剧。
back_translation: An elegant yet cunning deadpan comedy.

text: neither as scary-funny as tremors nor demented-funny as starship troopers , the movie is n't tough to take as long as you 've paid a matinee price .
translation: 既不如《震撼者》那样惊悚搞笑，也不如《星河舰队》那样疯狂搞笑，只要你支付了午间票价，这部电影看起来并不难受。
back_translation: It is neither as thrillingly funny as "The Shocking One" nor as crazily funny as "Starship Troopers." As long as you pay for a matinee ticket, this movie doesn't seem too painful to watch.

text: the delicious trimmings ... arrive early and stay late , filling nearly every minute ... with a lighthearted glow , some impudent snickers , and a glorious dose of humankind 's liberating ability to triumph over a scrooge or two .
translation: 美味的装饰品提前到达，逗留到很晚，几乎每一分钟都充满了轻松的光辉，偶尔的调皮咯咯笑声，以及人类超越一两个守财奴的解放能力的辉煌剂量。
back_translation: Delicious decorations arriving early, staying late, with almost every minute filled with a relaxed glow, occasional playful giggles, and a glorious dose of humanity's ability to transcend one or two miserly souls.

text: the movie is a dud .
translation: 这部电影很烂。
back_translation: This movie is very bad.

text: unfolds in a low-key , organic way that encourages you to accept it as life and go with its flow .
translation: 以一种低调、自然的方式展开，鼓励你接受生活并顺其自然。
back_translation: Unfold in a low-key, natural way, encouraging you to embrace life and go with the flow.

text: does n't do more than expand a tv show to movie length .
translation: 只是在把电视节目扩展到电影长度。
back_translation: It’s just extending a television show to movie length.

text: one of the best movies of the year .
translation: 年度最佳电影之一。
back_translation: One of the best movies of the year.

text: by applying definition to both sides of the man , the picture realizes a fullness that does not negate the subject .
translation: 通过将定义应用于男人的两侧，这幅画实现了一种并不否定主题的充实感。
back_translation: By applying the definition to both sides of the man, this painting achieves a sense of richness that does not deny the subject.

text: the movie turns out to be -lrb- assayas ' -rrb- homage to the gallic ` tradition of quality , ' in all its fusty squareness .
translation: 这部电影最终被认为是阿萨亚斯对高卢“质量传统”的致敬，尽管其中充满了陈腐的呆板。
back_translation: This film is ultimately regarded as Assayas's tribute to the Gallic "tradition of quality," despite being filled with clichéd rigidity.

text: once the downward spiral comes to pass , auto focus bears out as your typical junkie opera ...
translation: 一旦下行螺旋发生，自动聚焦就表现得像典型的瘾君子歌剧
back_translation: Once a downward spiral occurs, automatic focus behaves like a typical addict's opera...

text: ` butterfingered ' is the word for the big-fisted direction of jez butterworth , who manages to blast even the smallest sensitivities from the romance with his clamorous approach .
translation: “手忙脚乱”是杰兹·巴特沃斯的粗犷风格的描述，他以喧闹的方式甚至将爱情中最微小的敏感度都击得粉碎。
back_translation: "Hands busy and feet in a mess" is a description of Jez Butterworth's rough style, where he noisily shatters even the smallest sensitivities in love.

text: cal is an unpleasantly shallow and immature character with whom to spend 110 claustrophobic minutes .
translation: 卡尔是一个令人不快、肤浅且不成熟的角色，和他一起度过110分钟的压抑时光非常不愉快。
back_translation: Carl is an unpleasant, shallow, and immature character, making the 110 minutes spent with him a very unpleasurable experience.

text: berry 's saucy , full-bodied performance gives this aging series a much needed kick , making `` die another day '' one of the most entertaining bonds in years
translation: 贝瑞的性感、饱满的表演为这个老旧系列注入了急需的活力，使得《再死一次》成为近年来最具娱乐性的007电影之一。
back_translation: Berry's sexy and full-bodied performance injects much-needed vitality into this old series, making "Die Another Day" one of the most entertaining 007 films in recent years.

text: despite the film 's bizarre developments , hoffman keeps us riveted with every painful nuance , unexpected flashes of dark comedy and the character 's gripping humanity .
translation: 尽管影片的发展十分离奇，霍夫曼以每一个痛苦的细微之处、意外的黑色幽默瞬间以及角色引人深思的人性让我们始终保持关注。
back_translation: Despite the film's strange development, Hoffman keeps us engaged with every painful detail, unexpected moments of dark humor, and the thought-provoking humanity of the characters.

text: if you love reading and\/or poetry , then by all means check it out .
translation: 如果你热爱阅读和/或诗歌，那就一定要去看看。
back_translation: If you love reading and/or poetry, you must check it out.

text: driven by a fantastic dual performance from ian holm ... the film is funny , insightfully human and a delightful lark for history buffs .
translation: 这部电影由伊恩·霍姆的精彩双重表现推动，幽默、深刻人性，令历史爱好者感到愉快的乐趣。
back_translation: This film is driven by Ian Holm's brilliant dual performance, combining humor and profound humanity, providing delightful enjoyment for history enthusiasts.

text: douglas mcgrath 's nicholas nickleby does dickens as it should be done cinematically .
translation: 道格拉斯·麦格拉思的《尼古拉斯·尼克尔比》是对狄更斯作品应有的电影化呈现。
back_translation: Douglas McGrath's "Nicholas Nickleby" is a rightful cinematic interpretation of Dickens' work.

text: diane lane 's sophisticated performance ca n't rescue adrian lyne 's unfaithful from its sleazy moralizing .
translation: 黛安·莲的精湛表演不能拯救阿德里安·莱因的《不忠》免受其肮脏的道德说教。
back_translation: Diane Lane's superb performance cannot save Adrian Lyne's "Unfaithful" from its sordid moral preaching.

text: simply put , `` far from heaven '' is a masterpiece .
translation: 简而言之，《远离天堂》是一部杰作。
back_translation: In short, "Far from Heaven" is a masterpiece.

text: shot in rich , shadowy black-and-white , devils chronicles , with increasingly amused irony , the relationship between reluctant captors and befuddled captives .
translation: 以丰富、阴影交错的黑白画面拍摄，《魔鬼编年史》通过越来越滑稽的讽刺，描绘了犹豫不决的 captors 和困惑的 captives 之间的关系。
back_translation: Shot in rich, shadowy black and white, "The Devil's Chronicles" depicts the relationship between indecisive captors and bewildered captives through increasingly absurd satire.

text: mcgrath has deftly trimmed dickens ' wonderfully sprawling soap opera , the better to focus on the hero 's odyssey from cowering poverty to courage and happiness .
translation: 麦格拉斯巧妙地精简了狄更斯那部极具纵深感的肥皂剧，以更好地聚焦于英雄从畏惧贫困到勇气和幸福的历程。
back_translation: Magrath cleverly streamlined Dickens' deeply layered soap opera to better focus on the hero's journey from the fear of poverty to courage and happiness.

text: anyone who suffers through this film deserves , at the very least , a big box of consolation candy .
translation: 任何经历过这部电影的人至少都值得一大盒安慰糖果。
back_translation: Anyone who has experienced this movie deserves at least a big box of comfort candy.

text: a worthwhile documentary , whether you 're into rap or not , even if it may still leave you wanting more answers as the credits roll .
translation: 一部值得一看的纪录片，无论你是否喜欢说唱，尽管在片尾字幕滚动时它可能仍会让你想要更多的答案。
back_translation: A documentary worth watching, whether you like rap or not, and it may still leave you wanting more answers even as the credits roll.

text: the original was n't a good movie but this remake makes it look like a masterpiece !
translation: 原版不是一部好电影，但这个重拍让它显得像是一部杰作！
back_translation: The original version is not a good movie, but this remake makes it seem like a masterpiece!

text: it 's a fun adventure movie for kids -lrb- of all ages -rrb- that like adventure .
translation: 这是一部适合所有年龄孩子观看的有趣冒险电影，特别是喜欢冒险的孩子。
back_translation: This is an interesting adventure movie suitable for children of all ages, especially those who love adventure.

text: one sloughs one 's way through the mire of this alleged psychological thriller in search of purpose or even a plot .
translation: 在这个所谓的心理惊悚片中，人们在泥沼中苦苦挣扎，寻找目的甚至是情节。
back_translation: In this so-called psychological thriller, people are struggling in the mire, searching for purpose or even a storyline.

text: limps along on a squirm-inducing fish-out-of-water formula that goes nowhere and goes there very , very slowly .
translation: 在一个让人不适的生搬硬套的情节公式中缓慢推进，这个故事毫无进展，而且非常，非常缓慢。
back_translation: The story progresses slowly within an uncomfortable, rigid formula, making no progress at all, and it is very, very slow.

text: no amount of nostalgia for carvey 's glory days can disguise the fact that the new film is a lame kiddie flick and that carvey 's considerable talents are wasted in it .
translation: 对卡维辉煌时代的任何怀旧情绪都无法掩饰新电影是部低劣儿童影片的事实，而卡维的巨大才华在其中也被浪费了。
back_translation: Any nostalgic feelings for Cavie’s glorious era cannot hide the fact that the new movie is a mediocre children’s film, and Cavie’s immense talent is wasted in it.

text: consistently clever and suspenseful .
translation: 始终聪明且充满悬念。
back_translation: Always clever and full of suspense.

text: this is an ungainly movie , ill-fitting , with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be .
translation: 这是一部笨拙的电影，结构不协调，肘部突出，原本应该是膝盖的地方却显得不合适。
back_translation: This is a clumsy movie, with a disjointed structure, awkward protrusions at the elbows, and places that should be like knees but seem inappropriate.

text: a real audience-pleaser that will strike a chord with anyone who 's ever waited in a doctor 's office , emergency room , hospital bed or insurance company office .
translation: 这是一个真正能引起观众共鸣的作品，任何曾经在医生办公室、急诊室、医院病床或保险公司办公室等候过的人都会产生共鸣。
back_translation: This is a work that truly resonates with the audience; anyone who has ever waited in a doctor's office, emergency room, hospital bed, or insurance company office will relate to it.

text: ... if you , like me , think an action film disguised as a war tribute is disgusting to begin with , then you 're in for a painful ride .
translation: ...如果你和我一样，认为一部伪装成战争致敬的动作片从一开始就让人恶心，那么你将经历一段痛苦的旅程。
back_translation: ...If you are like me and find a so-called war tribute action film distasteful from the very beginning, then you will go through a painful journey.

text: if you 're as happy listening to movies as you are watching them , and the slow parade of human frailty fascinates you , then you 're at the right film .
translation: 如果你在听电影时和观看电影时一样快乐，并且人类脆弱的慢慢游行让你着迷，那么你来对地方了。
back_translation: If you find as much joy in listening to movies as you do in watching them, and if the slow parade of human vulnerability fascinates you, then you’ve come to the right place.

text: one funny popcorn flick .
translation: 一部有趣的爆米花电影。
back_translation: An interesting popcorn movie.

text: bad company has one of the most moronic screenplays of the year , full of holes that will be obvious even to those who are n't looking for them .
translation: 《坏公司》是今年最愚蠢的剧本之一，漏洞百出，连那些没在寻找它们的人都能明显看出。
back_translation: "Bad Company" is one of the dumbest scripts of the year, riddled with flaws that are obvious even to those not looking for them.

text: i 'd be hard pressed to think of a film more cloyingly sappy than evelyn this year .
translation: 我很难想出今年比《伊芙琳》更令人感到过于甜腻的电影。
back_translation: I find it hard to think of a movie this year that is sweeter than "Evelyn."

text: a gem of a romantic crime comedy that turns out to be clever , amusing and unpredictable .
translation: 一部聪明、有趣且出人意料的浪漫犯罪喜剧佳作。
back_translation: A clever, entertaining, and unexpectedly romantic crime comedy masterpiece.

text: smith finds amusing juxtapositions that justify his exercise .
translation: 史密斯找到了有趣的对比，证明了他的锻炼是有意义的。
back_translation: Smith found an interesting comparison that proved his workout was meaningful.

text: a charming , banter-filled comedy ... one of those airy cinematic bon bons whose aims -- and by extension , accomplishments -- seem deceptively slight on the surface .
translation: 一部迷人、充满玩笑的喜剧这是一种轻松的电影甜点，其目标——以及由此带来的成就——在表面上似乎显得微不足道。
back_translation: A charming, joke-filled comedy... This is a lighthearted cinematic treat whose goals—and the achievements that come with them—seem trivial on the surface.

text: it 's that rare family movie -- genuine and sweet without relying on animation or dumb humor .
translation: 这是一部稀有的家庭电影——真诚而甜美，没有依赖动画或愚蠢幽默。
back_translation: This is a rare family movie - sincere and sweet, without relying on animation or silly humor.

text: hollywood ending is the most disappointing woody allen movie ever .
translation: 《好莱坞结局》是伍迪·艾伦最令人失望的电影。
back_translation: "Hollywood Ending" is Woody Allen's most disappointing movie.

text: it 's mildly amusing , but i certainly ca n't recommend it .
translation: 这有点滑稽，但我当然不能推荐它。
back_translation: This is a bit absurd, but I certainly cannot recommend it.

text: this dreadfully earnest inversion of the concubine love triangle eschews the previous film 's historical panorama and roiling pathos for bug-eyed mugging and gay-niche condescension .
translation: 这个沉重认真反转的妾侍爱情三角关系抛弃了前一部电影的历史全景和翻滚的悲情，而是选择了夸张的表情和同性恋小众的居高临下。
back_translation: This heavy and serious twist on the love triangle of concubines abandons the historical panorama and rolling tragedies of the previous film, opting instead for exaggerated expressions and a condescending view of the LGBTQ+ community.

text: formula 51 promises a new kind of high but delivers the same old bad trip .
translation: 公式51承诺提供一种新型的快感，但实际上却带来了同样糟糕的经历。
back_translation: Formula 51 promises to provide a new kind of pleasure, but in reality, it brings the same bad experience.

text: what madonna does here ca n't properly be called acting -- more accurately , it 's moving and it 's talking and it 's occasionally gesturing , sometimes all at once .
translation: 麦当娜在这里所做的不能被正确称为表演——更准确地说，是移动、交谈，有时还伴随手势，有时三者同时进行。
back_translation: What Madonna does here cannot be accurately called a performance—more precisely, it is movement, conversation, and sometimes accompanied by gestures, with all three sometimes occurring simultaneously.

text: rifkin 's references are ... impeccable throughout .
translation: 里夫金的参考文献始终无可挑剔。
back_translation: Rifkin's references are always impeccable.

text: the director explores all three sides of his story with a sensitivity and an inquisitiveness reminiscent of truffaut .
translation: 导演以一种敏感和好奇的方式探讨了他故事的三个方面，让人想起特吕弗。
back_translation: The director explores the three aspects of his story in a sensitive and curious manner, reminiscent of Truffaut.

text: the fact that the ` best part ' of the movie comes from a 60-second homage to one of demme 's good films does n't bode well for the rest of it .
translation: 影片“最佳部分”来自对德梅导演的一部优秀电影的60秒致敬，这对整部影片的其他部分并不乐观。
back_translation: The film "Best Part" is a 60-second tribute to an excellent movie directed by Demei, which is not optimistic about the rest of the film.

text: an enjoyable comedy of lingual and cultural differences ... the ch芒teau is a film -- full of life and small delights -- that has all the wiggling energy of young kitten .
translation: 一部愉快的关于语言和文化差异的喜剧《城堡》是一部充满活力和小乐趣的电影，拥有幼猫般活泼的能量。
back_translation: A delightful comedy about language and cultural differences... "The Castle" is a lively and fun-filled movie that exudes the playful energy of a kitten.

text: an engaging , formulaic sports drama that carries a charge of genuine excitement .
translation: 一部引人入胜、公式化的体育剧情片，充满了真正的激动人心。
back_translation: A captivating and formulaic sports drama film, filled with genuine excitement.

text: something must have been lost in the translation .
translation: 在翻译中一定有什么东西丢失了。
back_translation: Something must have been lost in the translation.

text: witty , contemplative , and sublimely beautiful .
translation: 机智，深思，绝美。
back_translation: Witty, thoughtful, and stunningly beautiful.

text: foster and whitaker are especially fine .
translation: 福斯特和惠特克特别出色。
back_translation: Foster and Whitaker are particularly outstanding.

text: the lightest , most breezy movie steven spielberg has made in more than a decade .
translation: 这是史蒂文·斯皮尔伯格在十多年里制作的最轻松、最愉快的电影。
back_translation: This is the most lighthearted and enjoyable film that Steven Spielberg has made in over a decade.

text: if i want a real movie , i 'll buy the criterion dvd .
translation: 如果我想看一部真实的电影，我会买克里特里昂的DVD。

text: this is the kind of movie that you only need to watch for about thirty seconds before you say to yourself , ` ah , yes , here we have a bad , bad , bad movie . '

text: campanella 's competent direction and his excellent cast overcome the obstacles of a predictable outcome and a screenplay that glosses over rafael 's evolution .

text: sch眉tte 's dramatic snapshot of the artist three days before his death offers an interesting bit of speculation as to the issues brecht faced as his life drew to a close .
translation: 施特的戏剧性快照记录了艺术家去世前三天的情景，提供了一个有趣的猜测，关于布莱希特在生命即将结束时所面临的问题。
back_translation: Schte's dramatic snapshot captures the scene three days before the artist's death, offering an interesting speculation about the issues Brecht faced as his life was coming to an end.

text: would be an unendurable viewing experience for this ultra-provincial new yorker if 26-year-old reese witherspoon were not on hand to inject her pure fantasy character , melanie carmichael , with a massive infusion of old-fashioned hollywood magic .
translation: 如果26岁的瑞ese Witherspoon不在场为她纯粹的幻想角色梅拉尼·卡迈克尔注入大量老派好莱坞魔法，这对这个极端地方主义的纽约人来说将是一种无法忍受的观影体验。

translation: 有些电影勇于夸张，而有些电影则不在乎自己的愚蠢，这两者之间是有区别的。

text: it irritates and saddens me that martin lawrence 's latest vehicle can explode obnoxiously into 2,500 screens while something of bubba ho-tep 's clearly evident quality may end up languishing on a shelf somewhere .
translation: 这让我感到愤怒和难过，马丁·劳伦斯的最新作品能够在2500个银幕上轰动上映，而《巴巴·霍特普》显而易见的质量却可能最终淹没在某个货架上。

translation: 当一切都说完的时候，她非常爱他们——我相信，你也是。
