text: kids do n't mind crappy movies as much as adults , provided there 's lots of cute animals and clumsy people .
translation: 孩子们对糟糕电影的容忍度不如成年人，只要里面有很多可爱的动物和笨拙的人。
back_translation: Children have a lower tolerance for bad movies than adults, as long as there are lots of cute animals and clumsy people in them.

text: it forces you to watch people doing unpleasant things to each other and themselves , and it maintains a cool distance from its material that is deliberately unsettling .
translation: 它强迫你观看人们彼此和自我做出令人不快的事情，并且与其内容保持一种冷静的距离，这种距离是故意让人不安的。

text: while the performances are often engaging , this loose collection of largely improvised numbers would probably have worked better as a one-hour tv documentary .

text: haneke 's script -lrb- from elfriede jelinek 's novel -rrb- is contrived , unmotivated , and psychologically unpersuasive , with an inconclusive ending .
translation: 哈内克的剧本（来自埃尔弗里德·耶利内克的小说）是人为构造的，没有动机，心理上也不具说服力，结局模糊不清。
back_translation: Haneke's screenplay (based on Elfriede Jelinek's novel) is artificially constructed, lacking motivation, psychologically unconvincing, and has an ambiguous ending.

text: there is only so much baked cardboard i need to chew .

text: the movie is loaded with good intentions , but in his zeal to squeeze the action and our emotions into the all-too-familiar dramatic arc of the holocaust escape story , minac drains his movie of all individuality .
translation: 这部电影充满了良好的意图，但在他热衷于将行动和我们的情感挤入那个过于熟悉的关于大屠杀逃亡故事的戏剧性弧线时，米纳克让他的电影失去了所有的个性。
back_translation: This movie is full of good intentions, but as Minack becomes eager to squeeze the action and our emotions into that overly familiar dramatic arc of the Holocaust escape story, he loses all individuality in his film.

text: tully is worth a look for its true-to-life characters , its sensitive acting , its unadorned view of rural life and the subtle direction of first-timer hilary birmingham .
translation: 《塔莉》值得一看，因为它展现了真实的人物、细腻的表演、对乡村生活的简朴视角，以及首次执导的希拉里·伯明翰的微妙导演风格。
back_translation: "Tully" is worth watching because it showcases real characters, delicate performances, a simple perspective on rural life, and the subtle directorial style of Hilary Birmingham in her directorial debut.

text: filmmaker tian zhuangzhuang triumphantly returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually masterful work of quiet power .

text: ... a movie that , quite simply , should n't have been made .

text: five screenwriters are credited with the clich茅-laden screenplay ; it seems as if each watered down the version of the one before .

text: director alfonso cuaron gets vivid , convincing performances from a fine cast , and generally keeps things going at a rapid pace , occasionally using an omniscient voice-over narrator in the manner of french new wave films .
translation: 导演阿方索·卡隆从优秀的演员阵容中获得生动而可信的表演，并且通常保持快速的节奏，偶尔以全知的旁白叙述者的方式运用，这让人联想到法国新浪潮电影。
back_translation: Director Alfonso Cuarón draws vivid and convincing performances from an excellent cast, often maintaining a brisk pace and occasionally employing an omniscient narrator in a way reminiscent of French New Wave cinema.

text: ... manages to deliver a fair bit of vampire fun .
translation: ...成功带来了不少吸血鬼的乐趣。

text: guys say mean things and shoot a lot of bullets .
translation: 家伙们说恶意的话，并且开了很多枪。

translation: 我们实际上想要我们的钱退回来。
back_translation: We actually want our money back.

text: more than anything else , kissing jessica stein injects freshness and spirit into the romantic comedy genre , which has been held hostage by generic scripts that seek to remake sleepless in seattle again and again .
translation: 比起其他任何事情，亲吻杰西卡·斯坦为浪漫喜剧注入了新鲜感和活力，这一类型一直被那些试图一次又一次重拍《西雅图不眠夜》的千篇一律的剧本所绑架。
back_translation: Kissing Jessica Stein injects freshness and vitality into the romantic comedy genre, which has long been hijacked by cliché scripts that attempt to remake "Sleepless in Seattle" over and over again.

text: when cowering and begging at the feet a scruffy giannini , madonna gives her best performance since abel ferrara had her beaten to a pulp in his dangerous game .
translation: 当在肮脏的贾尼尼脚下畏缩求饶时，麦当娜表现出了自阿ベル·法拉拉在他的《危险游戏》中把她打得粉碎以来最好的演出。
back_translation: When cowering and begging for mercy at the filthy feet of Giannini, Madonna delivered her best performance since Abel Ferrara shattered her in his "Dangerous Game."

text: the sheer joy and pride they took in their work -- and in each other -- shines through every frame .
translation: 他们对工作的纯粹喜悦和自豪感，以及对彼此的关心，透过每一个画面熠熠生辉。
back_translation: Their pure joy and pride in their work, as well as their care for each other, shine brightly through every frame.

text: the cumulative effect of the movie is repulsive and depressing .
translation: 这部电影的累计效果令人厌恶和沮丧。
back_translation: The cumulative effect of this movie is令人厌恶和沮丧.

text: ... digs beyond the usual portrayals of good kids and bad seeds to reveal a more ambivalent set of characters and motivations .
translation: 深入探讨了超越通常好孩子与坏种子的描绘，揭示了一组更为复杂的角色和动机。
back_translation: ...delved deeper into the portrayal beyond the usual good kids and bad seeds, revealing a set of more complex characters and motivations.

text: much of all about lily chou-chou is mesmerizing : some of its plaintiveness could make you weep .
translation: 关于莉莉·周周的许多内容令人着迷：它的一些忧伤感可能会让你流泪。
back_translation: Many aspects of Lily Zhou Zhou are fascinating: some of its sadness may bring you to tears.

text: it 's a rollicking adventure for you and all your mateys , regardless of their ages .
translation: 这是一次狂欢的冒险，无论你的伙伴们年龄多大，都能尽情享受。
back_translation: This is a festive adventure that everyone, no matter how old your companions are, can enjoy to the fullest.

text: an empty shell of an epic rather than the real deal .
translation: 一个史诗的空壳，而不是实质。
back_translation: An epic shell, rather than substance.

text: -lrb- scherfig -rrb- has made a movie that will leave you wondering about the characters ' lives after the clever credits roll .
translation: （舍尔菲格）制作了一部电影，会让你在聪明的片尾字幕结束后，思考角色们的生活。
back_translation: (Scherfig) made a film that will make you reflect on the characters' lives after the clever end credits.

text: it may be a somewhat backhanded compliment to say that the film makes the viewer feel like the movie 's various victimized audience members after a while , but it also happens to be the movie 's most admirable quality
translation: 说这部电影让观众在一段时间后感受到电影中各种受害观众的感觉，可能是一种有些含蓄的赞美，但这也正是这部电影最值得钦佩的品质。
back_translation: Saying that this film allows the audience to feel the emotions of various victimized characters after some time may be a somewhat subtle compliment, but it is precisely this quality of the film that is most admirable.

text: a delightful entree in the tradition of food movies .
translation: 一部令人愉悦的菜肴，延续了美食电影的传统。
back_translation: A delightful dish that continues the tradition of food films.

text: -lrb- johnnie to and wai ka fai are -rrb- sure to find an enthusiastic audience among american action-adventure buffs , but the film 's interests may be too narrow to attract crossover viewers .
translation: （约翰尼·托和韦家辉）肯定能在美国动作冒险迷中找到热情的观众，但这部电影的兴趣可能过于狭隘，无法吸引跨界观众。
back_translation: (Johnny To and Wai Ka-Fai) are sure to find enthusiastic audiences among American action-adventure fans, but the film's appeal may be too narrow to attract crossover viewers.

text: conceptually brilliant ... plays like a living-room war of the worlds , gaining most of its unsettling force from the suggested and the unknown .
translation: 概念上非常出色像一场客厅里的世界大战，主要的令人不安的力量来自于暗示和未知。
back_translation: Conceptually outstanding... like a world war in the living room, with the main unsettling forces stemming from implications and the unknown.

text: this feature is about as necessary as a hole in the head
translation: 这个功能的必要性就像头上的洞一样。
back_translation: The necessity of this function is like a hole in the head.

text: -lrb- danny huston gives -rrb- an astounding performance that deftly , gradually reveals a real human soul buried beneath a spellbinding serpent 's smirk .
translation: 丹尼·赫斯顿的表演令人惊叹，巧妙而渐进地揭示了一个隐藏在迷人蛇形微笑下的真实人性。
back_translation: Danny Huston's performance is stunning, skillfully and gradually revealing a true humanity hidden behind a charming serpentine smile.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: 除了霍夫曼强大的表演班，这是一部难得的剧作，提供了对每个人都曾经历过或未来会经历的那种心痛的深思熟虑和回报丰厚的洞察。
back_translation: Aside from the powerful performances by the Hoffman ensemble, this is a rare play that offers thoughtful and rewarding insights into the kind of heartache that everyone has experienced or will experience in the future.

text: this is n't exactly profound cinema , but it 's good-natured and sometimes quite funny .
translation: 这并不算深刻的电影，但它性格温和，有时相当搞笑。
back_translation: This is not a profound movie, but it has a gentle character and is sometimes quite funny.

text: hailed as a clever exercise in neo-hitchcockianism , this clever and very satisfying picture is more accurately chabrolian .
translation: 被誉为新希区柯克主义的巧妙练习，这部聪明且令人满意的影片更准确地说是查布罗式的。
back_translation: Lauded as a clever exercise in the new Hitchcockian style, this smart and satisfying film is more accurately described as a Chabrol-style work.

text: it leers , offering next to little insight into its intriguing subject .
translation: 它令人垂涎，几乎没有提供关于其迷人主题的洞察。
back_translation: It is tantalizing but provides almost no insight into its captivating subject.

text: a pleasant and engaging enough sit , but in trying to have the best of both worlds it ends up falling short as a whole .
translation: 一个愉快而吸引人的剧集，但在试图兼顾两全其美时，整体上却未能达到预期。
back_translation: A pleasant and engaging episode, but overall it failed to meet expectations while trying to balance both sides.

text: touches smartly and wistfully on a number of themes , not least the notion that the marginal members of society ... might benefit from a helping hand and a friendly kick in the pants .
translation: 巧妙而带着怀旧感地触及了多个主题，尤其是边缘社会成员...可能从一只援手和一记友好的推动中受益的观念。
back_translation: Skillfully and nostalgically touching on multiple themes, especially the idea that marginalized members of society... could benefit from a helping hand and a friendly push.

text: yakusho , as always , is wonderful as the long-faced sad sack ... and his chemistry with shimizu is very believable .
translation: 作为总是如此的长脸悲伤角色，yakusho 太棒了他与清水之间的化学反应非常真实。
back_translation: As always, Yakusho is fantastic as the long-faced, sad character... the chemistry between him and Shimizu is very genuine.

text: works , it 's thanks to huston 's revelatory performance .
translation: 这部作品之所以成功，得益于休斯顿的启示性表演。
back_translation: The success of this work is attributed to Houston's inspiring performance.

text: ararat feels like a book report
translation: 阿拉拉特感觉像是一篇书面报告。
back_translation: Ararat feels like a written report.

text: the beautiful images and solemn words can not disguise the slack complacency of -lrb- godard 's -rrb- vision , any more than the gorgeous piano and strings on the soundtrack can drown out the tinny self-righteousness of his voice .
translation: 美丽的画面和庄严的言辞无法掩盖（戈达尔的）视角中的懒散自满，就像配乐中的华丽钢琴和弦乐无法掩盖他声音中的刺耳自义感一样。
back_translation: The beautiful images and solemn words cannot conceal the lazy complacency in (Godard's) perspective, just as the grand piano and strings in the soundtrack cannot mask the jarring sense of self-righteousness in his voice.

text: tully is in many ways the perfect festival film : a calm , self-assured portrait of small town regret , love , duty and friendship that appeals to the storytelling instincts of a slightly more literate filmgoing audience .
translation: 塔利在很多方面都是一部完美的节日电影：它以从容、自信的态度描绘了小镇的遗憾、爱情、责任和友谊，吸引了稍微更有文化的观众的叙事本能。
back_translation: "Tali" is a perfect holiday movie in many ways: it depicts the regrets, love, responsibilities, and friendships of a small town with a calm and confident attitude, appealing to the narrative instincts of a slightly more cultured audience.

text: it 's a shame the marvelous first 101 minutes have to be combined with the misconceived final 5 .
translation: 真是可惜，精彩的前101分钟不得不与误解的最后5分钟结合在一起。
back_translation: It's really a shame that the outstanding first 101 minutes had to be combined with the misunderstood last 5 minutes.

text: a surprisingly charming and even witty match for the best of hollywood 's comic-book adaptations .
translation: 一个令人惊讶的迷人，甚至机智的匹配好莱坞最佳漫画改编作品。
back_translation: An astonishingly charming, even witty match for the best comic adaptations in Hollywood.

text: my advice is to skip the film and pick up the soundtrack .
translation: 我的建议是跳过这部电影，听它的原声带。
back_translation: My suggestion is to skip the movie and listen to its soundtrack instead.

text: audacious-impossible yet compelling ...
translation: 大胆——看似不可能却令人信服的
back_translation: Bold—seemingly impossible yet convincing...

text: a quasi-documentary by french filmmaker karim dridi that celebrates the hardy spirit of cuban music .
translation: 法国电影制作人卡里姆·德里迪的一部伪纪录片，庆祝了古巴音乐坚韧的精神。
back_translation: A mockumentary by French filmmaker Karim Dridi, celebrating the resilient spirit of Cuban music.

text: family fare .
translation: 家庭盛宴。
back_translation: Family feast.

text: the movie resolutely avoids all the comic possibilities of its situation , and becomes one more dumb high school comedy about sex gags and prom dates .
translation: 这部电影坚决避开了其情境中的所有喜剧可能性，变成了另一部愚蠢的高中喜剧，关于性笑话和舞会约会。
back_translation: This movie decisively avoids all comedic possibilities in its context, turning into yet another silly high school comedy about sex jokes and prom dates.

text: one of recent memory 's most thoughtful films about art , ethics , and the cost of moral compromise .
translation: 最近记忆中最深刻的 film 关于艺术、伦理和道德妥协代价的电影之一。
back_translation: One of the most memorable films in recent memory about the cost of artistic, ethical, and moral compromise.

text: even if you 're an agnostic carnivore , you can enjoy much of jonah simply , and gratefully , as laugh-out-loud lunacy with a pronounced monty pythonesque flavor .
translation: 即使你是一个不可知论的肉食者，你仍然可以简单而感激地享受《约拿》，作为一种让人捧腹大笑的疯狂，并带有显著的蒙提·派森风味。
back_translation: Even if you are an agnostic carnivore, you can simply and appreciatively enjoy "Jonah" as a madcap comedy that is hilariously amusing, with a notable Monty Python flavor.

text: one of the best of a growing strain of daring films ... that argue that any sexual relationship that does n't hurt anyone and works for its participants is a relationship that is worthy of our respect .
translation: 这是越来越多勇敢电影中的最佳之一它们主张任何不伤害他人且对参与者有效的性关系都是值得我们尊重的关系。
back_translation: This is one of the best movies about bravery It advocates that any sexual relationship that does not harm others and is effective for the participants deserves our respect.

text: set in a 1986 harlem that does n't look much like anywhere in new york .
translation: 设定在1986年的哈莱姆，但看起来与纽约的任何地方都毫无相似之处。
back_translation: Set in Harlem in 1986, it appears to bear no resemblance to anywhere in New York.

text: in the spirit of the season , i assign one bright shining star to roberto benigni 's pinocchio -- but i guarantee that no wise men will be following after it .
translation: 在这个季节的氛围中，我给罗伯托·贝尼尼的《匹诺曹》打上一颗明亮的星星——但我保证不会有智者追随而来。
back_translation: In the atmosphere of this season, I give Roberto Benigni's "Pinocchio" a bright star — but I guarantee there will be no wise men following.

text: evokes a palpable sense of disconnection , made all the more poignant by the incessant use of cell phones .
translation: 引发了一种明显的隔阂感，更因手机的无休止使用而显得格外尖锐。
back_translation: It has triggered a noticeable sense of estrangement, which is made even more acute by the incessant use of mobile phones.

text: they crush each other under cars , throw each other out windows , electrocute and dismember their victims in full consciousness .
translation: 他们在车下相互压扁，互相从窗户扔出去，电击并肢解他们的受害者，完全清醒。
back_translation: They crushed each other under the car, threw each other out of the windows, electrocuted and dismembered their victims, completely sober.

text: in addition to scoring high for originality of plot -- putting together familiar themes of family , forgiveness and love in a new way -- lilo & stitch has a number of other assets to commend it to movie audiences both innocent and jaded .
translation: 除了在情节原创性上得分很高——以新的方式将家庭、宽恕和爱的熟悉主题结合在一起——《小美人鱼与史迪奇》还有许多其他优点，使其受到无辜和疲惫观众的赞赏。
back_translation: In addition to scoring high on originality of plot—combining familiar themes of family, forgiveness, and love in a new way—"The Little Mermaid and Stitch" has many other merits that endear it to innocent and weary audiences.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film ` refreshing , ' but it is .
translation: 也许称这部电影为“耳目一新”有些陈词滥调，但确实如此。
back_translation: Calling this movie "refreshing" may be a bit of a cliché, but it truly is.

text: as predictable as the outcome of a globetrotters-generals game , juwanna mann is even more ludicrous than you 'd expect from the guy-in-a-dress genre , and a personal low for everyone involved .
translation: 就像环球旅行者与将军游戏的结果一样可预测，《Juwanna Mann》比你对穿裙子的类型的期待还要荒谬，是参与制作的每个人的个人低谷。
back_translation: Just as predictable as the outcome of a globe-trotting adventure or a game of generals, "Juwanna Mann" is even more absurd than your expectations of a guy in a skirt; it represents a personal low point for everyone involved in its production.

text: almodovar is an imaginative teacher of emotional intelligence in this engaging film about two men who discover what william james once called ` the gift of tears . '
translation: 阿尔莫多瓦是一位富有想象力的情感智慧老师，这部引人入胜的电影讲述了两名男子发现威廉·詹姆斯曾称之为“泪水的礼物”的故事。
back_translation: Almodovar is a teacher of emotional wisdom with a rich imagination. This captivating film tells the story of two men who discover what William James once referred to as "the gift of tears."

text: a fantastically vital movie that manages to invest real humor , sensuality , and sympathy into a story about two adolescent boys .
translation: 一部极具活力的电影，成功地将真正的幽默、感性和同情融入两个青少年男孩的故事中。
back_translation: A highly energetic film that successfully incorporates genuine humor, emotion, and empathy into the story of two teenage boys.

text: ... the story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: 这个故事离奇、不合逻辑、简直愚蠢。
back_translation: ...this story is bizarre, illogical, and simply ridiculous.

text: and lee seems just as expectant of an adoring , wide-smiling reception .
translation: 李似乎也对充满爱意、面带微笑的欢迎充满期待。
back_translation: Li seems to be looking forward to the loving welcome filled with smiles.

text: it 's all arty and jazzy and people sit and stare and turn away from one another instead of talking and it 's all about the silences and if you 're into that , have at it .
translation: 一切都是艺术的、爵士的，人们坐着凝视，彼此转过身去而不是交谈，所有的一切都是关于沉默的，如果你喜欢这样，就尽情享受吧。
back_translation: Everything is artistic, jazzy; people sit and stare, turning away from each other instead of talking. Everything is about silence. If you like it this way, then enjoy it to the fullest.

text: an old-fashioned drama of substance about a teacher 's slide down the slippery slope of dishonesty after an encounter with the rich and the powerful who have nothing but disdain for virtue .
translation: 一部关于老师在与富人和权力者接触后，逐渐滑向不诚实滑坡的老派剧情，这些富人和权力者对美德充满藐视。
back_translation: A classic storyline about a teacher who gradually slides into dishonesty after coming into contact with the rich and powerful, who hold a contempt for virtue.

text: another useless recycling of a brutal mid - '70s american sports movie .
translation: 又是一部无用的回收，改编自70年代中期的美国体育电影。
back_translation: Another useless remake, adapted from a 1970s American sports film.

text: the kind of movie that leaves vague impressions and a nasty aftertaste but little clear memory of its operational mechanics .
translation: 这种电影给人留下模糊的印象和糟糕的余味，但对其运作机制记忆模糊。
back_translation: This type of movie leaves a vague impression and a bad aftertaste, but memories of its workings are unclear.

text: hartley adds enough quirky and satirical touches in the screenplay to keep the film entertaining .
translation: 哈特利在剧本中增添了足够的古怪和讽刺元素，使电影保持娱乐性。
back_translation: Hartley added enough quirky and satirical elements to the script to keep the film entertaining.

text: as literary desecrations go , this makes for perfectly acceptable , occasionally very enjoyable children 's entertainment .
translation: 作为文学的亵渎，这可以说是完全可以接受的，有时非常愉快的儿童娱乐。
back_translation: As a desecration of literature, this can be said to be completely acceptable and sometimes a very pleasant children's entertainment.

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering .
translation: 这部令人难以忍受的电影旨在让你思考存在的痛苦。
back_translation: This unbearable movie is designed to make you contemplate the suffering of existence.

text: goofy , nutty , consistently funny .
translation: 傻乎乎的，古怪的，一直很好笑的。
back_translation: Silly, quirky, and always very funny.

text: two big things are missing -- anything approaching a visceral kick , and anything approaching even a vague reason to sit through it all .
translation: 有两个重要的东西缺失了——任何接近直接冲击的体验，以及任何接近可以让人坐下来耐心看完整个过程的模糊理由。
back_translation: Two important things are missing—any experience close to a direct impact, and any vague reason that allows one to sit down patiently and watch the entire process unfold.

text: if `` lilo & stitch '' is n't the most edgy piece of disney animation to hit the silver screen , then this first film to use a watercolor background since `` dumbo '' certainly ranks as the most original in years .
translation: 如果《小美人鱼》不是迪士尼动画史上最前卫的作品，那么这部自《大象丹布》以来首部使用水彩背景的影片无疑是近年来最具原创性的作品。
back_translation: If "The Little Mermaid" is not the most avant-garde work in Disney animation history, then this film, the first to use watercolor backgrounds since "Dumbo," is undoubtedly the most original work in recent years.

text: while it has definite weaknesses -- like a rather unbelievable love interest and a meandering ending -- this '60s caper film is a riveting , brisk delight .
translation: 尽管它确实有一些弱点——比如令人难以置信的爱情线和一个游离的结局——这部60年代的盗窃片却是一部引人入胜、节奏明快的乐趣。
back_translation: Despite having some weaknesses—such as an unbelievable romantic subplot and a loose ending—this heist film from the 1960s is an engaging and fast-paced joy.

text: it 's a talking head documentary , but a great one .
translation: 这是一部访谈式纪录片，但是一部很棒的作品。
back_translation: This is an interview-style documentary, but it is a great work.

text: an extremely unpleasant film .
translation: 一部极其不愉快的电影。
back_translation: An extremely unpleasant movie.

text: director juan jose campanella could have turned this into an argentine retread of `` iris '' or `` american beauty , '' but instead pulls a little from each film and creates something more beautiful than either of those films .
translation: 导演胡安·何塞·坎潘娜不仅可能将这部电影变成阿根廷版的《虹膜》或《美国丽人》，而是从每部电影中汲取一些元素，创造出比这两部电影更美丽的作品。
back_translation: Director Juan José Campanella may not only turn this film into the Argentine version of "Iris" or "American Beauty," but also draw elements from each film to create a work that is even more beautiful than both.

text: not good enough to pass for a litmus test of the generation gap and not bad enough to repulse any generation of its fans .
translation: 不够好到可以作为代沟的试金石，但也不至于让任何一代的粉丝感到反感。
back_translation: Not good enough to serve as a touchstone for generational gaps, but also not so bad as to make fans of any generation feel disgusted.

text: after seeing the film , i can tell you that there 's no other reason why anyone should bother remembering it .
translation: 看完这部电影后，我可以告诉你，没人有其他理由去记住它。
back_translation: After watching this movie, I can tell you that no one has any other reason to remember it.

text: it stars schticky chris rock and stolid anthony hopkins , who seem barely in the same movie .
translation: 它星光熠熠，分别由搞笑的克里斯·洛克和严肃的安东尼·霍普金斯主演，他们似乎几乎不在同一部电影里。
back_translation: It sparkles with starlight and is respectively starred by the comedic Chris Rock and the serious Anthony Hopkins, who seem almost not to be in the same movie.

text: merely -lrb- and literally -rrb- tosses around sex toys and offers half-hearted paeans to empowerment that are repeatedly undercut by the brutality of the jokes , most at women 's expense .
translation: 仅仅是 -lrb- 而且字面上 -rrb- 在玩弄性玩具，并提供半心半意的赞歌来表 empowerment，这些都被玩笑的残酷性不断削弱，许多关于女性的笑话。
back_translation: It's just -lrb- and literally -rrb- playing with sex toys and offering half-hearted praise to provide empowerment, all of which is constantly undermined by the cruelty of jokes, many of which are about women.

text: terrible .
translation: 糟糕。
back_translation: Oh no.

text: throwing in everything except someone pulling the pin from a grenade with his teeth , windtalkers seems to have ransacked every old world war ii movie for overly familiar material .
translation: 《风语者》似乎把每部老旧的二战电影中那些过于熟悉的素材都翻了一遍，除了有人用牙齿拔掉手榴弹的引信。
back_translation: "Windtalkers" seems to have gone through every familiar element from old World War II movies, except for someone using their teeth to pull the pin from a grenade.

text: chai 's structure and pacing are disconcertingly slack .
translation: 柴的结构和节奏令人感到不安地松散。
back_translation: The structure and rhythm of the poem feel unsettlingly loose.

text: if you grew up on scooby -- you 'll love this movie .
translation: 如果你从小看《斯库比》，你一定会喜欢这部电影。
back_translation: If you grew up watching Scooby, you will definitely enjoy this movie.

text: enjoyably fast-moving , hard-hitting documentary .
translation: 令人愉快的快速推进、锐利有力的纪录片。
back_translation: A delightful, fast-paced, and sharp documentary.

text: if you come from a family that eats , meddles , argues , laughs , kibbitzes and fights together , then go see this delightful comedy .
translation: 如果你来自一个一起吃饭、插嘴、争吵、欢笑、闲聊和打架的家庭，那么去看看这部精彩的喜剧。
back_translation: If you come from a family where you eat together, interrupt each other, argue, laugh, chat, and fight, then go watch this wonderful comedy.

text: the director mostly plays it straight , turning leys ' fable into a listless climb down the social ladder .
translation: 导演大多采取直接的方式，将丽斯的寓言变成了一场无精打采的社会阶梯下滑。
back_translation: Most directors take a direct approach, turning Liz's fable into a lackluster descent down the social ladder.

text: millions of dollars heaped upon a project of such vast proportions need to reap more rewards than spiffy bluescreen technique and stylish weaponry .
translation: 数百万美元投入到如此庞大的项目中，应该收获比华丽的蓝屏技术和时尚武器更多的回报。
back_translation: Millions of dollars invested in such a large project should yield more returns than just flashy blue screen technology and stylish weapons.

text: any film that does n't even in passing mention political prisoners , poverty and the boat loads of people who try to escape the country is less a documentary and more propaganda by way of a valentine sealed with a kiss .
translation: 任何一部甚至连提及政治犯、贫困和试图逃离这个国家的大量人们的电影，既不像是一部纪录片，更像是一封带着吻印的情书式宣传。
back_translation: Any film that even mentions political prisoners, poverty, and the large number of people trying to escape this country is less like a documentary and more like a letter of propaganda sealed with a kiss.

text: it 's depressing to see how far herzog has fallen .
translation: 看到赫尔佐格堕落得如此之远让人感到沮丧。
back_translation: It's frustrating to see Herzog fall so far.

text: some episodes work , some do n't .
translation: 有些剧集有效，有些无效。
back_translation: Some series are effective, while others are not.

text: like its new england characters , most of whom wander about in thick clouds of denial , the movie eventually gets around to its real emotional business , striking deep chords of sadness .
translation: 就像它的新英格兰角色，大多数人游荡在浓厚的否认云雾中，这部电影最终触及了其真正的情感核心，敲响了深沉的悲伤音符。
back_translation: Like its New England setting, the majority of people wander through a thick fog of denial, but the film ultimately touches its true emotional core, striking a deep note of sorrow.

text: all the more disquieting for its relatively gore-free allusions to the serial murders , but it falls down in its attempts to humanize its subject .
translation: 尽管它相对无血腥地提及连环谋杀案，但这使人感到更加不安；不过在试图人性化其主题时却显得拙劣。
back_translation: Although it mentions serial murders relatively bloodlessly, it feels even more unsettling; however, it appears clumsy in its attempt to humanize its themes.

text: a film of empty , fetishistic violence in which murder is casual and fun .
translation: 一部充满空洞、恋物癖暴力的电影，谋杀显得随意而有趣。
back_translation: A film filled with emptiness and fetishistic violence, where murder appears to be casual and amusing.

text: for those in search of something different , wendigo is a genuinely bone-chilling tale .
translation: 对于那些寻找不同体验的人来说，《温迪戈》是一部真正令人毛骨悚然的故事。
back_translation: For those seeking a different experience, "Wendigo" is a truly spine-chilling story.

text: disappointing in comparison to other recent war movies ... or any other john woo flick for that matter .
translation: 与其他近期战争电影相比令人失望或者说任何其他吴宇森的电影。
back_translation: Disappointing compared to other recent war films... or any other John Woo film, for that matter.

text: it 's a familiar story , but one that is presented with great sympathy and intelligence .
translation: 这是一个熟悉的故事，但以极大的同情心和智慧呈现出来。
back_translation: This is a familiar story, but presented with great compassion and wisdom.

text: becomes a fascinating study of isolation and frustration that successfully recreates both the physical setting and emotional tensions of the papin sisters .
translation: 成为一个引人入胜的孤立和挫折的研究，成功地重现了帕平姐妹的物理环境和情感紧张。
back_translation: It has become an engaging study of isolation and frustration, successfully recreating the physical environment and emotional tension of the Papin sisters.

text: murderous maids pulls no punches in its depiction of the lives of the papin sister and the events that led to their notorious rise to infamy ...
translation: 《谋杀女仆》毫不掩饰地描绘了帕平姐妹的生活及其声名狼藉的成名事件
back_translation: "Murder of a Maid" unabashedly depicts the lives of the Phipps sisters and their infamous rise to prominence...

text: it 's not nearly as fresh or enjoyable as its predecessor , but there are enough high points to keep this from being a complete waste of time .
translation: 它远没有前作那么新鲜或令人愉悦，但还算有足够的亮点，让这不会完全浪费时间。
back_translation: It is far from being as fresh or enjoyable as its predecessor, but it still has enough highlights to make it not a complete waste of time.

text: the movie does n't add anything fresh to the myth .
translation: 这部电影没有为这个神话增添任何新意。
back_translation: This movie did not add any new elements to the myth.

text: it is n't that stealing harvard is a horrible movie -- if only it were that grand a failure !
translation: 这并不是说《盗窃哈佛》是一部可怕的电影——如果它真有那么大的失败就好了！
back_translation: This is not to say that "Stealing Harvard" is a terrible movie—if it were that much of a failure, it would be better!

text: the script falls back on too many tried-and-true shenanigans that hardly distinguish it from the next teen comedy .
translation: 这个剧本依赖于太多老套的把戏，几乎无法将其与下一部青少年喜剧区分开来。
back_translation: This script relies too much on clichéd tricks, making it nearly impossible to distinguish it from the next teen comedy.

text: a rote exercise in both animation and storytelling .
translation: 一个在动画和叙事方面的机械练习。
back_translation: A mechanical exercise in animation and narrative.

text: in his latest effort , storytelling , solondz has finally made a movie that is n't just offensive -- it also happens to be good .
translation: 在他最新的作品《讲故事》中，索隆兹终于制作了一部不仅仅是让人反感的电影——它还是一部好的作品。
back_translation: In his latest work "Telling Stories," Sorons has finally created a film that is not just off-putting—it is also a good piece of art.

text: enough is not a bad movie , just mediocre .
translation: 《足够》不是一部糟糕的电影，只是平庸。
back_translation: "Enough" is not a terrible movie, just mediocre.

text: a smart , sassy and exceptionally charming romantic comedy .
translation: 一部聪明、机智且极具魅力的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A clever, witty, and highly charming romantic comedy.

text: stuffy , full of itself , morally ambiguous and nothing to shout about .
translation: 沉闷，自以为是，道德模糊，毫无值得大声叫嚷的地方。
back_translation: Dull, self-righteous, morally ambiguous, and lacking anything worth shouting about.

text: reyes ' directorial debut has good things to offer , but ultimately it 's undone by a sloppy script
translation: 雷耶斯的导演处女作有一些值得称道的地方，但最终还是被马虎的剧本所毁。
back_translation: Reyes' directorial debut has some commendable aspects, but ultimately it is ruined by a careless script.

text: it wears its heart on the sleeve of its gaudy hawaiian shirt .
translation: 它把心思表现在华丽的夏威夷衬衫的袖子上。
back_translation: It expresses its thoughts through the sleeves of a flashy Hawaiian shirt.

text: it 's a spectacular performance - ahem , we hope it 's only acting .
translation: 这是一次壮观的表演——咳咳，我们希望这只是演戏。
back_translation: This is a spectacular performance—cough cough, we hope this is just acting.

text: ... the film 's considered approach to its subject matter is too calm and thoughtful for agitprop , and the thinness of its characterizations makes it a failure as straight drama . '
translation: 这部电影对其主题的考虑方法太冷静和深思熟虑，不适合激进宣传，而其角色刻画的薄弱使其作为正剧的表现失败。
back_translation: The film's approach to its themes is too calm and thoughtful for radical propaganda, and its weak character portrayal leads to failure in its performance as a serious drama.

text: symbolically , warm water under a red bridge is a celebration of feminine energy , a tribute to the power of women to heal .
translation: 象征性地，红桥下的温水是对女性能量的庆祝，向女性疗愈的力量致敬。
back_translation: Symbolically, the warm water beneath the red bridge is a celebration of feminine energy, paying tribute to the healing power of women.

text: you come away from his film overwhelmed , hopeful and , perhaps paradoxically , illuminated .
translation: 你看完他的电影后，感到无比震撼、充满希望，也许还有些矛盾地，心灵得到启迪。
back_translation: After watching his movie, you feel incredibly shocked, filled with hope, and perhaps somewhat paradoxically, your soul is enlightened.

text: equlibrium could pass for a thirteen-year-old 's book report on the totalitarian themes of 1984 and farenheit 451 .
translation: 《均衡》可以算作一个十三岁孩子关于《1984》和《华氏451度》中极权主义主题的书面报告。
back_translation: "Balance" can be considered a written report by a thirteen-year-old child on the theme of totalitarianism in "1984" and "Fahrenheit 451."

text: a film of delicate interpersonal dances .
translation: 一部关于微妙人际舞蹈的电影。
back_translation: A film about the subtle dance of interpersonal relationships.

text: -lrb- westbrook -rrb- makes a wonderful subject for the camera .
translation: #NAME?
back_translation: #NAME?

text: cusack 's just brilliant in this .
translation: 库萨克在这部作品中表现得真棒。
back_translation: Kusak performed wonderfully in this work.

text: what a bewilderingly brilliant and entertaining movie this is .
translation: 这是一部令人困惑又精彩的娱乐电影。
back_translation: This is a confusing yet captivating entertainment film.

text: never lets go your emotions , taking them to surprising highs , sorrowful lows and hidden impulsive niches ... gorgeous , passionate , and at times uncommonly moving .
translation: 永远不要放手你的情感，它们会带你走向令人惊讶的高峰，悲伤的低谷和隐秘的冲动角落华丽、充满激情，有时异常感人。
back_translation: Never let go of your emotions; they will lead you to astonishing heights, sorrowful lows, and hidden corners of impulse... Magnificent, passionate, and sometimes extraordinarily moving.

text: few films have captured the chaos of an urban conflagration with such fury , and audience members will leave feeling as shaken as nesbitt 's cooper looks when the bullets stop flying .
translation: 少数影片能如此激烈地捕捉城市大火的混乱，观众在子弹停止飞扬时离场时将感受到和内斯比特的库珀一样的震撼。
back_translation: Few films can capture the chaos of a city fire so intensely, and viewers will leave feeling a shock similar to that of Cooper in "Nesbit" when the bullets stop flying.

text: ferrara 's best film in years .
translation: 费拉拉多年最佳影片。
back_translation: Best Film of the Year in Ferrara.

text: we have poignancy jostling against farce , thoughtful dialogue elbowed aside by one-liners , and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason except , maybe , that it looks neat .
translation: 我们有情感深刻与荒诞的冲突，深思熟虑的对话被一句句冷笑话挤开，还有一种视觉风格，融入了旋转动画，似乎没有其他明显的理由，除了可能看起来很酷。
back_translation: We have a profound conflict between emotions and absurdity, thoughtful dialogues are pushed aside by cold jokes, and there is a visual style that incorporates rotating animations, seemingly for no other reason than that it might look cool.

text: watching war photographer , you come to believe that nachtwey hates the wars he shows and empathizes with the victims he reveals .
translation: 观看《战争摄影师》时，你会相信纳赫特维厄对他展现的战争感到厌恶，并对他揭示的受害者心生同情。
back_translation: When watching "War Photographer," you will believe that Nachtwey feels disgust towards the war he depicts and sympathy for the victims he reveals.

text: you 'd be hard put to find a movie character more unattractive or odorous -lrb- than leon -rrb- .
translation: 你很难找到一个比里昂更不讨喜或更臭的电影角色了。
back_translation: It's hard to find a film character more unlikable or more odious than Lyon.

text: what soured me on the santa clause 2 was that santa bumps up against 21st century reality so hard , it 's icky .
translation: 让我对《圣诞老人2》感到不满的是，圣诞老人如此强烈地碰撞到21世纪的现实，这让我觉得很糟糕。
back_translation: What makes me dissatisfied with "Santa Claus 2" is that Santa Claus collides so strongly with the realities of the 21st century, which makes me feel terrible.

text: ash wednesday is not edward burns ' best film , but it is a good and ambitious film .
translation: 《灰星期三》不是爱德华·伯恩斯最好的电影，但它是一部好且雄心勃勃的电影。
back_translation: "Gray Wednesday" is not Edward Burns' best film, but it is a good and ambitious film.

text: the lead actors share no chemistry or engaging charisma .
translation: 主要演员之间没有化学反应或引人入胜的魅力。
back_translation: There is no chemistry or captivating charm between the main actors.

text: ms. phoenix is completely lacking in charm and charisma , and is unable to project either esther 's initial anomie or her eventual awakening .
translation: 菲尼克斯小姐完全缺乏魅力和个性，无法展现埃丝特最初的无所适从或她最终的觉醒。
back_translation: Miss Phoenix is completely lacking in charm and personality, failing to portray Esther's initial confusion or her eventual awakening.

text: when not wallowing in its characters ' frustrations , the movie is busy contriving false , sitcom-worthy solutions to their problems .
translation: 当不沉溺于角色的挫折时，这部电影忙于为他们的问题设计虚假的、类似情景喜剧的解决方案。
back_translation: When not dwelling on the frustrations of the characters, the film is busy devising false, sitcom-like solutions to their problems.

text: polished , well-structured film .
translation: 精致且结构良好的电影。
back_translation: A refined and well-structured film.

text: the laughs are as rare as snake foo yung .
translation: 笑声像蛇发饼一样稀少。
back_translation: Laughter is as rare as a snake's hair pancake.

text: an eloquent , reflective and beautifully acted meditation on both the profoundly devastating events of one year ago and the slow , painful healing process that has followed in their wake .
translation: 一部深思熟虑、优雅动人且演技出色的冥想，既反映了去年深刻而毁灭性的事件，也表达了在这些事件之后缓慢而痛苦的愈合过程。
back_translation: A thoughtful, elegantly moving meditation that reflects on the profound and devastating events of last year while also expressing the slow and painful healing process that follows.

text: but there 's plenty to offend everyone ...
translation: 但有很多让每个人都感到不快的事情
back_translation: But there are many things that make everyone feel uncomfortable...

text: after that it becomes long and tedious like a classroom play in a college history course .
translation: 之后，它变得漫长而乏味，就像大学历史课程中的一场课堂剧。
back_translation: After that, it became long and tedious, like a classroom play in a college history course.

text: an exceptionally acted , quietly affecting cop drama .
translation: 一部表演异常出色、默默感人的警匪剧。
back_translation: An exceptionally outstanding and quietly touching police and criminal drama.

text: one of the best films i have ever seen , constantly pulling the rug from underneath us , seeing things from new sides , plunging deeper , getting more intense .
translation: 我见过的最好的电影之一，不断从我们脚下抽走地毯，从新的角度看事物，深入探讨，愈发强烈。
back_translation: One of the best movies I've ever seen, constantly pulling the rug out from under us, looking at things from new angles, exploring deeply, and becoming increasingly intense.

text: stitch is a bad mannered , ugly and destructive little \*\*\*\* .
translation: 斯蒂奇是个举止粗鲁、丑陋且具有破坏性的家伙。
back_translation: Stitch is a rude, ugly, and destructive guy.

text: an intelligently made -lrb- and beautifully edited -rrb- picture that at the very least has a spark of life to it -- more than you can say for plenty of movies that flow through the hollywood pipeline without a hitch .
translation: 一部制作精良（并且剪辑得非常美丽）的影片，至少有一丝生气——这比许多顺利通过好莱坞流水线的电影要强得多。
back_translation: A well-made film (with beautifully edited footage) has at least a hint of vitality—this is far better than many films that smoothly pass through the Hollywood assembly line.

text: charlie hunnam has the twinkling eyes , repressed smile and determined face needed to carry out a dickensian hero .
translation: 查理·汉纳姆拥有闪烁的眼睛、压抑的微笑和坚定的面容，正是诠释狄更斯英雄所需的特质。
back_translation: Charlie Hunnam has sparkling eyes, a repressed smile, and a resolute face, embodying the qualities needed to portray a Dickensian hero.

text: what should have been a painless time-killer becomes instead a grating endurance test .
translation: 原本应该是一个轻松消磨时间的活动，反而变成了一场令人烦恼的耐力测试。
back_translation: What should have been a relaxing way to pass the time turned into a frustrating test of endurance.

text: the film has -lrb- its -rrb- moments , but they are few and far between .
translation: 这部电影有一些时刻，但是寥寥无几。
back_translation: This movie has some moments, but they are few and far between.

text: if religious films are n't your bailiwick , stay away .
translation: 如果宗教电影不是你的兴趣所在，那就远离它吧。
back_translation: If religious movies are not your interest, then stay away from them.

text: this enthralling documentary ... is at once playful and haunting , an in-depth portrait of an iconoclastic artist who was fundamentally unknowable even to his closest friends .
translation: 这部引人入胜的纪录片既充满趣味又令人难忘，深入刻画了一位颠覆传统的艺术家，即便是他最亲近的朋友对他也无法完全了解。
back_translation: This captivating documentary is both intriguing and unforgettable, providing an in-depth portrait of a groundbreaking artist who remains incomprehensible even to his closest friends.

text: a wild , endearing , masterful documentary .
translation: 一部狂野、动人心弦、技艺高超的纪录片。
back_translation: A wild, gripping, and skillfully crafted documentary.

text: a dreadful day in irish history is given passionate , if somewhat flawed , treatment .
translation: 爱尔兰历史上一个可怕的日子得到了充满激情的处理，尽管有些缺陷。
back_translation: A terrible day in Irish history was dealt with passionately, despite some flaws.

text: the april 2002 instalment of the american war for independence , complete with loads of cgi and bushels of violence , but not a drop of human blood .
translation: 2002年4月的《美国独立战争》分期作品，配备大量CGI和成吨的暴力，但没有一滴人类鲜血。
back_translation: The April 2002 installment of "The American Revolutionary War" features extensive CGI and tons of violence, but not a drop of human blood.

text: if there was any doubt that peter o'fallon did n't have an original bone in his body , a rumor of angels should dispel it .
translation: 如果还有人怀疑彼得·奥法隆没有一丝原创的才华，那么关于天使的谣言应该会消除这种怀疑。
back_translation: If there are still people who doubt Peter O'Fallon's originality, then the rumors about angels should dispel that doubt.

text: there is something in full frontal , i guess , about artifice and acting and how it distorts reality for people who make movies and watch them , but like most movie riddles , it works only if you have an interest in the characters you see .
translation: 我想，关于人工和表演，完全正面地展现了一些东西，以及它如何扭曲对于制作电影和观看电影的人的现实，但像大多数电影谜题一样，只有当你对所看到的人物感兴趣时，它才会奏效。
back_translation: I think it completely presents something about artificiality and performance in a positive light, as well as how it distorts the reality for those who create and watch films. But like most cinematic puzzles, it only works if you're interested in the characters you see.

text: a minor-league soccer remake of the longest yard .
translation: 一部小联盟足球版的《长庭}.
back_translation: A small league soccer version of "The Long Pavilion."

text: ` it 's painful to watch witherspoon 's talents wasting away inside unnecessary films like legally blonde and sweet home abomination , i mean , alabama . '
translation: 观看惠特斯普恩的才华在《合法金发》和《甜蜜家园阿巴马》等不必要的电影中浪费，真是令人痛心。
back_translation: It is truly heartbreaking to see Reese Witherspoon's talent wasted in unnecessary films like "Legally Blonde" and "Sweet Home Alabama."

text: it 's absolutely amazing how first-time director kevin donovan managed to find something new to add to the canon of chan .
translation: 第一次执导的凯文·多诺万能够为成龙的作品增添新的元素，真是令人惊叹。
back_translation: It's amazing that Kevin Donofrio's first directorial effort can add new elements to Jackie Chan's work.

text: it 's as raw and action-packed an experience as a ringside seat at a tough-man contest .
translation: 这是一种原始而充满动作的体验，就像在一个硬汉比赛的坐席旁边一样。
back_translation: This is a raw and action-filled experience, just like being next to the seats in a tough guy competition.

text: to me , it sounds like a cruel deception carried out by men of marginal intelligence , with reactionary ideas about women and a total lack of empathy .
translation: 在我看来，这听起来像是一些智力边缘的人所实施的残忍欺骗，他们对女性持有反动的想法，完全缺乏同理心。
back_translation: In my opinion, this sounds like a cruel deception perpetrated by some intellectually marginal individuals who hold reactionary views towards women and are completely devoid of empathy.

text: you wo n't have any trouble getting kids to eat up these veggies .
translation: 你不会有任何问题让孩子们吃这些蔬菜。
back_translation: You won't have any problems getting the kids to eat these vegetables.

text: too bland and fustily tasteful to be truly prurient .
translation: 过于淡而无味且古板，无法真正变得淫秽。
back_translation: Too bland and stiff to truly become obscene.

text: it does n't work as either .
translation: 它也不起作用。
back_translation: It doesn't work either.

text: this one aims for the toilet and scores a direct hit .
translation: 这次瞄准厕所，直接命中。
back_translation: This time it aimed at the toilet and hit it directly.

text: in the name of an allegedly inspiring and easily marketable flick , the emperor 's club turns a blind eye to the very history it pretends to teach .
translation: 在一部 allegedly inspiring 和易于营销的电影的名义下，《皇帝的俱乐部》对它所假装教授的历史视而不见。
back_translation: Under the guise of an allegedly inspiring and easily marketable film, "The Emperor's Club" turns a blind eye to the history it pretends to teach.

text: the movie is undone by a filmmaking methodology that 's just experimental enough to alienate the mainstream audience while ringing cliched to hardened indie-heads .
translation: 这部电影被一种制作方法所破坏，这种方法足够实验性，以至于使主流观众感到疏离，同时对老练的独立电影爱好者来说又显得陈词滥调。

text: two tedious acts light on great scares and a good surprise ending .

text: the film has the thrown-together feel of a summer-camp talent show : hastily written , underrehearsed , arbitrarily plotted and filled with crude humor and vulgar innuendo .

text: sharp edges and a deep vein of sadness run through its otherwise comic narrative .
translation: 尖锐的边缘和深深的悲伤贯穿于其原本滑稽的叙述中。

text: crush is so warm and fuzzy you might be able to forgive its mean-spirited second half .
translation: 这部影片的前半部分如此温暖和可爱，以至于你可能会原谅它后半部分的恶意。

text: strong filmmaking requires a clear sense of purpose , and in that oh-so-important category , the four feathers comes up short .
translation: 优秀的电影制作需要明确的目标，而在这个至关重要的类别中，《四根羽毛》显得不足。

text: the best didacticism is one carried by a strong sense of humanism , and bertrand tavernier 's oft-brilliant safe conduct -lrb- `` laissez-passer '' -rrb- wears its heart on its sleeve .
translation: 最好的教育主义是由强烈的人文主义所驱动的，而贝特朗·塔韦尼尔的这部常常闪耀光芒的《通行证》（“ laissez-passer”）则是将其内心表露无遗。
back_translation: The best educational philosophy is driven by a strong humanism, and Bertrand Tavernier's often shining film "Laissez-passer" reveals this inner sentiment in full.

text: i have returned from the beyond to warn you : this movie is 90 minutes long , and life is too short .
translation: 我从彼岸归来警告你：这部电影时长90分钟，而人生太短暂。

text: ... despite lagging near the finish line , the movie runs a good race , one that will have you at the edge of your seat for long stretches . '
translation: 尽管在接近终点时有所滞后，这部电影仍然跑得很好，让你在很长一段时间内都坐立不安。
back_translation: Despite slowing down near the end, the film still runs well and keeps you on the edge of your seat for a long time.

text: witty and often surprising , a dark little morality tale disguised as a romantic comedy .
translation: 聪明而常常令人惊讶，这是一部伪装成浪漫喜剧的阴暗小道德故事。

text: they 're the unnamed , easily substitutable forces that serve as whatever terror the heroes of horror movies try to avoid .

back_translation: They are the unnamed, easily replaceable forces, and it is these forces that form the various fears that the heroes of horror films attempt to avoid.

text: spain 's greatest star wattage does n't overcome the tumult of maudlin tragedy .

text: director jay russell stomps in hobnail boots over natalie babbitt 's gentle , endearing 1975 children 's novel .
translation: 导演杰伊·拉塞尔穿着钉靴怒气冲冲地走过纳塔莉·巴比特1975年的温柔而动人的儿童小说。

text: colorful , energetic and sweetly whimsical ... the rare sequel that 's better than its predecessor .

translation: 对一个病态而邪恶的女人的自命不凡且最终空洞的审视。

text: a small movie with a big heart .
translation: 一部小电影，却有着大大的心。

translation: 玛吉·G在她的首个主演角色中取得了令人惊叹的突破，抢尽风头。

text: most of the movie is so deadly dull that watching the proverbial paint dry would be a welcome improvement .

text: -lrb- the cockettes -rrb- provides a window into a subculture hell-bent on expressing itself in every way imaginable . '

text: most thrillers send audiences out talking about specific scary scenes or startling moments ; `` frailty '' leaves us with the terrifying message that the real horror may be waiting for us at home .
translation: 大多数惊悚片让观众讨论具体的恐怖场景或令人震惊的时刻；而《虚弱》则给我们留下了一个可怕的信息：真正的恐怖可能在家中等待着我们。
back_translation: Most thrillers prompt viewers to discuss specific scary scenes or shocking moments; however, "The Weakness" leaves us with a terrifying message: true horror may be waiting for us at home.

text: the difference between cho and most comics is that her confidence in her material is merited .
translation: 与大多数漫画不同的是，Cho对她的素材的自信是有根据的。

text: this remake of lina wertmuller 's 1975 eroti-comedy might just be the biggest husband-and-wife disaster since john and bo derek made the ridiculous bolero .
translation: 这部翻拍自丽娜·韦尔图默1975年 erotic-comedy 的电影，可能是自约翰和波·德瑞克拍摄荒唐的《博雷罗》以来，最大的一桩夫妻灾难。

text: -lrb- a -rrb- poorly executed comedy .
translation: （一部）执行得很差的喜剧。

text: holland lets things peter out midway , but it 's notably better acted -- and far less crass - than some other recent efforts in the burgeoning genre of films about black urban professionals .
translation: 荷兰的作品往往在中途渐渐平淡，但表演明显更好，而且比一些近期关于黑人城市职业人士这一新兴类型电影的粗俗作品要好得多。

text: maintains your sympathy for this otherwise challenging soul by letting you share her one-room world for a while .
translation: 通过让你分享她独居的世界一段时间，维持了你对这个以外挑战性的灵魂的同情。

text: tends to pile too many `` serious issues '' on its plate at times , yet remains fairly light , always entertaining , and smartly written .
translation: 有时倾向于在其议题上堆积过多的“严肃问题”，然而仍然保持相当轻松，总是充满娱乐性，并且写得很聪明。

text: -lrb- russell -rrb- makes good b movies -lrb- the mask , the blob -rrb- , and the scorpion king more than ably meets those standards .

text: mr. clooney , mr. kaufman and all their collaborators are entitled to take a deep bow for fashioning an engrossing entertainment out of an almost sure-fire prescription for a critical and commercial disaster .
translation: 克鲁尼先生、考夫曼先生及他们所有的合作者理应深深鞠躬，因为他们将几乎注定要在评论和商业上遭遇灾难的题材，打造出了引人入胜的娱乐作品。

text: it would be churlish to begrudge anyone for receiving whatever consolation that can be found in dragonfly , yet it is impossible to find the film anything but appalling , shamelessly manipulative and contrived , and totally lacking in conviction .
translation: 对任何人因蜻蜓而获得的安慰心怀妒忌是无礼的，但无论如何，这部电影都让人无法找到任何令人满意之处，完全令人失望，赤裸裸地操控观众，做作而且完全缺乏信念。
back_translation: It is undignified to be jealous of anyone's comfort derived from a dragonfly, but in any case, this movie leaves nothing satisfactory to find, is completely disappointing, manipulates the audience blatantly, is pretentious, and utterly lacks conviction.

text: both deserve better .
translation: 他们都值得更好的。

text: slap me , i saw this movie .
translation: 打我，我看过这部电影。

text: a coming-of-age tale from new zealand whose boozy , languid air is balanced by a rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances across the board .
translation: 一部来自新西兰的成长故事，酒意浓厚、氛围悠闲，通过丰富的视觉清晰度和深情的表演保持了平衡。
back_translation: A coming-of-age story from New Zealand, rich in wine and relaxed in atmosphere, balanced by its rich visual clarity and heartfelt performances.

text: ` it 's better to go in knowing full well what 's going to happen , but willing to let the earnestness of its execution and skill of its cast take you down a familiar road with a few twists .
translation: 最好在明白即将发生的事情的情况下去看，但也愿意让其执行的真诚和演员的技艺带你走上一条 familiar 的道路，同时有一些曲折。
back_translation: It’s best to watch with an understanding of what’s about to happen, but also be willing to let the sincerity of the performances and the actors' skills take you on a familiar path, albeit with some twists and turns.

translation: 一幅令人震惊的地狱肖像，让人无法摆脱。

translation: 绝望地愚蠢、毫无幽默感且缺乏灵感。

text: bogdanich is unashamedly pro-serbian and makes little attempt to give voice to the other side .

text: like a pack of dynamite sticks , built for controversy .
translation: 像一包炸药棒，注定引发争议。

text: take any 12-year-old boy to see this picture , and he 'll be your slave for a year .
translation: 带任何一个12岁的男孩去看这张图片，他会成为你一年的奴隶。

text: miyazaki 's nonstop images are so stunning , and his imagination so vivid , that the only possible complaint you could have about spirited away is that there is no rest period , no timeout .
translation: 宫崎骏的不间断画面如此惊人，他的想象力如此生动，以至于你唯一可能对《千与千寻》提出的抱怨就是没有休息的时间，没有暂停。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki's uninterrupted visuals are so astounding, and his imagination is so vivid that the only complaint you might have about "Spirited Away" is that there is no time to rest, no pauses.

text: stage director sam mendes showcases tom hanks as a depression era hit-man in this dark tale of revenge .

text: veret茅 has a whip-smart sense of narrative bluffs .
translation: vereté 具有敏锐的叙事虚实感。

text: ponderous , plodding soap opera disguised as a feature film .
translation: 沉重乏味的肥皂剧伪装成一部故事片。
back_translation: A heavy and tedious soap opera disguised as a feature film.

text: gets the look and the period trappings right , but it otherwise drowns in a sea of visual and verbal clich茅s .

text: director roger kumble offers just enough sweet and traditional romantic comedy to counter the crudity .
translation: 导演罗杰·坎布尔提供了足够甜蜜和传统的浪漫喜剧，以抵消粗俗。
back_translation: Director Roger Campbell delivers a sufficiently sweet and traditional romantic comedy to offset the vulgarity.

text: a bittersweet contemporary comedy about benevolent deception , which , while it may not rival the filmmaker 's period pieces , is still very much worth seeing .
translation: 一部关于善意欺骗的苦乐参半的当代喜剧，尽管可能无法与该导演的历史剧相媲美，但仍然非常值得一看。
back_translation: A contemporary comedy about benevolent deception that is bittersweet; although it may not compare to the director's historical dramas, it is still very much worth watching.

text: gorgeous to look at but insufferably tedious and turgid ... a curiously constricted epic .
translation: 美丽的外表却无比乏味和沉闷一个奇怪而狭隘的史诗。

text: then again , in a better movie , you might not have noticed .
translation: 不过，在一部更好的电影中，你可能就不会注意到了。

translation: 一个相当愉快的混合体，既有《最长 Yard》的元素，又有1999年盖·里奇的《偷天换日》。

text: the re - enactments , however fascinating they may be as history , are too crude to serve the work especially well .
translation: 这些重演虽然在历史上非常迷人，但对于这项工作来说过于粗糙。

text: if a horror movie 's primary goal is to frighten and disturb , then they works spectacularly well ... a shiver-inducing , nerve-rattling ride .
translation: 如果一部恐怖片的主要目标是让人感到害怕和不安，那么它们的效果非常显著如同一次令人毛骨悚然、神经紧张的旅程。
back_translation: If the main aim of a horror movie is to evoke feelings of fear and unease, then they are extremely effective... much like a chilling, nerve-wracking journey.

text: oedekerk mugs mercilessly , and the genuinely funny jokes are few and far between .
translation: 欧德克恶搞无情，而真正搞笑的笑话寥寥无几。
back_translation: Obscure jokes are ruthless, while truly funny jokes are few and far between.

text: often silly -- and gross -- but it 's rarely as moronic as some campus gross-out films .
translation: 常常是傻乎乎的——而且恶心——但它很少像一些校园恶搞电影那样愚蠢。
back_translation: Often silly—and gross—but it's rarely as stupid as some campus prank movies.

text: spielberg 's first real masterpiece , it deserved all the hearts it won -- and wins still , 20 years later .
translation: 斯皮尔伯格的第一部真正的杰作，它值得赢得的所有赞誉——并且在20年后仍然继续赢得赞誉。
back_translation: Spielberg's first true masterpiece, it deserves all the accolades it has received—and continues to receive even 20 years later.

text: ... unlike -lrb- scorsese 's mean streets -rrb- , ash wednesday is essentially devoid of interesting characters or even a halfway intriguing plot .
translation: ... 与（斯科塞斯的《愤怒的街道》）不同，《灰色星期三》本质上缺乏有趣的角色，甚至没有一个半有趣的情节。
back_translation: Unlike Scorsese's "Mean Streets," "Gray Wednesday" essentially lacks interesting characters and doesn't even have a semi-interesting plot.

text: you may feel compelled to watch the film twice or pick up a book on the subject .
translation: 你可能会觉得有必要看这部电影两遍或拿本关于这个主题的书。
back_translation: You might feel it is necessary to watch this movie twice or read a book on this subject.

text: slow and ponderous , but rohmer 's drama builds to an intense indoor drama about compassion , sacrifice , and christian love in the face of political corruption .
translation: 缓慢而沉重，但罗默的戏剧发展成一场关于同情、牺牲和基督教之爱的紧张室内戏剧，面对政治腐败。
back_translation: Slow and heavy, but Romer's play develops into a tense indoor drama about empathy, sacrifice, and Christian love, in the face of political corruption.

text: sheridan 's take on the author 's schoolboy memoir ... is a rather toothless take on a hard young life .
translation: 谢里登对作者的学生时代回忆录的看法对一个艰难的年轻生活的描述显得有些无力。
back_translation: Sheridan's view on the author's memoir of their school days... the description of a difficult young life seems somewhat weak.

text: godard has never made a more sheerly beautiful film than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love , history , memory , resistance and artistic transcendence .
translation: 戈达尔从未制作过比这部意外感人的关于爱、历史、记忆、抵抗和艺术超越的思考更为纯粹美丽的电影。
back_translation: Godard has never made a more beautifully pure film than this unexpectedly touching reflection on love, history, memory, resistance, and the transcendence of art.

text: under-rehearsed and lifeless
translation: 排练不足且缺乏生气
back_translation: Insufficient rehearsal and lack of vitality.

text: the film offers an intriguing what-if premise .
translation: 这部电影提出了一个引人入胜的假设前提。
back_translation: This movie presents an intriguing hypothetical premise.

text: this 10th film in the series looks and feels tired .
translation: 这部系列的第十部电影看起来很疲惫。
back_translation: The tenth movie in this series looks tired.

text: you need n't be steeped in '50s sociology , pop culture or movie lore to appreciate the emotional depth of haynes ' work .
translation: 你不需要深入了解50年代的社会学、流行文化或电影传说，就能欣赏海恩斯作品的情感深度。
back_translation: You don't need to have a deep understanding of the sociology, popular culture, or cinematic legends of the 1950s to appreciate the emotional depth of Haines' work.

text: rarely have i seen a film so willing to champion the fallibility of the human heart .
translation: 我很少看到一部如此愿意为人心的脆弱辩护的电影。
back_translation: I rarely see a movie that is so willing to defend the vulnerability of the human heart.

text: a witty , low-key romantic comedy .
translation: 一部机智、低调的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A clever and low-key romantic comedy.

text: what enlivens this film , beyond the astute direction of cardoso and beautifully detailed performances by all of the actors , is a note of defiance over social dictates .
translation: 使这部电影充满活力的，不仅是卡多索的精明导演和所有演员精美细致的表演，还有对社会规范的反抗之音。
back_translation: What makes this film vibrant is not only Cardoso's sharp direction and the exquisite performances of all the actors, but also the voice of rebellion against social norms.

text: a delightful little film that revels in its own simplicity , mostly martha will leave you with a smile on your face and a grumble in your stomach .
translation: 一部令人愉悦的小电影，它陶醉于自身的简单，大多数情况下，《玛莎》会让你脸上挂着微笑，肚子里却有些不满。
back_translation: A delightful little film that revels in its simplicity, most of the time, "Martha" will leave a smile on your face while also leaving you somewhat dissatisfied inside.

text: it 's hard to quibble with a flick boasting this many genuine cackles , but notorious c.h.o. still feels like a promising work-in-progress .
translation: 很难对一部拥有这么多真诚笑声的电影挑剔，但臭名昭著的c.h.o.仍然感觉像是一部有潜力的未完成作品。
back_translation: It is hard to be critical of a film that has so many genuine laughs, but the notorious C.H.O. still feels like a potentially unfinished work.

text: a shoddy male hip hop fantasy filled with guns , expensive cars , lots of naked women and rocawear clothing .
translation: 一个粗糙的男性嘻哈幻想，充满枪支、昂贵的汽车、大量裸露的女性和Rocawear服装。
back_translation: A rough male hip-hop fantasy, filled with guns, expensive cars, plenty of naked women, and Rocawear clothing.

text: a strong and confident work which works so well for the first 89 minutes , but ends so horrendously confusing in the final two
translation: 一部强大而自信的作品，在前89分钟内表现得非常出色，但在最后两分钟却Ending得令人困惑。
back_translation: A powerful and confident work that performs excellently for the first 89 minutes, but ends in a confusing way in the last two minutes.

text: even the hastily and amateurishly drawn animation can not engage .
translation: 即使是匆忙和业余水平绘制的动画也无法引起兴趣。
back_translation: Even animations created in a hurry and at an amateur level fail to attract interest.

text: with ` bowling for columbine , ' michael moore gives us the perfect starting point for a national conversation about guns , violence , and fear .
translation: 通过《为哥伦拜恩保龄球》，迈克尔·摩尔为我们提供了一个关于枪支、暴力和恐惧的全国对话的完美起点。
back_translation: Through "Bowling for Columbine," Michael Moore provides us with a perfect starting point for a national dialogue about guns, violence, and fear.

text: i liked it just enough .
translation: 我只是刚好喜欢它。
back_translation: I just happen to like it.

text: it 's the funniest american comedy since graffiti bridge .
translation: 这是自《涂鸦桥》以来 funniest的美国喜剧。
back_translation: This is the funniest American comedy since "The Graffiti Bridge."

text: after an uncertain start , murder hits and generally sustains a higher plateau with bullock 's memorable first interrogation of gosling .
translation: 在一个不确定的开局之后，《谋杀》迎来了高潮，并在布洛克对戈斯林的难忘第一次审问中保持了较高的水平。
back_translation: After an uncertain start, "Murder" reached its climax and maintained a high level during Brock's unforgettable first interrogation of Gosling.

text: although devoid of objectivity and full of nostalgic comments from the now middle-aged participants , dogtown and z-boys has a compelling story to tell .
translation: 尽管缺乏客观性，并充满了来自如今中年参与者的怀旧评论，但《狗镇和Z男孩》有一个引人入胜的故事要讲述。
back_translation: Despite its lack of objectivity and being filled with nostalgic comments from today's middle-aged participants, "Dog Town and Z-Boys" has an engaging story to tell.

text: ... a delicious crime drama on par with the slickest of mamet .
translation: ... 一部与最精致的马梅特作品相媲美的美味犯罪剧。
back_translation: ... A delicious crime drama that rivals the finest works of Mamet.

text: on top of a foundering performance , -lrb- madonna 's -rrb- denied her own athleticism by lighting that emphasizes every line and sag .
translation: 在一场表现不佳的基础上，-lrb- 麦当娜 -rrb- 通过强调每一条线条和下垂的灯光，否认了她自己运动能力的存在。
back_translation: Based on a poor performance, -lrb- Madonna -rrb- denied the existence of her own athletic ability by emphasizing every line and drooping light.

text: on the surface a silly comedy , scotland , pa would be forgettable if it were n't such a clever adaptation of the bard 's tragic play .
translation: 乍一看，《苏格兰，PA》是一部愚蠢的喜剧，但如果不是它对莎士比亚悲剧的巧妙改编，它可能会被遗忘。
back_translation: At first glance, "Scotland, PA" seems like a silly comedy, but it might have been forgotten if it weren't for its clever adaptation of Shakespearean tragedy.

text: mostly works because of the universal themes , earnest performances ... and excellent use of music by india 's popular gulzar and jagjit singh .
translation: 主要是因为普遍的主题、真挚的表演以及印度著名的古尔扎尔和贾吉特·辛格出色的音乐使用。
back_translation: Mainly due to the universal themes, sincere performances... and the excellent use of music by India's renowned Gulzar and Jagjit Singh.

text: about the only thing to give the movie points for is bravado -- to take an entirely stale concept and push it through the audience 's meat grinder one more time .
translation: 这部电影唯一值得称道的就是它的勇气——将一个完全陈旧的概念再一次推向观众的“肉铡”。
back_translation: The only commendable aspect of this movie is its courage—to once again push a completely outdated concept onto the audience's "meat grinder."

text: but the performances of pacino , williams , and swank keep the viewer wide-awake all the way through .
translation: 但阿尔帕西诺、罗宾威廉姆斯和希拉里斯万克的表演让观众始终保持清醒。
back_translation: But the performances of Al Pacino, Robin Williams, and Hilary Swank kept the audience awake throughout.

text: a boring , pretentious muddle that uses a sensational , real-life 19th-century crime as a metaphor for -- well , i 'm not exactly sure what -- and has all the dramatic weight of a raindrop .
translation: 一个无聊、做作的混乱，以19世纪真实的犯罪事件作为隐喻——嗯，我不太确定是什么——而且它的戏剧性重压就像一滴雨水一样轻。
back_translation: A boring, pretentious mess, using a real crime event from the 19th century as a metaphor—well, I'm not quite sure what for—yet its dramatic weight feels as light as a drop of rain.

text: far from heaven is a dazzling conceptual feat , but more than that , it 's a work of enthralling drama .
translation: 《远离天堂》是一项令人眼花缭乱的概念创作，但更重要的是，它是一部引人入胜的戏剧作品。
back_translation: "Far from Heaven" is a dazzling concept creation, but more importantly, it is an engaging dramatic work.

text: blessed with a searing lead performance by ryan gosling -lrb- murder by numbers -rrb- , the movie is powerful and provocative .
translation: 这部电影有瑞安·高斯林（《数字谋杀》）的出色表演，既强大又引人深思。
back_translation: This film features an outstanding performance by Ryan Gosling (from "Digital Murder") that is both powerful and thought-provoking.

text: the film desperately sinks further and further into comedy futility .
translation: 影片绝望地越来越陷入喜剧的徒劳之中。
back_translation: The film increasingly sinks into the futility of comedy in a desperate manner.

text: it almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in amusing us .
translation: 这部电影似乎更关心的是自我娱乐，而不是取悦我们。
back_translation: This movie seems more concerned with self-entertainment rather than pleasing us.

text: a low-rent retread of the alien pictures .
translation: 廉价翻拍的外星人电影。
back_translation: A cheaply made remake of an alien movie.

text: it merely indulges in the worst elements of all of them .
translation: 它仅仅沉溺于它们所有最糟糕的元素。
back_translation: It simply indulges in all of their worst elements.

text: there 's none of the happily-ever - after spangle of monsoon wedding in late marriage -- and that 's part of what makes dover kosashvili 's outstanding feature debut so potent .
translation: 在晚婚中没有季风婚礼那种欢快幸福的结局闪光——这正是多弗·科萨什维利出色的导演处女作如此强大的原因之一。
back_translation: The absence of the joyful and happy ending typical of a monsoon wedding in Late Marriage is one of the reasons why Dover Koshashvili's outstanding directorial debut is so powerful.

text: the entire film is one big excuse to play one lewd scene after another .
translation: 整部电影无非是一个大借口，不断上演一幕又一幕的淫秽场景。
back_translation: The entire movie is nothing more than a big excuse, constantly presenting scene after scene of obscene acts.

text: a fascinating examination of the joyous , turbulent self-discovery made by a proper , middle-aged woman .
translation: 对一位端庄的中年女性所经历的欢愉与动荡的自我发现进行迷人的探讨。
back_translation: A captivating exploration of the joys and turmoils of self-discovery experienced by a poised middle-aged woman.

text: has an unmistakable , easy joie de vivre .
translation: 有一种 unmistakable 和简单的生活乐趣。
back_translation: There is an unmistakable and simple joy in life.

text: it 's a rare window on an artistic collaboration .
translation: 这是对艺术合作的一个罕见窗口。
back_translation: This is a rare opportunity for artistic collaboration.

text: report card : does n't live up to the exalted tagline - there 's definite room for improvement .
translation: 成绩单：未能达到崇高的标语——还有明显的提升空间。
back_translation: Transcript: Did not meet the lofty slogan - there is still significant room for improvement.

text: too intensely focused on the travails of being hal hartley to function as pastiche , no such thing is hartley 's least accessible screed yet .
translation: 过于专注于哈尔·哈特利所经历的痛苦，无法作为一种模仿存在，这仍然是哈特利最难以接近的作品。
back_translation: Too focused on the suffering experienced by Hal Hartley, it cannot exist as a form of imitation; this remains Hartley's most inaccessible work.

text: a backstage must-see for true fans of comedy .
translation: 真正喜爱喜剧的粉丝们必看的幕后景点。
back_translation: A must-see behind-the-scenes spot for true comedy fans.

text: it 's got the brawn , but not the brains .
translation: 它有力量，但没有智慧。
back_translation: It has power, but no wisdom.

text: lacks dramatic punch and depth .
translation: 缺乏戏剧性的冲击力和深度。
back_translation: Lacks dramatic impact and depth.

text: it may be a no-brainer , but at least it 's a funny no-brainer .
translation: 这可能是个显而易见的事情，但至少这是个有趣的显而易见的事情。
back_translation: This may be an obvious thing, but at least it's an interesting obvious thing.

text: like the excruciating end of days , collateral damage presents schwarzenegger as a tragic figure , but sympathy really belongs with any viewer forced to watch him try out so many complicated facial expressions .
translation: 就像痛苦的末日，附带损害将施瓦辛格呈现为一个悲剧人物，但同情真正属于任何被迫观看他尝试如此多复杂面部表情的观众。
back_translation: Like a painful ending, collateral damage presents Schwarzenegger as a tragic figure, but sympathy truly belongs to any audience forced to watch him attempt so many complex facial expressions.

text: a great cast and a wonderful but sometimes confusing flashback movie about growing up in a dysfunctional family .
translation: 一部演员阵容强大、精彩但有时令人困惑的闪回电影，讲述在一个功能失调家庭中成长的故事。
back_translation: A powerful cast and exciting yet sometimes confusing flashback film that tells the story of growing up in a dysfunctional family.

text: ozpetek offers an aids subtext , skims over the realities of gay sex , and presents yet another tired old vision of the gay community as an all-inclusive world where uptight , middle class bores like antonia can feel good about themselves .
translation: 奥兹佩特的作品提供了一个艾滋病的潜在主题，回避了同性性行为的现实，并呈现了对同性恋社区又一个陈旧的视野，描绘了一个包容的世界，让那些紧张的中产阶级无聊人士如安东尼亚可以感到自我满足。
back_translation: Ozpetek's work presents a potential theme of AIDS, avoiding the reality of homosexual behavior and offering yet another outdated perspective on the LGBTQ community, depicting an inclusive world that allows anxious middle-class bored individuals like Antonietta to feel self-satisfied.

text: the leads are so unmemorable , despite several attempts at lengthy dialogue scenes , that one eventually resents having to inhale this gutter romancer 's secondhand material .
translation: 这些主角太没有记忆点了，尽管尝试了几次冗长的对话场景，但最终还是让人厌倦不得不接受这个低劣爱情小说家的二手素材。
back_translation: These protagonists are too forgettable. Despite several attempts at lengthy dialogue scenes, it ultimately becomes tedious, forcing one to accept the second-hand material of a mediocre romance novelist.

text: a relative letdown .
translation: 相对的失望。
back_translation: Relative disappointment.

text: from its nauseating spinning credits sequence to a very talented but underutilized supporting cast , bartleby squanders as much as it gives out .
translation: 从令人作呕的旋转片头到非常有才华但被低估的配角，巴特尔比浪费的东西和给予的东西一样多。
back_translation: From the nauseating spinning opening to the incredibly talented yet underrated supporting roles, Bartel wastes as much as he gives.

text: a realistically terrifying movie that puts another notch in the belt of the long list of renegade-cop tales .
translation: 一部现实主义的恐怖电影，给叛逆警察故事的漫长列表再添一笔。
back_translation: A realist horror film adds another entry to the long list of rebellious cop stories.

text: brings an irresistible blend of warmth and humor and a consistent embracing humanity in the face of life 's harshness .
translation: 带来了不可抗拒的温暖和幽默感，以及在生活严酷面前始终拥抱人性的态度。
back_translation: Brought an irresistible warmth and sense of humor, as well as a steadfast embrace of humanity in the face of life's harsh realities.

text: inconsequential road-and-buddy pic .
translation: 无关紧要的道路和朋友的照片。
back_translation: Unimportant roads and photos of friends.

text: it 's been 13 months and 295 preview screenings since i last walked out on a movie , but resident evil really earned my indignant , preemptive departure .
translation: 距我上次走出电影院已经过去了13个月和295场预上映，而《生化危机》确实让我感到愤慨，以至于提前离场。
back_translation: It's been 13 months and 295 previews since I last walked out of a cinema, and "Resident Evil" truly outraged me to the point where I left early.

text: the leanest and meanest of solondz 's misanthropic comedies .
translation: 索隆兹最精简且最尖刻的厌世喜剧。
back_translation: Zoronz's most concise and sharpest misanthropic comedy.

text: about schmidt belongs to nicholson .
translation: 关于施密特的事情属于尼科尔森。
back_translation: The matter concerning Schmidt pertains to Nicholson.

text: its metaphors are opaque enough to avoid didacticism , and the film succeeds as an emotionally accessible , almost mystical work .
translation: 它的隐喻足够晦涩，以避免说教主义，这部电影作为一部情感上可接近的、几乎神秘的作品而成功。
back_translation: Its metaphors are obscure enough to avoid didacticism, and the film succeeds as an emotionally accessible, almost mystical work.

text: starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking time bombs and other hollywood-action cliches .
translation: 开始时是一个紧张的政治和心理惊悚片，但被定时炸弹和其他好莱坞动作陈词滥调所破坏。
back_translation: It starts as a tense political and psychological thriller, but is undermined by a ticking bomb and other Hollywood action clichés.

text: even if it pushes its agenda too forcefully , this remains a film about something , one that attempts and often achieves a level of connection and concern .
translation: 即使它推进其议程过于激烈，这仍是一部关于某种事物的电影，它试图并且常常实现一定程度的联系和关切。
back_translation: Even if it advances its agenda too aggressively, it is still a film about something that attempts and often achieves a certain level of connection and concern.

text: the film is grossly contradictory in conveying its social message , if indeed there is one .
translation: 这部电影在传达其社会信息时严重自相矛盾，即使确实存在这样一个信息。
back_translation: This movie is seriously self-contradictory in conveying its social message, even if such a message does exist.

text: daringly perceptive , taut , piercing and feisty , biggie and tupac is undeniably subversive and involving in its bold presentation .
translation: 《大gie与小pac》无疑在大胆的呈现中颠覆且引人入胜，具有大胆的洞察力、紧张感、穿透力和活力。
back_translation: "The Big GIE and Little PAC" undoubtedly captivates and subverts with its bold presentation, characterized by daring insights, tension, depth, and vitality.

text: boyd 's screenplay -lrb- co-written with guardian hack nick davies -rrb- has a florid turn of phrase that owes more to guy ritchie than the bard of avon .
translation: 博伊德的剧本（与《卫报》记者尼克·戴维斯共同创作）用词华丽，语气更像是盖·里奇，而非阿登的莎士比亚。
back_translation: Boyd's script (co-written with Guardian journalist Nick Davies) uses ornate language and has a tone more akin to Guy Ritchie than Arden's Shakespeare.

text: not about scares but a mood in which an ominous , pervasive , and unknown threat lurks just below the proceedings and adds an almost constant mindset of suspense .
translation: 不是关于恐怖，而是一种氛围，在这种氛围中，潜伏着一种不祥、普遍而未知的威胁，恰好在事件进行之下，给人带来几乎持续的悬念感。
back_translation: It's not about horror, but rather an atmosphere in which there lurks an ominous, pervasive, and unknown threat, creating an almost continuous sense of suspense amid the unfolding events.

text: this deeply spiritual film taps into the meaning and consolation in afterlife communications .
translation: 这部深具灵性的电影触及了关于来世交流的意义和安慰。
back_translation: This deeply spiritual film touches on the significance and comfort of communication with the afterlife.

text: i know that i 'll never listen to marvin gaye or the supremes the same way again
translation: 我知道我再也不会以同样的方式听马文·盖伊或最高乐团的歌曲了。
back_translation: I know that I will never listen to songs by Marvin Gaye or The Supremes in the same way again.

text: a big , loud , bang-the-drum bore .
translation: 一个大声、吵闹、令人厌烦的人。
back_translation: A loud, noisy, annoying person.

text: horrendously amateurish filmmaking that is plainly dull and visually ugly when it is n't incomprehensible .
translation: 可怕的业余电影制作，明显乏味且视觉上丑陋，且在无法理解的时候更加糟糕。
back_translation: Terrible amateur filmmaking, obviously dull and visually ugly, and even worse when it's incomprehensible.

text: after collateral damage , you might imagine that most every aggrieved father clich茅 has been unturned .
translation: 在附带损害之后，你可能会想象大多数受到委屈的父亲的陈词滥调已经被翻转了一遍。
back_translation: After the collateral damage, you might imagine that most of the clichés of wronged fathers have already been turned upside down.

text: predictable storyline and by-the-book scripting is all but washed away by sumptuous ocean visuals and the cinematic stylings of director john stockwell .
