text: bursting through the constraints of its source , this is one adapted - from-television movie that actually looks as if it belongs on the big screen .
translation: 突破了来源的限制，这是一部改编自电视电影的作品，实际上看起来就像是属于大银幕的。
back_translation: Breaking the limitations of its source, this is a work adapted from a television movie, and it actually looks like it belongs on the big screen.

text: even with all its botches , enigma offers all the pleasure of a handsome and well-made entertainment .
translation: 尽管经历了种种失误，《谜》仍然提供了优雅且精良的娱乐体验。
back_translation: Despite experiencing various mishaps, "The Riddle" still offers an elegant and high-quality entertainment experience.

text: the images lack contrast , are murky and are frequently too dark to be decipherable .
translation: 这些图像缺乏对比度，模糊不清，且常常太暗，无法辨认。
back_translation: These images lack contrast, are unclear, and are often too dark to be recognizable.

text: there 's real visual charge to the filmmaking , and a strong erotic spark to the most crucial lip-reading sequence .
translation: 影片的视觉冲击力非常强烈，而在最关键的读唇片段中则蕴含着强烈的性感火花。
back_translation: The visual impact of the film is very strong, and in the most crucial lip-reading segment, there is a strong spark of sensuality.

text: if you 're in the right b-movie frame of mind , it may just scare the pants off you .
translation: 如果你正处于合适的B级电影心境中，它可能会把你吓得裤子都脱掉。
back_translation: If you're in the right mood for a B-grade movie, it might scare you so much that you'll lose your pants.

text: city by the sea is a gritty police thriller with all the dysfunctional family dynamics one could wish for .
translation: 《海边城市》是一部充满张力的警察惊悚片，展现了所有可以想象的功能失调家庭动态。
back_translation: "Seaside City" is a tense police thriller that showcases all imaginable dysfunctional family dynamics.

text: dismally dull sci-fi comedy .
translation: 悲惨沉闷的科幻喜剧。
back_translation: A tragic and depressing sci-fi comedy.

text: it 's weird , wonderful , and not necessarily for kids .
translation: 这很奇怪，很美妙，并不一定适合孩子。
back_translation: This is very strange, very wonderful, but it may not necessarily be suitable for children.

text: executed with such gentle but insistent sincerity , with such good humor and appreciation of the daily grind that only the most hardhearted scrooge could fail to respond .
translation: 以如此温柔却坚定的真诚，伴随着如此良好的幽默感和对日常生活的欣赏，唯有最无情的守财奴才能不作回应。
back_translation: With such gentle yet firm sincerity, accompanied by such a great sense of humor and appreciation for everyday life, only the most heartless miser could remain unresponsive.

text: maybe he was reading the minds of the audience .
translation: 也许他在读观众的心思。
back_translation: Perhaps he is reading the audience's thoughts.

text: grenier is terrific , bringing an unforced , rapid-fire delivery to toback 's heidegger - and nietzsche-referencing dialogue .
translation: 格雷尼尔表现出色，带来了自然而流畅的快速对话，引用了托巴克的海德格尔和尼采。
back_translation: Grenier performed outstandingly, bringing a natural and fluid rapid conversation, referencing Toback's Heidegger and Nietzsche.

text: burns ' fifth beer-soaked film feels in almost every possible way -- from the writing and direction to the soggy performances -- tossed off .
translation: 伯恩斯的第五部醉酒电影在几乎所有方面都感觉到了一种潦草——从写作和导演到沉闷的表演。
back_translation: Burns' fifth drunken film feels hasty in almost every aspect—from the writing and direction to the dull performances.

text: less the sensational true-crime hell-jaunt purists might like and more experimental in its storytelling -lrb- though no less horrifying for it -rrb- .
translation: 较少让嗜好真实犯罪的纯粹主义者喜欢的轰动，而在叙事上更具实验性——尽管因此并不减少其恐怖性。
back_translation: Less sensationalism that pure enthusiasts of true crime like, and a more experimental narrative—though this does not diminish its horror.

text: it 's not so much a movie as a joint promotion for the national basketball association and teenaged rap and adolescent poster-boy lil ' bow wow .
translation: 这部电影不太像是一部电影，更像是国家篮球协会与青少年说唱歌手、青年偶像小鲍威尔的联合宣传。
back_translation: This movie doesn't quite feel like a film; it seems more like a joint promotion between the NBA and the young rapper and youth idol, Lil Bow Wow.

text: it labours as storytelling .
translation: 它作为讲故事而辛苦工作。
back_translation: It works hard as a storyteller.

text: a first-class road movie that proves you can run away from home , but your ego and all your problems go with you .
translation: 一部一流的公路电影，证明了你可以离家出走，但你的自我和所有问题都会跟随你。
back_translation: A top-notch road movie that proves you can run away from home, but your true self and all your problems will follow you.

text: the nonstop artifice ultimately proves tiresome , with the surface histrionics failing to compensate for the paper-thin characterizations and facile situations .
translation: 不断的做作最终显得让人厌倦，表面的戏剧性未能弥补角色描写肤浅和情节简单的缺陷。
back_translation: Constant pretentiousness ultimately becomes tiresome, and the superficial drama fails to compensate for the shallow character portrayal and simplistic plot deficiencies.

text: it makes me say the obvious : abandon all hope of a good movie ye who enter here .
translation: 让人不得不说出明显的话：进入这里的你们，放弃对好电影的所有希望吧。
back_translation: It must be said clearly: those of you who enter here, abandon all hope of good movies.

text: festers in just such a dungpile that you 'd swear you were watching monkeys flinging their feces at you .
translation: 就在这样的粪堆里发酵，你会发誓自己是在看猴子把粪便扔向你。
back_translation: In the midst of such a pile of dung, you would swear that you are watching monkeys throw feces at you.

text: yes , i have given this movie a rating of zero .
translation: 是的，我给这部电影的评分是零分。
back_translation: Yes, I give this movie a score of zero.

text: a buoyant romantic comedy about friendship , love , and the truth that we 're all in this together .
translation: 一部关于友谊、爱情和我们共同面对这一切真相的轻松浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A light-hearted romantic comedy about friendship, love, and the truths we face together.

text: the locations go from stark desert to gorgeous beaches .
translation: 这些地点从荒凉的沙漠到迷人的海滩。
back_translation: These locations range from desolate deserts to charming beaches.

text: an acceptable way to pass a little over an hour with moviegoers ages 8-10 , but it 's unlikely to inspire anything more than a visit to mcdonald 's , let alone some savvy street activism .
translation: 对于8-10岁的小观众来说，花一个多小时观看这部电影是可以接受的，但不太可能激发出更多的热情，除了去麦当劳吃个饭，更别提什么聪明的街头行动了。
back_translation: For young viewers aged 8 to 10, spending over an hour watching this movie is acceptable, but it is unlikely to spark much enthusiasm beyond going to McDonald's for a meal, let alone any clever street actions.

text: those who are n't put off by the film 's austerity will find it more than capable of rewarding them .
translation: 那些不被影片的简朴所打扰的人，将会发现它能够给他们带来更多的回报。
back_translation: Those who are not disturbed by the simplicity of the film will find that it can bring them more rewards.

text: has nothing good to speak about other than the fact that it is relatively short , tries its best to hide the fact that seagal 's overweight and out of shape .
translation: 除了相对较短这一点外，几乎没有什么好说的，尽力掩饰西格尔超重和状态不佳的事实。
back_translation: Aside from being relatively short, there is almost nothing good to say, as efforts are made to cover up the fact that Sigel is overweight and in poor condition.

text: like a three-ring circus , there are side stories aplenty -- none of them memorable .
translation: 像一个三环马戏团一样，有许多次要故事——其中没有一个令人难忘。
back_translation: Like a three-ring circus, there are many secondary stories—none of which are memorable.

text: a fascinating literary mystery story with multiple strands about the controversy of who really wrote shakespeare 's plays .
translation: 一个迷人的文学悬疑故事，涉及多个线索，关于谁真正写了莎士比亚的戏剧的争议。
back_translation: A captivating literary mystery story involving multiple clues, about the controversy over who truly wrote Shakespeare's plays.

text: just too silly and sophomoric to ensnare its target audience .
translation: 太傻和幼稚，无法吸引其目标观众。
back_translation: Too foolish and immature to attract its target audience.

text: ... one of the more influential works of the ` korean new wave ' .
translation: ... 韩国新潮流中更具影响力的作品之一。
back_translation: ... one of the more influential works in the new trend of South Korea.

text: the closest thing to the experience of space travel
translation: 最接近太空旅行体验的事物
back_translation: The closest experience to space travel.

text: right now , they 're merely signposts marking the slow , lingering death of imagination .
translation: 现在，它们只是标志着想象力缓慢而持续死亡的路标。
back_translation: Now, they are just signposts marking the slow and steady death of imagination.

text: while easier to sit through than most of jaglom 's self-conscious and gratingly irritating films , it 's still tainted by cliches , painful improbability and murky points .
translation: 虽然比贾格隆大多数自觉且令人恼怒的电影更容易观看，但它仍然受到陈词滥调、令人痛苦的不可能性和模糊观点的影响。
back_translation: Although it is easier to watch than most of Jagger's self-aware and annoying films, it is still affected by clichés, painfully impossible scenarios, and vague perspectives.

text: bon app茅tit !
translation: 祝您好胃口！
back_translation: Wishing you a good appetite!

text: as animation increasingly emphasizes the computer and the cool , this is a film that takes a stand in favor of tradition and warmth .
translation: 随着动画越来越强调计算机技术和酷炫风格，这是一部站在传统和温暖一边的电影。
back_translation: As animation increasingly emphasizes computer technology and flashy styles, this is a film that stands on the side of tradition and warmth.

text: boy , has this franchise ever run out of gas .
translation: 这部系列真是耗尽了创意。
back_translation: This series has really run out of creativity.

text: the film itself is about something very interesting and odd that would probably work better as a real documentary without the insinuation of mediocre acting or a fairly trite narrative .
translation: 这部电影本身讲述的是一些非常有趣和奇怪的事情，如果没有平庸的表演或相当陈腐的叙述，可能作为一部真实的纪录片效果会更好。
back_translation: The movie itself tells some very interesting and strange things, and it might have been more effective as a true documentary if it didn't have the mediocre performances or rather clichéd narration.

text: two hours of junk .
translation: 两个小时的垃圾。
back_translation: Two hours of garbage.

text: this is absolutely and completely ridiculous and an insult to every family whose mother has suffered through the horrible pains of a death by cancer .
translation: 这简直是完全荒谬，是对每一个经历母亲因癌症痛苦而去世的家庭的侮辱。
back_translation: This is simply completely absurd and an insult to every family that has experienced the pain of losing a mother to cancer.

text: i love the opening scenes of a wintry new york city in 1899 .
translation: 我喜欢1899年冬季纽约市的开场场景。
back_translation: I like the opening scene of New York City in the winter of 1899.

text: -lrb- d -rrb- espite its familiar subject matter , ice age is consistently amusing and engrossing ...
translation: 尽管它的题材很熟悉，《冰河世纪》依然始终让人感到有趣和吸引人
back_translation: Although its theme is very familiar, "Ice Age" still feels interesting and engaging.

text: though its rather routine script is loaded with familiar situations , the movie has a cinematic fluidity and sense of intelligence that makes it work more than it probably should .
translation: 尽管其相当常规的剧本充满了熟悉的情境，这部电影却展现了电影的流畅性和智慧感，使其效果超出了预期。
back_translation: Despite its rather conventional script filled with familiar situations, the film showcases a sense of fluidity and wit that makes its impact exceed expectations.

text: alternative medicine obviously has its merits ... but ayurveda does the field no favors .
translation: 替代医学显然有其优点但阿育吠陀并未给这一领域带来好处。
back_translation: Alternative medicine clearly has its advantages... but Ayurveda has not brought benefits to this field.

text: a living testament to the power of the eccentric and the strange .
translation: 一个活生生的证据，证明了奇特与怪异的力量。
back_translation: A living proof that demonstrates the power of the peculiar and the bizarre.

text: it 's not as awful as some of the recent hollywood trip tripe ... but it 's far from a groundbreaking endeavor .
translation: 它并不像最近一些好莱坞的垃圾那么糟糕但离突破性的成就还有很远。
back_translation: It's not as bad as some recent Hollywood garbage... but it is still far from being a groundbreaking achievement.

text: infidelity drama is nicely shot , well-edited and features a standout performance by diane lane .
translation: 不忠的戏剧拍摄精美，剪辑出色，并且戴安·兰德的表演非常出色。
back_translation: The drama "Betrayal" is beautifully filmed, excellently edited, and Diane Lane's performance is outstanding.

text: a soulless jumble of ineptly assembled cliches and pabulum that plays like a 95-minute commercial for nba properties .
translation: 一团没有灵魂的拼凑，不堪一击的陈词滥调和无聊内容，像是一部95分钟的NBA资产商业广告。
back_translation: A soulless patchwork, full of clichéd rhetoric and boring content, feels like a 95-minute commercial for NBA assets.

text: talkiness is n't necessarily bad , but the dialogue frequently misses the mark .
translation: 话多不一定是坏事，但对话常常未能命中要点。
back_translation: Talking a lot is not necessarily a bad thing, but conversations often fail to hit the point.

text: but the 2002 film does n't really believe in it , and breaks the mood with absurdly inappropriate ` comedy ' scenes .
translation: 但2002年的电影并不真心相信这一点，并且通过荒谬不合适的“喜剧”场景打破了气氛。
back_translation: However, the 2002 film does not genuinely believe this and breaks the atmosphere with absurd and inappropriate "comedy" scenes.

text: not so much farcical as sour .
translation: 不是那么滑稽，而是更为尖酸。
back_translation: It's not so funny, but rather more acerbic.

text: like life on the island , the movie grows boring despite the scenery .
translation: 就像岛上的生活一样，这部电影尽管风景优美，却变得无聊。
back_translation: Just like life on the island, this movie, despite its beautiful scenery, becomes boring.

text: the material and the production itself are little more than routine .
translation: 材料和生产本身只是例行公事而已。
back_translation: The materials and production themselves are just a routine affair.

text: aspires to the cracked lunacy of the adventures of buckaroo banzai , but thanks to an astonishingly witless script ends up more like the adventures of ford fairlane .
translation: 渴望追求《巴克鲁·邦泽的冒险》中那种疯狂的癫狂，但由于剧本惊人地愚蠢，最终更像是《福特·费尔雷恩的冒险》。
back_translation: Desiring to pursue the kind of crazed insanity found in "The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai," but due to the script being astonishingly foolish, it ultimately resembles "The Adventures of Ford Fairlane" more.

text: far more successful , if considerably less ambitious , than last year 's kubrick-meets-spielberg exercise .
translation: 比去年 "库布里克与斯皮尔伯格相遇 "的尝试成功得多，虽然雄心要少得多。
back_translation: The attempt at "Kubrick Meets Spielberg" is much more successful than last year, although it is also much less ambitious.

text: when it 's this rich and luscious , who cares ?
translation: 当它如此丰富美味时，谁在乎呢？
back_translation: When it is so rich and delicious, who cares?

text: informative , intriguing , observant , often touching ... gives a human face to what 's often discussed in purely abstract terms .
translation: 信息丰富、引人入胜、善于观察，常常感人为那些通常以纯粹抽象的方式讨论的事物赋予了人性。
back_translation: Informative, captivating, observant, and often moving... it gives humanity to things that are usually discussed in purely abstract ways.

text: a compelling pre-wwii drama with vivid characters and a warm , moving message .
translation: 一部引人入胜的二战前剧情剧，人物生动，传递温暖感人的信息。
back_translation: An engaging pre-World War II drama with vivid characters that conveys a warm and touching message.

text: a bizarre piece of work , with premise and dialogue at the level of kids ' television and plot threads as morose as teen pregnancy , rape and suspected murder
translation: 一部离奇的作品，前提和对话的水平像儿童电视节目，而情节线却阴郁得如同青少年怀孕、强奸和怀疑谋杀。
back_translation: A bizarre work, with premises and dialogue levels akin to children's television programs, yet the storyline is as grim as themes of teenage pregnancy, rape, and suspected murder.

text: at best , cletis tout might inspire a trip to the video store -- in search of a better movie experience .
translation: 充其量，克莱提斯·图特可能会激发一次去录像店的旅程——寻找更好的观影体验。
back_translation: At most, Claitis Tute may inspire a trip to the video store—searching for a better viewing experience.

text: skip this turd and pick your nose instead because you 're sure to get more out of the latter experience .
translation: 跳过这个废话，挖挖你的鼻子吧，因为你肯定能从后者的经历中获得更多。
back_translation: Skip this nonsense and pick your nose, because you'll definitely gain more from the latter's experience.

text: what a concept , what an idea , what a thrill ride .
translation: 多么一个概念，多么一个想法，多么刺激的游乐设施。
back_translation: What a concept, what an idea, what an exciting amusement ride.

text: unlike most surf movies , blue crush thrillingly uses modern technology to take the viewer inside the wave .
translation: 与大多数冲浪电影不同，《蓝色冲击》令人兴奋地利用现代科技让观众身临其境地感受波浪。
back_translation: Unlike most surfing movies, "Blue Shock" excitingly uses modern technology to immerse the audience in the experience of the waves.

text: be forewarned , if you 're depressed about anything before watching this film , you may just end up trying to drown yourself in a lake afterwards .
translation: 请注意，如果你在观看这部电影之前感到沮丧，之后你可能会试图在湖里淹死自己。
back_translation: Please note that if you feel frustrated before watching this movie, you might try to drown yourself in the lake afterwards.

text: it has become apparent that the franchise 's best years are long past .
translation: 显然，这个特许经营权的最佳年华早已过去。
back_translation: Clearly, the best days of this franchise are long gone.

text: it strikes hardest ... when it reminds you how pertinent its dynamics remain .
translation: 当它提醒你其动态依然如此重要时，打击最为强烈。
back_translation: The impact is strongest when it reminds you that its dynamics are still so important.

text: most consumers of lo mein and general tso 's chicken barely give a thought to the folks who prepare and deliver it , so , hopefully , this film will attach a human face to all those little steaming cartons .
translation: 大多数吃捞面和左宗棠鸡的消费者几乎没有考虑到那些准备和送餐的人，所以，希望这部电影能为那些小小的蒸汽餐盒附上一个人性的面孔。
back_translation: Most consumers who enjoy lo-mein and General Tso's chicken rarely consider the people who prepare and deliver their meals, so I hope this film can give a human face to those small steam containers.

text: even in terms of the low-grade cheese standards on which it operates , it never quite makes the grade as tawdry trash .
translation: 即使按照它所依赖的低劣奶酪标准，它也从未真正达到低俗垃圾的水平。
back_translation: Even according to the inferior cheese standards it relies on, it has never truly reached the level of vulgar trash.

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard -lrb- which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog -rrb- is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .
translation: 关于《偷哈佛》的最好的评价（可以称之为《弗雷迪被狗侵犯》）是，它没有汤姆·格林的《弗雷迪被指控》那么讨厌。
back_translation: The best评价 of "Stealing Harvard" (which could be called "Freddy Gets Dogged") is that it is not as annoying as Tom Green's "Freddy Got Fingered."

text: ill-considered , unholy hokum .
translation: 不加考虑的不圣之言。
back_translation: Unconsidered words of non-holiness.

text: it 's just merely very bad .
translation: 这只是非常糟糕。
back_translation: This is just very bad.

text: a flick about our infantilized culture that is n't entirely infantile .
translation: 一部关于我们幼稚文化的电影，但并非完全幼稚。
back_translation: A movie about our childish culture, but not completely childish.

text: rymer does n't trust laughs -- and does n't conjure proper respect for followers of the whole dead-undead genre , who deserve more from a vampire pic than a few shrieky special effects .
translation: 雷默不信任笑声，也对整个死与不死类型的追随者没有应有的尊重，他们值得在吸血鬼电影中得到更多，而不是一些尖叫的特效。
back_translation: Reimer does not trust laughter and has little respect for the entire genre of living and dead followers. They deserve more in vampire films than just some screaming special effects.

text: trying to make head or tail of the story in the hip-hop indie snipes is enough to give you brain strain -- and the pay-off is negligible .
translation: 在嘻哈独立小品中，试图搞清楚故事头尾足以让你脑力劳动过度——而收获微乎其微。
back_translation: In hip-hop indie pieces, trying to figure out the beginning and end of a story is enough to make you overthink, with little reward.

text: the film does give a pretty good overall picture of the situation in laramie following the murder of matthew shepard .
translation: 这部电影确实很好地描绘了马修·谢泼德被谋杀后拉勒米的整体情况。
back_translation: This film indeed depicts the overall situation in Laramie after Matthew Shepard was murdered very well.

text: this toothless dog , already on cable , loses all bite on the big screen .
translation: 这只无牙的狗已经被牵着，在大银幕上失去了所有攻击力。
back_translation: This toothless dog has been led around, losing all its aggressiveness on the big screen.

text: this rich , bittersweet israeli documentary , about the life of song-and-dance-man pasach ` ke burstein and his family , transcends ethnic lines .
translation: 这部丰富而苦涩的以色列纪录片，关于歌舞者帕萨赫·库尔斯坦及其家庭的生活，超越了民族界限。
back_translation: This rich and bittersweet Israeli documentary about the life of dancer Pasach Kurstan and his family transcends national boundaries.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .
translation: 博尔使用了大量快速剪辑和模糊的逐帧打印来增强效果，但傻乎乎的对话和有时不足的表演削弱了这种效果。
back_translation: Boll made extensive use of rapid editing and blurry frame printing to enhance the effect, but the silly dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances weakened this effect.

text: this 90-minute dud could pass for mike tyson 's e !
translation: 这部90分钟的烂片可以当作迈克·泰森的作品！
back_translation: This 90-minute terrible movie can be considered a work of Mike Tyson!

text: a generic family comedy unlikely to be appreciated by anyone outside the under-10 set .
translation: 一部普通的家庭喜剧，外面的人不太可能欣赏，尤其是十岁以下的观众。
back_translation: A typical family comedy that outsiders are unlikely to appreciate, especially viewers under ten.

text: an amateurish , quasi-improvised acting exercise shot on ugly digital video .
translation: 一场业余的、半即兴的表演练习，拍摄在劣质的数字视频上。
back_translation: An amateur, semi-improvised performance practice, filmed on low-quality digital video.

text: the very simple story seems too simple and the working out of the plot almost arbitrary .
translation: 这个非常简单的故事似乎过于简单，情节的发展几乎显得随意。

text: the elements were all there but lack of a pyschological center knocks it flat .
translation: 所有元素都在，但缺乏心理中心使其黯然失色。
back_translation: All elements are present, but the lack of a psychological center makes it dull.

text: exactly what its title implies : lusty , boisterous and utterly charming .
translation: 正如其标题所暗示的那样：热情洋溢、喧闹且极具魅力。

text: what remains is a variant of the nincompoop benigni persona , here a more annoying , though less angry version of the irresponsible sandlerian manchild , undercut by the voice of the star of road trip .
translation: 剩下的是一种傻瓜贝尼尼的人物形象，这里是一个更烦人但更少愤怒的、不负责任的桑德勒式大男孩版本，被公路旅行的明星的声音削弱了。
back_translation: The remainder is a character image of a foolish Benigni, presented as a more annoying but less angry, irresponsible Adam Sandler-style man-child, diminished by the voice of a road trip star.

text: cherish is a dud -- a romantic comedy that 's not the least bit romantic and only mildly funny .
translation: 《珍爱》是一部失败的作品——一部既不浪漫又仅仅有点搞笑的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: "Dear Love" is a failed work—neither romantic nor particularly funny, just a little comedic romantic comedy.

text: heartwarming here relies less on forced air than on petter n忙ss ' delicate , clever direction ... and a wonderful , imaginative script by axel hellstenius .
translation: 温暖人心的这里更依赖于彼得·纳斯精致聪明的导演风格，而不是强迫的气息......以及阿克塞尔·赫尔斯泰纽斯的精彩富有想象力的剧本。
back_translation: What warms the heart here relies more on Peter Nash's exquisite and clever directorial style than on a forced atmosphere... as well as Axel Hertz's brilliant and imaginative script.

text: let 's see , a haunted house , a haunted ship , what 's next ... ghost blimp ?
translation: 让我们看看，一个闹鬼的房子，一个闹鬼的船，接下来是什么鬼气球？
back_translation: Let's see, a haunted house, a haunted ship, what comes next... a ghost balloon?

text: with its paint fights , motorized scooter chases and dewy-eyed sentiment , it 's a pretty listless collection of kid-movie clich茅s .
translation: 随着涂鸦大战、机动滑板车追逐和情感满满的画面，它实际上是一部乏味的儿童电影陈词滥调的集合。
back_translation: With the graffiti battles, scooter chases, and emotionally charged scenes, it is actually a collection of boring clichés typical of children's movies.

text: based on dave barry 's popular book of the same name , the movie benefits from having a real writer plot out all of the characters ' moves and overlapping story .
translation: 基于戴夫·巴里同名的畅销书，这部电影得益于有一位真正的编剧为所有角色的行动和重叠的故事绘制情节。
back_translation: Based on Dave Barry's bestselling book of the same name, the film benefits from having a real screenwriter to craft the plot for all the characters' actions and overlapping stories.

text: what 's missing is what we call the ` wow ' factor .
translation: 缺少的是我们所称的“哇”因素。
back_translation: What is missing is what we call the "wow" factor.

text: normally , rohmer 's talky films fascinate me , but when he moves his setting to the past , and relies on a historical text , he loses the richness of characterization that makes his films so memorable .
translation: 通常情况下，罗梅尔的对话电影让我着迷，但当他把背景设置在过去，并依赖于历史文本时，他失去了使他的电影如此难忘的角色刻画的丰富性。
back_translation: Usually, Romer's dialogue-driven films fascinate me, but when he sets the backdrop in the past and relies on historical texts, he loses the richness of character portrayal that makes his films so memorable.

text: even if it is generally amusing from time to time , i spy has all the same problems the majority of action comedies have .
translation: 即使它不时令人发笑，间谍也存在大多数动作喜剧所面临的所有问题。
back_translation: Even though it occasionally makes people laugh, "Spy" faces all the problems that most action comedies encounter.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .
translation: 你要留意那种开放感和小惊喜。

text: the urban landscapes are detailed down to the signs on the kiosks , and the color palette , with lots of somber blues and pinks , is dreamy and evocative .
translation: 城市景观细致入微，甚至包括亭子上的标志，色彩调色板充满阴郁的蓝色和粉色，梦幻而引人遐思。
back_translation: The urban landscape is intricately detailed, even including the signs on the pavilions, with a color palette filled with somber blues and pinks, dreamlike and thought-provoking.

text: the abiding impression , despite the mild hallucinogenic buzz , is of overwhelming waste -- the acres of haute couture ca n't quite conceal that there 's nothing resembling a spine here .
translation: 尽管有温和的迷幻效果，给人留下的深刻印象是压倒性的浪费——这些高定服装的大片土地并不能掩盖这里缺乏真正的核心。
back_translation: Despite the mild psychedelic effects, the overwhelming impression left is one of excessive waste—these vast areas of haute couture cannot conceal the lack of true substance here.

text: it throws quirky characters , odd situations , and off-kilter dialogue at us , all as if to say , `` look at this !
translation: 它向我们抛出古怪的字符、奇异的情境和不和谐的对话，仿佛在说：“看这个！”
back_translation: It throws at us strange characters, bizarre situations, and discordant dialogues, as if saying, "Look at this!"

text: alan and his fellow survivors are idiosyncratic enough to lift the movie above its playwriting 101 premise .
translation: 艾伦和他的幸存者伙伴们足够特立独行，使得这部电影超越了其剧本写作101的前提。

text: a film neither bitter nor sweet , neither romantic nor comedic , neither warm nor fuzzy .
translation: 一部既不苦涩也不甜蜜，既不浪漫也不喜剧，既不温暖也不模糊的电影。
back_translation: A film that is neither bitter nor sweet, neither romantic nor comedic, neither warm nor vague.

text: of all the halloween 's , this is the most visually unappealing .
translation: 在所有的万圣节中，这是最不具视觉吸引力的。
back_translation: Among all Halloween celebrations, this one is the least visually appealing.

text: light , silly , photographed with colour and depth , and rather a good time .
translation: 轻松、愚蠢，用色彩和深度拍摄，颇为愉快。
back_translation: Easy, silly, shot with color and depth, quite enjoyable.

text: it 's refreshing to see a romance this smart .
translation: 看到这么聪明的爱情故事真令人耳目一新。
back_translation: It's truly refreshing to see such a clever love story.

text: sodden and glum , even in those moments where it 's supposed to feel funny and light .
translation: 沉闷而阴郁，即使在那些应该感觉有趣和轻松的时刻。
back_translation: Dull and gloomy, even at moments that should feel interesting and relaxing.

text: with nary a glimmer of self-knowledge , -lrb- crane -rrb- becomes more specimen than character -- and auto focus remains a chilly , clinical lab report .
translation: 毫无自知之明，-lrb- 克兰 -rrb- 更像是一个标本而不是角色，而自动聚焦则保持着一种冷漠、医疗的实验室报告风格。

text: nothing about the film -- with the possible exception of elizabeth hurley 's breasts -- is authentic .
translation: 关于这部电影的内容——除了伊丽莎白·赫利的胸部可能算是例外——都不是真实的。
back_translation: Everything about this movie's content—aside from Elizabeth Hurley's breasts, which might be an exception—is not real.

text: a manically generous christmas vaudeville .
translation: 一个狂热慷慨的圣诞杂耍表演。
back_translation: A fanatical and generous Christmas juggling show.

text: the powder blues and sun-splashed whites of tunis make an alluring backdrop for this sensuous and spirited tale of a prim widow who finds an unlikely release in belly-dancing clubs .
translation: 突尼斯的粉蓝色和阳光洒落的白色为这个充满感性和活力的故事提供了迷人的背景，讲述了一位严谨的寡妇在肚皮舞俱乐部中意外找到解放的经历。
back_translation: The powder blue and sunlit white of Tunisia provide a charming backdrop for this sensual and vibrant story, which tells of a meticulous widow who unexpectedly finds freedom in a belly dance club.

text: with dickens ' words and writer-director douglas mcgrath 's even-toned direction , a ripping good yarn is told .
translation: 在狄更斯的文字和编剧导演道格拉斯·麦克格拉斯的平稳导演下，讲述了一个引人入胜的故事。
back_translation: Under the smooth direction of Dickens's writing and director Douglas McGrath, an engaging story is told.

text: i approached the usher and said that if she had to sit through it again , she should ask for a raise .
translation: 我走到引导员那里，对她说如果她还要再坐一遍的话，她应该要求加薪。

text: it makes you believe the cast and crew thoroughly enjoyed themselves and believed in their small-budget film .
translation: 这让你相信演员和工作人员非常享受他们的工作，并相信他们的小成本电影。
back_translation: This makes you believe that the actors and crew really enjoy their work and have faith in their low-budget film.

text: the film is enriched by an imaginatively mixed cast of antic spirits , headed by christopher plummer as the subtlest and most complexly evil uncle ralph i 've ever seen in the many film and stage adaptations of the work .
translation: 这部影片由富有想象力的混合演员阵容丰富多彩，主演是克里斯托弗·普拉默，他饰演了我在众多该作品的电影和舞台改编中见过的最微妙、最复杂的邪恶角色拉尔夫叔叔。
back_translation: This film features a richly imaginative ensemble cast, with Christopher Plummer starring as Uncle Rolf, the most subtle and complex villain I have seen in many adaptations of this work, both in film and on stage.

text: these three films form a remarkably cohesive whole , both visually and thematically , through their consistently sensitive and often exciting treatment of an ignored people .
translation: 这三部电影在视觉和主题上形成了一个remarkably cohesive whole，通过对被忽视人群的持续敏感且常常令人兴奋的处理。

text: smart and alert , thirteen conversations about one thing is a small gem .
translation: 聪明而敏锐，《关于一件事的十三次对话》是一颗小瑰宝。
back_translation: Smart and perceptive, "Thirteen Conversations About One Thing" is a little gem.

text: insanely hilarious !
translation: 令人难以置信的搞笑！

text: ... strips bible stores of the potential for sanctimoniousness , making them meaningful for both kids and church-wary adults .
translation: ... 剥夺了圣经商店自以为是的潜力，使其对孩子和对教会持谨慎态度的成年人都变得有意义。
back_translation: ... deprived the Bible shop of its self-righteous potential, making it meaningful for children and for adults in the church who hold a cautious attitude.

text: it 's just weirdness for the sake of weirdness , and where human nature should be ingratiating , it 's just grating .
translation: 这只是为了怪异而怪异，而在人性应该迎合的地方，反而让人感到刺耳。

text: it works its magic with such exuberance and passion that the film 's length becomes a part of its fun .
translation: 它以如此热情和激情施展魔力，以至于影片的长度成为了乐趣的一部分。
back_translation: It casts its magic with such enthusiasm and passion that the film's length becomes part of the enjoyment.

text: even if the enticing prospect of a lot of nubile young actors in a film about campus depravity did n't fade amid the deliberate , tiresome ugliness , it would be rendered tedious by avary 's failure to construct a story with even a trace of dramatic interest .
translation: 即使在一部关于校园堕落的电影中，众多年轻演员的吸引前景没有因故意的、令人厌烦的丑陋而消失，但由于艾瓦里的故事构建缺乏丝毫戏剧性的兴趣，它仍然会变得乏味。
back_translation: Even in a film about campus decline, the appealing prospects of numerous young actors do not disappear due to deliberate and annoying ugliness, but the lack of any dramatic interest in Aivary's story construction still makes it boring.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .
translation: 它拖得太长，陷入了角色过多和不必要的副线中。

translation: 一部让人感觉良好的电影，但却没有给你足够的理由去感到良好。

text: give shapiro , goldman , and bolado credit for good intentions , but there 's nothing here that they could n't have done in half an hour .
translation: 给Shapiro、Goldman和Bolado以好意的评价，但这里没有什么是他们半小时内无法完成的。

text: i was feeling this movie until it veered off too far into the exxon zone , and left me behind at the station looking for a return ticket to realism .
translation: 我一直对这部电影感兴趣，直到它过于偏离了现实，像是进入了埃克森的地带，让我留在车站寻找回归现实的票。
back_translation: I have always been interested in this movie, until it strayed too far from reality, as if entering the realm of Exxon, leaving me at the station searching for a ticket back to reality.

text: if the real-life story is genuinely inspirational , the movie stirs us as well .
translation: 如果真实生活的故事确实激励人心，那么电影也会感动我们。
back_translation: If real-life stories are indeed inspiring, then movies can also touch our hearts.

text: disturbing .
translation: 令人不安。
back_translation: unsettling.

text: the large-frame imax camera lends itself beautifully to filming the teeming life on the reefs , making this gorgeous film a must for everyone from junior scientists to grown-up fish lovers .
translation: 大型IMAX摄像机非常适合拍摄珊瑚礁上生机勃勃的生命，使这部华丽的电影成为从小小科学家到成人鱼类爱好者的每个人必须观看的作品。

text: it 's hard to pity the ` plain ' girl who becomes a ravishing waif after applying a smear of lip-gloss .
translation: 很难对那个涂上一层唇彩后就变成迷人孤儿的“普通”女孩感到同情。
back_translation: It's hard to feel sympathy for that "ordinary" girl who transforms into a charming orphan after applying a layer of lip gloss.

text: why anyone who is not a character in this movie should care is beyond me .
translation: 我无法理解为什么这部电影中没有角色的人会关心。
back_translation: I can't understand why people without characters in this movie would care.

text: the movie 's major and most devastating flaw is its reliance on formula , though , and it 's quite enough to lessen the overall impact the movie could have had .
translation: 这部电影最大的也是最具破坏性的缺陷在于其依赖公式，这足以减弱这部电影本可以产生的整体影响。
back_translation: The biggest and most destructive flaw of this movie lies in its reliance on formulas, which is enough to diminish the overall impact that the film could have generated.

text: it is depressing , ruthlessly pained and depraved , the movie equivalent of staring into an open wound .
translation: 这令人感到沮丧，痛苦而堕落，这部电影就像直视一个敞开的伤口。
back_translation: This is frustrating, painful, and degrading; this movie is like looking directly at an open wound.

text: as aimless as an old pickup skidding completely out of control on a long patch of black ice , the movie makes two hours feel like four .
translation: 就像一辆老旧的皮卡车在一段长长的黑冰上完全失控，无目标地滑行，这部电影让两个小时变得像四个小时一样漫长。
back_translation: Like an old pickup truck completely out of control, sliding aimlessly on a long stretch of black ice, this movie makes two hours feel like four.

text: a comedy-drama of nearly epic proportions rooted in a sincere performance by the title character undergoing midlife crisis .
translation: 一部近乎史诗的喜剧-drama，以真诚的表演为基础，讲述了主角经历中年危机的故事。
back_translation: An almost epic comedy-drama, based on sincere performances, tells the story of the protagonist going through a midlife crisis.

text: ... contains very few laughs and even less surprises .
translation: ...几乎没有笑声，惊喜更是寥寥无几。

text: a horrible , 99-minute stink bomb .
translation: 一个可怕的，99分钟的臭弹。

text: you can watch , giggle and get an adrenaline boost without feeling like you 've completely lowered your entertainment standards .
translation: 你可以观看、咯咯笑，还能获得肾上腺素的提升，而不必感觉自己完全降低了娱乐标准。
back_translation: You can watch, laugh, and get an adrenaline boost without feeling like you've completely lowered your entertainment standards.

text: earnest and heartfelt but undernourished and plodding .
translation: 真诚而深情，但却缺乏营养和冗长。
back_translation: Sincere and deep, yet lacking in substance and lengthy.

text: a dull , somnambulant exercise in pretension whose pervasive quiet is broken by frequent outbursts of violence and noise .
translation: 一种沉闷、梦游般的自命不凡的练习，其无处不在的宁静常被频繁的暴力和噪音打破。
back_translation: A dull, dreamlike practice of self-importance, whose pervasive tranquility is often shattered by frequent violence and noise.

text: it is n't quite one of the worst movies of the year .
translation: 这并不算是今年最糟糕的电影之一。

text: the film presents visceral and dangerously honest revelations about the men and machines behind the curtains of our planet .
translation: 这部电影呈现了有关我们地球幕后男人和机器的直观而危险的真实揭示。

text: handled correctly , wilde 's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice .
translation: 若处理得当，王尔德的剧作是一部优雅机智与巧妙构思的杰作。

text: this is the best star trek movie in a long time .
translation: 这是很久以来最佳的《星际迷航》电影。
back_translation: This is the best "Star Trek" movie in a long time.

text: a remarkably alluring film set in the constrictive eisenhower era about one suburban woman 's yearning in the face of a loss that shatters her cheery and tranquil suburban life .
translation: 一部引人入胜的电影，背景设定在限制重重的艾森豪威尔时代，讲述了一位郊区女性在面对摧毁她快乐宁静的郊区生活的失落时的渴望。
back_translation: An engaging film set against the backdrop of the restrictive Eisenhower era, telling the story of a suburban woman’s yearning in the face of the loss that threatens to destroy her happy and peaceful suburban life.

text: instead of simply handling conventional material in a conventional way , secretary takes the most unexpected material and handles it in the most unexpected way .
translation: 秘书不是简单地以传统方式处理常规材料，而是采用最意想不到的材料，并以最意想不到的方式进行处理。
back_translation: Secretaries do not simply handle routine materials in a traditional manner, but instead use the most unexpected materials and process them in the most unexpected ways.

text: a winning comedy with its wry observations about long-lived friendships and the ways in which we all lose track of ourselves by trying to please others .
translation: 一部获胜的喜剧，以其对持久友谊的讽刺观察以及我们通过迎合他人而逐渐迷失自我的方式为主题。
back_translation: A winning comedy that centers on the satirical observation of enduring friendship and how we gradually lose ourselves by catering to others.

text: writer-director randall wallace has bitten off more than he or anyone else could chew , and his movie veers like a drunken driver through heavy traffic .
translation: 编剧兼导演兰德尔·华莱士大开口气，超出了他和任何人所能承受的范围，他的电影就像一名醉酒司机在繁忙的交通中东冲西撞。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Randall Wallace speaks boldly, exceeding the limits of what he and anyone else can endure; his movies are like a drunk driver weaving recklessly through busy traffic.

text: like kissing jessica stein , amy 's orgasm has a key strength in its willingness to explore its principal characters with honesty , insight and humor .
translation: 像《亲吻杰西卡·斯坦》一样，艾米的高潮在于它愿意以诚实、洞察和幽默来探索其主要角色的一个重要优势。
back_translation: Like "Kissing Jessica Stein," Amy's strength lies in its willingness to explore a key aspect of its main character with honesty, insight, and humor.

text: an edifying glimpse into the wit and revolutionary spirit of these performers and their era .
translation: 对这些表演者及其时代的机智和革命精神的启发性一瞥。
back_translation: An inspiring glimpse into the wit and revolutionary spirit of these performers and their era.

text: starts promisingly but disintegrates into a dreary , humorless soap opera .
translation: 开始时很有前景，但最终变成了一出沉闷、无趣的肥皂剧。

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .
translation: 触感整体上较轻，表演大多数是可信的。
back_translation: The overall sensation is relatively light, and most of the performances are credible.

text: it is sentimental but feels free to offend , is analytical and then surrenders to the illogic of its characters , is about grief and yet permits laughter .
translation: 它是感性的，但又不怕冒犯，具有分析性，然后向角色的不合逻辑屈服，讲述悲伤，却又允许欢笑。
back_translation: It is emotional, yet unafraid of offense, possessing analytical qualities, and then yielding to the illogicality of the characters, telling sorrow while allowing for laughter.

text: eight legged freaks wo n't join the pantheon of great monster\/science fiction flicks that we have come to love ...
translation: 《八脚怪》不会加入我们所喜爱的伟大怪兽/科幻电影的殿堂
back_translation: "Octopus Monster" will not join the hall of great monsters/sci-fi movies that we love...

text: howard and his co-stars all give committed performances , but they 're often undone by howard 's self-conscious attempts to find a ` literary ' filmmaking style to match his subject .
translation: 霍华德和他的联合主演们都表现出色，但他们常常被霍华德那种自我意识强烈的尝试所困扰，试图找到一种与主题相匹配的“文学”电影风格。
back_translation: Howard and his co-stars all delivered excellent performances, but they are often hampered by Howard's strong self-awareness in his attempts to find a "literary" film style that matches the theme.

text: the actors must indeed be good to recite some of this laughable dialogue with a straight face .
translation: 演员们确实必须很优秀，才能面无表情地背诵这些可笑的对话。
back_translation: Actors really have to be excellent to recite these ridiculous dialogues without any expression.

text: it 's better suited for the history or biography channel , but there 's no arguing the tone of the movie - it leaves a bad taste in your mouth and questions on your mind .
translation: 它更适合于历史或传记频道，但不可否认电影的语气——给人一种不好的感觉，心中留下疑问。
back_translation: It is more suited for historical or biography channels, but the tone of the film is undeniable—it leaves a bad feeling and leaves questions in the mind.

text: a story which fails to rise above its disgusting source material .
translation: 一个未能超越其令人厌恶的素材的故事。
back_translation: A story that fails to transcend its disgusting material.

text: belongs in the too-hot-for-tv direct-to-video\/dvd category , and this is why i have given it a one-star rating .
translation: 属于“太火爆而不能在电视上播出”的直接视频/ DVD 类别，这就是我给它一星评价的原因。
back_translation: It belongs to the category of "too hot to be broadcast on television," which is why I gave it a one-star rating.

text: imagine a film that begins as a seven rip-off , only to switch to a mix of the shining , the thing , and any naked teenagers horror flick from the 1980s .
translation: 想象一部电影，开始时像《七宗罪》的翻拍，然后转为《闪灵》、《怪形》和任何1980年代裸体青少年恐怖片的混合。
back_translation: Imagine a movie that starts off like a remake of "Seven," then transitions into a mix of "The Shining," "The Thing," and any 1980s slasher film featuring naked teenagers.

text: without a fresh infusion of creativity , 4ever is neither a promise nor a threat so much as wishful thinking .
translation: 没有新鲜的创意注入，4ever既不是承诺也不是威胁，而只是一种愿望的思考。

text: this humbling little film , fueled by the light comedic work of zhao benshan and the delicate ways of dong jie , is just the sort for those moviegoers who complain that ` they do n't make movies like they used to anymore . '
translation: 这部令人谦卑的小电影，由赵本山的轻松喜剧表演和董洁的细腻表现推动，正是那些抱怨“他们再也不制作像以前那样的电影”的观众所喜欢的类型。
back_translation: This humble little film, driven by Zhao Benshan's relaxed comedic performance and Dong Jie’s nuanced portrayal, is precisely the type that audiences who complain "they no longer make movies like they used to" enjoy.

text: what does n't this film have that an impressionable kid could n't stand to hear ?
translation: 这部电影缺少什么让一个容易受影响的孩子无法忍受的呢？
back_translation: What does this movie lack that makes it unbearable for an impressionable child?

text: stevens ' vibrant creative instincts are the difference between this and countless other flicks about guys and dolls .
translation: 史蒂文充满活力的创造力是这部影片与无数关于男人和玩偶的电影之间的区别。
back_translation: Steven's vibrant creativity is what sets this film apart from countless other movies about men and dolls.

text: ` in this poor remake of such a well loved classic , parker exposes the limitations of his skill and the basic flaws in his vision . '
translation: 在这部可怜的翻拍作品中，帕克暴露了他的技艺局限和他视野中的基本缺陷。
back_translation: In this pitiful remake, Parker exposes his limitations in skill and the fundamental flaws in his vision.

text: overall tomfoolery like this is a matter of taste .
translation: 整体的愚蠢行为这种事情是品味问题。
back_translation: Overall foolish behavior is a matter of taste.

text: a soap-opera quality twist in the last 20 minutes ... almost puts the kibosh on what is otherwise a sumptuous work of b-movie imagination .
translation: 最后20分钟的肥皂剧般的转折几乎扼杀了这部本身是一部奢华的b级电影想象力的作品。
back_translation: The last 20 minutes of soap opera-like twists... almost suffocated the imagination of this otherwise luxurious B-grade film.

text: the actors try hard but come off too amateurish and awkward .
translation: 演员们努力演出，但显得过于业余和笨拙。
back_translation: The actors worked hard in their performances, but they appeared too amateurish and clumsy.

text: occasionally loud and offensive , but more often , it simply lulls you into a gentle waking coma .
translation: 偶尔吵闹且让人反感，但更多时候，它只是让你陷入一种温和的清醒昏迷。
back_translation: Occasionally noisy and annoying, but more often, it simply leaves you in a state of gentle, alert stupor.

text: we 've seen it all before in one form or another , but director hoffman , with great help from kevin kline , makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the world 's greatest teacher .
translation: 我们以前以某种形式见过这一切，但导演霍夫曼在凯文·克莱恩的极大帮助下，使我们关心这个世界上伟大的老师最新的再生。
back_translation: We have seen all of this in some form before, but director Hoffman, with the great help of Kevin Kline, makes us care about the latest resurgence of the great teacher in this world.

text: easily the most thoughtful fictional examination of the root causes of anti-semitism ever seen on screen .
translation: 无疑是影视作品中对反犹太主义根本原因进行的最深刻的虚构探讨。
back_translation: It is undoubtedly the most profound fictional exploration of the fundamental causes of anti-Semitism in film and television works.

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .
translation: 尽管遭遇了幽默感失灵，但写作《洛基》的那个人不应该与这样一艘漏水的船一起沉没。

text: about half of them are funny , a few are sexy and none are useful in telling the story , which is paper-thin and decidedly unoriginal .
translation: 其中大约一半是搞笑的，一小部分是性感的，但没有一个对讲述故事有用，故事情节薄弱且明显缺乏原创性。
back_translation: About half of it is humorous, a small part is sexy, but none of it is useful for storytelling; the plot is weak and obviously lacks originality.

text: the film is filled with humorous observations about the general absurdity of modern life as seen through the eyes outsiders , but deftly manages to avoid many of the condescending stereotypes that so often plague films dealing with the mentally ill .
translation: 这部电影充满了对现代生活一般荒谬的幽默观察，通过外部人的视角展现，但巧妙地避免了许多常常困扰涉及精神疾病主题电影的居高临下的刻板印象。
back_translation: This film is filled with humorously absurd observations about modern life, presented through the perspective of an outsider, yet cleverly avoids many of the condescending stereotypes that often plague films dealing with the theme of mental illness.

text: impostor ca n't think of a thing to do with these characters except have them run through dark tunnels , fight off various anonymous attackers , and evade elaborate surveillance technologies .
translation: 假的身份无法想出与这些角色做其他事情，只能让他们穿越黑暗的隧道，抵御各种匿名攻击者，并躲避复杂的监视技术。
back_translation: A false identity cannot come up with other activities for these characters, only allowing them to traverse dark tunnels, fend off various anonymous attackers, and evade complex surveillance technologies.

text: a great script brought down by lousy direction .
translation: 一个优秀的剧本因为糟糕的导演而受到影响。
back_translation: A great script can be undermined by a poor director.

text: new ways of describing badness need to be invented to describe exactly how bad it is .
translation: 需要创造新的描述恶劣程度的方法，以准确描述其有多糟糕。

text: rubbo runs through a remarkable amount of material in the film 's short 90 minutes .
translation: 鲁博在90分钟的短片中涵盖了大量的素材。

text: while this film has an ` a ' list cast and some strong supporting players , the tale -- like its central figure , vivi -- is just a little bit hard to love .
translation: 尽管这部影片有一流的演员阵容和一些强有力的配角，但这个故事——就像其中心人物维维一样——有些让人难以心生热爱。
back_translation: Despite having a top-notch cast and some strong supporting characters, the story—like its central character, Veevee—makes it somewhat difficult to feel a deep affection for it.

text: zoom !
translation: 放大！
back_translation: Enlarge!

text: it 's a bad sign when you 're rooting for the film to hurry up and get to its subjects ' deaths just so the documentary will be over , but it 's indicative of how uncompelling the movie is unless it happens to cover your particular area of interest .
translation: 当你希望电影快点进入主题人物的死亡，以便纪录片尽快结束时，这是一种糟糕的迹象，但这也表明这部电影是多么缺乏吸引力，除非它恰好涉及你特别感兴趣的领域。
back_translation: When you hope the movie quickly gets to the death of the main character so that the documentary can end sooner, it's a bad sign, but it also indicates how much the film lacks appeal, unless it happens to deal with a field that particularly interests you.

text: the creative animation work may not look as fully ` rendered ' as pixar 's industry standard , but it uses lighting effects and innovative backgrounds to an equally impressive degree .
translation: 这部创意动画作品可能在渲染效果上不如皮克斯的行业标准那么完美，但它同样运用了灯光效果和创新的背景，给人留下深刻的印象。
back_translation: This creative animated work may not achieve the perfect rendering effects of Pixar's industry standards, but it similarly employs lighting effects and innovative backgrounds that leave a deep impression.

text: every sequel you skip will be two hours gained .
translation: 你跳过的每一部续集将会节省两小时。
back_translation: Every sequel you skip will save you two hours.

text: it 's hard to imagine anybody ever being `` in the mood '' to view a movie as harrowing and painful as the grey zone , but it 's equally hard to imagine anybody being able to tear their eyes away from the screen once it 's started .
translation: 很难想象有人会有心情去看像《灰色地带》这样令人心痛和痛苦的电影，但同样难以想象一旦开始后，有人能把目光从屏幕上移开。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine that someone would be in the mood to watch a heart-wrenching and painful movie like "The Gray Zone," but it's equally hard to imagine that once they start, anyone could take their eyes off the screen.

text: it gives devastating testimony to both people 's capacity for evil and their heroic capacity for good .
translation: 它令人痛心地证明了人类的邪恶潜力和他们的英雄主义潜力。
back_translation: It painfully demonstrates the evil potential of humanity as well as their potential for heroism.

text: makes one thing abundantly clear .
translation: 使一件事非常明确。
back_translation: Make something very clear.

text: cherry orchard is badly edited , often awkwardly directed and suffers from the addition of a wholly unnecessary pre-credit sequence designed to give some of the characters a ` back story . '
translation: 《樱桃园》的剪辑很糟糕，导演常常显得笨拙，并且由于增加了一个完全不必要的片头序列，试图为一些角色提供“背景故事”，而受到影响。
back_translation: The editing of "The Cherry Orchard" is very poor, with the director often appearing clumsy, and it is affected by the addition of an entirely unnecessary opening sequence that attempts to provide "backstory" for some characters.

text: too slick and manufactured to claim street credibility .
translation: 太过光滑和做作，无法声称有街头信誉。
back_translation: Too slick and contrived to claim street credibility.

text: the film is full of charm .
translation: 这部电影充满魅力。
back_translation: This movie is full of charm.

text: it 's not the least of afghan tragedies that this noble warlord would be consigned to the dustbin of history .
translation: 阿富汗悲剧中最不幸的便是这位高贵的军阀会被遗忘在历史的尘埃中。
back_translation: The most unfortunate aspect of the Afghan tragedy is that this noble warlord will be forgotten in the dust of history.

text: there are no special effects , and no hollywood endings .
translation: 没有特殊效果，也没有好莱坞结局。
back_translation: No special effects, and no Hollywood ending.

translation: 尽管好莱坞的结局有其令人捧腹大笑的片段（包括一个精彩的结尾台词），但这部电影最终让人感觉像是一个巨大的遗憾。

translation: 我们欣赏这部电影的严酷客观性，以及它拒绝寻求我们的眼泪和同情。
back_translation: We appreciate the film's harsh objectivity and its refusal to seek our tears and sympathy.

text: a funny and well-contructed black comedy where the old adage `` be careful what you wish for '' is given a full workout .
translation: 一部有趣且结构严谨的黑色幽默喜剧，充分展现了古老谚语“谨慎对待你的愿望”。
back_translation: An interesting and well-structured black comedy that fully showcases the old saying "be careful what you wish for."

text: not a schlocky creature feature but something far more stylish and cerebral -- and , hence , more chillingly effective .
translation: 不是一种低劣的生物特效电影，而是更具风格和思考性的东西——因此，这种影片更加令人毛骨悚然且有效。
back_translation: It is not a low-quality biological effects movie, but something more stylish and thoughtful—therefore, this type of film is more eerie and effective.

text: this movie ... does n't deserve the energy it takes to describe how bad it is .
translation: 这部电影不值得花费精力去描述它有多糟糕。
back_translation: This movie... is not worth the effort to describe how bad it is.

text: one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animated filmmaking since old walt doodled steamboat willie .
translation: 自古老的沃尔特涂鸦《汽船威利》以来，动画电影制作最重要和令人振奋的形式之一。
back_translation: Since the ancient graffiti of Walter's "Steamboat Willie," animated film production has become one of the most important and exciting forms.

text: after a while , hoffman 's quirks and mannerisms , particularly his penchant for tearing up on cue -- things that seem so real in small doses -- become annoying and artificial .
translation: 过了一段时间，霍夫曼的怪癖和举止，尤其是他在适当时刻流泪的倾向——那些在小剂量下似乎十分真实的东西——变得令人厌烦且显得做作。
back_translation: After a while, Hoffman's quirks and behavior, especially his tendency to cry at appropriate moments—those things that seemed very genuine in small doses—became annoying and appeared pretentious.

text: it 's not like having a real film of nijinsky , but at least it 's better than that eponymous 1980 biopic that used soap in the places where the mysteries lingered .
translation: 这并不像拥有尼金斯基的真实电影，但至少比那部1980年的同名传记片要好，那部片子在神秘之处用肥皂代替了。
back_translation: This isn't like having a real film about Nijinsky, but it's at least better than that 1980 biopic of the same name, which replaced mystery with soap.

text: the only surprise is that heavyweights joel silver and robert zemeckis agreed to produce this ; i assume the director has pictures of them cavorting in ladies ' underwear .
translation: 唯一让人惊讶的是重量级制片人乔尔·西尔弗和罗伯特·泽米基斯同意制作这个；我想导演手中有他们穿着女士内衣嬉戏的照片。
back_translation: The only surprising thing is that heavyweight producers Joel Silver and Robert Zemeckis agreed to make this; I guess the director has photos of them frolicking in women's lingerie.

translation: 整体感觉和观看一集升级版的《第七天堂》没有太大区别。
back_translation: The overall feeling is not very different from watching an upgraded episode of "Seventh Heaven."

text: ... spellbinding fun and deliciously exploitative .
translation: 充满魅力的乐趣和美味的剥削。
back_translation: Charming fun and delicious exploitation.

text: what 's next ?
translation: 接下来是什么？
back_translation: What's next?

text: in the end , there is n't much to it .
translation: 最后，其实没什么大不了的。
back_translation: In the end, it's really not a big deal.

text: an allegory concerning the chronically mixed signals african american professionals get about overachieving could be intriguing , but the supernatural trappings only obscure the message .
translation: 关于非裔美国专业人士在过度成就方面所收到的混乱信号的寓言可能很有趣，但超自然的外衣只会模糊信息。
back_translation: The fable about the mixed signals received by African American professionals regarding overachievement may be intriguing, but the supernatural guise only obscures the message.

text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people ... manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .
translation: 一部关于彻底空洞人物的令人难以忍受的喜剧设法体现了新浪潮的最糟糕的过度表现，却没有它的乐趣或活力。
back_translation: An excruciating comedy about utterly hollow characters... manages to embody the worst excesses of the Nouvelle Vague without any of its fun or vitality.

text: the movie itself is far from disappointing , offering an original take on courtroom movies , a few nifty twists that are so crucial to the genre and another first-rate performance by top-billed star bruce willis .
translation: 这部电影远不令人失望，提供了对法庭电影的独特视角，几个对这个类型至关重要的巧妙转折，以及顶级明星布鲁斯·威利斯的又一流表演。
back_translation: This film is far from disappointing, offering a unique perspective on courtroom dramas, several clever twists that are essential to the genre, and another stellar performance by top star Bruce Willis.

text: norton is magnetic as graham .
translation: 诺顿像格雷厄姆一样有魅力。
back_translation: Norton is as charming as Graham.

text: the year 's greatest adventure , and jackson 's limited but enthusiastic adaptation has made literature literal without killing its soul -- a feat any thinking person is bound to appreciate .
translation: 这一年的伟大冒险，杰克逊有限但热情的改编使文学变得具体而不失灵魂——这是任何有思考能力的人都一定会欣赏的成就。
back_translation: This year's great adventure, Jackson's limited yet passionate adaptation makes literature tangible without losing its soul — an achievement that anyone with the ability to think will surely appreciate.

text: a remarkable movie with an unsatisfying ending , which is just the point .
translation: 一部令人瞩目的电影，结局却让人不满意，这正是重点所在。
back_translation: A striking movie, yet the ending leaves much to be desired; this is precisely the point.

text: mr. goyer 's loose , unaccountable direction is technically sophisticated in the worst way .
translation: 戈耶先生那松散且不负责任的指导在技术上以最糟糕的方式展现出复杂性。
back_translation: Mr. Goya's loose and irresponsible guidance technically demonstrates complexity in the worst possible way.

text: a weird little movie that 's amusing enough while you watch it , offering fine acting moments and pungent insights into modern l.a. 's show-biz and media subcultures .
translation: 一部怪异的小电影，看起来足够有趣，提供了精彩的表演时刻和对现代洛杉矶娱乐业和媒体亚文化的深刻洞察。
back_translation: A quirky little film that appears interesting enough, offering brilliant moments of performance and deep insights into the modern entertainment industry and media subculture of Los Angeles.

text: a wonderful , ghastly film .
translation: 一部精彩而可怕的电影。
back_translation: A wonderful and terrifying movie.

text: the movie weighs no more than a glass of flat champagne .
translation: 这部电影的分量不比一杯无气泡的香槟重。
back_translation: This movie carries no more weight than a glass of non-sparkling champagne.

text: the film is flat .
translation: 这部电影很平庸。
back_translation: This movie is very mediocre.

text: stealing harvard will dip into your wallet , swipe 90 minutes of your time , and offer you precisely this in recompense : a few early laughs scattered around a plot as thin as it is repetitious .
translation: 《盗取哈佛》会让你掏钱包，浪费你90分钟的时间，而提供给你的回报正是这一点：在一个情节既薄弱又重复的故事中，散布着几处早期的笑点。
back_translation: "Stealing Harvard" will make you open your wallet and waste 90 minutes of your time, while the return it offers you is this: in a story that is both weak and repetitive, there are a few early moments of humor scattered throughout.

text: shiner can certainly go the distance , but is n't world championship material
translation: Shiner 当然可以走得很远，但并不具备世界冠军的实力。
back_translation: Shiner can certainly go far, but does not have the strength of a world champion.

text: but windtalkers does n't beat that one , either .
translation: 但是《风语者》也无法超越那部。
back_translation: However, "Windtalkers" is also unable to surpass that film.

text: -lrb- lee -rrb- treats his audience the same way that jim brown treats his women -- as dumb , credulous , unassuming , subordinate subjects .
translation: #NAME?
back_translation: #NAME?

text: the problem with antwone fisher is that it has a screenplay written by antwone fisher based on the book by antwone fisher .
translation: 《安东·费舍的烦恼》的问题在于它的剧本是由安东·费舍根据安东·费舍的书写成的。
back_translation: The problem with "The Troubles of Anton Fischer" is that its script was written by Anton Fischer based on Anton Fischer's own writings.

text: whenever you think you 've seen the end of the movie , we cut to a new scene , which also appears to be the end .
translation: 每当你觉得电影就要结束时，我们又切换到一个新场景，这个场景看起来也像是结尾。
back_translation: Whenever you think the movie is about to end, we switch to a new scene that also appears to be the conclusion.

text: a zinger-filled crowd-pleaser that open-minded elvis fans -lrb- but by no means all -rrb- will have fun with .
translation: 一部充满精彩梗的受欢迎影片，开放思想的艾尔维斯粉丝（但并不全是）都会乐在其中。
back_translation: A popular film full of wonderful gags that open-minded Elvis fans (but not only) will enjoy.

text: co-writer\/director jonathan parker 's attempts to fashion a brazil-like , hyper-real satire fall dreadfully short .
translation: 联合编剧/导演乔纳森·帕克的尝试将一部类似《巴西》的超现实讽刺作品塑造成形，但结果惨不忍睹。
back_translation: The attempt by co-writer/director Jonathan Parker to shape a surreal satire similar to "Brazil" ends in a disastrous result.

text: smart and fun , but far more witty than it is wise .
translation: 聪明有趣，但聪慧远不如机智。
back_translation: Smart and interesting, but wisdom is far less than wit.

text: o fantasma is boldly , confidently orchestrated , aesthetically and sexually , and its impact is deeply and rightly disturbing .
translation: 《幽灵》以大胆、坚定的方式进行编排，无论是美学还是性方面，其影响深刻且令人不安。

text: this cinema verite speculation on the assassination of john f. kennedy may have been inspired by blair witch , but it takes its techniques into such fresh territory that the film never feels derivative .
translation: 这部关于约翰·F·肯尼迪刺杀事件的真实影像风格的推测，可能受到《女巫布莱尔》的启发，但它所采用的技巧进入了如此新颖的领域，以至于影片从未给人一种抄袭的感觉。

text: -lrb- city -rrb- reminds us how realistically nuanced a robert de niro performance can be when he is not more lucratively engaged in the shameless self-caricature of ` analyze this ' -lrb- 1999 -rrb- and ` analyze that , ' promised -lrb- or threatened -rrb- for later this year .
translation: （城市）提醒我们，当罗伯特·德尼罗未被更有利可图地卷入《分析一下》（1999）和《分析那件事》（预计或威胁于今年晚些时候上映）的无耻自我夸张时，他的表演是多么地真实而细腻。

text: as relationships shift , director robert j. siegel allows the characters to inhabit their world without cleaving to a narrative arc .
translation: 随着关系的变化，导演罗伯特·J·西格尔让角色们在他们的世界中生活，而不是依赖于叙事弧线。

text: takes you by the face , strokes your cheeks and coos beseechingly at you : slow down , shake off your tensions and take this picture at its own breezy , distracted rhythms .
translation: 轻轻握住你的脸，抚摸你的脸颊，恳求地说道：慢下来，放松你的紧张，以轻松、分心的节奏来拍这张照片。

text: it 's a long way from orwell 's dark , intelligent warning cry -lrb- 1984 -rrb- to the empty stud knockabout of equilibrium , and what once was conviction is now affectation .

back_translation: From Orwell's dark, insightful warning ("1984") to a hollow and uninteresting balance, what was once belief has now turned into pretentiousness.

text: short-story quaint , touchingly mending a child 's pain for his dead mother via communication with an old woman straight out of eudora welty .
translation: 短篇故事，生动地通过与一位老女人的交流，感人地抚慰一个孩子因母亲去世而产生的痛苦，宛如尤多拉·韦尔蒂的作品。

text: smart , funny and just honest enough to provide the pleasures of a slightly naughty , just-above-average off - broadway play .

text: a photographic marvel of sorts , and it 's certainly an invaluable record of that special fishy community .
