back_translation: Wandering through various fields in theme and style, heavily drawing from the works of Lynch, Jodorowsky, and von Trier, yet failing to find its own spark.

text: lyne 's latest , the erotic thriller unfaithful , further demonstrates just how far his storytelling skills have eroded .
translation: 莱恩最新的作品《不忠》这部情色惊悚片进一步证明了他的叙事能力已经退化到了何种程度。
back_translation: Ryan's latest work "Infidelity," this erotic thriller, further proves the extent to which his narrative abilities have degraded.

text: a determined , ennui-hobbled slog that really does n't have much to say beyond the news flash that loneliness can make people act weird .
translation: 一个坚定的、被无聊桎梏的艰难过程，实际上并没有太多值得说的，除了提醒我们孤独可以让人表现得很怪异。
back_translation: A steadfast and difficult process shackled by boredom, which actually doesn't have much to say, except to remind us that loneliness can make people behave quite strangely.

text: fails to satisfactorily exploit its gender politics , genre thrills or inherent humor .
translation: 未能令人满意地发挥其性别政治、类型惊悚或固有幽默的效果。
back_translation: Failed to satisfactorily achieve its effects in gender politics, genre thrills, or inherent humor.

text: jeffs has created a breathtakingly assured and stylish work of spare dialogue and acute expressiveness .
translation: 杰夫创造了一部令人赞叹、极具风格的作品，简洁的对话与敏锐的表现力相结合。
back_translation: Jeff created an amazing and stylish piece, combining concise dialogue with keen expressiveness.

text: daughter from danang sticks with its subjects a little longer and tells a deeper story
translation: 岘港的女儿与其主题保持更长的联系，讲述了更深刻的故事。
back_translation: The daughter of Da Nang maintains a longer connection with its theme, telling a deeper story.

text: the movie 's captivating details are all in the performances , from foreman 's barking-mad taylor to thewlis 's smoothly sinister freddie and bettany\/mcdowell 's hard-eyed gangster .
translation: 这部电影迷人的细节都体现在表演上，从工头发狂的裁缝到修利斯光滑阴险的弗雷迪，以及贝塔尼/麦克道尔的目光冷峻的黑帮。
back_translation: The charming details of this movie are reflected in the performances, from the crazed foreman seamstress to the smooth and sinister Freddy played by Shulis, and the cold-eyed gangsters of Bethany/McDowell.

text: quite frankly , i ca n't see why any actor of talent would ever work in a mcculloch production again if they looked at how this movie turned out .
translation: 坦率地说，我无法理解为什么任何有才能的演员会再在McCulloch的制作中工作，如果他们看到这部电影的结果。
back_translation: Frankly, I can't understand why any talented actor would work again in a McCulloch production if they saw the result of this film.

text: a little more intensity and a little less charm would have saved this film a world of hurt .
translation: 再多一点强度，少一点魅力，这部电影就会免遭许多伤害。
back_translation: A little more intensity and a little less charm, and this movie would have avoided a lot of damage.

text: a really good premise is frittered away in middle-of-the-road blandness .
translation: 一个非常好的前提在平淡无奇的乏味中被浪费掉了。
back_translation: A very good premise was wasted in the mundane and boring.

text: a bit too eager to please .
translation: 有点过于想要取悦他人。
back_translation: A bit too eager to please others.

text: sade achieves the near-impossible : it turns the marquis de sade into a dullard .
translation: 萨德实现了近乎不可能的事：他把萨德侯爵变成了一个笨蛋。
back_translation: Sade accomplished the nearly impossible: he turned the Marquis de Sade into a fool.

text: it seems impossible that an epic four-hour indian musical about a cricket game could be this good , but it is .
translation: 一部关于板球比赛的史诗四小时印度音乐剧居然可以如此优秀，似乎是不可能的，但事实就是如此。
back_translation: An epic four-hour Indian musical about a cricket match surprisingly turns out to be so excellent, which seems impossible, but it is indeed the case.

text: rarely has skin looked as beautiful , desirable , even delectable , as it does in trouble every day .
translation: 肌肤很少看起来如此美丽、迷人，甚至令人垂涎，正如每天面临的困难一样。
back_translation: The skin rarely looks so beautiful, enchanting, and even covetable, just like the difficulties faced every day.

text: a piece of mildly entertaining , inoffensive fluff that drifts aimlessly for 90 minutes before lodging in the cracks of that ever-growing category : unembarrassing but unmemorable .
translation: 一部轻松可笑、没有冒犯性的作品，在90分钟内漫无目的地游荡，最终落入了一个日益扩大的类别：不尴尬但也不令人难忘。
back_translation: A lighthearted and amusing work that aimlessly wanders for 90 minutes, ultimately falling into an ever-expanding category: not awkward but also not memorable.

text: funny and also heartwarming without stooping to gooeyness .
translation: 有趣且温馨，但不落入过于甜腻的境地。
back_translation: Interesting and warm, but without becoming overly sweet.

text: this kiddie-oriented stinker is so bad that i even caught the gum stuck under my seat trying to sneak out of the theater
translation: 这个面向小孩的烂片糟糕到让我发现座位下的口香糖都在试图溜出影院。
back_translation: This terrible kids' movie was so bad that I noticed the gum under my seat trying to escape the theater.

text: shreve 's graceful dual narrative gets clunky on the screen , and we keep getting torn away from the compelling historical tale to a less-compelling soap opera .
translation: 施雷夫优雅的双重叙事在荧幕上显得笨拙，我们不断被从引人入胜的历史故事中拉回到一个更不吸引人的肥皂剧中。
back_translation: Shire's elegant dual narrative appears clumsy on screen, as we are repeatedly pulled away from the captivating historical story back into a less engaging soap opera.

text: the story passes time until it 's time for an absurd finale of twisted metal , fireballs and revenge .
translation: 故事随着时间推移，直到迎来一个荒谬的结局，充满扭曲的金属、火球和复仇。
back_translation: The story unfolds over time, leading to an absurd ending filled with twisted metal, fireballs, and revenge.

text: imagine a scenario where bergman approaches swedish fatalism using gary larson 's far side humor
translation: 想象一个场景，伯格曼以加里·拉尔森的《远侧幽默》来探讨瑞典的宿命论。
back_translation: Imagine a scene where Bergman explores Swedish fatalism through Gary Larson's "Far Side Humor."

text: he 's not good with people .
translation: 他与人相处不好。
back_translation: He does not get along well with others.

text: big mistake .
translation: 大错误。
back_translation: Big mistake.

text: aan opportunity wasted .
translation: 一个被浪费的机会。
back_translation: A wasted opportunity.

text: y tu mam谩 tambi茅n is hilariously , gloriously alive , and quite often hotter than georgia asphalt .
translation: 《你的妈妈也一样》是那么搞笑，辉煌而生动，而且常常比乔治亚州的沥青还要火热。
back_translation: "Your Mom Too" is so funny, brilliant and vivid, and often hotter than the asphalt in Georgia.

text: rubbo 's humorously tendentious intervention into the who-wrote-shakespeare controversy .
translation: 鲁博幽默而有偏见地介入了谁写莎士比亚的争论。
back_translation: Rubo humorously and biasedly intervened in the debate over who wrote Shakespeare.

text: it is quite a vision .
translation: 这真是一个宏伟的愿景。
back_translation: This is truly a grand vision.

text: a stupid , derivative horror film that substitutes extreme gore for suspense .
translation: 一部愚蠢且缺乏创意的恐怖电影，它用极端的血腥取代悬念。
back_translation: A stupid and uncreative horror movie that replaces suspense with extreme violence.

text: the color sense of stuart little 2 is its most immediate and most obvious pleasure , but it would count for very little if the movie were n't as beautifully shaped and as delicately calibrated in tone as it is .
translation: 《斯图尔特·小小鼠2》的色彩感是其最直接和最明显的乐趣，但如果这部电影没有如此优美的构造和精致的语调调整，那就显得微不足道了。
back_translation: The sense of color in "Stuart Little 2" is its most direct and obvious pleasure, but without such beautiful construction and delicate tonal adjustments, it would seem insignificant.

text: downbeat , period-perfect biopic hammers home a heavy-handed moralistic message .
translation: 沉重的、时期完美的传记电影传达了一个强烈的道德教训。
back_translation: The heavy, period-perfect biopic conveys a strong moral lesson.

text: less a study in madness or love than a study in schoolgirl obsession .
translation: 与其说是对疯狂或爱情的研究，不如说是对女学生痴迷的研究。
back_translation: Rather than a study of madness or love, it is more accurately a study of the obsession with female students.

text: the pairing does sound promising in theory ... but their lack of chemistry makes eddie murphy and robert deniro in showtime look like old , familiar vaudeville partners .
translation: 这一搭配在理论上听起来很有前景但他们缺乏化学反应，让埃迪·墨菲和罗伯特·德尼罗在《秀时》中的表现看起来像是老熟悉的表演搭档。
back_translation: This pairing sounds promising in theory... but they lack chemistry, making Eddie Murphy and Robert De Niro's performances in "Showtime" seem like the old familiar acting duo.

text: you come away thinking not only that kate is n't very bright , but that she has n't been worth caring about and that maybe she , janine and molly -- an all-woman dysfunctional family -- deserve one another .
translation: 你会觉得凯特不仅不聪明，而且她也不值得关心，或许她、贾宁和莫莉——一个全女性的功能失调家庭——应该彼此相配。
back_translation: You might feel that Kate is not only not smart, but also not worthy of concern; perhaps she, Janine, and Molly—an entirely female dysfunctional family—should be more compatible with each other.

text: if you 're looking for something new and hoping for something entertaining , you 're in luck .
translation: 如果你在寻找一些新鲜事物并希望得到一些娱乐，那你就运气来了。
back_translation: If you are looking for something new and hope to get some entertainment, then you're in luck.

text: a triumph of pure craft and passionate heart .
translation: 纯粹技艺与热情之心的胜利。
back_translation: The victory of pure craftsmanship and passionate heart.

text: cool .
translation: 酷。
back_translation: Cool.

text: the film boasts dry humor and jarring shocks , plus moments of breathtaking mystery .
translation: 这部影片展现了干涩的幽默和令人震惊的冲击，以及惊心动魄的神秘时刻。
back_translation: This film showcases dry humor and shocking impact, as well as heart-pounding mysterious moments.

text: beautiful , angry and sad , with a curious sick poetry , as if the marquis de sade had gone in for pastel landscapes .
translation: 美丽、愤怒和悲伤，带着一种好奇的病态诗意，仿佛萨德侯爵迷上了柔和的风景画。
back_translation: Beauty, anger, and sadness, infused with a morbid sense of curious poetry, as if the Marquis de Sade had become enamored with gentle landscape paintings.

text: morvern callar confirms lynne ramsay as an important , original talent in international cinema .
translation: 《莫尔温·卡拉尔》确认林恩·拉姆塞在国际电影中是一个重要的原创新星。
back_translation: "Morven Callar" confirms Lynne Ramsay as an important original new star in international cinema.

text: guy gets girl , guy loses girl , audience falls asleep .
translation: 男孩追女孩，男孩失去女孩，观众入睡。
back_translation: The boy chases the girl, the boy loses the girl, and the audience falls asleep.

text: there are so few films about the plight of american indians in modern america that skins comes as a welcome , if downbeat , missive from a forgotten front .
translation: 关于美国印第安人在现代美国困境的电影少之又少，因此《皮肤》作为一封被遗忘战线的欢迎信，尽管阴郁，但仍然令人铭记。
back_translation: There are very few films about Native Americans in modern America, so "Skin," as a welcome letter from a forgotten front, is memorable despite its gloom.

text: depressingly thin and exhaustingly contrived .
translation: 令人沮丧的薄弱和令人疲惫的牵强。
back_translation: Frustrating weakness and exhausting strain.

text: bluer than the atlantic and more biologically detailed than an autopsy , the movie ... is , also , frequently hilarious .
translation: 比大西洋更蓝，比尸检更生物详细，这部电影也是，常常令人捧腹大笑。
back_translation: Bluer than the Atlantic, more biologically detailed than an autopsy, this movie... is also often laugh-out-loud funny.

text: bouquet gives a performance that is masterly .
translation: 花束的表演堪称大师之作。
back_translation: The bouquet performance can be called a masterpiece.

text: it 's as sorry a mess as its director 's diabolical debut , mad cows .
translation: 这部影片的混乱程度与导演其丑陋的处女作《疯狂的牛》一样糟糕。
back_translation: The level of chaos in this film is as bad as the director's ugly debut, "Crazy Cow."

text: there 's a lot to recommend read my lips .
translation: 《读我的嘴巴》有很多值得推荐的地方。
back_translation: "Read My Lips" has many aspects that are worth recommending.

text: i 'd rather watch a rerun of the powerpuff girls
translation: 我宁愿看《飞天小女警》的重播。
back_translation: I would rather watch a rerun of "The Powerpuff Girls."

text: this submarine drama earns the right to be favorably compared to das boot .
translation: 这部潜艇剧集有理由与《大潜艇》相提并论。
back_translation: This submarine series has reason to be compared with "The Great Submarine."

text: the only question ... is to determine how well the schmaltz is manufactured -- to assess the quality of the manipulative engineering .
translation: 唯一的问题是要确定这种肉汤的制作质量——评估其操控工程的质量。
back_translation: The only issue is to determine the quality of the broth's production - to evaluate the quality of its manipulation process.

text: it 's impossible to even categorize this as a smutty guilty pleasure .
translation: 将其归类为一种污秽的罪恶快感甚至是不可能的。
back_translation: It is even impossible to classify it as a filthy sinful pleasure.

text: maintains your interest until the end and even leaves you with a few lingering animated thoughts .
translation: 保持你直到最后的兴趣，甚至留下几个挥之不去的思考。
back_translation: Maintain your interest until the end, and even leave behind some lingering thoughts.

text: the movie does n't think much of its characters , its protagonist , or of us .
translation: 这部电影对它的角色、主角以及我们并不太看重。
back_translation: This movie doesn't place much importance on its characters, protagonists, or us.

text: britney spears ' phoniness is nothing compared to the movie 's contrived , lame screenplay and listless direction .
translation: 布兰妮·斯皮尔斯的做作与电影那虚情假意、无趣的剧本和乏味的导演相比简直微不足道。
back_translation: Britney Spears' affectation is insignificant compared to the insincerity, boredom of the script, and the tedious direction of the movie.

text: the movie 's progression into rambling incoherence gives new meaning to the phrase ` fatal script error . '
translation: 这部电影的发展进入了喋喋不休的无意义状态，使得“致命脚本错误”这个短语获得了新的含义。
back_translation: The development of this movie has entered a tedious and meaningless state, giving the phrase "fatal script error" a new meaning.

text: devos and cassel have tremendous chemistry -- their sexual and romantic tension , while never really vocalized , is palpable .
translation: 德沃斯和卡塞尔之间有着巨大的化学反应——他们之间的性和浪漫张力虽然从未真正表达出来，但却是触手可及的。
back_translation: There is a huge chemical reaction between DeVos and Cassel—though their sexual and romantic tension has never truly been expressed, it is palpable.

text: ... about as exciting to watch as two last-place basketball teams playing one another on the final day of the season .
translation: ... 就像两个垫底的篮球队在赛季的最后一天互相对抗一样无聊。
back_translation: ... just as boring as two bottom-ranked basketball teams facing each other on the last day of the season.

text: terrific as nadia , a russian mail-order bride who comes to america speaking not a word of english , it 's kidman who holds the film together with a supremely kittenish performance that gradually accumulates more layers .
translation: 娜迪亚是一位来自俄罗斯的邮购新娘，她来到美国时一句英语都不会说，而妮可·基德曼的表演却将整部电影紧紧连在一起，展现出了极其俏皮的形象，并逐渐积累了更多的层次。
back_translation: Nadia is a mail-order bride from Russia who came to the United States without being able to speak a word of English, while Nicole Kidman's performance tightly connects the entire film, showcasing an extremely playful character and gradually adding more layers.

text: he fails .
translation: 他失败了。
back_translation: He failed.

text: this new movie version of the alexandre dumas classic is the stuff of high romance , brought off with considerable wit .
translation: 这部亚历山大·仲马经典作品的新电影版充满了浓厚的浪漫气息，且以相当机智的方式呈现。
back_translation: This new film adaptation of Alexandre Dumas' classic work is filled with a strong sense of romance and presented in a quite clever manner.

text: nicolas cage is n't the first actor to lead a group of talented friends astray , and this movie wo n't create a ruffle in what is already an erratic career .
translation: 尼古拉斯·凯奇并不是第一个带领一群有才华的朋友误入歧途的演员，而这部电影也不会在他已经动荡不定的职业生涯中掀起波澜。
back_translation: Nicolas Cage is not the first actor to lead a group of talented friends astray, and this movie will not cause a stir in his already tumultuous career.

text: it 's dark but has wonderfully funny moments ; you care about the characters ; and the action and special effects are first-rate .
translation: 虽然它很黑暗，但有着精彩的幽默时刻；你会在乎角色；而且动作和特效都是一流的。
back_translation: Although it is dark, it has wonderful moments of humor; you will care about the characters; and the action and special effects are top-notch.

text: jeong-hyang lee 's film is deceptively simple , deeply satisfying .
translation: 李正香的电影表面看似简单，实则令人深感满意。
back_translation: Li Zhengxiang's films may seem simple on the surface, but they are truly satisfying.

text: the bodily function jokes are about what you 'd expect , but there are rich veins of funny stuff in this movie .
translation: 身体功能的笑话是你所期待的，但这部电影中有丰富的幽默素材。
back_translation: The jokes about bodily functions are what you might expect, but this movie is rich in humorous material.

text: for a film about action , ultimate x is the gabbiest giant-screen movie ever , bogging down in a barrage of hype .
translation: 关于一部动作电影，终极X是迄今为止最唠叨的巨幕电影，陷入了一片宣传的泥沼。
back_translation: About an action movie, Ultimate X is the most talkative blockbuster film to date, mired in a quagmire of promotion.

text: it 's a solid movie about people whose lives are anything but .
translation: 这是一部关于生活远非简单的人的坚实电影。
back_translation: This is a solid movie about life being anything but simple for people.

text: one ca n't shake the feeling that crossroads is nothing more than an hour-and-a-half-long commercial for britney 's latest album .
translation: 人们无法摆脱这种感觉，《十字路口》不过是为布兰妮最新专辑的一个一个半小时的广告。
back_translation: People can't shake the feeling that "Crossroads" is just a one-and-a-half-hour advertisement for Britney's latest album.

text: visually engrossing , seldom hammy , honorably mexican and burns its kahlories with conviction .
translation: 视觉上引人入胜，鲜少夸张，荣誉地呈现墨西哥风情，坚定地燃烧其热量。
back_translation: Visually captivating, rarely exaggerated, it proudly showcases Mexican flair while steadfastly igniting its heat.

text: high crimes steals so freely from other movies and combines enough disparate types of films that it ca n't help but engage an audience .
translation: 《高犯罪》从其他电影中窃取灵感，并结合了足够多元化的影片类型，因此它无法不吸引观众。
back_translation: "High Crime" draws inspiration from other movies and combines a diverse range of film genres, making it impossible not to attract viewers.

text: it makes even elizabeth hurley seem graceless and ugly .
translation: 这甚至让伊丽莎白·赫利显得毫无优雅和丑陋。
back_translation: This even made Elizabeth Hurley appear completely devoid of elegance and ugly.

text: if you can read the subtitles -lrb- the opera is sung in italian -rrb- and you like ` masterpiece theatre ' type costumes , you 'll enjoy this movie .
translation: 如果你能读懂字幕（这部歌剧是用意大利语演唱的），而且你喜欢“杰作剧院”风格的服装，你会喜欢这部电影。
back_translation: If you can understand the subtitles (this opera is performed in Italian), and you like the costume style of "Masterpiece Theatre," you will enjoy this film.

text: a terrifically entertaining specimen of spielbergian sci-fi .
translation: 一个极具娱乐性的斯皮尔伯格式科幻作品。
back_translation: A highly entertaining Spielberg-style sci-fi work.

text: simply a re-hash of the other seven films .
translation: 只是对其他七部电影的重新加工。
back_translation: It is just a reworking of the other seven films.

text: hmmm ... might i suggest that the wayward wooden one end it all by stuffing himself into an electric pencil sharpener ?
translation: 嗯我可以建议那位迷途的木头家伙通过把自己塞进一个电动削铅笔机来结束一切吗？
back_translation: Um... Can I suggest that lost wooden guy to end it all by stuffing himself into an electric pencil sharpener?

text: a playful iranian parable about openness , particularly the need for people of diverse political perspectives to get along despite their ideological differences .
translation: 一个关于开放的伊朗寓言，特别是强调尽管意识形态存在差异，来自不同政治观点的人们仍需和睦相处。
back_translation: A fable about an open Iran, particularly emphasizing that despite ideological differences, people from different political perspectives still need to coexist peacefully.

text: death might be a release .
translation: 死亡可能是一种解脱。
back_translation: Death may be a form of liberation.

text: the movie 's messages are quite admirable , but the story is just too clich茅d and too often strains credulity .
translation: 这部电影的信息非常值得赞赏，但故事实在是太陈词滥调，且常常让人难以置信。
back_translation: The information in this movie is commendable, but the story is just too clichéd and often hard to believe.

text: a live-action cartoon , a fast-moving and cheerfully simplistic 88 minutes of exaggerated action put together with the preteen boy in mind .
translation: 一部真人动画片，快速而愉快地简化了88分钟的夸张动作，旨在迎合青少年男孩的口味。
back_translation: A live-action animated film that quickly and pleasantly simplifies 88 minutes of exaggerated action, aimed at appealing to teenage boys.

text: as ex-marine walter , who may or may not have shot kennedy , actor raymond j. barry is perfectly creepy and believable .
translation: 作为前海军陆战队员沃尔特，雷蒙德·J·巴里扮演的角色可能曾经或未曾射击肯尼迪，令人觉得他既令人毛骨悚然又可信。
back_translation: As former Marine Walter, the role played by Raymond J. Barry may have once or may not have shot Kennedy, making him seem both eerie and credible.

text: the production design , score and choreography are simply intoxicating .

text: a perfect example of rancid , well-intentioned , but shamelessly manipulative movie making .

translation: 卢克斯，现在已八十多岁，以叙述者、犹太奶奶和主题的身份进行精彩的组合表演——带我们走进一部部分传记、部分娱乐和部分历史的影片。

translation: 萨尔玛融入当地文化，在这部关于墨西哥偶像的色彩斑斓的传记片中表现得前所未有的出色。

text: not everyone will welcome or accept the trials of henry kissinger as faithful portraiture , but few can argue that the debate it joins is a necessary and timely one .
translation: 并非每个人都会欢迎或接受《亨利·基辛格的考验》作为忠实的肖像，但很少有人能否认它所引发的辩论是一个必要且及时的议题。

back_translation: A lively and imaginative children's film that explores the new Augustinian theology: Is God trapped in heaven out of fear of His most famous creation?

text: alas , it 's the man that makes the clothes .

text: klein , charming in comedies like american pie and dead-on in election , delivers one of the saddest action hero performances ever witnessed .
translation: 克莱因在《美国派》和《竞选》这样的喜剧中表现出色，在《选举》中精准到位，但他在这里交出了有史以来最悲伤的动作英雄表演之一。
back_translation: Klein excels in comedies like "American Pie" and "Election," delivering a precise performance in "Election," but here he gives one of the saddest action hero performances ever.

text: from the dull , surreal ache of mortal awareness emerges a radiant character portrait .

translation: 尽管设置在夏威夷，有科幻元素和一些喧闹的滑稽时刻，但《莉萝》的基本情节完全可以来自一部泪水斑斑的复古雪莉·坦普尔剧本。

text: gooding is the energetic frontman , and it 's hard to resist his enthusiasm , even if the filmmakers come up with nothing original in the way of slapstick sequences .

back_translation: Gudin is a dynamic lead singer; even though the filmmakers didn't present any original content in the humorous scenes, his enthusiasm remains hard to resist.

text: ... the whole thing succeeded only in making me groggy .
translation: ... 整件事只让我感到头昏眼花。

text: just when you think that every possible angle has been exhausted by documentarians , another new film emerges with yet another remarkable yet shockingly little-known perspective .
translation: 就在你认为纪录片制作人已经探讨了所有可能的角度时，又一部新影片出现，以一个令人惊讶且鲜为人知的视角展示。

text: think of it as gidget , only with muscles and a lot more smarts , but just as endearing and easy to watch .
translation: 把它想象成一个肌肉发达、聪明得多的吉吉特，但同样迷人，令人容易观看。

text: grant carries the day with impeccable comic timing , raffish charm and piercing intellect .
translation: 格兰特以无可挑剔的喜剧时机、放荡不羁的魅力和锐利的智慧赢得了胜利。

text: a frustrating ` tweener ' -- too slick , contrived and exploitative for the art houses and too cynical , small and decadent for the malls .
translation: 令人沮丧的“中间电影”——对艺术电影院来说过于华丽、做作和剥削，对购物中心来说则过于愤世嫉俗、规模小且颓废。

text: predictably soulless techno-tripe .
translation: 可预测的无灵魂电子废物。

text: the filmmakers keep pushing the jokes at the expense of character until things fall apart .

text: it 's incredible the number of stories the holocaust has generated .
translation: 令人难以置信的是，关于大屠杀产生的故事数量之多。

text: the movie keeps coming back to the achingly unfunny phonce and his several silly subplots .

text: the film 's most improbable feat ?
translation: 这部电影最不可能的成就是什么？

text: the charm of revolution os is rather the way it introduces you to new , fervently held ideas and fanciful thinkers .
translation: 革命操作系统的魅力在于它向你介绍新的、热烈表达的思想和富有想象力的思想家。

text: there is no substitute for on-screen chemistry , and when friel pulls the strings that make williams sink into melancholia , the reaction in williams is as visceral as a gut punch .
translation: 荧幕上的化学反应是无可替代的，当弗里尔操控着让威廉姆斯陷入忧郁时，威廉姆斯的反应宛如一记重拳，直击灵魂。

text: there are some fairly unsettling scenes , but they never succeed in really rattling the viewer .
translation: 有些场景相当不安，但是它们从未真正成功地让观众感到不安。

text: possibly the most irresponsible picture ever released by a major film studio .
translation: 可能是主要电影公司发布的最不负责任的图片。

text: the characters are paper thin and the plot is so cliched and contrived that it makes your least favorite james bond movie seem as cleverly plotted as the usual suspects .

text: a crisp psychological drama -lrb- and -rrb- a fascinating little thriller that would have been perfect for an old `` twilight zone '' episode .
translation: 一部简洁的心理剧——以及——一部引人入胜的小惊悚片，完全可以成为旧版“黄昏区”剧集的完美剧集。
back_translation: A concise psychological drama—and—a captivating little thriller—could perfectly fit into the classic "Twilight Zone" series.

text: there is simply no doubt that this film asks the right questions at the right time in the history of our country .
translation: 毫无疑问，这部电影在我们国家历史上恰逢其时地提出了正确的问题。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this movie timely raises the right questions in the history of our country.

text: time stands still in more ways that one in clockstoppers , a sci-fi thriller as lazy as it is interminable .
translation: 《时钟停止者》是一部科幻惊悚片，在多种方式上时间静止，既懒散又漫长。
back_translation: "The Clock Stopper" is a sci-fi thriller where time comes to a standstill in various ways, both lazily and for a long duration.

text: a dark , quirky road movie that constantly defies expectation .
translation: 一部黑暗而古怪的公路电影，不断挑战观众的期望。
back_translation: A dark and bizarre road movie that constantly challenges the audience's expectations.

text: mr. spielberg and his company just want you to enjoy yourselves without feeling conned .
translation: 斯皮尔伯格先生和他的公司只希望你们尽情享受，而不会感到被欺骗。
back_translation: Mr. Spielberg and his company just hope you enjoy it without feeling deceived.

text: what the audience feels is exhaustion , from watching a movie that is dark -lrb- dark green , to be exact -rrb- , sour , bloody and mean .
translation: 观众感到的是一种疲惫，因为观看了一部阴暗的电影（确切来说是深绿色的），酸涩、血腥且残酷。
back_translation: The audience feels a sense of fatigue because they have watched a dark movie (to be precise, a deep green one) that is sour, bloody, and brutal.

text: mr. polanski is in his element here : alone , abandoned , but still consoled by his art , which is more than he has ever revealed before about the source of his spiritual survival .
translation: 波兰斯基先生在这里找到了自己的位置：孤独，被遗弃，但仍然因他的艺术而得到安慰，这比他之前所揭露的关于他精神生存源泉的更多。
back_translation: Mr. Polanski has found his place here: lonely, abandoned, but still comforted by his art, which reveals more about the source of his spiritual existence than he had previously exposed.

text: a devastating indictment of unbridled greed and materalism .
translation: 对不受限制的贪婪和物质主义的毁灭性指控。
back_translation: A devastating accusation against unrestricted greed and materialism.

text: it feels like very light errol morris , focusing on eccentricity but failing , ultimately , to make something bigger out of its scrapbook of oddballs .
translation: 这感觉像是很轻的厄尔·莫里斯，专注于怪异却最终未能从其奇人奇事的剪贴簿中创作出更大的东西。
back_translation: This feels like a very light Errol Morris, focusing on the bizarre but ultimately failing to create something greater from its scrapbook of oddities and eccentricities.

text: it 's full of cheesy dialogue , but great trashy fun that finally returns de palma to his pulpy thrillers of the early '80s .
translation: 这部电影充满了老套的对话，但是一种很棒的低俗乐趣，最终让德帕尔马回归到了他80年代初的通俗惊悚片风格。
back_translation: This movie is filled with clichéd dialogue, but it provides a wonderful lowbrow enjoyment that ultimately brings De Palma back to his popular thriller style from the early 1980s.

text: diggs and lathan are among the chief reasons brown sugar is such a sweet and sexy film .
translation: 迪格斯和拉森是《棕糖》这部电影如此甜蜜和性感的主要原因。
back_translation: Diggs and Larson are the main reasons why the movie "Brown Sugar" is so sweet and sexy.

text: but this new jangle of noise , mayhem and stupidity must be a serious contender for the title .
translation: 但这种新奇的噪音、混乱和愚蠢一定是夺冠的有力竞争者。
back_translation: But this new and novel noise, chaos, and stupidity must be strong contenders for the championship.

text: darkly funny and frequently insightful .
translation: 黑暗幽默且常常具有洞察力。
back_translation: Dark humor is often insightful.

text: formuliac , but fun .
translation: 公式化，但有趣。
back_translation: Formalized, yet interesting.

text: there 's some good material in their story about a retail clerk wanting more out of life , but the movie too often spins its wheels with familiar situations and repetitive scenes .
translation: 他们的故事中有一些很好的素材，讲述了一位零售店员想要更多生活的追求，但这部电影太常陷入熟悉的情境和重复的场景。
back_translation: There are some great materials in their story that tell of a retail worker's pursuit of more out of life, but the film often gets trapped in familiar situations and repetitive scenes.

text: damon brings the proper conviction to his role as -lrb- jason bourne -rrb- .
translation: 达蒙在他饰演的 -lrb- 杰森·伯恩 -rrb- 角色中展现了恰当的信念。
back_translation: Damon demonstrated the right conviction in his role as Jason Bourne.

text: the movie does n't generate a lot of energy .
translation: 这部电影没有产生很多能量。
back_translation: This movie did not generate a lot of energy.

text: and yet , it still works .
translation: 然而，它仍然有效。
back_translation: However, it is still effective.

text: it squanders chan 's uniqueness ; it could even be said to squander jennifer love hewitt !
translation: 它浪费了詹的独特性；甚至可以说也浪费了詹妮弗·洛夫·休伊特！
back_translation: It wasted the uniqueness of Zach; one could even say it wasted Jennifer Love Hewitt as well!

text: ... a light , yet engrossing piece .
translation: ... 一篇轻松而引人入胜的作品。
back_translation: ... a light and engaging piece of work.

text: really quite funny .
translation: 真的很有趣。
back_translation: Really interesting.

text: pretty much sucks , but has a funny moment or two .
translation: 大致上很糟，但有一两个搞笑的时刻。
back_translation: Overall it's pretty bad, but there are one or two funny moments.

text: a singularly off-putting romantic comedy .
translation: 一种特别令人厌恶的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A particularly disgusting romantic comedy.

text: diaz wears out her welcome in her most charmless performance
translation: 迪亚兹在她最无魅力的表演中消磨了她的欢迎度。
back_translation: Diaz wore down her popularity with her least charming performance.

text: the actors improvise and scream their way around this movie directionless , lacking any of the rollicking dark humor so necessary to make this kind of idea work on screen .
translation: 演员们在这部电影中即兴发挥，尖叫着毫无方向，缺乏使这一类型主意在屏幕上有效运作所必需的欢快黑色幽默。
back_translation: The actors improvise in this film, screaming aimlessly, lacking the playful dark humor necessary for making this genre work effectively on screen.

text: the off-center humor is a constant , and the ensemble gives it a buoyant delivery .
translation: 这种离中心的幽默感是一种常态，而演出阵容则赋予了它一种轻快的表现。
back_translation: This off-center sense of humor is a norm, and the cast gives it a lively performance.

text: nearly all the fundamentals you take for granted in most films are mishandled here .
translation: 几乎所有你在大多数电影中视为理所当然的基础要素在这里都被处理得不当。
back_translation: Almost all the fundamental elements that you take for granted in most movies are poorly handled here.

text: an eye-boggling blend of psychedelic devices , special effects and backgrounds , ` spy kids 2 ' is a visual treat for all audiences .
translation: 《间谍先锋2》是一场令人惊叹的视觉盛宴，融合了迷幻装置、特效和背景，适合所有观众。
back_translation: "Spy Vanguard 2" is a stunning visual feast, blending psychedelic devices, special effects, and backgrounds, suitable for all audiences.

text: a lot of talent is wasted in this crass , low-wattage endeavor .
translation: 在这个粗俗、低水平的努力中，许多才能被浪费了。
back_translation: In this coarse, low-level endeavor, many talents have been wasted.

text: saddled with an unwieldy cast of characters and angles , but the payoff is powerful and revelatory .
translation: 背负着复杂的角色和情节，但回报却是强大而启发性的。
back_translation: Bearing complex roles and plots, yet the reward is powerful and inspirational.

text: an engaging criminal romp that will have viewers guessing just who 's being conned right up to the finale .
translation: 一场引人入胜的犯罪冒险，将让观众在最后一刻猜测究竟谁在被欺骗。
back_translation: An engaging crime adventure that will keep the audience guessing until the last moment about who is being deceived.

text: an engrossing portrait of uncompromising artists trying to create something original against the backdrop of a corporate music industry that only seems to care about the bottom line .
translation: 一幅引人入胜的肖像，展现了那些在只关心利润的企业音乐行业背景下，努力创作出原创作品的坚定艺术家们。
back_translation: An engaging portrait that showcases the steadfast artists striving to create original works amidst a music industry backdrop that only cares about profits.

text: kaufman 's script is never especially clever and often is rather pretentious .
translation: 考夫曼的剧本从来没有特别聪明，往往显得有些自负。
back_translation: Kaufman's scripts have never been particularly clever and often come across as somewhat arrogant.

text: it celebrates the group 's playful spark of nonconformity , glancing vividly back at what hibiscus grandly called his ` angels of light . '
translation: 它庆祝了这个团体不拘一格的顽皮火花，生动地回顾了海棠花所称之为的“光之天使”。
back_translation: It celebrates the group's unconventional mischievous spark and vividly recalls what the begonia refers to as "angels of light."

text: like coming into a long-running , well-written television series where you 've missed the first half-dozen episodes and probably wo n't see the next six .
translation: 就像进入一部长期播出的、剧本精良的电视剧，而你错过了前六集，也可能不会看到接下来的六集。
back_translation: It's like entering a long-running, well-scripted TV series, where you've missed the first six episodes and may not see the next six either.

text: its flame-like , roiling black-and-white inspires trembling and gratitude .
translation: 它那如火焰般翻滚的黑白色彩令人颤栗，充满感激。
back_translation: Its rolling black and white colors, like flames, are breathtaking and filled with gratitude.

text: although it includes a fair share of dumb drug jokes and predictable slapstick , `` orange county '' is far funnier than it would seem to have any right to be .
translation: 尽管包含了一些愚蠢的毒品笑话和可预测的滑稽场景，《橙县》远比它看起来应该有的要有趣得多。
back_translation: Despite containing some silly drug jokes and predictable comedic scenes, "Orange County" is much more entertaining than it seems it should be.

text: -lrb- the film -rrb- tackles the topic of relationships in such a straightforward , emotionally honest manner that by the end , it 's impossible to ascertain whether the film is , at its core , deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful .
translation: （这部电影）以如此直接和情感真诚的方式探讨了关系的话题，以至于到最后，很难确定这部电影在本质上是深度悲观还是悄然充满希望。
back_translation: (This movie) explores the topic of relationships in such a direct and emotionally sincere manner that by the end, it is hard to determine whether the film is fundamentally deeply pessimistic or quietly filled with hope.

text: the film is weighed down by supporting characters who are either too goodly , wise and knowing or downright comically evil .
translation: 这部电影被那些要么过于善良、聪明而敏锐，要么彻底滑稽邪恶的配角所拖累。
back_translation: This movie is dragged down by supporting characters who are either excessively kind, smart and sharp, or completely comically evil.

text: it 's a visual rorschach test and i must have failed .
translation: 这是一项视觉罗夏墨迹测试，而我一定是失败了。
back_translation: This is a visual Rorschach inkblot test, and I must have failed it.

text: an uncomfortable experience , but one as brave and challenging as you could possibly expect these days from american cinema .
translation: 一种不舒服的体验，但正如你如今从美国电影中所能期待的那样勇敢而具有挑战性。
back_translation: An uncomfortable experience, but as you can now expect from American movies, it is brave and challenging.

text: the huskies are beautiful , the border collie is funny and the overall feeling is genial and decent .
translation: 哈士奇很美，边境牧羊犬很有趣，整体感觉温和而体面。
back_translation: Huskies are beautiful, Border Collies are interesting, and overall they feel gentle and dignified.

text: charming and witty , it 's also somewhat clumsy .
translation: 迷人而机智，但也有些笨拙。
back_translation: Charming and witty, but also a bit clumsy.

text: amari has dressed up this little parable in a fairly irresistible package full of privileged moments and memorable performances .
translation: 阿玛里用一种相当吸引人的方式装饰了这个小寓言，充满了特权时刻和难忘的表演。
back_translation: Amari decorated this little fable in a quite charming way, full of privileged moments and unforgettable performances.

text: with mcconaughey in an entirely irony-free zone and bale reduced mainly to batting his sensitive eyelids , there 's not enough intelligence , wit or innovation on the screen to attract and sustain an older crowd .
translation: 麦康纳和贝尔分别处于一个完全没有讽刺的环境中，而贝尔仅仅是在挥动他敏感的眼睑，屏幕上没有足够的智慧、机智或创新来吸引和维持年长观众的兴趣。
back_translation: McConaughey and Bell are in an environment completely devoid of irony, while Bell is merely fluttering his sensitive eyelids, with not enough wisdom, wit, or innovation on screen to attract and maintain the interest of older audiences.

text: a vivid , spicy footnote to history , and a movie that grips and holds you in rapt attention from start to finish .
translation: 历史的一段生动、辛辣的注脚，以及一部从头到尾都紧紧抓住并吸引你注意力的电影。
back_translation: A vivid and poignant footnote to history, as well as a film that keeps you captivated and engaged from beginning to end.

text: ... an eerily suspenseful , deeply absorbing piece that works as a treatise on spirituality as well as a solid sci-fi thriller .
translation: ... 一部阴森悬疑、深具吸引力的作品，既是一篇关于灵性的论述，也是一部扎实的科幻惊悚片。
back_translation: ... a chilling and suspenseful work that is both a discourse on spirituality and a solid sci-fi thriller.

text: despite juliet stevenon 's attempt to bring cohesion to pamela 's emotional roller coaster life , it is not enough to give the film the substance it so desperately needs .
translation: 尽管朱丽叶·史蒂文森试图为帕梅拉的情感过山车般的生活带来连贯性，但这仍然不足以给予电影所急需的实质内容。
back_translation: Although Juliet Stevenson tries to bring coherence to Pamela's emotionally tumultuous life, it still falls short of providing the substance that the film desperately needs.

text: this film is an act of spiritual faith -- an eloquent , deeply felt meditation on the nature of compassion .
translation: 这部电影是一种精神信仰的表现——对慈悲本质的深刻而富有感染力的沉思。
back_translation: This film is a manifestation of spiritual belief - a profound and evocative contemplation of the essence of compassion.

text: it all plays out ... like a high-end john hughes comedy , a kind of elder bueller 's time out .
translation: 一切就像一部高端的约翰·休斯喜剧，某种程度上像是老布勒的休息时间。
back_translation: Everything feels like an upscale John Hughes comedy, somewhat akin to Old Blue's downtime.

text: what with all the blanket statements and dime-store ruminations on vanity , the worries of the rich and sudden wisdom , the film becomes a sermon for most of its running time .
translation: 考虑到所有关于虚荣的笼统陈述和低级反思、富人的烦恼以及突如其来的智慧，这部电影在大部分时间里变成了一场说教。
back_translation: Considering all the general statements about vanity and low-level reflections, the troubles of the rich, and sudden wisdom, this film mostly turns into a sermon.

text: wildly incompetent but brilliantly named half past dead -- or for seagal pessimists : totally past his prime .
translation: 极其无能但名字极具创意——半死不活——或者对于西戈尔的悲观者来说：完全已过巅峰。
back_translation: Extremely incompetent but with a highly creative name—Half-Alive—or for the pessimists of Sigol: completely past its peak.

text: those eternally devoted to the insanity of black will have an intermittently good time .
translation: 那些永远致力于黑暗疯狂的人将会时不时地享受美好时光。
back_translation: Those who are forever devoted to the dark madness will occasionally enjoy good times.

text: the pretensions -- and disposable story -- sink the movie .
translation: 自命不凡的表现和可有可无的故事拖累了这部电影。
back_translation: The pretentious performances and the unnecessary story weighed down this film.

text: she nearly glows with enthusiasm , sensuality and a conniving wit .
translation: 她几乎散发出热情、性感和狡诈的智慧。
back_translation: She exudes a blend of passion, sensuality, and cunning intelligence.

text: and for many of us , that 's good enough .
translation: 对我们许多人来说，这已经足够了。
back_translation: For many of us, this is already enough.

text: meyjes ... has done his homework and soaked up some jazzy new revisionist theories about the origins of nazi politics and aesthetics .
translation: 梅耶斯做好了功课，吸收了一些关于纳粹政治和美学起源的新修正主义理论。
back_translation: Meyers... did his homework and absorbed some new revisionist theories about the origins of Nazi politics and aesthetics.

text: poetic , heartbreaking .
translation: 富有诗意，令人心碎。
back_translation: Poetic and heart-wrenching.

text: a memorable experience that , like many of his works , presents weighty issues colorfully wrapped up in his own idiosyncratic strain of kitschy goodwill .
translation: 一个难忘的经历，像他许多作品一样，以他自己特有的庸俗善意的风格，生动地包装了重要的问题。
back_translation: A memorable experience, like many of his works, vividly packaged important issues in his own distinct style of vulgar kindness.

text: as an actress , madonna is one helluva singer .
translation: 作为一名女演员，麦当娜简直是一位出色的歌手。
back_translation: As an actress, Madonna is an outstanding singer.

text: the script by vincent r. nebrida ... tries to cram too many ingredients into one small pot .
translation: 文森特·R·内布里达的剧本...试图将太多成分塞进一个小锅里。
back_translation: Vincent R. Negroni's screenplay... tries to cram too many ingredients into a small pot.

text: just as the lousy tarantino imitations have subsided , here comes the first lousy guy ritchie imitation .
translation: 就在劣质的塔伦蒂诺模仿逐渐平息之时，第一部劣质的盖·里奇模仿片来了。
back_translation: Just as the imitation of Quentin Tarantino began to wane, the first low-quality imitation of Guy Ritchie arrived.

text: the direction has a fluid , no-nonsense authority , and the performances by harris , phifer and cam ` ron seal the deal .
translation: 导演具有一种流畅、严肃的权威感，而哈里斯、菲佛和卡姆·朗的表演则为这部作品定下了基调。
back_translation: The director possesses a smooth and serious sense of authority, while the performances of Harris, Pfeiffer, and Kamala Harris set the tone for the work.

text: a film that will enthrall the whole family .
translation: 一部能够让整个家庭着迷的电影。
back_translation: A movie that can captivate the entire family.

text: it just does n't have anything really interesting to say .
translation: 它只是没有什么真正有趣的内容可说。
back_translation: It just doesn't have anything truly interesting to say.

text: much of the lady and the duke is about quiet , decisive moments between members of the cultural elite as they determine how to proceed as the world implodes .
translation: 《女士与公爵》大部分内容围绕文化精英之间的安静而果断的时刻，展示他们在世界崩溃之际如何决定下一步行动。
back_translation: "The Lady and the Duke" primarily revolves around the quiet yet decisive moments between cultural elites, showcasing how they determine their next course of action in the face of a collapsing world.

text: while you have to admit it 's semi-amusing to watch robert deniro belt out `` when you 're a jet , you 're a jet all the way , '' it 's equally distasteful to watch him sing the lyrics to `` tonight . ''
translation: 虽然你不得不承认，看罗伯特·德尼罗高唱“当你是喷气机时，就是喷气机直到最后”是半有趣的，但观看他唱“今晚”的歌词同样让人感到不愉快。
back_translation: Although you have to admit that it’s somewhat amusing to see Robert De Niro singing "When you're a Jet, you're a Jet all the way," watching him sing the lyrics of "Tonight" is equally unsettling.

text: a quaint , romanticized rendering .
translation: 一个古雅、浪漫化的表现。
back_translation: An expression that is elegant and romanticized.

text: filmmakers david weissman and bill weber benefit enormously from the cockettes ' camera craziness -- not only did they film performances , but they did the same at home .
translation: 电影制作人大卫·韦斯曼和比尔·韦伯从科克特斯的摄像疯狂中受益匪浅 —— 他们不仅拍摄了现场表演，还在家中进行了同样的拍摄。
back_translation: Film producers David Weissman and Bill Weber benefited immensely from the Cockteau's filming frenzy — they not only filmed live performances but also conducted similar shoot at home.

text: as chilling and fascinating as philippe mora 's modern hitler-study , snide and prejudice .
translation: 与菲利普·莫拉的现代希特勒研究《讽刺与偏见》一样令人毛骨悚然和迷人。
back_translation: Just as chilling and captivating as Philip Mora's modern Hitler studies "Satire and Prejudice."

text: a little too ponderous to work as shallow entertainment , not remotely incisive enough to qualify as drama , monsoon wedding serves mostly to whet one 's appetite for the bollywood films .
translation: 《季风婚礼》有些沉闷，不足以作为肤浅的娱乐，也远不够犀利，无法称为戏剧，主要是激发人们对宝莱坞电影的兴趣。
back_translation: "Monsoon Wedding" is somewhat dull, not enough to serve as superficial entertainment, and it is far from sharp enough to be considered drama. Its main purpose is to stimulate people's interest in Bollywood films.

text: a movie that the less charitable might describe as a castrated cross between highlander and lolita .
translation: 一些人可能会将这部电影描述为《围城》与《洛丽塔》的阉割版混合体。
back_translation: Some people might describe this movie as a neutered hybrid of "Fortress Besieged" and "Lolita."

text: seagal , who looks more like danny aiello these days , mumbles his way through the movie .
translation: 西格尔如今看起来更像丹尼·艾洛，他在电影中咕哝着。
back_translation: Sigel now looks more like Danny Aiello, mumbling in the film.

text: a full experience , a love story and a murder mystery that expands into a meditation on the deep deceptions of innocence .
translation: 一个完整的体验，一段爱情故事，以及一个谋杀之谜，扩展成对纯真深层欺骗的沉思。
back_translation: A complete experience, a love story, and a murder mystery, expanded into a meditation on the deep deception of innocence.

text: how do you make a movie with depth about a man who lacked any ?
translation: 如何拍摄一部关于一个缺乏深度的男人的电影？
back_translation: How to make a movie about a shallow man?

text: fudges fact and fancy with such confidence that we feel as if we 're seeing something purer than the real thing .
translation: 以如此自信将事实和幻想混淆，使我们感觉到似乎看到的东西比真实的东西更纯粹。
back_translation: With such confidence in blurring the line between fact and fantasy, it makes us feel that what we perceive seems purer than reality itself.

text: the cast is top-notch and i predict there will be plenty of female audience members drooling over michael idemoto as michael .
translation: 演员阵容一流，我预测会有很多女性观众对迈克尔·伊德莫托饰演的迈克尔垂涎欲滴。
back_translation: The cast is top-notch, and I predict that many female viewers will be drooling over Michael played by Michael Eidermoto.

text: sandra bullock and hugh grant make a great team , but this predictable romantic comedy should get a pink slip .
translation: 桑德拉·布洛克和休·格兰特是一对出色的搭档，但这部可预测的浪漫喜剧应当被解雇。

text: it 's all stitched together with energy , intelligence and verve , enhanced by a surplus of vintage archive footage .
translation: 这一切都通过能量、智慧和活力缝合在一起，并通过丰富的复古档案 footage 进行了增强。

text: so muddled , repetitive and ragged that it says far less about the horrifying historical reality than about the filmmaker 's characteristic style .
translation: 如此混乱、重复和零碎，以至于与其说它讲述了可怕的历史现实，不如说它体现了导演典型的风格。
back_translation: It is so chaotic, repetitive, and fragmented that it embodies the director's typical style more than it tells a terrifying historical reality.

translation: 节奏更快的家庭电影。

text: `` analyze that '' is one of those crass , contrived sequels that not only fails on its own , but makes you second-guess your affection for the original .
translation: “分析一下”是那些粗糙、造作的续集之一，不仅自身失败，还让你重新审视对原作的喜爱。

text: fairy-tale formula , serves as a paper skeleton for some very good acting , dialogue , comedy , direction and especially charm .

text: the quirky drama touches the heart and the funnybone thanks to the energetic and always surprising performance by rachel griffiths .

back_translation: This quirky play touched hearts and entertained the audience with Rachel Griffiths' vibrant and always surprising performance.

text: i 'm sure the filmmakers found this a remarkable and novel concept , but anybody who has ever seen an independent film can report that it is instead a cheap clich茅 .
translation: 我相信制片人认为这是一个非凡而新颖的概念，但任何看过独立电影的人都可以报告，这实际上是一个廉价的陈词滥调。
back_translation: I believe the producer thinks this is an extraordinary and novel concept, but anyone who has seen independent films can report that this is actually a cheap cliché.

text: in its understanding , often funny way , it tells a story whose restatement is validated by the changing composition of the nation .
translation: 在它的理解中，常常以幽默的方式讲述一个故事，这个故事的重述受到国家构成变化的验证。
back_translation: In its understanding, it often tells a story in a humorous way, and this retelling is validated by the changes in the composition of the nation.

text: let 's issue a moratorium , effective immediately , on treacly films about inspirational prep-school professors and the children they so heartwarmingly motivate .
translation: 让我们立即对关于那些激励人心的贵族学校教授以及他们所温暖激励的孩子们的感人电影发布一个暂停令。
back_translation: Let us immediately issue a pause on those touching films about inspiring noble school teachers and the children they warm and inspire.

text: tiresomely derivative and hammily acted .
translation: 乏味的重复和过于做作的表演。
back_translation: Boring repetition and overly affected performances.

text: i walked away from this new version of e.t. just as i hoped i would -- with moist eyes .
translation: 我带着湿润的眼睛走出了这一版的《外星人》，正如我所希望的那样。
back_translation: I walked out of this version of "Alien" with tearful eyes, just as I had hoped.

text: what should have been a cutting hollywood satire is instead about as fresh as last week 's issue of variety .

text: the film does a solid job of slowly , steadily building up to the climactic burst of violence .
translation: 这部电影在缓慢而稳定地构建到高潮的暴力爆发方面做得很出色。

text: the heart of the film is a touching reflection on aging , suffering and the prospect of death .
translation: 这部电影的核心是对衰老、痛苦和死亡前景的感人反思。
back_translation: The core of this movie is a poignant reflection on aging, suffering, and the prospect of death.

text: the notion of deleting emotion from people , even in an advanced prozac nation , is so insanely dysfunctional that the rampantly designed equilibrium becomes a concept doofus .
translation: 从人们身上删除情感的观念，即使在一个高度依赖普罗扎克的国家，也是如此疯狂和功能失调，以至于疯狂设计的平衡变成了一个愚蠢的概念。
back_translation: The idea of removing emotions from people is so insane and dysfunctional, even in a country highly reliant on Prozac, that the balance designed by madness turns into a foolish concept.

text: puts to rest any thought that the german film industry can not make a delightful comedy centering on food .
translation: 消除了人们对德国电影产业无法制作围绕食物的迷人喜剧的所有想法。
back_translation: It dispelled all notions that the German film industry could not produce captivating comedies centered around food.

text: with the dog days of august upon us , think of this dog of a movie as the cinematic equivalent of high humidity .
translation: 随着八月的酷暑来临，把这部电影视为高湿度的电影等价物。

text: no amount of arty theorizing -- the special effects are ` german-expressionist , ' according to the press notes -- can render it anything but laughable .
translation: 任何数量的艺术理论——根据新闻资料，这些特效被称为“德国表现主义”——都无法使其变得不令人发笑。
back_translation: No amount of art theory—according to news sources, these effects are called "German Expressionism"—can make it less laughable.

text: a well-executed spy-thriller .
translation: 一部执行得很好的间谍惊悚片。

text: lisa rinzler 's cinematography may be lovely , but love liza 's tale itself virtually collapses into an inhalant blackout , maintaining consciousness just long enough to achieve callow pretension .
translation: 丽莎·林兹勒的摄影技术可能很美，但《爱丽莎》的故事本身几乎崩溃成一种吸入剂的失去意识，只能维持意识足够的时间，以实现幼稚的自负。
back_translation: Lisa Lindsley's photographic technique may be beautiful, but the story of "Alisa" itself nearly collapses into a loss of consciousness from an inhalant, barely maintaining awareness long enough to sustain childish vanity.

text: the trailer is a riot .
translation: 预告片真是太精彩了。

text: this cloying , voices-from-the-other-side story is hell .
translation: 这个甜腻的、来自另一边的故事真是地狱。

text: alas , getting there is not even half the interest .

text: a chilly , brooding but quietly resonant psychological study of domestic tension and unhappiness .
translation: 一部阴郁而冷峻，但悄然共鸣的心理研究，探讨了家庭紧张和不幸福。

text: the result is somewhat satisfying -- it still comes from spielberg , who has never made anything that was n't at least watchable .
translation: 结果还是令人满意的——这毕竟出自斯皮尔伯格之手，他从未制作过任何不值得一看的作品。

text: i 'll go out on a limb .
translation: 我将冒险一试。

text: sheridan is painfully bad , a fourth-rate jim carrey who does n't understand the difference between dumb fun and just plain dumb .
translation: 谢里登非常糟糕，是一个四流的金·凯瑞，他不懂什么是愚蠢的乐趣与纯粹的愚蠢之间的区别。

text: as improbable as this premise may seem , abbass 's understated , shining performance offers us the sense that on some elemental level , lilia deeply wants to break free of her old life .

text: maybe leblanc thought , `` hey , the movie about the baseball-playing monkey was worse . ''
translation: 也许勒布朗想，“嘿，关于那个打棒球的猴子的电影更糟。”
back_translation: Maybe LeBron thought, "Hey, that movie about the monkey playing baseball is worse."

text: gives an intriguing twist to the french coming-of-age genre .

text: escapes the precious trappings of most romantic comedies , infusing into the story very real , complicated emotions .

text: full of bland hotels , highways , parking lots , with some glimpses of nature and family warmth , time out is a discreet moan of despair about entrapment in the maze of modern life .
translation: 充满了平淡的酒店、高速公路、停车场，偶尔能看到自然和家庭温暖的身影，时间的停顿是对陷入现代生活迷宫中的绝望的隐秘呻吟。
back_translation: Filled with ordinary hotels, highways, and parking lots, occasionally one can see glimpses of nature and the warmth of family. The pause of time is a secret sigh of despair for those trapped in the maze of modern life.

text: a naturally funny film , home movie makes you crave chris smith 's next movie .
translation: 一部自然搞笑的电影，家庭电影让你渴望克里斯·史密斯的下一部作品。

text: director hoffman , his writer and kline 's agent should serve detention

text: the quirky and recessive charms of co-stars martin donovan and mary-louise parker help overcome the problematic script .

text: it 's a mindless action flick with a twist -- far better suited to video-viewing than the multiplex .

text: as an entertainment destination for the general public , kung pow sets a new benchmark for lameness .

text: graced with the kind of social texture and realism that would be foreign in american teen comedies .

text: -lrb- allen -rrb- manages to breathe life into this somewhat tired premise .

text: exhilarating but blatantly biased .
translation: 令人振奋但明显偏颇。

text: a mostly believable , refreshingly low-key and quietly inspirational little sports drama .
translation: 一部大多可信、清新低调且轻静鼓舞人心的小型体育剧。

text: how this one escaped the lifetime network i 'll never know .
translation: 我永远不知道这个是怎么逃过终身网络的。

text: to some eyes this will seem like a recycling of clich茅s , an assassin 's greatest hits .

text: less funny than it should be and less funny than it thinks it is .
translation: 比它应该的更少搞笑，也比它认为的更少搞笑。

text: the innate theatrics that provide its thrills and extreme emotions lose their luster when flattened onscreen .

translation: 最终，这部电影就是让你听技术宅滔滔不绝，当然前提是你喜欢这种风格。
back_translation: In the end, this movie is just about letting tech enthusiasts talk endlessly, of course, provided that you enjoy this style.

text: the film is undone by anachronistic quick edits and occasional jarring glimpses of a modern theater audience watching the events unfold .
translation: 这部电影因时代错位的快速剪辑和偶尔出现的现代观众观看事件展开的刺耳画面而显得不完美。

text: what could have easily become a cold , calculated exercise in postmodern pastiche winds up a powerful and deeply moving example of melodramatic moviemaking .
translation: 本可以轻易变成冷漠、计算的后现代拼贴，但最终演变成了一部强烈而深刻感人的情节剧电影的典范。
back_translation: It could have easily turned into a cold, calculating postmodern collage, but ultimately evolved into a powerful and deeply moving example of a dramatic film.

text: russell lacks the visual panache , the comic touch , and perhaps the budget of sommers 's title-bout features .
translation: 拉塞尔缺乏视觉魅力、喜剧风格，可能也缺乏索默斯的冠军战影片所需的预算。

text: some remarkable achival film about how shanghai -lrb- of all places -rrb- served jews who escaped the holocaust .
translation: 一些关于上海——一个特别的地方——如何接纳逃离大屠杀的犹太人的精彩档案电影。

text: `` interview '' loses its overall sense of mystery and becomes a tv episode rather than a documentary that you actually buy into .
translation: “采访”失去了整体的神秘感，变成了一部电视剧，而不是你真正能投入其中的纪录片。

text: an old-fashioned but emotionally stirring adventure tale of the kind they rarely make anymore .
translation: 一种古老却感人至深的冒险故事，属于如今已不常见的类型。

text: intelligent and moving .
translation: 智能且感人。

text: a bodice-ripper for intellectuals .
translation: 为知识分子而作的激情小说。

text: it 's fun , wispy , wise and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teen in love with his stepmom .
translation: 这是一部有趣、轻松、聪明的电影，令人惊讶的是，它在讲述一个青少年爱上继母的故事时表现得相当不冒犯。
back_translation: This is an interesting, light-hearted, and clever movie that surprisingly manages to tell the story of a teenager falling in love with his stepmother without being offensive.

text: the narrator and the other characters try to convince us that acting transfigures esther , but she 's never seen speaking on stage ; one feels cheated , and esther seems to remain an unchanged dullard .
translation: 叙述者和其他角色试图说服我们表演改变了艾斯特，但她从未在舞台上说话；人们感到受骗，而艾斯特似乎依然是一个毫无变化的愚钝者。
back_translation: The narrator and other characters try to convince us that the performance changed Esther, but she never speaks on stage; people feel deceived, and Esther seems to remain a dullard without any change.

text: time out is existential drama without any of the pretension associated with the term .
translation: 《超时》是一部存在主义戏剧，但没有与这个词相关的任何矫揉造作。

text: guilty of the worst sin of attributable to a movie like this : it 's not scary in the slightest .
translation: 犯下了如此电影所能归咎的最严重的罪过：完全没有一点恐怖。

text: peppering this urban study with references to norwegian folktales , villeneuve creates in maelstrom a world where the bizarre is credible and the real turns magical .
translation: 维伦纽夫在《漩涡》中将挪威民间故事融入这部城市研究，创造了一个怪诞可信、现实变得神奇的世界。

text: elling builds gradually until you feel fully embraced by this gentle comedy .
translation: 这个温和的喜剧逐渐展开，直到你感受到完全被其包围。

text: kwan is a master of shadow , quietude , and room noise , and lan yu is a disarmingly lived-in movie .
translation: 宽是阴影、宁静和环境噪音的高手，而兰宇是一部令人意外地充满生活气息的电影。

text: maryam is a small film , but it offers large rewards .
translation: 《玛丽亚姆》是一部小制作的电影，但它提供了丰厚的回报。

text: ya-yas everywhere will forgive the flaws and love the film .
translation: 无处不在的ya-yas会原谅缺陷并热爱这部电影。

text: a stylistic romp that 's always fun to watch .
translation: 一场风格上令人愉快的嬉戏，总是让人乐于观看。

text: you can tell almost immediately that welcome to collinwood is n't going to jell .
translation: 你几乎可以立刻感觉到《欢迎来到科林伍德》不会成功。

text: a shimmeringly lovely coming-of-age portrait , shot in artful , watery tones of blue , green and brown .
translation: 一幅闪耀着迷人的成长肖像，以艺术化的水蓝、绿色和棕色调拍摄。

text: its impressive images of crematorium chimney fires and stacks of dead bodies are undermined by the movie 's presentation , which is way too stagy .
translation: 其令人印象深刻的火葬场烟囱火焰和堆积的尸体图像被电影的呈现所削弱，显得过于舞台化。
back_translation: The impressive images of the crematorium chimneys' flames and the piled-up corpses are diminished by the film's presentation, appearing overly staged.

text: there 's a heavy stench of ` been there , done that ' hanging over the film .
translation: 电影中弥漫着浓重的“经历过，做过”的恶臭。
back_translation: The film is permeated with a strong stench of "having experienced it, having done it."

text: an affectionately goofy satire that 's unafraid to throw elbows when necessary ...
translation: 一部充满深情且傻乎乎的讽刺作品，必要时毫不畏惧地出手反击
back_translation: A work full of deep feelings and silly satire, unafraid to strike back when necessary...

text: but never mind all that ; the boobs are fantasti
translation: 但别管那些了；胸部真是太棒了。
back_translation: But don't worry about that; the chest is really amazing.

text: at every opportunity to do something clever , the film goes right over the edge and kills every sense of believability ... all you have left is a no-surprise series of explosions and violence while banderas looks like he 's not trying to laugh at how bad it
translation: 在每一个有机会展现机智的时刻，这部电影都彻底失控，摧毁了所有的可信度你剩下的只有一系列毫无惊喜的爆炸和暴力场面，而班德拉斯看起来就像是在努力忍住笑，笑自己有多糟糕。
back_translation: At every moment when the opportunity to showcase wit arises, this movie completely derails, destroying all credibility... what you're left with is just a series of unremarkable explosions and violent scenes, while Banderas looks like he's struggling to hold back laughter at how bad he is.

text: stress ` dumb . '
translation: 压力 "笨。"
back_translation: Pressure "stupid."

text: katz 's documentary does n't have much panache , but with material this rich it does n't need it .
translation: 卡茨的纪录片虽然没有太多华丽的风格，但凭借如此丰富的素材，它并不需要这些。
back_translation: Katz's documentary may not have much of a flashy style, but with such rich material, it doesn't need it.

text: deadly dull , pointless meditation on losers in a gone-to-seed hotel .
translation: 致命乏味，毫无意义的冥想，关于一个颓废酒店里的失败者。
back_translation: A deadly dull and meaningless meditation on the failures of a loser in a rundown hotel.

text: huppert and girardot give performances of exceptional honesty .
translation: 于珀特和吉拉尔多的表演展现了非凡的诚实。

text: where 's the movie here ?
translation: 电影在哪里？
