text: an unsophisticated sci-fi drama that takes itself all too seriously .
translation: 一部过于严肃的简单科幻剧。
back_translation: A simple sci-fi drama that is overly serious.

text: whether this is art imitating life or life imitating art , it 's an unhappy situation all around .
translation: 无论这是艺术模仿生活还是生活模仿艺术，周围的情况都令人不快。
back_translation: Whether this is art imitating life or life imitating art, the surrounding circumstances are unsettling.

text: it does n't take a rocket scientist to figure out that this is a mormon family movie , and a sappy , preachy one at that .
translation: 这部电影显然是一部摩门教家庭电影，而且还是一部感情泛滥、说教意味浓厚的电影，没必要是火箭科学家才能看出来。
back_translation: This movie is clearly a Mormon family film, and it's also a movie filled with excessive sentimentality and heavy-handed moralizing, something that doesn't require a rocket scientist to realize.

text: this makes minority report necessary viewing for sci-fi fans , as the film has some of the best special effects ever .
translation: 这使得《少数派报告》成为科幻迷必看的影片，因为这部电影拥有一些最好的特效。
back_translation: This makes "Minority Report" a must-see film for sci-fi fans, as it features some of the best visual effects.

text: if you really want to understand what this story is really all about , you 're far better served by the source material .
translation: 如果你真的想了解这个故事的真正含义，阅读原始材料会更有帮助。
back_translation: If you really want to understand the true meaning of this story, reading the original material would be more helpful.

text: swimming is above all about a young woman 's face , and by casting an actress whose face projects that woman 's doubts and yearnings , it succeeds .
translation: 游泳首先是关于一个年轻女性的面容，通过选用一位能够展现她疑惑与渴望的女演员，这部作品取得了成功。
back_translation: Swimming is primarily about the face of a young woman, and by choosing an actress who can convey her confusion and desire, the work has succeeded.

text: mattei 's underdeveloped effort here is nothing but a convenient conveyor belt of brooding personalities that parade about as if they were coming back from stock character camp -- a drowsy drama infatuated by its own pretentious self-examination .
translation: 马泰的这一未成熟努力不过是一个方便的传送带，沮丧的人物在上面游荡，仿佛他们刚刚从固定角色训练营回来——一场迷恋于自我炫耀的昏昏欲睡的戏剧。
back_translation: Matte's immature effort is nothing more than a convenient conveyor belt, with frustrated characters wandering above it, as if they have just returned from a fixed-role training camp—a drowsy drama obsessed with self-promotion.

text: ` the war of the roses , ' trailer-trash style .
translation: “玫瑰战争”，拖车垃圾风格。
back_translation: "War of the Roses," trailer trash style.

text: the powerpuff girls arrive on the big screen with their super-powers , their super-simple animation and their super-dooper-adorability intact .
translation: 泡泡糖女孩们带着她们的超能力、超简单的动画和超可爱的魅力来到大银幕上。
back_translation: Bubblegum girls bring their superpowers, ultra-simple animations, and super cute charm to the big screen.

text: originality is sorely lacking .
translation: 原创性严重缺乏。
back_translation: Severe lack of originality.

text: it trusts the story it sets out to tell .
translation: 它信任它要讲述的故事。
back_translation: It trusts the story it wants to tell.

text: the film has a kind of hard , cold effect .
translation: 这部电影有一种冷硬的效果。
back_translation: This movie has a cold and hard effect.

text: strip it of all its excess debris , and you 'd have a 90-minute , four-star movie .
translation: 去掉所有多余的杂质，你会得到一部90分钟的四星电影。
back_translation: Remove all unnecessary impurities, and you will get a 90-minute four-star movie.

text: while there 's likely very little crossover appeal to those without much interest in the elizabethans -lrb- as well as rank frustration from those in the know about rubbo 's dumbed-down tactics -rrb- , much ado about something is an amicable endeavor .
translation: 尽管对于那些对伊丽莎白时代没有太多兴趣的人来说，这个话题可能没有什么吸引力 -（以及对于了解鲁博的简单化策略的人的明显沮丧）- ，但《小道消息》是一项友好的努力。
back_translation: Although this topic may not be very appealing to those who have little interest in the Elizabethan era - and the obvious frustration for those who understand Rubo's simplification strategy - "Gossip" is a friendly effort.

text: did we really need a remake of `` charade ? ''
translation: 我们真的需要翻拍《调情者》吗？
back_translation: Do we really need to remake "The Flirter"?

text: stevens has a flair for dialogue comedy , the film operates nicely off the element of surprise , and the large cast is solid .
translation: 史蒂文斯在对话喜剧方面有天赋，这部电影很好地利用了意外元素，庞大的演员阵容也很出色。
back_translation: Stevens has a talent for dialogue comedy, and this film makes great use of unexpected elements, with a stellar cast as well.

text: the mystery of enigma is how a rich historical subject , combined with so much first-rate talent ... could have yielded such a flat , plodding picture .
translation: 恩igma的神秘在于一个丰富的历史题材，与如此多的一流人才结合，却会产生如此平淡、沉闷的画面。
back_translation: The mystery of Enigma lies in its rich historical theme, combined with so many top talents, yet it results in such a bland and dull picture.

text: all leather pants & augmented boobs , hawn is hilarious as she tries to resuscitate the fun-loving libertine lost somewhere inside the conservative , handbag-clutching sarandon .
translation: 所有的皮裤和丰胸，霍恩在努力复活那个在保守、握着手袋的萨兰登内心深处失落的爱好享乐者时，真是搞笑。
back_translation: All the leather pants and breast enhancements, it's truly funny how Horne is trying to revive the lost hedonist deep within the conservative, handbag-clutching Sarandon.

text: throughout , mr. audiard 's direction is fluid and quick .
translation: 在整个过程中，奥迪亚尔先生的导演风格流畅而迅速。
back_translation: Throughout the process, Mr. Audiar's directing style was smooth and swift.

text: the observations of this social\/economic\/urban environment are canny and spiced with irony .
translation: 对这个社会/经济/城市环境的观察机智且充满讽刺。
back_translation: Observations of this social/economic/urban environment are witty and full of irony.

text: while insomnia is in many ways a conventional , even predictable remake , nolan 's penetrating undercurrent of cerebral and cinemantic flair lends -lrb- it -rrb- stimulating depth .
translation: 尽管失眠在很多方面是一个传统的，甚至可以预测的重制，但诺兰的深刻内涵和脑力与电影艺术的魅力赋予了它刺激的深度。
back_translation: Although insomnia is traditionally a predictable remake in many ways, Nolan's profound themes and the allure of cinematic artistry give it a stimulating depth.

text: undoubtedly the scariest movie ever made about tattoos .
translation: 无疑是关于纹身的最恐怖电影。
back_translation: Without a doubt, it is the scariest movie about tattoos.

text: ... in the pile of useless actioners from mtv schmucks who do n't know how to tell a story for more than four minutes .
translation: ...在一堆来自那些不知道如何讲超过四分钟故事的MTV傻瓜的无用动作片中。
back_translation: ...among a pile of useless action films from those MTV fools who don't know how to tell a story longer than four minutes.

text: watching a brian depalma movie is like watching an alfred hitchcock movie after drinking twelve beers .
translation: 观看布莱恩·德帕尔马的电影就像在喝了十二瓶啤酒后观看阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克的电影。
back_translation: Watching a Brian De Palma film is like watching an Alfred Hitchcock film after drinking twelve bottles of beer.

text: ian holm conquers france as an earthy napoleon
translation: 伊恩·霍尔姆饰演的拿破仑以一种接地气的形象征服法国。
back_translation: Ian Holm's portrayal of Napoleon captivates France with a down-to-earth image.

text: time out is as serious as a pink slip .
translation: 停职和被解雇一样严重。
back_translation: Suspension is as serious as being fired.

text: tykwer 's surface flash is n't just a poor fit with kieslowski 's lyrical pessimism ; it completely contradicts everything kieslowski 's work aspired to , including the condition of art .
translation: 提克威的《表面闪烁》不仅与基耶斯洛夫斯基的抒情悲观主义不相符；它完全与基耶斯洛夫斯基作品所追求的一切，包括艺术的状态，背道而驰。
back_translation: Tickwei's "Surface Flicker" not only does not align with Kieslowski's lyrical pessimism; it is completely contrary to everything that Kieslowski's works strive for, including the state of art.

text: -lrb- creates -rrb- the worst kind of mythologizing , the kind that sacrifices real heroism and abject suffering for melodrama .
translation: -（创造）最糟糕的神话化，牺牲真实的英雄主义和悲惨的痛苦来追求戏剧性。
back_translation: - (Creating) the worst mythology, sacrificing true heroism and tragic suffering in pursuit of drama.

text: director tom shadyac and star kevin costner glumly mishandle the story 's promising premise of a physician who needs to heal himself .
translation: 导演汤姆·沙迪亚克和明星凯文·科斯特纳沮丧地处理了这个关于一位需要自我疗愈的医生的故事的有前景的前提。
back_translation: Director Tom Shadyac and star Kevin Costner dealt with the promising premise of a story about a doctor in need of self-healing with frustration.

text: a tremendous piece of work .
translation: 一项伟大的作品。
back_translation: A great work.

text: as an actor 's showcase , hart 's war has much to recommend it , even if the top-billed willis is not the most impressive player .
translation: 作为演员的展示，《哈特的战争》有很多值得推荐的地方，即使主演的威利斯并不是最令人印象深刻的演员。
back_translation: As an actor's showcase, "Hart's War" has many commendable aspects, even though the lead performer, Willis, is not the most impressive actor.

text: a pretty funny movie , with most of the humor coming , as before , from the incongruous but chemically perfect teaming of crystal and de niro .
translation: 一部非常有趣的电影，其中大部分幽默如之前一样，来自于水晶与德尼罗之间不和谐但化学反应完美的搭档。
back_translation: A very interesting movie, where most of the humor, as before, comes from the discordant yet perfectly chemistry-filled partnership between Crystal and De Niro.

text: there 's something poignant about an artist of 90-plus years taking the effort to share his impressions of life and loss and time and art with us .
translation: 一位90多岁的艺术家愿意分享他对生活、失落、时间和艺术的印象，令人感到深刻。
back_translation: A 90-year-old artist is willing to share his profound impressions on life, loss, time, and art.

text: our culture is headed down the toilet with the ferocity of a frozen burrito after an all-night tequila bender -- and i know this because i 've seen ` jackass : the movie . '
translation: 我们的文化正如经过一夜狂饮龙舌兰后，冰冻卷饼以惊人的势头冲入厕所——我知道这一点，因为我看过《小丑：电影》。
back_translation: Our culture is like a frozen burrito rushing into the toilet after a night of heavy tequila drinking—I know this because I've seen "Joker: The Movie."

text: moonlight mile does n't quite go the distance but the cast is impressive and they all give life to these broken characters who are trying to make their way through this tragedy .
translation: 《月光英里》虽然未能达到理想的效果，但演员阵容十分出色，他们都为这些在悲剧中挣扎的破碎角色注入了生命。
back_translation: "Moonlight Mile" may not have achieved the desired effect, but the cast is outstanding, and they have brought life to these broken characters struggling in tragedy.

text: american and european cinema has amassed a vast holocaust literature , but it is impossible to think of any film more challenging or depressing than the grey zone .
translation: 美国和欧洲电影积累了大量的霍洛克斯文学，但很难想到有哪部电影比《灰色地带》更具挑战性或更让人沮丧。
back_translation: American and European films have accumulated a wealth of Holocaust literature, but it's hard to think of any movie that is more challenging or more frustrating than "The Gray Zone."

text: the script is too mainstream and the psychology too textbook to intrigue .
translation: 剧本太主流，心理描写也太教科书化，无法引起兴趣。
back_translation: The script is too mainstream, and the psychological depiction is too textbook-like, which fails to spark interest.

text: if you recognize zeus -lrb- the dog from snatch -rrb- it will make you wish you were at home watching that movie instead of in the theater watching this one .
translation: 如果你认出宙斯（《夺宝奇兵》中的狗），你会希望自己在家看那部电影，而不是在剧院看这部。
back_translation: If you recognize Zeus (the dog from "Indiana Jones"), you would wish you were watching that movie at home rather than in the theater.

text: wilco is a phenomenal band with such an engrossing story that will capture the minds and hearts of many .
translation: Wilco是一支杰出的乐队，他们的故事引人入胜，能够俘获许多人的心灵和思想。
back_translation: Wilco is an outstanding band, and their story is fascinating, capable of capturing the hearts and minds of many people.

text: though nijinsky 's words grow increasingly disturbed , the film maintains a beguiling serenity and poise that make it accessible for a non-narrative feature .
translation: 尽管尼基欣的话语愈发不安，但电影仍保持着迷人的宁静和优雅，使其对于非叙述性影片来说易于接近。
back_translation: Despite Nikichin's increasingly unsettling words, the film maintains a captivating calmness and elegance, making it accessible for a non-narrative film.

text: parker updates the setting in an attempt to make the film relevant today , without fully understanding what it was that made the story relevant in the first place .
translation: 帕克更新了设置，试图让电影符合当今的相关性，却并未完全理解当初是什么让这个故事具备相关性的。
back_translation: Parker updated the settings in an attempt to make the film relevant to today, but did not fully understand what originally made the story relevant.

text: this movie may not have the highest production values you 've ever seen , but it 's the work of an artist , one whose view of america , history and the awkwardness of human life is generous and deep .
translation: 这部电影可能不是你见过的制作水平最高的，但它是一个艺术家的作品，他对美国、历史以及人类生活的尴尬之处有着慷慨而深刻的视角。
back_translation: This film may not be the highest production quality you have seen, but it is the work of an artist who has a generous and profound perspective on America, history, and the awkwardness of human life.

text: brings together some of the biggest names in japanese anime , with impressive results .
translation: 汇聚了一些日本动漫界的大牌，取得了令人印象深刻的成果。
back_translation: It has brought together some big names in the Japanese anime industry and achieved impressive results.

text: woefully pretentious .
translation: 痛苦地自命不凡。
back_translation: Suffering while considering oneself exceptional.

text: mattei so completely loses himself to the film 's circular structure to ever offer any insightful discourse on , well , love in the time of money .
translation: 马泰完全沉浸在电影的循环结构中，无法提供任何关于金钱时代爱情的深刻讨论。
back_translation: Mathe is completely immersed in the cyclical structure of the film and is unable to provide any profound discussion on love in the age of money.

text: -lrb- leigh -rrb- has a true talent for drawing wrenching performances from his actors -lrb- improvised over many months -rrb- and for conveying the way tiny acts of kindness make ordinary life survivable .
translation: -（莱赫）具有从演员身上引发感人表演的真正才华（经过多个月的即兴演出），并且能够传达微小善举使平凡生活得以生存的方式。
back_translation: - (Leh) has a true talent for eliciting poignant performances from actors (after months of improvisation) and is able to convey the way small acts of kindness enable ordinary life to thrive.

text: director douglas mcgrath takes on nickleby with all the halfhearted zeal of an 8th grade boy delving into required reading .
translation: 导演道格拉斯·麦克格拉斯以一种八年级男孩面对必读书籍时的冷漠热情来处理《尼克尔比》。
back_translation: Director Douglas McGrath approaches "Nicholas Nickleby" with the indifferent enthusiasm of an eighth-grade boy confronted with required reading.

text: godard uses his characters -- if that 's not too glorified a term -- as art things , mouthpieces , visual motifs , blanks .
translation: 戈达尔将他的角色——如果这个词不是太过美化的话——用作艺术物品、喉舌、视觉主题、空白。
back_translation: Godard used his role—if that word is not too flattering—as an art object, a mouthpiece, a visual theme, and a blank slate.

text: there 's plenty to enjoy -- in no small part thanks to lau .
translation: 有很多乐趣——这在很大程度上要感谢刘。
back_translation: There is a lot of fun—much of it thanks to Liu.

text: gaping plot holes sink this ` sub ' - standard thriller and drag audience enthusiasm to crush depth .
translation: 令人失望的情节漏洞让这部“次”标准惊悚片沉没，拖慢了观众的热情，令人心灰意冷。
back_translation: Disappointing plot holes caused this "second-rate" thriller to sink, dampening the audience's enthusiasm and leaving them disheartened.

text: no surprises .
translation: 没有惊喜。
back_translation: No surprise.

text: the film is so bad it does n't improve upon the experience of staring at a blank screen .
translation: 这部电影糟糕到甚至不如盯着一块空白屏幕来得有趣。
back_translation: This movie is so bad that it's even less interesting than staring at a blank screen.

text: a stylish cast and some clever scripting solutions help chicago make the transition from stage to screen with considerable appeal intact .
translation: 时尚的演员阵容和一些巧妙的剧本解决方案帮助《芝加哥》在从舞台转向银幕时保持了相当大的吸引力。
back_translation: The fashionable cast and some clever script solutions helped "Chicago" maintain considerable appeal when transitioning from stage to screen.

text: conforms itself with creating a game of ` who 's who ' ... where the characters ' moves are often more predictable than their consequences .
translation: 以创造一个“谁是谁”的游戏为目标其中角色的行为往往比其后果更可预测。
back_translation: The goal is to create a "who is who" game... in which the characters' actions are often more predictable than their consequences.

text: an effective portrait of a life in stasis -- of the power of inertia to arrest development in a dead-end existence .
translation: 一个有效的静态生活画像——惯性的力量在死胡同的存在中阻碍发展的表现。
back_translation: An effective static life image - the manifestation of the power of inertia hindering development in the existence of a dead end.

text: nights feels more like a quickie tv special than a feature film ... it 's not even a tv special you 'd bother watching past the second commercial break .
translation: 这个夜晚更像是一部短小的电视特辑而不是一部电影甚至连第二个广告间歇后都不会值得你继续观看的电视特辑。
back_translation: This night felt more like a short television special rather than a movie... it wouldn't even be worth continuing to watch after the second commercial break.

text: blue crush is as predictable as the tides .
translation: 《蓝色冲击》就像潮水一样可预测。
back_translation: "Blue Shock" is as predictable as the tides.

text: we 're left with a story that tries to grab us , only to keep letting go at all the wrong moments .
translation: 我们留下的是一个试图吸引我们的故事，却总在错误的时刻让我们失去兴趣。
back_translation: What we are left with is a story that tries to attract us but always loses our interest at the wrong moments.

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .
translation: 这部带字幕的服装剧设定在一个遥远的非洲帝国，时代背景是没有手机、枪支和内燃机，但其中涌动的政治议题却与明天一样切合。
back_translation: This subtitled costume drama is set in a distant African empire, during a time without mobile phones, firearms, and internal combustion engines, yet the political issues it explores are just as relevant as those of tomorrow.

text: with minimal imagination , you could restage the whole thing in your bathtub .
translation: 只需一点想象力，你就可以在浴缸里重演整个过程。
back_translation: With just a little imagination, you can recreate the entire process in the bathtub.

text: just consider what new best friend does not have , beginning with the minor omission of a screenplay .
translation: 只需考虑一下新最佳朋友缺少什么，首先是缺少剧本这一小小的遗漏。
back_translation: Just consider what the new best friend is lacking, first and foremost, it's the small omission of a script.

text: instead of contriving a climactic hero 's death for the beloved-major - character-who-shall - remain-nameless , why not invite some genuine spontaneity into the film by having the evil aliens ' laser guns actually hit something for once ?
translation: 与其为了那位心爱的重要角色设计一个高潮的死亡场面，不如让邪恶外星人的激光枪这次真的击中一些东西，给电影带来一些真实的自发性？
back_translation: Instead of designing a climactic death scene for that beloved important character, why not let the evil alien's laser gun actually hit something this time, bringing some genuine spontaneity to the movie?

text: brown sugar signals director rick famuyiwa 's emergence as an articulate , grown-up voice in african-american cinema .
translation: 《黑糖》标志着导演瑞克·法穆伊瓦在非裔美国电影中崭露头角，成为一个表达清晰、成熟的声音。
back_translation: "Brown Sugar" marks the emergence of director Rick Famuyiwa as a clear and mature voice in African American cinema.

text: their computer-animated faces are very expressive .
translation: 他们的电脑动画面孔非常富有表现力。
back_translation: Their computer-animated faces are very expressive.

text: not only is it hokey , manipulative and as bland as wonder bread dipped in milk , but it also does the absolute last thing we need hollywood doing to us : it preaches .
translation: 不仅它显得矫揉造作、操控意识且平淡无味，如同浸泡在牛奶中的白面包，而且它还做了好莱坞最不需要对我们做的事情：说教。
back_translation: Not only does it appear affected and manipulative, bland and tasteless, like white bread soaked in milk, but it also does the one thing Hollywood needs least from us: preaching.

text: the acting is n't much better .
translation: 表演也没好到哪里去。
back_translation: The performance wasn't great either.

text: a powerful and telling story that examines forbidden love , racial tension , and other issues that are as valid today as they were in the 1950s .
translation: 一个强大而深刻的故事，探讨了禁忌之爱、种族紧张和其他问题，这些问题在今天与1950年代一样有效。
back_translation: A powerful and profound story that explores forbidden love, racial tension, and other issues that are just as relevant today as they were in the 1950s.

text: another best of the year selection .
translation: 又一个年度最佳选择。
back_translation: Another annual best choice.

text: the film runs on a little longer than it needs to -- muccino either does n't notice when his story ends or just ca n't tear himself away from the characters -- but it 's smooth and professional .
translation: 这部电影的时长稍长于必要的时间——穆奇诺要么没有意识到自己的故事结束，要么就是无法与角色告别——但影片流畅且专业。
back_translation: The film's duration is slightly longer than necessary—Muchino either did not realize that his story had come to an end, or he was unable to say goodbye to the characters—but the film is smooth and professional.

text: it 's just too bad the screenwriters eventually shoot themselves in the feet with cop flick cliches like an oily arms dealer , squad car pile-ups and the requisite screaming captain .
translation: 这真是太糟糕了，编剧最终用油腻的军火商、警车相撞和必需的尖叫队长等警匪片老套情节自食其果。
back_translation: This is really terrible; the screenwriter ultimately fell into the trap of clichés from crime films, using greasy arms dealers, police car crashes, and the necessary screaming captain.

text: its one-sidedness ... flirts with propaganda .
translation: 其片面性...与宣传相 flirt。
back_translation: Its one-sidedness... flirts with propaganda.

text: the overall effect is awe and affection -- and a strange urge to get on a board and , uh , shred , dude .
translation: 整体效果是敬畏和喜爱——以及一种奇怪的冲动，想要滑上板子，呃，驰骋，兄弟。
back_translation: The overall effect is a sense of awe and affection—along with a strange impulse to glide on the board, uh, to ride, brother.

text: the underworld urban angst is derivative of martin scorsese 's taxi driver and goodfellas , but this film speaks for itself .
translation: 地下世界的城市焦虑来源于马丁·斯科塞斯的《出租车司机》和《好家伙》，但这部电影本身就能发声。
back_translation: The urban anxiety of the underground world originates from Martin Scorsese's "Taxi Driver" and "Goodfellas," but this film is capable of voicing itself.

text: ` synthetic ' is the best description of this well-meaning , beautifully produced film that sacrifices its promise for a high-powered star pedigree .
translation: “合成的”是对这部用心良苦、制作精美的电影最好的描述，它为了高人气的明星阵容而牺牲了自己的潜力。
back_translation: "Contrived" is the best description for this meticulously crafted film, which sacrifices its own potential for the sake of a star-studded cast.

text: the film proves unrelentingly grim -- and equally engrossing .
translation: 这部电影展现了无情的阴暗，并同样引人入胜。
back_translation: This film showcases relentless darkness and is equally captivating.

text: too clumsy in key moments ... to make a big splash .
translation: 在关键时刻太笨拙无法引起轰动。
back_translation: Clumsy at critical moments... unable to make an impact.

text: a small gem of a movie that defies classification and is as thought-provoking as it is funny , scary and sad .
translation: 一部小巧的电影，无法归类，既引人深思，又充满幽默、恐怖和悲伤。
back_translation: A compact film that defies classification, thought-provoking, yet full of humor, horror, and sadness.

text: the ch芒teau would have been benefited from a sharper , cleaner script before it went in front of the camera .
translation: 在拍摄前，这座城堡本应得到一份更为简洁、干净的剧本的收益。
back_translation: Before filming, this castle should have benefited from a simpler and cleaner script.

text: ... quite good at providing some good old fashioned spooks .
translation: ... 在提供一些老派的惊吓方面相当不错。
back_translation: ... is quite good at providing some old-school scares.

text: arliss howard 's ambitious , moving , and adventurous directorial debut , big bad love , meets so many of the challenges it poses for itself that one can forgive the film its flaws .
translation: 阿尔利斯·霍华德雄心勃勃、感人并富有冒险精神的导演处女作《大坏爱情》克服了许多自我设定的挑战，因此可以原谅电影的一些瑕疵。
back_translation: Arlis Howard's ambitious, touching, and adventurous directorial debut "Big Bad Love" overcomes many self-imposed challenges, allowing for some forgiveness of the film's flaws.

text: ` the ch芒teau is never quite able to overcome the cultural moat surrounding its ludicrous and contrived plot . '
translation: “这座 ch_teau 永远无法克服其荒谬和牵强情节周围的文化护城河。”
back_translation: "This ch_teau will never be able to overcome the cultural moat surrounding its absurd and far-fetched plot."

text: in that setting , their struggle is simply too ludicrous and borderline insulting .
translation: 在那个背景下，他们的挣扎简直是太荒谬，并且近乎于侮辱。
back_translation: In that context, their struggles are simply absurd and almost insulting.

text: i am not generally a huge fan of cartoons derived from tv shows , but hey arnold !
translation: 我通常并不是非常喜欢基于电视节目制作的卡通，但《嘿，阿诺德！》。
back_translation: I usually don't really like cartoons based on TV shows, but "Hey, Arnold!"

text: literary purists may not be pleased , but as far as mainstream matinee-style entertainment goes , it does a bang-up job of pleasing the crowds .
translation: 文学纯粹主义者可能不会满意，但就主流下午场娱乐而言，它在取悦观众方面做得非常出色。
back_translation: Literary purists may not be satisfied, but for mainstream afternoon entertainment, it does an excellent job of pleasing the audience.

text: it 's rare to see a movie that takes such a speedy swan dive from `` promising '' to `` interesting '' to `` familiar '' before landing squarely on `` stupid '' .
translation: 很少能看到一部电影在“有前途”、“有趣”到“熟悉”的过程中迅速下滑，最后直接坠落到“愚蠢”。
back_translation: It's rare to see a film rapidly decline from being "promising" and "interesting" to "familiar," ultimately plummeting straight into "foolishness."

text: a wild ride of a movie that keeps throwing fastballs .
translation: 一部不断投出快球的狂野电影。
back_translation: A wild film that continuously throws fastballs.

text: tunney , brimming with coltish , neurotic energy , holds the screen like a true star .
translation: 坦尼充满了青春的神经质能量，像真正的明星一样掌控着银幕。
back_translation: Tani is filled with youthful, neurotic energy, commanding the screen like a true star.

text: the actresses find their own rhythm and protect each other from the script 's bad ideas and awkwardness .
translation: 女演员们找到自己的节奏，互相保护，避免剧本中的坏点子和尴尬。
back_translation: The actresses found their rhythm, protected each other, and avoided the bad ideas and awkward moments in the script.

text: romething 's really wrong with this ricture !
translation: 这张图片真的有点不对劲！
back_translation: This picture really seems a bit off!

text: an uninspired preachy and clich茅d war film .
translation: 一部缺乏灵感、说教和陈词滥调的战争电影。
back_translation: A war movie lacking inspiration, preaching, and clichés.

text: el crimen del padre amaro would likely be most effective if used as a tool to rally anti-catholic protestors .
translation: 《阿马罗神父的罪行》如果作为动员反对天主教抗议者的工具，可能会最有效。
back_translation: "The Crimes of Father Amaro" may be most effective as a tool to mobilize protests against the Catholic Church.

text: a processed comedy chop suey .
translation: 一道加工过的喜剧杂烩。
back_translation: A processed comedic medley.

text: rouge is less about a superficial midlife crisis than it is about the need to stay in touch with your own skin , at 18 or 80 .
translation: 红唇不仅仅是关于表面的中年危机，更是关于在18岁或80岁时与自己肌肤保持联系的需要。
back_translation: Red lips are not just about the superficial midlife crisis, but about the need to maintain a connection with one's own skin, whether at 18 or 80 years old.

text: part of the charm of satin rouge is that it avoids the obvious with humour and lightness .
translation: 丝绸红的魅力在于它以幽默和轻盈的方式避免了明显之处。
back_translation: The charm of silk red lies in its ability to avoid the obvious in a humorous and light manner.

text: its story about a young chinese woman , ah na , who has come to new york city to replace past tragedy with the american dream is one that any art-house moviegoer is likely to find compelling .
translation: 这个故事讲述了一位年轻的中国女性阿娜，她来到纽约市，希望用美国梦取代过去的悲剧，这个故事对任何艺术片观众来说都很吸引人。
back_translation: This story tells of a young Chinese woman named Anna who comes to New York City, hoping to replace past tragedies with the American Dream. It is very appealing to any art film audience.

text: great performances , stylish cinematography and a gritty feel help make gangster no. 1 a worthwhile moviegoing experience .
translation: 出色的表演、时尚的摄影和坚韧的氛围使《黑道先锋》成为一次值得观看的电影体验。
back_translation: Outstanding performances, stylish cinematography, and a resilient atmosphere make "Underworld Pioneer" a movie experience worth watching.

text: but that they are doing it is thought-provoking .
translation: 但他们这样做是值得深思的。
back_translation: But their actions are worth pondering.

text: the film has a nearly terminal case of the cutes , and it 's neither as funny nor as charming as it thinks it is .
translation: 这部电影几乎到了可爱的终点，却既没有它想象中的搞笑，也没有它想象中的迷人。
back_translation: This movie almost reached a charming end, yet it lacked both the humor it aimed for and the charm it envisioned.

text: the screenplay flounders under the weight of too many story lines .
translation: 剧本因故事线过多而显得笨拙。
back_translation: The script appears clumsy due to too many storylines.

text: an improvement on the feeble examples of big-screen poke-mania that have preceded it .
translation: 对之前薄弱的大屏幕宝可梦热潮例子的改进。
back_translation: Improvements on the previous weak examples of the large-screen Pokémon craze.

text: manages to please its intended audience -- children -- without placing their parents in a coma-like state .
translation: 成功地让目标受众——儿童——愉悦，而不让他们的父母陷入昏迷状态。
back_translation: Successfully pleasing the target audience—children—without putting their parents into a state of stupor.

text: what starts off as a possible argentine american beauty reeks like a room stacked with pungent flowers .
translation: 一开始可能是阿根廷的美国美女，但闻起来就像是一间堆满刺鼻花朵的房间。
back_translation: At first, it might be a beautiful American woman from Argentina, but it smells like a room filled with pungent flowers.

text: serving sara should be served an eviction notice at every theater stuck with it .
translation: 萨拉应该在每个困扰着它的剧院收到一份驱逐通知。
back_translation: Sara should receive an eviction notice from every theater that is troubling her.

text: what 's hard to understand is why anybody picked it up .
translation: 难以理解的是，为什么会有人选择它。
back_translation: It is difficult to understand why someone would choose it.

text: a winning and wildly fascinating work .
translation: 一部成功且极具魅力的作品。
back_translation: A successful and highly captivating work.

text: blue crush is so prolonged and boring it is n't even close to being the barn-burningly bad movie it promised it would be .
translation: 《蓝色冲击》实在太冗长和无聊，远未达到它所承诺的那种极其糟糕的水平。
back_translation: "Blue Shock" is truly too lengthy and boring, far from reaching the extremely bad level it promised.

text: for once , a movie does not proclaim the truth about two love-struck somebodies , but permits them time and space to convince us of that all on their own .
translation: 这部电影并没有宣扬两个陷入爱河的人的真相，而是给他们时间和空间让我们自己来相信这一切。
back_translation: This film does not promote the truth of two people in love, but rather gives them time and space for us to believe in it ourselves.

text: -lrb- fincher 's -rrb- camera sense and assured pacing make it an above-average thriller .
translation: 芬奇的摄影感和自信的节奏使它成为一部超出平均水平的悬疑惊悚片。
back_translation: Fincher's photographic sensibility and confident pacing make it an above-average suspense thriller.

text: but while the highly predictable narrative falls short , treasure planet is truly gorgeous to behold .
translation: 但是尽管这个高度可预测的叙事有所欠缺，《宝藏星球》确实令人赏心悦目。
back_translation: However, despite the shortcomings of this highly predictable narrative, "Treasure Planet" is indeed visually pleasing.

text: there must be an audience that enjoys the friday series , but i would n't be interested in knowing any of them personally .
translation: 一定有观众喜欢《星期五系列》，但是我对认识其中的任何人都没有兴趣。
back_translation: There must be viewers who like the "Friday series," but I have no interest in getting to know any of them.

text: some fine acting , but ultimately a movie with no reason for being .
translation: 一些出色的表演，但归根结底是一部毫无存在理由的电影。
back_translation: Some excellent performances, but ultimately it's a film that has no reason to exist.

text: and if you appreciate the one-sided theme to lawrence 's over-indulgent tirade , then knock yourself out and enjoy the big screen postcard that is a self-glorified martin lawrence lovefest .
translation: 如果你欣赏劳伦斯过度沉溺于单方面主题的长篇大论，那么尽情享受这幅自我美化的马丁·劳伦斯爱的画面吧。
back_translation: If you appreciate Martin Lawrence's lengthy monologues that excessively indulge in one-sided themes, then enjoy this self-glorifying portrait of Martin Lawrence's love.

text: it 's consistently funny , in an irresistible junior-high way , and consistently free of any gag that would force you to give it a millisecond of thought .
translation: 它始终令人发笑，以一种不可抗拒的初中风格，且始终没有任何需要你思考一毫秒的笑料。
back_translation: It is always amusing, with an irresistible middle school style, and there are never any jokes that require you to think for even a millisecond.

text: it 's definitely not made for kids or their parents , for that matter , and i think even fans of sandler 's comic taste may find it uninteresting .
translation: 这绝对不是为孩子或他们的父母所制作的，甚至我觉得即使是喜欢桑德勒幽默风格的粉丝们也可能会觉得它无趣。
back_translation: This is definitely not made for children or their parents, and I even think that fans who enjoy Sandler's sense of humor might find it boring.

text: things really get weird , though not particularly scary : the movie is all portent and no content .
translation: 事情确实变得怪异，虽然并不是特别可怕：这部电影充满了预兆却没有实质内容。
back_translation: Things have definitely become strange, though not particularly terrifying: this movie is full of foreshadowing but lacks substantial content.

text: a properly spooky film about the power of spirits to influence us whether we believe in them or not .
translation: 一部真正恐怖的电影，讲述了灵魂的力量如何影响我们，无论我们是否相信它们。
back_translation: A truly terrifying movie that tells the story of how the power of the soul affects us, whether or not we believe in them.

text: drawing on an irresistible , languid romanticism , byler reveals the ways in which a sultry evening or a beer-fueled afternoon in the sun can inspire even the most retiring heart to venture forth .
translation: 通过一种不可抗拒的、慵懒的浪漫主义，Byler揭示了一个炎热的夜晚或阳光下喝酒的下午如何能够激励连最内向的心灵也勇敢地迈出步伐。
back_translation: Through an irresistible, lazy romanticism, Byler reveals how a hot night or an afternoon drinking in the sun can inspire even the most introverted souls to bravely take a step forward.

text: there 's absolutely no reason why blue crush , a late-summer surfer girl entry , should be as entertaining as it is
translation: 绝对没有理由让《蓝色冲击》这部晚夏冲浪女孩题材的电影如此精彩。
back_translation: There is absolutely no reason for the movie "Blue Crush," a late summer surf girl-themed film, to be so wonderful.

text: mike leigh populates his movie with a wonderful ensemble cast of characters that bring the routine day to day struggles of the working class to life
translation: 迈克·李在他的电影中聚集了一支出色的演员阵容，生动地展现了工人阶级日常生活中的琐碎斗争。
back_translation: Mike Leigh assembles an excellent cast in his films, vividly portraying the mundane struggles of working-class daily life.

text: contains a few big laughs but many more that graze the funny bone or miss it altogether , in part because the consciously dumbed-down approach wears thin .
translation: 虽然包含了一些大笑的时刻，但更多的是轻轻触碰幽默感或者完全错过幽默的时刻，这在一定程度上是因为故意低级的方式显得乏味。
back_translation: Although there are some moments of great laughter, there are more instances of gently touching on humor or completely missing it, partly because the deliberately crude approach feels dull.

text: transforms one of -lrb- shakespeare 's -rrb- deepest tragedies into a smart new comedy .
translation: 将莎士比亚最深刻的悲剧之一转变为一个聪明的新喜剧。
back_translation: Transform one of Shakespeare's most profound tragedies into a clever new comedy.

text: successfully blended satire , high camp and yet another sexual taboo into a really funny movie .
translation: 成功地将讽刺、高度戏谑以及另一个性的禁忌融合成了一部非常搞笑的电影。
back_translation: Successfully merged satire, high parody, and another taboo of sexuality into a very funny movie.

text: a sweet-tempered comedy that forgoes the knee-jerk misogyny that passes for humor in so many teenage comedies .
translation: 一部温和幽默的喜剧，放弃了在许多青春喜剧中常见的冲动厌女情绪作为幽默的表现。
back_translation: A gentle and humorous comedy that abandons the impulsive misogynistic sentiments often found in many teen comedies as a form of humor.

text: an elegant film with often surprising twists and an intermingling of naivet茅 and sophistication .
translation: 一部优雅的电影，常常有惊人的转折，交织着天真与复杂的气质。
back_translation: An elegant film often has surprising twists, interweaving innocence and complexity.

text: even better than the first one !
translation: 比第一部还要好！
back_translation: Better than the first one!

text: i ca n't recommend it .
translation: 我不能推荐它。
back_translation: I cannot recommend it.

text: poor ben bratt could n't find stardom if mapquest emailed him point-to-point driving directions .
translation: 可怜的本·布拉特，即使地图查询给他发了逐点的驾车路线，他也找不到成名之路。
back_translation: Poor Ben Blatter, even with the step-by-step driving directions from the map, he still can't find the road to fame.

text: more of the same from taiwanese auteur tsai ming-liang , which is good news to anyone who 's fallen under the sweet , melancholy spell of this unique director 's previous films .
translation: 来自台湾导演蔡明亮的更多作品，这对所有沉浸在这位独特导演之前影片的甜美与忧郁魅力中的人来说都是好消息。
back_translation: More works from Taiwanese director Tsai Ming-liang, which is good news for everyone immersed in the sweet and melancholic charm of this unique director's previous films.

text: allen shows he can outgag any of those young whippersnappers making moving pictures today .
translation: 艾伦展示了他能超过那些今天制作电影的年轻人的搞笑能力。
back_translation: Allen demonstrated his comedic ability to surpass the young people making movies today.

text: by-the-numbers yarn .
translation: 数字化纱线。
back_translation: Digital yarn.

text: on the granger movie gauge of 1 to 10 , the powerpuff girls is a fast , frenetic , funny , even punny 6 -- aimed specifically at a grade-school audience .
translation: 在格兰杰电影评分表上从1到10，《飞天小女警》是一部快节奏、充满活力、有趣，甚至带有双关语的6分电影——专门针对小学生观众。
back_translation: On the Granger Movie Rating Scale from 1 to 10, "The Powerpuff Girls" is a fast-paced, vibrant, and fun movie with even some puns, rated 6 out of 10—specifically aimed at elementary school audiences.

text: those who trek to the ` plex predisposed to like it probably will enjoy themselves .
translation: 那些前往`plex的人，如果他们有倾向喜欢它，可能会玩得很开心。
back_translation: Those who go to `plex, if they tend to like it, might have a lot of fun.

text: an ambitious ` what if ? '
translation: 一个雄心勃勃的“如果?”
back_translation: An ambitious "What if?"

text: when a movie has stuck around for this long , you know there 's something there .
translation: 当一部电影能够持续这么久时，你知道其中一定有值得的地方。
back_translation: When a movie can last this long, you know there must be something worthwhile about it.

text: nothing wrong with performances here , but the whiney characters bugged me .
translation: 这里的表演没有问题，但那些抱怨的角色让我感到烦恼。
back_translation: The performance here is fine, but the complaining characters annoy me.

text: it 's a boring movie about a boring man , made watchable by a bravura performance from a consummate actor incapable of being boring .
translation: 这是一部关于一个无聊男人的无聊电影，但因一位无可挑剔、无法无聊的顶级演员的出色表演而变得可看。
back_translation: This is a boring movie about a boring man, but it becomes watchable due to the outstanding performance of a top-notch actor who is impeccable and anything but boring.

text: a first-class , thoroughly involving b movie that effectively combines two surefire , beloved genres -- the prison flick and the fight film .
translation: 一部一流的、完全吸引人的乙级电影，有效地结合了两种必定受欢迎的类型——监狱片和搏击片。
back_translation: A first-class, completely captivating B-movie that effectively combines two undoubtedly popular genres _ prison films and fighting films.

text: the lady and the duke is a smart , romantic drama that dares to depict the french revolution from the aristocrats ' perspective .
translation: 《女士与公爵》是一部聪明、浪漫的戏剧，敢于从贵族的角度描绘法国大革命。
back_translation: "The Lady and the Duke" is a clever and romantic drama that daringly portrays the French Revolution from the perspective of the aristocracy.

text: even if you 've seen `` stomp '' -lrb- the stage show -rrb- , you still have to see this !
translation: 即使你看过《踩踏》（舞台秀），你仍然要看看这个！
back_translation: Even if you have seen "Stomp" (the stage show), you still need to check this out!

text: this familiar rise-and-fall tale is long on glamour and short on larger moralistic consequences , though it 's told with sharp ears and eyes for the tenor of the times .
translation: 这个熟悉的兴衰故事充满了 glamour ，但在更大的道德后果上则相对欠缺，尽管它以敏锐的耳朵和眼睛捕捉时代的气息。
back_translation: This familiar story of rise and fall is filled with glamour, but it is relatively lacking in greater moral consequences, even though it captures the spirit of the era with sharp ears and eyes.

text: the ensemble cast turns in a collectively stellar performance , and the writing is tight and truthful , full of funny situations and honest observations .
translation: 这个群体演员的表现 collectively 出色，剧本紧凑而真实，充满了有趣的情境和真诚的观察。
back_translation: The performances of this group of actors are collectively outstanding, the script is tight and authentic, filled with interesting situations and sincere observations.

text: while not all that bad of a movie , it 's nowhere near as good as the original .
translation: 虽然这部电影并不算太糟，但远远比不上原版。
back_translation: Although this movie isn't too bad, it falls far short of the original.

text: as broad and cartoonish as the screenplay is , there is an accuracy of observation in the work of the director , frank novak , that keeps the film grounded in an undeniable social realism .
translation: 尽管剧本夸张且卡通化，导演弗兰克·诺瓦克的观察力在作品中保持了一种不可否认的社会现实主义，使得这部电影保持了真实感。
back_translation: Despite the exaggerated and cartoonish script, director Frank Novak's insight maintains an undeniable social realism in the work, giving the film a sense of authenticity.

text: its use of the thriller form to examine the labyrinthine ways in which people 's lives cross and change , buffeted by events seemingly out of their control , is intriguing , provocative stuff .
translation: 其利用惊悚形式来探讨人们的生活是如何交织和变化的，这些变化受到看似超出他们控制的事件的影响，令人着迷，发人深省。
back_translation: It uses the horror genre to explore how people's lives are intertwined and change, influenced by events that seem beyond their control, which is fascinating and thought-provoking.

text: a less-than-thrilling thriller .
translation: 一部令人失望的惊悚片。
back_translation: A disappointing thriller.

text: would 've been nice if the screenwriters had trusted audiences to understand a complex story , and left off the film 's predictable denouement .
translation: 如果编剧能够信任观众理解一个复杂的故事，而省略掉电影中可预测的结局，那就会很好。
back_translation: It would be great if screenwriters could trust the audience to understand a complex story and omit the predictable ending in the film.

text: the hard-to-predict and absolutely essential chemistry between the down-to-earth bullock and the nonchalant grant proves to be sensational , and everything meshes in this elegant entertainment .
translation: 脚踏实地的布洛克与漫不经心的格兰特之间难以预测且绝对重要的化学反应令人惊艳，一切都在这场优雅的娱乐中完美结合。
back_translation: The unpredictable yet absolutely significant chemistry between the down-to-earth Brock and the carefree Grant is stunning, with everything perfectly combining in this elegant entertainment.

text: some of the most ravaging , gut-wrenching , frightening war scenes since `` saving private ryan '' have been recreated by john woo in this little-known story of native americans and their role in the second great war .
translation: 约翰·吴在这个鲜为人知的关于美洲原住民及其在第二次世界大战中角色的故事中，重现了一些自《拯救大兵瑞恩》以来最具破坏性、揪心和令人恐惧的战争场景。
back_translation: John Woo recreates some of the most devastating, heart-wrenching, and terrifying war scenes since "Saving Private Ryan" in this lesser-known story about Native Americans and their role in World War II.

text: morton deserves an oscar nomination .
translation: 莫顿值得获得奥斯卡提名。
back_translation: Morton deserves an Oscar nomination.

text: you 'll just have your head in your hands wondering why lee 's character did n't just go to a bank manager and save everyone the misery .
translation: 你只会抱着头，想知道为什么李的角色不去找银行经理，这样就可以让大家免受痛苦。
back_translation: You can only hold your head and wonder why Li's character doesn't go to find the bank manager, which could spare everyone from suffering.

text: by turns pretentious , fascinating , ludicrous , provocative and vainglorious .
translation: 时而自命不凡，时而引人入胜，时而荒谬可笑，时而挑衅，时而自负虚荣。
back_translation: At times self-important, at times captivating, at times absurdly amusing, at times provocative, at times arrogantly vain.

text: it 's kind of sad that so many people put so much time and energy into this turkey .
translation: 让人有点伤感的是，很多人投入了那么多时间和精力在这只火鸡上。
back_translation: What makes one a bit sad is that many people have invested so much time and energy into this turkey.

text: -lrb- davis -rrb- wants to cause his audience an epiphany , yet he refuses to give us real situations and characters .
translation: （戴维斯）想让他的观众产生顿悟，然而他拒绝给我们真实的情境和角色。
back_translation: (Davis) wants to evoke an epiphany in his audience, yet he refuses to provide us with real situations and characters.

text: it all looks and plays like a $ 40 million version of a game you 're more likely to enjoy on a computer .
translation: 它看起来和玩起来都像是一个4000万美元版本的游戏，你更有可能在电脑上享受。
back_translation: It looks and plays like a $40 million game that you are more likely to enjoy on a computer.

text: van wilder has a built-in audience , but only among those who are drying out from spring break and are still unconcerned about what they ingest .
translation: 范·怀尔德有一个内置的观众群体，但仅限于那些正在从春假中恢复的年轻人，且仍然对他们摄入的东西毫不在意。
back_translation: Van Wilder has an inherent audience, but it is limited to young people who are just recovering from spring break and still indifferent to what they consume.

text: forget the psychology 101 study of romantic obsession and just watch the procession of costumes in castles and this wo n't seem like such a bore .
translation: 忘掉心理学101中对浪漫痴迷的研究，只需观看城堡中的服装游行，这样就不会觉得如此无聊。
back_translation: Forget the studies on romantic obsession from Psychology 101; just watch the costume parade in the castle, and it won't feel so boring.

text: it 's too harsh to work as a piece of storytelling , but as an intellectual exercise -- an unpleasant debate that 's been given the drive of a narrative and that 's been acted out -- the believer is nothing less than a provocative piece of work .
translation: 作为一部叙事作品，它过于严苛，但作为一种智力练习——一种被赋予叙事驱动力并被演绎的不愉快辩论——《信徒》毫不逊色于一部引人深思的作品。
back_translation: As a narrative work, it is overly harsh, but as an intellectual exercise—an unpleasant debate endowed with narrative drive and interpretation—"The Believer" is no less than a thought-provoking piece.

text: there 's no excuse for following up a delightful , well-crafted family film with a computer-generated cold fish .
translation: 没有理由在一部令人愉快、精心制作的家庭电影之后跟进一部计算机生成的冷淡作品。
back_translation: There’s no reason to follow up a delightful, well-crafted family film with a cold, computer-generated piece.

text: a very capable nailbiter .
translation: 一个非常能干的啃指甲者。

text: one scene after another in this supposedly funny movie falls to the floor with a sickening thud .
translation: 这部所谓搞笑的电影中，一个接一个的场景让人感到不适地重重摔倒在地。
back_translation: In this so-called comedy film, one uncomfortable scene after another has people falling heavily to the ground.

text: a witty , whimsical feature debut .
translation: 一部机智而富有奇思妙想的处女作。
back_translation: A clever and imaginative debut work.

text: `` -lrb- hopkins -rrb- does n't so much phone in his performance as fax it .
translation: 霍普金斯的表演与其说是打电话，不如说是发传真。
back_translation: Hopkins' performance is more like sending a fax than making a phone call.

text: a moving and stark reminder that the casualties of war reach much further than we imagine .
translation: 一个感人而刺痛的提醒，战争的伤亡远远超出我们的想象。
back_translation: A poignant and painful reminder that the casualties of war far exceed our imagination.

text: no big whoop , nothing new to see , zero thrills , too many flashbacks and a choppy ending make for a bad film .
translation: 没有什么大不了的，没什么新东西可看，毫无刺激，太多的回忆片段和支离破碎的结局导致这部电影很糟糕。
back_translation: There's nothing much to see, nothing new, it's very dull. Too many fragmented memories and broken endings make this movie terrible.

text: wedding feels a bit anachronistic .
translation: 婚礼感觉有点过时。
back_translation: The wedding feels a bit outdated.

text: it 's like rocky and bullwinkle on speed , but that 's neither completely enlightening , nor does it catch the intensity of the movie 's strangeness .
translation: 这就像是《洛基与布尔温克尔》加速版，但这既没有完全启发人，也无法捕捉到电影奇异性的强烈感。
back_translation: This is like an accelerated version of "Rocky and Bullwinkle," but it neither fully inspires nor captures the strong sense of the film's uniqueness.

text: schepisi , aided by a cast that seems to include every top-notch british actor who did not appear in gosford park -lrb- as well as one , ms. mirren , who did -rrb- , has succeeded beyond all expectation .
translation: 舍皮西在一支似乎包括了所有没有出现在《戈斯福德公园》中的顶级英国演员的阵容中（还有一位出现在其中的米伦女士），超出了所有人的期待。
back_translation: Shepherd exceeded everyone's expectations in a cast that seemingly included all the top British actors who did not appear in "Gosford Park," along with one Ms. Mirren who did.

text: this movie got me grinning .
translation: 这部电影让我忍不住微笑。
back_translation: This movie made me can't help but smile.

text: a haunting tale of murder and mayhem .
translation: 一个令人毛骨悚然的谋杀与混乱的故事。
back_translation: A chilling story of murder and chaos.

text: weighted down with slow , uninvolving storytelling and flat acting .
translation: 拖沓的故事叙述和平淡的表演让人感到沉重。
back_translation: The sluggish storytelling and plain performances make one feel weighed down.

text: me without you has a bracing truth that 's refreshing after the phoniness of female-bonding pictures like divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood .
translation: 没有你，带有一种令人振奋的真理，在《雅雅姐妹会的神秘秘密》等女性团结影片的虚假之后，显得格外清新。
back_translation: Without you, it carries an uplifting truth that feels particularly refreshing in contrast to the falsehoods of films about women's solidarity like "The Mysterious Secret of the Yaya Sisterhood."

text: consummate actor barry has done excellent work here .
translation: 完美的演员巴里在这里表现出色。
back_translation: The perfect actor Barry excels here.

text: a decent-enough nail-biter that stands a good chance of being the big hit franklin needs to stay afloat in hollywood .
translation: 一部足够引人入胜的紧张影片，有很大机会成为富兰克林在好莱坞生存下去所需的热门作品。
back_translation: A sufficiently captivating thriller has a great chance of becoming the hit that Franklin needs to survive in Hollywood.

text: ... the plot weaves us into a complex web .
translation: 情节将我们编织成一个复杂的网络。
back_translation: ...the plot weaves us into a complex web.

text: too infuriatingly quirky and taken with its own style .
translation: 过于令人愤怒的古怪，陶醉于它自己的风格。
back_translation: Excessively infuriating quirks, indulging in its own style.

text: the most opaque , self-indulgent and just plain goofy an excuse for a movie as you can imagine .
translation: 这是你能想象的最不透明、最自我沉溺、简直就是荒诞不经的电影借口。
back_translation: This is the most opaque, self-indulgent, and utterly absurd movie excuse you can imagine.

text: the scorpion king is more fun than conan the barbarian .
translation: 《蝎子王》比《野蛮人柯南》更有趣。
back_translation: "The Scorpion King" is more interesting than "Conan the Barbarian."

text: he has a great cast and a great idea .
translation: 他有一支优秀的演员阵容和一个很好的创意。
back_translation: He has an excellent cast and a great concept.

text: `` sweet home alabama '' is what it is -- a nice , harmless date film ...
translation: 《甜蜜家园阿拉巴马》就是它的本质——一部不错的、无害的约会电影
back_translation: "Sweet Home Alabama" is its essence—a decent, harmless romantic comedy...

text: even when there are lulls , the emotions seem authentic , and the picture is so lovely toward the end ... you almost do n't notice the 129-minute running time .
translation: 即使在冷场时，情感似乎也很真实，影片接近尾声时如此美丽你几乎不会注意到129分钟的片长。
back_translation: Even during the cold moments, the emotions seem very real, and it's so beautiful towards the end of the film... you hardly notice the 129-minute runtime.

text: diaz , applegate , blair and posey are suitably kooky which should appeal to women and they strip down often enough to keep men alert , if not amused .
translation: 迪亚兹、阿普尔盖特、布莱尔和波西都非常古怪，应该会吸引女性，而她们经常脱衣服，也足以让男性保持警觉，尽管不一定让他们感到 entertained。
back_translation: Diaz, Applegate, Blair, and Posey are all very quirky, which should attract women, and they often take off their clothes, enough to keep men on their toes, although it doesn't necessarily entertain them.

text: sure , it 's contrived and predictable , but its performances are so well tuned that the film comes off winningly , even though it 's never as solid as you want it to be .
translation: 当然，这部电影有些矫揉造作和可预测，但演员们的表演非常到位，让电影显得颇为成功，尽管它从未像你所希望的那样坚实。
back_translation: Of course, the movie is somewhat contrived and predictable, but the performances of the actors are very well done, which makes the film seem quite successful, even though it never feels as solid as you might hope.

text: sadly , full frontal plays like the work of a dilettante .
translation: 遗憾的是，《全裸》如同一位业余爱好者的作品。
back_translation: Unfortunately, "The Naked" resembles a work of an amateur.

text: runs on the pure adrenalin of pacino 's performance .
translation: 依靠帕奇诺的表演所带来的纯粹肾上腺素而运行。
back_translation: It runs on the pure adrenaline brought by Pacino's performance.

text: the tuxedo was n't just bad ; it was , as my friend david cross would call it , ` hungry-man portions of bad ' .
translation: 这件燕尾服不仅仅是糟糕；正如我的朋友大卫·交叉所说，简直是“饿汉份额的糟糕”。
back_translation: This tuxedo is not just bad; as my friend David Cross said, it's "a horrible portion for a starving man."

text: shyamalan takes a potentially trite and overused concept -lrb- aliens come to earth -rrb- and infuses it into a rustic , realistic , and altogether creepy tale of hidden invasion .
translation: 沙马兰将一个潜在的陈词滥调和过度使用的概念（外星人来到地球）注入了一个乡村、现实且完全令人毛骨悚然的隐藏入侵故事中。
back_translation: Shyamalan injected a potentially clichéd and overused concept (aliens arriving on Earth) into a rural, realistic, and completely chilling story of hidden invasion.

text: `` spider-man is better than any summer blockbuster we had to endure last summer , and hopefully , sets the tone for a summer of good stuff .
translation: 蜘蛛侠比我们去年夏天经历的任何一部夏季大片都要好， 希望它能为这个夏季的好作品定下基调。
back_translation: Spider-Man is better than any summer blockbuster we experienced last summer, and I hope it sets the tone for good works this summer.

text: the film is visually dazzling , the depicted events dramatic , funny and poignant .
translation: 这部电影在视觉上令人眼花缭乱，描绘的事件既戏剧化又幽默，令人感动。
back_translation: This movie is visually stunning, with events that are both dramatic and humorous, leaving a lasting emotional impact.

text: ... a complete shambles of a movie so sloppy , so uneven , so damn unpleasant that i ca n't believe any viewer , young or old , would have a good time here .
translation: ... 一部完全混乱的电影，糟糕得如此不均衡，如此令人不快，我简直无法相信无论年轻人还是老人会在这里获得任何乐趣。
back_translation: ... a completely chaotic movie, so uneven and so unpleasant that I can hardly believe that either young people or old people would find any enjoyment here.

text: like many western action films , this thriller is too loud and thoroughly overbearing , but its heartfelt concern about north korea 's recent past and south korea 's future adds a much needed moral weight .
translation: 与许多西方动作片一样，这部惊悚片过于喧闹且令人喘不过气，但它对朝鲜近期历史和韩国未来的真诚关切增添了急需的道德分量。
back_translation: Like many Western action films, this thriller is overly loud and overwhelming, but its sincere concern for North Korea's recent history and South Korea's future adds a much-needed moral weight.

text: a charmer from belgium .
translation: 来自比利时的魅力者。
back_translation: Charmers from Belgium.

text: it 's not only dull because we 've seen -lrb- eddie -rrb- murphy do the genial-rogue shtick to death , but because the plot is equally hackneyed .
translation: 这不仅让人感到乏味，因为我们已经看到埃迪·墨菲（Eddie Murphy）演绎这一和善的流氓角色到死，而且因为情节同样老套。
back_translation: This is not only dull because we have already seen Eddie Murphy portray this affable rogue character to death, but also because the plot is equally clichéd.

text: even during the climactic hourlong cricket match , boredom never takes hold .
translation: 即使在高潮的一个小时的板球比赛中， boredom 也从未占据上风。
back_translation: Even in an hour-long cricket match at its climax, boredom has never taken the upper hand.

text: a movie that sends you out of the theater feeling like you 've actually spent time living in another community .
translation: 一部让你走出电影院，感觉自己真的在另一个社区生活过的电影。
back_translation: A film that makes you walk out of the theater feeling as if you have truly lived in another community.

text: pipe dream does have its charms .
translation: 泡沫梦想确实有其魅力。
back_translation: Dreams of bubbles do indeed have their charm.

text: if you 're part of her targeted audience , you 'll cheer .
translation: 如果你是她的目标受众之一，你会欢呼。
back_translation: If you are one of her target audience, you would cheer.

text: crush could be the worst film a man has made about women since valley of the dolls .
translation: 《迷恋》可能是自《玩偶谷》以来，男人对女性拍的最糟糕的电影。
back_translation: "Obsession" may be the worst movie made by men about women since "Dollhouse."

text: it 's very beavis and butthead , yet always seems to elicit a chuckle .
translation: 这非常像《比维斯与巴特海德》，但总是能引发一阵笑声。
back_translation: This is very much like “Beavis and Butt-Head,” but it always manages to provoke a wave of laughter.

text: solaris is rigid and evasive in ways that soderbergh 's best films , `` erin brockovich , '' `` out of sight '' and `` ocean 's eleven , '' never were .
translation: 《太阳光灿烂》在某种程度上是刚性和难以捉摸的，而索德伯格最好的电影《艾琳·布罗克维奇》、《无处可去》和《海洋之十一》则从未如此。
back_translation: "The Sunshine is Brilliant" is to some extent rigid and elusive, whereas Soderbergh's best films, "Erin Brockovich," "Out of Sight," and "Ocean's Eleven," have never been like this.

text: a modestly made but profoundly moving documentary .
translation: 一部制作简朴但深具感人力量的纪录片。
back_translation: A simply produced but profoundly moving documentary.

text: ... grows decidedly flimsier with its many out-sized , out of character and logically porous action set pieces .
translation: ...伴随着众多不合常规、超大规模且逻辑漏洞百出的动作场面，变得愈加薄弱。
back_translation: ...along with numerous unconventional, oversized, and logically flawed action scenes, it has become increasingly weak.

text: fessenden continues to do interesting work , and it would be nice to see what he could make with a decent budget .
translation: 费辛登继续进行有趣的工作，看看他能在一个不错的预算下制作出什么作品会很不错。
back_translation: Feixinden continues to do interesting work, it would be nice to see what he can create within a decent budget.

text: as a feature-length film , it wears out its welcome as tryingly as the title character .
translation: 作为一部长篇电影，它的拖沓与标题角色一样让人感到厌烦。
back_translation: As a feature film, its sluggishness is as annoying as the titular character.

text: frank capra played this story straight .
translation: 弗兰克·卡普拉以严肃的方式演绎了这个故事。
back_translation: Frank Capra interpreted this story in a serious manner.

text: control-alt-delete simone as quickly as possible
translation: 尽快按下控制-选项-删除，西蒙。
back_translation: Press Control-Option-Delete as soon as possible, Simon.

text: nevertheless , it still seems endless .
translation: 然而，它似乎仍然没有尽头。
back_translation: However, it seems to still have no end.

text: there 's a persistent theatrical sentiment and a woozy quality to the manner of the storytelling , which undercuts the devastatingly telling impact of utter loss personified in the film 's simple title .
translation: 叙事方式中有一种持久的戏剧性情感和恍惚的特质，这削弱了影片简单标题中所体现的彻底失落的毁灭性影响。
back_translation: The narrative style features a persistent dramatic emotion and a sense of disorientation, which diminishes the utterly lost destructive impact reflected in the film's simple title.

text: mel gibson fights the good fight in vietnam in director randall wallace 's flag-waving war flick with a core of decency .
translation: 梅尔·吉普森在导演兰德尔·华莱士的充满爱国情怀的战争电影中，以正义的信念在越南奋战，影片核心体现了人性的善良。
back_translation: Mel Gibson fights with a sense of justice in the patriotic war film directed by Randall Wallace, which embodies the goodness of human nature at its core.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: 尽管这部电影被宣传为喜剧，《甜蜜家园阿拉巴马》并没有你希望的那么搞笑。
back_translation: Despite being marketed as a comedy, "Sweet Home Alabama" is not as funny as you might hope.

text: `` barbershop '' is a good-hearted ensemble comedy with a variety of quirky characters and an engaging story .
translation: 《理发店》是一部充满善意的喜剧，拥有各种古怪的角色和引人入胜的故事。
back_translation: "The Barbershop" is a heartwarming comedy filled with quirky characters and an engaging storyline.

text: though lan yu lacks a sense of dramatic urgency , the film makes up for it with a pleasing verisimilitude .
translation: 尽管《蓝宇》缺乏戏剧紧迫感，但影片以令人愉悦的真实感弥补了这一点。
back_translation: Although "Lan Yu" lacks dramatic urgency, the film compensates for this with a delightful sense of realism.

text: this hastily mounted production exists only to capitalize on hopkins ' inclination to play hannibal lecter again , even though harris has no immediate inclination to provide a fourth book .
translation: 这个匆忙制作的作品只是为了利用霍普金斯再次扮演汉尼拔·莱克特的兴趣，尽管哈里斯并没有立即提供第四本书的意向。
back_translation: This hastily made work was only to take advantage of Hopkins' interest in playing Hannibal Lecter again, even though Harris did not immediately express intentions for a fourth book.

text: fortunately , elling never gets too cloying thanks to the actors ' perfect comic timing and sweet , genuine chemistry .
translation: 幸运的是，由于演员们完美的喜剧时机和甜美、真诚的化学反应，艾灵从未显得过于肉麻。
back_translation: Fortunately, thanks to the perfect comedic timing of the actors and their sweet, genuine chemistry, Ailing never came across as overly cheesy.

text: but it has an ambition to say something about its subjects , but not a willingness .
translation: 但它有意愿对其主题有所表达，却缺乏这种意愿。
back_translation: But it has the intention to express something about its subject, yet lacks that willingness.

text: please , someone , stop eric schaeffer before he makes another film .

text: sheridan had a wonderful account to work from , but , curiously , he waters it down , turning grit and vulnerability into light reading .

text: despite its faults , gangs excels in spectacle and pacing .

text: a loud , low-budget and tired formula film that arrives cloaked in the euphemism ` urban drama . '

text: lovingly photographed in the manner of a golden book sprung to life , stuart little 2 manages sweetness largely without stickiness .
translation: 以一种栩栩如生的金色图书的方式精心拍摄，斯图尔特·利特尔2在保持甜美的同时基本没有粘腻感。

text: flat , misguided comedy .

text: there are moments of hilarity to be had .

text: it 's hard to imagine anyone managing to steal a movie not only from charismatic rising star jake gyllenhaal but also from accomplished oscar winners susan sarandon , dustin hoffman and holly hunter , yet newcomer ellen pompeo pulls off the feat with aplomb .
translation: 很难想象有人能够从充满魅力的上升之星杰克·吉伦哈尔以及成就卓越的奥斯卡获奖者苏珊·萨兰登、达斯汀·霍夫曼和荷莉·亨特手中偷走一部电影，但新演员艾伦·庞佩欧却轻松完成了这个壮举。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine that anyone could steal a movie from the charming rising star Jake Gyllenhaal and the accomplished Oscar winners Susan Sarandon, Dustin Hoffman, and Holly Hunter, but newcomer Ellen Pompeo has managed to do just that with ease.

text: i never thought i 'd say this , but i 'd much rather watch teens poking their genitals into fruit pies !

text: i suspect this is the kind of production that would have been funnier if the director had released the outtakes theatrically and used the film as a bonus feature on the dvd .

text: it offers a glimpse of the solomonic decision facing jewish parents in those turbulent times : to save their children and yet to lose them .

text: the film jolts the laughs from the audience -- as if by cattle prod .

text: plodding , poorly written , murky and weakly acted , the picture feels as if everyone making it lost their movie mojo .

text: elegant , mannered and teasing .
translation: 优雅、举止得体且调皮。

text: there are flaws , but also stretches of impact and moments of awe ; we 're wrapped up in the characters , how they make their choices , and why .

translation: 《再也不》是浪漫喜剧类型中一个受欢迎且令人心暖的补充，时而感人，时而搞笑，令人不安，甚至，确实有点性感。

translation: 不是伟大的美国喜剧，但如果你喜欢这个系列之前的电影，你也会喜欢这部。

text: kapur 's contradictory feelings about his material result in a movie that works against itself .

text: but they fascinate in their recklessness .
translation: 但他们在放荡不羁中令人着迷。

text: this is an action movie with an action icon who 's been all but decommissioned .

text: ` cq may one day be fondly remembered as roman coppola 's brief pretentious period before going on to other films that actually tell a story worth caring about
translation: 《cq》或许有一天会被怀念为罗曼·科波拉短暂而自负的时期，而他随后拍摄的其他电影却真正讲述了值得关心的故事。

text: who cares ? -rrb- .

text: neither revelatory nor truly edgy -- merely crassly flamboyant and comedically labored .

text: an unflinching , complex portrait of a modern israel that is rarely seen on-screen .

text: the first question to ask about bad company is why anthony hopkins is in it .

text: an intelligent romantic thriller of a very old-school kind of quality .

text: a distinctly mixed bag , the occasional bursts of sharp writing alternating with lots of sloppiness and the obligatory moments of sentimental ooze .

translation: 一部你可以看完、在某种程度上享受，然后就忘记的B级电影。

text: watch barbershop again if you 're in need of a cube fix -- this is n't worth sitting through .

text: i have n't laughed that hard in years !
translation: 我已有多年没那样笑过了！

back_translation: An elegant and expressive film that brings a glimmer of hope to refugees at the end, allowing them to envision the future and resist the long-lost past.

text: what a great way to spend 4 units of your day .

text: and vin diesel is the man .
translation: 文·迪塞尔是个男人。

text: just a kiss is a just a waste .
translation: 只是一个吻只是浪费。

text: murder by numbers just does n't add up .
translation: 数字谋杀总是说不清。

text: all three descriptions suit evelyn , a besotted and obvious drama that tells us nothing new .
translation: 这三个描述都适合艾薇琳，这是一部迷恋且明显的戏剧，没有告诉我们任何新东西。

text: this is popcorn movie fun with equal doses of action , cheese , ham and cheek -lrb- as well as a serious debt to the road warrior -rrb- , but it feels like unrealized potential
translation: 这是一部充满乐趣的爆米花电影，兼具动作、低俗、搞笑和无耻的元素（同时也对《怒火 motorista》有着严重的借鉴），但感觉像是未能实现的潜力。
back_translation: This is a fun popcorn movie that combines elements of action, vulgarity, humor, and shamelessness (while also heavily borrowing from "Anger Motorist"), but it feels like unrealized potential.

text: in death to smoochy , we do n't get williams ' usual tear and a smile , just sneers and bile , and the spectacle is nothing short of refreshing .
translation: 在《死亡与微笑》中，我们没有看到威廉姆斯通常的泪水和微笑，只有嘲笑和恶心，这种景象令人耳目一新。
back_translation: In "Death and Smiles," we do not see Williams' usual tears and smiles, only mockery and disgust, a refreshing sight.

text: an uneven mix of dark satire and childhood awakening .
translation: 一种不均衡的黑色讽刺与童年觉醒的混合。

text: the movie is about as humorous as watching your favorite pet get buried alive .
translation: 这部电影的幽默程度就像看着你最喜欢的宠物被活埋一样。

translation: 《熊出没》比我想象中的任何电影都要糟糕得多。

text: dramatically lackluster .
translation: 戏剧性地缺乏活力。

text: made eddie murphy a movie star and the man has n't aged a day .

text: this is an undeniably intriguing film from an adventurous young talent who finds his inspiration on the fringes of the american underground .

text: yes , mibii is rote work and predictable , but with a philosophical visual coming right at the end that extravagantly redeems it .
translation: 是的，Mibii是机械化的工作和可预测的，但在最后有一种哲学的视觉效果，极尽奢华地挽回了它。
back_translation: Yes, Mibii is mechanized and predictable, but in the end, it has a philosophical visual effect that lavishly redeems it.

text: their contrast is neither dramatic nor comic -- it 's just a weird fizzle .
translation: 他们的对比既不戏剧化也不搞笑——只是一个奇怪的无趣。

text: all the characters are clinically depressed and have abandoned their slim hopes and dreams .
translation: 所有角色都患有重度抑郁症，放弃了他们微薄的希望和梦想。
back_translation: All characters suffer from severe depression, giving up their meager hopes and dreams.

text: tartakovsky 's team has some freakish powers of visual charm , but the five writers slip into the modern rut of narrative banality .
translation: 塔塔科夫斯基的团队拥有一些奇异的视觉魅力，但五位编剧却陷入了现代叙事平庸的泥潭。
back_translation: Tarkovsky's team possesses a peculiar visual charm, but the five screenwriters have fallen into the quagmire of modern narrative mediocrity.

text: a gently funny , sweetly adventurous film that makes you feel genuinely good , that is to say , entirely unconned by false sentiment or sharp , overmanipulative hollywood practices .
translation: 一部轻松幽默、甜美冒险的电影，让你感到真正的愉悦，也就是说，完全不受虚假情感或激烈、过度操控的好莱坞手法的欺骗。

text: tries too hard to be funny in a way that 's too loud , too goofy and too short of an attention span .
translation: 努力以一种过于喧闹、过于搞怪以及注意力过短的方式来搞笑。
back_translation: Striving to be funny in an overly noisy, quirky, and attention-span-short way.

text: the obnoxious title character provides the drama that gives added clout to this doc .
translation: 令人厌烦的主角为这部纪录片增加了戏剧性，增强了其权威性。
back_translation: The annoying protagonist adds drama to the documentary and enhances its authority.

text: you emerge dazed , confused as to whether you 've seen pornography or documentary .
translation: 你感到迷惑不解，难以判断自己看到的是色情片还是纪录片。

text: lucy 's a dull girl , that 's all .

text: sensitive ensemble performances and good period reconstruction add up to a moving tragedy with some buoyant human moments .
translation: 敏感的合奏表演和良好的时代重现结合在一起，构成了一部动人的悲剧，穿插着一些轻快的人性瞬间。
back_translation: The sensitive ensemble performance combined with a good re-creation of the era forms a moving tragedy, interspersed with some light-hearted moments of humanity.

text: directed without the expected flair or imagination by hong kong master john woo , windtalkers airs just about every cliche in the war movie compendium across its indulgent two-hour-and-fifteen-minute length .
translation: 由香港大师吴宇森执导的《风语者》，在其沉溺于两小时十五分钟的长度中，几乎展示了战争影片大全中的每个陈词滥调，而缺乏预期的风采或想象力。
back_translation: Directed by Hong Kong master John Woo, "Windtalkers" showcases almost every cliché in the war film genre within its indulgent two hours and fifteen minutes, lacking the expected flair or imagination.

text: it looks closely , insightfully at fragile , complex relationships .
translation: 它深入而细致地观察脆弱而复杂的人际关系。

text: the story has some nice twists but the ending and some of the back-story is a little tired .
translation: 这个故事有一些不错的转折，但结局和一些背景故事有点老套。

text: is an inexpressible and drab wannabe looking for that exact niche .

translation: 一个极具想象力的角色研究，它虽然开头比较慢，却通过将我带入情境而弥补了这一点。
