text: it 's the kind of movie that , aside from robert altman , spike lee , the coen brothers and a few others , our moviemakers do n't make often enough .
translation: 这是一部电影，除了罗伯特·阿尔特曼、斯派克·李、科恩兄弟和一些其他人，我们的电影制作人很少会制作这样的电影。
back_translation: This is a film that, aside from Robert Altman, Spike Lee, the Coen brothers, and a few others, our filmmakers rarely make.

text: the action sequences are fun and reminiscent of combat scenes from the star wars series .
translation: 动作场景令人愉快，令人想起《星球大战》系列中的战斗场景。
back_translation: The action scenes are delightful and reminiscent of the battle scenes in the "Star Wars" series.

text: the work of an exhausted , desiccated talent who ca n't get out of his own way .
translation: 一个疲惫、干枯的才华无法摆脱自己的困境。
back_translation: A weary and withered talent cannot escape its predicament.

text: the problem is that van wilder does little that is actually funny with the material .
translation: 问题在于，范·怀尔德对这些素材做的搞笑事情少之又少。
back_translation: The problem is that Van Wilder does very little funny stuff with this material.

text: no cliche escapes the perfervid treatment of gang warfare called ces wild .
translation: 没有一个陈词滥调能逃脱被称为CES Wild的热烈对待的帮派战争。
back_translation: No cliché can escape the intense treatment of the gang war known as CES Wild.

text: comes off like a bad imitation of the bard .
translation: 听起来像是对莎士比亚的拙劣模仿。
back_translation: It sounds like a poor imitation of Shakespeare.

text: the sweetest thing leaves an awful sour taste .
translation: 最甜的东西却留下可怕的酸味。
back_translation: The sweetest things leave a terrible sour taste.

text: it 's a great american adventure and a wonderful film to bring to imax .
translation: 这是一个伟大的美国冒险，也是一个适合在IMAX放映的精彩电影。
back_translation: This is a great American adventure and an exciting film suitable for IMAX screening.

text: resembles a soft porn brian de palma pastiche .
translation: 类似于一部柔软色情的布赖恩·德帕尔马拼贴作品。
back_translation: Similar to a soft-core pornography collage by Brian De Palma.

text: a uniquely sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession that spends a bit too much time on its fairly ludicrous plot .
translation: 一部独特的 sensual 隐喻化戏剧，展示了对性痴迷的感受，但在其相当荒谬的情节上花费了过多的时间。
back_translation: A unique sensual metaphorical drama that showcases feelings of sexual obsession, but spends too much time on its rather absurd plot.

text: the sentimental cliches mar an otherwise excellent film .
translation: 感伤的陈词滥调损害了一部原本优秀的电影。
back_translation: Sentimental clichés detract from what could have been an excellent film.

text: hollywood has taken quite a nosedive from alfred hitchcock 's imaginative flight to shyamalan 's self-important summer fluff .
translation: 好莱坞从阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克的富有创意的飞翔大幅下滑到了奈特·沙马兰自负的夏季轻浮之作。
back_translation: Hollywood has fallen from Alfred Hitchcock's creatively soaring heights to M. Night Shyamalan's self-indulgent, frivolous summer works.

text: this is standard crime drama fare ... instantly forgettable and thoroughly dull .
translation: 这是标准的犯罪剧内容瞬间让人遗忘且相当无聊。
back_translation: This is standard crime drama content... instantly forgettable and quite boring.

text: eyre is on his way to becoming the american indian spike lee .
translation: 艾尔正在走向成为美国印第安人斯派克·李的道路。
back_translation: Ayr is on the path to becoming the Spike Lee of American Indians.

text: in questioning the election process , payami graphically illustrates the problems of fledgling democracies , but also the strength and sense of freedom the iranian people already possess , with or without access to the ballot box .
translation: 在质疑选举过程时，Payami 生动地描绘了新兴民主国家的问题，但也展示了伊朗人民所拥有的力量和自由感，无论是否能够进入投票箱。
back_translation: While questioning the electoral process, Payami vividly depicted the issues faced by emerging democracies, but also showcased the power and sense of freedom the Iranian people possess, regardless of their ability to access the ballot box.

text: there 's a scientific law to be discerned here that producers would be well to heed : mediocre movies start to drag as soon as the action speeds up ; when the explosions start , they fall to pieces .
translation: 这里有一条科学法则值得制作人注意：平庸的电影一旦情节加速就会开始变得拖沓；当爆炸场面开始时，它们便会崩溃。
back_translation: There is a scientific law that producers should pay attention to: once the plot of a mediocre movie accelerates, it will begin to feel prolonged; when the explosive scenes start, they will collapse.

text: borstal boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking , the kind that pretends to be passionate and truthful but is really frustratingly timid and soggy .
translation: 《少年犯》代表了最糟糕的电影制作类型，那种表面上看似充满激情和真实，实际上却令人沮丧地胆怯和软弱。
back_translation: "Juvenile Offenders" represents the worst type of filmmaking, appearing on the surface to be full of passion and authenticity, yet is frustratingly timid and weak in reality.

text: so genial is the conceit , this is one of those rare pictures that you root for throughout , dearly hoping that the rich promise of the script will be realized on the screen .
translation: 这个构思如此美妙，这是一部你整个过程中都为之打气的罕见影片，真心希望剧本的丰富承诺能够在银幕上实现。
back_translation: This concept is so wonderful; it is a rare film that you cheer for throughout the entire process. I sincerely hope that the rich promises of the script can be realized on screen.

text: the only entertainment you 'll derive from this choppy and sloppy affair will be from unintentional giggles -- several of them .
translation: 你从这场凌乱不堪的事务中获得的唯一娱乐，将是来自几次意外的窃笑。
back_translation: The only amusement you will gain from this disheveled affair will be a few unexpected chuckles.

text: the good girl is a film in which the talent is undeniable but the results are underwhelming .
translation: 《好女孩》是一部才华不可否认但结果令人失望的电影。
back_translation: "Good Girl" is a film with undeniable talent but a disappointing outcome.

text: more of the same old garbage hollywood has been trying to pass off as acceptable teen entertainment for some time now .
translation: 更多的还是好莱坞试图将其作为可接受的青少年娱乐的老旧垃圾。
back_translation: More of it is still Hollywood trying to pass it off as acceptable teen entertainment, old junk.

text: amazingly dopey .
translation: 令人惊讶的愚笨。
back_translation: Surprisingly foolish.

text: the christ allegory does n't work because there is no foundation for it
translation: 基督寓言不起作用，因为没有基础。
back_translation: The Christian parable does not work because there is no foundation.

text: romanek keeps adding flourishes -- artsy fantasy sequences -- that simply feel wrong .
translation: 罗曼克不停地添加花哨的元素——艺术奇幻画面——让人觉得非常不对劲。
back_translation: Romance adds flashy elements—artistic fantastical images—that make people feel very uncomfortable.

text: combines improbable melodrama -lrb- gored bullfighters , comatose ballerinas -rrb- with subtly kinky bedside vigils and sensational denouements , and yet at the end , we are undeniably touched .
translation: 将不太可能的戏剧性元素（如被刺伤的斗牛士、昏迷的芭蕾舞者）与微妙的奇特守夜和惊人的结局结合在一起，尽管如此，最后我们无可否认地感动。
back_translation: Combining unlikely dramatic elements (such as a wounded bullfighter and a fainted ballerina) with subtle oddities of the night watch and a stunning conclusion, nonetheless, we are undeniably moved in the end.

text: you do n't need to be a hip-hop fan to appreciate scratch , and that 's the mark of a documentary that works .
translation: 你不需要成为嘻哈音乐的粉丝才能欣赏刮盘，这正是一个成功纪录片的标志。
back_translation: You don't need to be a fan of hip-hop music to appreciate "Scratching," which is exactly the hallmark of a successful documentary.

text: i 'm not sure which half of dragonfly is worse : the part where nothing 's happening , or the part where something 's happening , but it 's stupid .
translation: 我不确定蜻蜓的哪个部分更糟：没有发生什么的那部分，还是发生了什么但又很愚蠢的那部分。
back_translation: I’m not sure which part of the dragonfly is worse: the part where nothing happens, or the part where something happens but is stupid.

text: writer\/director david caesar ladles on the local flavour with a hugely enjoyable film about changing times , clashing cultures and the pleasures of a well-made pizza .
translation: 编剧/导演大卫·凯撒用一部极其令人愉快的电影展现了当地的风情，讲述了变迁的时代、冲突的文化以及一块精心制作的比萨的乐趣。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director David Caesar presents a highly enjoyable film that showcases local customs, telling the story of changing times, cultural conflicts, and the joy of a well-crafted pizza.

text: the journey to the secret 's eventual discovery is a separate adventure , and thrill enough .
translation: 发现秘密的旅程本身就是一场独立的冒险，足够令人兴奋。
back_translation: The journey of discovering secrets is an adventure in itself, exciting enough.

text: roman polanski directs the pianist like a surgeon mends a broken heart ; very meticulously but without any passion .
translation: 罗曼·波兰斯基执导《钢琴家》就像外科医生修复破碎的心；非常细致却没有任何激情。
back_translation: Roman Polanski's direction of "The Pianist" is like a surgeon repairing a broken heart; very meticulous but devoid of any passion.

text: it 's soulful and unslick , and that 's apparently just what -lrb- aniston -rrb- has always needed to grow into a movie career .
translation: 这部作品充满灵魂且不修饰，显然正是（安妮斯顿）一直以来所需要的，以便成长为一名电影演员。
back_translation: This work is full of soul and unembellished, clearly what (Aniston) has needed all along to grow into a movie actress.

text: like blended shades of lipstick , these components combine into one terrific story with lots of laughs .
translation: 就像混合的口红色调，这些元素汇聚成一个精彩的故事，充满了欢笑。
back_translation: Like a blend of lipstick shades, these elements come together to create an exciting story filled with laughter.

text: devos delivers a perfect performance that captures the innocence and budding demons within a wallflower .
translation: 德沃斯的表演完美地展现了一个内向者内心的纯真与正在觉醒的恶魔。
back_translation: DeVos's performance perfectly showcased the innocence of an introvert's inner world and the awakening demon within.

text: has lost some of the dramatic conviction that underlies the best of comedies ...
translation: 失去了支撑最佳喜剧的一些戏剧性信念
back_translation: Lost some dramatic beliefs that support the best comedy...

text: tells a fascinating , compelling story .
translation: 讲述了一个引人入胜、扣人心弦的故事。
back_translation: It tells an engaging and gripping story.

text: like a comedian who starts off promisingly but then proceeds to flop , comedian runs out of steam after a half hour .
translation: 就像一个起初表现良好的 comedian，后来却表现失常，喜剧演员在半小时后就失去了劲头。
back_translation: Just like a comedian who initially performs well but later falls flat, the comedian lost his momentum after half an hour.

text: one of those films where the characters inhabit that special annex of hell where adults behave like kids , children behave like adults and everyone screams at the top of their lungs no matter what the situation .
translation: 这种电影之一，角色们生活在那种特别的地狱附属区，成年人像孩子一样行为，孩子们像成年人一样举止，所有人无论在什么情况下都尖叫得响亮无比。
back_translation: One such movie features characters living in a special hellish zone, where adults behave like children, children act like adults, and everyone screams loudly in any circumstance.

text: devotees of star trek ii : the wrath of khan will feel a nagging sense of deja vu , and the grandeur of the best next generation episodes is lacking .
translation: 《星际迷航 II：可汗愤怒》的粉丝会感到一种烦人的既视感，而最优秀的《下一代》一集的宏伟感则显得不足。
back_translation: Fans of "Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan" may feel an annoying sense of déjà vu, while the grandeur of the best episodes of "The Next Generation" seems lacking.

text: beautifully reclaiming the story of carmen and recreating it an in an african idiom .
translation: 美丽地重新讲述卡门的故事，并以非洲的语法重塑它。
back_translation: Beautifully retell the story of Carmen and reshape it with African grammar.

text: the punch lines that miss , unfortunately , outnumber the hits by three-to-one .
translation: 不幸的是，失误的笑点数量比成功的多出三倍。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the number of failed punchlines is three times greater than the successful ones.

text: michel piccoli 's moving performance is this films reason for being .
translation: 米歇尔·皮库利的感人表演是这部电影存在的理由。
back_translation: Michele Piculi's touching performance is the reason for the existence of this film.

text: read my lips is to be viewed and treasured for its extraordinary intelligence and originality as well as its lyrical variations on the game of love .
translation: 《读我的嘴》应被视为珍贵之作，不仅因为它非凡的智慧和独创性，还因为它在爱情游戏上的抒情变奏。
back_translation: "Read My Lips" should be regarded as a precious work, not only for its extraordinary wisdom and originality but also for its lyrical variations on the game of love.

text: those seeking a definitive account of eisenstein 's life would do better elsewhere .
translation: 那些寻求爱森斯坦生活确凿记载的人，最好去别的地方寻找。
back_translation: Those who seek concrete records of Eisenstein's life are better off looking elsewhere.

text: yes , soar .
translation: 是的，翱翔。
back_translation: Yes, soaring.

text: as banal as the telling may be -- and at times , all my loved ones more than flirts with kitsch -- the tale commands attention .
translation: 尽管这个故事的叙述可能平淡无奇——有时，我所有亲人都不止是与俗气调情——但这个故事仍然吸引着注意。
back_translation: Although the narrative of this story may be ordinary—at times, all my relatives are more than just flirting with the mundane—this story still captures attention.

text: although frailty fits into a classic genre , in its script and execution it is a remarkably original work .
translation: 尽管《虚弱》适合经典类型，但在其剧本和执行上，它是一部极具原创性的作品。
back_translation: Although "Weakness" fits the classic genre, it is an exceptionally original work in its script and execution.

text: naipaul fans may be disappointed .
translation: 奈保尔的粉丝可能会感到失望。
back_translation: Naipaul's fans may feel disappointed.

text: attal pushes too hard to make this a comedy or serious drama .
translation: 阿塔尔过于强求将其制作成喜剧或严肃剧。
back_translation: Atal is overly demanding in trying to make it a comedy or a serious drama.

text: poignant and moving , a walk to remember is an inspirational love story , capturing the innocence and idealism of that first encounter .
translation: 感人至深的《记忆之路》是一部鼓舞人心的爱情故事，捕捉了第一次邂逅的纯真与理想主义。

text: in any case , i would recommend big bad love only to winger fans who have missed her since 1995 's forget paris .
translation: 无论如何，我只推荐《坏爱情》给自1995年《忘记巴黎》以来一直想念她的Winger粉丝。
back_translation: Anyway, I only recommend "Bad Love" to Winger fans who have missed her since "Forget Paris" in 1995.

text: ... by the time it 's done with us , mira nair 's new movie has its audience giddy with the delight of discovery , of having been immersed in a foreign culture only to find that human nature is pretty much the same all over .
translation: 在它结束对我们的影响时，米拉·奈尔的新电影让观众兴奋不已，体验到发现的乐趣，沉浸在异国文化中，最终发现人性在各地几乎是一样的。
back_translation: As it concludes its impact on us, Mira Nair's new film excites audiences, allowing them to experience the joy of discovery, immerse themselves in exotic cultures, and ultimately realize that humanity is almost the same everywhere.

text: if there 's a heaven for bad movies , deuces wild is on its way .
translation: 如果有一个坏电影的天堂，《双面人》正朝那里去。
back_translation: If there is a heaven for bad movies, "The Double Man" is heading there.

text: a huge box-office hit in korea , shiri is a must for genre fans .
translation: 《杀人回忆》在韩国是一个巨大的票房成功，对于类型片迷来说是必看的。
back_translation: "Memories of Murder" was a huge box office success in South Korea and is a must-watch for genre film enthusiasts.

text: clint eastwood 's blood work is a lot like a well-made pb & j sandwich : familiar , fairly uneventful and boasting no real surprises -- but still quite tasty and inviting all the same .
translation: 克林特·伊斯特伍德的《血迹》就像一块制作精良的花生酱和果酱三明治：熟悉、相对平淡，没有真正的惊喜——但依然相当美味和诱人。
back_translation: Clint Eastwood's "Cry Macho" is like a well-crafted peanut butter and jelly sandwich: familiar, relatively plain, with no real surprises—but still quite tasty and appealing.

text: the thing about guys like evans is this : you 're never quite sure where self-promotion ends and the truth begins .
translation: 关于像埃文斯这样的人，这件事就是：你永远无法确定自我推销结束的地方和真相开始的地方。
back_translation: Regarding people like Evans, the thing is: you can never be sure where self-promotion ends and the truth begins.

text: i found myself growing more and more frustrated and detached as vincent became more and more abhorrent .
translation: 随着文森特变得越来越令人厌恶，我发现自己变得越来越沮丧和疏离。
back_translation: As Vincent became more and more unbearable, I found myself becoming increasingly frustrated and alienated.

text: it 's like an all-star salute to disney 's cheesy commercialism .
translation: 这就像是对迪士尼花哨商业主义的全明星致敬。
back_translation: It's like an all-star tribute to Disney's flashy commercialism.

text: like a bad improvisation exercise , the superficially written characters ramble on tediously about their lives , loves and the art they 're struggling to create .
translation: 就像一次糟糕的即兴表演练习，那些表面上写得很简陋的角色冗长乏味地诉说着他们的生活、爱情和他们正在努力创造的艺术。
back_translation: Like a bad improvisation rehearsal, those superficially written characters tediously recount their lives, loves, and the art they are struggling to create.

text: though her fans will assuredly have their funny bones tickled , others will find their humor-seeking dollars best spent elsewhere .
translation: 尽管她的粉丝肯定会感到很开心，但其他人可能会发现将他们寻找幽默的花费花在别处更划算。
back_translation: Although her fans are sure to feel very happy, others may find it more cost-effective to spend their search for humor elsewhere.

text: the first fatal attraction was vile enough .
translation: 第一次致命吸引足够邪恶。
back_translation: The first fatal attraction is wicked enough.

text: a sentimental but entirely irresistible portrait of three aging sisters .
translation: 一幅感人但完全不可抗拒的三位年迈姐妹的肖像。
back_translation: A touching yet completely irresistible portrait of three elderly sisters.

text: measured against practically any like-themed film other than its oscar-sweeping franchise predecessor the silence of the lambs , red dragon rates as an exceptional thriller .
translation: 与几乎任何其他同类电影相比，除了其荣获奥斯卡奖项的前作《沉默的羔羊》之外，《红龙》都是一部卓越的惊悚片。
back_translation: Compared to almost any other film of its kind, "Red Dragon" is an exceptional thriller, second only to its Oscar-winning predecessor, "The Silence of the Lambs."

text: and as with most late-night bull sessions , eventually the content is n't nearly as captivating as the rowdy participants think it is .
translation: 就像大多数深夜闲聊一样，最终内容并没有参与者想象中那么吸引人。
back_translation: Like most late-night chats, the final content is not as captivating as the participants imagine.

text: ... a quietly introspective portrait of the self-esteem of employment and the shame of losing a job ...
translation: ... 一幅静静内省的画面，描绘了就业的自尊和失业的羞愧 ...
back_translation: ... a quietly introspective scene that depicts the self-esteem of employment and the shame of unemployment ...

text: garcia and the other actors help make the wobbly premise work .
translation: 加西亚和其他演员帮助使这个不稳定的前提运作。
back_translation: Garcia and the other actors help make this unstable premise work.

text: it 's just plain lurid when it is n't downright silly .
translation: 这简直就是赤裸裸的耸人听闻，甚至不乏荒谬。
back_translation: This is simply blatant sensationalism, and it is even ridiculous.

text: friday after next is the kind of film that could only be made by african-americans because of its broad racial insensitivity towards african-americans .
translation: 《下个星期五》是一部只能由非裔美国人制作的电影，因为它对非裔美国人表现出广泛的种族敏感性。
back_translation: "Next Friday" is a film that can only be made by African Americans, as it demonstrates a wide sensitivity to issues affecting African Americans.

text: it is also beautifully acted .
translation: 它的表演也非常出色。
back_translation: Its performance was also outstanding.

text: this dubious product of a college-spawned -lrb- colgate u. -rrb- comedy ensemble known as broken lizard plays like a mix of cheech and chong and chips .
translation: 这个由大学萌芽而成的可疑产品——由科尔盖特大学的喜剧团体“破碎的蜥蜴”制作，听起来像是切奇和钟的组合与《警察故事》的混合。
back_translation: This suspicious product, which sprouted from a university, is made by the comedy group "Broken Lizard" from Colgate University, and it sounds like a combination of Cheech and Chong mixed with "Police Story."

text: all three actresses are simply dazzling , particularly balk , who 's finally been given a part worthy of her considerable talents .
translation: 三位女演员都令人惊艳，特别是巴尔克，她终于得到了一个配得上她非凡才华的角色。
back_translation: All three actresses are stunning, especially Balk, who finally received a role that matches her extraordinary talent.

text: ... a powerful sequel and one of the best films of the year .
translation: ... 一部强大的续集，也是年度最佳电影之一。
back_translation: ... a powerful sequel and one of the best movies of the year.

text: it 's about individual moments of mood , and an aimlessness that 's actually sort of amazing .
translation: 这关乎于个人情绪的瞬间，以及一种实际上令人惊叹的无目的感。
back_translation: This relates to moments of personal emotion and a truly amazing sense of aimlessness.

text: a gift to anyone who loves both dance and cinema
translation: 献给热爱舞蹈和电影的每一个人。
back_translation: Dedicated to everyone who loves dance and film.

text: such a wildly uneven hit-and-miss enterprise , you ca n't help suspecting that it was improvised on a day-to-day basis during production .
translation: 如此不均匀的成功与失败的企业，你不禁怀疑它是在制作过程中日复一日即兴创作的。
back_translation: Such uneven success and failure of enterprises make you wonder if it is an improvised creation made day by day during the production process.

text: the new film of anton chekhov 's the cherry orchard puts the ` ick ' in ` classic . '
translation: 安东·契诃夫的新电影《樱桃园》让“经典”中多了一丝“恶心”。
back_translation: Anton Chekhov's new film "The Cherry Orchard" adds a touch of "nausea" to the "classic."

text: poor editing , bad bluescreen , and ultra-cheesy dialogue highlight the radical action .
translation: 糟糕的剪辑、糟糕的蓝幕和极其老土的对话凸显了激烈的动作。
back_translation: Awful editing, terrible blue screen, and extremely corny dialogue highlight the intense action.

text: if welles was unhappy at the prospect of the human race splitting in two , he probably would n't be too crazy with his great-grandson 's movie splitting up in pretty much the same way .
translation: 如果维尔斯对人类分裂成两部分的前景感到不安，他可能对他的曾孙的电影以类似方式分裂也不会太感兴趣。
back_translation: If Weir is uneasy about the prospect of humanity splitting into two parts, he may not be too interested in seeing his great-grandson's film splinter in a similar way.

text: passions , obsessions , and loneliest dark spots are pushed to their most virtuous limits , lending the narrative an unusually surreal tone .
translation: 激情、执念以及最孤独的黑暗角落被推至最美德的极限，使叙述呈现出一种异常超现实的语调。
back_translation: Passion, obsession, and the loneliest dark corners are pushed to the limits of the greatest virtues, giving the narrative an unusually surreal tone.

text: definitely a crowd-pleaser , but then , so was the roman colosseum .
translation: 肯定是一个受欢迎的景点，不过罗马斗兽场也是。
back_translation: It is definitely a popular attraction, but so is the Colosseum in Rome.

text: this story of a determined woman 's courage to find her husband in a war zone offers winning performances and some effecting moments .
translation: 这个讲述一位决心坚定的女性在战区寻找丈夫的故事，展现了精彩的表演和一些感人的时刻。
back_translation: This tells the story of a determined woman searching for her husband in a war zone, showcasing brilliant performances and some touching moments.

text: well made but uninvolving , bloodwork is n't a terrible movie , just a stultifyingly obvious one -- an unrewarding collar for a murder mystery .
translation: 制作精良但缺乏吸引力，《血液工作》并不是一部糟糕的电影，只是显得过于明显——对一部谋杀悬疑片来说是个没什么回报的枷锁。
back_translation: Well-made but lacking in appeal, "Blood Work" is not a bad movie; it just feels too obvious—a thankless burden for a murder mystery.

text: ... expands the horizons of boredom to the point of collapse , turning into a black hole of dullness , from which no interesting concept can escape .
translation: ...将无聊的视野扩展到崩溃的边缘，变成一个无趣的黑洞，从中没有任何有趣的概念能够逃脱。
back_translation: ...expanding the boring perspective to the brink of collapse, turning into a dull black hole from which no interesting concepts can escape.

text: as steamy as last week 's pork dumplings .
translation: 和上周的猪肉饺子一样蒸汽腾腾。
back_translation: Just like last week's steamed pork dumplings, they are steaming hot.

text: the story itself it mostly told through on-camera interviews with several survivors , whose riveting memories are rendered with such clarity that it 's as if it all happened only yesterday .
translation: 这个故事主要通过对几位幸存者的现场采访来讲述，他们引人入胜的记忆被呈现得如此清晰，仿佛一切就发生在昨天。
back_translation: This story primarily unfolds through on-site interviews with several survivors, whose captivating memories are presented so vividly that it feels as if everything happened just yesterday.

text: the movie is clever , offbeat and even gritty enough to overcome my resistance .
translation: 这部电影聪明、独特，甚至还有些粗糙，足以克服我的抵触情绪。
back_translation: This film is smart, unique, and even a bit rough, enough to overcome my resistance.

text: another week , another gross-out college comedy -- ugh .
translation: 又一周，又一部让人反感的大学喜剧——呃。
back_translation: Another week, another annoying college comedy—ugh.

text: a laughable -- or rather , unlaughable -- excuse for a film .
translation: 一个可笑的——或者说，不可笑的——电影借口。
back_translation: A ridiculous— or rather, not ridiculous— excuse for a movie.

text: too silly to take seriously .
translation: 太傻，无法认真对待。
back_translation: Too silly to take seriously.

text: low comedy does n't come much lower .
translation: 低级喜剧几乎没有更低的了。

text: it 's a very tasteful rock and roll movie .
translation: 这是一部非常有品味的摇滚片。
back_translation: This is a very tasteful rock film.

text: meticulously mounted , exasperatingly well-behaved film , which ticks off kahlo 's lifetime milestones with the dutiful precision of a tax accountant .
translation: 这部片子经过精心制作，表现得令人恼火的乖巧，以税务会计的精准度逐一列出了卡洛一生中的重要里程碑。
back_translation: This film is meticulously crafted, displaying an irritatingly cleverness, listing the important milestones in Carlo's life with the precision of a tax accountant.

text: davis ' candid , archly funny and deeply authentic take on intimate relationships comes to fruition in her sophomore effort .
translation: 戴维斯对亲密关系的坦率、机智幽默和深刻真实的看法在她的第二部作品中得到了充分展现。

text: a fast paced and suspenseful argentinian thriller about the shadow side of play .
translation: 一部节奏紧凑、悬念十足的阿根廷惊悚片，讲述了游戏的阴暗面。
back_translation: A tightly-paced, suspenseful Argentine thriller that explores the dark side of gaming.

text: ultimately the , yes , snail-like pacing and lack of thematic resonance make the film more silly than scary , like some sort of martha stewart decorating program run amok .
translation: 最终，确实，蜗牛般的节奏和缺乏主题共鸣使这部电影更多地显得愚蠢而非可怕，就像某种失控的玛莎·斯图尔特装饰节目。
back_translation: In the end, indeed, the snail-like pace and lack of thematic resonance make this film seem more foolish than frightening, like some sort of out-of-control Martha Stewart decorating show.

text: sewer rats could watch this movie and be so skeeved out that they 'd need a shower .
translation: 下水道的老鼠看到这部电影可能会觉得非常恶心，甚至需要洗个澡。
back_translation: The rats in the sewer might find this movie extremely disgusting, even needing a bath.

text: hard to resist .
translation: 难以抗拒。
back_translation: Hard to resist.

text: there 's an excellent 90-minute film here ; unfortunately , it runs for 170 .
translation: 这儿有一部出色的90分钟电影；不幸的是，它长达170分钟。
back_translation: There is an excellent 90-minute movie here; unfortunately, it lasts 170 minutes.

text: director carl franklin , so crisp and economical in one false move , bogs down in genre cliches here .
translation: 导演卡尔·富兰克林在《一招致命》中表现得如此简洁高效，但在这里却陷入了类型化的陈词滥调。
back_translation: Director Carl Franklin was so concise and efficient in "One False Move," but here he falls into clichéd tropes.

text: like a precious and finely cut diamond , magnificent to behold in its sparkling beauty yet in reality it 's one tough rock .
translation: 就像一颗珍贵而精心切割的钻石，璀璨夺目，令人赞叹，然而实际上它却是一块坚韧的岩石。
back_translation: Like a precious and meticulously cut diamond, it dazzles and amazes, yet in reality, it is a tough piece of rock.

text: no cute factor here ... not that i mind ugly ; the problem is he has no character , loveable or otherwise .
translation: 这里没有可爱因素我并不介意丑；问题是他没有个性，无论是可爱的还是其他的。
back_translation: There is no cute factor here... I don't mind being ugly; the problem is that he has no personality, whether cute or otherwise.

text: suffers from its timid parsing of the barn-side target of sons trying to breach gaps in their relationships with their fathers .
translation: 在儿子们试图弥补与父亲关系中的裂缝时，它在对牛栏侧目标的谨慎解析中遭受痛苦。
back_translation: As the sons try to mend the rift in their relationship with their father, it suffers in the cautious analysis of the target on the side of the cow shed.

text: it 's a frankenstein-monster of a film that does n't know what it wants to be .
translation: 这是一部怪物电影，像是弗兰肯斯坦的怪物，不知道自己想成为什么。
back_translation: This is a monster movie, like Frankenstein's monster, not knowing what it wants to become.

text: an incredibly narrow in-joke targeted to the tiniest segment of an already obscure demographic .
translation: 一个针对已经冷门的细分人群的极其狭窄的内部笑话。

text: a knowing look at female friendship , spiked with raw urban humor .
translation: 对女性友谊的深刻洞察，夹杂着生动的都市幽默。

text: ... begins on a high note and sustains it beautifully .
translation: 以高昂的调子开始，并完美地维持下去。

text: the overall result is an intelligent , realistic portrayal of testing boundaries .
translation: 整体结果是对测试边界的聪明、现实的描绘。
back_translation: The overall result is a smart and realistic depiction of the testing boundaries.

text: quaid is utterly fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie , and moore wonderfully underplays the long-suffering heroine with an unflappable '50s dignity somewhere between jane wyman and june cleaver .
translation: 奎德饰演的丈夫在痛苦的谎言中毫无畏惧，而摩尔则巧妙地表现出这位历经多次考验的女主角，展现出一种在简·怀曼和琼·克利弗之间的1950年代不可动摇的尊严。
back_translation: The husband played by Quaid is fearless in the painful lies, while Moore cleverly portrays the battle-tested heroine, showcasing an unwavering dignity reminiscent of the 1950s between Jane Wyman and Joan Crawford.

text: most of the problems with the film do n't derive from the screenplay , but rather the mediocre performances by most of the actors involved
translation: 这部电影的大部分问题不在于剧本，而在于大多数演员的平庸表演。

text: a poignant comedy that offers food for thought .
translation: 一部引人深思的感人喜剧。

text: deuces wild treads heavily into romeo and juliet\/west side story territory , where it plainly has no business going .
translation: 《双倍幸运》深深踏入了《罗密欧与朱丽叶》和《西区故事》的领域，而显然它没有资格进入这个领域。
back_translation: "Double Luck" has deeply stepped into the realm of "Romeo and Juliet" and "West Side Story," and it is clear that it does not qualify to enter this realm.

text: there is no psychology here , and no real narrative logic -- just a series of carefully choreographed atrocities , which become strangely impersonal and abstract .
translation: 这里没有心理描写，也没有真正的叙事逻辑——只有一系列精心编排的暴行，变得奇怪地冷漠和抽象。
back_translation: There is no psychological description here, nor is there a real narrative logic—only a series of carefully arranged acts of violence that become strangely indifferent and abstract.

text: secretary manages a neat trick , bundling the flowers of perversity , comedy and romance into a strangely tempting bouquet of a movie .
translation: 《秘书》巧妙地将异常、喜剧和浪漫的元素打包成一束奇妙诱人的电影花束。

text: everything about it from the bland songs to the colorful but flat drawings is completely serviceable and quickly forgettable .
translation: 从平淡无奇的歌曲到色彩丰富但平面的画作，一切都完全合格，且很容易被遗忘。

text: this fascinating experiment plays as more of a poetic than a strict reality , creating an intriguing species of artifice that gives the lady and the duke something of a theatrical air .
translation: 这个迷人的实验更像是一种诗意而非严格的现实，创造了一种引人入胜的伪装，使得女士和公爵似乎有了一种戏剧性的气息。
back_translation: This charming experiment resembles poetry rather than strict reality, creating an engaging disguise that gives the lady and the duke an air of drama.

text: a few pieces of the film buzz and whir ; very little of it actually clicks .
translation: 电影的嗡嗡声和嗡鸣声虽有几部分，但实际上很少有真正的契合。

text: ah-nuld 's action hero days might be over .
translation: 阿诺德的动作英雄时代可能结束了。

text: the movie has a script -lrb- by paul pender -rrb- made of wood , and it 's relentlessly folksy , a procession of stagy set pieces stacked with binary oppositions .
translation: 这部电影的剧本（由保罗·潘德创作）是用木头做的，风格极为乡村，展现了一系列带有明显对立的舞台场景。

text: the filmmakers ' eye for detail and the high standards of performance convey a strong sense of the girls ' environment .
translation: 电影制作人对细节的关注和高标准的表演传达了女孩们生活环境的强烈感受。

text: it also shows how deeply felt emotions can draw people together across the walls that might otherwise separate them .
translation: 它还展示了深切的情感是如何将人们团结在一起，跨越本可能分隔他们的墙。
back_translation: It also demonstrates how deep emotions can unite people, crossing the walls that may otherwise divide them.

text: even accepting this in the right frame of mind can only provide it with so much leniency .
translation: 即使以正确的心态接受这一点，也只能给予它有限的宽容。

text: it 's at once laughable and compulsively watchable , in its committed dumbness .
translation: 这部作品在其坚定的愚蠢中，既可笑又令人无法抵挡地想要观看。

text: they threw loads of money at an idea that should 've been so much more even if it was only made for teenage boys and wrestling fans .
translation: 他们在一个本应更有潜力的想法上投入了大量资金，即使这个想法只是为了青少年男孩和摔跤迷而制作的。

text: - west coast rap wars , this modern mob music drama never fails to fascinate .
translation: #NAME?
back_translation: #NAME?

text: as part of mr. dong 's continuing exploration of homosexuality in america , family fundamentals is an earnest study in despair .
translation: 作为董先生继续探索美国同性恋的一部分，家庭基础是一部在绝望中真诚的研究。
back_translation: As part of Mr. Dong's continued exploration of homosexuality in the United States, "Family Foundations" is a sincere study in despair.

text: a movie more to be prescribed than recommended -- as visually bland as a dentist 's waiting room , complete with soothing muzak and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms .
translation: 这部电影更像是被开处方而不是被推荐——视觉上平淡无奇，宛如牙医的候诊室，伴随着舒缓的音乐和可预测叙事节奏的缓冲。
back_translation: This movie feels more like a prescription rather than a recommendation—visually bland, resembling a dentist's waiting room, accompanied by soothing music and a predictable narrative rhythm.

text: all in all , brown sugar is a satisfying well-made romantic comedy that 's both charming and well acted .
translation: 总的来说，《红糖》是一部令人满意的精心制作的浪漫喜剧，既迷人又表演出色。
back_translation: Overall, "Brown Sugar" is a satisfying and well-crafted romantic comedy that is both charming and features excellent performances.

text: represents a worthy departure from the culture clash comedies that have marked an emerging indian american cinema .
translation: 代表了一个值得的突破，远离了标志着新兴印美电影的文化冲突喜剧。
back_translation: It represents a worthwhile breakthrough, moving away from the cultural clash comedies that characterize emerging Indian-American filmmaking.

text: so bland and utterly forgettable that it might as well have been titled generic jennifer lopez romantic comedy .
translation: 如此平淡和完全令人忘记，以至于它可以直接被命名为“通用的詹妮弗·洛佩兹浪漫喜剧”。

translation: 一部随着生活节奏摇摆和碰撞的喜剧。

text: a stylish thriller .
translation: 一部时尚的惊悚片。

text: constantly touching , surprisingly funny , semi-surrealist exploration of the creative act .
translation: 不断触动人心，出人意料地幽默，半超现实主义的创造性行为探索。
back_translation: Constantly touching people's hearts, unexpectedly humorous, and a creative exploration of half surrealistic behavior.

text: birthday girl does n't try to surprise us with plot twists , but rather seems to enjoy its own transparency .
translation: 生日女孩并不试图用情节反转来给我们惊喜，而是似乎喜欢它自己的透明度。

text: a poky and pseudo-serious exercise in sham actor workshops and an affected malaise .
translation: 一个陈腐且伪认真的假演员工作坊练习，以及一种矫揉造作的忧郁。

text: that rare movie that works on any number of levels -- as a film of magic and whimsy for children , a heartfelt romance for teenagers and a compelling argument about death , both pro and con , for adults .
translation: 那部罕见的电影在多个层面上都有效——对儿童来说是一部充满魔法和奇思妙想的电影，对青少年来说是一部感人至深的浪漫爱情故事，对成年人来说则是关于生死的引人深思的辩论，既有支持也有反对。
back_translation: That rare movie is effective on multiple levels—it's a magical and whimsical film for children, a deeply touching romantic love story for teenagers, and a thought-provoking debate about life and death for adults, with both supporting and opposing views.

text: the universal theme of becoming a better person through love has never been filmed more irresistibly than in ` baran . '
translation: 通过爱变得更好的普遍主题在《巴兰》中从未以如此令人无法抗拒的方式被拍摄过。

text: there 's got to be a more graceful way of portraying the devastation of this disease .
translation: 必须有一种更优雅的方式来表现这种疾病的毁灭性。

text: unfolds as one of the most politically audacious films of recent decades from any country , but especially from france .
translation: 成为近年来任何国家中，尤其是法国，最具政治大胆性的影片之一。
back_translation: It has become one of the most politically audacious films in recent years, especially in France.

text: the rock is destined to be the 21st century 's new `` conan '' and that he 's going to make a splash even greater than arnold schwarzenegger , jean-claud van damme or steven segal .
translation: 巨石注定成为21世纪的新“康纳”，并且他的成就将超过阿诺德·施瓦辛格、尚-克劳德·范·达美或史蒂文·西格尔。
back_translation: The giant is destined to become the new "Conner" of the 21st century, and his achievements will surpass those of Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jean-Claude Van Damme, or Steven Seagal.

text: adults , other than the parents ... will be hard pressed to succumb to the call of the wild .
translation: 除了父母以外的成年人将很难屈服于大自然的召唤。

text: here , alas , it collapses like an overcooked souffl茅 .
translation: 这里，唉，它就像一个煮过头的舒芙蕾一样坍塌了。

text: plays like one long , meandering sketch inspired by the works of john waters and todd solondz , rather than a fully developed story .
translation: 这部作品像是一部漫长而曲折的草图，受到约翰·沃特斯和托德·索伦兹作品的启发，而不是一个经过充分发展的故事。

text: snow dogs finds its humour in a black man getting humiliated by a pack of dogs who are smarter than him
translation: 《雪犬》中的幽默在于一个黑人被一群比他更聪明的狗羞辱。

text: before it takes a sudden turn and devolves into a bizarre sort of romantic comedy , steven shainberg 's adaptation of mary gaitskill 's harrowing short story ... is a brilliantly played , deeply unsettling experience .
translation: 在故事突然转折并演变成一种奇异的浪漫喜剧之前，史蒂文·香柏格对玛丽·盖茨基尔那部令人不安的短篇小说的改编是一种表现出色、深深令人不安的体验。
back_translation: Before the story suddenly twists and evolves into a strange romantic comedy, Steven Spielberg's adaptation of Mary Gateskill's disturbing short story... is an outstanding and deeply unsettling experience.

text: ... very funny , very enjoyable ...
translation: 非常有趣，非常愉快
back_translation: Very interesting, very enjoyable...

text: the hackneyed story about an affluent damsel in distress who decides to fight her bully of a husband is simply too overdone .
translation: 关于一个富裕的少女在困境中决定反抗她那个霸凌丈夫的故事实在是太陈词滥调了。

text: ... with the gifted pearce on hand to keep things on semi-stable ground dramatically , this retooled machine is ultimately effective enough at achieving the modest , crowd-pleasing goals it sets for itself .
translation: ... 有天才的皮尔斯在场，使事情在戏剧上保持在半稳定的状态，这台重新改造的机器最终足够有效地实现了它为自己设定的适度、受欢迎的目标。

text: much like its easily dismissive take on the upscale lifestyle , there is n't much there here .
translation: 与其轻易地对高档生活方式作出轻视的看法一样，这里并没有太多内容。
back_translation: There isn't much content here, just as there is a tendency to easily dismiss high-end lifestyles.

text: lathan and diggs carry the film with their charisma , and both exhibit sharp comic timing that makes the more hackneyed elements of the film easier to digest .
translation: 拉桑和迪格斯凭借他们的魅力撑起了整部电影，两人都展现了敏锐的喜剧时机，使影片中更老套的元素变得更容易消化。
back_translation: Rasan and Diggs held up the entire film with their charm, both showcasing a sharp sense of comedic timing that made the more clichéd elements of the movie easier to digest.

text: he has improved upon the first and taken it a step further , richer and deeper .

text: it 's a testament to de niro and director michael caton-jones that by movie 's end , we accept the characters and the film , flaws and all .
translation: 这证明了德尼罗和导演迈克尔·凯顿-琼斯的才华，以至于在电影结束时，我们接受了角色和影片，尽管有缺陷。

text: this method almost never fails him , and it works superbly here .
translation: 这种方法几乎从未让他失望，而且在这里效果极佳。

translation: 它在技术上是华丽的，但也几乎是充满活力的。

translation: 一部典型的肥胖又混乱的成长电影。

text: often likable , but just as often it 's meandering , low on energy , and too eager to be quirky at moments when a little old-fashioned storytelling would come in handy .
translation: 常常令人喜爱，但同样常常显得漫无目的，缺乏活力，在一些需要传统叙事技巧的时刻过于渴望表现出古怪。

text: rob schneider 's infantile cross-dressing routines fill the hot chick , the latest gimmick from this unimaginative comedian .
translation: 罗伯·施奈德的幼稚异装表演充斥着《热辣尤物》，这是这位缺乏创意的喜剧演员最新的噱头。

text: ... the tale of her passionate , tumultuous affair with musset unfolds as sand 's masculine persona , with its love of life and beauty , takes form .
translation: ...她与穆塞的激情而动荡的爱情故事展开，桑的男性化形象在对生活和美的热爱中逐渐成型。

text: it 's so devoid of joy and energy it makes even jason x ... look positively shakesperean by comparison .
translation: 它是如此缺乏快乐和活力，甚至让《杰森X》看起来与之相比都显得积极向莎士比亚。

text: a hypnotic portrait of this sad , compulsive life .
translation: 一个催眠般的肖像，描绘了这种悲伤而强迫的生活。

text: an ugly , pointless , stupid movie .
translation: 一部丑陋、毫无意义、愚蠢的电影。
back_translation: An ugly, meaningless, and foolish movie.

text: a fascinating , unnerving examination of the delusions of one unstable man .
translation: 对一个不稳定男人妄想的迷人而令人不安的审视。

text: a smart little indie .
translation: 一个聪明的小独立游戏。

translation: 一顿充满陈词滥调的大餐，才华横溢的演员们通常对此感到窒息。

text: ... what a banal bore the preachy circuit turns out to be
translation: ... 讲教的圈子原来是多么乏味无聊。
back_translation: ... the circle of teaching is actually so dull and boring.

text: goes on and on to the point of nausea .
translation: 不断地进行到让人感到恶心的地步。

text: i have a new favorite musical -- and i 'm not even a fan of the genre
translation: 我有了一部新的最爱音乐剧——而我甚至不是这个类型的粉丝。

text: master of disguise runs for only 71 minutes and feels like three hours .
translation: 《伪装大师》仅播放71分钟，却感觉像是三个小时。

text: you 'll feel like you ate a reeses without the peanut butter ... '
translation: 你会感觉像吃了一个没有花生酱的瑞士巧克力

text: easily one of the best and most exciting movies of the year .
translation: 毫无疑问，这是今年最优秀和最激动人心的电影之一。

text: despite the surface attractions -- conrad l. hall 's cinematography will likely be nominated for an oscar next year -- there 's something impressive and yet lacking about everything .
translation: 尽管表面上具有吸引力——康拉德·L·霍尔的摄影很可能会在明年获得奥斯卡奖提名——但一切似乎都令人印象深刻却又缺少了些什么。
back_translation: Although it appears attractive on the surface—Conrad L. Hall's photography is likely to receive an Oscar nomination next year—everything seems impressive yet lacks something.

text: broder 's screenplay is shallow , offensive and redundant , with pitifully few real laughs .
translation: 布罗德的剧本肤浅、冒犯且多余，几乎没有真正的笑点。

text: looks more like a travel-agency video targeted at people who like to ride bikes topless and roll in the mud than a worthwhile glimpse of independent-community guiding lights .
translation: 看起来更像是针对喜欢裸骑和在泥土中打滚的人群的旅行社视频，而不是对独立社区引导者有价值的瞥见。
back_translation: It looks more like a travel agency video aimed at people who enjoy naked rides and rolling in the dirt, rather than a valuable glimpse for independent community guides.

text: that 's why sex and lucia is so alluring .
translation: 这就是《性与卢西娅》如此吸引人的原因。

text: after an hour and a half of wondering -- sometimes amusedly , sometimes impatiently -- just what this strenuously unconventional movie is supposed to be , you discover that the answer is as conventional as can be .
translation: 经过一个半小时的思考——有时是 amusedly，有时是 impatiently——究竟这部极为不拘一格的电影到底想表达什么时，你发现答案其实非常传统。
back_translation: After an hour and a half of contemplation—sometimes amusedly, sometimes impatiently—about what this extremely unconventional film is trying to express, you realize that the answer is actually quite traditional.

text: nettelbeck ... has a pleasing way with a metaphor .
translation: 内特尔贝克... 在使用隐喻方面很有魅力。

text: a puzzle whose pieces do not fit .
translation: 一个拼图，其拼块不配。

text: a bit of a downer and a little over-dramatic at times , but this is a beautiful film for people who like their romances to have that french realism .
translation: 有点低沉，有时也有点过于戏剧化，但这是一部美丽的电影，适合那些喜欢法国现实主义浪漫的人。

text: after the first 10 minutes , which is worth seeing , the movie sinks into an abyss of clich茅s , depression and bad alternative music .
translation: 在前10分钟后，这部电影虽然值得一看，但却沉浸在陈词滥调、抑郁和糟糕的另类音乐的深渊中。

text: not everything in this ambitious comic escapade works , but coppola , along with his sister , sofia , is a real filmmaker .

back_translation: Not everything works in this ambitious comic adventure, but Coppola and his sister Sofia are indeed true film makers.

text: it 's fun , but it 's a real howler .
translation: 这很有趣，但真是个笑话。

text: even through its flaws , revolution # 9 proves to be a compelling , interestingly told film .
translation: 尽管存在缺陷，《革命9号》仍然是一部引人入胜、叙述有趣的电影。

text: just the labour involved in creating the layered richness of the imagery in this chiaroscuro of madness and light is astonishing .
translation: 仅仅是在这个疯狂与光明的明暗对照中创造出层次丰富的象征所涉及的劳动是令人惊叹的。
back_translation: The labor involved in creating richly layered symbols amid this contrast of madness and light is astounding.

text: the case is a convincing one , and should give anyone with a conscience reason to pause .
translation: 这个案例令人信服，应该让任何有良知的人停下来思考。

text: no such thing breaks no new ground and treads old turf like a hippopotamus ballerina .

text: when twentysomething hotsies make movies about their lives , hard-driving narcissism is a given , but what a world we 'd live in if argento 's hollywood counterparts ... had this much imagination and nerve .
translation: 当二十多岁的热辣年轻人拍摄关于他们生活的电影时，强烈的自恋是可以预见的，但如果阿根廷的好莱坞同行们有这样多的想象力和勇气，我们将生活在一个怎样的世界里。
back_translation: It is foreseeable that strong narcissism will emerge when hot young people in their twenties make movies about their lives, but if their Hollywood counterparts in Argentina had as much imagination and courage, what kind of world would we be living in?

translation: 单独来看，《大麻烦》可以算是一部有趣的小电影。

text: -lrb- reynolds -rrb- takes a classic story , casts attractive and talented actors and uses a magnificent landscape to create a feature film that is wickedly fun to watch .
translation: -（雷诺兹）改编了一个经典故事，选用了有魅力且有才华的演员，并利用壮丽的风景制作了一部非常有趣的影片。
back_translation: Reynolds adapted a classic story, selected charming and talented actors, and used stunning scenery to create a very interesting film.

text: if you 're content with a clever pseudo-bio that manages to have a good time as it doles out pieces of the famous director 's life , eisenstein delivers .
translation: 如果你满足于一个聪明的伪传记，它在讲述这位著名导演的生活片段时能让人愉快，那么爱森斯坦就能做到。

text: this is the kind of subject matter that could so easily have been fumbled by a lesser filmmaker , but ayres makes the right choices at every turn .

text: probes in a light-hearted way the romantic problems of individuals for whom the yearning for passion spells discontent .
translation: 以轻松幽默的方式探讨那些渴望激情但感到不满的个体的浪漫问题。

text: it made me realize that we really have n't had a good cheesy b-movie playing in theaters since ... well ... since last week 's reign of fire .
translation: 让我意识到自从好吧自上周的《火之统治》以来，我们真的没有在影院播放过一部好的低成本奶酪B级电影。

text: ... once the true impact of the day unfolds , the power of this movie is undeniable .
translation: 一旦这一天的真正影响显现，这部电影的力量是不可否认的。

text: this time , the hype is quieter , and while the movie is slightly less successful than the first , it 's still a rollicking good time for the most part .

back_translation: This time, the promotional efforts were slightly less intense. Although the success of this film is somewhat inferior to the first one, overall it is still an enjoyable viewing experience.

text: nothing more than a stifling morality tale dressed up in peekaboo clothing .
translation: 无非是一个穿着窥视衣服的压抑道德故事。
back_translation: It's nothing more than a depressing moral story about someone wearing voyeuristic clothes.

text: this is the sort of low-grade dreck that usually goes straight to video -- with a lousy script , inept direction , pathetic acting , poorly dubbed dialogue and murky cinematography , complete with visible boom mikes .
translation: 这是一种通常直接发行到视频的低劣烂片——糟糕的剧本、拙劣的导演、可怜的演技、糟糕的配音和模糊的摄影，甚至能看到麦克风。

text: every joke is repeated at least four times .
translation: 每个笑话至少被重复四次。

translation: 这些笑话和剧本相当混杂。

translation: 成年人至少会有一个关于西部的梦幻形象可以品味，无论电影的拗口情节如何。

text: the best film of the year 2002 .
translation: 2002年最佳电影。

text: blisteringly rude , scarily funny , sorrowfully sympathetic to the damage it surveys , the film has in kieran culkin a pitch-perfect holden .
translation: 极其粗鲁、令人惊恐地幽默，并对它所观察到的伤害抱有悲伤的同情，这部电影在基兰·卡尔金身上找到了一个完美的人选。

text: the first shocking thing about sorority boys is that it 's actually watchable .

translation: 一部我一见倾心的电影，更重要的是，让我在回忆中依然热爱。
back_translation: A movie that I fell in love with at first sight, and more importantly, it allows me to still cherish it in my memories.

text: an overstylized , pur茅ed m茅lange of sex , psychology , drugs and philosophy .
translation: 一种过度风格化、混合了性、心理学、药物和哲学的浓缩混合物。

text: this is a movie full of grace and , ultimately , hope .
translation: 这是一部充满优雅和希望的电影。

translation: 一部让石头哭泣的纪录片——既可耻又令人恐惧。

text: most haunting about `` fence '' is its conclusion , when we hear the ultimate fate of these girls and realize , much to our dismay , that this really did happen .
translation: “围栏”中最令人不安的是它的结尾，我们听到了这些女孩的最终命运，并意识到，让我们感到沮丧的是，这真的发生过。
back_translation: The most disturbing aspect of "The Fence" is its ending, where we hear about the final fate of these girls and realize that what frustrates us is that this really happened.

text: starts out ballsy and stylish but fails to keep it up and settles into clich茅s .
translation: 开始时大胆且时尚，但未能保持这一状态，最终陷入了陈词滥调。

text: the film feels formulaic , its plot and pacing typical hollywood war-movie stuff , while the performances elicit more of a sense of deja vu than awe .

back_translation: This movie feels formulaic, with a plot and pacing typical of a Hollywood war film, and the performances evoke a sense of familiarity rather than awe.

text: -lrb- i -rrb- t 's certainly laudable that the movie deals with hot-button issues in a comedic context , but barbershop is n't as funny as it should be .
translation: 虽然这部电影在喜剧的语境中处理热点问题是值得称赞的，但《理发店》并没有想象中那么好笑。
back_translation: Although this movie's handling of hot topics in a comedic context is commendable, "Barbershop" is not as funny as expected.

text: but the second half of the movie really goes downhill .
translation: 但是电影的后半部分真的下滑得很厉害。

text: a well paced and satisfying little drama that deserved better than a ` direct-to-video ' release .
translation: 一部节奏恰当且令人满意的小戏剧，理应得到比“直接发行到视频”更好的待遇。
back_translation: A well-paced and satisfying short play deserves better treatment than being "direct-to-video."

text: this misty-eyed southern nostalgia piece , in treading the line between sappy and sanguine , winds up mired in tear-drenched quicksand .
translation: 这篇充满雾霭的南方怀旧作品，在在甜腻与乐观之间徘徊，最终陷入了泪水浸湿的流沙中。
back_translation: This nostalgic work from the misty South oscillates between sweetness and optimism, eventually sinking into a quicksand soaked with tears.

text: the only fun part of the movie is playing the obvious game .
translation: 电影中唯一有趣的部分就是玩明显的游戏。
back_translation: The only interesting part of the movie is playing obvious games.

text: an inconsequential , barely there bit of piffle .
translation: 微不足道、几乎不存在的一点闲话。
back_translation: Trivial, almost nonexistent small talk.

text: although fairly involving as far as it goes , the film does n't end up having much that is fresh to say about growing up catholic or , really , anything .
translation: 尽管在某种程度上颇具吸引力，但这部电影对成长为天主教徒或实际上任何事情并没有什么新鲜的见解。
back_translation: Although it is quite appealing to some extent, this movie does not offer any fresh insights into growing up as a Catholic or really anything else.

text: an engrossing story that combines psychological drama , sociological reflection , and high-octane thriller .
translation: 一个引人入胜的故事，结合了心理戏剧、社会反思和高能惊悚片。

text: a gripping drama .
translation: 一部引人入胜的戏剧。

text: it picked me up , swung me around , and dropped me back in my seat with more emotional force than any other recent film .
translation: 它把我托起，转了个圈，然后用比任何其他近期电影更强烈的情感力量把我放回座位上。
back_translation: It lifted me up, spun me around, and then put me back in my seat with a stronger emotional power than any other recent film.

text: the pleasures that it does afford may be enough to keep many moviegoers occupied amidst some of the more serious-minded concerns of other year-end movies .
translation: 它所带来的乐趣可能足以让许多观众在其他年末电影的一些更严肃的关切中保持忙碌。
back_translation: The joy it brings may be enough to keep many viewers occupied amidst the more serious concerns of other year-end films.

text: its inescapable absurdities are tantamount to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has n't been living under a rock -lrb- since sept. 11 -rrb- .
translation: 它不可避免的荒谬性相当于侮辱任何没有躲在岩石下生活过的人智力——自9月11日以来。
back_translation: Its inevitably absurd nature is equivalent to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has not lived under a rock since September 11.

text: a pretty decent kid-pleasing , tolerable-to-adults lark of a movie .
translation: 一部相当不错的儿童喜剧，对成年人来说也可以接受的电影。

text: as i settled into my world war ii memories , i found myself strangely moved by even the corniest and most hackneyed contrivances .
translation: 当我沉浸在我的二战记忆中时，我发现自己对那些再普通不过和老套的情节感到奇妙的动容。
back_translation: As I immersed myself in my memories of World War II, I found myself wonderfully moved by those seemingly ordinary and cliché plots.

text: the movie generates plot points with a degree of randomness usually achieved only by lottery drawing .
translation: 这部电影生成情节的随机性通常只有通过抽奖才能实现。

text: classic cinema served up with heart and humor
translation: 经典影院带着真情与幽默呈现
back_translation: The classic cinema presents with sincerity and humor.

text: there may have been a good film in `` trouble every day , '' but it is not what is on the screen .
translation: 《每日的烦恼》中可能有一部好电影，但它并不体现在荧幕上。
back_translation: There might be a good movie in "Daily Troubles," but it does not manifest on the screen.

text: the result is an ` action film ' mired in stasis .
translation: 结果是一部陷入滞后的“动作片”。
back_translation: The result is a "action movie" that is stuck in stagnation.

text: that 's because relatively nothing happens .
translation: 那是因为相对来说没有什么事情发生。
back_translation: That is because relatively speaking, not much has happened.

text: an authentically vague , but ultimately purposeless , study in total pandemonium .

text: oddly , the film is n't nearly as downbeat as it sounds , but strikes a tone that 's alternately melancholic , hopeful and strangely funny .

translation: 将一个潜在有趣的主意变成了一部令人痛苦的电影学校体验，这部电影对电影的公关人员或那些像电影角色一样吸食大量毒品的人来说更具吸引力。

text: most of the information has already appeared in one forum or another and , no matter how broomfield dresses it up , it tends to speculation , conspiracy theories or , at best , circumstantial evidence .
translation: 大部分信息已经出现在一个或另一个论坛上，无论布伦菲尔德如何包装它，它往往趋向于推测、阴谋论或者在最好情况下只是间接证据。

text: imagine -lrb- if possible -rrb- a pasolini film without passion or politics , or an almodovar movie without beauty or humor , and you have some idea of the glum , numb experience of watching o fantasma .
translation: 想象一下 -（如果可能的话）- 一部没有激情或政治的帕索里尼电影，或一部没有美感或幽默的阿尔莫多瓦电影，你就能大致感受到观看《幻影》时那种阴郁、麻木的体验。
back_translation: Imagine - (if possible) - a Pasolini film without passion or politics, or an Almodóvar film without aesthetics or humor, and you can roughly sense the gloomy, numbing experience of watching "Phantom."

text: just plain bad .
translation: 就是糟糕透了。

translation: 当一位负责某年最糟糕电影的编剧在随后的年份执导了一部同样糟糕的影片时，你很难相信这只是巧合。

translation: 导演埃利·舒拉基（Elie Chouraqui），他共同编写了剧本，捕捉了战争的混乱恐怖，但如果你要让真相屈从于肥皂剧令人心碎的要求，那么何必费心呢？
back_translation: Director Elie Chouraqui, who co-wrote the screenplay, captures the chaotic horrors of war, but if you are going to let the truth yield to the heartbreaking demands of a soap opera, then why bother?

text: this is a movie so insecure about its capacity to excite that it churns up not one but two flagrantly fake thunderstorms to underscore the action .
translation: 这是一部对自己激发观众兴奋能力如此不自信的电影，以至于不惜制造出不止一个而是两个明显虚假的雷暴来强调动作场面。
back_translation: This is a movie so insecure about its ability to excite the audience that it goes so far as to create not just one but two obviously false thunderstorms to emphasize the action scenes.

text: if i want music , i 'll buy the soundtrack .
translation: 如果我想要音乐，我会买原声带。
back_translation: If I want music, I will buy the soundtrack.

text: this movie has the usual impossible stunts ... but it has just as many scenes that are lean and tough enough to fit in any modern action movie .
translation: 这部电影有着通常不可能的特技但同样有许多紧凑而强硬的场面，可以适应任何现代动作片。
back_translation: This movie has typically impossible stunts... but it also features many compact and tough scenes that could fit into any modern action film.

text: sometimes makes less sense than the bruckheimeresque american action flicks it emulates .
translation: 有时比它所模仿的布鲁克海默式美国动作片更没道理。
back_translation: Sometimes it's even less reasonable than the Jerry Bruckheimer-style American action films it imitates.

text: as a film director , labute continues to improve .
translation: 作为电影导演，拉布特不断进步。
back_translation: As a film director, Labute continues to make progress.

text: a dark comedy that goes for sick and demented humor simply to do so .
translation: 一部追求病态和扭曲幽默的黑色喜剧，仅仅为了实现这一点。
back_translation: A black comedy that pursues pathological and twisted humor, solely for the sake of achieving this.

text: lazily directed by charles stone iii ... from a leaden script by matthew cirulnick and novelist thulani davis .
translation: 懒散地由查尔斯·斯通三世执导根据马修·西鲁尼克和小说家图拉尼·戴维斯的沉闷剧本改编。
back_translation: Directed lazily by Charles Stone III... Adapted from the dull screenplay by Matthew Cirulnick and novelist Turani Davis.

text: the dialogue is cumbersome , the simpering soundtrack and editing more so .
translation: 对话繁琐，背景音乐和剪辑更显得冗长。
back_translation: The dialogue is tedious, and the background music and editing make it feel even longer.

text: this is a film living far too much in its own head .
translation: 这部电影过于沉浸在自己的思想中。
back_translation: This movie is too immersed in its own thoughts.

text: pascale bailly 's rom-com provides am茅lie 's audrey tautou with another fabuleux destin -- i.e. , a banal spiritual quest .
translation: 帕斯卡尔·拜伊的浪漫喜剧为艾米莉的奥黛丽·塔图提供了另一个华丽的命运——即，一个平凡的精神追寻。
back_translation: Pascal Bai's romantic comedy offers Audrey Tautou's _milie another splendid fate — that is, a quest for a mundane spirit.

text: p.t. anderson understands the grandness of romance and how love is the great equalizer that can calm us of our daily ills and bring out joys in our lives that we never knew were possible .
translation: p.t. 安德森理解浪漫的宏伟，以及爱是如何成为伟大的平衡器，能够安抚我们日常的忧愁，并带出我们生活中那些我们从未意识到的快乐。
back_translation: Anderson understands the grandeur of romance and how love serves as a great equalizer, able to soothe our daily sorrows and bring forth the joys in our lives that we have never realized.

text: imagine o. henry 's the gift of the magi relocated to the scuzzy underbelly of nyc 's drug scene .
translation: 想象一下，欧·亨利的《麦琪的礼物》被 relocated 到纽约市毒品交易的阴暗角落。
back_translation: Imagine O. Henry's "The Gift of the Magi" relocated to the dark corners of drug dealing in New York City.

text: i do n't know if frailty will turn bill paxton into an a-list director , but he can rest contentedly with the knowledge that he 's made at least one damn fine horror movie .
translation: 我不知道《脆弱》是否会让比尔·帕克斯顿成为一线导演，但他可以欣然接受一个事实，那就是他至少制作了一部非常出色的恐怖电影。
back_translation: I don’t know if "Fragile" will make Bill Paxton a top-tier director, but he can happily accept the fact that he has at least produced a truly outstanding horror film.

text: large budget notwithstanding , the movie is such a blip on the year 's radar screen that it 's tempting just to go with it for the ride .
translation: 尽管预算庞大，这部电影在这一年的雷达屏幕上仍然只是一个小小的波动，让人忍不住想随它一起去看看。
back_translation: Despite the large budget, this movie still appears as just a small blip on the radar screen this year, making one unable to resist the urge to check it out.

text: `` frailty '' offers chills much like those that you get when sitting around a campfire around midnight , telling creepy stories to give each other the willies .
translation: 《脆弱》带来的寒意恰似午夜时分围坐篝火旁，讲述诡异故事以给彼此带来毛骨悚然的感觉。
back_translation: "The Fragile" brings a chill that is akin to sitting around a bonfire at midnight, sharing eerie tales to give each other a spine-tingling feeling.

text: despite modest aspirations its occasional charms are not to be dismissed .
translation: 尽管抱有适度的抱负，但其偶尔的魅力不容小觑。
back_translation: Despite having moderate ambitions, its occasional charm should not be underestimated.

text: any reasonably creative eighth-grader could have written a more credible script , though with the same number of continuity errors .
translation: 任何一个具有合理创造力的八年级学生都能写出一个更可信的剧本，尽管同样存在数量相同的连续性错误。
back_translation: Any reasonably creative eighth grader could write a more credible script, even though it contains the same number of continuity errors.

text: go , girls , right down the reality drain .
translation: 去吧，女孩们，直奔现实的深渊。
back_translation: Go ahead, girls, and plunge straight into the abyss of reality.

text: staggeringly dreadful romance .
translation: 极其可怕的浪漫。
back_translation: Extremely terrifying romance.

text: a smart , compelling drama .
translation: 一部聪明且引人入胜的剧情。
back_translation: A smart and engaging plot.

text: thoughtless , random , superficial humour and a lot of very bad scouse accents
translation: 无厘头的、随机的、肤浅的幽默，以及许多非常糟糕的斯卡尔斯口音。
back_translation: Absurd, random, superficial humor, along with many very bad Scouse accents.

text: ... there 's enough cool fun here to warm the hearts of animation enthusiasts of all ages .
translation: 这里有足够的酷炫乐趣，让所有年龄段的动画爱好者心暖如春。
back_translation: Here there is enough cool and fun to warm the hearts of animation lovers of all ages like spring.

text: deliciously slow .
translation: 美味地慢。
back_translation: Deliciously slow.

text: the problem , amazingly enough , is the screenplay .
translation: 问题，令人惊讶的是，是剧本。
back_translation: The problem, surprisingly, is the script.

text: offers an interesting look at the rapidly changing face of beijing .
translation: 提供了一个对快速变化的北京面貌的有趣观察。
back_translation: It provides an interesting observation of the rapidly changing landscape of Beijing.

text: ... certainly an entertaining ride , despite many talky , slow scenes .
translation: 尽管有许多对话多、节奏缓慢的场景，但这无疑是一场娱乐的旅程。
back_translation: ...despite many dialogue-heavy and slow-paced scenes, this is undoubtedly an entertaining journey.

text: an escapist confection that 's pure entertainment .
translation: 一种纯粹娱乐的逃避甜点。
back_translation: A purely entertaining escape dessert.

text: an amused indictment of jaglom 's own profession .
translation: 对贾格隆自己职业的 amused indictment。
back_translation: An amused indictment of Jaglong's own profession.

text: so aggressively cheery that pollyana would reach for a barf bag .
translation: 如此过于乐观，以至于波莉安娜会想要拿一个呕吐袋。
back_translation: So overly optimistic that Pollyanna would want to grab a vomit bag.

text: a worthy idea , but the uninspired scripts , acting and direction never rise above the level of an after-school tv special .
translation: 一个值得称赞的想法，但缺乏灵感的剧本、表演和导演始终未能超越课后电视特别节目的水平。
back_translation: A commendable idea, but the uninspired script, performances, and direction have never transcended the level of a post-class television special.

text: beautifully shot , delicately scored and powered by a set of heartfelt performances , it 's a lyrical endeavour .
translation: 拍摄精美，配乐细腻，加上真挚的表演，这是一部抒情的作品。
back_translation: The cinematography is exquisite, the music is delicate, and combined with heartfelt performances, this is a lyrical piece.

text: pompous and garbled .
translation: 自大和混乱。
back_translation: Arrogance and chaos.

text: there 's a whole heap of nothing at the core of this slight coming-of-age\/coming-out tale .
translation: 这个轻微的成长/出柜故事的核心是一片空白。
back_translation: The core of this subtle growth/coming out story is a blank space.

text: for all its problems ... the lady and the duke surprisingly manages never to grow boring ... which proves that rohmer still has a sense of his audience .
translation: 尽管存在种种问题《女士与公爵》意外地始终保持着趣味这证明了罗美尔依然对他的观众有着敏锐的把握。
back_translation: Despite various issues... "The Lady and the Duke" unexpectedly maintains its appeal... which proves that Rohmer still has a keen grasp of his audience.

text: the salton sea has moments of inspired humour , though every scrap is of the darkest variety .
translation: 沙尔顿湖时刻展现出启发性的幽默，尽管其每一丝幽默都带有最阴暗的色彩。
back_translation: Sharlton Lake momentarily showcases inspirational humor, although every thread of that humor carries the darkest undertones.

text: a touching , sophisticated film that almost seems like a documentary in the way it captures an italian immigrant family on the brink of major changes .
translation: 一部感人且成熟的电影，几乎像是一部纪录片，生动地捕捉了一户即将经历重大变革的意大利移民家庭。
back_translation: A touching and mature film, almost like a documentary, vividly captures an Italian immigrant family on the brink of significant change.

text: it is supremely unfunny and unentertaining to watch middle-age and older men drink to excess , piss on trees , b.s. one another and put on a show in drag .
translation: 观看中年及老年男性过量饮酒、在树上撒尿、互相吹嘘，以及穿女装表演，实在是无趣和乏味。
back_translation: Watching middle-aged and older men drink excessively, urinate on trees, boast to each other, and perform in women's clothing is truly boring and tedious.

text: a sleep-inducing thriller with a single twist that everyone except the characters in it can see coming a mile away .
translation: 一部催眠的惊悚片，只有一个转折，除了剧中的角色，其他人都能预见这转折有一英里远。
back_translation: A hypnotic thriller with only one twist, which everyone except for the characters in the story can foresee a mile away.

text: cuba gooding jr. valiantly mugs his way through snow dogs , but even his boisterous energy fails to spark this leaden comedy .
translation: 古巴·古丁（Cuba Gooding Jr.）英勇地在《雪狗》中卖弄，但即使他热情的表现也未能点燃这部沉闷的喜剧。
back_translation: Cuba Gooding Jr. boldly shows off in "Snow Dogs," but even his enthusiastic performance fails to ignite this dull comedy.

text: a sharp , amusing study of the cult of celebrity .
translation: 对名人崇拜的敏锐而幽默的研究。
back_translation: A sharp and humorous study on celebrity worship.

text: a culture-clash comedy that , in addition to being very funny , captures some of the discomfort and embarrassment of being a bumbling american in europe .
translation: 一部文化冲突的喜剧，不仅非常搞笑，还捕捉到在欧洲时作为一个笨拙的美国人的一些不适和尴尬。
back_translation: A comedy of cultural clashes that is not only very funny but also captures some of the discomfort and awkwardness of being an awkward American in Europe.

text: constantly slips from the grasp of its maker .
translation: 不断从创造者的掌控中溜走。
back_translation: Constantly slipping away from the creator's control.

text: the leaping story line , shaped by director peter kosminsky into sharp slivers and cutting impressions , shows all the signs of rich detail condensed into a few evocative images and striking character traits .
translation: 跳跃的故事情节，由导演彼得·科兹明斯基塑造成锐利的碎片和深刻的印象，展现出丰富细节的迹象，这些细节浓缩在几个富有表现力的画面和鲜明的人物特征中。
back_translation: The jumping storyline, shaped by director Peter Kosminsky into sharp fragments and profound impressions, showcases signs of rich details condensed into several expressive images and vivid character traits.

text: an emotionally strong and politically potent piece of cinema .
translation: 一部情感强烈且政治意义深远的电影。
back_translation: A film that is emotionally intense and politically significant.

text: that the real antwone fisher was able to overcome his personal obstacles and become a good man is a wonderful thing ; that he has been able to share his story so compellingly with us is a minor miracle .
translation: 真实的安东尼·费舍尔能够克服个人障碍，成为一个好人，这是件美好的事情；他能如此引人入胜地与我们分享自己的故事，是一个小奇迹。
back_translation: The real Anthony Fischer's ability to overcome personal obstacles and become a good person is a wonderful thing; it is a small miracle that he can share his story with us so engagingly.

text: what a dumb , fun , curiously adolescent movie this is .
translation: 这是一部多么傻, 有趣, 奇特的青春电影啊。
back_translation: What a silly, funny, and unique coming-of-age movie this is.

text: simplistic , silly and tedious .
translation: 简单、愚蠢且乏味。
back_translation: Simple, stupid, and boring.

text: we just do n't really care too much about this love story .
translation: 我们对此爱情故事其实并不太在意。
back_translation: We are actually not that concerned about this love story.

text: writer\/director burr steers emphasizes the q in quirky , with mixed results .
translation: 编剧/导演布尔·斯蒂尔斯强调了“古怪”中的q，效果参差不齐。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Boor Stills emphasized the "quirkiness" in "quirky," with mixed results.

text: it 's usually a bad sign when directors abandon their scripts and go where the moment takes them , but olympia , wash. , based filmmakers anne de marcken and marilyn freeman did just that and it 's what makes their project so interesting .
translation: 当导演抛弃剧本，随心所欲地创作时，通常是个坏兆头，但来自华盛顿州奥林匹亚的制片人安妮·德·马克肯和玛丽琳·弗里曼正是这样做的，这正是他们的项目如此有趣的原因。
back_translation: When directors abandon the script and create at will, it's usually a bad sign, but producers Anne DeMarcken and Marilyn Freeman from Olympia, Washington are doing just that, which is exactly why their project is so interesting.

text: now here 's a sadistic bike flick that would have made vittorio de sica proud .
translation: 现在这里有一部残忍的自行车电影，会让维托里奥·德·西卡感到自豪。
back_translation: There is a brutal bicycle movie here now that would make Vittorio De Sica proud.

text: offers laughs and insight into one of the toughest ages a kid can go through .
translation: 提供了欢笑和对孩子可能经历的最艰难阶段之一的深刻见解。
back_translation: It provides laughter and deep insights into one of the most difficult phases a child may experience.

text: for a film about explosions and death and spies , `` ballistic : ecks vs. sever '' seems as safe as a children 's film .
translation: 对于一部关于爆炸、死亡和间谍的电影来说，《弹道：艾克斯与塞佛》看起来就像是一部儿童电影一样安全。
back_translation: For a film about explosions, death, and espionage, "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever" looks as safe as a children's movie.

text: it 's up to -lrb- watts -rrb- to lend credibility to this strange scenario , and her presence succeeds in making us believe .
translation: 这要靠（沃特斯）来为这个奇怪的情景增添可信度，而她的存在成功地让我们相信。
back_translation: This relies on (Waters) to add credibility to this strange situation, and her presence successfully makes us believe it.

text: what makes this film special is serry 's ability to take what is essentially a contained family conflict and put it into a much larger historical context .
translation: 这部电影特别之处在于塞里将本质上是一个封闭家庭冲突的故事放入一个更大的历史背景中。
back_translation: The uniqueness of this film lies in how Serei places a story that is essentially about a closed family conflict within a larger historical context.

text: well , in some of those , the mother deer even dies .
translation: 好吧，在其中一些情况中，母鹿甚至会死去。
back_translation: Well, in some of these cases, the doe may even die.

text: ... a solid , well-formed satire .
translation: ... 一部扎实、结构良好的讽刺作品。
back_translation: ... a solid and well-structured satirical work.

text: the film is small in scope , yet perfectly formed .
translation: 这部电影规模小，却完美无缺。
back_translation: This film is small in scale, yet flawless.

text: less than fresh .
translation: 不够新鲜。
back_translation: Not fresh enough.

text: those moviegoers who would automatically bypass a hip-hop documentary should give `` scratch '' a second look .
translation: 那些自动跳过嘻哈纪录片的观众应该再仔细看看《Scratch》。
back_translation: Those viewers who automatically skip hip-hop documentaries should take another look at "Scratch."

text: a 75-minute sample of puerile rubbish that is listless , witless , and devoid of anything resembling humor .
translation: 一段长达75分钟的幼稚废话，毫无生气，缺乏机智，完全没有任何类似幽默的东西。
back_translation: A 75-minute long childish nonsense, completely lifeless, lacking wit, and having nothing that resembles humor at all.

text: it 's mired in a shabby script that piles layer upon layer of action man clich茅 atop wooden dialogue and a shifting tone that falls far short of the peculiarly moral amorality of -lrb- woo 's -rrb- best work .
translation: 它陷入了一个破烂的剧本中，层层叠叠地堆砌着动作英雄的陈词滥调，伴随着生硬的对话和变化莫测的语气，远远不能达到 -lrb- 如果 -rrb- 最佳作品那种独特的道德非道德性。
back_translation: It gets caught in a shabby script, piling on clichéd action hero tropes, accompanied by stiff dialogue and unpredictable tones, far from achieving the unique moral ambiguity of the best works.

text: using a stock plot , about a boy injects just enough freshness into the proceedings to provide an enjoyable 100 minutes in a movie theater .
translation: 使用一个股票情节，关于一个男孩为整个过程注入了足够的新鲜感，让在电影院度过的100分钟变得愉快。
back_translation: Using a stock plot, a boy injects enough freshness into the entire process, making the 100 minutes spent in the cinema enjoyable.

text: old-fashioned but thoroughly satisfying entertainment .
translation: 老派但令人完全满意的娱乐。
back_translation: Old-fashioned yet completely satisfying entertainment.

text: they just have problems , which are neither original nor are presented in convincing way .
translation: 他们的问题既不新颖，也没有以令人信服的方式呈现。
back_translation: Their questions are neither novel nor presented in a convincing manner.

text: mindless and boring martial arts and gunplay with too little excitement and zero compelling storyline .
translation: 毫无头脑且乏味的武术和枪战，缺乏刺激和完全没有引人入胜的故事情节。
back_translation: Mindless and dull martial arts and gunfights, lacking excitement and completely devoid of an engaging storyline.

text: an ingenious and often harrowing look at damaged people and how families can offer either despair or consolation .
translation: 对受损人群的巧妙且常常令人痛苦的深入探讨，揭示了家庭如何提供绝望或安慰。
back_translation: A clever yet often painful in-depth exploration of damaged populations reveals how families can provide despair or comfort.

text: below may not mark mr. twohy 's emergence into the mainstream , but his promise remains undiminished .
translation: 以下可能并不能标志图希先生的崭露头角，但他的潜力依然未减。
back_translation: The following may not signify Mr. Tuxi's rise to prominence, but his potential remains undiminished.

text: i think it was plato who said , ' i think , therefore i know better than to rush to the theatre for this one . '
translation: 我觉得是柏拉图说过：“我思故我更知道不必急着去剧院看这个。”
back_translation: I think Plato once said: "I think, therefore I know that there is no need to rush to the theater to see this."

text: the soul-searching deliberateness of the film , although leavened nicely with dry absurdist wit , eventually becomes too heavy for the plot .
translation: 这部电影的灵魂探索和深思熟虑，尽管配以适度的干涩荒诞的幽默，但最终对情节来说变得过于沉重。
back_translation: The film's exploration of the soul and thoughtful reflection, although accompanied by moderate dry absurd humor, ultimately becomes too heavy for the plot.

text: is n't it a bit early in his career for director barry sonnenfeld to do a homage to himself ?
translation: 巴里·索南菲尔德导演在他的职业生涯中是不是还太早就为自己致敬了呢？
back_translation: Has director Barry Sonnenfeld paid tribute to himself too early in his career?

text: this stuck pig of a movie flails limply between bizarre comedy and pallid horror .
translation: 这部糟糕的电影在离奇的喜剧和苍白的恐怖之间无力挣扎。
back_translation: This terrible movie struggles helplessly between absurd comedy and pale horror.

text: chouraqui brings documentary-like credibility to the horrors of the killing field and the barbarism of ` ethnic cleansing . '
translation: 舒拉基为杀戈场的恐怖和“种族清洗”的野蛮带来了像纪录片一样的可信度。
back_translation: Shuraki brought a documentary-like credibility to the horror of the killing fields and the barbarity of "ethnic cleansing."

text: it 's endlessly inventive , consistently intelligent and sickeningly savage .
translation: 它充满了无尽的创意，始终保持着智慧，并且让人感到令人作呕的狠厉。
back_translation: It is full of endless creativity, always maintains wisdom, and evokes a repulsive harshness.

text: white has n't developed characters so much as caricatures , one-dimensional buffoons that get him a few laughs but nothing else .
translation: 白人并没有发展出角色，反而只是一些漫画化的、一维的小丑，让他获得了一些笑声，但别无其他。
back_translation: White people did not develop characters; instead, they were merely some cartoonish, one-dimensional clowns, which earned them some laughs but nothing more.

text: world traveler might not go anywhere new , or arrive anyplace special , but it 's certainly an honest attempt to get at something .
translation: 世界旅行者可能不会去任何新地方，或者到达任何特别的地方，但这无疑是一个诚实的尝试，旨在寻找某种东西。
back_translation: World travelers may not go to any new places or arrive at any particular destination, but it is undoubtedly an honest attempt aimed at searching for something.

text: it is life affirming and heartbreaking , sweet without the decay factor , funny and sad .
translation: 它令人振奋又令人心碎，甜美而没有衰败的因素，既幽默又悲伤。
back_translation: It is exhilarating yet heartbreaking, sweet and devoid of decay, both humorous and melancholic.

text: witty dialog between realistic characters showing honest emotions .
translation: 现实角色之间机智的对话，展现真诚的情感。
back_translation: Witty dialogue between real characters that showcases genuine emotions.

text: wimps out by going for that pg-13 rating , so the more graphic violence is mostly off-screen and the sexuality is muted .

text: you 'll cry for your money back .

text: strange and beautiful film .

text: reveals how important our special talents can be when put in service of of others .
