text: a touching , small-scale story of family responsibility and care in the community .
translation: 一个感人的、小规模的家庭责任和社区关怀的故事。
back_translation: A touching story of small-scale family responsibility and community care.

text: the gifted crudup has the perfect face to play a handsome blank yearning to find himself , and his cipherlike personality and bad behavior would play fine if the movie knew what to do with him .
translation: 有天赋的克鲁帕拥有完美的面孔，适合饰演一个英俊而空虚、渴望找到自我的角色，而他的神秘个性和坏行为也会很合适，只要电影知道如何处理这个角色。
back_translation: The talented Krupa has a perfect face, suitable for playing a handsome yet empty character, eager to find himself. His mysterious personality and bad behavior would also fit well, as long as the film knows how to handle this character.

text: an artsploitation movie with too much exploitation and too little art .
translation: 一部艺术剥削电影，剥削成分过多，艺术成分过少。
back_translation: An art exploitation film with too much exploitation and too little artistry.

text: unless you 're a fanatic , the best advice is : ` scooby ' do n't .
translation: 除非你是个狂热者，最好的建议是：“别做斯库比。”
back_translation: Unless you are a fanatic, the best advice is: "Don't be Scooby."

text: nicole kidman evolved from star to superstar some time over the past year , which means that birthday girl is the kind of quirkily appealing minor movie she might not make for a while .
translation: 妮可·基德曼在过去的一年间从明星进化为超级明星，这意味着这部名为《生日女孩》的影片是她可能不会再制作的一种古怪吸引人的小众电影。
back_translation: Nicole Kidman has evolved from a star to a super star over the past year, which means that the film titled "Birthday Girl" is a quirky, appealing indie film that she may not make again.

text: and the positive change in tone here seems to have recharged him .
translation: 这里的语气积极变化似乎让他重新振作起来。
back_translation: The positive change in tone here seems to have uplifted him.

text: there 's just something about watching a squad of psychopathic underdogs whale the tar out of unsuspecting lawmen that reaches across time and distance .
translation: 观看一群精神病患者的弱者无情地攻击毫不知情的执法人员，总有一种跨越时间和距离的魅力。
back_translation: Watching a group of mentally ill patients ruthlessly attack unsuspecting law enforcement personnel always has a charm that transcends time and distance.

text: the script is high on squaddie banter , low on shocks .
translation: 剧本充满了士兵的玩笑，缺乏惊喜。
back_translation: The script is filled with soldier jokes and lacks surprises.

text: go back to sleep .
translation: 继续睡觉。
back_translation: Keep sleeping.

text: this movie plays like an extended dialogue exercise in retard 101 .
translation: 这部电影就像是一次延长的对话练习，堪称愚蠢101。
back_translation: This movie is like an extended conversation exercise, almost a course in stupidity 101.

text: it 's as if a bored cage spent the duration of the film 's shooting schedule waiting to scream : `` got aids yet ? ''
translation: 就好像一个无聊的笼子在电影拍摄的整个过程中一直在等待尖叫：“你得艾滋病了吗？”
back_translation: It's like a boring cage that has been waiting to scream throughout the entire filming process: "Did you get AIDS?"

text: secret ballot is a funny , puzzling movie ambiguous enough to be engaging and oddly moving .
translation: 《秘密投票》是一部有趣且令人困惑的电影，模糊的情节足以吸引观众，并带来奇特的感动。
back_translation: "The Secret Vote" is an interesting yet perplexing film, with a vague plot that is enough to captivate the audience and evoke a unique emotional response.

text: a visionary marvel , but it 's lacking a depth in storytelling usually found in anime like this .
translation: 一部富有远见的奇迹，但在故事叙述的深度上缺乏通常在这种动漫中找到的元素。
back_translation: A visionary miracle, but lacking the depth of storytelling elements typically found in this type of anime.

text: nair just does n't have the necessary self-control to guide a loose , poorly structured film through the pitfalls of incoherence and redundancy .
translation: 奈尔根本没有必要的自控能力来引导一部松散、结构不良的电影穿越不连贯和冗余的陷阱。
back_translation: Nair simply lacks the necessary self-control to guide a loose, poorly structured film through the traps of incoherence and redundancy.

text: one of the most slyly exquisite anti-adult movies ever made .
translation: 有史以来最狡猾精致的反成人电影之一。
back_translation: One of the most cunning and sophisticated anti-pornographic films in history.

text: this low-rent -- and even lower-wit -- rip-off of the farrelly brothers ' oeuvre gets way too mushy -- and in a relatively short amount of time .
translation: 这个低成本、甚至低智的模仿法瑞利兄弟作品的电影变得过于感性——而且在相对较短的时间内。
back_translation: This low-cost, even low-intelligence film that imitates the work of the Farrelly brothers has become overly sentimental—and in a relatively short amount of time.

text: happily stays close to the ground in a spare and simple manner and does n't pummel us with phony imagery or music .
translation: 愉快地以简单朴素的方式贴近地面，没有用虚假的意象或音乐来轰炸我们。
back_translation: Joyfully and simply close to the ground, without bombarding us with false imagery or music.

text: fails as a dystopian movie , as a retooling of fahrenheit 451 , and even as a rip-off of the matrix .
translation: 作为一部反乌托邦电影，它失败了，作为《华氏451度》的重新改编，它也失败了，甚至作为《黑客帝国》的翻版，它也失败了。
back_translation: As a dystopian film, it fails; as a re-adaptation of "Fahrenheit 451," it also fails; even as a copy of "The Matrix," it fails.

text: whatever one makes of its political edge , this is beautiful filmmaking from one of french cinema 's master craftsmen .
translation: 无论人们对其政治色彩有何看法，这都是法国电影大师级工匠的美丽电影作品。
back_translation: Regardless of people's views on its political undertones, this is a beautiful cinematic work by a master craftsman of French cinema.

text: jagger , stoppard and director michael apted ... deliver a riveting and surprisingly romantic ride .
translation: 贾格尔、斯托帕德和导演迈克尔·阿普特...带来了一个引人入胜且出人意料的浪漫之旅。
back_translation: Jager, Stoppard, and director Michael Apted... brought an engaging and unexpected romantic journey.

text: banal and predictable .
translation: 平庸而可预测。
back_translation: Mediocre and predictable.

text: takes a clunky tv-movie approach to detailing a chapter in the life of the celebrated irish playwright , poet and drinker .
translation: 采用笨拙的电视电影风格，详细描述了这位著名的爱尔兰剧作家、诗人和饮酒者生活中的一个章节。
back_translation: In a clumsy television movie style, it details a chapter from the life of the famous Irish playwright, poet, and drinker.

text: the trashy teen-sleaze equivalent of showgirls .
translation: 垃圾青少年低俗版的《表演者》。
back_translation: The vulgar version of "The Performer" by trashy teenagers.

text: best of all is garcia , who perfectly portrays the desperation of a very insecure man .
translation: 最棒的是加西亚，他完美地表现了一个极度不安男士的绝望。
back_translation: The best is Garcia, who perfectly portrayed the desperation of a deeply unsettled man.

text: it does n't flinch from its unsettling prognosis , namely , that the legacy of war is a kind of perpetual pain .
translation: 它没有对其令人不安的预后退缩，即战争遗留下来的是一种永恒的痛苦。
back_translation: It did not shy away from its unsettling prognosis, that what war leaves behind is an eternal suffering.

text: scooby-doo does n't know if it wants to be a retro-refitting exercise in campy recall for older fans or a silly , nickelodeon-esque kiddie flick .
translation: 《史酷比》不知道是想成为一种为老粉丝重温经典的怀旧改造练习，还是一部幼稚的、像是谁的小孩频道的电影。
back_translation: "Scooby-Doo" is uncertain whether it aims to be a nostalgic remake for old fans to reminisce about the classics or a childish movie that belongs on a kids' channel.

text: a dramatic comedy as pleasantly dishonest and pat as any hollywood fluff .
translation: 一部戏剧性的喜剧，既愉快又不诚实，和任何好莱坞的轻浮作品一样老套。
back_translation: A dramatic comedy that is both enjoyable and dishonest, as clichéd as any lighthearted Hollywood production.

text: unfunny and lacking any sense of commitment to or affection for its characters , the reginald hudlin comedy relies on toilet humor , ethnic slurs .
translation: 缺乏幽默感，对角色缺乏任何承诺或感情的雷吉纳德·哈德林喜剧，依赖于厕所幽默和种族诽谤。
back_translation: A comedy by Reginald Hudlin that lacks a sense of humor and any commitment or emotion to the characters, relying on toilet humor and racial slurs.

text: `` the best disney movie since the lion king ''
translation: 自《狮子王》以来最好的迪士尼电影
back_translation: The best Disney movie since "The Lion King."

text: best indie of the year , so far .
translation: 迄今为止，年度最佳独立游戏。
back_translation: So far, the best independent game of the year.

text: feels less like a cousin to blade runner than like a bottom-feeder sequel in the escape from new york series .
translation: 感觉更像是《纽约逃亡》系列的一个劣质续集，而不像《银翼杀手》的亲属。
back_translation: It feels more like a low-quality sequel to the "Escape from New York" series rather than a relative of "Blade Runner."

text: it jumps around with little logic or continuity , presenting backstage bytes of information that never amount to a satisfying complete picture of this particular , anciently demanding m茅tier .
translation: 它跳跃得毫无逻辑和连贯性，呈现出后台信息的片段，这些信息从未构成对这一古老而严苛职业令人满意的完整图景。
back_translation: It jumps around with no logic or coherence, presenting fragments of background information that never form a satisfactory complete picture of this ancient and demanding profession.

text: simone is not a bad film .
translation: 西蒙不是一部坏电影。
back_translation: Simon is not a bad movie.

text: a sexy , peculiar and always entertaining costume drama set in renaissance spain , and the fact that it 's based on true events somehow makes it all the more compelling .
translation: 一部性感、独特且始终引人入胜的服装剧，背景设定在文艺复兴时期的西班牙，而它基于真实事件的事实更使其倍添吸引力。
back_translation: A sensual, unique, and always captivating costume drama set in Renaissance Spain, whose appeal is further enhanced by its basis in true events.

text: as the sulking , moody male hustler in the title role , -lrb- franco -rrb- has all of dean 's mannerisms and self-indulgence , but none of his sweetness and vulnerability .
translation: 作为标题角色的情绪低落、易怒的男性推销员，-lrb- 弗朗科 -rrb- 拥有迪恩所有的举止和自我沉溺，但没有他的一丝甜美和脆弱。
back_translation: As the title character, the emotionally depressed and irritable male salesman, -lrb- Franco -rrb- has all the mannerisms and self-indulgence of Dean, but lacks any of his sweetness and vulnerability.

text: the first bond movie in ages that is n't fake fun .
translation: 很久以来第一部不虚假的邦德电影。
back_translation: The first non-fake Bond movie in a long time.

text: the problem is that for the most part , the film is deadly dull .
translation: 问题是电影大部分时间都无聊得让人忍受不了。
back_translation: The problem is that the movie is mostly unbearably boring.

text: for the rest of us , sitting through dahmer 's two hours amounts to little more than punishment .
translation: 对于我们其他人来说，忍受达默的两个小时几乎没有什么好处，只是一种惩罚。
back_translation: For the rest of us, enduring the two hours of Dahmer is almost no benefit, just a punishment.

text: the rollerball sequences feel sanitised and stagey .
translation: 滚珠笔的场景感觉被净化和舞台化。
back_translation: The scene of the ballpoint pen feels purified and staged.

text: ramsay and morton fill this character study with poetic force and buoyant feeling .
translation: 拉姆塞和摩顿赋予这个人物研究以诗意的力量和轻盈的情感。
back_translation: Ramsey and Morton infuse the character study with poetic power and a lightness of emotion.

text: the film is saved from are n't - kids-cute sentimentality by a warmth that is n't faked and a stately sense of composition .
translation: 这部电影摆脱了孩子气的可爱 sentimental 主义，展现了一种真实的温暖和庄重的构图感。
back_translation: This film sheds the childish cuteness of sentimentality and presents a genuine warmth and a solemn sense of composition.

text: death to smoochy is often very funny , but what 's even more remarkable is the integrity of devito 's misanthropic vision .
translation: 《死亡与小丑》常常非常搞笑，但更值得注意的是德维托的厌世主义视角的完整性。
back_translation: "Death and the Joker" is often very funny, but what is more noteworthy is the integrity of DeVito's nihilistic perspective.

text: the only young people who possibly will enjoy it are infants ... who might be distracted by the movie 's quick movements and sounds .
translation: 唯一可能会享受它的年轻人是婴儿他们可能会被电影的快速运动和声音所分散注意力。
back_translation: The only young people who might enjoy it are babies... they may be distracted by the fast movement and sounds of the movie.

text: there 's something fishy about a seasonal holiday kids ' movie ... that derives its moment of most convincing emotional gravity from a scene where santa gives gifts to grownups .
translation: 圣诞节儿童电影中有些可疑的地方它最感人的情感高潮来源于一个场景，圣诞老人给成年人送礼物。
back_translation: There are some suspicious aspects in children's Christmas movies... The most touching emotional climax comes from a scene where Santa Claus gives gifts to adults.

text: it collapses when mr. taylor tries to shift the tone to a thriller 's rush .
translation: 当泰勒先生试图把语气转变为惊悚片的紧张氛围时，它崩溃了。
back_translation: When Mr. Taylor tried to shift the tone to a tense atmosphere of a thriller, it fell apart.

text: it 's also not smart or barbed enough for older viewers -- not everyone thinks poo-poo jokes are ` edgy . '
translation: 这对年长观众来说也不够聪明或尖刻——并不是每个人都认为屎尿笑话是“尖锐”的。
back_translation: This is not clever or sharp enough for older audiences—not everyone thinks that poop and pee jokes are "sharp."

text: it gives poor dana carvey nothing to do that is really funny , and then expects us to laugh because he acts so goofy all the time .
translation: 这给了可怜的达娜·卡维什么有趣的事情都没有，然后又期待我们因为他总是表现得如此傻乎乎而笑。
back_translation: This gave poor Dana Cavi nothing interesting, and then expected us to laugh because he always acted so silly.

text: efficient , suitably anonymous chiller .
translation: 高效、适当匿名的冷却器。
back_translation: Efficient and appropriately anonymous cooler.

text: ... stylistically , the movie is a disaster .
translation: 在风格上，这部电影是一场灾难。
back_translation: ...In terms of style, this movie is a disaster.

text: it 's mildly entertaining , especially if you find comfort in familiarity .
translation: 这稍微有点娱乐性，尤其是如果你在熟悉中找到安慰的话。
back_translation: This is a bit entertaining, especially if you find comfort in familiarity.

text: ... a guiltless film for nice evening out .
translation: ... 一部适合愉快夜晚的无负罪感的电影。
back_translation: ... a guilt-free movie perfect for a pleasant night.

text: what makes salton sea surprisingly engrossing is that caruso takes an atypically hypnotic approach to a world that 's often handled in fast-edit , hopped-up fashion .
translation: 沙尔顿湖之所以令人惊讶地引人入胜，是因为卡鲁索以一种非同寻常的催眠式手法处理了一个常常以快速剪辑、兴奋的方式呈现的世界。
back_translation: The reason Lake Shalton is surprisingly captivating is that Caruso handles a world often presented with fast cuts and excitement in an unusually hypnotic manner.

text: an opportunity missed .
translation: 错失的机会。
back_translation: Missed opportunities.

text: canada 's arctic light shines bright on this frozen tundra soap opera that breathes extraordinary life into the private existence of the inuit people .
translation: 加拿大的北极光照耀着这部冰冻苔原的肥皂剧，为因纽特人的私密生活注入了非凡的生命力。
back_translation: The northern lights of Canada illuminate this frozen tundra soap opera, infusing the private lives of the Inuit people with extraordinary vitality.

text: fresh and raw like a blown-out vein , narc takes a walking-dead , cop-flick subgenre and beats new life into it .
translation: 新鲜而生猛，就像一条爆裂的静脉，毒品警探将行尸走肉般的警匪片子划分成一个小类型，并为其注入新的生命。
back_translation: Fresh and vibrant, like a bursting vein, the narcotics detective categorizes the lifeless cop-and-robber films into a small genre and injects it with new life.

text: dignified ceo 's meet at a rustic retreat and pee against a tree .
translation: 尊贵的首席执行官们在一个乡村度假胜地会面，并在树上小便。
back_translation: Distinguished CEOs meet at a countryside resort and urinate on trees.

text: a creepy , intermittently powerful study of a self-destructive man ... about as unsettling to watch as an exploratory medical procedure or an autopsy .
translation: 一个阴森可怕、间歇性强烈的自我毁灭者的研究观看起来让人不安，仿佛在观看一场探索性医疗程序或尸检。
back_translation: A chilling and terrifying study of an intermittent and intense self-destructor... watching it is unsettling, as if observing an exploratory medical procedure or an autopsy.

text: the overall vibe is druggy and self-indulgent , like a spring-break orgy for pretentious arts majors .
translation: 整体氛围显得迷幻而自我放纵，像是一个装逼艺术专业学生的春假狂欢派对。
back_translation: The overall atmosphere feels psychedelic and self-indulgent, like the spring break party of a pretentious art major student.

text: the transporter bombards the viewer with so many explosions and side snap kicks that it ends up being surprisingly dull .
translation: 《运输者》让观众沉浸在大量爆炸和侧踢中，结果却让人感到意外的乏味。
back_translation: "The Transporter" immerses the audience in a barrage of explosions and side kicks, but the result is surprisingly dull.

text: beneath the film 's obvious determination to shock at any cost lies considerable skill and determination , backed by sheer nerve .
translation: 在影片明显追求不惜一切代价让人震惊的表象下，隐藏着相当的技巧和决心，背后是纯粹的勇气。
back_translation: Beneath the film's obvious pursuit of shock at any cost lies considerable skill and determination, backed by sheer courage.

text: perry 's good and his is an interesting character , but `` serving sara '' has n't much more to serve than silly fluff .
translation: 佩里的表演很好，他是一个有趣的角色，但《为萨拉服务》并没有提供多少实质内容，只是一味的轻浮。
back_translation: Perry's performance is good; he is an interesting character, but "Serving Sara" does not offer much substantial content, just being frivolous all the way.

text: the film 's trailer also looked like crap , so crap is what i was expecting .
translation: 这部电影的预告片看起来也很糟糕，所以我预期的就是糟糕。
back_translation: The trailer for this movie looks terrible, so I expect it to be bad.

text: the sentimental script has problems , but the actors pick up the slack .
translation: 情感剧本存在问题，但演员们弥补了这个不足。
back_translation: The emotional script had its flaws, but the actors made up for this deficiency.

text: puts a refreshing and comical spin on the all-too-familiar saga of the contemporary single woman .
translation: 为当代单身女性这一熟悉的故事增添了清新和幽默的视角。
back_translation: It adds a fresh and humorous perspective to the familiar story of contemporary single women.

text: there are some laughs in this movie , but williams ' anarchy gets tiresome , the satire is weak .
translation: 这部电影有一些笑点，但威廉姆斯的无政府状态让人感到厌倦，讽刺也很薄弱。
back_translation: This movie has some funny moments, but Williams' chaos becomes tiresome, and the satire is quite weak.

text: boisterous , heartfelt comedy .
translation: 喧闹而充满真情的喜剧。
back_translation: A noisy and heartfelt comedy.

text: it 's as if allen , at 66 , has stopped challenging himself .
translation: 就好像66岁的艾伦已经停止了对自己的挑战。
back_translation: It's as if 66-year-old Allen has stopped challenging himself.

text: the characters seem one-dimensional , and the film is superficial and will probably be of interest primarily to its target audience .
translation: 这些角色似乎是一维的，电影表面化，可能主要对其目标观众感兴趣。
back_translation: These characters seem one-dimensional, and the movie is superficial, likely only appealing to its target audience.

text: i 'm sure mainstream audiences will be baffled , but , for those with at least a minimal appreciation of woolf and clarissa dalloway , the hours represents two of those well spent .
translation: 我相信主流观众会感到困惑，但对于那些至少有一点对伍尔夫和克拉丽莎·达洛威欣赏的人来说，《时光》代表了两段值得的时光。
back_translation: I believe mainstream audiences may feel confused, but for those who at least have a little appreciation for Woolf and Clarissa Dalloway, "Time" represents two segments of worthwhile moments.

text: very amusing , not the usual route in a thriller , and the performances are odd and pixilated and sometimes both .
translation: 非常有趣，不是惊悚片中通常的路线，而且表演奇特且略显模糊，有时二者兼而有之。
back_translation: Very interesting, not the usual route found in horror films, and the performances are unique and somewhat ambiguous, sometimes embodying both.

text: if festival in cannes nails hard - boiled hollywood argot with a bracingly nasty accuracy , much about the film , including some of its casting , is frustratingly unconvincing .
translation: 如果戛纳电影节以令人痛快的恶毒准确性揭示了好莱坞行话的真实面貌，那么关于这部电影的许多方面，包括部分演员阵容，令人沮丧地令人难以信服。
back_translation: If the Cannes Film Festival reveals the true nature of Hollywood jargon with a gratifyingly vicious accuracy, then many aspects of this film, including part of the cast, are frustratingly hard to believe.

text: coral reef adventure is a heavyweight film that fights a good fight on behalf of the world 's endangered reefs -- and it lets the pictures do the punching .
translation: 珊瑚礁冒险是一部重量级电影，代表世界受威胁的珊瑚礁进行了一场良好的斗争——它让画面来传达力量。
back_translation: Coral Reef Adventure is a heavyweight film that represents a good fight for the world's threatened coral reefs—it lets the visuals convey the power.

text: but it could be , by its art and heart , a necessary one .
translation: 但它可以通过其艺术和心灵，成为一个必要的存在。
back_translation: But it can become a necessary existence through its art and spirit.

text: i wanted more .
translation: 我想要更多。
back_translation: I want more.

text: the entire cast is extraordinarily good .
translation: 整个演员阵容非常出色。
back_translation: The entire cast is outstanding.

text: as if trying to grab a lump of play-doh , the harder that liman tries to squeeze his story , the more details slip out between his fingers .
translation: 就像试图抓住一团橡皮泥一样，利曼越是努力挤压他的故事，更多的细节就越是从他指缝之间溜走。
back_translation: Just like trying to hold onto a lump of clay, the more Lehman tried to squeeze his story, the more details slipped away from his fingers.

text: a bracing , unblinking work that serves as a painful elegy and sobering cautionary tale .
translation: 一部振奋人心、直面现实的作品，既是一首痛苦的悼词，也是一则令人警醒的警示故事。
back_translation: An inspiring and realistic work, it is both a painful elegy and a thought-provoking cautionary tale.

text: a fine , rousing , g-rated family film , aimed mainly at little kids but with plenty of entertainment value to keep grown-ups from squirming in their seats .
translation: 一部精彩、振奋人心、适合家庭观看的电影，主要面向小朋友，但也有足够的娱乐价值让大人们在座位上不会感到无聊。
back_translation: An exciting, uplifting, and family-friendly movie, primarily aimed at children, but with enough entertainment value to keep adults from feeling bored in their seats.

text: it 's immensely ambitious , different than anything that 's been done before and amazingly successful in terms of what it 's trying to do .
translation: 它的野心巨大，和以前所做的任何事情都不同，在实现目标方面惊人成功。
back_translation: Its ambition is enormous, different from anything done before, and it has achieved remarkable success in reaching its goals.

text: ... a pretentious mess ...
translation: ... 一个自命不凡的混乱 ...
back_translation: ... a self-important chaos ...

text: it sends you away a believer again and quite cheered at just that .
translation: 它再次让你带着信仰离开，而且对此感到非常振奋。
back_translation: It leaves you again with faith and feeling very uplifted about it.

text: terminally bland , painfully slow and needlessly confusing ... the movie , shot on digital videotape rather than film , is frequently indecipherable .
translation: 终极平淡，痛苦缓慢，并且不必要地令人困惑这部影片是用数字录像带拍摄而非胶卷，常常让人难以理解。
back_translation: Utterly bland, the pain is slow and unnecessarily confusing... This film is shot on digital videotape rather than film, often making it difficult to comprehend.

text: a very depressing movie of many missed opportunities .
translation: 一部关于许多错失机会的非常压抑的电影。
back_translation: A very depressing movie about many missed opportunities.

text: captures the raw comic energy of one of our most flamboyant female comics .
translation: 捕捉了我们最 flamboyant 的女性喜剧演员之一的原始喜剧能量。
back_translation: Captured the raw comedic energy of one of our most flamboyant female comedians.

text: if the man from elysian fields is doomed by its smallness , it is also elevated by it -- the kind of movie that you enjoy more because you 're one of the lucky few who sought it out .
translation: 如果来自极乐世界的人因其小而注定失败，那么它也因其小而得到提升——这种电影让你更加享受，因为你是为数不多的几个去寻找它的幸运儿之一。
back_translation: If a person from the Blissful World is destined to fail because of their smallness, then they are also elevated because of it — such a movie makes you enjoy it more because you are one of the few lucky ones to seek it out.

text: writer-director walter hill and co-writer david giler try to create characters out of the obvious cliches , but wind up using them as punching bags .
translation: 编剧兼导演沃尔特·希尔和联合编剧大卫·吉勒试图从明显的陈词滥调中创造角色，但最终却把他们当作出气筒使用。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Walter Hill, along with co-writer David Giler, tried to create characters from obvious clichés, but ultimately ended up using them as scapegoats.

text: this wretchedly unfunny wannabe comedy is inane and awful - no doubt , it 's the worst movie i 've seen this summer .
translation: 这部可悲的无趣的伪喜剧无聊而糟糕 - 毫无疑问，它是我这个夏天看过的最糟糕的电影。
back_translation: This pathetic, uninteresting pseudo-comedy is boring and terrible - there is no doubt that it is the worst movie I have seen this summer.

text: in the process of trimming the movie to an expeditious 84 minutes , director roger kumble seems to have dumped a whole lot of plot in favor of ... outrageous gags .
translation: 在将电影剪辑到仅84分钟的过程中，导演罗杰·坎布尔似乎放弃了大量情节，而选择了 ...... 离谱的幽默片段。
back_translation: In the process of cutting the film down to just 84 minutes, director Roger Campbell seems to have sacrificed a large amount of plot in favor of ... absurd comedic segments.

text: singer\/composer bryan adams contributes a slew of songs -- a few potential hits , a few more simply intrusive to the story -- but the whole package certainly captures the intended , er , spirit of the piece .
translation: 歌手兼作曲家布莱恩·亚当斯贡献了大量歌曲——一些潜在的热门曲目，还有一些只是对故事的干扰——但整个作品无疑捕捉到了该作品的预期氛围。
back_translation: Singer-songwriter Bryan Adams has contributed a large number of songs—some potential hits and others merely distractions from the story—but the entire body of work undoubtedly captures the intended atmosphere of the piece.

text: does n't come close to justifying the hype that surrounded its debut at the sundance film festival two years ago .
translation: 并不能接近证明两年前在圣丹斯电影节首映时所涉及的炒作。
back_translation: It does not come close to proving the hype involved when it premiered at the Sundance Film Festival two years ago.

text: this slender plot feels especially thin stretched over the nearly 80-minute running time .
translation: 这个纤细的情节在近80分钟的时长中显得尤其单薄。
back_translation: This thin plot seems particularly flimsy over the nearly 80-minute duration.

text: the movie 's biggest shocks come from seeing former nymphette juliette lewis playing a salt-of-the-earth mommy named minnie and watching slim travel incognito in a ridiculous wig no respectable halloween costume shop would ever try to sell .
translation: 这部电影最大的震撼来自于看到前小妖精朱莉叶·刘易斯饰演的朴实无华的妈妈米妮，以及看着斯利姆化妆成一顶可笑的假发秘密旅行，这种假发是任何尊重的万圣节服装店都不会试图出售的。
back_translation: The greatest shock of this film comes from seeing the unpretentious mother Minnie, played by former little pixie Juliette Lewis, and watching Slim transform into a ridiculous secret travel wig, something that no respectable Halloween costume store would ever try to sell.

text: if you value your time and money , find an escape clause and avoid seeing this trite , predictable rehash .
translation: 如果你重视自己的时间和金钱，找一个退出条款，尽量避免观看这部陈词滥调、可预测的老调重弹。
back_translation: If you value your time and money, look for an exit clause and try to avoid watching this clichéd and predictable rehash.

text: boasts a handful of virtuosic set pieces and offers a fair amount of trashy , kinky fun .
translation: 拥有一系列技巧高超的经典场景，并提供相当数量的低俗、古怪的乐趣。
back_translation: Featuring a series of classic scenes with a range of impressive skills, while also providing a considerable amount of crude and quirky fun.

text: the jokes are flat , and the action looks fake .
translation: 笑话平淡，动作看起来很假。
back_translation: The jokes are bland, and the action looks very fake.

text: it 's a ripper of a yarn and i for one enjoyed the thrill of the chill .
translation: 这是个精彩的故事，我非常享受那种刺激的寒意。
back_translation: This is an exciting story, and I really enjoy that thrilling chill.

text: weirdly , broomfield has compelling new material but he does n't unveil it until the end , after endless scenes of him wheedling reluctant witnesses and pointing his camera through the smeared windshield of his rental car .
translation: 奇怪的是，布伦菲尔德有令人信服的新材料，但他直到最后才揭示这些，之前无休止地场景中他不断地劝说不情愿的证人，并通过他租来的汽车的污迹斑斑的挡风玻璃拍摄。
back_translation: Strangely, Bruinfield has compelling new materials, but he reveals them only at the very end, having endlessly persuaded reluctant witnesses throughout the scenes, all while filming through the dirty windshield of his rented car.

text: once folks started hanging out at the barbershop , they never wanted to leave .
translation: 一旦人们开始在理发店闲逛，他们就再也不想离开了。
back_translation: Once people start hanging out in the barber shop, they never want to leave.

text: choppy , overlong documentary about ` the lifestyle . '
translation: 关于“生活方式”的剪辑凌乱、过长的纪录片。
back_translation: A disorganized and overly long documentary about "lifestyle."

text: better still , he does all of this , and more , while remaining one of the most savagely hilarious social critics this side of jonathan swift .
translation: 更好的是，他在做到这一切的同时，仍然是这边最犀利搞笑的社会批评家之一，堪比乔纳森·斯威夫特。
back_translation: Better yet, he remains one of the sharpest and most humorous social critics around, truly comparable to Jonathan Swift, while accomplishing all of this.

text: the action quickly sinks into by-the-numbers territory .
translation: 动作迅速陷入了按部就班的境地。
back_translation: The actions quickly fell into a routine.

text: ends up offering nothing more than the latest schwarzenegger or stallone flick would .
translation: 最终提供的内容不过是最新的施瓦辛格或史泰龙电影所带来的。
back_translation: The content ultimately provided is nothing more than what the latest Schwarzenegger or Stallone movies bring.

text: though there are many tense scenes in trapped , they prove more distressing than suspenseful .
translation: 尽管《被困》有很多紧张的场景，但它们比起悬念更令人不安。

text: the last kiss will probably never achieve the popularity of my big fat greek wedding , but its provocative central wedding sequence has far more impact .
translation: 最后一吻可能永远无法达到《我的大希腊婚礼》的流行程度，但其挑衅性的中央婚礼序列却有更大的冲击力。
back_translation: The final kiss may never reach the popularity of "My Big Fat Greek Wedding," but its provocative central wedding sequence has a greater impact.

text: low rent from frame one .
translation: 第一帧的低租金。
back_translation: Low rent for the first frame.

text: sheridan seems terrified of the book 's irreverent energy , and scotches most of its 茅lan , humor , bile , and irony .
translation: 谢里登似乎对这本书的不敬能量感到害怕，并压制了其中大部分的活力、幽默、讽刺和讥讽。

text: unfortunately , carvey 's rubber-face routine is no match for the insipid script he has crafted with harris goldberg .
translation: 不幸的是，卡维的橡胶脸表演与他与哈里斯·戈德堡共同创作的乏味剧本完全不成匹配。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Carvey's rubber-faced performance does not match the dull script he co-created with Harris Goldberg at all.

text: it may as well be called `` jar-jar binks : the movie . ''
translation: 这部电影也可以称为“贾贾·宾克斯：电影”。

text: over the years , hollywood has crafted a solid formula for successful animated movies , and ice age only improves on it , with terrific computer graphics , inventive action sequences and a droll sense of humor .
translation: 多年来，好莱坞为成功的动画电影打造了一套稳固的公式，而《冰川时代》在此基础上更进一步，拥有出色的电脑图形、富有创意的动作场景和风趣的幽默感。
back_translation: For many years, Hollywood has established a solid formula for successful animated films, and "Ice Age" takes it a step further with outstanding computer graphics, creative action scenes, and a humorous sense of wit.

text: what one is left with , even after the most awful acts are committed , is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has made its way into your very bloodstream .
translation: 即使在最可怕的行为发生后，留下的还是一种压倒性的悲伤，这种悲伤仿佛已渗透到你的血液里。
back_translation: Even after the most horrific acts occur, what remains is an overwhelming sadness, a sadness that seems to have seeped into your very bloodstream.

text: it hates its characters .
translation: 它讨厌它的角色。
back_translation: It hates its role.

text: ... an incredibly heavy-handed , manipulative dud that feels all too familiar .
translation: 一个令人难以忍受、操控性强的失误，感觉非常熟悉。
back_translation: ...an unbearable and highly manipulative mistake that feels very familiar.

text: with `` ichi the killer '' , takashi miike , japan 's wildest filmmaker gives us a crime fighter carrying more emotional baggage than batman ...
translation: 在《杀手一》里，导演三池崇史，这位日本最狂野的电影制作人，给我们呈现了一位比蝙蝠侠背负更多情感包袱的犯罪斗士
back_translation: In "Killer 1," director Takashi Miike, Japan's wildest filmmaker, presents us with a crime fighter who carries more emotional baggage than Batman...

text: anyone who wants to start writing screenplays can just follow the same blueprint from hundreds of other films , sell it to the highest bidder and walk away without anyone truly knowing your identity .
translation: 任何想要开始编写剧本的人都可以遵循数百部其他电影的相同蓝图，将其卖给出价最高的人，然后悄然离开，无人真正知道你的身份。
back_translation: Anyone who wants to start writing a script can follow the same blueprint as hundreds of other films, sell it to the highest bidder, and then quietly leave, with no one really knowing your identity.

text: comes off as a long , laborious whine , the bellyaching of a paranoid and unlikable man .
translation: 听起来像是冗长而费力的抱怨，一个多疑而不讨喜的人的唠叨。
back_translation: It sounds like a long and tedious complaint, the ramblings of a suspicious and unpleasant person.

text: we do n't even like their characters .
translation: 我们甚至不喜欢他们的人物。
back_translation: We don't even like their characters.

text: just a collection of this and that -- whatever fills time -- with no unified whole .
translation: 只是一堆这个和那个的集合——无论什么填充时间——没有统一的整体。
back_translation: Just a collection of this and that—whatever fills the time—without a unified whole.

text: the characters never change .
translation: 角色永远不变。

text: even kids deserve better .
translation: 孩子们也值得更好的生活。
back_translation: Children also deserve a better life.

text: while scorsese 's bold images and generally smart casting ensure that `` gangs '' is never lethargic , the movie is hindered by a central plot that 's peppered with false starts and populated by characters who are nearly impossible to care about .
translation: 尽管斯科塞斯大胆的影像和通常聪明的选角确保了《黑帮》从未显得疲沓，但电影受到中央情节的阻碍，情节中充满了虚假的开端，角色几乎让人无法产生共鸣。
back_translation: Despite Scorsese's bold visuals and usually smart casting ensuring that "The Irishman" never feels sluggish, the film is hindered by its central narrative, which is filled with false starts and characters that are almost impossible to connect with.

text: once ice-t sticks his mug in the window of the couple 's bmw and begins haranguing the wife in bad stage dialogue , all credibility flies out the window .
translation: 一旦Ice-T将他的脸伸进那对夫妇的宝马车窗，开始用糟糕的舞台对话对妻子进行训斥，所有的可信度都随之消失。
back_translation: Once Ice-T leaned his face into the couple's BMW window and started scolding the wife with bad stage dialogue, all credibility vanished.

text: this is more fascinating -- being real -- than anything seen on jerry springer .
translation: 这比杰里·斯普林格上看到的任何事情都更加引人入胜——真实的存在。
back_translation: This is more compelling than anything seen on Jerry Springer—it's real existence.

text: into how long is this movie ?
translation: 这部电影多长时间？
back_translation: How long is this movie?

text: the work of an artist tormented by his heritage , using his storytelling ability to honor the many faceless victims .
translation: 这位艺术家的作品受到他遗产的折磨，利用他的叙事能力来纪念许多无名的受害者。
back_translation: The works of this artist are haunted by his heritage, using his narrative ability to commemorate many unnamed victims.

text: think the lion king redone for horses , with fewer deliberate laughs , more inadvertent ones and stunningly trite songs by bryan adams , the world 's most generic rock star .
translation: 想象一下《狮子王》重新演绎成马的版本，少了一些刻意的笑点，更多的是意外的笑声，还有布莱恩·亚当斯创作的惊人陈词滥调的歌曲，他是世界上最普通的摇滚明星。
back_translation: Imagine a version of "The Lion King" reinterpreted with horses, lacking some of the deliberate comedic moments, but featuring more unexpected laughter, along with amazing clichés in songs by Bryan Adams, who is the most ordinary rock star in the world.

text: you 'll probably love it .
translation: 你可能会喜欢它。
back_translation: You might like it.

text: and for all the wrong reasons besides .
translation: 而且还是出于所有错误的理由。
back_translation: And it is still for all the wrong reasons.

text: reminiscent of alfred hitchcock 's thrillers , most of the scary parts in ` signs ' occur while waiting for things to happen .
translation: 让人联想到阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克的惊悚片，《征兆》中大多数恐怖场景发生在等待事情发生的过程中。
back_translation: Reminiscent of Alfred Hitchcock's thrillers, most of the terrifying scenes in "The Signs" occur during the anticipation of events.

text: in his debut as a director , washington has a sure hand .
translation: 在他的执导处女作中，华盛顿表现得游刃有余。
back_translation: In his directorial debut, Washington demonstrated great finesse.

text: if you love him , you 'll like it .
translation: 如果你爱他，你会喜欢它。
back_translation: If you love him, you will like it.

text: what 's so fun about this silly , outrageous , ingenious thriller is the director 's talent .
translation: 这个愚蠢、荒唐、巧妙的惊悚片之所以有趣，正是由于导演的才华。
back_translation: The reason this stupid, ridiculous, and clever thriller is interesting is precisely because of the director's talent.

text: i like that smith , he 's not making fun of these people , he 's not laughing at them .
translation: 我喜欢史密斯，他没有嘲笑这些人，也没有在他们身上大笑。
back_translation: I like Smith; he didn't mock these people, nor did he laugh at them.

text: the logic of it all will be greek to anyone not predisposed to the movie 's rude and crude humor .
translation: 这一切的逻辑对任何不习惯这部电影粗俗幽默的人来说都是天书。
back_translation: The logic of all this is like ancient scripture to anyone not accustomed to the crude humor of this film.

text: the movie 's downfall is to substitute plot for personality .
translation: 这部电影的堕落在于用情节取代了个性。
back_translation: The downfall of this movie lies in replacing personality with plot.

text: so much about the film is loopy and ludicrous ... that it could have been a hoot in a bad-movie way if the laborious pacing and endless exposition had been tightened .
translation: 电影的许多情节都显得离奇和荒诞如果节奏不那么拖沓，冗长的背景介绍能有所精简，这部电影可能会以一种烂片的方式变得十分有趣。
back_translation: Many of the plot points in the movie seem strange and absurd... If the pacing were not so sluggish and the lengthy background introduction could be streamlined, this film might have become quite interesting in a so-bad-it's-good way.

text: victor rosa is leguizamo 's best movie work so far , a subtle and richly internalized performance .
translation: 维克多·罗萨是莱基扎莫迄今为止最好的电影作品，表演微妙且内涵丰富。
back_translation: Victor Roza is Lechiza's best film work to date, with performances that are subtle and profoundly rich in meaning.

text: psychologically savvy .
translation: 心理上聪明。
back_translation: Psychologically smart.

text: a stirring tribute to the bravery and dedication of the world 's reporters who willingly walk into the nightmare of war not only to record the events for posterity , but to help us clearly see the world of our making .
translation: 对世界记者勇气和奉献精神的感人致敬，他们自愿走入战火的噩梦，不仅仅是为了记录后世的事件，更是为了帮助我们清晰地看到我们所创造的世界。
back_translation: A heartfelt tribute to the courage and dedication of journalists around the world, who willingly step into the nightmarish flames of war, not only to document events for future generations but also to help us see clearly the world we have created.

text: a chilling movie without oppressive gore .
translation: 一部没有压迫感血腥的惊悚电影。
back_translation: A thrilling movie without a sense of oppression and bloodshed.

text: we assume he had a bad run in the market or a costly divorce , because there is no earthly reason other than money why this distinguished actor would stoop so low .
translation: 我们假设他在市场上遭遇了不好的局面或经历了一场代价昂贵的离婚，因为除了一些金钱上的原因，这位杰出的演员没有任何世俗的理由会沦落到如此地步。
back_translation: We assume that he faced a tough situation in the market or went through an expensive divorce, because aside from some financial reasons, this outstanding actor has no worldly reasons to fall into such a state.

text: star trek was kind of terrific once , but now it is a copy of a copy of a copy .
translation: 星际迷航曾经非常出色，但现在它只是一部复制品的复制品。

text: several of steven soderbergh 's earlier films were hailed as the works of an artist .
translation: 史蒂文·索德伯格的一些早期电影被誉为艺术家的作品。
back_translation: Some of Steven Soderbergh's early films are praised as works of art.

text: the riveting performances by the incredibly flexible cast make love a joy to behold .
translation: 令人惊叹的灵活演员们的精彩表演让爱情成为一种令人愉悦的观赏体验。
back_translation: The spectacular performances of the amazing flexible actors made love a delightful viewing experience.

text: the most audacious , outrageous , sexually explicit , psychologically probing , pure libido film of the year has arrived from portugal .
translation: 来自葡萄牙的年度最敢于挑战、令人震惊、性明示、心理探究、纯欲电影已经到来。
back_translation: The annual boldest, shocking, sexually explicit, psychologically probing, and pure desire film from Portugal has arrived.

text: a thoughtful movie , a movie that is concerned with souls and risk and schemes and the consequences of one 's actions .
translation: 一部深思熟虑的电影，一部关注灵魂、风险、阴谋以及一个人行为后果的电影。
back_translation: A well-thought-out film that focuses on the soul, risks, conspiracies, and the consequences of a person's actions.

text: the dramatic scenes are frequently unintentionally funny , and the action sequences -- clearly the main event -- are surprisingly uninvolving .
translation: 戏剧性的场景常常意外地搞笑，而动作场面——显然是重头戏——却令人意外地缺乏吸引力。
back_translation: Dramatic scenes are often unexpectedly funny, while the action scenes—clearly the highlights—surprisingly lack appeal.

text: directed by kevin bray , whose crisp framing , edgy camera work , and wholesale ineptitude with acting , tone and pace very obviously mark him as a video helmer making his feature debut .
translation: 由凯文·布雷执导，他干练的构图、尖锐的摄影风格，以及对表演、语气和节奏的显著无能，明显表明他是一位首次执导长片的视频导演。
back_translation: Directed by Kevin Bray, his competent composition, sharp photographic style, and significant inability in performance, tone, and pacing clearly indicate that he is a video director making his feature film debut.

text: because the intelligence level of the characters must be low , very low , very very low , for the masquerade to work , the movie contains no wit , only labored gags .
translation: 因为角色的智力水平必须很低，非常低，非常非常低，才能使伪装得以成功，这部电影没有机智，只有费力的笑料。

text: viewers of barney 's crushingly self-indulgent spectacle will see nothing in it to match the ordeal of sitting through it .

text: one of those rare films that seems as though it was written for no one , but somehow manages to convince almost everyone that it was put on the screen , just for them .
translation: 这是一部罕见的电影，似乎是为任何人而写的，但不知怎么的，几乎让所有人都相信它是专门为他们而放映的。
back_translation: This is a rare film that seems to be written for anyone, yet somehow makes almost everyone believe it is being shown specifically for them.

text: diane lane works nothing short of a minor miracle in unfaithful .
translation: 黛安·莲恩在《不忠》中展现了不亚于小奇迹的表演。
back_translation: Diane Lane delivers a performance in "Unfaithful" that is nothing short of a small miracle.

text: one of the very best movies ever made about the life of moviemaking .
translation: 关于电影制作生涯的最佳电影之一。
back_translation: One of the best films about a career in filmmaking.

text: is many things -- stoner midnight flick , sci-fi deconstruction , gay fantasia -- but above all it 's a love story as sanguine as its title .
translation: 它有很多种样子——嬉戏的午夜电影、科幻解构、同志幻想——但最重要的是，它是一部如其标题般乐观的爱情故事。
back_translation: It has many forms—playful midnight movies, sci-fi deconstructions, queer fantasies—but most importantly, it is a love story that is as optimistic as its title.

text: but if the essence of magic is its make-believe promise of life that soars above the material realm , this is the opposite of a truly magical movie .
translation: 但如果魔法的本质是它超越物质领域的虚幻生命承诺，那么这部电影正好与真正的魔法电影相反。
back_translation: But if the essence of magic is its illusory promise of life that transcends the material realm, then this movie is exactly the opposite of a true magic film.

text: a loud , brash and mainly unfunny high school comedy .
translation: 一部喧闹、粗鲁且主要不搞笑的高中喜剧。
back_translation: A noisy, crude, and mostly unfunny high school comedy.

text: watching junk like this induces a kind of abstract guilt , as if you were paying dues for good books unread , fine music never heard .
translation: 观看这种垃圾让人产生一种抽象的内疚感，仿佛你在为未读的好书、从未听过的美妙音乐付出代价。
back_translation: Watching this kind of garbage creates an abstract sense of guilt, as if you are paying a price for unread good books and beautiful music you have never heard.

text: an inuit masterpiece that will give you goosebumps as its uncanny tale of love , communal discord , and justice unfolds .
translation: 一部因纽特的杰作，将让你起鸡皮疙瘩，因为它揭示了一个奇特的爱情故事、社区纷争和正义的情节。
back_translation: A masterpiece from the Inuit that will give you goosebumps, as it reveals a peculiar love story, community conflicts, and the quest for justice.

text: can be viewed as pure composition and form -- film as music
translation: 可以被视为纯粹的构成和形式——电影如同音乐
back_translation: Can be seen as purely composition and form—film is like music.

text: this is a remake by the numbers , linking a halfwit plot to a series of standup routines in which wilson and murphy show how funny they could have been in a more ambitious movie .
translation: 这是一个按照数字重制的作品，将一个愚蠢的情节与一系列单口喜剧节目联系在一起，威尔逊和墨菲展示了在一部更加雄心勃勃的电影中他们本可以有多搞笑。
back_translation: This is a work reimagined by numbers, connecting a silly plot with a series of stand-up comedy shows, where Wilson and Murphy demonstrate how funny they could have been in a more ambitious film.

text: the jokes are telegraphed so far in advance they must have been lost in the mail .
translation: 这些笑话提前传达得太远，肯定是在邮件中丢失了。
back_translation: These jokes were communicated too far in advance, they must have been lost in the email.

text: a cruelly funny twist on teen comedy packed with inventive cinematic tricks and an ironically killer soundtrack
translation: 一部残酷而幽默的青少年喜剧，充满了巧妙的电影技巧和讽刺意味的绝妙音轨。
back_translation: A cruel yet humorous teen comedy, filled with clever cinematic techniques and a brilliantly ironic soundtrack.

text: smarter than its commercials make it seem .
translation: 比其广告所显现的更聪明。
back_translation: Smarter than what their advertisements suggest.

text: a reasonably entertaining sequel to 1994 's surprise family hit that may strain adult credibility .
translation: 一部合理有趣的续集，给1994年意外爆红的家庭电影，可能会让成年人感到信服力不足。
back_translation: A reasonable and interesting sequel to the unexpectedly popular family movie from 1994 may leave adults feeling that it lacks credibility.

text: could have been crisper and punchier , but it 's likely to please audiences who like movies that demand four hankies .
translation: 可能会更为干脆有力，但这可能会让喜欢需要四块手帕的影片的观众满意。
back_translation: It may be more straightforward and powerful, but this may satisfy viewers who enjoy films that require four handkerchiefs.

text: a french film with a more down-home flavor .
translation: 一部更接地气的法国电影。
back_translation: A more down-to-earth French film.

text: when a movie asks you to feel sorry for mick jagger 's sex life , it already has one strike against it .
translation: 当一部电影让你为米奇·贾格尔的性生活感到难过时，它已经有了一个反对的理由。
back_translation: When a movie makes you feel sad about Mick Jagger's sex life, it already has a reason for dissent.

text: an asian neo-realist treasure .
translation: 一部亚洲新现实主义的珍宝。
back_translation: A treasure of Asian new realism.

text: generic thriller junk .
translation: 普通的惊悚片垃圾。
back_translation: Ordinary thriller movie garbage.

text: an honest , sensitive story from a vietnamese point of view .
translation: 一个来自越南视角的诚实、敏感的故事。
back_translation: An honest and sensitive story from a Vietnamese perspective.

text: while some of the camera work is interesting , the film 's mid-to-low budget is betrayed by the surprisingly shoddy makeup work .
translation: 尽管一些摄像工作颇具趣味，但影片的中低预算暴露于惊人劣质的化妆效果之下。
back_translation: Although some of the cinematography is quite interesting, the film's low to mid-budget exposes it to shockingly poor makeup effects.

text: more than their unique residences , home movie is about the people who live in them , who have carved their own comfortable niche in the world and have been kind enough to share it .
translation: 《家园电影》不仅仅是关于他们独特的居所，更是关于那些住在里面的人，他们在这个世界上开辟了自己的舒适天地，并慷慨地与我们分享。
back_translation: "The Home Movie" is not just about their unique dwellings, but also about the people living inside them, who have carved out their own comfortable spaces in this world and generously share them with us.

text: apparently , romantic comedy with a fresh point of view just does n't figure in the present hollywood program .
translation: 显然，带有新颖观点的浪漫喜剧在当前的好莱坞节目中并没有出现。
back_translation: Clearly, romantic comedies with novel perspectives are not appearing in the current Hollywood lineup.

text: thanks to confident filmmaking and a pair of fascinating performances , the way to that destination is a really special walk in the woods .
translation: 得益于自信的电影制作和两场引人入胜的表演，这条通往目的地的路确实是一场特别的森林漫步。
back_translation: Thanks to confident filmmaking and two captivating performances, this journey to the destination truly feels like a special walk through the forest.

text: a compelling allegory about the last days of germany 's democratic weimar republic .
translation: 关于德国魏玛共和国最后日子的一个引人注目的寓言。
back_translation: A striking parable about the final days of the Weimar Republic in Germany.

text: or maybe `` how will you feel after an 88-minute rip-off of the rock with action confined to slo-mo gun firing and random glass-shattering ? ''
translation: 或者“你会感觉如何，在一部88分钟的抄袭《勇闯夺命岛》的电影中，动作只能限于慢动作开枪和随机的玻璃破碎？”
back_translation: "Or how would you feel about an 88-minute movie that plagiarizes 'The Rock,' where the action is limited to slow-motion gunfire and random glass shattering?"

text: it falls far short of poetry , but it 's not bad prose .
translation: 它远不及诗歌，但也算不错的散文。
back_translation: It is not as good as poetry, but it is also decent prose.

text: the things this movie tries to get the audience to buy just wo n't fly with most intelligent viewers .
translation: 这部电影试图让观众接受的东西，对大多数聪明的观众来说是无法接受的。
back_translation: What this movie tries to make the audience accept is unacceptable to most smart viewers.

text: sillier , cuter , and shorter than the first -lrb- as best i remember -rrb- , but still a very good time at the cinema .
translation: 比第一部更搞笑、更可爱、更短 -lrb- 我记得没错的话 -rrb- ，但在影院里仍然是一次非常愉快的时光。
back_translation: Funnier, cuter, and shorter than the first one - if I remember correctly - but still a very enjoyable time in the theater.

text: by the time the surprise ending is revealed , interest can not be revived .
translation: 当惊人的结局被揭示时，兴趣无法恢复。

translation: 一部粗糙的滑稽喜剧，回顾了早已消失的低成本搞笑电影，如《鬼与麦克鸡》。

text: a beguiling evocation of the quality that keeps dickens evergreen : the exuberant openness with which he expresses our most basic emotions .
translation: 对狄更斯常青品质的迷人唤起：他以热情洋溢的开放态度表达我们最基本情感的方式。

translation: 宾夕法尼亚州的苏格兰完全过于严肃，以至于无法超越其巧妙的概念。

text: i firmly believe that a good video game movie is going to show up soon .
translation: 我坚信很快会出现一部好的电子游戏改编电影。

translation: 蔡肯巧妙地平衡了实时节奏与推动性事件。

text: brainless , but enjoyably over-the-top , the retro gang melodrama , deuces wild represents fifties teen-gang machismo in a way that borders on rough-trade homo-eroticism .
translation: 无脑但愉快地夸张，这部复古帮派 melodrama《双子星》以一种接近粗犷交易同性恋情的方式展现了五十年代青少年帮派的男子气概。
back_translation: Mindlessly but joyfully exaggerated, this retro gang melodrama "Gemini" presents the masculinity of 1950s teenage gangs in a manner close to a rugged portrayal of same-sex relationships.

text: if you ever wanted to be an astronaut , this is the ultimate movie experience - it 's informative and breathtakingly spectacular .
translation: 如果你曾经想成为宇航员，这就是终极电影体验 - 既富有信息性又令人叹为观止。

text: even the digressions are funny .
translation: 甚至插曲也很有趣。
back_translation: Even the interludes are very interesting.

text: and , thanks to the presence of ` the king , ' it also rocks .
translation: 而且，感谢“国王”的存在，它也很震撼。

text: in other words , about as bad a film you 're likely to see all year .

translation: 视觉上令人着迷关于父亲与儿子、忠诚与责任的常常强烈的人物研究。

text: as violent , profane and exploitative as the most offensive action flick you 've ever seen .

text: we 've seen the hippie-turned-yuppie plot before , but there 's an enthusiastic charm in fire that makes the formula fresh again .

text: gets better after foster leaves that little room .
translation: 在福斯特离开那个小房间后变得更好了。

text: compulsively watchable , no matter how degraded things get .
translation: 无论情况多么恶化，令人强迫观看。

text: -lrb- evans is -rrb- a fascinating character , and deserves a better vehicle than this facetious smirk of a movie .
translation: #NAME?

text: the plot grows thin soon , and you find yourself praying for a quick resolution .
translation: 情节很快变得单薄，你发现自己在祈求快速解决。

text: this is rote spookiness , with nary an original idea -lrb- or role , or edit , or score , or anything , really -rrb- in sight , and the whole of the proceedings beg the question ` why ? '
translation: 这完全是程式化的恐怖，毫无原创想法 -lrb- 或角色，或剪辑，或配乐，或者其他任何东西 -rrb- 在眼前可见，整个过程让人不禁问“为什么？”

text: manages to be wholesome and subversive at the same time .
translation: 同时保持纯真和颠覆性。

text: feels aimless for much of its running time , until late in the film when a tidal wave of plot arrives , leaving questions in its wake .
translation: 在大部分时间里感觉缺乏目标，直到影片后期情节如潮水般涌来，留下了许多疑问。
back_translation: For most of the time, I felt a lack of direction, until the plot of the film surged in the later stages, leaving many questions behind.

text: a few zingers aside , the writing is indifferent , and jordan brady 's direction is prosaic .
translation: 除了几句精彩的台词之外，写作平淡无奇，而乔丹·布雷迪的导演风格则显得普通。

text: the corpse count ultimately overrides what little we learn along the way about vicarious redemption .
translation: 尸体的数量最终掩盖了我们在过程中了解到的关于替代救赎的微不足道的内容。

text: a wishy-washy melodramatic movie that shows us plenty of sturm und drung , but explains its characters ' decisions only unsatisfactorily .
translation: 一部模糊不清的情感剧电影，展示了大量的风暴与压力，但对角色的决定解释得很不令人满意。

text: is n't as sharp as the original ... despite some visual virtues , ` blade ii ' just does n't cut it .

text: enigma lacks it .

text: too bad none of it is funny .
translation: 太可惜了，里面没有一个好笑的。

text: there 's no conversion effort , much of the writing is genuinely witty and both stars are appealing enough to probably have a good shot at a hollywood career , if they want one .

text: yet in its own aloof , unreachable way it 's so fascinating you wo n't be able to look away for a second .
translation: 然而，它以自己冷漠、不可触及的方式吸引人得令人无法目光离开片刻。

text: this film puts wang at the forefront of china 's sixth generation of film makers .

translation: 一部令人深思且强大的纪录片，讲述了最严重的个人损失：被母亲拒绝。

text: like the full monty , this is sure to raise audience 's spirits and leave them singing long after the credits roll .
translation: 像《全裸上阵》一样，这部作品肯定会激发观众的情绪，让他们在片尾字幕结束后还继续哼唱。

translation: 我一直很欣赏精心编写的电影，无论《伊格比下沉》可能存在什么缺陷，这一点无可否认。

translation: 无论演员们产生多少好意，秀场最终还是会因其自身的薄弱而崩溃。

text: after sitting through this sloppy , made-for-movie comedy special , it makes me wonder if lawrence hates criticism so much that he refuses to evaluate his own work .
translation: 在经历了这样一个粗糙的、为电影而制作的喜剧特别节目后，我不禁想知道劳伦斯是否如此厌恶批评，以至于他拒绝评估自己的作品。
back_translation: After experiencing such a rough, movie-made comedy special, I can't help but wonder if Lawrence is so averse to criticism that he refuses to assess his own work.

text: obviously , a lot of people wasted a lot of their time -lrb- including mine -rrb- on something very inconsequential .
translation: 显然，很多人浪费了大量时间（包括我的）在一些非常无关紧要的事情上。

translation: 本应该直接发行为视频。

text: it deserves to be seen everywhere .
translation: 它值得在每个地方被看到。

text: you do n't need to know your ice-t 's from your cool-j 's to realize that as far as these shootings are concerned , something is rotten in the state of california .
translation: 你不需要知道你的冰茶与酷杰的区别，就能意识到就这些枪击事件而言，加州的情况有些不对劲。

text: by turns very dark and very funny .
translation: 时而非常黑暗，时而非常幽默。

translation: 完全糟糕的伊朗剧就像一个冷清清的清真寺里脾气暴躁的阿亚图拉一样无趣。

text: suspend your disbelief here and now , or you 'll be shaking your head all the way to the credits .
