back_translation: He is one of the few "cool" actors, and he seems to have never realized his coolness.

text: this 100-minute movie only has about 25 minutes of decent material .
translation: 这部100分钟的电影只有大约25分钟的不错素材。
back_translation: This 100-minute movie has only about 25 minutes of decent material.

text: a serious movie with serious ideas .
translation: 一部严肃的电影，探讨严肃的主题。
back_translation: A serious film that explores serious themes.

text: attal 's hang-ups surrounding infidelity are so old-fashioned and , dare i say , outdated , it 's a wonder that he could n't have brought something fresher to the proceedings simply by accident .
translation: 阿塔尔对不忠的顾虑是如此过时，甚至可以说是陈旧，真让人惊讶他竟然没有通过偶然带来一些更新颖的东西。
back_translation: Atar's concerns about infidelity are so outdated that it is surprising he didn't accidentally bring something more novel.

text: plot , characters , drama , emotions , ideas -- all are irrelevant to the experience of seeing the scorpion king .
translation: 情节、角色、戏剧、情感、理念——这些都与观看《蝎子王》的体验无关。
back_translation: Plot, characters, drama, emotions, concepts—none of these are related to the experience of watching "The Scorpion King."

text: stripped almost entirely of such tools as nudity , profanity and violence , labute does manage to make a few points about modern man and his problematic quest for human connection .
translation: 几乎完全剥离了裸露、粗口和暴力等元素，拉布特却设法提出了一些关于现代人及其在寻求人与人之间联系时所面临的问题的观点。
back_translation: Labute has almost completely stripped away elements such as nudity, coarse language, and violence, yet he manages to present some views on modern people and the issues they face in seeking connections with one another.

text: it 's the cute frissons of discovery and humor between chaplin and kidman that keep this nicely wound clock not just ticking , but humming .
translation: 正是卓别林和基德曼之间可爱的发现与幽默的微妙火花，使这只精致的钟不仅在滴答作响，还在轻声吟唱。
back_translation: It is the charming discoveries and the subtle spark of humor between Chaplin and Kidman that make this exquisite clock not only tick but also softly sing.

text: leave it to the french to truly capture the terrifying angst of the modern working man without turning the film into a cheap thriller , a dumb comedy or a sappy melodrama .
translation: 把它交给法国人，他们真正捕捉到了现代工作人的恐惧焦虑，而没有把电影变成廉价的惊悚片、愚蠢的喜剧或感_的情节剧。
back_translation: They handed it over to the French, who truly captured the fear and anxiety of the modern worker without turning the film into a cheap thriller, a silly comedy, or a sentimental drama.

text: beautiful to watch and holds a certain charm .
translation: 观赏起来非常美丽，并且具有一种独特的魅力。
back_translation: It looks very beautiful and has a unique charm.

text: campbell scott finds the ideal outlet for his flick-knife diction in the role of roger swanson .
translation: 坎贝尔·斯科特在罗杰·斯旺森的角色中找到了他那种尖刻语言的理想发泄。
back_translation: Campbell Scott found the ideal outlet for his sharp language in the character of Roger Swanson.

text: then you 'd do well to check this one out because it 's straight up twin peaks action ...
translation: 那么你最好去看看这个，因为它完全是双峰镇的风格...
back_translation: Then you better go check this out, because it's totally in the style of Twin Peaks...

text: that neither protagonist has a distinguishable condition hardly matters because both are just actory concoctions , defined by childlike dimness and a handful of quirks .
translation: 两个主角都没有明显的特点几乎无关紧要，因为他们都是演员的创作，特征为孩子般的愚蠢和少量的怪癖。
back_translation: Neither of the two protagonists has any obvious characteristics and is almost insignificant, as they are both creations of the actors, characterized by childlike foolishness and a few quirks.

text: land , people and narrative flow together in a stark portrait of motherhood deferred and desire explored .
translation: 土地、人民和叙事交织在一起，呈现出一个关于推迟母性和探索渴望的鲜明肖像。
back_translation: Land, people, and narratives intertwine to present a vivid portrait of delayed motherhood and the exploration of desire.

text: barney 's ideas about creation and identity do n't really seem all that profound , at least by way of what can be gleaned from this three-hour endurance test built around an hour 's worth of actual material .
translation: 巴尼关于创造和身份的观点似乎并没有那么深刻，至少从这部围绕一个小时实际内容构建的三个小时的耐力测试中可以看出。
back_translation: Barney's views on creation and identity don't seem that profound, at least as can be seen from this three-hour endurance test built around an actual hour of content.

text: build some robots , haul 'em to the theatre with you for the late show , and put on your own mystery science theatre 3000 tribute to what is almost certainly going to go down as the worst -- and only -- killer website movie of this or any other year .
translation: 建造一些机器人，把它们带到剧院参加午夜场，并为几乎肯定会成为今年或任何其他年份最糟糕且唯一的杀手网站电影献上你自己的《神秘科学剧院3000》致敬。
back_translation: Build some robots, take them to the theater for the midnight show, and pay your own tribute to "Mystery Science Theater 3000" for what is almost guaranteed to be the worst and only slasher film of this year or any other year.

text: cineasts will revel in those visual in-jokes , as in the film 's verbal pokes at everything from the likes of miramax chief harvey weinstein 's bluff personal style to the stylistic rigors of denmark 's dogma movement .
translation: 影迷们将会在那些视觉幽默中陶醉，正如影片对从米拉麦克斯首席哈维·韦恩斯坦的虚张声势个人风格到丹麦教义运动的风格严格性的口头调侃一样。
back_translation: Moviegoers will be enchanted by the visual humor, just as the film mocks the flamboyant personal style of Harvey Weinstein, the chief of Miramax, and the rigorous style of the Danish doctrine movement.

text: bottom-rung new jack city wannabe .
translation: 底层的新杰克城仿效者。
back_translation: The imitator of the new Jack City at the bottom layer.

text: despite the fact that this film was n't as bad as i thought it was going to be , it 's still not a good movie
translation: 尽管这部电影比我想象中的要好，但它仍然不是一部好电影。
back_translation: Although this movie is better than I expected, it is still not a good movie.

text: but this time , the old mib label stands for milder is n't better .
translation: 但这次，旧的MIB标签代表“温和并不更好”。
back_translation: But this time, the old MIB label represents "mild is not better."

text: forget the misleading title , what 's with the unexplained baboon cameo ?
translation: 忘掉那个误导性的标题，那个未解释的狒狒出现有什么意思？
back_translation: Forget about that misleading title; what does the unexplained baboon's appearance mean?

text: it 's clotted with heavy-handed symbolism , dime-store psychology and endless scenic shots that make 105 minutes seem twice as long .
translation: 它充满了沉重的象征主义、廉价的心理学和无尽的风景镜头，让105分钟的时长似乎变成了两倍那么长。
back_translation: It is filled with heavy symbolism, cheap psychology, and endless landscape shots, making the 105-minute duration feel almost twice that long.

text: what 's surprising about this traditional thriller , moderately successful but not completely satisfying , is exactly how genteel and unsurprising the execution turns out to be .
translation: 这部传统惊悚片令人惊讶的是，尽管其适度成功但并不完全令人满意，最终的表现却显得如此温文尔雅和毫无惊喜。
back_translation: This traditional thriller is surprisingly moderate in its success, yet ultimately unsatisfying, with a final performance that feels so gentle and devoid of surprises.

text: yet another entry in the sentimental oh-those-wacky-brits genre that was ushered in by the full monty and is still straining to produce another smash hit .
translation: 又一个属于感性“哦，那些古怪的英国人”类型的作品，始于《全裸骑士》，至今仍在努力推出另一部轰动一时的作品。
back_translation: Another work in the sentimental "Oh, those quirky Brits" style, which began with "The Full Monty" and is still striving to release another sensational piece.

text: every conceivable mistake a director could make in filming opera has been perpetrated here .
translation: 在这里，导演在拍摄歌剧时可能犯下的每一个可想象的错误都被犯到了。
back_translation: Here, every imaginable mistake that the director could make while shooting the opera has been committed.

text: the film 's desire to be liked sometimes undermines the possibility for an exploration of the thornier aspects of the nature\/nurture argument in regards to homosexuality .
translation: 这部电影希望受到喜爱，有时会削弱对与同性恋相关的自然/培养论争的更棘手方面进行探索的可能性。
back_translation: This film hopes to be well-received, but sometimes this can weaken the possibility of exploring the more challenging aspects of the nature vs. nurture debate related to homosexuality.

text: a standard police-oriented drama that , were it not for de niro 's participation , would have likely wound up a tnt original .
translation: 一部标准的警察题材戏剧，如果不是因为德尼罗的参与，很可能会成为TNT的原创剧。
back_translation: A standard police drama, if not for De Niro's involvement, would likely have become an original show on TNT.

text: with notorious c.h.o. cho proves she has the stuff to stand tall with pryor , carlin and murphy .
translation: 凭借臭名昭著的C.H.O.，Cho证明了她有实力与Pryor、Carlin和Murphy并肩而立。
back_translation: With her notorious C.H.O., Cho has proven that she has the strength to stand shoulder to shoulder with Pryor, Carlin, and Murphy.

text: watching this film , one is left with the inescapable conclusion that hitchens ' obsession with kissinger is , at bottom , a sophisticated flower child 's desire to purge the world of the tooth and claw of human power .
translation: 看这部电影，人们不禁得出一个不可避免的结论：希钦斯对基辛格的痴迷，从根本上来说，是一个复杂的花孩对清除人类权力的残酷与争斗的渴望。
back_translation: Watching this movie, one cannot help but arrive at an inevitable conclusion: Hitchens' obsession with Kissinger is fundamentally a complex desire of a flower child yearning for the eradication of human power's cruelty and struggles.

text: e.t. works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: 《外星人E.T.》之所以成功，是因为其令人惊讶的主旨，14岁的罗伯特·麦克诺顿、6岁的德鲁·巴里摩尔和10岁的亨利·托马斯让我们相信这位来自遥远星球的聪慧访客的存在。
back_translation: The success of "E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial" is attributed to its astonishing themes, as 14-year-old Robert MacNaughton, 6-year-old Drew Barrymore, and 10-year-old Henry Thomas make us believe in the existence of this wise visitor from a distant planet.

text: yes , it 's as good as you remember .
translation: 是的，它跟你记忆中的一样好。
back_translation: Yes, it's just as good as you remember.

text: for veggietales fans , this is more appetizing than a side dish of asparagus .
translation: 对于蔬菜故事的粉丝来说，这比一旁的芦笋配菜更诱人。
back_translation: For fans of the vegetable story, this is more enticing than the side dish of asparagus.

text: full of detail about the man and his country , and is well worth seeing .
translation: 充满了关于这个人和他的国家的细节，值得一看。
back_translation: Filled with details about this person and his country, it is worth a look.

text: little more than a well-mounted history lesson .
translation: 不超过一堂准备充分的历史课。
back_translation: No more than a well-prepared history lesson.

text: peter jackson and company once again dazzle and delight us , fulfilling practically every expectation either a longtime tolkien fan or a movie-going neophyte could want .
translation: 彼得·杰克逊和他的团队再次让我们感到震撼和愉悦，几乎满足了所有长期托尔金迷或电影新手的期望。
back_translation: Peter Jackson and his team have once again amazed and delighted us, almost fulfilling the expectations of all long-time Tolkien fans or newcomers to the films.

text: this tale has been told and retold ; the races and rackets change , but the song remains the same .
translation: 这个故事已经被讲述和重述过多次；种族和骗局有所变化，但歌曲依然如故。
back_translation: This story has been told and retold many times; the races and schemes may vary, but the song remains the same.

text: a joyous occasion
translation: 一个快乐的时刻
back_translation: A happy moment.

text: -lrb- `` take care of my cat '' -rrb- is an honestly nice little film that takes us on an examination of young adult life in urban south korea through the hearts and minds of the five principals .
translation: 《照顾我的猫》是一部诚实而美好的小电影，通过五个主要角色的心灵与思想，带我们审视韩国城市年轻人的生活。
back_translation: "Taking Care of My Cat" is an honest and beautiful little film that takes us through the lives of young urbanites in Korea by exploring the hearts and minds of five main characters.

text: novak contemplates a heartland so overwhelmed by its lack of purpose that it seeks excitement in manufactured high drama .
translation: 诺瓦克思考着一个因为缺乏目标而感到不知所措的中心地带，以至于在制造的高戏剧中寻求刺激。
back_translation: Novak was contemplating a central zone overwhelmed by a lack of purpose, to the extent that he sought excitement in manufactured high drama.

text: one-of-a-kind near-masterpiece .
translation: 独一无二的接近杰作。
back_translation: A unique near-masterpiece.

text: trying to figure out the rules of the country bear universe -- when are bears bears and when are they like humans , only hairier -- would tax einstein 's brain .
translation: 试图弄清楚乡村熊宇宙的规则——熊什么时候是熊，什么时候又像人类，只是毛发更浓密——这将考验爱因斯坦的大脑。
back_translation: Trying to figure out the rules of the rural bear universe—when a bear is a bear and when it resembles a human, just with thicker fur—will test Einstein's brain.

text: a thoroughly engaging , surprisingly touching british comedy .
translation: 一部引人入胜、令人意外感动的英式喜剧。
back_translation: An engaging and unexpectedly touching British comedy.

text: you have no affinity for most of the characters .
translation: 你对大多数角色没有亲和力。
back_translation: You don't have affinity for most characters.

text: its salient points are simultaneously buried , drowned and smothered in the excesses of writer-director roger avary .
translation: 其显著要点在编剧兼导演罗杰·阿威瑞的过度表现中被同时埋没、淹没和压制。
back_translation: The significant points are simultaneously buried, submerged, and suppressed in the excessive performance of writer-director Roger Avary.

text: whether or not you buy mr. broomfield 's findings , the film acquires an undeniable entertainment value as the slight , pale mr. broomfield continues to force himself on people and into situations that would make lesser men run for cover .
translation: 无论你是否认同布鲁姆菲尔德先生的发现，这部电影的娱乐价值是不可否认的，因为那位瘦弱苍白的布鲁姆菲尔德先生继续强迫自己接触那些会让普通人逃之夭夭的人和情况。
back_translation: Regardless of whether you agree with Mr. Bloomfield's findings, the entertainment value of this film is undeniable, as the frail and pale Mr. Bloomfield continues to force himself into contact with people and situations that would make ordinary individuals flee.

text: a relentless , bombastic and ultimately empty world war ii action flick .
translation: 一部无情、夸张且最终空洞的二战动作片。
back_translation: A merciless, exaggerated, and ultimately hollow World War II action film.

text: charlotte sometimes is a brilliant movie .
translation: 《夏洛特有时》是一部出色的电影。
back_translation: "Charlotte Sometimes" is an outstanding film.

text: move over bond ; this girl deserves a sequel .
translation: 让位于邦德吧；这个女孩值得一个续集。
back_translation: Let’s give the role to Bond; this girl deserves a sequel.

text: an exceptionally dreary and overwrought bit of work , every bit as imperious as katzenberg 's the prince of egypt from 1998 .
translation: 一部异常沉闷和情绪过于激烈的作品，和卡岑伯格1998年的《埃及王子》一样极具霸权气息。
back_translation: An exceptionally dull work with overly intense emotions, it has a strong sense of dominance similar to Katzenberg's 1998 "The Prince of Egypt."

text: for a story set at sea , ghost ship is pretty landbound , with its leaden acting , dull exposition and telegraphed ` surprises . '
translation: 对于设定在海上的故事来说，幽灵船显得相当地面化，演技沉闷， exposition 乏味，且“惊喜”早已显而易见。
back_translation: For a story set at sea, the ghost ship feels quite mundane, the performances are dull, the exposition is tedious, and the "surprises" are already quite obvious.

text: congrats disney on a job well done , i enjoyed it just as much !
translation: 恭喜迪士尼，做得很好，我也同样享受其中！
back_translation: Congratulations to Disney, well done, I enjoyed it as well!

text: a muddy psychological thriller rife with miscalculations .
translation: 一部充满错判的泥泞心理惊悚片。
back_translation: A muddy psychological thriller full of misjudgments.

text: is it possible for a documentary to be utterly entranced by its subject and still show virtually no understanding of it ?
translation: 一部纪录片是否可能对其主题完全着迷，却几乎完全没有理解它？
back_translation: Is it possible for a documentary to be completely captivated by its subject while almost completely failing to understand it?

text: it 's a piece of handiwork that shows its indie tatters and self-conscious seams in places , but has some quietly moving moments and an intelligent subtlety .
translation: 这是一件手工作品，虽然在某些地方显示出它的独立痕迹和自我意识的缝线，但仍有一些 quietly moving 的时刻和聪明而微妙的细节。
back_translation: This is a handmade piece, which, although it shows signs of independence and self-awareness in some places, still contains moments that are quietly moving and has clever and subtle details.

text: the movie 's plot is almost entirely witless and inane , carrying every gag two or three times beyond its limit to sustain a laugh .
translation: 这部电影的情节几乎完全无趣且愚蠢，每个笑料都被拖延了两到三次，超出了引发笑声的极限。
back_translation: The plot of this movie is almost completely boring and stupid, with every joke dragged out two to three times, surpassing the limit of what could trigger laughter.

text: in between all the emotional seesawing , it 's hard to figure the depth of these two literary figures , and even the times in which they lived .
translation: 在所有情感的起伏之间，很难弄清这两位文学人物的深度，甚至他们生活的时代。
back_translation: Amid all the emotional ups and downs, it is difficult to grasp the depth of these two literary figures, or even the era in which they lived.

text: expect no major discoveries , nor any stylish sizzle , but the film sits with square conviction and touching good sense on the experience of its women .
translation: 期待没有重大发现，也没有时尚的火花，但这部电影以坚定的信念和感人的常识描绘了女性的经历。
back_translation: Expecting no major discoveries or fashionable sparks, this film depicts the experiences of women with unwavering belief and touching common sense.

text: an exit sign , that is .
translation: 一个出口标志。
back_translation: An exit sign.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the middle east struggle and into the humanity of its people .
translation: 精美的工艺和残酷的诚实让《承诺》为我们意外展现了中东冲突的复杂性，以及其人民的人性。
back_translation: The exquisite craftsmanship and brutal honesty of "The Commitment" unexpectedly reveal the complexity of the Middle Eastern conflict and the humanity of its people.

text: entirely suspenseful , extremely well-paced and ultimately ... dare i say , entertaining !
translation: 完全悬疑，节奏极佳，最终我敢说，令人娱乐！
back_translation: Completely suspenseful, with excellent pacing, and in the end... I dare say, it’s entertaining!

text: just dreadful .
translation: 真糟糕。
back_translation: Really terrible.

text: bill morrison 's decasia is uncompromising , difficult and unbearably beautiful .
translation: 比尔·莫里森的《衰败》是毫不妥协的，困难且令人难以承受的美丽。
back_translation: Bill Morrison's "Decadent" is uncompromising, difficult, and unbearably beautiful.

text: a superlative b movie -- funny , sexy , and rousing .
translation: 一部极佳的B级电影——搞笑、性感且振奋人心。
back_translation: A great B-movie—funny, sexy, and uplifting.

text: the advantage of a postapocalyptic setting is that it can be made on the cheap .
translation: 末日后世界的一个优势是可以低成本制作。
back_translation: One advantage of the post-apocalyptic world is the ability to produce at low cost.

text: yet another genre exercise , gangster no. 1 is as generic as its title .
translation: 又是一个类型练习，《黑帮老大1》的名字一样普通。
back_translation: It's another type of exercise, and the name "The Gangster Boss 1" is just as ordinary.

text: before it collapses into exactly the kind of buddy cop comedy it set out to lampoon , anyway .
translation: 在它崩溃成恰好是它想要嘲笑的那种兄弟警察喜剧之前，无论如何。
back_translation: Before it collapses into exactly the kind of buddy cop comedy it wants to mock, anyway.

text: ... while dark water is n't a complete wash -lrb- no pun intended -rrb- , watched side-by-side with ringu , it ultimately comes off as a pale successor .
translation: 虽然《黑水》并不是完全的失败（无意间的玩笑），与《午夜凶铃》并排观看时，它最终显得像一个苍白的继承者。
back_translation: ...although "Black Water" is not a complete failure (an unintentional joke), when watched alongside "The Ring," it ultimately appears as a pale successor.

text: plays out with a dogged and eventually winning squareness that would make it the darling of many a kids-and-family-oriented cable channel .
translation: 以一种顽强且最终取胜的方正性展现出来，这将使它成为许多面向儿童和家庭的有线频道的宠儿。
back_translation: It will showcase a tenacity that ultimately leads to victory, making it a favorite among many cable channels aimed at children and families.

text: one feels the dimming of a certain ambition , but in its place a sweetness , clarity and emotional openness that recalls the classics of early italian neorealism .
translation: 人们感受到某种雄心的减淡，但取而代之的是一种甜美、清晰和情感的开放，这让人想起早期意大利新现实主义的经典作品。
back_translation: People feel a fading of certain ambitions, but in their place is a sweetness, clarity, and emotional openness that recalls the classic works of early Italian neorealism.

text: the script 's judgment and sense of weight is way , way off .
translation: 剧本的判断和分量感完全不对。
back_translation: The judgment and weight of the script are completely off.

text: despite its dry wit and compassion , the film suffers from a philosophical emptiness and maddeningly sedate pacing .
translation: 尽管影片具有干练的幽默感和同情心，但它仍然受到哲学空虚和令人烦恼的缓慢节奏的困扰。
back_translation: Despite the film's sharp sense of humor and compassion, it is still plagued by philosophical emptiness and a frustratingly slow pace.

text: is a mess .
translation: 是一团糟。
back_translation: It's a mess.

text: adroit but finally a trifle flat , mad love does n't galvanize its outrage the way , say , jane campion might have done , but at least it possesses some .
translation: 巧妙但最终有些平淡，《疯狂的爱》并没有像简·坎皮恩那样激发起愤怒，但至少它有一些。
back_translation: Clever but ultimately a bit bland, "Crazy Love" does not evoke anger like Jane Campion, but at least it has some.

text: ... quite endearing .
translation: ... 相当令人心动。
back_translation: ... quite captivating.

text: hip-hop prison thriller of stupefying absurdity .
translation: 令人震惊荒谬的嘻哈监狱惊悚片。
back_translation: A shocking and absurd hip-hop prison thriller.

text: a domestic melodrama with weak dialogue and biopic cliches .
translation: 一部对话平淡且充满传记陈词滥调的家庭剧。
back_translation: A family drama with dull dialogue and full of biographical clichés.

text: a little better than sorcerer 's stone .
translation: 比《哈利·波特与魔法石》稍微好一点。
back_translation: A little better than "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone."

text: nothing short of wonderful with its ten-year-old female protagonist and its steadfast refusal to set up a dualistic battle between good and evil .
translation: 这部作品无疑是精彩的，拥有一个十岁女孩作为主角，并且坚定地拒绝设定善与恶之间的二元对立斗争。
back_translation: This work is undoubtedly exquisite, featuring a ten-year-old girl as the protagonist, who resolutely rejects the binary struggle between good and evil.

text: almost as offensive as `` freddy got fingered . ''
translation: 几乎和“弗雷迪被指控”一样令人反感。
back_translation: Almost as offensive as "Freddie was accused."

text: imagine susan sontag falling in love with howard stern .
translation: 想象苏珊·桑塔格爱上霍华德·斯特恩。
back_translation: Imagine Susan Sontag falling in love with Howard Stern.

text: there 's no point of view , no contemporary interpretation of joan 's prefeminist plight , so we 're left thinking the only reason to make the movie is because present standards allow for plenty of nudity .
translation: 没有视角，没有对琼的前女性主义困境的当代解读，因此我们只能认为拍摄这部电影的唯一理由是当前的标准允许大量的裸体。
back_translation: Without perspective and a contemporary interpretation of Jiong's previous feminist dilemmas, we can only assume that the sole reason for making this film is that current standards allow for a significant amount of nudity.

text: a listless sci-fi comedy in which eddie murphy deploys two guises and elaborate futuristic sets to no particularly memorable effect .
translation: 一部乏味的科幻喜剧，艾迪·墨菲在其中化身两个角色，使用华丽的未来场景，却没有产生特别令人难忘的效果。
back_translation: A dull sci-fi comedy in which Eddie Murphy takes on two roles, featuring glamorous futuristic scenes, but fails to create a particularly memorable effect.

text: renner carries much of the film with a creepy and dead-on performance .
translation: 瑞纳通过其令人毛骨悚然且精准的表演支撑了整部电影。
back_translation: Rena supported the entire film with her creepy yet precise performance.

text: the film fits into a genre that has been overexposed , redolent of a thousand cliches , and yet remains uniquely itself , vibrant with originality .
translation: 这部电影属于一个过度曝光的类型，充满了成千上万的陈词滥调，但它却保持着独特的自我，充满了原创性。
back_translation: This movie belongs to an overexposed genre, filled with thousands of clichés, yet it maintains a unique identity, brimming with originality.

text: the sequel plays out like a flimsy excuse to give blade fans another look at wesley snipes ' iconic hero doing battle with dozens of bad guys -- at once .
translation: 续集的情节像是一种薄弱的借口，让刀锋迷们再一次看到韦斯利·斯奈普斯扮演的标志性英雄与数十个坏人同时较量。
back_translation: The plot of the sequel feels like a weak excuse to let Blade fans see Wesley Snipes' iconic hero battle dozens of villains once again.

text: wendigo wants to be a monster movie for the art-house crowd , but it falls into the trap of pretention almost every time .
translation: 《温迪戈》想要成为一部迎合艺术电影观众的怪兽电影，但几乎每次都会陷入做作的陷阱。
back_translation: "Wendigo" aims to be a monster movie catering to art film audiences, but it almost always falls into the trap of being contrived.

text: steven soderbergh does n't remake andrei tarkovsky 's solaris so much as distill it .
translation: 史蒂文·索德伯格并不是在翻拍安德烈·塔尔科夫斯基的《太阳能》，而是对其进行提炼。
back_translation: Steven Soderbergh is not remaking Andrei Tarkovsky's "Solaris," but rather refining it.

text: a compelling yarn , but not quite a ripping one .
translation: 一个引人入胜的故事，但并不是一个令人惊叹的故事。
back_translation: An engaging story, but not an astounding one.

text: if routine action and jokes like this are your cup of tea , then pay your $ 8 and get ready for the big shear .
translation: 如果例行公事和这样的笑话是你的喜好，那么支付8美元，准备好迎接大剪刀吧。
back_translation: If routine tasks and jokes like this are your preference, then pay $8 and get ready for the big scissors.

text: tale will be all too familiar for anyone who 's seen george roy hill 's 1973 film , `` the sting . ''
translation: 这个故事对于任何看过乔治·罗伊·希尔1973年电影《魅影》的观众来说都将是非常熟悉的。
back_translation: This story will be very familiar to anyone who has seen George Roy Hill's 1973 film "The Phantom."

text: warm and exotic .
translation: 温暖而异国情调。
back_translation: Warm and exotic.

text: the movie 's blatant derivativeness is one reason it 's so lackluster .
translation: 这部电影的明显抄袭性是它乏善可陈的原因之一。
back_translation: The obvious plagiarism in this movie is one of the reasons why it is lackluster.

text: rehearsals are frequently more fascinating than the results .
translation: 排练通常比结果更令人着迷。
back_translation: Rehearsals are often more fascinating than the results.

text: like a grinning jack o ' lantern , its apparent glee is derived from a lobotomy , having had all its vital essence scooped out and discarded .
translation: 像一盏咧嘴笑的南瓜灯，它的明显欢乐源于一场脑叶切除术，所有的生命精华都被挖掘出来并丢弃。
back_translation: Like a grinning pumpkin lantern, its obvious joy stems from a lobotomy, where all the essence of life has been excavated and discarded.

text: a dazzling thing to behold -- as long as you 're wearing the somewhat cumbersome 3d goggles the theater provides .
translation: 一件令人眼花缭乱的景象——只要你戴上影院提供的有些笨重的3D眼镜。
back_translation: A dazzling spectacle—just as long as you wear the somewhat bulky 3D glasses provided by the cinema.

text: it 's a wonderful , sobering , heart-felt drama .
translation: 这是一个精彩、令人深思、发自内心的剧情。
back_translation: This is a brilliant, thought-provoking, and heartfelt storyline.

text: here 's yet another cool crime movie that actually manages to bring something new into the mix .
translation: 又是一部酷炫的犯罪电影，它确实成功地将一些新元素融入其中。
back_translation: It is another cool crime movie that successfully incorporates some new elements.

text: one of those movies that make us pause and think of what we have given up to acquire the fast-paced contemporary society .
translation: 那些让我们停下来思考为了获得快速节奏的现代社会而放弃了什么的电影之一。
back_translation: One of those films that makes us pause and think about what we have given up to achieve the fast pace of modern society.

text: done in mostly by a weak script that ca n't support the epic treatment .
translation: 主要是由于一个无法支撑史诗待遇的弱剧本所造成的。
back_translation: It is primarily caused by a weak script that cannot support an epic treatment.

text: unfortunately , kapur modernizes a.e.w. mason 's story to suit the sensibilities of a young american , a decision that plucks `` the four feathers '' bare .
translation: 不幸的是，卡普尔将A.E.W.梅森的故事现代化，以迎合年轻美国人的敏感性，这个决定让《四根羽毛》失去了应有的内涵。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Kapoor modernized A.E.W. Mason's story to cater to the sensibilities of young Americans, a decision that caused "The Four Feathers" to lose its intended depth.

text: uneven , self-conscious but often hilarious spoof .
translation: 不均匀，自我意识强但常常令人捧腹的恶搞。
back_translation: Uneven, with a strong self-awareness but often hilariously absurd parody.

text: deserving of its critical backlash and more .
translation: 值得受到批评的反击以及更多。
back_translation: Criticism-worthy backlash and more.

text: do we really need another film that praises female self-sacrifice ?
translation: 我们真的需要另一部赞美女性自我牺牲的电影吗？
back_translation: Do we really need another movie that praises women's self-sacrifice?

text: more mature than fatal attraction , more complete than indecent proposal and more relevant than 9 1\/2 weeks , unfaithful is at once intimate and universal cinema .
translation: 《不忠》比《致命诱惑》更成熟，比《不道德提案》更完整，比《九个半星期》更贴近生活，是一部既亲密又具有普遍性的电影。
back_translation: "Betrayal" is more mature than "Fatal Attraction," more complete than "Indecent Proposal," and closer to life than "9_ Weeks." It is a film that is both intimate and universal.

text: the wonder of mostly martha is the performance of gedeck , who makes martha enormously endearing .
translation: 《大厨玛莎》的奇妙之处在于盖德克的表演，她让玛莎变得非常迷人。
back_translation: The magic of "Chef Martha" lies in Gedek's performance, as she makes Martha very charming.

text: a battle between bug-eye theatre and dead-eye matinee .
translation: 虫眼剧院与死眼午间表演的战斗。
back_translation: The battle between the Insect Eye Theater and the Dead Eye Matinee performance.

text: like a tarantino movie with heart , alias betty is richly detailed , deftly executed and utterly absorbing .
translation: 像一部充满魅力的昆汀·塔伦蒂诺电影，《别名贝蒂》细节丰富，制作精良，令人完全沉醉。
back_translation: Like a captivating Quentin Tarantino film, "Alias Betty" is rich in detail, well-produced, and utterly mesmerizing.

text: it 's hard to say who might enjoy this , are there tolstoy groupies out there ?
translation: 很难说谁可能会喜欢这个，外面有没有托尔斯泰的粉丝？
back_translation: It's hard to say who might like this; are there any fans of Tolstoy out there?

text: this movie is to be cherished .
translation: 这部电影值得珍藏。
back_translation: This movie is worth cherishing.

text: in all fairness , i must report that the children of varying ages in my audience never coughed , fidgeted or romped up and down the aisles for bathroom breaks .
translation: 公平地说，我必须报告，我的观众中不同年龄的孩子们从未咳嗽、坐不住或在过道上跑来跑去上厕所。
back_translation: Fairly speaking, I must report that the different-aged children in my audience have never coughed, fidgeted, or run up and down the aisles to go to the bathroom.

text: the screenplay is hugely overwritten , with tons and tons of dialogue -- most of it given to children .
translation: 剧本过于冗长，对话过多——大部分台词都给了儿童角色。
back_translation: The script is overly lengthy, with too much dialogue—most of the lines are given to the child characters.

text: entertains not so much because of its music or comic antics , but through the perverse pleasure of watching disney scrape the bottom of its own cracker barrel .
translation: 它的娱乐性并不主要在于音乐或搞笑的滑稽，而是通过看迪士尼在自己的饼干桶底部刮擦所带来的反常快感。
back_translation: Its entertainment value does not primarily lie in the music or the humorous antics, but rather in the unusual pleasure brought by watching Disney scrape the bottom of its cookie jar.

text: ryan gosling ... is at 22 a powerful young actor .
translation: 瑞安·高斯林在22岁时是一位强大的年轻演员。
back_translation: Ryan Gosling was a powerful young actor at the age of 22.

text: i am highly amused by the idea that we have come to a point in society where it has been deemed important enough to make a film in which someone has to be hired to portray richard dawson .
translation: 我对这种观点感到非常 amused，我们社会已经到了一个阶段，认为拍摄一部必须聘请人来扮演理查德·道森的电影是多么重要。
back_translation: I find this viewpoint very amusing; our society has reached a stage where it's considered so important to hire someone to play Richard Dawson in a movie.

text: while this movie , by necessity , lacks fellowship 's heart , two towers outdoes its spectacle .
translation: 虽然这部电影在必然上缺乏《指环王：护戒使者》的核心情感，但《指环王：双塔复苏》的视觉盛宴却胜过它。
back_translation: Although this film inevitably lacks the core emotion of "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," the visual feast of "The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers" surpasses it.

text: for those who are intrigued by politics of the '70s , the film is every bit as fascinating as it is flawed .
translation: 对于那些对70年代政治感兴趣的人来说，这部电影既迷人又缺陷重重。
back_translation: For those interested in the politics of the 1970s, this film is both captivating and flawed.

text: an absorbing and unsettling psychological drama .
translation: 一部引人入胜且令人不安的心理剧。
back_translation: A captivating and unsettling psychological drama.

text: like the best of godard 's movies ... it is visually ravishing , penetrating , impenetrable .
translation: 就像戈达尔最佳的电影一样它在视觉上令人惊叹，深刻而又无法捉摸。
back_translation: Just like Godard's best films... it is visually stunning, profound, and elusive.

text: spare but quietly effective retelling .
translation: 简洁却悄然有效的重述。
back_translation: Concise yet quietly effective rephrasing.

text: the story that emerges has elements of romance , tragedy and even silent-movie comedy .
translation: 这个故事融合了浪漫、悲剧甚至无声电影喜剧的元素。
back_translation: This story combines elements of romance, tragedy, and even silent film comedy.

text: this is an insultingly inept and artificial examination of grief and its impacts upon the relationships of the survivors .
translation: 这是对悲痛及其对幸存者关系影响的侮辱性拙劣和人造的审视。
back_translation: This is an insulting, clumsy, and artificial examination of grief and its impact on the relationships of survivors.

text: it 's a strange film , one that was hard for me to warm up to .
translation: 这是一部奇怪的电影，让我很难产生共鸣。
back_translation: This is a strange movie that makes it hard for me to resonate with it.

text: a series of immaculately composed shots of patch adams quietly freaking out does not make for much of a movie .
translation: 一系列精心构图的帕奇·亚当斯安静地崩溃的镜头并不能构成一部出色的电影。
back_translation: A series of carefully composed shots of Patch Adams quietly falling apart does not make for an outstanding film.

text: harks back to a time when movies had more to do with imagination than market research .
translation: 回溯到一个电影更多依赖于想象力而非市场调研的时代。
back_translation: Back to an era when movies relied more on imagination than market research.

text: all the queen 's men is a throwback war movie that fails on so many levels , it should pay reparations to viewers .
translation: 《所有女王的男人》是一部怀旧战争电影，失败了很多层面，应该向观众赔偿。
back_translation: "The Men of All Queens" is a nostalgic war film that fails on many levels and should compensate the audience.

text: fessenden 's narrative is just as much about the ownership and redefinition of myth as it is about a domestic unit finding their way to joy .
translation: 费森登的叙述不仅关乎神话的拥有和重新定义，也关乎一个家庭单位如何找到快乐。
back_translation: Feisenden's narrative is not only about the possession and redefinition of myths, but also about how a family unit finds happiness.

text: the exclamation point seems to be the only bit of glee you 'll find in this dreary mess .
translation: 感叹号似乎是你在这满是阴郁的混乱中能找到的唯一一丝快乐。
back_translation: The exclamation mark seems to be the only trace of joy you can find in this chaotic gloom.

text: a banal , virulently unpleasant excuse for a romantic comedy .
translation: 一个平庸、刻薄的浪漫喜剧借口。
back_translation: A mediocre, bitter excuse for a romantic comedy.

text: a must see for all sides of the political spectrum
translation: 所有政治光谱各方都必看的佳作
back_translation: A must-watch masterpiece for all sides of the political spectrum.

text: the storylines are woven together skilfully , the magnificent swooping aerial shots are breathtaking , and the overall experience is awesome .
translation: 故事情节巧妙地交织在一起，壮观的俯瞰镜头令人屏息，总体体验令人赞叹。
back_translation: The storyline is cleverly interwoven, the spectacular overhead shots are breathtaking, and the overall experience is awe-inspiring.

text: skip the film and buy the philip glass soundtrack cd .
translation: 跳过电影，买菲利普·格拉斯的原声带CD。
back_translation: Skip the movie and buy the soundtrack CD by Philip Glass.

text: ... unspeakably , unbearably dull , featuring reams of flatly delivered dialogue and a heroine who comes across as both shallow and dim-witted .
translation: 难以言喻地、无法忍受地乏味，充满了平淡无奇的对话和一个显得浅薄且愚蠢的女主角。
back_translation: ...indescribably and unbearably dull, filled with mundane conversations and a protagonist who appears shallow and foolish.

text: forages for audience sympathy like a temperamental child begging for attention , giving audiences no reason to truly care for its decrepit freaks beyond the promise of a reprieve from their incessant whining .
translation: 像一个脾气不好的孩子乞求关注一样，向观众乞求同情，让观众没有理由真正关心其破旧的怪物，除了能够从他们无休止的抱怨中得到片刻的解脱。
back_translation: Like a temperamental child begging for attention, it pleads for sympathy from the audience, leaving them with no real reason to truly care about its worn-out monstrosity, except for the brief relief they can obtain from its endless complaints.

text: an action\/thriller of the finest kind , evoking memories of day of the jackal , the french connection , and heat .
translation: 一部顶尖的动作/ thriller，唤起了《杰卡尔的日子》、《法国链接》和《热情》 的回忆。
back_translation: A top-notch action/thriller that evokes memories of "Days of Jekyll," "The French Connection," and "Passion."

text: beyond the cleverness , the weirdness and the pristine camerawork , one hour photo is a sobering meditation on why we take pictures .
translation: 超越聪明、有趣和纯净的摄影技巧，《一小时快照》是一部关于我们为何拍照的严肃思考。
back_translation: Beyond clever, interesting, and pure photographic techniques, "One Hour Snapshot" is a serious reflection on why we take photographs.

text: the best part about `` gangs '' was daniel day-lewis .
translation: 《黑帮》的最佳部分是丹尼尔·戴·刘易斯。
back_translation: The best part of "The Gangster" is Daniel Day-Lewis.

text: ... hypnotically dull .
translation: ... 催眠般的无聊。
back_translation: ... hypnotically boring.

text: we ca n't accuse kung pow for misfiring , since it is exactly what it wants to be : an atrociously , mind-numbingly , indescribably bad movie .
translation: 我们不能指责《功夫鸡》失误，因为它正是它想要的样子：一部极其糟糕、令人无聊、无法形容的坏电影。
back_translation: We cannot blame "Kung Fu Chicken" for its shortcomings, because it is exactly what it aims to be: an extremely terrible, boring, and indescribably bad movie.

text: but then again , i hate myself most mornings .
translation: 但话又说回来，我大多数早晨都讨厌自己。
back_translation: But on the other hand, I mostly hate myself in the mornings.

text: although purportedly a study in modern alienation , it 's really little more than a particularly slanted , gay s\/m fantasy , enervating and deadeningly drawn-out .
translation: 尽管名义上是一项关于现代疏离的研究，但它实际上不过是一场特别偏向的、同性恋的SM幻想，令人疲惫且冗长乏味。
back_translation: Although nominally a study on modern alienation, it is in fact just a particularly biased, gay BDSM fantasy that is exhausting and tedious.

text: it can be safely recommended as a video\/dvd babysitter .
translation: 可以安全地推荐作为视频/ DVD 保姆。
back_translation: It can be safely recommended as a video/DVD babysitter.

text: the movie should jolt you out of your seat a couple of times , give you a few laughs , and leave you feeling like it was worth your seven bucks , even though it does turn out to be a bit of a cheat in the end .
translation: 这部电影应该会让你几次从座位上惊跳起来，给你带来几分欢笑，并让你觉得七块钱的票价物有所值，尽管它最后确实有点让人感到失望。
back_translation: This movie will probably make you jump out of your seat a few times, bring you some laughs, and make you feel that the seven-dollar ticket price is worth it, even though it does end up being a bit disappointing.

text: part of the film 's cheeky charm comes from its vintage schmaltz .
translation: 电影部分的调皮魅力来自于其复古的过度感情。
back_translation: The playful charm of the film comes from its retro excess of emotion.

text: a fun family movie that 's suitable for all ages -- a movie that will make you laugh , cry and realize , ` it 's never too late to believe in your dreams . '
translation: 一部适合各个年龄段的有趣家庭电影——一部会让你笑、哭并意识到“相信你的梦想永远不嫌晚”的电影。
back_translation: A fun family movie suitable for all ages—a film that will make you laugh, cry, and realize that "it's never too late to believe in your dreams."

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .
translation: 与大多数动漫不同，外部狂热粉丝似乎主要是喜欢幻想的内向年轻男性，《大都会》从未显得十分幼稚。
back_translation: Unlike most anime, "Metropolis" never seems very childish, as its external fanbase primarily consists of introverted young men who enjoy fantasy.

text: there is something that is so meditative and lyrical about babak payami 's boldly quirky iranian drama secret ballot ... a charming and evoking little ditty that manages to show the gentle and humane side of middle eastern world politics
translation: 关于巴巴克·帕亚米大胆独特的伊朗戏剧《秘密投票》，有一种如此冥想和抒情的感觉这是一个迷人而富有感染力的小曲，成功展示了中东世界政治中温柔和人性的一面。
back_translation: Regarding Babak Payami's bold and unique Iranian play "Secret Ballot," there is such a meditative and lyrical feeling... It is a charming and infectious piece that successfully showcases the gentleness and humanity within the politics of the Middle East.

text: it winds up moving in many directions as it searches -lrb- vainly , i think -rrb- for something fresh to say .
translation: 它不断地向多个方向移动，试图寻找一些新的说法 -（我认为这是徒劳的）-。
back_translation: It constantly moves in multiple directions, trying to find some new expressions - (I think this is futile) -.

text: it 's as if de palma spent an hour setting a fancy table and then served up kraft macaroni and cheese .
translation: 就像德帕尔马花了一个小时摆设一个华丽的餐桌，然后却上了速食麦片和奶酪。
back_translation: Just like De Palma spent an hour setting a beautiful dining table, only to serve fast food cereal and cheese.

text: with or without the sex , a wonderful tale of love and destiny , told well by a master storyteller
translation: 无论是否涉及性，这都是一个关于爱情和命运的美妙故事，由一位大师级讲述者娓娓道来。
back_translation: Whether it involves sex or not, this is a wonderful story about love and fate, told eloquently by a master storyteller.

text: rifkin no doubt fancies himself something of a hubert selby jr. , but there is n't an ounce of honest poetry in his entire script ; it 's simply crude and unrelentingly exploitative .
translation: 里夫金无疑自以为是某种休伯特·塞尔比的角色，但他的整部剧本中没有一丝诚实的诗意；它只是粗糙且毫不留情地剥削。
back_translation: Rifkin undoubtedly considers himself some sort of Hubert Selby character, but there is not a shred of honest poetry in his entire script; it is merely crude and ruthlessly exploitative.

text: but it 's defiantly and delightfully against the grain .
translation: 但这无疑是令人愉悦的反常。

text: ` matrix ' - style massacres erupt throughout ... but the movie has a tougher time balancing its violence with kafka-inspired philosophy .

text: -lrb- toback 's -rrb- fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard ... blends uneasily with the titillating material .

back_translation: The lavish split screens, stuttering edits, and pretentious quotes from Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard are not very compatible with the stimulating material.

text: at a time when commercialism has squeezed the life out of whatever idealism american moviemaking ever had , godfrey reggio 's career shines like a lonely beacon .

text: elegant and eloquent -lrb- meditation -rrb- on death and that most elusive of passions , love .

text: weird .
translation: 奇怪。

text: -lrb- clooney 's -rrb- debut can be accused of being a bit undisciplined , but it has a tremendous , offbeat sense of style and humor that suggests he was influenced by some of the filmmakers who have directed him , especially the coen brothers and steven soderbergh .
translation: #NAME?

translation: 将其与非常糟糕的喜剧写作结合在一起你就得到了一团糟。

translation: 尼克尔比小姐以如此不屈的迪更斯式的体面庆祝人类精神，这让我感到震惊！

text: romanek 's themes are every bit as distinctive as his visuals .

text: ... an airless , prepackaged julia roberts wannabe that stinks so badly of hard-sell image-mongering you 'll wonder if lopez 's publicist should share screenwriting credit .

text: your children will be occupied for 72 minutes .

text: exciting and well-paced .

text: the amazing film work is so convincing that by movies ' end you 'll swear you are wet in some places and feel sand creeping in others .

text: femme fatale offers nothing more than a bait-and-switch that is beyond playing fair with the audience .

text: combines sharp comedy , old-fashioned monster movie atmospherics , and genuine heart to create a film that 's not merely about kicking undead \*\*\* , but also about dealing with regret and , ultimately , finding redemption .

back_translation: It combines sharp comedy, the atmosphere of classic monster movies, and genuine emotion to create a film that is not just about kicking undead creatures, but about dealing with regrets and ultimately finding redemption.

text: just a bunch of good actors flailing around in a caper that 's neither original nor terribly funny .
translation: 只是一群优秀演员在一场既不新颖也不怎么有趣的拦截中挣扎。

text: the movie does its best to work us over , with second helpings of love , romance , tragedy , false dawns , real dawns , comic relief , two separate crises during marriage ceremonies , and the lush scenery of the cotswolds .
translation: 这部电影尽力打动我们，带来爱情、浪漫、悲剧、虚假的曙光、真实的曙光、幽默的调节，婚礼仪式中的两个独立危机，以及科茨沃尔德的迷人风景。

text: rodriguez does a splendid job of racial profiling hollywood style -- casting excellent latin actors of all ages -- a trend long overdue .

translation: 更可能让你摸不着头脑而不是躲在椅子下面。

text: despite its flaws ... belinsky is still able to create an engaging story that keeps you guessing at almost every turn .

text: the script boasts some tart tv-insider humor , but the film has not a trace of humanity or empathy .

text: though it 's not very well shot or composed or edited , the score is too insistent and the dialogue is frequently overwrought and crudely literal , the film shatters you in waves .
translation: 尽管这部电影的拍摄、构图和剪辑都不太出色，音乐过于强烈，台词经常过于夸张和直白，但它仍然以波浪般的方式让你崩溃。
back_translation: Although the shooting, composition, and editing of this movie are not very outstanding, the music is overly intense, and the dialogue is often exaggerated and straightforward, it still breaks you down in a wave-like manner.

text: satin rouge is not a new , or inventive , journey , but it 's encouraging to see a three-dimensional , average , middle-aged woman 's experience of self-discovery handled with such sensitivity .
translation: 红色缎面并不是一次新的或有创意的旅程，但看到一个三维的、普通的、中年女性的自我发现经历以如此敏感的方式处理，令人鼓舞。
back_translation: The red satin is not a new or creative journey, but it is inspiring to see a three-dimensional, ordinary, middle-aged woman's self-discovery experience handled in such a sensitive way.

text: due to stodgy , soap opera-ish dialogue , the rest of the cast comes across as stick figures reading lines from a teleprompter .
translation: 由于对话显得沉闷且像肥皂剧，其他演员看起来像是在读提词器上的台词的木偶人物。
back_translation: The dialogue seems dull and like a soap opera, and the other actors appear to be puppet-like figures reading lines from a teleprompter.

text: it 's so crammed with scenes and vistas and pretty moments that it 's left a few crucial things out , like character development and coherence .
translation: 它充满了场景、风景和美好时刻，却缺少了一些关键的东西，比如角色发展和连贯性。
back_translation: It is full of scenes, landscapes, and beautiful moments, but lacks some key elements, such as character development and coherence.

text: a hypnotic cyber hymn and a cruel story of youth culture .
translation: 一首催眠的网络圣歌和一个残酷的青春文化故事。

text: no thanks .
translation: 不用谢。

text: delia , greta , and paula rank as three of the most multilayered and sympathetic female characters of the year .
translation: 德莉亚、格蕾塔和宝拉被评为今年最复杂、最令人同情的女性角色中的三位。
back_translation: Delia, Greta, and Paula have been recognized as three of the most complex and sympathetic female characters of the year.

text: action - mechanical .
translation: 机械动作。
back_translation: Mechanical action.

text: another wholly unnecessary addition to the growing , moldering pile of , well , extreme stunt pictures .
translation: 另一个完全不必要的补充，添加到越来越多、逐渐腐烂的极限特技电影的堆积中。
back_translation: Another completely unnecessary addition to the growing pile of increasingly decaying extreme stunt films.

text: this would have been better than the fiction it has concocted , and there still could have been room for the war scenes .
translation: 这本来会比它所编造的虚构故事更好，仍然可以留出空间用于战争场景。

text: it 's a bad sign in a thriller when you instantly know whodunit .
translation: 在惊悚片中，当你立刻知道凶手是谁时，这是个坏兆头。

text: while the production details are lavish , film has little insight into the historical period and its artists , particularly in how sand developed a notorious reputation .
translation: 尽管制作细节华丽，但电影对历史时期及其艺术家的洞察力很少，特别是在沙子如何发展出恶名方面。
back_translation: Despite the exquisite production details, the film offers little insight into the historical period or its artists, particularly in how sand gained its notorious reputation.

text: although olivier assayas ' elegantly appointed period drama seems , at times , padded with incident in the way of a too-conscientious adaptation ... its three-hour running time plays closer to two .
translation: 尽管奥利维尔·阿萨亚斯的优雅年代剧在某些时候似乎因过于尽责的改编而充满插曲，但其三小时的片长实际上更接近两小时。

text: the moral shrapnel and mental shellshock will linger long after this film has ended .
translation: 道德碎片和心理冲击将会在这部电影结束后长时间萦绕。

text: overall , it 's a very entertaining , thought-provoking film with a simple message : god is love .
translation: 总的来说，这是一部非常有趣、引人深思的电影，传达了一个简单的信息：上帝是爱。
