text: some movies were made for the big screen , some for the small screen , and some , like ballistic : ecks vs. sever , were made for the palm screen .
translation: 有些电影是为大银幕制作的，有些是为小银幕制作的，还有一些，比如《弹道：埃克斯大战塞弗》，是为掌中屏制作的。
back_translation: Some films are made for the big screen, some for the small screen, and some, like "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever," are made for the handheld screen.

text: a confident , richly acted , emotionally devastating piece of work and 2002 's first great film
translation: 一部自信、表演丰富、情感深刻的作品，也是2002年的第一部伟大电影。
back_translation: A confident, richly performed, and deeply emotional work, it is also the first great film of 2002.

text: labute 's careful handling makes the material seem genuine rather than pandering .
translation: 拉布特的细心处理使得材料看起来真实而不是迎合。
back_translation: Labute's careful handling makes the material appear authentic rather than contrived.

text: the whole film has this sneaky feel to it -- as if the director is trying to dupe the viewer into taking it all as very important simply because the movie is ugly to look at and not a hollywood product .
translation: 整部电影给人一种偷偷摸摸的感觉——仿佛导演试图让观众因为电影的视觉效果丑陋且不是好莱坞制品而误以为这一切都很重要。
back_translation: The whole movie gives a sneaky feeling - as if the director is trying to make the audience mistakenly think that everything is significant because of the film's ugly visual effects and that it is not a Hollywood product.

text: an inelegant combination of two unrelated shorts that falls far short of the director 's previous work in terms of both thematic content and narrative strength .
translation: 两部无关短片的不雅结合，在主题内容和叙事力量上都远不及导演之前的作品。
back_translation: The inappropriate combination of two unrelated short films falls far short of the director's previous works in terms of thematic content and narrative power.

text: ... a funny yet dark and seedy clash of cultures and generations .
translation: ... 一场有趣却黑暗、肮脏的文化与代际冲突。
back_translation: ... an interesting yet dark and dirty clash of culture and generations.

text: as tricky and satisfying as any of david mamet 's airless cinematic shell games .
translation: 像大卫·马梅特（David Mamet）没有空气的电影壳游戏一样既复杂又令人满意。
back_translation: As complex and satisfying as David Mamet's movie "Oleanna," which lacks air.

text: the story is smart and entirely charming in intent and execution .
translation: 这个故事聪明而迷人，在意图和执行上都表现得很出色。
back_translation: This story is clever and enchanting, excelling in both intent and execution.

text: the action clich茅s just pile up .
translation: 动作 clichés 一直堆积。
back_translation: Action clichés have been piling up.

text: not only does the thoroughly formulaic film represent totally exemplify middle-of-the-road mainstream , it also represents glossy hollywood at its laziest .
translation: 这部极具公式化的电影不仅完全体现了中规中矩的主流风格，而且还代表了好莱坞最懒惰的一面。
back_translation: This highly formulaic film not only fully embodies the conventional mainstream style but also represents the laziest side of Hollywood.

text: a delicious and delicately funny look at the residents of a copenhagen neighborhood coping with the befuddling complications life tosses at them .
translation: 这是对哥本哈根一个社区居民在应对生活带来的困扰和复杂问题时，既美味又微妙搞笑的观察。
back_translation: This is a deliciously subtle and humorous observation of a community resident in Copenhagen dealing with the troubles and complexities of life.

text: if ever a concept came handed down from the movie gods on a silver platter , this is it .
translation: 如果有一个概念是从电影神灵那里以银盘奉上的，那就是这个。
back_translation: If there is a concept that is served on a silver platter from the gods of cinema, it is this.

text: you may be captivated , as i was , by its moods , and by its subtly transformed star , and still wonder why paul thomas anderson ever had the inclination to make the most sincere and artful movie in which adam sandler will probably ever appear .
translation: 你可能会像我一样，被它的情绪所迷住，被它微妙变化的明星所吸引，仍然会想知道保罗·托马斯·安德森为什么会有这样的倾向，去制作亚当·桑德勒可能会出演的最真诚和最艺术的电影。
back_translation: You might, like me, be captivated by its emotions and drawn to its subtly changing stars, still wondering why Paul Thomas Anderson has the tendency to create the most sincere and artistic films that Adam Sandler might star in.

text: `` brown sugar '' admirably aspires to be more than another `` best man '' clone by weaving a theme throughout this funny film .
translation: ``红糖'' 令人钦佩地渴望成为不仅仅是另一个 ``伴郎'' 模式，通过在这部搞笑电影中编织一个主题。
back_translation: "Brown sugar" admirably aspires to be more than just another "groomsman" model by weaving a theme into this comedy film.

text: highlighted by a gritty style and an excellent cast , it 's better than one might expect when you look at the list of movies starring ice-t in a major role .
translation: 以生动的风格和出色的演员阵容为特色，当你查看冰T在主要角色中出演的电影名单时，这部影片比你预期的要更好。
back_translation: Featuring a lively style and an outstanding cast, this film is better than you expect when you look at the list of movies in which Ice-T plays a major role.

text: gently humorous and touching .
translation: 温柔幽默且感人。
back_translation: Gentle, humorous, and touching.

text: puportedly `` based on true events , '' a convolution of language that suggests it 's impossible to claim that it is `` based on a true story '' with a straight face .
translation: 据称“基于真实事件”，这种语言的复杂性暗示着，很难以直截了当的态度声称它是“基于真实故事”的。
back_translation: It is said to be "based on true events," and the complexity of the language suggests that it is difficult to straightforwardly claim that it is "based on a true story."

text: vulgar is too optimistic a title .
translation: “粗俗”这个标题过于乐观。
back_translation: The title "vulgar" is overly optimistic.

text: `` the adventures of pluto nash '' is a big time stinker .
translation: 《普鲁托·纳什的冒险》是一部烂片。
back_translation: "Pluto Nash's Adventure" is a terrible movie.

text: visually captivating .
translation: 视觉上吸引人。
back_translation: Visually appealing.

text: as each of them searches for their place in the world , miller digs into their very minds to find an unblinking , flawed humanity .
translation: 随着他们每个人在世界上寻找自己的位置，米勒深入他们的内心，发现了不妥协的、有缺陷的人性。
back_translation: As each of them searches for their place in the world, Miller delves deep into their hearts, discovering uncompromising and flawed humanity.

text: writer-director stephen gaghan has made the near-fatal mistake of being what the english call ` too clever by half . '
translation: 编剧兼导演史蒂芬·盖根犯了一个接近致命的错误，就是英人所说的“聪明过头了”。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Stephen Gaghan made a nearly fatal mistake, what the English call "overthinking."

text: for the future , one hopes mr. plympton will find room for one more member of his little band , a professional screenwriter .
translation: 对于未来，人们希望普林普顿先生能为他的小团队找到一个专业编剧的名额。
back_translation: People hope that Mr. Plimpton can find a position for a professional screenwriter for his small team in the future.

text: the story plays out slowly , but the characters are intriguing and realistic .
translation: 这个故事展开得很慢，但角色们既引人入胜又现实。
back_translation: The story unfolds slowly, but the characters are both engaging and realistic.

text: very predictable but still entertaining
translation: 非常可预测但仍然 entretenido
back_translation: Very predictable but still entertaining.

text: if you 're not a fan , it might be like trying to eat brussels sprouts .
translation: 如果你不是粉丝，那可能就像尝试吃球芽甘蓝一样。
back_translation: If you're not a fan, it might feel like trying to eat Brussels sprouts.

text: has far more energy , wit and warmth than should be expected from any movie with a `` 2 '' at the end of its title .
translation: 比起任何以“2”结尾的电影，这部电影拥有更多的能量、机智和温暖。
back_translation: Compared to any movie that ends with "2," this film has more energy, wit, and warmth.

text: mr. deeds is sure to give you a lot of laughs in this simple , sweet and romantic comedy .
translation: 《德兹先生》一定会在这部简单、甜美而浪漫的喜剧中给你带来很多笑声。
back_translation: "Mr. Diz" will definitely bring you a lot of laughter in this simple, sweet, and romantic comedy.

text: it all seemed wasted like deniro 's once promising career and the once grand long beach boardwalk .
translation: 这一切看起来都是徒劳的，就像德尼罗曾经前途光明的事业和曾经辉煌的长滩海滨长廊。
back_translation: All of this seems futile, like De Niro's once-promising career and the former glory of the Long Beach Boardwalk.

text: its gentle , touching story creeps into your heart .
translation: 它温柔动人的故事悄悄走进你的心里。
back_translation: Its gentle and touching story quietly enters your heart.

text: armed with a game supporting cast , from the pitch-perfect forster to the always hilarious meara and levy , like mike shoots and scores , doing its namesake proud .
translation: 配备了一支出色的配角阵容，从精准无误的福斯特到总是搞笑的米拉和莱维，《像麦克一样》射门得分，真正让它的名字熠熠生辉。
back_translation: Equipped with an outstanding supporting cast, from the precise Foster to the always hilarious Mira and Levi, "Like Mike" truly shines with its name.

text: ... works on some levels and is certainly worth seeing at least once .
translation: ... 在某些层面上是有效的，至少值得看一次。
back_translation: ... is effective on some levels, and is at least worth watching once.

text: a potentially good comic premise and excellent cast are terribly wasted .
translation: 一个潜在的好漫画主题和出色的演员阵容被严重浪费了。
back_translation: A potentially good comic theme and an excellent cast were severely wasted.

text: a small gem from belgium .
translation: 比利时的一颗小宝石。
back_translation: A little gem in Belgium.

text: the characters are complex and quirky , but entirely believable as the remarkable ensemble cast brings them to life .
translation: 角色复杂而古怪，但完全可信，因为卓越的配角阵容使他们栩栩如生。
back_translation: The characters are complex and quirky, but totally believable, as the outstanding supporting cast brings them to life.

text: worth a look as a curiosity .
translation: 值得一看，作为一个好奇。
back_translation: Worth a look, out of curiosity.

text: if you 've got a house full of tots -- do n't worry , this will be on video long before they grow up and you can wait till then .
translation: 如果你家里有一群小孩——别担心，这段视频在他们长大之前就会录好了，你可以等到那时再看。
back_translation: If you have a group of kids at home — don’t worry, this video will be recorded before they grow up, and you can wait until then to watch it.

text: eddie murphy and owen wilson have a cute partnership in i spy , but the movie around them is so often nearly nothing that their charm does n't do a load of good .
translation: 艾迪·墨菲和欧文·威尔逊在《我间谍》中有着可爱的合作，但围绕他们的电影往往几乎毫无内容，以至于他们的魅力并没有发挥太大的作用。
back_translation: Eddie Murphy and Owen Wilson have a delightful collaboration in "I Spy," but the films surrounding them often lack substance to such an extent that their charm doesn't make much of an impact.

text: short and sweet , but also more than anything else slight ... tadpole pulls back from the consequences of its own actions and revelations .
translation: 简短而甜蜜，但更重要的是略显微不足道蝌蚪对于自己行为和揭示的后果感到退缩。
back_translation: Short and sweet, but more importantly, slightly trivial... The tadpole feels hesitant about its actions and the consequences revealed.

text: poignant and delicately complex .
translation: 感人且细腻复杂。
back_translation: Touching and intricately complex.

text: and we do n't avert our eyes for a moment .
translation: 我们片刻也不转移视线。
back_translation: We do not shift our gaze for even a moment.

text: simply and eloquently articulates the tangled feelings of particular new yorkers deeply touched by an unprecedented tragedy .
translation: 简洁而优雅地表达了特定纽约人因前所未有的悲剧而深受触动的复杂情感。
back_translation: It expresses in a concise and elegant manner the complex emotions of certain New Yorkers who are deeply touched by an unprecedented tragedy.

text: ... could easily be called the best korean film of 2002 .
translation: ... 可以轻松称为2002年最佳韩国电影。
back_translation: ... can easily be called the best Korean movie of 2002.

text: the title , alone , should scare any sane person away .
translation: 这个标题本身就应该让任何理智的人感到害怕。
back_translation: This title itself should make any rational person feel scared.

text: for all the time we spend with these people , we never really get inside of them .
translation: 在我们与这些人共度的所有时光中，我们从未真正走进他们的内心。
back_translation: In all the time we spent with these people, we never really got into their hearts.

text: it does n't matter that the film is less than 90 minutes .
translation: 电影少于90分钟并不重要。
back_translation: The duration of the movie being less than 90 minutes is not important.

text: the plot is paper-thin and the characters are n't interesting enough to watch them go about their daily activities for two whole hours .
translation: 情节薄弱，角色也没有足够的趣味，无法让人忍受他们的日常活动长达两个小时。
back_translation: The plot is weak, and the characters lack sufficient interest, making it unbearable to endure their daily activities for two hours.

text: the film is a hoot , and is just as good , if not better than much of what 's on saturday morning tv especially the pseudo-educational stuff we all ca n't stand .
translation: 这部电影非常有趣，和大多数星期六早晨的电视节目一样好，甚至比我们都讨厌的那些伪教育节目还要好。
back_translation: This movie is very interesting, just as good as most Saturday morning TV shows, and even better than those so-called educational programs that we all hate.

text: the ending feels at odds with the rest of the film .
translation: 结局与整部电影的其余部分感觉不协调。
back_translation: The ending feels inconsistent with the rest of the movie.

text: in the end there is one word that best describes this film : honest .
translation: 最后有一个词可以最好地描述这部电影：真诚。
back_translation: In the end, there is one word that best describes this movie: sincerity.

text: the movie barely makes sense , with its unbelievable na茂vet茅 and arbitrary flashbacks .
translation: 这部电影简直没什么道理，充满了令人难以置信的天真和随意的闪回。
back_translation: This movie is simply nonsensical, filled with incredibly naive and random flashbacks.

text: it 's a quirky , off-beat project .
translation: 这是一个古怪而独特的项目。
back_translation: This is a quirky and unique project.

text: if you can get past the taboo subject matter , it will be well worth your time .
translation: 如果你能超越这个禁忌话题，它将值得你花时间。
back_translation: If you can go beyond this taboo topic, it will be worth your time.

text: coy but exhilarating , with really solid performances by ving rhames and wesley snipes .
translation: 害羞但令人振奋，文·瑞姆斯和韦斯利·斯奈普斯的表演都相当出色。
back_translation: Shy yet exhilarating, the performances of Will Remes and Wesley Snipes are quite outstanding.

text: starts slowly , but adrien brody -- in the title role -- helps make the film 's conclusion powerful and satisfying .
translation: 开头缓慢，但阿德里安·布罗迪在主角中帮助使影片的结局强而有力、令人满意。
back_translation: The beginning is slow, but Adrien Brody helps make the ending of the film powerful and satisfying.

text: feeble comedy .
translation: 弱小的喜剧。
back_translation: Weak comedy.

text: no amount of blood and disintegrating vampire cadavers can obscure this movie 's lack of ideas .
translation: 再多的鲜血和化为灰烬的吸血鬼尸体也无法掩盖这部电影缺乏创意的事实。
back_translation: No amount of blood and ashes from vampire corpses can hide the fact that this movie lacks creativity.

text: ... the good and different idea -lrb- of middle-aged romance -rrb- is not handled well and , except for the fine star performances , there is little else to recommend `` never again . ''
translation: 中年浪漫这个好的且不同的想法处理得不好，除了优秀的明星表演外，几乎没有其他值得推荐的地方“再也不见”。
back_translation: The idea of middle-aged romance, which is good and different, is poorly handled; aside from the excellent performances by the stars, there is almost nothing else worth recommending about "Never Again."

text: would that greengrass had gone a tad less for grit and a lot more for intelligibility .
translation: 希望格林格拉斯能稍微少一点咄咄逼人，多一点可理解性。
back_translation: I hope Greengrass can be a bit less aggressive and have a bit more understandability.

text: sadly , as blood work proves , that was a long , long time ago .
translation: 可悲的是，血液检测证明，那已经是很久很久以前的事了。
back_translation: Sadly, blood tests proved that it was a long, long time ago.

text: the performers are so spot on , it is hard to conceive anyone else in their roles .
translation: 演员们表现得如此出色，让人很难想象其他人能够胜任他们的角色。
back_translation: The actors performed so excellently that it's hard to imagine anyone else being able to take on their roles.

text: the first mistake , i suspect , is casting shatner as a legendary professor and kunis as a brilliant college student -- where 's pauly shore as the rocket scientist ?
translation: 我怀疑第一个错误是让香农扮演一位传奇教授，而让库尼斯扮演一位出色的大学生——保利·肖尔作为火箭科学家在哪里呢？
back_translation: I suspect the first mistake was casting Shannon as a legendary professor while casting Kunis as an excellent college student—where is Pauly Shore as the rocket scientist?

text: wise and deadpan humorous .
translation: 睿智且冷面幽默。
back_translation: Wise and coolly humorous.

text: twenty-three movies into a mostly magnificent directorial career , clint eastwood 's efficiently minimalist style finally has failed him .
translation: 在二十三部电影之后，克林特·伊斯特伍德的高效极简风格最终未能给他带来成功。
back_translation: After twenty-three films, Clint Eastwood's efficient minimalist style ultimately failed to bring him success.

text: boring and meandering .
translation: 无聊且漫无目的。
back_translation: Bored and aimless.

text: while certainly more naturalistic than its australian counterpart , amari 's film falls short in building the drama of lilia 's journey .
translation: 虽然比其澳大利亚同行更具自然主义，阿马里的电影在刻画莉莉亚旅程的戏剧性方面显得不足。
back_translation: Although Amari's films are more naturalistic than their Australian counterparts, they lack in effectively portraying the drama of Lilia's journey.

text: make chan 's action sequences boring .
translation: 让陈的动作场面变得无聊。
back_translation: Make Chen's action scenes boring.

text: simply put , there should have been a more compelling excuse to pair susan sarandon and goldie hawn .
translation: 简单来说，苏珊·萨兰登和戈尔迪·霍恩的搭配应该有一个更有说服力的理由。
back_translation: In simple terms, the pairing of Susan Sarandon and Goldie Hawn should have a more convincing reason.

text: proves a lovely trifle that , unfortunately , is a little too in love with its own cuteness .
translation: 证明这是一个可爱的琐事，不幸的是，它稍微有点过于迷恋自己的可爱。
back_translation: It proves to be a delightful trifle; unfortunately, it is a bit too enamored with its own cuteness.

text: but its storytelling prowess and special effects are both listless .
translation: 但它的叙事能力和特效都显得无趣。
back_translation: But its narrative ability and special effects seem uninteresting.

text: an energizing , intoxicating documentary charting the rise of hip-hop culture in general and the art of scratching -lrb- or turntablism -rrb- in particular .
translation: 一部振奋人心、令人陶醉的纪录片，描绘了嘻哈文化的兴起，特别是刮碟艺术（或称唱盘艺术）。
back_translation: An inspiring and captivating documentary that depicts the rise of hip-hop culture, particularly the art of turntablism.

text: screenwriter dan schneider and director shawn levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite .
translation: 编剧丹·施耐德和导演肖恩·莱维用音量和原色代替幽默和锋利。
back_translation: Screenwriter Dan Schneider and director Shawn Levy replace humor and sharpness with volume and primary colors.

text: -lrb- ramsay -rrb- visually transforms the dreary expanse of dead-end distaste the characters inhabit into a poem of art , music and metaphor .
translation: （拉姆齐）将角色所处的死胡同的沉闷空间，视觉上转变为一首艺术、音乐和隐喻的诗。
back_translation: (Ramsey) visually transforms the dreary space of the dead end the characters find themselves in into a poem of art, music, and metaphor.

text: works as pretty contagious fun .
translation: 工作就像是非常有感染力的乐趣。
back_translation: Work is like a very contagious joy.

text: in the pianist , polanski is saying what he has long wanted to say , confronting the roots of his own preoccupations and obsessions , and he allows nothing to get in the way .
translation: 在《钢琴家》中，波兰斯基表达了他长期以来想要说的话，面对自己关注和痴迷的根源，并不让任何事情妨碍他。
back_translation: In "The Pianist," Polanski expresses what he has long wanted to say, confronting the sources of his attention and obsession without allowing anything to hinder him.

text: ... liotta is put in an impossible spot because his character 's deceptions ultimately undo him and the believability of the entire scenario .
translation: ... 利奥塔被置于一个不可能的境地，因为他角色的欺骗最终使他自己受到毁灭，并且让整个情节失去可信度。
back_translation: ... Lyotard is placed in an impossible situation because the deception of his role ultimately leads to his own destruction and makes the entire plot lose credibility.

text: if there was ever a movie where the upbeat ending feels like a copout , this is the one .
translation: 如果有一部电影的积极结局让人觉得像是在敷衍，那就是这部。
back_translation: If a movie's happy ending feels like it's just going through the motions, it's this one.

text: ... the cast portrays their cartoon counterparts well ... but quite frankly , scoob and shag do n't eat enough during the film . '
translation: ... 演员们很好地表现了他们的卡通角色 ... 但坦率地说，斯库比和沙吉在电影中吃得不够。
back_translation: The actors portrayed their cartoon characters well... but to be honest, Scooby and Shaggy didn't eat enough in the movie.

text: the sheer dumbness of the plot -lrb- other than its one good idea -rrb- and the movie 's inescapable air of sleaziness get you down .
translation: 情节的纯粹愚蠢（除了一个好点子）以及电影不可避免的恶心气息让人沮丧。
back_translation: The sheer stupidity of the plot (except for one good idea) and the film's inevitably nauseating atmosphere are frustrating.

text: those who do n't entirely ` get ' godard 's distinctive discourse will still come away with a sense of his reserved but existential poignancy .
translation: 那些不完全理解戈达尔独特话语的人仍然会感受到他那种克制而又富有存在主义深度的感人之处。
back_translation: Those who do not fully understand Godard's unique discourse will still feel the touching quality of his restraint combined with a deep existential significance.

text: provides a very moving and revelatory footnote to the holocaust .
translation: 为大屠杀提供了一个非常感人且启发性的脚注。
back_translation: Provided a very moving and inspiring footnote for the Holocaust.

text: ... there is enough originality in ` life ' to distance it from the pack of paint-by-number romantic comedies that so often end up on cinema screens .
translation: “生活”中有足够的原创性，使其与那些经常出现在电影屏幕上的填色浪漫喜剧拉开距离。
back_translation: "Life" contains enough originality to set it apart from the clichéd romantic comedies that often appear on movie screens.

text: raimi crafted a complicated hero who is a welcome relief from the usual two-dimensional offerings .
translation: 莱米塑造了一个复杂的英雄，给人一种比通常的二维角色更令人耳目一新的感觉。
back_translation: Raimi has shaped a complex hero, offering a more refreshing feeling than the typical two-dimensional characters.

text: if you saw benigni 's pinocchio at a public park , you 'd grab your kids and run and then probably call the police .
translation: 如果你在公园里看到贝尼尼的《匹诺曹》，你会抓着孩子们跑，然后可能还会拨打报警电话。
back_translation: If you see Bernini's "Pinocchio" in the park, you would grab the children and run, and then perhaps call the police.

text: it is dark , brooding and slow , and takes its central idea way too seriously .
translation: 它阴沉、沉闷且节奏缓慢，把中心思想看得过于严肃。
back_translation: It is gloomy, dull, and slow-paced, taking the central idea too seriously.

text: it cuts to the core of what it actually means to face your fears , to be a girl in a world of boys , to be a boy truly in love with a girl , and to ride the big metaphorical wave that is life -- wherever it takes you .
translation: 它触及了面对恐惧的真正含义，作为一个在男孩世界中的女孩，作为一个真正爱着女孩的男孩，以及在生活这条大比喻之浪上乘风破浪，无论它将你带向何方。
back_translation: It touches upon the true meaning of facing fears, as a girl in a boy's world, as a boy who truly loves a girl, and sailing through the great metaphorical wave of life, no matter where it may take you.

text: an enjoyable , if occasionally flawed , experiment .
translation: 一个愉快的实验，尽管偶尔有一些缺陷。
back_translation: A pleasant experiment, although there were occasional flaws.

text: it is , however , a completely honest , open-hearted film that should appeal to anyone willing to succumb to it .
translation: 然而，这是一部完全诚实、真诚的电影，应该能打动任何愿意沉浸其中的人。
back_translation: However, this is a completely honest and sincere film that should touch anyone willing to immerse themselves in it.

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .
translation: 我觉得这部电影根本不爱女性。
back_translation: I feel that this movie doesn't respect women at all.

text: american musical comedy as we know it would n't exist without the precedent of yiddish theater , whose jolly , fun-for-fun 's - sake communal spirit goes to the essence of broadway .
translation: 我们所知的美国音乐喜剧如果没有意第绪戏剧的先例是不存在的，意第绪戏剧那种快乐、为了乐趣而乐趣的共同精神正是百老汇的本质所在。
back_translation: The American musical comedy as we know it would not exist without the precedent of Yiddish theater; the joyful, fun-loving spirit of Yiddish theater is precisely the essence of Broadway.

text: do n't judge this one too soon - it 's a dark , gritty story but it takes off in totally unexpected directions and keeps on going .
translation: 不要过早评判这个故事——它是一部黑暗、粗犷的故事，但它朝着完全意想不到的方向发展，并不断推进。
back_translation: Do not judge this story too early—it is a dark and rough tale, but it unfolds in completely unexpected directions and keeps moving forward.

text: ... -lrb- the film -rrb- works , due mostly to the tongue-in-cheek attitude of the screenplay .
translation: （这部电影）之所以成功，主要归功于剧本的调侃态度。
back_translation: The success of this movie is mainly attributed to its sarcastic tone in the script.

text: features nonsensical and laughable plotting , wooden performances , ineptly directed action sequences and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory .
translation: 特点是无意义和可笑的情节，木讷的表演，笨拙的动作场面，以及一些近年来最糟糕的对话。
back_translation: The characteristics are meaningless and ridiculous plotlines, wooden performances, clumsy action scenes, and some of the worst dialogue in recent years.

text: too smart to ignore but a little too smugly superior to like , this could be a movie that ends up slapping its target audience in the face by shooting itself in the foot .
translation: 太聪明以至于无法忽视，但又有点过于自以为是而让人不喜欢，这可能是一部最终因自毁长城而让目标观众感到被打脸的电影。
back_translation: Too smart to ignore, yet a bit too presumptuous to be liked, this could be a film that ultimately backfires and leaves its target audience feeling insulted.

text: the director 's many dodges and turns add up to little more than a screenful of gamesmanship that 's low on both suspense and payoff .
translation: 导演的许多绕弯子和转折加起来不过是一屏幕的游戏技巧，既缺乏悬念也没有回报。
back_translation: The director's many twists and turns amount to nothing more than a screen full of gaming techniques, lacking both suspense and payoff.

text: an invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker 's extraordinary access to massoud , whose charm , cultivation and devotion to his people are readily apparent .
translation: 一份无价的历史文件，得益于导演对马苏德的非凡接触，他的魅力、修养和对人民的奉献显而易见。
back_translation: An invaluable historical document, thanks to the director's extraordinary connection with Masood, whose charm, demeanor, and dedication to the people are evident.

text: ... no charm , no laughs , no fun , no reason to watch .
translation: 没有魅力，没有笑声，没有乐趣，没有观看的理由。
back_translation: ...no charm, no laughter, no fun, no reason to watch.

text: thanks largely to williams , all the interesting developments are processed in 60 minutes -- the rest is just an overexposed waste of film .
translation: 多亏了威廉斯，所有有趣的进展都在60分钟内处理完毕——其余的只是过度曝光的废片。
back_translation: Thanks to Williams, all the interesting developments were wrapped up within 60 minutes—the rest was just overexposed footage.

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks -lrb- at least during their '70s heyday -rrb- comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .
translation: 在伍迪·艾伦或梅尔·布鲁克斯的手中——至少在他们70年代的鼎盛时期——可能会变成滑稽的疯狂，但在这部首部独立电影中却显得幼稚和无趣。
back_translation: In the hands of Woody Allen or Mel Brooks—at least during their peak in the 1970s—it could have turned into a hilarious madness, but in this first independent film, it comes across as childish and uninteresting.

text: it would take a complete moron to foul up a screen adaptation of oscar wilde 's classic satire .
translation: 要把奥斯卡·王尔德经典讽刺作品的影视改编搞糟，必须是个彻底的傻瓜。
back_translation: To completely mess up a film adaptation of Oscar Wilde's classic satirical work, one must be a total fool.

text: jackass is a vulgar and cheap-looking version of candid camera staged for the marquis de sade set .
translation: 《驴子》是一个粗俗且外观廉价的版本，类似于为萨德侯爵一派安排的偷拍节目。
back_translation: "The Donkey" is a vulgar and cheaply-looking version, akin to a hidden-camera show arranged for the Marquis de Sade's circle.

text: everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful cinematography and naturalistic acting .
translation: 每个人都应该能够欣赏到精彩的摄影效果和自然的表演。
back_translation: Everyone should be able to appreciate stunning photography and natural performances.

text: one well-timed explosion in a movie can be a knockout , but a hundred of them can be numbing .
translation: 一场时机把握得当的电影爆炸可以让人印象深刻，但一百场却可能让人麻木。
back_translation: A well-timed movie explosion can leave a deep impression, but a hundred of them might make one numb.

text: where their heads were is anyone 's guess .
translation: 他们的头在哪里无人知晓。
back_translation: Where their heads are, no one knows.

text: scotland looks wonderful , the fans are often funny fanatics , the showdown sure beats a bad day of golf .
translation: 苏格兰看起来真美，球迷们常常是有趣的狂热分子，这场对决绝对比糟糕的高尔夫球赛要好。
back_translation: Scotland looks truly beautiful, and the fans are often interesting enthusiasts; this matchup is definitely better than a terrible game of golf.

text: the music makes a nice album , the food is enticing and italy beckons us all .
translation: 音乐制作了一个美妙的专辑，食物诱人，意大利向我们所有人招手。
back_translation: Music has produced a wonderful album, the food is irresistible, and Italy is beckoning to all of us.

text: one of the best silly horror movies of recent memory , with some real shocks in store for unwary viewers .
translation: 最近记忆中最好的滑稽恐怖片之一，给不明真相的观众带来了一些真正的惊吓。
back_translation: One of the best horror-comedy films in recent memory has given unsuspecting viewers some genuine scares.

text: the film is a very good viewing alternative for young women .
translation: 这部电影是年轻女性非常好的观赏选择。
back_translation: This movie is a great viewing choice for young women.

text: beautifully shot against the frozen winter landscapes of grenoble and geneva , the film unfolds with all the mounting tension of an expert thriller , until the tragedy beneath it all gradually reveals itself .
translation: 影片在格勒诺布尔和日内瓦的冰冻冬季风景中美丽地拍摄，随着紧张气氛的不断升级，像一部专业的惊悚片，直到其下方的悲剧逐渐显露出来。
back_translation: The film is beautifully shot in the frozen winter landscapes of Grenoble and Geneva, with a constantly escalating tense atmosphere, resembling a professional thriller, until the underlying tragedy gradually unfolds.

text: griffin & co. manage to be spectacularly outrageous .
translation: 格里芬公司总是能表现得十分惊人和离谱。
back_translation: Griffin Company always manages to perform in an astonishing and absurd manner.

text: it is hard not to be especially grateful for freedom after a film like this .
translation: 在看完这样一部电影后，难免会尤其感激自由。
back_translation: After watching such a movie, one cannot help but feel particularly grateful for freedom.

text: a well-put-together piece of urban satire .
translation: 一部精心制作的城市讽刺作品。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted work of urban satire.

text: too much of nemesis has a tired , talky feel .
translation: 过多的复仇者让人感觉疲惫且絮絮叨叨。
back_translation: Too many Avengers make one feel tired and rambling.

text: pan nalin 's exposition is beautiful and mysterious , and the interviews that follow , with the practitioners of this ancient indian practice , are as subtle and as enigmatic .
translation: 潘·纳林的阐述既美丽又神秘，而随后的采访则与这一古老印度实践的从业者们一样微妙而神秘。
back_translation: Pan Nalin's explanation is both beautiful and mysterious, while the subsequent interviews are just as subtle and enigmatic as the practitioners of this ancient Indian practice.

text: given the fact that virtually no one is bound to show up at theatres for it , the project should have been made for the tube .
translation: 考虑到几乎没有人会去电影院观看这个项目，它应该是为电视制作的。
back_translation: Considering that almost no one would go to the cinema to watch this project, it should be made for television.

text: with more character development this might have been an eerie thriller ; with better payoffs , it could have been a thinking man 's monster movie .
translation: 如果有更多的角色发展，这本来可以是一部诡异的惊悚片；如果有更好的回报，它本可以是一部引人深思的怪兽电影。
back_translation: If there had been more character development, this could have been a strange thriller; if there had been better payoffs, it could have been a thought-provoking monster movie.

text: an entertaining british hybrid of comedy , caper thrills and quirky romance .
translation: 一部娱乐性十足的英国混合喜剧，充满了惊险刺激和古怪的浪漫情节。
back_translation: A highly entertaining British hybrid comedy, full of thrilling excitement and quirky romantic elements.

text: but ... in trying to capture the novel 's deeper intimate resonances , the film has -- ironically - distanced us from the characters .
translation: 但是在试图捕捉小说更深层的亲密共鸣时，这部电影却——具有讽刺意味地——让我们与角色产生了距离。
back_translation: However, in trying to capture the deeper intimate resonance of the novel, the film ironically distanced us from the characters.

text: the modern master of the chase sequence returns with a chase to end all chases
translation: 现代追逐场面的高手回归，带来了一场终极追逐。
back_translation: The master of modern chase scenes returns, bringing an ultimate pursuit.

text: queen of the damned as you might have guessed , makes sorry use of aaliyah in her one and only starring role -- she does little here but point at things that explode into flame .
translation: 如你所料，《被诅咒的女王》对早逝的阿莉雅的使用极为可怜——她在这里几乎只是指着一些会爆炸起火的东西。
back_translation: As you expected, "The Cursed Queen" makes very little use of the late Arya—she is almost just pointing at things that will explode and catch fire.

text: a loud , witless mess that has none of the charm and little of the intrigue from the tv series .
translation: 一个喧闹而无知的混乱，既没有电视剧的魅力，也几乎没有吸引力。
back_translation: A noisy and ignorant chaos, lacking both the charm of a TV drama and almost any appeal.

text: a cartoon ?
translation: 一部卡通？
back_translation: A cartoon?

text: a crass and insulting homage to great films like some like it hot and the john wayne classics .
translation: 对《热情似火》和约翰·威恩经典影片的粗俗且侮辱性的致敬。
back_translation: A crude and insulting tribute to "Viva Las Vegas" and John Wayne's classic films.

text: the problem with `` xxx '' is that its own action is n't very effective .
translation: `` xxx `` 的问题在于它自身的行为效果不大。
back_translation: The problem with `` xxx `` is that its own behavioral effects are limited.

text: ` yes , that 's right : it 's forrest gump , angel of death . '
translation: “是的，没错：这是《阿甘正传》，死亡天使。”
back_translation: "Yes, that's right: this is 'Forrest Gump,' the angel of death."

text: with a romantic comedy plotline straight from the ages , this cinderella story does n't have a single surprise up its sleeve .
translation: 这部浪漫喜剧的情节仿佛来自古老时代，这个灰姑娘的故事没有任何惊喜。

text: ... while certainly clever in spots , this too-long , spoofy update of shakespeare 's macbeth does n't sustain a high enough level of invention .
translation: 尽管在某些地方确实聪明，这部过于冗长、恶搞版的莎士比亚《麦克白》并没有维持足够高的创意水平。
back_translation: Although it is clever in some places, this overly lengthy and parodic version of Shakespeare's "Macbeth" does not maintain a sufficiently high level of creativity.

text: no new plot conceptions or environmental changes , just different bodies for sharp objects to rip through .
translation: 没有新的情节构思或环境变化，只是不同的身体让尖锐物体撕裂。
back_translation: There are no new plot ideas or environmental changes, just different bodies being torn apart by sharp objects.

text: australian actor\/director john polson and award-winning english cinematographer giles nuttgens make a terrific effort at disguising the obvious with energy and innovation .
translation: 澳大利亚演员/导演约翰·波尔森和获奖的英国摄影师贾尔斯·纳特根斯努力用活力和创新来掩饰明显之处，效果非常出色。
back_translation: Australian actor/director John Polson and award-winning British cinematographer Giles Nuttgens work hard to cover the obvious with vitality and innovation, and the results are outstanding.

text: twohy knows how to inflate the mundane into the scarifying , and gets full mileage out of the rolling of a stray barrel or the unexpected blast of a phonograph record .
translation: Twohy会将平凡的事物夸大为令人恐惧的情景，并充分利用一只滚动的散装桶或意外响起的唱片的冲击效果。
back_translation: Twohy exaggerates ordinary things into terrifying scenarios, fully utilizing the shock effect of a rolling bulk barrel or a record that unexpectedly plays.

text: at once a testament to the divine calling of education and a demonstration of the painstaking process of imparting knowledge .
translation: 既是对教育神圣召唤的证明，也是传授知识艰辛过程的展示。
back_translation: It is both proof of the sacred calling of education and a demonstration of the arduous process of imparting knowledge.

text: insufferably naive .
translation: 无法忍受地天真。
back_translation: Unbearably naive.

text: these are textbook lives of quiet desperation .
translation: 这些是教科书般的安静绝望的生活。

text: worth a salute just for trying to be more complex than your average film .
translation: 值得敬佩，仅仅因为试图比普通电影更复杂。
back_translation: It is admirable simply for trying to be more complex than an ordinary movie.

text: it excels because , unlike so many other hollywood movies of its ilk , it offers hope .
translation: 它之所以出色，是因为与其他许多同类好莱坞电影不同，它传递了希望。
back_translation: It stands out because, unlike many other similar Hollywood films, it conveys hope.

text: the fun of the movie is the chance it affords to watch jackson , who also served as executive producer , take his smooth , shrewd , powerful act abroad .
translation: 这部电影的乐趣在于它提供了一个机会，让我们看杰克逊，作为执行制片人，他把自己那光滑、精明、强大的表演带到了海外。
back_translation: The enjoyment of this film lies in the opportunity it provides to see Jackson, as an executive producer, bring his smooth, shrewd, and powerful performance overseas.

text: far too clever by half , howard 's film is really a series of strung-together moments , with all the spaces in between filled with fantasies , daydreams , memories and one fantastic visual trope after another .
translation: 过于聪明，霍华德的电影实际上是一系列连接在一起的片段，片段之间的空白则被幻想、白日梦、回忆和一个接一个的奇妙视觉意象填满。
back_translation: Too clever, Howard's film is actually a series of interconnected fragments, with the gaps between the fragments filled by fantasy, daydreams, memories, and a succession of wonderful visual imagery.

text: serious and thoughtful .
translation: 严肃而深思。
back_translation: Serious and thoughtful.

text: soderbergh skims the fat from the 1972 film .
translation: 索德伯格剔除了1972年电影中的多余部分。
back_translation: Soderbergh has removed the excess parts from the 1972 film.

text: a remarkably insightful look at the backstage angst of the stand-up comic .
translation: 对单口喜剧演员后台焦虑的深刻洞察。
back_translation: A profound insight into the backstage anxiety of stand-up comedians.

text: alternately hilarious and sad , aggravating and soulful , scathing and joyous .
translation: 交替着搞笑和悲伤，令人恼火和充满灵性，尖锐和欢乐。
back_translation: Alternating between humor and sadness, infuriating and spiritual, sharp and joyful.

text: this is the case of a pregnant premise being wasted by a script that takes few chances and manages to insult the intelligence of everyone in the audience .
translation: 这是一个怀孕的前提被一个冒险较少并且成功侮辱了观众智商的剧本所浪费的案例。
back_translation: This is a case where the premise of pregnancy is wasted on a script that takes fewer risks and successfully insults the audience's intelligence.

text: it 's unlikely we 'll see a better thriller this year .
translation: 今年我们不太可能看到比这更好的惊悚片。
back_translation: This year, it's unlikely that we'll see a better thriller than this.

text: it 's provocative stuff , but the speculative effort is hampered by taylor 's cartoonish performance and the film 's ill-considered notion that hitler 's destiny was shaped by the most random of chances .
translation: 这是一部具有挑衅性的作品，但由于泰勒的表演像卡通一样，以及电影考虑不周的想法——希特勒的命运是由最随机的机会塑造的——这使得推测性的努力受到阻碍。
back_translation: This is a provocative work, but Taylor's performance, resembling a cartoon, and the film's poorly thought-out ideas—particularly that Hitler's fate is shaped by the most random of chances—hinder its speculative efforts.

text: a movie that ca n't get sufficient distance from leroy 's delusions to escape their maudlin influence .
translation: 一部无法与勒罗伊的幻想保持足够距离以逃避其伤感影响的电影。
back_translation: A film that cannot maintain enough distance from Leroy's fantasy to avoid its poignant impact.

text: though harris is affecting at times , he can not overcome the sense that pumpkin is a mere plot pawn for two directors with far less endearing disabilities .
translation: 尽管哈里斯有时表现出色，但他无法克服这样一种感觉，即南瓜只是两个残缺不全的导演的一个简单情节棋子。
back_translation: Despite Harris's outstanding performances at times, he cannot overcome the feeling that the pumpkin is simply a plot device for two incomplete directors.

text: schneidermeister ... makin ' a fool of himself ... losin ' his fan base ...
translation: 施耐德大师 ... 让自己出丑 ... 失去他的粉丝群 ...
back_translation: Master Schneider ... makes a fool of himself ... loses his fan base ...

text: in this case zero .
translation: 在这种情况下是零。
back_translation: In this case, it is zero.

text: the young stars are too cute ; the story and ensuing complications are too manipulative ; the message is too blatant ; the resolutions are too convenient .
translation: 年轻的明星太可爱了；故事和随之而来的复杂情节太过操控；信息太过明显；解决方案太过方便。
back_translation: The young star is too cute; the story and the complicated plot that comes with it are too manipulative; the information is too obvious; the solution is too convenient.

text: the difference is that i truly enjoyed most of mostly martha while i ne
translation: 区别在于我真心喜欢《大厨的烦恼》中的大部分内容，而我并不喜欢。
back_translation: The difference is that I genuinely like most of the content in "The Chef's Troubles," while I do not like it.

text: sexy and romantic .
translation: 性感而浪漫。
back_translation: Sensual and romantic.

text: by the time the plot grinds itself out in increasingly incoherent fashion , you might be wishing for a watch that makes time go faster rather than the other way around .
translation: 随着情节以越来越不连贯的方式展开，你可能会希望有一块能让时间过得更快的手表，而不是相反。

text: arteta directs one of the best ensemble casts of the year
translation: 阿尔特塔执导了今年最优秀的群戏之一。

text: vividly conveys the passion , creativity , and fearlessness of one of mexico 's most colorful and controversial artists -- a captivating drama that will speak to the nonconformist in us all .
translation: 生动地传达了墨西哥最具色彩和争议性的艺术家之一的热情、创造力和无畏精神——一部引人入胜的戏剧，将触动我们心中所有的非传统者。
back_translation: Vividly conveying the passion, creativity, and fearless spirit of one of Mexico's most colorful and controversial artists—a captivating drama that will resonate with all the nonconformists in our hearts.

text: the concept is a hoot .
translation: 这个概念真有趣。
back_translation: This concept is really interesting.

text: it may not be particularly innovative , but the film 's crisp , unaffected style and air of gentle longing make it unexpectedly rewarding .
translation: 它可能不是特别创新，但这部电影清晰、自然的风格和温柔渴望的气息使其意外地令人满意。
back_translation: It may not be particularly innovative, but the film's clear and natural style, along with its subtle sense of longing, makes it surprisingly satisfying.

text: in its own way , joshua is as blasphemous and nonsensical as a luis bu帽uel film without the latter 's attendant intelligence , poetry , passion , and genius .
translation: 在某种意义上，约书亚就像一部路易斯·布努埃尔的电影一样亵渎和荒谬，只是缺乏后者的智慧、诗意、激情和天才。
back_translation: In a sense, Joshua is as blasphemous and absurd as a film by Luis Bu_uel, just lacking the latter's wisdom, poetic quality, passion, and genius.

text: perhaps a better celebration of these unfairly dismissed heroes would be a film that is n't this painfully forced , false and fabricated .
translation: 也许对这些被不公正解雇的英雄更好的庆祝方式是拍一部不是如此生硬、虚假和捏造的电影。
back_translation: Perhaps a better way to celebrate these unjustly fired heroes is to make a film that is not so stiff, false, and fabricated.

text: ... you can be forgiven for realizing that you 've spent the past 20 minutes looking at your watch and waiting for frida to just die already .
translation: 你可以理解，过去20分钟里你一直在看手表，等着弗里达快点死去，这种心情是可以被原谅的。
back_translation: ...you can understand that it is forgivable to feel that way after spending the last 20 minutes looking at your watch, waiting for Frida to die faster.

text: the director , mark pellington , does a terrific job conjuring up a sinister , menacing atmosphere though unfortunately all the story gives us is flashing red lights , a rattling noise , and a bump on the head .
translation: 导演马克·佩林顿在营造阴险、威胁的氛围方面做得非常出色，但不幸的是，故事给我们的仅仅是闪烁的红灯、刺耳的声音和头部的碰撞。
back_translation: Director Mark Pellington excels at creating a sinister and threatening atmosphere, but unfortunately, the story gives us only flashing red lights, piercing sounds, and head collisions.

text: even if the naipaul original remains the real masterpiece , the movie possesses its own languorous charm .
translation: 即使奈保尔的原作仍然是现实杰作，这部电影也拥有自己独特的慵懒魅力。
back_translation: Even though Naipaul's original work is still a masterpiece of reality, this film has its own unique lazy charm.

text: delivers more than its fair share of saucy hilarity .
translation: 提供了超出其应有份额的调皮搞笑。
back_translation: Provided an excessive amount of mischievous humor.

text: if it were any more of a turkey , it would gobble in dolby digital stereo .
translation: 如果再像火鸡一样，它就是在杜比数字立体声中咯咯叫。
back_translation: If it's like a turkey again, then it's gobbling in Dolby Digital Surround Sound.

text: more intimate than spectacular , e.t. is carried less by wow factors than by its funny , moving yarn that holds up well after two decades .
translation: 比起壮观，E.T.更亲密，它更多地依靠幽默和感人的故事，而不是惊人的元素，尽管已经过去二十年，这个故事依然耐人寻味。
back_translation: Compared to the spectacular, E.T. is more intimate; it relies more on humor and a touching story rather than astonishing elements. Even after twenty years, the story remains thought-provoking.

text: i thought the relationships were wonderful , the comedy was funny , and the love ` real ' .
translation: 我认为人际关系很美好，幽默很有趣，爱情是真实的。
back_translation: I believe interpersonal relationships are beautiful, humor is interesting, and love is real.

text: amid the shock and curiosity factors , the film is just a corny examination of a young actress trying to find her way .
translation: 在震惊和好奇的因素中，这部电影只是对一位年轻女演员努力寻找自我的老套审视。
back_translation: Amidst the elements of shock and curiosity, this film is merely a cliché examination of a young actress's struggle to find herself.

text: wickedly funny , visually engrossing , never boring , this movie challenges us to think about the ways we consume pop culture .
translation: 这部电影搞笑至极，视觉吸引力十足，从不无聊，它挑战我们思考我们消费流行文化的方式。
back_translation: This movie is extremely funny, visually engaging, and never boring; it challenges us to think about how we consume popular culture.

text: the spaniel-eyed jean reno infuses hubert with a mixture of deadpan cool , wry humor and just the measure of tenderness required to give this comic slugfest some heart .
translation: 拥有西班牙猎犬般眼神的尚-雷诺赋予了于贝尔一种死板冷酷、讽刺幽默以及恰到好处的温柔，使这场喜剧式的搏斗充满了情感。
back_translation: Jean Reno, with the gaze of a Spanish Greyhound, imbues the character of Hubert with a deadpan coldness, ironic humor, and just the right touch of tenderness, making this comedic duel full of emotion.

text: a film with almost as many delights for adults as there are for children and dog lovers .
translation: 一部对成年人和儿童以及爱狗人士几乎一样充满乐趣的电影。
back_translation: A film that is equally enjoyable for adults, children, and dog lovers.

text: a depraved , incoherent , instantly disposable piece of hackery .
translation: 一篇堕落、无 coherence、瞬间可丢弃的低级作品。
back_translation: A degenerate, incoherent, disposable low-level piece of work.

text: the animation and game phenomenon that peaked about three years ago is actually dying a slow death , if the poor quality of pokemon 4 ever is any indication .
translation: 大约三年前达到顶峰的动画和游戏现象实际上正在缓慢地衰退，如果《口袋妖怪4：永远》糟糕的质量可以作为指示的话。
back_translation: The animated and gaming phenomenon that peaked about three years ago is actually slowly declining, if the poor quality of "Pokémon 4: Forever" can serve as an indication.

text: the camera soars above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the large-screen format , before swooping down on a string of exotic locales , scooping the whole world up in a joyous communal festival of rhythm .
translation: 镜头在令人眼花缭乱的全景画面中高高飞过地球，充分利用大屏幕的格式，然后俯冲下来，呈现一系列异国情调的地点，将整个世界卷入一场快乐的节奏 communal festival。
back_translation: The camera soars high above the Earth in a dazzling panoramic view, making full use of the big screen format, then swoops down to showcase a series of exotic locations, immersing the entire world in a joyful rhythm of a communal festival.

text: what 's really sad is to see two academy award winning actresses -lrb- and one academy award winning actor -rrb- succumb to appearing in this junk that 's tv sitcom material at best .
translation: 真正令人感到悲哀的是看到两位奥斯卡获奖女演员（还有一位奥斯卡获奖男演员）屈就于出演这种顶多算是电视情景喜剧的垃圾。
back_translation: What is truly sad is to see two Oscar-winning actresses (and one Oscar-winning actor) stooping to appear in this rubbish that can at most be considered a television sitcom.

text: -lrb- jackson and bledel -rrb- seem to have been picked not for their acting chops , but for their looks and appeal to the pre-teen crowd .
translation: （杰克逊和布莱德尔）似乎不是因为他们的演技而被选中，而是因为他们的外貌和对青少年观众的吸引力。
back_translation: It seems that (Jackson and Bladel) were not chosen for their acting skills, but rather for their looks and appeal to teenage audiences.

text: whatever the movie 's sentimental , hypocritical lessons about sexism , its true colors come out in various wet t-shirt and shower scenes .
translation: 无论这部电影在性别歧视方面有什么感伤且虚伪的教训，它的真实面貌在各种湿透的T恤和淋浴场景中显露无遗。
back_translation: No matter what sentimental and hypocritical lessons this movie has regarding gender discrimination, its true nature is revealed in various soaked t-shirts and shower scenes.

text: piercingly affecting ... while clearly a manipulative film , emerges as powerful rather than cloying .
translation: 刺痛人心  虽然显然是一部操控观众情感的电影，但却表现出强大的力量，而非令人厌烦的甜腻。
back_translation: It pierces the heart... Although it is obviously a film that manipulates the audience's emotions, it demonstrates a powerful force rather than being cloyingly annoying.

text: gussied up with so many distracting special effects and visual party tricks that it 's not clear whether we 're supposed to shriek or laugh .
translation: 装饰得如此花哨，有如此多分散注意力的特效和视觉玩意，以至于不清楚我们是应该尖叫还是笑。
back_translation: Decorated so flamboyantly, with so many distracting special effects and visual gimmicks, that it's unclear whether we should scream or laugh.

text: if only it had the story to match .
translation: 要是它的故事也能相称就好了。
back_translation: If only its story could be equally matched.

text: `` frailty '' has been written so well , that even a simple `` goddammit ! ''
translation: “脆弱”写得如此出色，以至于即使是一个简单的“该死！”
back_translation: "Vulnerability" is written so excellently that even a simple "Damn it!" stands out.

text: the pianist is the film roman polanski may have been born to make .
translation: 《钢琴家》是罗曼·波兰斯基可能注定要拍摄的电影。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is a film that Roman Polanski was likely destined to make.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: 这部电影充满了感染力的热情，我们被电影所传达的信念所打动：所有生命都围绕着那个地方、那个时间和那项运动。
back_translation: This movie is full of passionate energy, and we are moved by the belief conveyed by the film: all lives revolve around that place, that time, and that sport.

text: an excellent sequel .
translation: 一部出色的续集。
back_translation: An outstanding sequel.

text: the trouble with making this queen a thoroughly modern maiden is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than , as was more likely , a victim of mental illness .
translation: 将这个女王塑造成一个彻底现代的少女的问题在于，这也使她看起来愚蠢和肤浅，而不是更可能的作为精神疾病的受害者。
back_translation: The problem with shaping this queen into a completely modern girl is that it makes her seem foolish and superficial, rather than more likely to be a victim of mental illness.

text: it 's a technically superb film , shining with all the usual spielberg flair , expertly utilizing the talents of his top-notch creative team .
translation: 这是一部在技术上极为出色的电影，展现了史蒂芬·斯皮尔伯格一贯的风格，巧妙地利用了他顶尖创作团队的才华。
back_translation: This is a technically outstanding film that showcases Steven Spielberg's signature style, cleverly utilizing the talents of his top creative team.

text: the story really has no place to go since simone is not real -- she ca n't provide any conflict .
translation: 这个故事真的没有发展空间，因为西蒙不是一个真实的角色——她无法提供任何冲突。
back_translation: This story really has no room for development because Simon is not a real character—she cannot provide any conflict.

text: both a detective story and a romance spiced with the intrigue of academic skullduggery and politics .
translation: 既是一部侦探故事，也是一部浪漫小说，夹杂着学术阴谋和政治的 intrigues。
back_translation: It is both a detective story and a romantic novel, intertwined with academic conspiracies and political intrigues.

text: all the sensuality , all the eroticism of a good vampire tale has been , pardon the pun , sucked out and replaced by goth goofiness .
translation: 所有的感性，所有好吸血鬼故事的色情之处，都被，抱歉这个双关，抽走了，取而代之的是哥特式的滑稽。
back_translation: All the sensuality, all the eroticism of good vampire stories, has been, sorry for the pun, drawn away, replaced by a Gothic absurdity.

text: a quiet , disquieting triumph .
translation: 一个安静却让人不安的胜利。
back_translation: A quiet yet unsettling victory.

text: anyone who ever fantasized about space travel but ca n't afford the $ 20 million ticket to ride a russian rocket should catch this imax offering .
translation: 任何曾经幻想过太空旅行但无力负担2000万美元搭乘俄罗斯火箭票的人，都应该看看这个IMAX影片。
back_translation: Anyone who has ever dreamed of space travel but cannot afford the $20 million ticket to ride a Russian rocket should watch this IMAX film.

text: -lrb- carvey 's -rrb- characters are both overplayed and exaggerated , but then again , subtlety has never been his trademark .
translation: （卡维的）角色既过于夸张又过于浮夸，但再说一遍，微妙从来就不是他的商标。
back_translation: (Kavi's) character is both overly exaggerated and pretentious, but I will say it again, subtlety has never been his trademark.

text: if divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood suffers from a ploddingly melodramatic structure , it comes to life in the performances .
translation: 如果《雅雅姐妹会的神秘秘密》在结构上显得沉闷而富于戏剧性，那么它在表演中则焕发出活力。
back_translation: If "The Mysterious Secret of the Yaya Sisters' Club" seems dull and dramatic in structure, it shines with vitality in its performance.

text: rashomon-for-dipsticks tale .
translation: 拉喧噪的故事。
back_translation: The story of the noisy crowd.

text: sleek and arty .
translation: 流畅且富有艺术感。
back_translation: Smooth and artistic.

text: a terrific date movie , whatever your orientation .
translation: 一部很棒的约会电影，无论你的性取向如何。
back_translation: A great dating movie, regardless of your sexual orientation.

text: the exploitative , clumsily staged violence overshadows everything , including most of the actors .
translation: 剥削性的、粗笨地 staged 暴力掩盖了一切，包括大多数演员。
back_translation: The exploitative and clumsily staged violence covers everything, including most of the actors.

text: it takes a really long , slow and dreary time to dope out what tuck everlasting is about .
translation: 要搞清楚《永久的停留》到底是关于什么，需要花费很长、缓慢而沉闷的时间。
back_translation: To understand what "Permanent Stay" is really about, one needs to spend a long, slow, and tedious time.

text: it 's splash without the jokes .
translation: 这是没有笑话的水花。
back_translation: This is a splash without a joke.

text: even as it pays earnest homage to turntablists and beat jugglers , old schoolers and current innovators , scratch is great fun , full of the kind of energy it 's documenting .
translation: 即使它对唱片DJ和节拍混音者、老派音乐家和当今创新者表示了真诚的敬意，《Scratch》仍然非常有趣，充满了它所记录的那种活力。
back_translation: Even though it pays sincere tribute to record DJs and beat mixers, old-school musicians, and contemporary innovators, "Scratch" remains highly engaging and is full of the kind of vitality it captures.

text: you begin to long for the end credits as the desert does for rain .
translation: 你开始渴望片尾字幕，就像沙漠渴望雨水一样。
back_translation: You begin to long for the end credits, just as a desert longs for rain.

text: a coming-of-age movie that hollywood would n't have the guts to make .
translation: 一部好莱坞不会有胆量制作的成长电影。
back_translation: A coming-of-age film that Hollywood would not have the courage to make.

text: ` possession , ' based on the book by a.s. byatt , demands that labute deal with the subject of love head-on ; trading in his cynicism for reverence and a little wit
translation: 《占有》，根据a.s.拜厄特的书改编，要求拉布特直面爱情主题；用他的讽刺换取敬意和一点机智。
back_translation: "Possession," adapted from A.S. Byatt's book, demands that Rabut confront the theme of love; using his satire to earn respect and a touch of wit.

text: did no one on the set have a sense of humor , or did they not have the nerve to speak up ?
translation: 难道剧组里没有人有幽默感，还是他们没有勇气说出来？
back_translation: Is there really no one in the crew with a sense of humor, or are they just too timid to say it?

text: cinematic pyrotechnics aside , the only thing avary seems to care about are mean giggles and pulchritude .
translation: 撇开电影特效不谈，艾弗里似乎只关心恶作剧和美貌。
back_translation: Aside from the movie special effects, Avery seems only interested in pranks and beauty.

text: some of the most inventive silliness you are likely to witness in a movie theatre for some time .
translation: 你在电影影院中可能会看到的一些最富有创意的愚蠢事。
back_translation: Some of the most creatively silly things you might see in a movie theater.

text: the story is lacking any real emotional impact , and the plot is both contrived and cliched .
translation: 这个故事缺乏真正的情感冲击，情节既显得牵强又陈词滥调。
back_translation: This story lacks real emotional impact, and the plot feels both forced and clichéd.

text: others , more attuned to the anarchist maxim that ` the urge to destroy is also a creative urge ' , or more willing to see with their own eyes , will find morrison 's iconoclastic uses of technology to be liberating .
translation: 其他人，更多地与无政府主义的箴言“摧毁的冲动也是创造的冲动”相呼应，或者更愿意用自己的眼睛去看的人，会发现莫里森对技术的破旧立新使用是解放性的。
back_translation: Others, resonating more with the anarchist adage that "the impulse to destroy is also a creative impulse," or those who prefer to see with their own eyes, will find Morrison's use of technology, both old and new, to be liberating.

text: an awfully good , achingly human picture .
translation: 一幅极其美好、令人心痛的人性画面。
back_translation: An extremely beautiful and heart-wrenching portrayal of human nature.

text: but no. .
translation: 但不是。
back_translation: But not.

text: it never plays as dramatic even when dramatic things happen to people .
translation: 即使人们经历戏剧性的事情，这种情况也从未显得戏剧化。
back_translation: Even when people experience dramatic events, the situation has never seemed dramatic.

text: i have n't seen such self-amused trash since freddy got fingered .
translation: 自从《弗雷迪被指控》以来，我再也没有见过如此自娱自乐的垃圾。
back_translation: Since "Freddy was accused," I haven't seen such self-indulgent garbage.

text: a cross between blow and boyz n the hood , this movie strives to be more , but does n't quite get there .
translation: 这部电影是《吹牛》和《街头男孩》的结合，试图成为更好的作品，但似乎没有达到那个高度。
back_translation: This movie is a combination of "The Big Short" and "Street Boy," trying to become a better work, but it seems to have fallen short of that height.

text: it 's a bad action movie because there 's no rooting interest and the spectacle is grotesque and boring .
translation: 这是一部糟糕的动作电影，因为没有人可以让观众投入其中，而其场面既可怕又无聊。
back_translation: This is a terrible action movie because no one can engage the audience, and the scenes are both terrifying and tedious.

text: provides the kind of ` laugh therapy ' i need from movie comedies -- offbeat humor , amusing characters , and a happy ending .
translation: 提供我在电影喜剧中所需的“笑疗法”——独特的幽默、有趣的角色和一个快乐的结局。
back_translation: Provide me with the "laughter therapy" I need in a comedy film - unique humor, interesting characters, and a happy ending.

text: a prolonged extrusion of psychopathic pulp .
translation: 持续的精神病质肉质挤出。
back_translation: Persistent psychopathic flesh extrusion.

text: little action , almost no suspense or believable tension , one-dimensional characters up the wazoo and sets that can only be described as sci-fi generic .
translation: 几乎没有动作，几乎没有悬念或可信的紧张气氛，角色非常单一，场景只能被描述为科幻作品的通用风格。
back_translation: Almost no action, almost no suspense or credible tension, the characters are very one-dimensional, and the scenes can only be described as generic sci-fi.

text: director nancy savoca 's no-frills record of a show forged in still-raw emotions captures the unsettled tenor of that post 9-11 period far better than a more measured or polished production ever could .
translation: 导演南希·萨沃卡（Nancy Savoca）简单朴实的记录了一场在仍然生疏的情感中锻造的表演，远比更为谨慎或精致的制作更好地捕捉到了那一场9/11后时期的不安基调。
back_translation: Director Nancy Savoca simply and authentically recorded a performance forged in still unfamiliar emotions, capturing the unsettling tone of the post-9/11 era far better than more cautious or polished productions.

text: despite its floating narrative , this is a remarkably accessible and haunting film .
translation: 尽管它的叙事方式比较松散，这是一部令人难以忘怀且极具可及性的电影。
back_translation: Although its narrative style is somewhat loose, it is a memorable and highly accessible film.

text: the sum of all fears pretends to be a serious exploration of nuclear terrorism , but it 's really nothing more than warmed-over cold war paranoia .
translation: 《所有恐惧的总和》假装是对核恐怖主义的深入探索，但实际上不过是重温冷战时期的偏执。
back_translation: "The Sum of All Fears" pretends to be an in-depth exploration of nuclear terrorism, but in reality, it is just a rehashing of the paranoia from the Cold War era.

text: the hypnotic imagery and fragmentary tale explore the connections between place and personal identity .
translation: 催眠般的意象和片段式的故事探讨了地点与个人身份之间的联系。
back_translation: Hypnotic imagery and fragmented narratives explore the connection between place and personal identity.

text: it 's fun , splashy and entertainingly nasty .
translation: 这很有趣，华丽而且妙趣横生。
back_translation: This is very interesting, glamorous, and full of charm.

text: ... the first 2\/3 of the film are incredibly captivating and insanely funny , thanks in part to interesting cinematic devices -lrb- cool visual backmasking -rrb- , a solid cast , and some wickedly sick and twisted humor ...
translation: ... 电影的前2/3部分非常吸引人且极其搞笑，部分归功于有趣的电影手法（酷炫的视觉反向配乐）、强大的演员阵容，以及一些恶搞而扭曲的幽默...
back_translation: The first two-thirds of the movie are highly engaging and extremely funny, partly due to the interesting cinematic techniques (cool visual reverse scoring), a strong cast, and some parodic and twisted humor...

text: rather , pity anyone who sees this mishmash .
translation: 倒是可怜那些看到这个混乱的人。
back_translation: It's pitiful for those who witness this chaos.

text: return to never land may be another shameless attempt by disney to rake in dough from baby boomer families , but it 's not half-bad .
translation: 《返回梦幻岛》可能是迪士尼又一次无耻的尝试，旨在从婴儿潮一代家庭中赚取利润，但它并不差。
back_translation: "Return to Neverland" might be Disney's shameless attempt to profit from the baby boomer generation's families again, but it's not bad.

text: the movie , despite its rough edges and a tendency to sag in certain places , is wry and engrossing .
translation: 这部电影尽管有一些粗糙之处，且在某些地方节奏略显拖沓，但仍然机智而引人入胜。
back_translation: Despite some rough edges and a slightly dragging pace in certain areas, this movie is still clever and engaging.

text: much like robin williams , death to smoochy has already reached its expiration date .
translation: 就像罗宾·威廉姆斯一样，《死亡与笑面人》已经过期了。
back_translation: Like Robin Williams, "Death and the Smiling Man" has become obsolete.

text: a pleasing , often-funny comedy .
translation: 一部令人愉快、常常搞笑的喜剧。
back_translation: A delightful and often humorous comedy.

text: a tour de force drama about the astonishingly pivotal role of imagination in the soulful development of two rowdy teenagers .
translation: 一部关于想象力在两个顽皮青少年灵魂发展中不可思议关键作用的精彩戏剧。
back_translation: A brilliant play about the incredible key role of imagination in the soul development of two playful teenagers.

text: good actors have a radar for juicy roles -- there 's a plethora of characters in this picture , and not one of them is flat .
translation: 优秀的演员对精彩角色有敏锐的洞察力——在这部作品中有大量角色，没有一个是平面的。
back_translation: Excellent actors have a keen insight into brilliant roles—this work features many characters, and none of them are one-dimensional.

text: after all , it 'll probably be in video stores by christmas , and it might just be better suited to a night in the living room than a night at the movies .

translation: 华丽而精致的工艺，但情感冷漠，这是一道错综复杂的难题，令人钦佩其精妙的构造，但很难在更深层次上产生联系。

translation: 在水下鬼故事中，《下沉》将其阴森的网撒向大西洋，并将其吐回，满是皱纹和焦炭，位于百慕大三角形的西北某处。
back_translation: In underwater ghost stories, "The Descent" casts its eerie net into the Atlantic, only to spew it back, wrinkled and scorched, somewhere northwest of the Bermuda Triangle.

text: the most compelling performance of the year adds substantial depth to this shocking testament to anti-semitism and neo-fascism .

text: well , jason 's gone to manhattan and hell , i guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for the inevitable future sequels -lrb- hey , do n't shoot the messenger -rrb- .

text: this odd , poetic road movie , spiked by jolts of pop music , pretty much takes place in morton 's ever-watchful gaze -- and it 's a tribute to the actress , and to her inventive director , that the journey is such a mesmerizing one .
translation: 这部奇特的诗意公路电影，伴随着流行音乐的震撼，几乎全部在莫顿那双永远注视的眼睛下展开——这既是对女演员的致敬，也是对她富有创意的导演的致敬，使得这一旅程如此迷人。
back_translation: This unique and poetic road movie unfolds almost entirely under the gaze of Morton's ever-watchful eyes, accompanied by the impact of popular music—paying homage both to the actress and to her imaginative director, which makes this journey so enchanting.

text: as gamely as the movie tries to make sense of its title character , there remains a huge gap between the film 's creepy , clean-cut dahmer -lrb- jeremy renner -rrb- and fiendish acts that no amount of earnest textbook psychologizing can bridge .
translation: 尽管这部电影努力让它的主角变得合理，但影片中干净利落的达默（杰瑞米·雷纳饰）与那些无法通过任何程度的严肃课堂心理学来弥补的凶残行为之间仍然存在巨大的鸿沟。
back_translation: Despite the film's efforts to make its protagonist relatable, there remains a huge gap between the clean-cut Dahmer (played by Jeremy Renner) and the brutal actions that cannot be justified by any level of serious classroom psychology.

translation: 聪明但无意义。

translation: 再次证明，如果电影制片人只遵循书籍，他们就不会出错。

translation: ... 明智而凄美的 ...

translation: 尽管部分在加拿大拍摄，但《全额支付》巧妙地捕捉了里根时代城市生活的方方面面。
back_translation: Despite being partially filmed in Canada, "Full Payment" cleverly captures various aspects of urban life during the Reagan era.

text: not counting a few gross-out comedies i 've been trying to forget , this is the first film in a long time that made me want to bolt the theater in the first 10 minutes .
translation: 不算我试图忘记的几部恶心喜剧，这是我很长时间以来第一部让我在前10分钟就想逃离影院的电影。

text: all of the elements are in place for a great film noir , but director george hickenlooper 's approach to the material is too upbeat .
translation: 所有元素都具备了一部伟大的黑色电影的基础，但导演乔治·希肯卢珀对素材的处理过于乐观。
back_translation: All the elements have the foundation of a great film noir, but director George Hickenlooper's handling of the material is overly optimistic.

text: the overall fabric is hypnotic , and mr. mattei fosters moments of spontaneous intimacy .
translation: 整体氛围令人着迷，而马泰先生则促成了自发亲密的时刻。

text: friday after next is a lot more bluster than bite .
translation: 下周五的事情更多的是虚张声势而非真正的影响。

translation: 电影中的歌剧从来都令人不满意。

text: nicole holofcenter , the insightful writer\/director responsible for this illuminating comedy does n't wrap the proceedings up neatly but the ideas tie together beautifully .
translation: 尼科尔·霍洛夫森，这位富有洞察力的编剧/导演，负责这部启发性的喜剧，她并没有将事情 neatly 收尾，但这些想法美妙地结合在一起。
back_translation: Nicole Holofcener, the insightful writer/director behind this inspiring comedy, doesn't tie things up neatly, but these ideas come together wonderfully.

text: but , like silence , it 's a movie that gets under your skin .
translation: 但，就像《沉默》一样，这是一部深入人心的电影。
back_translation: However, like "Silence," this is a deeply affecting film.

text: gooding and coburn are both oscar winners , a fact which , as you watch them clumsily mugging their way through snow dogs , seems inconceivable .
translation: 古丁和科伯恩都是奥斯卡奖得主，这一点在你观看他们笨拙地在《雪狗》中表演时，似乎难以置信。
back_translation: Goulding and Coburn are both Oscar winners, which seems hard to believe when you watch them awkwardly perform in "Snow Dogs."

text: loud , silly , stupid and pointless .
translation: 大声、愚蠢、无意义。

text: while it 's nothing we have n't seen before from murphy , i spy is still fun and enjoyable and so aggressively silly that it 's more than a worthwhile effort .
translation: 虽然这是我们从墨菲身上见过的，但《间谍》依然有趣且令人愉悦，极其搞笑，值得一试。
back_translation: Although this is something we have seen from Murphy, "The Spy" is still interesting and enjoyable, extremely funny, and worth a try.

text: mctiernan 's remake may be lighter on its feet -- the sober-minded original was as graceful as a tap-dancing rhino -- but it is just as boring and as obvious .
translation: 麦克蒂尔南的重拍版本可能轻松一些——那个严肃的原创版如同一只优雅的踢踏舞犀牛——但它同样无聊而明显。

text: if you 're looking to rekindle the magic of the first film , you 'll need a stronger stomach than us .
translation: 如果你想重温第一部电影的魔力，你需要比我们更强的胃口。
back_translation: If you want to relive the magic of the first movie, you need a stronger appetite than we do.

text: an average b-movie with no aspirations to be anything more .
translation: 一部没有任何追求的普通B级电影。
back_translation: An ordinary B-grade movie with no ambitions at all.

text: a film that plays things so nice 'n safe as to often play like a milquetoast movie of the week blown up for the big screen .
translation: 一部把事情处理得如此温和和安全，以至于常常像一部为大银幕放大的温吞吞的周末电影。
back_translation: A film that handles matters so gently and safely that it often feels like a slow-paced weekend movie enlarged for the big screen.

text: the movie straddles the fence between escapism and social commentary , and on both sides it falls short .
translation: 这部电影在逃避现实和社会评论之间摇摆不定，而且在两个方面都显得不足。
back_translation: This movie wavers between escaping reality and social commentary, and it is lacking in both aspects.

text: only masochistic moviegoers need apply .
translation: 只有受虐狂的电影观众才需要申请。
back_translation: Only masochistic moviegoers need to apply.

text: is anyone else out there getting tired of the whole slo-mo , double-pistoled , ballistic-pyrotechnic hong kong action aesthetic ?
translation: 还有其他人对这种慢动作、双枪、弹道火花的香港动作美学感到厌倦吗？
back_translation: Are there others who are tired of this slow-motion, dual-wielding, ballistic spark aesthetic of Hong Kong action?

text: like shrek , spirit 's visual imagination reminds you of why animation is such a perfect medium for children , because of the way it allows the mind to enter and accept another world .
translation: 像《怪物史瑞克》和《精灵》的视觉想象力，让人想起动画为何是儿童如此完美的媒介，因为它能够让心灵进入并接受另一个世界。
back_translation: The visual imagination of films like "Shrek" and "Trolls" reminds us why animation is such a perfect medium for children; it allows the mind to enter and embrace another world.

text: statham employs an accent that i think is supposed to be an attempt at hardass american but sometimes just lapses into unhidden british .
translation: 斯坦森使用的口音我认为是试图模仿强硬的美国口音，但有时却会不经意地暴露出他明显的英国口音。
back_translation: I think the accent that Statham uses is an attempt to imitate a tough American accent, but sometimes it inadvertently reveals his distinct British accent.

text: a yawn-provoking little farm melodrama .
translation: 一个令人打哈欠的小农场情节剧。

text: for all its shoot-outs , fistfights , and car chases , this movie is a phlegmatic bore , so tedious it makes the silly spy vs. spy film the sum of all fears , starring ben affleck , seem downright hitchcockian .

back_translation: Despite the numerous gunfights, fistfights, and car chases, this movie remains a dull and boring work, so tedious that the silly spy duel film "The Sum of All Fears," starring Ben Affleck, seems almost Hitchcockian in its classic quality.

text: it might not be 1970s animation , but everything else about it is straight from the saturday morning cartoons -- a retread story , bad writing , and the same old silliness .

text: spreads itself too thin , leaving these actors , as well as the members of the commune , short of profound characterizations

text: -lrb- less a movie than -rrb- an appalling , odoriferous thing ... so rotten in almost every single facet of production that you 'll want to crawl up your own \*\*\* in embarrassment .

back_translation: - (It would be more accurate to say that it is not a movie, but rather a shocking and foul-smelling thing... so rotten in almost every aspect of its production that it makes you feel ashamed, wanting to crawl into your own ***.)

text: funny and touching .
translation: 有趣而感人。

text: affirms the gifts of all involved , starting with spielberg and going right through the ranks of the players -- on-camera and off -- that he brings together .

text: a fifty car pileup of cliches .

text: will warm your heart without making you feel guilty about it .
translation: 会让你感到温暖，而不用因此感到内疚。

text: one of the most unpleasant things the studio has ever produced .

text: a glib but bouncy bit of sixties-style slickness in which the hero might wind up caught but the audience gets pure escapism .

text: this one is not nearly as dreadful as expected .

text: the result is a powerful , naturally dramatic piece of low-budget filmmaking .

text: does n't deliver a great story , nor is the action as gripping as in past seagal films .

text: chilling in its objective portrait of dreary , lost twenty-first century america .
translation: 在其对阴郁、迷失的二十一世纪美国的客观描绘中令人毛骨悚然。

text: the auteur 's ear for the way fears and slights are telegraphed in the most blithe exchanges gives the film its lingering tug .
translation: 这位导演对恐惧和轻视在最轻松的交流中被传达的方式的敏锐洞察，使得这部影片具有持久的吸引力。

text: a rehash of every gangster movie from the past decade .
translation: 过去十年所有黑帮电影的重述。

translation: 令人震惊、毁灭性的纪录片，讲述了两个心理失调的青少年在毒品麻痹的 spirals 下的生活。

text: the somber pacing and lack of dramatic fireworks make green dragon seem more like medicine than entertainment .
translation: 沉闷的节奏和缺乏戏剧性的火花使得《绿龙》看起来更像是一种药物，而不是娱乐。

text: below is well below expectations .
translation: 远低于预期。

translation: 一部典型美国恐怖片的通用国际版。

text: includes too much obvious padding .
translation: 包含了太多明显的填充。

text: at just over an hour , home movie will leave you wanting more , not to mention leaving you with some laughs and a smile on your face .
translation: 这部家庭电影时长刚过一个小时，会让你想要更多，更不用说会让你笑声不断，脸上挂着微笑。

text: the movie 's ultimate point -- that everyone should be themselves -- is trite , but the screenwriter and director michel gondry restate it to the point of ridiculousness .
translation: 这部电影的最终观点——每个人都应该做自己——虽然司空见惯，但编剧兼导演米歇尔·冈瑞却将其重申到荒谬的地步。

text: a fine documentary can be distinguished from a mediocre one by the better film 's ability to make its subject interesting to those who are n't part of its supposed target audience .
translation: 一部优秀的纪录片与平庸的纪录片的区别在于，前者能够使其主题吸引那些不在其预期目标观众之中的人。

text: in the wake of saving private ryan , black hawk down and we were soldiers , you are likely to be as heartily sick of mayhem as cage 's war-weary marine .
translation: 在《拯救大兵瑞恩》、《黑鹰坠落》和《我们是战士》的影响下，你可能会像凯奇的疲惫海军陆战队员一样，对暴乱感到厌倦。

text: peppered with witty dialogue and inventive moments .
translation: 充满机智的对话和富有创意的时刻。

text: -- is a crime that should be punishable by chainsaw .

translation: 无论你是否受到德里达关于“他者”和“自我”的任何讲座启发，德里达无疑是一个迷人而富有戏谑精神的人物。

text: parents may even find that it goes by quickly , because it has some of the funniest jokes of any movie this year , including those intended for adults .
translation: 父母可能会发现这部电影过得很快，因为它包含了今年所有电影中一些最搞笑的笑话，包括那些为成年人准备的笑话。

text: -lrb- gulpilil -rrb- is a commanding screen presence , and his character 's abundant humanism makes him the film 's moral compass .

text: the screenplay never lets us forget that bourne was once an amoral assassin just like the ones who are pursuing him ... there is never really a true `` us '' versus `` them '' .
translation: 剧本从未让我们忘记，伯恩曾经也是一名没有道德底线的刺客，就像那些追捕他的刺客一样……其实并没有真正的“我们”与“他们”之分。

translation: 对芝加哥摇滚乐队Wilco的幕后有趣观察...

text: the only thing scary about feardotcom is that the filmmakers and studio are brazen enough to attempt to pass this stinker off as a scary movie .

text: mention `` solaris '' five years from now and i 'm sure those who saw it will have an opinion to share .

text: that ` alabama ' manages to be pleasant in spite of its predictability and occasional slowness is due primarily to the perkiness of witherspoon -lrb- who is always a joy to watch , even when her material is not first-rate -rrb- ...

back_translation: Despite the predictability and occasional slowness of the plot in Alabama, its enjoyment largely stems from Witherspoon's lively performance (even if her material isn't top-notch, her performance remains delightful).

text: pacino is the best he 's been in years and keener is marvelous .
translation: 帕奇诺是近年来最出色的，基纳也表现得很棒。

text: much of the cast is stiff or just plain bad .

text: it 's excessively quirky and a little underconfident in its delivery , but otherwise this is the best ` old neighborhood ' project since christopher walken kinda romanced cyndi lauper in the opportunists .
translation: 它过于古怪，表现上有些缺乏自信，但除此之外，这是自克里斯托弗·沃肯在《 opportunists》中与辛迪·劳珀有些恋爱关系以来，最好的“老邻居”项目。

text: imagine the cleanflicks version of ` love story , ' with ali macgraw 's profanities replaced by romance-novel platitudes .
translation: 想象一下《爱情故事》的 CleanFlicks 版本，其中阿莉·麦克格劳（Ali MacGraw）所说的脏话被浪漫小说中的陈词滥调所替代。

text: extremely well acted by the four primary actors , this is a seriously intended movie that is not easily forgotten .

text: bound to appeal to women looking for a howlingly trashy time .

text: such a fine idea for a film , and such a stultifying , lifeless execution .

text: return to neverland manages to straddle the line between another classic for the company and just another run-of-the-mill disney sequel intended for the home video market .

back_translation: "Back to Dream Island" finds a balance between being a classic work of the company and an average Disney sequel made for the family video market.

text: writer-director david jacobson and his star , jeremy renner , have made a remarkable film that explores the monster 's psychology not in order to excuse him but rather to demonstrate that his pathology evolved from human impulses that grew hideously twisted .
translation: 编剧兼导演大卫·雅各布森以及他的主演杰瑞米·雷纳制作了一部引人注目的影片，探讨了怪物的心理，不是为了给他辩解，而是为了展示他的病理是如何源于人类冲动并扭曲成可怕的模样。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director David Jacobson, along with his lead actor Jeremy Renner, created a compelling film that explores the psyche of a monster, not to justify him, but to show how his pathology originates from human impulses and distorts into a terrifying form.

text: drama of temptation , salvation and good intentions is a thoughtful examination of faith , love and power .
translation: 诱惑、救赎和良好意图的戏剧是对信仰、爱情和权力的深思熟虑的探讨。

text: oddly compelling .
translation: 奇异而令人着迷。

text: a small fortune in salaries and stunt cars might have been saved if the director , tom dey , had spliced together bits and pieces of midnight run and 48 hours -lrb- and , for that matter , shrek -rrb- .
translation: 如果导演汤姆·戴（Tom Dey）将《午夜狂奔》和《48小时》（顺便说一下，《怪物史莱克》）的片段拼接在一起，可能会节省一小笔薪水和特技车的费用。
back_translation: If director Tom Dey were to splice together clips from "Midnight Run" and "48 Hours" (by the way, "Shrek"), it might save a small amount on salaries and stunt car expenses.

text: strange , funny , twisted , brilliant and macabre .
translation: 奇怪，有趣，扭曲，辉煌而阴森。

text: a movie that will thrill you , touch you and make you laugh as well .
translation: 一部将让你兴奋、感动并让你欢笑的电影。

text: this is very much of a mixed bag , with enough negatives to outweigh the positives .
translation: 这是一种非常复杂的情况，负面因素足以超过正面因素。

translation: 《灵异鬼屋》是个灾难般的故事，漏洞百出，完全缺乏惊悚感。
